item.text: (ma) @#/ ! /gsang sngags rgyud 'bum gyi skor bzhugs so/ /
(黃) 秘密經第十六部
@#/ /rgya gar skad du/ ar+ya a mo g+ha pA sha kal pa rA dzA/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags
pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po/ bam po dang po/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di
skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das ri bo po ta la na/ spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi pho
brang shing sa la dang / ta ma la dang / tsam pa ka dang / mya ngan 'tshang dang / a ti mug ta ka sna tshogs mang pos legs par
brgyan pa na/ dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po brgya stong dang / byang chub sems dpa' sa ya bye ba brgya stong phrag dgu bcu
rtsa dgu dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ gnas gtsang ma'i rigs kyi lha'i bu brgya stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing
mdun gyis bltas pa na/ dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / tshangs pa dang / lha'i bu rnams kyi dbang du mdzad nas chos

ston par mdzad do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ thal mo

sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su 'dzum pa'i bzhin gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das gang 'di don yod pa'i rgyal po'i snying po zhes bgyi ba mchis te/ bdag gis bskal

pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig gi sngon logs su 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par blta bar/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten dbang phyug rgyal po las mnos nas/ 'di ltar bdag gis dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa lha'i bu

rnams dang / gnas gtsang ma'i lha'i bu brgya stong phrag mang po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dzin du stsal nas/ bdag gis rmongs pa ma mchis pa'i ye shes bkod pa la sogs te ting nge 'dzin brgya stong phrag bcu

thob par bgyis lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar yang sa phyogs gang du snying po 'di spyod pa'i sa phyogs der/ dbang phyug dang dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa lha'i bu khri nyis stong bsrung ba dang / sba ba'i slad du gnas

par rig par bgyi lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das gang na don yod pa'i phun sum tshogs pa'i snying po 'di spyod pa'i sa phyogs de mchod rten du bkur bar 'gyur lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das sems can de dag ni sangs rgyas bye ba khrag

khrig stong phrag la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur lags so/ /gang zhig don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po 'di nyan par bgyid na/ bcom ldan 'das sdig pa spyod pa'am/ sdig pa'i chos kun tu spyod pa'am/ 'phags pa la skur ba 'debs pa

'am/ dam pa'i chos spong ba 'am/ mnar med par gzhol ba 'am/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad spong ba de 'gyod par 'gyur zhing / ma 'ongs pa na sdom pa 'thob par 'gyur lags so/ /bcom

ldan 'das re shig de nyid kyis zhag gcig smyung ba bgyis te/ bzlas brjod bgyis na/ tshe 'di nyid la las de rnam par dag pa dang / gtugs pa dang bsal bar 'gyur ro/ /rims nyin gcig pa 'am/ rims nyin gnyis pa 'am/ nyin gsum pa 'am/

nyin bzhi pa 'am/ de bzhin du rims nyin bdun pa 'am/ mig nad dang / rna ba'i nad dang / sna'i nad dam/ so dang mchu'i nad dam/ lce dang rkan gyi nad dam/ snying nad dam/ lto nad dam/ ro rgyab dang rked pa'i nad dam/ yan lag gam nying

lag gi nad dam/ gzhang 'brum 'am/ pho ba'i nad dam/ tshad pa 'am/ lag pa dang rkang pa'i nad dam/ sna nad dang glad pa'i nad dam/ sha bkra chen po 'am/ sha gzig gu 'am/ mdze 'am rkang shu'am 'brum bu phra mo 'am/ lhog pa 'am/

mtshan bar rdol pa'am/ 'brum bu 'am/ brjed byed dam/ byad dam/ gzhan gyis bgyis pa'i gsod pa 'am/ 'ching ba 'am/ brdeg pa 'am/ skrod pa 'am/ bden pa ma lags pas skur ba 'debs pa 'am/ bcom ldan 'das mdor na lus kyis

gdung pa'am/ sems kyis gdung ba 'am/ rmi lam ngan pa'i las de yongs su gtugs par gyur na/ sems can dag pa lhag par dad pa rnams kyis yongs su byang bar 'gyur ba lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ /bcom ldan 'das gal te 'khor bzhi 'am/ rigs bzhi

las gang dag rgyu dang / g.yo dag gis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po 'di nyan par bgyid/ 'dzin par bgyid/ 'chang bar bgyid/ klog par bgyid/ 'bri bar bgyid 'brir 'jug par bgyid/ kun chub par bgyid/ sems can gzhan la yang sgrogs par bgyid cing /

tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gtogs pa rnams kyi rna bug tu gtad de/ rna bar bzlas brjod bgyid la/ rdo rje'i tshig 'di rnams sems par bgyid de/ skur par ma mchis pa dang / gzugs ma mchis pa dang / rnam par mi rtog pa dang / kun du 'byung ba ma mchis pa dang /

ring du 'gro ba ma mchis pa dang / bgyid pa ma mchis pa dang / gos pa ma mchis pa dang / sems mnyam pa nyid dang / ma bral ba dang / phung po lnga dang bral ba ste/ rnal 'byor 'dis sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom par bgyid na/ de la phyogs bcu nas sangs rgyas

stong zhal ston par mdzad par 'gyur zhing / nongs pa 'chags par 'gyur ba la sogs pa rgyas par sbyar ro/ /glegs bam du bgyis te khyim na 'chang bar bgyid dam/ rje dpon gyis skrag pas bgyis sam/ bzhad gad tsam gyi rgyus

nyan par bgyid na/ bcom ldan 'das mkhas pas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mthus/ de dag gi rna khung du sgra de grag pa lags par 'tshal bar bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das dper na skyes bu 'ga' zhig gis tsan

dan nam/ ga bur ram gla rtsi zhig la khros sam/ yongs su smad de rdo la btags nas/ bdag nyid la byugs na tsan dan nam/ ga bur ram/ gla rtsi de 'di snyam du 'dis bdag la khros sam/ yongs su smad pas dri mnam par mi bgyi'o snyam du

mi sems kyi/ gzhan du na de nyid la dri bda' bar bgyid lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du bdag gi don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po 'di yang gang su yang rung bas/ bzhad gad tsam gyis zhes bya ba rgyas par sbyar ro/ /bcom ldan 'das g.yo

dang sgyus mchod par bgyid na yang de nyid sems can dmu rgod dag gi dge ba'i rgyur 'gyur lags so/ /gang dang gang du skye bar 'gyur bar/ tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / bsod nams kyi tshogs kyi dri dang bral bar mi 'gyur te/ tshul khrims kyi dri bda'

bar bgyid lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das gang yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge slong pha 'am/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen pha 'am/ dge bsnyen ma 'am/ de las gzhan pa'i sems can su yang rung bas/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i

snying po'i ched du yar ngo'i tshes brgyad la smyung ba bgyis te/ gzhan mi smra bar don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyid na/ bcom ldan 'das des tshe 'di nyid la phan yon nyi shu rtsa gcig 'thob par 'gyur te/ nyi shu rtsa gcig

gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ de'i lus la nad rnams 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de'i lus la las kyi dbang gis nad rnams byung yang myur du zhi bar 'gyur zhing / lus mdangs dang ldan pa dang yid du mchi bar 'gyur ro/ /skye bo mang po'i snying du sdug pa dang / dbang po

sbas par 'gyur ro/ /de'i don rnams 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /de'i don grub pa yang chom rkun gyis mi 'phrogs te/ zhugs kyis mi 'tshig chab kyis mi 'tshal rgyal po'i mthus dbrog par rngo mi thog par 'gyur ro/ /de'i lus kyi mtha' rnams

rgyas par 'gyur te/ ser bas ma lags so/ /chab kyi 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rlung dang char gyi 'jigs pa ma lags so/ /don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po thal ba 'am/ chu la lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis nas/ zhing gi phyogs

mtshams dang steng 'og tu bcing ba bgyis na gnod pa thams cad nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /gzi brjid dang mdangs 'phrogs par rngo mi thog par 'gyur zhing sems can thams cad kyi snying du sdug pa dang yid la 'thad par 'gyur ro/ /de la dgra'i 'jigs pa

'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de la dgra'i 'jigs pa byung yang myur du zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /de la mi ma lags pa'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ byad kyi 'jigs pa ma lags mkha' 'gro ma'i 'jigs pa ma lags te/ de la nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon

mongs pa drag po 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /me dang mtshon dang / dug gis 'gum par mi 'gyur ro/ /de la yang lha rnams kyis rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bsrung ba dang / skyob pa dang sbed pa'i phyir gnas par 'gyur ro/ /gang dang gang du skye bar 'gyur bar

byams pa dang snying rje dang dga' ba dang btang snyoms dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur te/ de la phan yon nyi shu rtsa gcig po 'di dag thob par 'gyur lags so/ /gzhan yang chos brgyad 'thob par 'gyur te brgyad gang zhe na 'gum pa'i dus su 'phags pa spyan

ras gzigs dbang phyug dge slong gi gzugs su mngon sum du zhal ston par 'gyur ro/ /bde bar 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur ro/ /lta ba 'khrul par mi 'gyur ro/ /lag pa mi g.yob dang dang / rkang pa mi g.yob pa dang bshang gci ma mchis pa dang khri'i

steng du 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur ro/ /dran pa shin du nye bar gnas par 'gyur ro/ /kha bub du 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro/ /'gum pa'i dus na yang spobs pa mi bas par 'gyur ro/ /de yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang du smon pa der skye bar

'gyur zhing dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ /nyin gcig bzhin du dus gsum du bzlas brjod bgyi'o/ /chang dang sha dang kun dong dang ke'u dang sgog skya dang / 'dres pa dang / lhag rol dang / 'di rnams khyad par du don du gnyer bas spang

bar bgyi'o/ /don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang sems can rnams la mthu mchis pa dang / mthu ma mchis pa la 'tshal bar bgyis nas bsgrag par bgyi'o/ /slob dpon gyis dpe mkhyud mi bgyi'o/ /'di ltar dri ma dang bral

zhing phrag dog dang ser sna spangs pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams lags te/ sems can rnams kyi don bgyi ba'i slad du sangs rgyas kyi byang chub 'thob par 'gyur bas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshogs kyi nang du gtogs so/ /byang chub

ces bgyi ba ni shes rab lags te sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba ni thabs lagaso/ chos 'di gnyis sems can rnams kyi don bgyi ba'i slad du kho nas thob pa lags so/ /gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la rjes su gnang na/ 'di ltar

bdag gi snying po 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar 'khor bzhi rnams dang gzhan sdig pa spyod pa rnams kyi don dang / sman pa dang bde ba'i slad du bsgrag par bgyi'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras

gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /sems can dag pa de'i dus la bab par shes na khyod smros shig /de bzhin gshegs pas rjes su yi rang bar mdzad zin te/ phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa can rnams la

pha'i bya ba byed par 'gyur ro/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mig mi 'dzums par bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag bgyis pa rnam par grol

ba'i dkyil 'khor skye bo mang po la sman pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba dang / skye bo'i tshogs chen po'i don du bdag la gsan du gsol/ dus gsum du gshegs shing bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'

thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rang sangs rgyas dang / 'phags pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /yang dag par song ba rnams dang / yang dag par zhugs pa rnams

la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byams pa la sogs pa ste byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par

rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la

phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad ya thA/ oM tsa ra tsa ra/ tsi ri tsi ri/ tsu ru tsu ru/ e h+ye hi ma hA kA ru Ni ka /tsi ri tsi ri/ mi ri mi ri/ tsu ru tsu ru/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ si ri si ri/ tsi ri tsi ri/ pi ri pi ri/ bi ri bi ri/ ma hA pad ma hAsta/ ka la ka

la/ ki li ki li/ ku lu ku lu/ ma hA shud d+ha satwa/ bud d+h+ya bud d+h+ya/ d+hA ba d+hA ba/ ka Na ka Na/ ki Ni ki Ni/ ku Nu ku Nu/ pa ra ma shud d+ha satwa/ ka ra ka ra/ ki ri ki ri/ ku ru ku ru/ ma hAs+thA ma prA pa ta / tsa la tsa la/ sany+tsa la sany+tsa la/ bi tsa la bi tsa

la/ e Ta Ta/ e Ta Ta/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ b+hi ri b+hi ri/ b+hu ru b+hu ru/ e h+ye hi ma hA kA ru Ni ka /ma hA pa sh+'u ba ti be sha d+ha ra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ sa ra sa ra/ tsa ra tsa ra/ ha ra ha ra/ ha hA ha hA/ hi hI hi hI/ hu hU hu hU \u0f00/ kA ra brah+ma/ be Sha d+ha ra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/

d+hu ru d+hu ru/ ta ra ta ra/ sa ra sa ra/ pa ra pa ra/ tsa ra tsa ra/ rash+mi sha ta sa ha sra pra ti man Di ta/ sha rI ra ya/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ ta pa ta pa/ b+ha ga wan/ so ma A di t+ya/ ya ma ba ru Na/ ku be ra/ bra n+d+ra ri Shi de ba ga Na/ a b+h+ya rtsi ta tsa ra Na/ su ru su ru/ tsu ru tsu ru/ mu ru mu ru/

pu ru pu ru/ sa nad ku mA ra/ ru dra/ bA sa ba/ biSh+Nu d+ha na dA/ de ba r-i Shi nA ya ka /ba hu bi bi d+ha/ be Sha d+ha ra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+ha ri d+ha ri/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ tha ra tha ra/ g+ha ra g+ha ra/ ya ra ya ra/ la ra la ra/ ha ra ha ra/ ma ra ma ra/ pa ra pa ra/ ba ra ba ra/ ba ra dA ya ka /sa man+ta a ba lo ki ta/ bi lo

ki ta/ lo ke shwa ra ma he shwa ra/ mu hu mu hu/ mu ru mu ru/ mu ya mu ya/ mun tsa mun tsa/ bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis dpal sa gsum gyi lha rnams dang / bdag dang / sems can thams cad 'jigs pa thams cad dang /

gnod pa thams cad dang / 'tshe ba thams cad dang / gdon thams cad las bsrungs shig /bsrungs shig /gsad pa dang / bcing ba dang / bsdigs pa dang / rgyal po dang / chom po dang / rkun po dang / me dang / chu dang / dug dang / mtshon las yongs su thar

bar mdzad pa/ ka Na ka Na/ ki Ni ki Ni/ ku Nu ku Nu/ tsa ra tsa ra/ in dri ya/ ba la bo d+h+yA~M ga /tsa tur/ sa r+ya saM pra kA sha ka /ta pa ta pa/ da ma da ma/ sa ma sa ma/ ma sa ma sa/ ma hA ta mo an d+ha kA ra/ bi d+ha ma na Sha/ Ta pa ra mi tA pa ri pU ra ka /

mi li mi li/ Ta Ta Ta Ta/ Tha Tha Tha Tha/ Ti Ti Ti Ti/ Tu Tu Tu Tu/ e ne ya tsar ma kri ta pa ri ka ra/ e h+ye hi/ I shwa ra ma he shwa ra/ ma hA b+hU ta ga Na sa~M b+hany+dza ka /ku ru ku ru/ pa ra pa ra/ ka ra ka ra/ ka Ta ka Ta/ ma Ta ma Ta/ bi shud d+ha/ bi Sha ya/ bA si na ma hA kA ru

Ni ka /shwe ta ya dz+nyo pa bi ta/ rad na mu ku Ta/ mA lA d+ha ra/ sarba dz+nyA shi ra/ si kr-i ta mu ku Ta/ mA lA d+ha ra/ ma hA da b+hU ta/ ka ma lA la~M kr-i ta/ ka ra d+hA ya/ d+h+yA na sa mA d+hi/ bi mo k+Sha/ a pra ka~M pya/ ba hu satwa san ta hi pa ri pA tsa ka /ma hA kA ru Ni ka /sarba

kar ma A ba ra Na bi sho d+ha ka sarba byA d+h-i pa ri mo tsa ka /sarba A shA pa ri p+'u ra ka /sarba satwa sa mA shwa a sa ka ra/ na mo stu te swA hA/ bklags pas las thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /dus gsum du bzlas brjod bgyis na/ mtshams med

pa lnga 'byang bar 'gyur zhing / las ky-i sgrib pa thams cad kyang yongs su dag par bgyid do/ mtshams bcad pa ni/ a ga ru'i bdug pa 'am/ thal ba dang / chab ba~M/ yungs kar dang / seng ldeng gi phur bu la sogs pas so/ /rims thams cad

la ni skud pas so/ /nad thams cad la ni mar ram/ 'bru mar ram/ chab la bzlas brjod bgyis te gtor bar bgyi'o/ /byad dgrol ba la ni mtshon gyis so/ /lto na ba la ni srung ba'i skud pas so/ /dug bsad pa la ni sa 'am chab kyis so/ /mig nad la

ni skud pa dkar pos rna ba la gdags par bgyi'o/ /so na ba la ni shing ka ra bi ra'i so shing gis so/ /mtshams bcad pa ni/ tshon sna lnga'i skud pa la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis te/ seng ldeng gi phur bu bzhi la bcings nas/ phyogs

bzhir gzugs par bgyis na/ mtshams chen po bcing bar 'gyur ro/ /thams cad bsrung ba ni skud pa 'am/ chab bam thal bas so/ /gdon thams cad la ni tshon sna lnga'i skud pas so/ /rims thams cad la ni skud pa dkar pos so/ /g.yan pa

dang / khyi rngo dang / lhog pa dang / mgrin pa 'gags pa thams cad la ni sbrang rtsi dang / pi pi ling sres pas so/ /mig nad la ni dri chu 'am/ shing pa la sha'i chu 'am/ shing mngar gyis chus so/ /rna ba'i nad la ni 'bru mar gyis so/ /'thab pa dang / 'thab

mo dang / rtsod par 'gyed pa dang / skur pa 'debs pa thams cad la ni chab la bzlas brjod bgyis te/ kha bshal bar bgyi'o/ /dpung dang yul dang rgyal srid dang / yul 'khor thams cad bsrung ba la ni bum pa gang ba gzhag la gos gtsang ma

bgos pas mchod pa rgya chen po bgyis nas/ bklag par bgyis na zhi ba chen por 'gyur ro/ /der yang chab kyis gtor bar bgyis te/ sems can thams cad la bsrung ba bgyis par 'gyur lags so/ /yams kyi nad dang gnod pa dang 'tshe

ba thams cad zhi bar bgyid pa dang / glags lta ba rnams la ni tsan dan la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis te/ snying gar byug par bgyi'o/ /mtshams med pa'i las thams cad bas par bgyi ba ni/ rtag tu bzlas brjod kyis so/ /khyim

bsrung ba la ni pad ma'i sbyin sreg gis so/ /sems can thams cad bskyang ba dang / 'byung po'i 'jigs pa dang / gdon thams cad bsrung ba la ni tsan dan gyi sbyin sreg gis so/ /dza ya dang bi dza ya dang / na ku li dang / g+han d+ha na gu li dang /

ba ru ni dang / tsai 'gra ba ru Ni dang / a b+ha ya ba ni dang / in dra ba ni dang / g+han d+ha pri yang gu dang / rgya spos dang / tsakra dang / ma hA tsakra biSh+Nu kran ta dang / so ma ra dzi dang / su nan da rnams la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis te/ nor bur

bgyis nas spyi bo 'am/ dpung pa la btags pas bsrel bar bgyi'o/ /khye'u rnams la ni mgul par ro/ /bu mo rnams la ni sta zur nas te/ dpal dang ldan par bgyid pa dang / bkra mi shis pa rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa'i nor bu

'di bsres na thams cad las bsrung ba bgyis par 'gyur ro/ /dug dang mes mi tshugs lags so/ /dug gis gnod pa bskyed par mi 'gyur ro/ /skyes na yang gnod pa bskyed par mi bgyid cing / myur du zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /gdon rnams

zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /rlung dang 'brug dang ser ba gcad pa dang / chab kyi rgyun dang / ser ba zlog la ni shing ka ra bi ra'i lcug mas te/ las thams cad bgyid pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po grub pa dam pa ma bsgrubs par las

'di rnams bgyid par 'gyur lags so/ /de nas bsgrub par 'tshal na ni ras la lhag ma ma yin pa'i tshon rtsis/ sangs rgyas dang 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug gi gzugs brnyan ral pa'-i thor tshugs dang e na ya'i lpags

pa dang / phyugs bdag gi cha lugs 'chang la/ rgyan thams cad ky-is brgyan pa bri bar bgyi ste/ ri mo mkhan gso sbyong can 'dril stsal bar bgyi'o/ /de nas sgrub pa pos sku gzugs de'i spyan sngar ba'i lci ba'i dkyil 'khor bgyis te/ me tog dkar po'i

sil ma bkram la/ spos kyis bkang ba'i snod brgyad gzhag par bgyi'o/ /sna brgyad pa 'am drug bcu rtsa bzhi pa 'am/ gzhan yang lha bshos sha dang / khrag dang ma 'dres pa bshams shing drangs la/ a ka ru'i bdug pas bdugs te/ lan stong

rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi'o/ /nyin zhag gcig gam/ nyin zhag gsum du smyung ba bgyis nas zas dkar gsum 'tshal te/ dus gsum du khrus bgyis nas/ gos gtsang ma bgos na/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bdag nyid
mchis nas/ bsams pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyid do/ /ldong ros sam mig sman la bzlas brjod bgyis te/ mig la bskus na de nas mi gda' bar gyur nas nam mkha' la mchi bar 'gyur zhing don yod pa'i

ye shes bkod pa thams cad zhes bgyi ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob par 'gyur te/ ci 'tshal ba de bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /de ni 'grub pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras

gzigs dbang phyug dang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu de dag dang / mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen po'i lha'i bu rnams yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /

don yod pa'i zhags pa rdzogs so// // de bzhin gshegs pa rgya mtsho rab 'byam thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug stan las langs te bla

gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/ nyi ma'i 'od ltar 'od zer stong 'phro zhing / 'od zer sna tshogs pa 'gyed pa'i lus kyis bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba

btud de/ zhal gyi dkyil 'khor rgyas shing rdzogs la zhi ba/ bzhin 'dzum pa'i bzhin gyis byams pa dang / snying rje chen po'i mthu yid la byed pas/ rigs bzhi yi 'jig rten la phan pa dang / snying brtse bas don thams cad grub

par rig sngags 'chang rnams kyi bla na med pa'i de kho na nyid grub pa mchog sbyin pa thob par bya ba'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag la don yod pa'i rgyal po'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po

chen po'i snying po 'di mchis te/ 'di pad ma rgya chen po'i dkyil 'khor de kho na nyid chen po'i snying por 'phags pa snying por gyur pa/ de kho na nyid grub pa pad ma dam pa dkyil 'khor chen po 'di phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags dang / snying po rim par phye ba

gsang ba dam pa rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor dam tshig dang / sgrub pa gsang ba 'di/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bsgrag par bgyi'o/ /lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye

chen po mang po'i 'khor chen po'i mdun dang / rig sngags grub pa'i lha'i dkyil 'khor gyi mdun 'dir yang bsgrag par bgyi'o/ /gang yang dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / tshangs pa dang / lha dang gshin rje dang / chu lha dang /

lus ngan dang / drang srong gi tshogs dang / zla ba dang / nyi ma dang / skar ma'i tshogs dang / rgyu skar dang / rig sngags 'chang grub pa'i lha mo rnams kyi mdun du de kho na nyid kyi snying po yang dag pa 'jig rten las 'das pa/ dngos grub sgrub pa bklags

pas grub pa dang / bsgoms pas grub pa bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar rig sngags chen po 'chang ba'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba'i mdun du de kho na nyid kyi snying po gsang ba dam pa bsgrags shing brjod par bgyi'o/ /de nas

bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i bsod nams stong gis brgyan pa mtshan dang dpe byad rnams kyis rnam par spras pa/ phyag dpung pa'i mdog gser gyi kha dog lta bu 'od zer 'phro ba du ma'i phreng ba dang /

spos kyi glang po che'i sna lta bu'i phyag brkyang ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyi bor gzhag nas klad pa la byugs te/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /

sems can dag pa dam pa snying rje chen po dang ldan pa khyod smros shig / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs te/ ngas kyang da ltar byin gyis rlob kyis khyod gsang ba dam pa'i dam tshig smros shig /phyogs

bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rjes su yi rang zhing byin gyis brlabs pa gang gA'i klung gi 'bum phrag bye ba brgya stong gi bye ma'i rdul phra rab snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis kyang byin gyis brlabs shing

rjes su yi rang bar mdzad do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis phyogs bcur bltas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar rang gi snying po de kho na nyid gsang ba'i

gsang sngags 'di dag gsol to/ /oM pad ma hasta/ ma hA a mo g+ha pA sha sA d+ha ya sa ma ya hri da yan tsa ra tsa ra hU~M/ don yod zhags pa'i rang bzhin gyi gzungs kyi snying po yin no/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gsang ba'i snying po 'di brjod ma thag tu ri'i rgyal po po ta la 'di brag dang nags tshal dang / rtsi shing du bcas pa dang / ri rab khor yug dang / khor yug chen po dang bcas pa rnams

rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos shing lha'i gnas rnams ldeg par gyur te/ thams cad 'dar 'dar por gyur to/ /klu'i gnas dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po'i gnas rnams kyang 'khrug par gyur to/ /rgya mtsho chen po'i rlabs kyang

'khrug par gyur to/ /chu gter rnams kyang 'khrug par gyur to/ /de ma thag tu phyogs bcu na sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs brnyan bzhugs pa rnams kyis legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ 'di skad ces kyang bka' stsal to/ /rgyal

ba'i bdag nyid du skyes pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i gsang ba'i snying po bklags pas 'grub pa bla na med pa smras pa legs so legs so/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /

sems pa dag pa khyod kyis gsang ba bklag pa'i cho ga de kho na nyid sgrub pa rgyas pa dang bcas par smros shig / spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gsang ba'i snying po'i gzungs 'di lan cig brjod pa tsam gyis

de'i mod la phyogs bcu tha dad pa nas gang gA klung sa ya bye ba brgya stong gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag brkyang ste/ spyi bor gzhag nas legs so zhes bgyi ba'i sgra gsungs te/ gsungs pa tsam gyi mod la sngon bskal pa

brgya stong du bsags pa'i sgrib pa rnams nyams par bgyid/ zhig par bgyid do/ /sdig pa thams cad dang / nad thams cad dang / de bzhin du gnod pa zhi bar bgyid do/ /sdig pa dang sems can gdug pa rnams dang / phas kyi rgol ba rnams

dang / mi 'dza' ba rnams 'jig par bgyid de/ 'di la the tshom mi bgyi'o/ /rtag tu 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mchod sbyin lta 'tshal bar 'gyur lags so/ /rig sngags 'di'i cho ga bsgrub pa ni 'di yin

te/ rig sngags 'chang gtsang mar gyur pas shin tu khrus bgyis te/ gos gtsang ma bgos par bgyi'o/ /byams pa dang / snying rje yid la bgyis pas 'byung po thams cad la mchog tu snying brtse bar bgyi'o/ /'phags pa spyan ras

gzigs dbang phyug gi ri mo'i gzugs la mchod par bgyi'o/ /me tog dang / bdug pa dang / dri dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / mar me dbul bar bgyi'o/ /tshes brgyad dam/ tshes bcwa lnga la bsgrub pa'i bzlas brjod kyi cho ga bgyi'o/ /ri mo'i

gzugs kyi mdun du thog mar skyil mo dkrung bcas nas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi'o/ /tshig gzhan mi smra bar khro bo'i rgyal po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis te chab dang / yungs kar gyis

dbang bskur bar bgyi'o/ /phyag rgya bcing bar bgyi ste/ lan nyi shu gcig tu bcing bar bgyi'o/ /gsang sngags kyis ni dbang bskur bar bgyi'o/ /phyag rgyas kyang dbang bskur bar bgyi'o/ /de'i 'og tu don yod zhags pa'i gsang ba'i dam

tshig gi snying po stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi'o/ /bzlas brjod bton pa tsam gyis de'i mod la don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po khro bo'i rgyal po dang bcas pa 'bum 'gyur du bzlas brjod bgyis par 'gyur ro/ /bzlas brjod rdzogs

nas ri mo'i gzugs 'bar zhing sa yang g.yo bar 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi lus las 'od zer sna tshogs pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /don yod pa'i zhags pa'i lag na thogs pa'i zhags pa 'bar bar 'gyur zhing /

rig sngags 'chang snying dga' ba dang / spyi bo'i gtsug 'bar bar 'gyur ro/ /'di ni grub pa'i rtags yin no zhes grub pa'i rtags dang legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byin te/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i cho ga zhib mo'i phyag

rgya 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /de nas dgos pa thams cad dang las thams cad brjod pa tsam gyis de'i mod la 'grub par 'gyur lags so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa sa ya bye ba brgya stong gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dang mnyam pa'i phyag

gser gyi kha dog 'dra bas spyi bo'i gtsug tu 'jog par rmi lam du mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rang bzhin gyi lus shin tu dri ma dang bral ba yongs su dag pas dri ma med pa'i bdag nyid kyi lus rang

bzhin gyis mdun du mchis par 'gyur ro/ /mchog thams cad stsol bar 'gyur ro/ /rnam pa thams cad du grub pa stsol bar 'gyur ro/ /don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po cho ga zhib mo'i phyag rgya grub pa stsol bar 'gyur ro/ /

ji ltar snying las skyes pa'i bu bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi byang chub thob kyi bar du yongs su skyong bar bgyid do/ /de lta bas na/ 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can gyi dkyil 'khor mtha' dag yongs su rdzogs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing legs par brgyan

pa byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba dang bcas pa na/ khang pa brtsegs pa legs par brgyan pa'i seng ge'i khri'i mchog la 'phags pa rgyal ba 'od dpag med 'od zer brgya stong phrag 'bum 'phro ba'i sku bzhugs

shing chos ston par blta bar 'tshal na/ rig sngags 'chang des legs par bkrus te/ gtsang mar gyur pas gos gtsang ma bgos te/ cho 'phrul gyi zla ba yar ngo la byams pa'i sems dang / snying rje'i lhag pa'i bsam pas gus pa dang / dad pa dang /

zhe sa dang / bla mar bgyi'o/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ri mo'i gzugs la ci 'byor pa me tog dang / bdug pa dang / dri dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / lhab lhub dang / ba dan gyis mchod par bgyi'o/ /tshes brgyad

nas tshes bcu gsum gyi bar la zas dkar gsum 'tshal bar bgyi'o/ /ri mo'i gzugs kyi mdun du nyin gcig bzhin dus gsum du don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig dang / tshig gzhan mi smra bar khro bo'i rgyal po lan

nyi shu rtsa gcig dang / snying po dang / nye ba'i snying po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis nas/ ri mo'i gzugs de nyid kyi mdun du mchis nas nyal bar bgyi'o/ /mchod yon dang yon chab dus gsum du dbul bar bgyi'o/ /a ga

ru dang / tsan dan dang / du ru ka dang / gu gul gyi me tog khu ba dang bcas pa gla rtsi dang lhan cig bsres nas blang bar bgyi'o/ /dgug pa'i sngags lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis te/ don yod khams gsum rnam par grags

/ /bdug pa'i rgyal po bla na med/ /gang phyir bdugs pa tsam gyis ni/ /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su bdug pa'i sprin chen po 'khrigs pas rgyas par 'gyur ro/ /

dri 'khrigs pa de dag gis sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa rnams la/ dri

chen po'i mchod pa dang / bdug pa chen po'i mchod pa bgyis par 'gyur zhing / de dag thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /gang yang dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gtogs pa'i sems can gang dag gis bdug pa'i dri tshor na de dag thams cad ngan song du

skye bar 'gyur ba'i las kyi sgrib pa rnams yongs su gtugs par 'gyur ro/ /'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang / mu ge dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / nang 'khrug pa dang / 'khrugs pa dang / rmi lam ngan pa dang / yams kyi nad dang / gnod pa dang / 'tshe ba dang /

gdung ba dang / mi bde ba thams cad dang / nad thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /rlung dang / ser ba dang / grang ba dang / tsha ba'i sprin thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /sdig pa thams cad 'jig par 'gyur ro/ /byad dang g.yengs byed dang / sngags kyi sbyor ba thams cad dang /

dug dang dbyig dug dang dug sbyar ma thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /gdon thams cad dang rjed byed thams cad dang / rims dang / bza' nyes dang / sgo mnyes dang / gnod sgrib dang / nad thams cad 'jig par 'gyur zhing / rmi lam ngan pa thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /

gnod ltas thams cad bdug pa'i dris 'bros par 'gyur/ 'jig par 'gyur/ 'gyes par 'gyur te/ byang chub kyi snying po la mchis kyi bar du lan 'ga' yang tshugs par mi 'gyur ro/ /bdug pa'i rgyal po 'di rtag tu sbyar bar bgyi'o/ /'di ltar

tshes bcu bzhi'i nub mo mchis la/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po brgya rtsa brgyad dang / khro bo'i rgyal po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi'o/ /zas dkar gsum gyi gtor ma ci 'byor pa dbul bar bgyi'o/ /snying po dang nye ba'i snying po stong rtsa brgyad

bzlas brjod bgyis la/ dri dang 'bru mar gyi mar me dbul bar bgyi'o/ /ri mo'i gzugs de nyid kyi mdun du nam langs kyi bar mchis nas nyal bar bgyi ste/ rmi lam du dbyig gi mtshon mthong ngam/ bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams gzhal med

khang dang bcas/ rin po che'i shing dang bcas/ rin po che'i ri dang bcas/ rdzing dang bcas/ gnas dang bcas/ khang pa brtsegs pa dang bcas/ gzhal med khang dang bcas/ rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul dang / rnam par 'phrul pa dang bcas pa mthong

ngam/ de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing / khang pa brtsegs pa na bzhugs la lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye

chen po 'khor dang bcas pa mthong ngam/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das tshe dpag med de yang / rig sngags 'chang de la dbugs 'byin par mdzad cing legs so

zhes bgyi ba yang stsol bar mdzad de/ kye skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis rig sngags 'chang gi skyes bu'i byed pa mang du byas pa dang / khyod kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba mang du skrun pa dang / khyod kyis lhag par mang du byas pa dang / khyod kyis bya ba gang

yin pa byas pa dang / khyod kyis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor phyag rgya chen po dang / gsang sngags rnam par phye ba'i snying po sgrub pa ni grub zin te/ legs so legs so/ /khyod rig sngags 'chang gi sangs rgyas nyid

du gyur cig /khyod 'di nas ma 'ongs pa'i mngal gyi skye ba blangs te/ tshe brjes nas nga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar 'gyur ro/ /byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /

zhes phyag g.yas pa spyi bor 'jog par 'gyur/ 'jig rten pa'i dngos grub thams cad stsol cing 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos grub sgrub pa ste/ 'di ni dam pa sgrub pa yin no zhes bdag gnyid sad nas dga' bar mthong ste/ sgrib

pa thams cad dang bral zhing yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bram ze'i gzugs kyis mdun na mchis par 'gyur zhing 'dod pa thams cad kyi mchog stsol bar 'gyur ro/ /gzugs kyi ri mo de yang

'bar zhing 'od zer 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /yon tan brgya stong mang po gzhan yang 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten pa'i phun sum tshogs pa yang 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /skye bo dang rgyal po dang / blon po dang / bram ze dang / khyim bdag thams cad dbang du

'gyur zhing cher mchod par 'gyur ro/ /dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams las don yod pa'i grub pa chen po thob par 'gyur ro/ /grub pa chen po bla na med pa'ang 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /nyin gcig bzhin du dus gsum du phyag rgya bcing bar

bgyi'o/ /de nas tshes bcu bzhi la thog mar dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams la ci 'byor pa'i yon dang bcas pa'i mchod ston stsal bar bgyi'o/ /de nas bdag nyid longs spyad par bgyi'o/ /gang gi tshe yang sangs rgyas la blta ba dang /

byang chub sems dpa' la blta ba dang / lha rnams la blta bar 'tshal ba na/ de'i tshe bdug pa'i rgyal po la dgug pa'i gsang sngags lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyi ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bdug par bgyi'o/ /

bdug pas bdugs pa tsam gyi mod la zhal ston par 'gyur zhing / dge ba'am mi dge ba thams cad dam/ nyams pa'am bri ba de thams cad bsrung bar 'gyur ro/ /ji tsam tshe'i mthar thug gi bar du gsung ba 'am/ 'gro ba'am 'ong ba gsung bar

'gyur ro/ /de nas gsang sngags kyi cho ga dang / bsgrub pa'i don dang las kyi cho ga yang ji lta ba bzhin du bshad par bgyi'o/ /oM pad ma d+ha ra a mo g+ha dza ya de tsu ru tsu ru swA hA/ don yod pa'i rgyal po'i nye ba'i snying po'i gsang sngags so/ /

oM pad ma pA sha d+ha rA ya/ a mo g+ha ba ra san tso da ya hU~M/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye

chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa la sogs pa bskul ba'i gsang sngags te/ bdug pa'i rgyal pos bdugs nas chab dang yungs dkar bsres pa la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis nas/ phyogs bcur gtor na thams

cad bskul bar bgyis par 'gyur ro/ /oM trai lo kya a b+hA hA na a mo g+ha pA sha /pad ma bi lo ki ta A An tu/ b+hu ba ne su ra/ su ru su ru/ bi ma le hU~M/ dgug pa'i gsang sngags te/ gu gul gyi bdug pa la lan brgya rtsa brgyad

bzlas brjod bgyis nas chu dang me tog bsres pas phyogs bcur gtor bar bgyi ste/ thams cad nas dgug pa dam pa grub pa lags so/ /oM pad ma b+hu dza ma hA pA sha d+hA ra Ni man tra yA mi/ a mo g+hA pa la yan tu b+hu ba swA hA/

mu ru mu ru hU~M/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / dkyil 'khor thams cad na gnas pa'i lha tshogs la sogs pa spyan drang ba'i gsang

sngags te/ ril ba spyi blugs dang / chab dang / me tog dang / tshems shing la bdug pa'i rgyal pos bdugs te/ thams cad la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis te/ thams cad spyan drang ba'i rig sngags so/ /

oM pad ma a mo g+hA badzra a d+hiSh+ThA na/ ku ru ku ru swA hA/ sa'i dkyil 'khor bcing ba ste/ chab dang yungs dkar la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis nas sa la gtor na/ dpag tshad sum brgyas kun nas 'khor ba'i sa'i

dkyil 'khor rdo rjer byin gyis brlab par 'gyur ro/ /de thams cad bsrungs pa ni rdo rje sra ba'i sems su 'gyur ro/ /dgra rnams kyis mi mthong ba dang / bgegs dang / log 'dren dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang /

'byung po dang / sha za dang / brjed byed dang / ro langs dang / 'dod dgur bsgyur ba'i gzugs can thams cad kyis mi mthong ste/ rnam pa thams cad du mi mthong bas rdo rje ltar sra bar 'gyur ro/ /oM a mo g+hA pA sha pad mo tu ra

sing hA/ san tu Ti si ri si ri hU~M/ gdan gyi gsang sngags te yungs dkar la stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis te sa la gtor na/ pad ma chen po'i gzhal yas khang gi gdan du byin gyis brlab nas legs par phul bar 'gyur ro/ /

de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i seng ge'i gdan du byin gyis brlabs nas legs par phul bar 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags 'chang gis rang gi stan la chab dang / yungs dkar la lan nyi shu rtsa

gcig bzlas brjod bgyis nas gtor te/ rig sngags 'grub pa'i pad ma'i stan gsang ba'i gsang sngags so/ /oM ma hA ka ru Na pad ma a mo g+hA pA sha dr-i D+ha badzra a d+hi ti b+hu ru b+hu ru b+han d+ha re swA hA/ dkyil 'khor

mtha' dag na khyim dang / nags tshal dang / kun dga' ra ba dang / gtsug lag khang dang / bsti gnas dang / 'chag sa dang / phug dang / dgon pa dang / gnas bsang ba'i phyir dri chab dang / yungs dkar la lan brgya rtsa
brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis nas gtor bar bgyis te/ gnas su gtogs pa thams cad bsang ba chen po bgyis par 'gyur ro/ /nyes par bgyid pa dang / bgegs dang / log 'dren dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po

dang / 'byung po thams cad 'bros par 'gyur te/ gnas bsang ba'i gsang sngags so/ /oM pad ma a mo g+hA pA she na sa man tA da sha su sh+'u si mA ban d+ha ya/ tu ru tu ru hU~M/ lcags kyi phur bu sor brgyad pa'i tshad
lnga la/ tshon sna lnga'i skud pas dkris te/ lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis nas phyogs bzhir gzugs par bgyi'o/ /lnga pa ni dbus kyi gzhir gzugs par bgyi ste/ rgyang grags bdun
'khor bar mtshams bc-ing ba bgyis par 'gyur ro/ /ji srid du phur bu ma phyung ba de srid du mtshams mchen po bcing ba bgyis par 'gyur ro/ /oM a mo g+ha maN+Da la ban d+ha ya sa man te na/ pad ma

ma hA pad me d+hu ru d+hu ru swA hA/ dkyil 'khor bcing ba ste/ dri chab dang / yungs dkar la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgy-is nas dkyil 'khor mtha' dag dang / de bzhin du 'og dang steng du yang gtor te/

dkyil 'khor chen po bcing bar bgyis par 'gyur te/ bgegs dang / log 'dren dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha za mchi bar 'os pa thams cad kyis mchi bar mi 'gyur ro/ /sems can gdug

pa dang / lha 'am/ klu gdug pa/ gang su yang rung ba de dag thams cad zil gyis mnan par 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten pa'i bgyi ba ngan pa dang / sngags ngan pa dang / sems ngan pa dang / bgyid pa ngan pa thams cad

yongs su spangs par 'gyur ro/ /oM a mo g+ha pa ri shud d+he sho d+ha ya sa man te na/ d+hi ri d+hi ri shud d+ha sa twa ma hA pad me hU~M/ 'dis ba'i rnam lnga la lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis te/ dkyil 'khor gyi sa'i cha
mtha' dag na/ gtsug lag khang ngam/ dgon pa'am/ bya skyibs sam/ tshang tshing ngam/ 'chag sa'am/ gnas sam/ tshal lam/ nags tshal lam/ skyed mos tshal lam/ kun dga' ra ba'am/ brang sa'am/ skyabs

sam/ khang pa la gtor na stong pa'am/ mi stong pa'am/ 'dam rdzab dang / mi gtsang ba dang / phyag dar gyis gang ba dang / 'byung po dang / sha za dang / yi dgas la sogs te rigs ngan pa thams cad yongs su spangs par 'gyur ro/ /

gtsang ba dag par 'gyur ro/ /gnas gtsang mar 'gyur ro/ /bdag nyid la dbang bskur na bza' nyes dang / bgo nyes dang / gnod ltas dang / gnod sgrib kyi gnas ngan pa thams cad yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/ /

gtsang ma dag par 'gyur ro/ /mi gtsang ba gtsang bar 'gyur ro/ /tshangs par spyod pa ma lags pa tshangs par spyod par 'gyur ro/ /bsnyen gnas ma bgyis pa ni bsnyen gnas bgyis par 'gyur ro/ /de la lha thams cad bsrung ba

dang / bskyab pa dang sba ba bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /dbang phyug dang dbang phyug chen po dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug dang / gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / lus ngan la sogs pa bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba ba'i slad du/ rtag tu rjes

su 'brang bar 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten pa thams cad kyi snying du sdug pa dang / mchod par 'os par 'gyur ro/ /tshig btsan par 'gyur ro/ /nad thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /sdig pa dang / sgrib pa dang / chad pa la sogs pa

thams cad las yongs su thar bar 'gyur ro/ /phyogs bzhir kun tu gtor na 'thab pa dang 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / mu ge dang mi ngas dang / yams kyi nad dang / gnod pa dang / 'tshe ba dang / 'khrug pa thams cad

zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /nyin gcig bzhin du bdag nyid la dbang bskur ram/ reg par bgyid na/ r-ig sngags dang phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor gyi rim par dbye ba dang las chen po 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /don yod pa'i grub pa chen po

'grub par 'gyur ro/ /gang dang gang du mchis pa de dang der cher mchod par 'gyur ro/ /thams cad kyis mi zlog par 'gyur ro/ /nyin gcig bzhin gzhal med khang rgya chen po bkra zhing rnam par bkra ba chen po rmi lam du mthong ba

dang / rnam pa thams cad du mchog rgya chen po 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / khyim bdag dang / rgyal po dang / blon po dang / btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad dbang du 'gyur zhing mchod par 'os par

'gyur ro/ /rtag tu gtsang bar spyod par gtsang zhing dag par 'gyur ro/ /rtag par dus kun tu 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug blta 'tshal bar 'gyur ro/ /'dod pa thams cad kyi mchog stsol bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs

pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med rmi lam du rtag tu mthong zhing shi 'phos nas yang 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro/ /oM pad me sa ra sa ra tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha ma hA a mo g+ha sa ma ya swA hA/

gsang ba chen po'i dam tshig gi gsang sngags so/ /oM bi pu la pad ma a mo g+ha sa ra ba bi sha tu/ ku ru ku ru swA hA/ 'jug pa'i gsang sngags so/ /oM a mo g+ha a nu sha ya ma hA pad ma ban d+hu re hU~M/ slob ma'i gsang

sngags so/ /oM a mo g+ha pad ma shi ge tu ru tu ru/ tish+Tha badzra ban d+he swA hA/ spyi gtsug bcing ba'i gsang sngags so/ /lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so/ /oM a mo g+ha pad ma dza lo k+She pa/ b+hi ri b+hi ri hU~M/ chab bteg pa'i

gsang sngags te/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so/ /oM a mo g+ha bi ka Ta sa~M b+ha ra pad ma A sa Ne dza la pa ti/ ku ru ku ru hU~M/ bum pa'i gsang sngags te lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas so/ /oM pad mo pra sa ra a mo g+ha bi ma le

b+ha ra b+ha ra swA hA/ chab kyi rgyun gyi gsang sngags te/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so/ /oM a mo g+ha pad me su pad me/ pUr+Na ka re d+hi ri d+hi ri bi ma le swA hA/ lag pa'i gsang sngags te/ lag pa gnyis la lan stong rtsa brgyad

bzlas brjod bgyis nas/ dkyil 'khor dang gsang sngags dang / phyag rgya dang / cho ga zhib mo dang bsgrub pa'i dgos pa thams cad bgyi ste/ sgrub pa thams cad la bsgrub par bgyi zhing las thams cad la dus thams cad du bgyi'o/ /oM

a mo g+ha bi ma le dzi hwA gra sa~M sho d+ha ni sa~M sho d+ha ya d+ha ra d+ha ra bi ma le pad ma ka ma la dzi hwA swA hA/ lce sbyang ba'i gsang sngags te/ dri chab la lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis te/ kha bshal la lce'i dri ma yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/ /

pad ma dang / ku mu ta'i 'dab ma dang / 'dra bar lce mnyen par 'gyur ro/ /so dang rkan dang mgul pa yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/ /oM a mo g+ha na d+ha bsti su ru su ru pra b+hu ru di bya gan d+hi pad ma pra b+he swA hA/ gsang sngags 'dis

khar stsal ba'i ri lu tsan dan dang / na la dang / spri ka dang / ut+pa la dang / gur gum dang / gla rtsi lhan cig blang ba bgyis la/ phye ma zhib mor btags nas ri lu zho gnyis tsam pa'i tshad du sbrang rtsi dang lhan cig sbyar la gsang sngags stong rtsa brgyad tshang

bar bzlas brjod bgyis te/ zangs kyi snod kyi nang du stsal nas bzlas brjod bgyid pa'i tshe khar stsal nas skad cig tsam bsdad pa bgyis na/ rtag tu kha nas ut+pa la'i dri 'byung bar 'gyur te/ rgyang grags tsam du the tshom med/ /de bzhin

gshegs pa thams cad dang / /de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' dgyes/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mchog sbyin mgon po mchog tu dga' bar 'gyur ro// //'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal

po/ bam po gnyis pa/ bzlas pas bde bar 'grub 'gyur bas/ /don yod rig sngags bla na med/ /rig sngags 'chang dang gtam bgyis pas/ /dus kun rdul dri spang bar bgy-i/ /mkhris pa bad kan snabs dag dang / /

de bzhin kun 'jig myur du ni/ /kha nas lha yi dri 'byung 'gyur/ /su la tshig dag smras pa ni/ /de ni myur du dbang du 'gyur/ /lha rnams dbang du mchis pa dang / /bde sogs bdag po dbang po dang / /gshin rje chu lha de bzhin du/ /

tshangs pa khyab 'jug dbang phyug che/ /'jig rten skyong ba bzhi dag dang / /zla ba nyi ma nyid dag dang / /thams cad dbang du gyur nas mchis/ /'di ni kha na mur bgyid na/ /tshig ldan lce yi rtse mo na/ /mchis sam tshig ni gsal

bar 'gyur/ /rtag tu mi min dbyangs 'gyur te/ /dri ma'i skyon ni rnam par spangs/ /tshig bcad stong bklags nyams mi 'gyur/ /hU~M zhes bgyis pas lha kun dang / /lha gang dkyil 'khor gnas pa'ang mchis/ /phaT

ces bgyis pas gdug pa dang / /bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad 'jig /gnod sbyin srin po sha za dang / /brjed byed 'byung po gsang ba pa/ /thams cad mod la 'byer 'gyur zhing / /kha bub tu yang 'gyel bar 'gyur/ /

ri lu kha na thogs na ni/ /dus kun du ni mkhas par 'gyur/ /grub pa myur du 'thob 'gyur te/ /thams cad du yang tshe ring 'gyur/ /tshig snyan 'jam zhing mnyen par 'gyur/ /ri lu 'di ni bcang bgyis na/ /don yod pad ma dri ma med/ /

ri lu zhes bgyi 'grub par 'gyur/ /oM ma la bi ga te/ pad ma bi ba re/ san tsar ba tsa re swA hA/ a mo g+ha sid d+hi sho d+ha ya hU~M/ nA ga pus pa'i shun pa dang / u shi ra dang tsan dan dang / pad ma ge sar dang / li shi dang / ka ko la dang /

spang spos dang / rgya spos dang / gur gum dang / pra pun da ri ka dang / e la dang / sa ma ka dang / u gra dang / su gan d+hi ga 'd-i rnams cha mnyam par bgyi ste zhib tu btags nas/ gsang sngags lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas nas char pa'i

chab dang bsres pas khrus bgyis shing 'tshal ba'am/ chab dron pos khrus bgyis pa 'am/ 'tshal bas shin tu khrus bgyis pa gtsang ma shin tu dag pas bag tsha ba ma mchis par bton pa tsam gyis sngon gyi drag po'i las

rnams dang / gdon kun 'joms par 'grub pa dang / /nad kun rnam par nyams pa dang / /'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug gi/ mun pa mi zad spong bar gsungs/ /bkrus 'tshal tsam gyi mod la ni/ /dri ma kun zhi som nyi

med/ /dpal gyis lha yi bzhin du 'bar/ /bsod nams phung po rnam par 'phel/ /gzi brjid phung po rtag tu 'bar/ /zla ba nyi ma bzhin du mdzes/ /gtsang ma'i lus su gyur pa na/ /lus ni lha yi bzhin du gyur/ /mi

gtsang ba ni gtsang bar gyur/ /ma dag pa ni dag par 'gyur/ /tshangs par spyod min tshangs spyod 'gyur/ /thub min thub pa kho nar 'gyur/ /tshangs par mi spyod tshangs spyod 'gyur/ /mgo skya gnyer ma spangs pa dang / /rtag tu bro nad ma

mchis 'gyur/ /lus la lha yi dri dag 'byung / /pad ma ku mu mnyen pa'i lus/ /sngon gyi dri ni rab spangs te/ /lha yi tsan dan dri dag ni/ /mda' rgyang gang du som nyi med/ /rtag tu bde bar nyal ba dang / /bde bar yang

ni sad par 'gyur/ /gnod sbyin srin po 'byung po dang / /lha min gdug pa log 'dren dang / /gdug pa'i bgegs rnams mthong mi 'gyur/ /mi bzad dgra rnams kyis kyang min/ /lus nyid sbyang ba bgyis nas su/ /sngags bzlas

brjod pa'i sgrub pa bgyi/ /legs par sgrub pa'i las bgyis na/ /de nyid bde bar 'grub par 'gyur/ /rgyal ba byang chub sems dpa' kun/ /de bzhin mod la gzigs par 'gyur/ /lha rnams kun dang gang dag gzhan/ /dkyil

'khor gnas pa myur du mchi/ /ci 'dod yid la bzlas pa yis/ /rtag tu don yod grub par 'gyur/ /thog mar lus sbyang cho ga bgyi/ /de nas gsang sngags legs par spyad/ /oM a mo g+ha pad ma lo tsa ni di bya dr-iSh+Ti pa

ri shud d+he/ su ru su ru pad ma/ a k+Shi bu ru bu ru sa man ta bya ba lo ka ni swA hA/ ldong ros gi hang rgya mtsho sbu ba sa ha dza/ /ut+pa la sbrang rtsi lhan cig reng bu 'di bgyis la/ /gsang sngags sum stong rtsa brgyad bzlas

pa'i mig sman 'di/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis mchog tu bzang zhes gsungs/ /'di ni 'jig rten dbang phyug mchog sbyin gyis/ /kun pas bkra shis 'di ni mig nad kun/ /'joms par bgyid de g.yar lam bzang

po rmi/ /yid du mi mchi ba nyid mthong mi 'gyur/ /ngan par snang dang ngan par blta/ /nam yang mthong bar mi 'gyur ro/ /gtum po 'joms pa gtum po dang / /lhag ma sbags pa bsgom nyes dang / /bza' nyes gnod sgrib

gnod sbyin dang / /srin po dang ni sdig sbrul dag /thams cad nyin dang mtshan dag tu/ /mi snang bar ni the tshom med/ /mi gis bzang po mthong ba dang / /rmi lam bzang po mthong bar 'gyur/ /zla ba srid du rab sbyar bas/ /lha rdzas

dag ni mthong bar 'gyur/ /mig yongs su sbyang ba'o/ /oM bud d+ha bud d+ha/ bi bud d+ha pad ma a mo g+hA mu khi ba ra ba ra de swA hA/ rig sngags 'dis gi hang la lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas so/ /don yod pa'i rgyal po

lan nyi shu rtsa gcig brjod par bgyi'o/ /khro bo'i rgyal po lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyi'o/ /snying po dang nye ba'i snying po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi'o/ /bzlas brjod bgyid pa'i tshe yang 'di blangs
te dpral ba'i dbus su thig li bgyis te/ thig le lan cig bgyis pas dpral ba'i steng na skar ma'-i dbyibs lta bur gnas par 'gyur ro/ /gdug pa thams cad dbang gyur mchis/ /gnod sbyin 'byung po gang dag
dang / /srin po bgegs dang log 'dren nyid/ /thams cad 'jig 'gyur the tshom med/ /sems can gdug pas gdug bsams kyang / /phyir zhing bzod par mi nus pas/ /de dag thams cad 'jig 'gyur te/ /me la

phye ma leb bzhin no/ /rtag tu rgyal po skye bos bcas/ /'khor bcas blon por bcas pa dang / /blon po che dang mdun na 'don/ /btsun mo'i tshogs bcas dbang du gyur/ /dge sbyong dang ni bram ze dag /thams

cad dbang du mchi bar 'gyur/ /rgyal rigs dmangs rigs dag dang ni/ /thams cad dbang du mchi bar 'gyur/ /mchod pa chen po'i 'os su 'gyur/ /rig sngags lha ni thams cad dang / /gang ltar dkyil 'khor gnas pa ste/ /de dag

thams cad dam tshig gi/ rjes su bsgrub cing skyong bar 'gyur/ /phyogs bcur bsrung ba bgyid 'gyur ba/ /rtag tu sgrub pa bla med stsol/ /thig le 'di bgyis grogs med rgyu ba dag /chom rkun dang ni chom po g.yon can dang / /

g.yul 'gyed nyid kyi 'jigs pa gang yin pa/ /kun nas sgral bar 'gyur te som nyi med/ /seng ge stag dang dom dang ni/ /glang chen khro bo mi bzad dang / /wa dang gdug bcas srog chags dang / /so gdug sbrul kun mgo nas za/ /

gang dag srog chags gdug par bcas/ /de dag thams cad nub 'gyur te/ /nam yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /ser ba me dang tshig pa dang / /char pa mi zad mtshon chu byad/ /mkhas pas thig le 'chang ba'i lus/ /khyim rdib pas

kyang non mi 'gyur/ /mkhas pa rig sngags 'chang ba'i don/ /thams cad 'di yis bgyid par 'gyur/ /shin tu ma grub gsal bar yang / /'grub par 'gyur te the tshom med/ /bcom ldan 'das rig sngags 'chang gis bdag dran par

bgyid cing / don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po dran par bgyid na/ bcom ldan 'das de ma thag tu rig sngags 'chang de'i mdun du bdag mchis nas/ yid la bsams pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o/ /thams cad kyi mchog

thams cad ji skad gsungs pa bzhin stsal bar bgyi'o/ /dgos pa thams cad sgrub par bgyi'o/ /don yod pa grub pa rjes su stsal bar bgyi'o/ /bden par dam bcas pas dam tshig rjes su bskyang bar bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das

gal te rig sngags 'chang gis ji skad gsungs pa'i cho ga zhib mo bsgrub par bgyid na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin brlabs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' rjes su gnang ba de dag thams cad bdag gis stsal bar bgyi'o/ /

bcom ldan 'das gal te rig sngags 'chang sgrub pa dang bral bar gyur na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni bdag gis ma nongs so/ /de lta bas na rig sngags 'chang gis ci skad gsungs pa'i cho ga dang / cho ga zhib mo sgrub pas/ gsang

sngags dang / phyag rgya bsgrub par bgyi ste/ dgos pa de dag thams cad the tshom ma mchis par 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /de nas gsang sngags bzlas te/ oM a mo g+hA pA sha d+ha ra sa ra pra sa ra hU~M/ mchod phyir thogs pa'i skud pa'i

gsang sngags te/ gzhon nu mas bkal ba'i skud pa la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis nas/ mdud pa gsum dor bar bgyi'o/ /oM a mo g+hA pra ba ra Na mu ru mu ri di bya ka shi ka~M / saM b+ha ba tu ta ra ta ra swA hA/ gos kyi gsang sngags

ste lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so/ /oM a mo g+ha pra sta N+yod shi pA mi bo d+hi ni pad me swA hA/ gos stegs pa'i gsang sngags te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so/ /oM dib byod ka swa~M b+hu ta a mo g+ha b+ha ru na tsa re b+hi shin ts+ya

hU~M/ khrus kyi sngags te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so/ /oM a mr-i ta a mo g+ha pad me a sa ne/ bir sha ni tsu ru tsu ru swA hA/ nye reg gi sngags te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so/ /oM a mo g+ha rak+Sha Ni ku ru ku ru swA hA/ bdag bsrung ba

ste/ yungs kar dang chab la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas nas/ rang gi lus la dbang bskur ro/ /oM a mo g+ha sa ma ya/ ma hA pad me tiSh+tha tiSh+tha hU~M/ dam tshig gi gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlas so/ /oM sa rbad tra a mo g+ha

ba pa ti tiSh+tha rak+Sha~M tu hU~M/ slob ma dang grogs bgyid pa bsrung ba ste/ thal ba la lan bdun bzlas nas dpral bar thig le bgyi'o/ /oM trai lo kya pad ma a mo g+ha kra ma Ne mi li mi li swA hA/ gom pa 'dor ba'i sngags te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas

brjod bgyi'o/ /oM pad me ma hA pad me sa ra sa ra/ sa man te na pa ri be sh+ta ya/ a mo g+ha pA she na su ru su ru swA hA/ tshon skud sna lnga la lan bdun bzlas te dkri bar bya'o/ /oM pi tsid tre a mo g+ha ba tan na rang ga bi shud d+ha ya/ ki Ni ki Ni swA hA/

ba dan gyi gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlas so/ /oM a mo g+ha sha ra badzra tuN+Da tha ra tha ra swA hA/ mda'i gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlas so/ /oM bi pu la a mo g+ha ma hA d+ha ra bi shud d+he se re se re swA hA/ rta babs kyi gsang sngags te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig

bzlas so/ /su dag der zhugs nas mtho ris kyi sgor zhugs par 'gyur ro/ /sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad yongs su byang bar 'gyur ro/ /oM nA nA bi tsi tra/ a mo g+ha pus pa/ pha la la tA kirna p+'u ra ya pa ra pa ra hU~M/ bum pa gang ba'i gsang sngags te lan bdun

bzlas so/ /oM a mo g+ha rad na bi ma Na/ ka Ta da tsa a d+hi Sh+Ti bid bya g+han do dz+wa la s+pha ra Na/ sa man te na dz+wa la dz+wa la swA hA/ pog phor gyi gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlas so/ /oM dz+wa la ba ti/ rad na g+ha ta/ si ri Ni tu Ti tu Ti swA hA/ gtor ma'i snod kyi gsang

sngags te lan bdun bzlas so/ /oM dib bya b+ha tsan a mo g+ha pad ma ba re pU ru ya hU~M/ kham phor gyi gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlas so/ /oM a mo g+ha sa~M pU ra Ni dro Na g+han d+ha pa ti swA hA/ thig le'i gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlas so/ /

oM sa ra ni sA ra ya/ a mo g+ha b+hu dza ne mA da ni hU~M/ ril ba mgrin rings kyi gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlas so/ /oM rata na dib bya rata na ku~M b+ha ba ti sA ga ra sa~M p+'u ra Ni swA hA/ bum pa'i gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlas so/ /oM bi tsid tro dz+wa la

nAn raM g+ha bi b+heg ta ya sa~M sho d+ha ya tu Ti swA hA/ tshon rtsi'-i gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlas so/ /oM dib bya a ba lo ki Ne bi b+ha dza ya tu sa man te na sa ma ra Ne swA hA/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis te so sor dbye bar bgyi'o/ /

oM nA nA pra hA ra Na a mo g+ha mud tra dz+wa la dz+wa la swA hA/ phyag mtshan bri ba ste lan bdun bzlas so/ /oM a mo g+ha rad na sU tra d+ha re ki Ni ki Ni swA hA/ thig skud kyi gsang sngags te lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis te dkyil 'khor

ram ri mo bris pa'i ras saM/ gzhan gzhi gang yang rung ba la gdab par bya'o/ /oM bi pu la ba re pra be sha ya/ a mo g+ha pad me hU~M/ sgo'i cha dbye ba ste sgo re re yang lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so/ /oM su ba b+hag ti su mang+ga la dwA ra ba ban ti/

oM dib bya bA dza na/ a mo g+ha pA sha na ba na ba re/ gi ri gi ri hU~M/ oM sam pUrna/ rU pya dib bya b+ha dza ni/ a mo g+ha pad me swA hA/ lan bdun bzlas par bgyi'o/ /oM bi bi d+ha ru pa hA ro pa ka ra Na/ tsa la tsa la/ a mo g+ha ba ti swA hA/

lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so/ /oM di bya gan d+ha nu sa ra ni a mo g+ha ba le d+ha ra d+ha ra swA hA/ mchod yon gyi gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlas so/ /oM g+han d+ha s+pha ra ni sa man ta/ a mo g+ha pra pu ra hU~M/ dri'i gsang sngags te lan

bdun bzlas so/ /oM ni ra ma la kA ya sho d+ha ni dib bya gan d+ha pra pU ra ya ni pU ra ya hU~M/ byug pa'i gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlas so/ /oM gan d+ha tsUr+Na pra p+'u ra Ni/ tsu ru tsu ru swA hA/ dri'i phye ma'i gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlas so/ /

oM sa man te na/ bi ma le gan d+hod ta re swA hA/ bskul ba'i gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlas so/ /oM dib bya g+han d+ha pra p+'u ra ni sA ga ra dza la dib bya a d+hi te ka la sho da ra pUr+Na pU ra ya/ dza ya sid d+hi swA hA/ bum pa'i dri chab kyi

gsang sngags te lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas so/ /oM ra sa sA gra ba ti/ sarba bi d+ha a d+hiSh+Thi te sa~M pU ra ya hU~M/ gtor ma ro sna tshogs can gyi gsang sngags te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so/ /oM dib bya b+ho dza na/ sam pU ra yA/ bi pu

la pra be swA hA/ kha zas kyi gsang sngags te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so/ /oM tri shu kla b+ho dza na ba li bi p+'u la ra sA gra ba ti su ra pra su ra hU~M/ zas dkar gsum gyi gtor ma 'am/ gzhan yang lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so/ /oM

ba la ba ti sA ra ba ti di bya ba na spa ti/ ta ra ta ra tu ni swA hA/ 'bras bu'i gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlas so/ /oM di bya ku ru su mod pa la nA nA puSh+pa pra bar Sha Ni b+ha ba swA hA/ me tog gi gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlas so/ /

oM bi bi d+ha la ta pu pa kun Thi ta ba na spa ti a ha ra sa~M pUr+Na kum b+he swA hA/ me tog gtor ba'i gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlas so/ /oM ma hA d+hU ba me g+ha pa Ta la san tsa da ya/ sa man te na hU~M swA hA/ bdug pa'i

gsang sngags te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so/ /oM a thar pa ni dz+wa la dz+wa la de mu khe swA hA/ me'i gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlas so/ /oM bi b-i d+ha ma Ni ka na ka rad no dz+wa la pU Sha Na ma Na ma Ni a mo g+ha ma swA hA/

cha zhing brgyan pa'i gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlas so/ /oM pad ma ka re bi ma la na kha/ ang gu li/ sa ma sa ma sarba ta thA ga ta/ a d+hi te swA hA/ thal mo sbyar ba'i gsang sngags te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so/ /oM sarba

gu no pra na ta/ she ro ba~M da na yA na maska ro mi/ mi li mi li tu ri ni swA hA/ phyag bgyi ba'i gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlas so/ /oM da sha di sha a bi ban da na pra sa ra tu hU~M/ bskor ba'i gsang sngags te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so/ /oM

bi bi d+hA yu d+hA dz+wa li ta pa ni/ pra dz+wa la pra s+phu ra hU~M/ thal mo'i gsang sngags te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so/ /oM di bya a mo g+ha bi pu la swa re ma d+hu ra nir g+ho Sha ru te na ra Na ra Na ra hU~M/ dril bu'i gsang sngags te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig

bzlas so/ /yang na brgya rtsa brgyad do/ /oM rash+mi dz+wa la sa man te ma a ba b+ha sa ya ma hA ma Ni rad ni shi khe swA hA/ mar me'i gsang sngags te lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas so/ /oM d+hu ru d+hu ru a pA hA ya shi g+h+ra~M dza be hU~M/ dgug pa'i gsang sngags

te gu gul gyi bdug pa la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas so/ /oM duSh+ThA sa do bi bo d+ha ni/ sa ma sa ma ya ba re swA hA/ dam tshig gi gsang sngags te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so/ /oM bi tsi tra ma ni bi pu la pra bar ta ni hU~M/ bgrang phreng gi gsang

sngags te lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas so/ /oM bi tsid tra rad no dz+wa lo bid bya/ ku su ma ba re puSh+pa ra ti swA hA/ me tog phreng ba'i gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlas so/ /oM dib bya lo tsa ne a mo g+he pra ba re/ sarba di bya a d+hi ta/

sid d+hi shud d+ha bi lo ki te swA hA/ dgug pa'i gsang sngags te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so/ /oM a mo g+ha pad me sa man ta shu ba ne ta ra ta ra gats+tsha swa b+hA ba nam swA hA/ slar gshegs su gsol ba'i gsang sngags te lan nyi shu

rtsa gcig bzlas so/ /oM di bya sam pU ra Ni nA ga bi lo ki na hU~M/ mkhar bsil gyi gsang sngags te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so/ /oM pad tra spu ra Ni spU ra ya/ a mo g+ha ba ti sa man ta pra be swA hA/ lhung bzed kyi gsang

sngags te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so/ /oM dur b+ha sang s+tha ra bid d+h+yi a d+hiSh+Thi ta pra sa ra su ra su ra/ r-i Shi p+'u dzi te swA hA/ rtswa gding ba'i gsang sngags te/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so/ /oM dz+wa la du ma dz+wa la shi khi

rash+mi gar b+hi swA hA/ sbyin sreg gi gsang sngags te lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas so/ /oM pad me ni pad ma sa ne ba re pra ba re nA ga b+hu ba ne swA hA/ 'bab chu dang mtsho'i gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlas so/ /oM kha ga tsa ri Ni/ ga ma ga ma

ya pA da pra tsa ri ni hU~M/ len pa'i gsang sngags te lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas so/ /oM sarbad hra a mo g+ha b+hi Shi ka ma hA tsU Ta bi ma le a b+hi Shiny+tsa tu mA~M/ pra ba ra pa Ni b+hu dze pad ma dwa dze swA hA/ dbang bskur ba'i gsang sngags te lan

nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so/ /rigs sngags 'chang gis gsang sngags 'di dag thams cad so sor cho ga zhib mo'i sgrub pa ci lta ba bzhin du thams cad so sor sbyar nas/ cho ga bsgrubs pa' na dgos pa rgya chen po'i 'byor pa'i mthu

'di dag dang / me tog dang / bdug pa dang / dri dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / rin po che'i snod sna tshogs pa dang / nor bu sna tshogs pa'i gzhal med khang rgya chen po 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /lha'i me tog dang / gdugs dang / ba dan sna tshogs

pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /ro brgya dang ldan pa'i kha zas kyi mchog dang / ro sna tshogs pa'i mchog rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /gtor ma bzang po rnam pa sna tshogs pa yang 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /ci tsam de bzhin gshegs pa la 'os

pa'i gzhal med khang dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa'i gzhal med khang ci lta ba de lta bu dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /lha rnams kyi gzhal med khang ji lta ba de lta bu dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin

rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams la so so'i gzhal med khang ci lta ba de lta bu dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /mi rnams kyi khang pa ci lta ba dang / kha zas

kyi mchog ci lta bu dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de lta bas na dgos pa'i rnam pa thams cad dang / de kho na nyid sgrub pa'i ci skad gsungs pa'i cho ga zhib mo dang / cho ga dang gsang sngags bsgrub pa rnams bgyi'o/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang gis grub pa

bla na med pa thams cad 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /gal te rig sngags 'chang gis las yongs su grub par bgyis te/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po 'di brjod pa tsam gyis rig sngags 'chang gi mdun du bdag rang gi gzugs

kyis nye bar mchis nas bsam pa dang re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o/ /sdig pa dang sgrib pa dang / gnod pa thams cad 'jig par 'gyur ro/ /yongs su dag pa'i lha chen po ltar lus dag par bgyi'o/ /cho ga zhib

mo dang / phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags dang / snying po dang / dkyil 'khor dang / don yod pa'i zhags pa'i rgyal po'i rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor grub pa'i mchog thams cad stsal bar bgyi'o/ /rig sngags 'chang 'khor los sgyur ba chen

po'i dbang bskur bas dbang bskur bar bgyi'o/ /de kho na nyid yang dag pa sgrub pa'i grub pa stsal bar bgyi'o/ /don yod pa'i zhags pa'i 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa sgrub pa'i grub pa chen po stsal bar bgyi'o/ /

shin tu rgya che zhing bag tsha ba ma mch-is pa dang / mchod pa dang bkur sti chen po 'jig rten thams cad kyi mchog khyad par du 'phags shing nor 'du ba'i bkra shis dang dpal stsal bar bgyi'o/ /'di la yid gnyis dang som nyi bskyed par mi

bgyi zhing / dngos po gzhan du yang yid la mi bgyi'o/ /sems can thams cad la byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms kyis brtse ba la mchog tu brtson par bgyi'o/ /bu gcig pa bzhin du sems can du gyur pa thams cad

la mchog tu brtse bar bgyi'o/ /bden par smra ba dang / bden pa la dga' ba dang / snyan par smra ba dang / snying rje'i lhag pa'i bsam pas dmigs nas/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po bzlas par bgyi'o/ /bzlas brjod kyi cho

ga bgyi zhing / phyag rgya dang gsang sngags kyang bzlas par bgyi'o/ /phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du gtogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams yid la bgyis nas/ sangs rgyas yid la rjes su dran pa bsgom par
bgyi'o/ /sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag bgyi'o/ /'phags pa mgon po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag bgyis nas/ mngon sum du mchi bar bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa

spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ri mo'i gzugs la phyag bgyis te/ mdun du rtswa'i gding ba bting nas dkyil mo dkrung bcas te mchis nas/ gzhan mi smra bar bzlas pa bgyis te/ 'di ni gsang ba'i de kho na nyid bsgrub

pa'o/ /de nas phyag rgya dang gsang sngags brjod par bgyi'o/ /bdag la don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i de kho na nyid 'grub par gyur cig /'jig rten dbang phyug mgon po thugs rje can sems can la byams pa/ sems dag

pa lag na pad ma can sems can thams cad la byams pa'i bdag nyid can gyi byin gyis brlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs pas/ phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs kun dang / /lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang / /srin po lha min gsang ba pa/ /

'jig rten skyong dang tshangs pa dang / /drag po khyab 'jug gzhon nu sogs/ /gshin rje chu lha lus ngan dang / /drang srong sogs dang de bzhin du/ /zla nyi kun 'gyed gzhon nu dang / /de bzhin dbang phyug dbang chen dag /phyag rgya bcings pa tsam

gyis ni/ /de dag myur du 'du bar 'gyur/ /sgrol ma bdun ni 'du bar 'gyur/ /de bzhin pha rol phyin bcu dag /mgrin sngon de bzhin gos dkar can/ /de bzhin pad ma gar gyi dbang / /rgyal dang rnam rgyal nyid dang ni/ /lcags sgrog

rdo rje lcags sgrog dang / /lha mo khro gnyer mA ma kI/ /dpe med pho nya mo dang ni/ /'jigs med dpal dang dbyangs can dang / /pad ma ko ti uta pa la/ /pad ma'i so can de bzhin du/ /ti si yi ni rtse mo na/ /'phrog ma 'byung po'i ma dag dang / /

de bzhin lag na rdo rje bcu/ /mthu chen de bzhin rig 'dzin dbang / /rdo rje 'chang chen de bzhin du/ /bcu gsum lha dbang lhan cig dang / /sum bcu gnyis nas lha dag ni/ /gsang sngags phyag rgya bcings tsam gyis/ /de dag thams cad 'du

bar 'gyur/ /phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rnam par gzigs shing ston par mdzad do/ /de'i mod la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis rnam par gzigs shing rtag tu mchog stsol bar 'gyur ro/ /rtag tu mgon

po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug spyan stong phyag stong dang / phyag rgya sna tshogs pa 'dzin pa lta 'tshal bar 'gyur ro/ /phyag rgya bcings pa tsam gyis ni/ /bram ze'i cha lugs don yod zhags/ /mthong bar 'gyur te

som nyi med/ /mgrin sngon dang ni rta mgrin dang / /de bzhin rgya mtsho'i klong dang ni/ /mgon po'i zhal ni bcu gcig dang / /de bzhin zhal ni bzhi dag dang / /mgon po 'jigs pa brgyad 'phrog dang / /de bzhin 'jigs pa bsam mi khyab/ /

rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs dang ni/ /sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin/ /phyag rgya bcings pa tsam gyis ni/ /mgon po thams cad ston par mdzad/ /bde ba can gyi 'jig rten khams/ /rgyal ba 'dren pa 'od dpag med/ /byang chub sems

dpa'i tshogs bskor ba/ /mgon po mod la mthong bar 'gyur/ /gzhan yang sangs rgyas stong gi zhing dag ni/ /chu bo gang gA'i bye ma dang mnyam pa'i/ /de bzhin gshegs 'bum bye ba brgya phrag stong / /byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs

bcas yongs bskor mgon/ /phyag rgya bcings pa tsam gyis mthong bar 'gyur/ /mthong ba chen po'i rnam par gzhan mthong ste/ /nyin gcig bzhin du byang chub snying po dang / /chos kyi 'khor lo de bzhin rdo rje'i gdan/ /de dag

rmi lam snang ba mthong 'gyur bar/ /de la yid gnyis som nyi the tsom med/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyis bshung ba 'am mtshams med lnga/ /mgon po che la gdug sems nyid dang ni/ /byang chub sems dpa'i bar chad 'phags pa la/ /

kha zer ba dang dam chos bslu ba dang / /rgyal bas gsungs spong mnar med gzhol ba dang / /mi bzad dmyal ba bcu drug gnas pa dang / /bskal pa 'bum po thams cad skad cig grol/ /phyag rgya gsang sngags bzlas pa tsam gyis sam/ /

thos sam mthong ngam ming ni gzung bas kyang / /sdig pa de kun 'jig 'gyur som nyi med/ /don zhags snying po'i phyag rgya mthong ba yang / /'jig rten mgon dang mtshungs te khyad par 'phags/ /sangs rgyas 'bum phrag stong dang

gang gA yi/ /bye ba brgya stong dag ni mthong bar 'gyur/ /byang chub snying por gtogs pa thams cad dang / /chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor bar mtshungs/ /don yod rgyal po'i snying po phyag rgya dang / /gsang sngags mthong na bsod nams

phung chen gyi/ /bsod nams phung po 'di dag 'phel bar 'gyur/ /de yi tshe yang rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur/ /de ni dpag tu med pa som nyi med/ /de nas rigs sngags 'chang ba gsang gyur nas/ /gtsang ma'i gos bsgos nas ni thog

mar yang / /yo byad bsgrub pa gtsang zhing spyod pa gtsang / /rtag tu yan lag spos ni sna tshogs dang / /sna tshogs bdug pas rab tu bdug bgyis zhing / /dpung pa lag pa lha yi spos kyis byug /gtsang ma'i sa phyogs gtsang ma'i gdan

bshams par/ /skyil mo dkrung bcas nas ni byams sems dang / /snying rje'i lhag bsam de nyid mnyam bzhag nas/ /phyogs bcu'i dus gsum gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / /rtag tu 'jig rten dbang la phyag bgyi zhing / /rtag tu bla ma

mchod cing chos la brtson/ /shin tu rig pas tshig gzhan mi smra bar/ /shin tu rig pas bsrung ba'i cho ga bgyi/ /shin tu bkra shis bla ma de nyid gus/ /bden par smra zhing snyan par smra ba dang / /sems can kun la snying rje'i bdag nyid can/ /

lhan cig rjes mthun gyur nas de nas ni/ /phyag rgya 'di bcing bar bgyi ste/ lag pa pad ma'i tshul du gzhag la/ sor mo rnams mnyam par bcings te/ mthe'u chung zla ba'i tshul du snying gar gzhag go/ phyag rgya 'di ni don yod pa'i rgyal

po'i snying po'i rtsa ba'i phyag rgya ste/ byang chub snying po'i bar du stsol bar bgyid do/ /mgon po 'jig rten dbang phyug dgug pa'i gsang sngags 'di brjod do/ /oM a mo g+ha bi kur bi ta/ sa man ta a ba lo ka ya man s+t+re ya dwa a

d+hi ta a mo g+ha pad me/ tsa ra bi tsa ra san tsa ra hU~M hU~M/ de ma thag tu dus gsum la rnam par lta ba don yod pa'i rgyal po pad ma 'bar ba'i gsal ba'i cho 'phrul dang bcas pa'i phyag rgya'i rgyal pos shin tu phra ba'i rdul dang / mnyam pa'i

dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mang po mtha' dag cher g.yos par 'gyur ro/ /dus gsum du gshegs shing bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi sku las 'od zer sna tshogs 'bum phrag brgya stong du

ma dag byung nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad rab tu dgyes shing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing la mdzad pa'i thugs rje chen pos phyag gser gyi kha dog lta bu brkyang nas/ rig sngags 'chang gi spyi bor 'jog par 'gyur ro/ /sgrub pa

dam pa don yod pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis/ byin gyis brlabs pa stsol bar 'gyur ro/ /dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / tshangs pa dang / lha'i bu dang gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / lus ngan dang / khyab bdag dang / kun 'gyed

gzhon nu la sogs pa lha rnams bsrung ba dang / skyob pa dang / sbed par bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /phyag rgya bcings pa tsam gyi mod la sdig pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad dang / 'jigs pa brgyad rnams dang / chad pa thams cad las yongs su thar

bar 'gyur ro/ /de'i grub pa yid du mchi bar 'gyur ro/ /las thams cad bgyid pa'i phyag rgya thams cad du mchog lags par grags pa lags so/ /don yod dam tshig mchog grags pa/ /pad ma rgyas pa'i phyag rgya bcing / /mdzub mo

gung rnams pad ma lcags kyu'i tshul du bgyis la/ sems mo mnyam par gzhag pa'i phyag rgya 'di bstan te/ rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor rtse ba'i phyag rgya 'dzin pa'i gsang sngags 'di brjod do/ /oM a mo g+ha pad ma~M ku sha sa man

yAn/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ ma hA satwa hU~M/ phyag rgya bcings te bcings ma thag tu 'am/ bzlas pa tsam gyis dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis legs so zhes bgyi ba stsol bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs

pa de dag thams cad dgyes pa dang / mnyes pa dang / rab tu dgyes pa dang / tshim pa dang / thugs dgyes pa skye bar 'gyur zhing / rig sngags 'chang la thugs rje chen po rgyas pa'i snying po grub pa dam pa stsol bar 'gyur zhing / yang nas yang du mthong ba stsol bar

'gyur ro/ /mchog thams cad stsol bar 'gyur ro/ /don yod pa'i zhags pa'i dam tshig grub pa stsol bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhib mo phyag rgya dang gsang sngags 'dzin pa rnam par

grol ba'i dkyil 'khor gzung ba tsam gyis dam tshig rjes su 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /thams cad du 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor phyag rgya dang dam tshig 'tshal bar 'gyur ro/ /thams cad du dgos pa'i

gsang sngags 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mchog sbyin pa rtag tu blta 'tshal bar 'gyur ro/ /lag mthil pad ma ltar bgyis la mdzub mo gung mo rdo rje ltar bgyi zhing / mthe chung brkyang ba'i phyag rgya

ni/ /pad ma 'chang la bdug pa dang / /me tog la sogs dri rnams dang / /phreng ba byug pa phye ma dang / /ba dan gos dang rgyan dang ni/ /gtor ma mchod yon rab tu dbul/ /bum pa gang ba'i dri sogs dang / /tshon skud sna lnga tshon dbye'o/ /gzhan

yang zas ni sna tshogs la/ /phyag rgya 'di ni kun la mchog /'di ni dbul ba'i phyag rgyar gsungs/ /thams cad du ni don yod mchog /go bar bgyi ba'i phyag rgya 'di/ /pad ma'i phyag gis byin gyis brlab/ /gung mo nor bus dkris pa lta

bu'i phyag rgya 'di ni bag tsha ba med pa'i pad ma rin po che'i phyag rgya lags te/ 'di ni grub pa dam pa lags so/ /spyan drang ba'i gsang sngags ni/ oM a mo g+ha pad ma ma hA sa t+ya a ya tu myi hA maN Da le/ bi ri bi ri bi ri pad ma b+hu dze swA hA/

dus gsum gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/ /gsol ba gdab pa'i gsang sngags te/ /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / /phyag na pad ma gsol gdab dgug /lha rnams kun dang de bzhin du/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni lha rnams

dgug /phyag rgya 'di ni bcings pa yis/ /phyogs bcu kun gyi sangs rgyas dang / /de bzhin byang chub sems dpa'ang 'du/ /lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang / /dri za lha min de bzhin du/ /nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci/ /lto 'phye chen po nyid

dag ste/ /de kun skad cig 'du 'gyur zhing / /srung ba'i phyir ni som nyi med/ /lag pa rdo rje'i tshul du gzhag la lag pa'i mthe'u chung rnams pad ma'i mtshams su bya ste/ gung mo rnams yid tsam bskums pa'i phyag rgya

bcings pa ni/ grub ldan 'di ni phyogs bcing dang / /dkyil 'khor bcing bar bgyis pa yi/ /bsrung ba'i las la bag tsha med/ /phyag rgya 'di ni bcings tsam dang / /gsang sngags stong ni bzlas tsam gyis/ /dpag tshad bdun ni khor

yug tu/ /mtshams bcing dkyil 'khor bcing ba dang / /bsrung ba'i las ni bgyis par 'gyur/ /oM a mo g+ha badzra dr-i D+ha pad ma ban d+ha sa man ta shan tu mAM/ tsu ru tsu ru hU~M phaT/ de nas don yod phyag rgya ste/ /

grub ldan sems can kun smra na/ /don yod pa'i phyag rgya yi/ /khyad par 'phags pa gzhan yang bstan/ /rdo rje thal mo sbyar nas sor mo rnams mnyam par gzhag te/ srin lag kha gdangs la sor mo rnams yid tsam

bskum pa ni/ don yod sna tshogs rgyal po yi/ /pad ma'i phyag rgya chen por bsgrags/ /phyag rgya 'di ni las kun dang / /'jug pa'i las kun sbyar ba dang / /dkyil 'khor phyag rgya mchog kun gsungs/ /phyag rgya
'di ni gzung tsam dang / /gsang sngags dam pas bsrungs bgyis nas/ /rig sngags 'chang ba 'jug par 'gyur/ /dus gsum gshegs pa rnam thar pa'i/ /dkyil 'khor dam pa grub par 'gyur/ /oM badzre

badzra/ a d+hiSh+Thi te pad me bi shwa rU pa d+ha re/ d+ha ra d+ha ra hU~M/ pra be sha tu sa tre+e yad d+hA ga dan d+hi ri tu Ti swA hA/ phyag rgya 'di ni bcings tsam gyis/ /de nyid grub pas phyogs bcu yi/ /sangs rgyas zhing ni rnam drug

tu/ /g.yo bar 'gyur ba som nyi med/ /phyag na pad ma'i lus 'bar nas/ /mgu ba chen po 'byung bar 'gyur/ /rig sngags 'chang la 'dzum bzhin gyis/ /rtag tu lta zhing mdun na mchis/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni zhing kun

dang / /mtho ris sgo rnams 'byed par 'gyur/ /sum bcu rtsa gnyis gnas rnams na/ /gnas pa'i lha rnams sgo 'byed cing / /sum bcu rtsa gsum gnas sgo na/ /gnas pa thams cad sgo 'byed do/ /bde can 'jig rten

khams dag ni/ /sgo na gnas pa sgo 'byed do/ /phyag rgya 'di ni bcings tsam gyis/ /gnas kun tu ni 'jug par 'gyur/ /phyag rgya sdig pa thams cad 'phrog /nye ba'i nyon mongs thams cad 'joms/ /sdug bsngal kun

las rnam par grol/ /gnod pa thams cad 'jig par bgyid/ /dmyal ba bcu drug rnams las thar/ /phyag rgya bcings pa tsam gyis ni/ /mi bzad 'jigs pa brgyad rnams dang / /nyes byas thams cad 'jig par byed/ /

dmyal ba'i sgo ni bcad par 'gyur/ /mi bzad 'jigs las bsgral bar 'gyur/ /phyag rgya 'di ni mthong tsam gyis/ /mtshams med lnga ni bgyis pa dang / /sdig pa kun las rnam par thar/ /sems can kun las rtag tu sdug /

de bzhin gshegs kun byin gyis rlob/ /phyag rgya 'di ni mthe bo'i rtse mo cung zad bkug la gzung ste/ gung mo pad ma'i ral pa'i tshul du bgyis te/ spyi bo'i ral pa la gzhag pa ni pad ma'i ral pa'i phyag rgya lags te/ 'di ni don

yod pa'i zhags pa zhes bsgrags te/ sems can thams cad la sman pa'i slad du/ gsang sngags 'di brjod par bgyi'o/ /oM a mo g+ha pad mo dze le bi sho d+ha ya hU~M/ bi ri bi ri ma le swA hA/ phyag rgya spyi bor gzhag nas

chab dag gis bkrus nas gtsang mas gsang sngags 'di/ brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas nas su/ /phyag rgya gsang sngags dogs med pas/ /rtag tu bkrus pa'i mod tsam gyis/ /mi gtsang ba ni gtsang bar 'gyur/ /mi gtsang spyod pa gtsang

bar 'gyur/ /tshangs spyod ma yin tshangs spyod 'gyur/ /mi thub pa ni thub par 'gyur/ /bsod nams phung po lha bzhin 'bar/ /zla ba nyi ma bzhin du mdzes/ /'jig rten kun snying rtag tu sdug /gsang sngags bla na med pa
'grub/ /grub pa don yod zhags pa yi/ /don yod de nyid grub par 'gyur/ /lha rnams kun ni 'du 'gyur te/ /bsrung ba'i phyir ni som nyi med/ /mgon po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs/ /sems

pa mchog sbyin dag pa po/ /mchog sbyin rgyun tu thams cad du/ /nyi ma re re mthong 'gyur zhing / /tshe 'phel rtag tu nad med 'gyur/ /de bzhin mgu dang rgyas par 'gyur/ /thams cad du ni las 'grub ste/ /gnod
pa kun las rnam par grol/ /sdig pa kun las rnam par thar/ /thams cad du ni bkra shis mchog /khrus kyi rnam pa 'di dag ni/ /don yod khrus kyi mchog yin no/ /lag gnyis bsdams la 'og tu bstan/ /

srin lag gnyis yud tsam bskum pa ni pad ma'i nor bu phyag rgya lags te/ kun nas kyang ni mnyam par gzhag /phyag rgya ting 'dzin lta bu 'di/ /skyil mo dkrung bcas mchis nas su/ /phyag rgya 'di dag bcing bgyi
zhing / /mnyam par gzhag nas gsang sngags bzlas/ /bcings pa tsam gyi mod nas ni/ /skyil dkrung rdo rje lhun mnyam 'gyur/ /kun nas go char gyur nas ni/ /bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad dang / /gnod
sbyin srin po 'byung por bcas/ /lha min mkha' lding gis mi mthong / /phyogs dang phyogs kyi mtshams dag tu/ /de dag thams cad rgyang ring 'bros/ /bgegs med par ni las 'grub pas/ /bzlas pa'i las

la som nyi med/ /oM a mo g+ha badzra dr-i D+ha pad me shwa ra hU~M/ thal mo mnyam par sbyar la mdzub mo dang gung mo bkug nas/ mthe bo pad ma kha phye ba ltar bgyis te/ don yod pa'i dbang phyug rgyal po'i phyag rgya'o/ /

'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun du gsang sngags dang phyag rgya bcing bar bgyi'o/ /oM pad me shwa ra a mo g+ha ba ra d+ha/ bi ri bi ri swA hA/ 'dis thog mar bzlas brjod nyi shu rtsa gcig bgyi'o/ /de'i 'og tu phyag rgya bcings

nas/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po de kho na nyid sems dpa'i bsam pa rtse gcig tu bzlas brjod bgyi'o/ /lan cig bzlas pa tsam gyi mod la/ dus gsum du rgyun du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas 'bum phrag brgya stong gang gA'i

klung gi bye ma snyed dang mnyam pa g.yo bar 'gyur zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis/ rig sngags 'chang de la legs so zhes bgyi bstsol bar 'gyur ro/ /dbugs 'byin par

mdzad do/ /rig sngags 'chang de la 'od zer sna tshogs gtong bar mdzad do/ /mgon po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dran par bgyis pa tsam gyi mod la mdun du mchis par 'gyur ro/ /'di ltar bcings pa tsam gyis

pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /pha rol tu phyin pa bcu dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang ldan

par 'gyur ro/ /mi 'jigs pa bzhi thob par 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad yongs su dag pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /phyag rgya 'di bcings la don yod pa'i rgyal po'i snying po dran par bgyis pa tsam gyi

mod la/ yon tan dang phan yon rnams 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad bgyis la phyag rgya brgya rtsa brgyad bcings nas/ zhag gcig smyung ba bgyis te bzlas brjod bgyis na/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs

dbang phyug bdag nyid kyi rang bzhin du mdun na mchis nas/ rig sngags 'chang la legs so zhes bgyi ba stsol te/ rig sngags 'chang legs so legs so/ /'di ni bzlas brjod kyi dam pa yin no/ /zhes dpung pa g.yas pa brkyang

ba'i lag pas rig sngags 'chang gi spyi bor gzhag nas/ dbugs 'byin par mdzad de tshur shog bu/ gang 'dod pa'i mchog slongs shig dang sbyin no/ /khyod rjes su bzung zhing byin gyis brlabs pas/ nga'i bu rig sngags 'chang gi thu bor

gyur cig /rig sngags 'chang khyod kyis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po grub pas/ rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya rim par dbye ba dang / cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po la brtan par gyis shig /snying rje chen po'i sems kyis

sems can thams cad la goms par gyis shig /khyod 'di nas ma 'ongs pa'i mngal du gnas nas/ shi 'phos te 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du 'gro bar 'gyur zhing / khyod pad ma'i nang du rdzus te skyes nas/ brgyan thams cad kyis

brgyan cing mtshan dang dpe byad kyis rab tu brgyan pa/ byang chub kyi snying po'i mthar thug gi bar du tshe dpag tu med par 'gyur ro/ /'di ltar tshig gzhan mi smra bar lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis te/ lan stong rtsa brgyad tshang na nam

mkha' la mchi bar 'gyur ro/ /don yod pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa rnam par dag pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags 'chang 'bum phrag bye ba stong phrag bcwa brgyad kyis yongs su bskor bar 'gyur ro/ /
