gis zas dkar gsum 'tshal bar bgyi'o/ /btung ba ngan pa dang / kha zas ngan pa dang / gnas ngan pa dang / lhag ma dang / spags pa pa dang rnam par spang bar bgyi'o/ /don yod pa'i rgyal po'i snying po nyi khri chig stong bzlas nas/ lag pa

g.yas pas chos kyi stan gyi steng du gzhag pa'i zhags pa la mnan no/ /lan nyi khri chig stong tshang ba dang / de nas rig sngags 'chang gis khro bo'i rgyal po lan stong rtsa brgyad tshang bar bzlas te/ yungs dkar re re nas dbang bskur

bar bgyi'o/ /lan stong rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang / rig sngags 'chang gis 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ri mo'i gzugs la mchod pa rgya cher bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag med dang / de bzhin gshegs

pa shAkya thub pa la yang mchod pa rgya cher bgyi'o/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang gis tshes bcwa lnga'i nya la nyin zhag gcig smyung ba bgyis nas mchod pa rgya cher bgyis te/ mchod pa'i yo byad gang ci yang rung ba de dag thams cad re re

nas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan nyi shu rtsa re re nas bzlas brjod bgyis nas dbul ba bgyi'o/ /de nas skyil mo dkrung bcas te mchis nas/ nyin mtshan kun tu don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas

te/ yungs dkar re re nas brdegs par bgyi'o/ /lan stong rtsa brgyad tshang ba cher g.yo bar 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ri mo'i gzugs las kyang 'od zer kha dog sna tshogs dag 'byung bar 'gyur

ro/ /nor bu'i zhags pa de yang 'bar bar 'gyur/ rig sngags 'chang gi mgo bo yang 'bar bar 'gyur ro/ /'bar ba tsam gyi mod la rig sngags 'chang gi lag pa g.yas pas nor bu'i zhags pa blangs pa na/ sgra chen po yang 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas 'phags pa spyan ras

gzigs dbang phyug lha'i bdag nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis rig sngags 'chang gi mdun na mchis par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med dang / de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs

'od kyi rgyal po'i sku gser gyi kha dog gis nam mkha' la rdzu 'phrul gyis bzhugs nas/ rig sngags 'chang la legs so zhes bgyi ba stsol bar 'gyur/ phyag dpung pa gser gyi kha dog 'dra ba brkyang ba'i phyag gis/ rig sngags 'chang

gi mgo bor bzhag nas/ rig sngags 'chang la dbugs 'byin par mdzad de/ rig sngags 'chang legs so legs so/ /khyod kyis yid bzhin gyi nor bu chen po don yod pa'i zhags pa rnam par dag pa grub po/ /khyod kyis 'jig rten

pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i las bsgrub pa'i cho ga bla na med pa grub ste/ rig sngags 'chang gis 'dod dgur bsgyur ba thams cad de/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi don yod grub pa yid bzhin gyi nor bu chen po'i zhags

pa thogs nas/ rig sngags 'chang gis 'bad mi dgos par yid bzhin gyi nor bu chen po don yod pa'i zhags pa grub pa'i rang bzhin 'dis/ 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dgos pa rnam pa sna tshogs bsgrubs par byed pa la

ltos shig /yid la ci ltar bsams pa bzhin rdzu 'phrul dang / cho 'phrul sna tshogs la bltos shig /rig sngags 'chang khyod shi 'phos nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du song zhig /'on te bde ba can blta bar 'tshal lam/ ci ltar de

bzhin gshegs pa la 'os pa'i lha rdzas kyi mchod par 'tshal lam/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'i sprin gyis mchod par 'tshal lam/ lha'i me tog dang / lha'i dri dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / chos gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan

dang / dril bu dang / ba dan dang / lhab lhub dang / rgyan dang gos kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod par bgyi ba 'tshal na/ rig sngags 'chang des spyi bo'i gtsug du dri'i dkyil 'khor bgyis la me tog dang / bdug pa yang dbul lo/ /yid bzhin gyi

nor bu chen po don yod pa'i zhags pa'i mchog 'di/ lag pa g.yon pas mnan la/ lag pa g.yas pas don yod pa yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i mchog gzungs nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la gtsugs te/ 'di lta bu yid la bgyid

pa chen po ci lta bu'i bsam pa yid la bgyid pa de lta bu yang bsams nas/ don yod rgyal po'i snying po lan bdun bzlas te phyag bgyi'o/ /yid bzhin gyi nor bu chen po rgya chen don yod pa 'di bzlas nas/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang

phyug gi snying po 'di/ lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi'o/ /byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen pos yongs su gdungs pa'i snying gis sems can thams cad la mchog du brtse bar bgyis nas gsang sngags bzlas brjod bgyi'o// //
'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po/ bam po lnga pa/ dus gsum du gshegs shing bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa thams cad la phyag

'tshal lo/ /rang sangs rgyas dang / 'phags pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /yang dag par song ba dang / yang dag par zhugs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal

lo/ /blo gros chen po shwa ra dwa ti'i bu la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gnas kyi mchog dga' ldan na gnas pa 'phags pa byams pa la sogs pa'i tshogs dang bcas pa'i mchog la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bde ba can gyi dkyil 'khor na

bzhugs pa de bzhin gshegs pa 'phags pa 'od dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs

dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tshangs pa dang khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / dbang phyug la sogs pa'i lha'i bu gzugs sna tshogs mnga' ba spyan ras gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ oM ma hA pad ma tsin ta ma Ni ma Nan Ni/ a mo g+ha ma

Ni su ma Ni/ ma hA ma Ni/ sarba ta thA ga ta/ a la~M kA ra/ ma hA a mo g+ha ma Ni/ tsa ra tsa ra san tsa ra/ na sha tsa tsa re shwa ra ma hA/ pad ma b+hu dza ba ra da/ ma hA kA ru ni ka /ma hA bi shwa r+'u pa d+ha ra/ pra ba ra ma hA bo d+hi satwa pad ma d+ha ra pad ma A san pad ma ma

ku Ta/ mA lA d+ha ra/ pad ma gau ra/ pad ma baM kr-i ta ta nu/ sa hA sra b+hu dza sa hA sra ne tra nA nAd b+hu ta/ pra ba ra Na/ mud dra bi b+hu Shi tA sa hA sra b+hu dza/ dza ya dza ya/ sha ta sa hA sra rash+mi pra ti man Di ta sha rI rA/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ bi tsid tra/ A b+ha ra Na d+ha ra/

ma Ni kan ka /badzra bai d+'ur+ya/ ma ra ka ta/ in dra nI la pad ma rA ga b+hu Shi ta shi rI ra/ tsi ri tsi ri/ bi tsid tra/ tsa rA Na/ ma hA bo d+hi satwa ba ra da brah+ma/ biSh+Nu ma he shwa ra r+'u pa d+ha ra/ pad me shwa ra/ lo ki shwa ra yam an+te shwa ra ba ru Na/

ku be ra r-i Sha ga Na ku mA ra/ se nA pa ti be sha d+ha ra d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ ma hAd b+hu ta bi sha d+ha ra/ sarba ta thA ga tA a b+hi Shi ka ta sa ma ya ma nu sma ra b+ha ga bAn/ p+'u ra ya ma shAn tA rA ya pu ra na/ shA ya

ya sa twan/ tar dza ya du sh+Ta na/ bA ta ya big+ha nan/ / ma ra ya tri do Sha mA la~M sa ra sa ra/ pa pa~M/ hU~M hU~M hU~M/ phaT phaT phaT/ sid+h+ya sid d+h+ya/ ma hA tsin tA ma Ni/ a mo g+ha pA sha d+ha ra/ sA d+ha ya sA d+ha ya/ bi pu la sid d+hi~M/

ma ma pra yats+tsha/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka /bud d+ha bud d+ha/ bo d+ha ya bo d+ha ya/ sa~M b+ho d+ha yA/ sa~M b+ho d+ha yA/ ma hA pa shu pa ti be Sha d+ha ra/ a nan bi kur ba Na/ r-id d+hi san da ri sha ra/ tu ru tu ru/ ta ra tu rA/ ga ga ne bi pu la bi mA na/

san d+ha ri sha ka /na mo stu te bi pu la pu N+ya/ ko shA d+ha ra/ ma hA a mo g+ha sid d+he hU~M hU~M/ a b+hi Shiny+tsa tu mA~M/ bi pu la kIrti ka re swA hA/ b+hu swA hA/ b+hur b+hu ba swA hA/ a mo g+ha bi pu le swA hA/ ma hA tsin tA ma Ni sid d+he swA hA/ sarba sid

d+hi ba ra d+he swA hA/ oM bi pu le shwa ra/ lo ke shwa ra/ ma hA tsin ta ma Ni/ ma hA a mo g+ha sid d+hi hU~M phaT swA hA/ don yod nor bu'i zhags pa chen po 'di lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas ma thag tu rig sngags 'chang gi lus thams cad

'bar bar 'gyur ro/ /don yod pa'i zhags pa lag pas mnan na nam mkha'i ngos la rdzu 'phrul gyis mchi bar 'gyur ro/ /sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin dang 'dra ba'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul chen po ston par 'gyur ro/ /

'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyang tshogs dang bcas/ 'khor dang bcas/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i dkyil 'khor dang / gzhal med khang mchog dang bcas

pa rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par 'phrul pa mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /bde ba can gyi gnas mtha' dag tu mchod pa'i char sprin gyi tshogs chen po 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med kyi mthus mchod pa'i sprin chen

por gnas par 'gyur ro/ /bde ba can na gnas pa de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med des/ rig sngags 'chang la legs so zhes bgyi ba stsol bar 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags 'chang des kyang sgra de dag thams cad thos par 'gyur

zhing mchod pa'i char chen po de yang mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /gal te rig sngags 'chang nam mkha' las chu 'bebs par 'tshal na/ de'i tshe bsams pa tsam gyis 'bab par 'gyur ro/ /'on te mi 'tshal na nam mkha' de nyid na nam mkha' la grub pa dang / rig sngags

'chang thams cad kyi mchog don yod rgya chen grub pa yid bzhin nor bu lag pa zhes bya ba'i 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur ro/ /dpag tu ma mchis pa'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i rig sngags 'chang gis yongs su bskor bar 'gyur ro/ /tshe bskal pa chen po brgya

stong phrag brgyad bcu rtsa gnyis su 'gyur ro/ /'on te babs na lo khrir 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten dbang phyug dang 'dra bar mchod pa dang gus pa chen po bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten thams cad kyi gtso bo gcig pur 'gyur ro/ /lha rnams kyang babs nas rig

sngags 'chang de la mchod pa'i mchog rgya chen po dag bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /sems can thams cad la bu gcig pa bzhin du mngon par dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /mchod pa'i 'os su yang 'gyur ro/ /lha thams cad kyis kyang kun du bsrung zhing phyag bgyi ba'i 'os su

'gyur ro/ /thos pa bsags pa'i rgya mtsho chen por yang 'gyur ro/ /gal te rig sngags 'chang phyogs bcu dus gsum thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba dang bcas pa rang sangs rgyas dang / 'phags pa

nyan thos kyi dge 'dun thams cad dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la mngon par dad pa dang bcas pa la mchod pa bgyid par 'tshal ba 'am/

phyogs bcu dus gsum du gtogs pa thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la bsod nams kyi phung po chen po yongs su rdzogs par 'tshal ba dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po bskyed par 'tshal ba 'am/ lha'i zhal zas kyi mchog ro bro ba'i mchog dang ldan pa'i bza' ba dang /

lha'i bcud kyis len gyi mchog gis de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / 'phags pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun thams cad la bstabs par 'tshal ba 'am/ sbyin pa mang po dang / chen po gtong bar 'tshal ba 'am/

nyin re zhing mchod pa'i sprin bgyid par 'tshal na/ rig sngags 'chang des legs par bkrus te/ gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos nas/ ci 'byor pas dkyil 'khor gru bzhir bgyis la/ bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang

phyug gi mdun du me tog dang / bdug pa yang dbul bar bgyi'o/ /pus mo gtsugs te thal mo sbyar nas zhags pa gzung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yid la bgyi'o/ /yid bzhin nor bu chen po rgya chen don yod 'di yang mchod par bgyi'o/ /

'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po lan bdun bzlas par bgyi'o/ /yid la bgyid pa yangs pa rgya chen po mchod pa'i sprin chen po dang / sbyin gtong chen po dang / kha zas dang / btung ba dang / dri dang phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / chos gos dang /

gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / gos dang / rgyan dang / lhab lhub dang / rgyan 'phyang dang / rol mo dang / sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pa dang / rin po che'i ljon shing dang / 'bras bu'i ljon shing dang / me tog gi ljon shing dang / mar me'i ljon shing dang /

dpag bsam gyi ljon shing yid la bgyis te/ gsang sngags kyi gzungs bzlas nas ji ltar yid la bsams shing don du gnyer ba bzhin phyogs bcur 'phangs na/ de'i tshe phyogs bcu dus gsum du gshegs pa dkyil 'khor mtha' dag tu

gtogs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du mkho ba'i yo byad thams cad ma tshang ba ma mchis par ci bsams pa bzhin de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi spyan sngar mchod pa'i char gyi sprin chen po 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /

de bzhin du mkho ba'i yo byad thams cad kyi mchod pa chen po ma tshang ba ma mchis pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du mthu chen po'i nor bu rgya chen don yod la mchod pa'i gzungs bzlas shing / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying

po'i gzungs 'di yang nyin gcig bzhin du bzlas par bgyi'o/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang gis dus gsum du gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa de dag mnyes par bgyis pa dang / mchod pa bgyis pa dang /

rim gro bgyis par 'gyur ro/ /bsod nams kyi phung po'i tshogs chen po dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po bskyed par 'gyur ro/ /dus gsum du gtogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa de dag thams cad
kyis rig sngags 'chang la dran pa dang /
blo gros dang stobs dang brtson 'grus dang gzi brjid stsol bar 'gyur ro/ /nyin gcig bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis dgongs par

'gyur ro/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rtag tu rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro/ /rtag tu mchog sbyin pa mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /mthong ba'i chos la 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal 'jigs pa 'jigs su rung ba dang / skrag
pa dang dngar ba rnams zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /nad kyis kyang gnod par mi 'gyur ro/ /rims kyis ma lags dug gis ma lags/ dug sbyar mas ma lags/ sbyor bas ma lags/ mtshon gyis ma lags/ mes
ma lags/ chus ma lags te/ lus la ser ba 'bab par mi 'gyur ro/ /dgras 'jigs par mi 'gyur te/ pha rol gyi dpung gi 'jigs pas ma lags/ pha rol gyi sde'i 'jigs pas ma lags/ phas kyi

rgol ba dang mi mdza' ba'i 'jigs pas ma lags/ lha'i 'jigs pas ma lags/ klu'i 'jigs pas ma lags te/ gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / srin po dang /

mkha' 'gro ma dang / 'dod dgur bsgyur ba dang / sbyor ba mo'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /dpag tshad gcig gi nang tshun chad bzung bar mi nus shing / rgyang ring por 'bros par 'gyur te/ de la bgegs bgyid par
mi 'gyur ro/ /gang dag mnar med par gnas par 'gyur ba'i sems can nam/ mtshams med pa lnga bgyid pa 'am/ 'phags pa la skur ba 'debs pa 'am/ dam pa'i chos spong ba 'am/ bskal pa bye bar
bsags pa'i las kyi sgrib pas lus yongs su dkris pa gang lags pa de yang mthong ba'i chos la thams cad lhag ma ma lus par yongs su gtugs par 'gyur/ yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro/ /gal te tshig gzhan

mi smra bar lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyid cing / smyung ba lan cig bgyis te/ bzlas brjod byas na de bskal pa bye ba phrag brgya stong du 'khor bar skye ba las phyir zlog par 'gyur ro/ /gzugs kyi bzlas brjod kyis las

snga ma rnams kyang 'byang bar 'gyur zhing / bskal pa stong du bsags pa'i sdig pa rnams nyams par 'gyur ro/ /'khor ba'i nyes pas phyir yang gos par mi 'gyur te/ sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad kyis pad ma bzhin du

gos par mi 'gyur ro/ /mthong ba'i chos la sa lnga pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /bsten pa tsam mam cho ga'i bzlas brjod la nges par gnas na/ phyir mi ldog pa'i gnas thob par 'gyur ro/ /dran pa tsam gyis pha rol tu phyin pa

drug yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /pha rol tu phyin pa bcu'i rjes su mchi bar 'gyur ro/ /nyin gcig bzhin du lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis na/ mthong ba'i chos la kun tu bzang po nyid thob par 'gyur ro/ /gsang

sngags dang cho ga zhib mo dang / dkyil 'khor dang phyag rgya thams cad kyi rjes su zhugs pa dang / dam tshig thams cad la zhugs par 'gyur ro/ /yang dag par skyed pa thams cad kyi rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro/ /rig

sngags 'chang mthong ba tsam gyis/ mnar med par gnas pa rnams kyi sdig pa rnam par 'jig par 'gyur ro/ /chung ngu na rig sngags 'chang dur khrod du zhugs nas gum pa'i rus pa 'am/ gum pa'i sha 'am/ gum pa'i

ro rul pa 'am/ chung ngu na gum pa'i gos bor ba 'am/ rtsig pa'i ri mo la rig sngags 'chang de'i grib mas phog par gyur na/ sems can de gang dang gang gis dmyal bar gzhol bar 'gyur ba de dang de nas mod la thar nas

'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur te/ de la yid gnyis som nyi bskyed par mi bgyid na/ gang dag ches mang du lhag par bgyid par 'gyur ba lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ gang rigs kyi bu pho 'am/ rigs

kyi bu mo 'am/ dge slong pha 'am/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge snyen pha 'am/ dge snyen ma 'am/ dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba 'ga' zhig gzungs 'di 'chang bar bgyid dam/ brjod par bgyid/ klog par bgyid/ 'don par bgyid/ sems par bgyid/ bsgom

par bgyid/ mchod par bgyid/ bri bar bgyid/ 'drir 'jug par bgyid na/ de nges par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro/ /mthong ba'i chos la yon tan chen po brgya stong mang po mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /'di nyid

bcangs na/ mthong ba'i chos la dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang rjes su mthun pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /gzungs 'di nyid re shig kun chub par bgyis nas/ mkho ba'i yo byad thams cad yongs su

rdzogs par 'gyur na/ dgos pa mang pos grims par bgyid pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ de nas rig sngags 'chang don yod yid bzhin nor bu'i zhags pa bsgrubs nas yid la bsams te/ bsams pa'i las thams cad bgyis na thams cad 'grub par 'gyur

ro/ /dgos pa dang bgyi ba thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /ci ltar 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mchog sbyin mngon sum du mthong nas/ lung bstan pa bzhin du don yod pa'i yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i zhags pa 'di de bzhin du blta bar bgyi ste/

'di la yid gnyis mi bgyi'o/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang gis zhags pa mgrin par btags la/ lag pa g.yas pas nor bu zer zhags pa blangs te/ lag pa g.yon pas lcags kyu blangs na mi gda' bar gyur nas/ gar dga' ba der 'jug

par 'gyur te/ mtshan mo yang nor bu'i 'od kyi snang bas nyin par blta ba bzhin mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /thams cad du lha'i gnas su 'jug pa dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci'i gnas dang /

lto 'phye chen po'i gnas dang / ri sul gyi phug dang / ri dang nags tshal dang / thang gi sgo rnams 'bye bar 'gyur ro/ /thams cad du mi mngon par zhugs nas slar ldog par 'gyur zhing ci 'tshal ba de bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /mi rnams kyi nang du lha'i

tshe lo brgyar 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ /nyon mongs pa dang / nyes pa'i skyon thams cad spangs par 'gyur ro/ /'on te rig sngags 'chang gis grub pa'i don la brtag par 'tshal na/ zla ba yar gyi ngo'i tshes brgyad dam/ bcu bzhi la legs par khrus bgyi'o/ /

gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgo bar bgyi'o/ /gtsang ma'i gnas sam/ phyogs su ba'i gcig ste/ ba'i rnam lngas yongs su sbyang bar bgyi'o/ /gnas de'i nang logs kyi dbus su dri'i dkyil 'khor bgyi'o/ /me tog gi sil ma bkram zhing bum

pa gang bas brgyan cing / spos sna tshogs kyis bgos pa'i bdug pa bzhag par bgyi'o/ /de nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun du stan bzangs po bshams te shin tu mnyam par gzhag pas zhags pa sbrul khyil pa'i tshul du

zlum por skyil nas gzhag par bgyi'o/ /dbus su nor bu gzhag par bgyi'o/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang gis mchod par bgyi'o/ /don yod rgyal po'i snying po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis nas/ khro bo'i rgyal po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig

bzlas brjod bgyi'o/ /de nas don yod yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i snying po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas de'i 'og tu tsan dan dang / a ka ru dang / du ru ka'i bdug pa dbul zhing nor bu la brtag par bgyi ste/ zhags pa dang / de thams cad

nor bu'i nang nas gda' bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa gda' ba 'am/ byang chub sems dpa' gda' ba 'am/ lha gda' ba 'am/ klu gda' ba 'am/ gnod sbyin dang srin po dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci

gda' ba dang / 'byung po dang / lto 'phye chen po gda' ba 'am/ g.yul 'gyed pa gda' ba 'am/ tshe ring ba gda' ba 'am/ tshe nyams pa gda' ba 'am/ tshe 'pho ba gda' ba 'am/ rgyal srid gda' ba 'am/ grong 'thob pa'am/ yul 'thob pa dang / grong khyer

'thob pa 'am/ dbyig dang / gser dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai d+'ur+ya dang / shang ka sh-i la dang / byi ru dang / sa le sbram dang / dngul dang / gos dang / lhab lhub dang / rgyan gda' ba 'am/ nor bsgyur ba smra ba dang / mig 'phrul smra ba 'am/ zhing smra ba 'am/ gter smra ba 'am/

'bru smra ba 'am/ bud med 'phrog pa 'am/ las sgrub pa 'am/ gsang sngags bsgrub pa 'am/ dbang du bgyi ba 'am/ ngo mtshar ba de dag thams cad nor bu'i nang nas gda' bar 'gyur zhing dge ba 'am mi dge ba/ de dag thams cad kyang gda' bar 'gyur ro/ /

lo 'am/ lo phyed dam gnod pa 'am/ 'tshe ba 'am/ mi yams sam/ ngas sam/ mi ngas chen po 'am/ phyug ngas sam/ gor ram/ rta nad dam/ glang po che'i nad dam/ rang gi dpung ngam/ gzhan gyi dpung gi 'jigs pa dang skrag pa chen po de dag thams cad me long gi dkyil

'khor la ci lta ba de bzhin du gda' bar 'gyur lags so/ /gang bsams shing gang gnyer bar 'grub pa 'am/ mi 'grub pa 'am/ dge ba 'am mi dge ba thams cad gda' bar 'gyur te/ de la the tshom dang yid gnyis dang som nyi mi bgyi ste/ dngos po don gzhan du mi 'gyur ro/ /char

mi 'bab pa'i dus su klu'i gnas su nor bu gzhag na/ ci tsam 'tshal bar char gyi rgyun 'bab par 'gyur ro/ /ha cang char ches na nam mkha' la nor bu bstan na char chen po 'chad par 'gyur ro/ /nyi ma 'char khar nyi ma la bstan na nyi ma babs nas mchog thams

cad stsol bar 'gyur ro/ /zla ba tshes pa la bstan na zla ba babs nas 'dod dgu thams cad kyi mchog stsol bar bgyid do/ /chu klung chen por bstan na rin po che rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /nags khung du bstan na sman gyi rdzas thams cad rang gi

gzugs kyis mdun na mchis nas gang gnyer ba de len par 'gyur ro/ /ri phug du bstan na sman thams cad 'bab par 'gyur te/ ci 'tshal ba de blang bar bgyi'o/ /'bru'i phung po la bstan na 'bru thams cad 'du bar 'gyur te/ gang du 'tshal ba der 'byung bar

'gyur ro/ /ma mo'i gnas sam/ nag po chen po la bstan te/ spyi bo'i gtsug tu gzhag na nag po chen po ma mo'i tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas pa rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na mchis nas/ dbang du 'gyur zhing dgos pa thams cad dang las thams cad

bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po'i mngon sum du bstan na yan lag bzhi'i dpung dang bcas pa/ blon po'i tshogs dang bcas/ btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa/ dbyig dang / gser dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai d+'ur+ya dang / shang ka shi la dang / byi ru dang / sa le sbram dang /

dngul dang gos dang rgyan dang / lhab lhub dang / rgyan 'chang ba dang / khang pa dang / ngo mtshar du bcas pa dbang du gyur nas/ ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bsnyen bkur bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /skye bo'i tshogs chen po'i nang du zhags pa 'phangs te/ don yod pa'i yid bzhin nor bu'i gzungs

bzlas na/ ci ltar 'tshal ba yid la bsams pa bzhin/ me tog dang 'bras bu dang / gzhal med khang 'bab par 'gyur ro/ /rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba'i rtse mor gzhag ste/ rgyal rigs spyi bor dbang bskur ba khyim gyi steng ngam khyams su gzhag la/ 'phags pa'i

yan lag brgyad kyi bsnyen gnas kyis sems can thams cad la mchog tu brtse bar bgyid do/ /don yod rgyal po'i snying po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis nas/ khro bo'i rgyal po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas par bgyi'o/ /de nas don yod pa'i yid

bzhin nor bu'i gzungs lan brgya rtsa brgyad gsang bstod de bzlas brjod bgyi'o/ /lan brgya rtsa brgyad tshang nas/ ci ltar yid la bsams pa bzhin char du 'bab par 'gyur ro/ /nor dang / 'bru dang / gos dang / lhab lhub la sogs pa/ me tog dang 'bras bu'i

'char 'bab par 'gyur ro/ /'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / mu ge'i dgon pa'i 'jigs pa dang / yams dang / gnod pa de dag thams cad 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mthus babs par 'gyur ro/ /thams

cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /sems can thams cad la mi 'jigs pa stsol bar 'gyur ro/ /'jigs pa dang sha 'khon thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro/ /gdug pa nas gcan zan khro bo thams cad kyi bar du yang byams pa la gnas par

'gyur ro/ /sems can thams cad mthun par bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /yid kyi brnag pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /don yod yid bzhin nor bu'i zhags pa chen po sgrub pa'i cho ga'o// // de nas rig sngags 'chang ral

gri dang zhags pa bsgrub par 'tshal na/ rig sngags 'chang gis lcags chen po las ral gri sor bcu drug gi tshad du bgyis la lag zungs kyi ngos la dngul las bgyis te/ gser gyis 'bar bar bri'o/ /shing shun gyi skud pa

'am/ arka'i skud pa dang / kha che dar gyi skud pa lhan cig du sgril la khru bcu drug byung ba shin du tshad la bab par bkum pa/ bsgrub pa'i dgos pa yongs su rdzogs pa la sum sgril du bkal bar bgyi'o/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang gis legs

par khrus bgyis te/ gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bsgos te/ zhags pa dang / ral gr-i mnan la/ lag pa g.yas pas dkyil 'khor la gzhag ste/ gzung bar bgyi'o/ /khros pa'i gnyer gyi bzhin gyis skyil mo dkrung bcas te mchis nas/ 'phags

pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ri mo'i gzugs kyi mdun du khro bo'i rgyal po lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas par bgyi'o/ /bzlas brjod lan stong rtsa brgyad tshang nas/ ral gri 'bar bar gyur nas/ rig sngags 'chang nam mkha' la 'phur

bar 'gyur zhing / ral gri grub pa'i rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi gtso bo 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro/ /gzhan gyi mthus zil gyis non par mi 'gyur ro/ /lo khri brgyad stong du 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ /'on te lag pa g.yon pas zhags pa

gzung la g.yas pas ral gri gzung ste/ khros pas hU~M zhes bgyi bas mnan na/ mi gda' bar gyur nas/ mi gda' ba dang / zhags pa dang / ral gri grub pa'i rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi gtso bo rgyal po 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro/ /tshe lo khri thub par

'gyur ro/ /'on te rig sngags 'chang khros pas ral gri bskor na/ bgegs dang / log 'dren dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po gdug pa thams cad dang / 'byung po thams cad kyi rig sngags bcad par 'gyur ro/ /g.yul gyi dbus su lan cig bskor na/ g.yul

'gyed pa'i mtshon cha thams cad bcad par 'gyur/ rengs par bgyis par 'gyur te/ thams cad phyogs bcur 'byer bar 'gyur ro/ /dur khrod kyi nang du bskor na/ dur khrod na gnas pa'i gdug pa rgyu ba thams cad kyi rig sngags gtubs par 'gyur zhing / gnas thams cad stongs par

'gyur ro/ /phug gi bskor na/ 'khrul 'khor dang sgo glegs thams cad dkrugs par 'gyur ro/ /gtan pa thams cad gtugs par 'gyur ro/ /gdug pa'i mi ma yin pa bar chad bgyid pa thams cad bcom par 'gyur/ thal bar brlag par 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang dgos pa

thams cad du ci ltar 'tshal ba bzhin du bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /ral gri sgrub pa'i cho ga'o// // de nas yang rig sngags 'chang sbrul gyi zhags pa sgrub par 'tshal na/ rig sngags 'chang des skud pa lnga las sgrubs te/ tshon rtsis kha bsgyur ba'i skud pa tshad bzhin

du gtubs la/ sgrub par shin tu 'os par las sgrub par bgyi'o/ /de nas zas bzang po'i phye ma dang / ma d+hu'i me tog dang / ras sa'i me tog dang ldong ros dang / pad ma ge sar dang / na ga pus pa dang / shing arka'i 'o ma de lhan cig du sbyar ba der btsag btsal

te/ dus gcig tu lhan cig tu mnyam du btags shing spyi bor legs par spru ste/ de la don yod rgyal po lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis nas/ sbrul 'khyil pa mgo gsum gyi gdengs ka can yongs su 'khyil pa gser gyis
g.yogs pa/ legs par sbrel pa ni zhags pa'i mchog lags so/ /rig sngags 'chang gis legs par khrus bgyis la/ gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos te/ ba'i lci ba'i dkyil 'khor gru bzhi tshad bzhin bgyis te/

dris mchod par bgyi'o/ /me tog gi sil ma dang / bum pa gang bas brgyan par bgyi'o/ /ba dan gyis kun nas brgyan par bgyi'o/ /dkyil 'khor gyi dbus kyi gnas su stan bzang po bshams te/ de'i steng du klu'i
zhags pa bskyil nas gzhag par bgyi'o/ /sbrul gyi mgo'i gdengs ka dbus ma ni kha shar phyogs su bstan no/ /dkar gsum gyi gtor ma gzhag par bgyi'o/ /mchod yon dkar po'i snod dang / bdug pa rnam pa

gsum po tsan dan dang / a ga ru dang d+hu ru ka rnams bsreg go/ 'bras yos dang / yungs kar bkram pa'i dkyil 'khor bgyis la/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mngon sum du gzhag la mchod pa rgya chen
po bgyis te/ rig sngags 'chang gis skyil mo dkrung bcas te/ mchis nas bzus brjod mang du bgyi'o/ /thog mar don yod zhags pa'i snying po

lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis nas/ khro bo'i rgyal po lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas pa'i yungs kar re re nas sbrul gyi mgo la gtor bar bgyi'o/ /sgrub pa thams cad tshang nas ni/ /rgyun du sbrul ni 'bar bar 'gyur/ /stan las

zhags pa g.yo ba ni/ /sor bzhi tsam gyi tshad tsam du/ /stan las gyen du 'phar bar 'gyur/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang gis gzung nas mi gda' bar gyur nas/ klu'i gnas su mchis te/ klu'i mtshor mchis na/ klu'i gnas kyi sgo rnams 'bye bar 'gyur ro/ /

rig sngags 'chang gis zhugs te don yod rgyal po bzlas nas/ sbrul gyi zhags pa lan gsum du bskor bar bgyi'o/ /de nas klu'i rgyal po btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa mchis nas rig sngags 'chang la mngon du smra bas rig sngags 'chang zhugs

shig ces smra bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang gis sbrul gyi zhags pa gzung te bskor nas 'jug par bgyi'o/ /de nas rigs sngags 'chang gis klu'i skyon de mi mthong zhing nub par 'gyur ro/ /'khrul 'khor dang / sgo glegs dang / gtan

thams cad gtubs shing bcad par 'gyur ro/ /zhugs pa tsam gyi mod la klu'i bu mo gzugs bzang mo mdzes ma rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan cing klubs ma mdzes ma mchis nas/ rin po che'i phreng ba thogs te/ rig sngags 'chang la dbul

bar bgyid do/ /rig sngags 'chang gis blangs nas spyi bo la gzhag te/ gzhag pa tsam gyi mod la klu'i bu mo nam mkha' la 'phur nas nu ma gnyis nas 'o ma zags pa dang / rig sngags 'chang gis bzed nas btung bar bgyi ste/ tshe nyi khri

thub par 'gyur ro/ /skra cung zad 'khyil bar yang 'gyur ro/ /klu'i rgyal po zhes bgyi ba thams cad kyi bdag po 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro/ /mthu dang brtson 'grus chen pos pha rol gnon par 'gyur ro/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang gis

sbrul gyi zhags pa gzhag la/ don yod rgyal po'i snying po shing ka ra bi ra'i lcug ma la bzlas nas byab par bgyi ste/ gang dang gang gi ming nas drangs shing yid la bsams pas mod la thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /char mi 'bab pa'i dus

su sbrul gyi zhags pa gnas mthon por bskor bar bgyi ste/ lan cig bskor ba tsam gyis char gyi rgyun chen po 'bab par 'gyur ro/ /ha cang char ches pa'i dus su sbrul gyi zhags pa gnas mthon por gzhag na char ha chung che ba las 'chad

par 'gyur ro/ /grang ba 'am/ /rlung ngam ser ba 'bab pa'i dus su nang par sngar klu'i zhags pa phyogs bzhir bskor na/ dpag tshad brgya khor ra khor yug tu ser ba 'bab par mi 'gyur ro/ /grang ba'i rlung dang ser ba thams cad bcings par

'gyur ro/ /lo khyud 'khor tshang bar mtshams chen po bcings par 'gyur ro/ /nyin gcig bzhin don yod rgyal po'i snying po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis nas zhags pa lag pa g.yas pas brdogs la/ lag

pa g.yon pas bskrad pa bgyis na/ nyin gcig bzhin lha'i zhal zas dang / btung ba 'dod dgu thams cad klu'i gnas nas byung nas skye bo stong stong tsam la stsol bar 'gyur ro/ /de'i dug thams cad mthong ba tsam gyis dug ma lags

par 'gyur ro/ /sbrul gyi zhags pa lag pa g.yas pas gzung la/ lag pa g.yon pas klu gzung nas/ dpyid dam/ ston kha 'am/ sprin chags pa'i dus su zhags pa bskor la khro bo'i rgyal po bzlas brjod bgyis te/ nam mkha' la

'phangs na me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / lo tog bzang po gang ci yang rung ba bzang po shin du smin pa/ kha zas shin du bzang po thams cad nam mkha'i ngos las sa la 'bab par 'gyur ro/ /gal te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bskor nas khro bo'i rgyal po lan nyi shu

rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis na/ klu'i gzhal med khang dang / gos dang lhab lhub dang / rgyan 'phyang dang / rgyan thams cad sa la 'bab par 'gyur ro/ /gal te rig sngags 'chang gis lan nyi shu rtsa gcig las lhag par bskor cing khro bo'i rgyal po bzlas brjod bgyis na de'i

tshe klu 'khor dang bcas pa gzhal med khang dang bcas par sa'i steng du ltung bar 'gyur ro/ /gal te rig sngags 'chang gis rgyal po btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa dbang du bgyi bar 'tshal na/ zhags pa gzhag la yungs kar la don yod rgyal po lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod

bgyis nas bsnun la/ de nas sbrul gyi zhags pa blangs te/ rgyal po'i khyim gyi phyogs gang lags pa der lhag par zhags pa bskor na/ rgyal po'i btsun mo 'khor dang bcas pa dbang du gyur nas/ ji srid 'tsho'i bar du

mchis par 'gyur ro/ /g.yul 'gyed pa na khro bo'i rgyal po bzlas brjod bgyis nas zhags pa g.yul gyi dbus su phangs na sbrul gdug pa mig dgrad pa/ lce sgyur ba mig me mdag ltar dmar ba 'byung bar 'gyur te/ mthong ba tsam gyi mod la

dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa phyogs bcur 'byer bar 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang ci lta ci ltar yid la bsams pa'i don de lta de lta bur thams cad sgrub par byed par 'gyur ro/ /sbrul gyi zhags pa sgrub pa'i cho ga'o// // de nas 'byung po'i dbang

phyug gi zhags pa sgrub par 'tshal na/ 'bri'i rtsid pa dang / rtsid po chen po lhan cig tu bkal ba dang / lcags las mdung rtse gsum pa sor bzhi'i tshad tsam du bgyis la/ de nas don yod rgyal po'i snying po lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis

nas khro bo'i rgyal po lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ nyin zhag gcig mchis la legs par khrus bgyis te/ gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgo bar bgyi'o/ /zla ba mar gyi ngo'i tshes bcu bzhi'i nyin zhag gcig gis bsgrub par bgyi'o/ /de nas

mdung rtse gsum pa'i zhags pa blangs nas 'byung po'i dbang phyug gi gzugs 'dra bar 'gyur ro/ /'byung po thams cad kyi bdag po lo brgya stong du 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ /'byung po'i gnas kyi gzhal med khang thams cad kyi bdag

por 'gyur ro/ /zhags pa lag par thogs nas/ dur khrod du zhugs na/ dur khrod na gnas pa thams cad mdun du mchis te/ gnas kyi sgo thams cad 'bye bar 'gyur zhing khyod ci dgar zhugs shig ces ci 'tshal ba de bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /

ro'i mgul du btags nas khro bo'i rgyal po bzlas na de nas ro langs nas ci dris pa de smra bar 'gyur zhing / c-i bsgo ba de bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /bkrol na 'chi bar 'gyur ro/ /gnod sbyin gyi mgul du btags nas khro bo'i rgyal po bzlas la khros pas drangs nas/

gnod sbyin de yang mdun du mchis nas/ rig sngags 'chang la rje btsun bka' stsol cig dang / thams cad bgyi'o zhes smra bar 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags 'chang gis khyod ji srid 'tsho'i bar du khro bo'i mngag gzhug pa'i las gyis shig ces smra bar

bgyi ste/ bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes de nas nyin gcig bzhin bsgo ba bgyis na/ las thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /gnod sbyin mo'i mgul du btags te/ khro bo'i rgyal po bzlas na/ gnod sbyin mo mchis nas/ rig sngags 'chang gi

mdun du mchis te/ rig sngags 'chang la mig mi 'dzums par blta zhing / rig sngags 'chang ci zhig don du gnyer zhes smra bar 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags 'chang gis kho bo la ma dang / chung ma dang sring mos bsgrub par bya ba'i dgos pa gsum byos

shig ces bsgo bar bgyi'o/ /gal te ma zhig du bgyid na bu gcig pa bzhin du bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / mal dang / gos dang / nor dang / 'brus yongs su skyong bar bgyid do/ /chung ma zhig tu bgyid na/ 'kho ba'i yo byad thams cad kyi dbang phyug dang

bdag por bgyid cing / de dang lhag par dga' bar rtse bas phyi bzhin 'brang bar 'gyur ro/ /gal te sring mo zhig du bgyid na/ yid la brnag pa'i 'dod pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyid do/ /dgos pa thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /

thams cad du rgyug cing slar yang ldog par 'gyur ro/ /nyin gcig bzhin lhab lhub dang / gos dang / rgyan thams cad stsol bar bgyid do/ /nyin gcig bzhin gzhan yang lha'i bu mo dag rtsed mo'i don du dgug par bgyid do/ /rnam thos kyi

mgul du btags te khros pas drangs nas khro bo'i rgyal po'i bzlas brjod bgyis na/ de nas rnam thos mchis nas/ nyin gcig bzhin dong tshe stong stsol bar 'gyur/ gser stong stsol bar 'gyur te/ des nyin gcig bzhin sbyin pa yang stsol/ bsod

nams kyang bgyi'o/ /nag po chen po'i mgul du btags la khro bo'i rgyal po lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis te/ khros pas lag pa g.yas pa'i thal lcag gis brdeg par bgyi'o/ /nag po chen pos sgra phyung ba dang / rig sngags 'chang skrag par mi bgyi bar slar yang

khros pas brdeg par bgyi'o/ /de nas mchi ma zag pa dang / rig sngags 'chang gis mchi ma bzed de/ thig le bgyis na mi gda' bar gyur nas gter thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang gis slar yang thal mos

brdeg par bgyis te/ de nas nag po chen po khrag du skyugs pa/ rig sngags 'chang gis byugs na nam mkha' la mchis nas/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen por 'gyur ro/ /gu gul gyi bdug pas bdugs nas khro bo'i rgyal po bzlas na/ nag po

chen po rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na mchis nas ci 'tshal ba'i mchog thams cad stsol bar bgyid cing / ma mo'i tshogs dang bcas pa thams cad dbang du mchi bar 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang ci 'tshal ba bgyid pa dgos pa thams cad bgyid

par 'gyur ro/ /mdung rtse gsum pa bsgrub pa'i cho ga'o// // de nas gzhan yang zhags pa dang rjes su mthun pa'i ri mo'i cho ga de kho na nyid sgrub pa'i cho ga bla na med pa brjod par bgyi ste/ 'jig rten mgon pos sna tshogs

pa'i/ /rnam pa'i kha dog gzugs bstan pa/ /sgyu ma lta bu'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /cho 'phrul sna tshogs gzugs bstan te/ /lag pa stong dang mig stong dang / /mtha' yas pa yi phyag rgya bstan/ /rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i
gzugs/ /khams gsum dag tu bstan pa ni/ /gdul bya gdul phyir gzugs bstan to/ /gsang ba 'di yi gzugs bstan pa/ /sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /rig sngags sgrub pa bla na med/ /de nyid

zhags pa bsgrubs phyir ro/ /de bas rig 'dzin shes rab can/ /'jig rten pha rol rjes mthun pa/ /sangs rgyas nyid don gnyer ba dang / /de bzhin gshegs kun lta ba dang / /bde can blta bar 'tshal ba dang / /

de nyid 'jig rten 'das pa yi/ /'j-ig dbang mgon po mthong 'tshal ba/ /mchog du gus par bgyi ba yi/ /cho ga'i rgyal po 'di brjod kyis/ /de nyid gus par dang ba dang / /shin tu dang ba nyid du bgyi/ /grol ba sna tshogs

'tshal ba la/ /sna tshogs pa yi gzugs bstan te/ /sna tshogs thabs kyis grol bar 'gyur/ /don yod rgyal po cho ga'i mchog /don yod grub pa'i 'jig rten 'das/ /don yod 'bras bu dam pa po/ /don yod kun du grub

pa 'thob/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis byin gyis brlabs/ /don yod 'jig rten 'jig rten mgon/ /'jig rten dbang phyug mchog sbyin pa/ /don yod 'jig rten ci 'tshal ba/ /mchog 'tshal ba ni grub par 'gyur/ /don yod

rgya chen rdzu 'phrul gyi/ /cho 'phrul rnam 'phrul rgyun mi 'chad/ /de lta bas na kun bsgrims te/ /bdag nyid yongs su dag bgyis nas/ /ci ltar cho ga bkod pa bzhin/ /rjes su mthun par ri mo'i gzugs/ /rtag tu ri mo'i

gzugs blta zhing / /zhags pa gzugs ni sna tshogs dang / /de bzhin khro bo'i rgyal po dang / /rig sngags rgyal po de bzhin du/ /dkyil 'khor lha dang me lha dang / /sbyin sreg rlung lha chu lha dang / /khro bo'i gzugs dang zhi

ba dang / /lha dang klu dang ston pa dang / /gnod sbyin srin po'i gzugs dang ni/ /'byung po lha min dri za dang / /nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci/ /lto 'phye chen po'i gzugs kun du/ /'jig rten mgon po mchog sbyin bstan/ /

gshin rje dang ni lus ngan dang / /tshangs pa khyab 'jug dbang phyug che/ /gzhon nu dbang phyug lha dang ni/ /dbang phyug chen po nyi ma dang / /zla gzugs rgyu skar tshes grangs lha/ /'di dag rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i/ /gzugs su
'jig rten mgon pos bstan/ /sems can rnams la phan 'tshal bas/ /gdul ba'i don du grol ba'i lam/ /sems can rnams la bstan pas na/ /de bas som nyi nyid mi bgyi/ /mchog tu dang bar bgyi ba lags/ /ci

ltar mthun pa'i dgos pa rnams/ /ci ltar mthun pa bzhin du 'grub/ /ci ltar mthun pa ri mo'i gzugs/ /ci ltar mthun pa'i zhags pa bsgrub/ /gnas 'di gang du 'os pa dang / /gang du sems ni dga' bar 'gyur/ /

goms pa gang gi phyag rgya dang / /gang gi dkyil 'khor char dbye ba/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang mgon/ /kun du sgrol ba 'dren pa'i gtso/ /don yod 'bras bu stsol ba'o/ /don yod grub pa'i grub pa thob/ /don yod dgos pa

thams cad dang / /grub pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo ni/ /mchog nyid la yang reg par 'gyur/ /zhags pa dang ri mo bsgrub pa'i cho ga'o// // de nas don yod pa'i las dang dgos pa bsgrub pa thams cad kyi sbyin sreg gi cho ga bshad par
bya ste/ sdig pa thams cad mod la 'phrog pa/ sgrib pa thams cad 'jigs par bgyid pa/ dgra thams cad 'joms pa/ bgegs thams cad rnam par 'joms pa/ gdug pa thams cad bzlog pa'i mchog sdig pa thams
cad 'jig par bgyid pa/ dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal bcu drug las grol bar bgyid pa/ 'jigs pa mi bzad pa brgyad rtag tu 'phrog pa/ mi bzad pa rnams 'joms pa/ pha rol gyi dpung ldog pa'i mchog /nad
thams cad 'joms pa/ mod la 'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa zhi bar bgyid pa/ mu ge'i dgon pa 'jig par bgyid pa/ yams kyi nad dang gnod pa 'joms pa/ lha'i bde ba 'dren par

bgyid pa'i mchog de kho na nyid kyi sangs rgyas sgrub pa/ sangs rgyas kyi byang chub bla na med pa'i mchog thams cad sgrub par bgyid pa/ sems can thams cad kyi thun mong mchog sbyin shin tu rnyed par dka' ba lha rnams
rtag tu mgu bar 'gyur ba/ klu rnams dga' ba 'thob par 'gyur ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams rtag tu nyin mtshan du gzigs par som nyi ma mchis pa/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams dga' bar 'gyur

ba/ dus kun du shin tu mnyam par gzhag pas/ 'jig rten dbang phyug mchog sbyin rtag tu mchis par som nyi ma mchis par rgyal po chen po bzhi 'khor dang bcas blon po dang bcas pa bsrung ba'i don du thams cad du

rtag tu rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur lags so/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang shes rab dang ldan pas/ gtsang ma'i gnas su mchis nas sbyin sreg bgyi ste/ gtsang ma yi ni sa phyogs sam/ /ca co ma mchis dben par ni/ /
zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa dang / /drag shul spyod pa rnams bgyi'o/ /zhi ba sems can thams cad kyi/ /don du sdig pa thams cad 'joms/ /rgyas pa rgyas pa thob 'gyur te/ /thams cad phun sum tshogs par
'gyur/ /dgra dang log 'dren gdug pa dang / /gnod sbyin srin po gsang ba pa/ /gdug sems can rnams bred pa dang / /skrags par sdigs pa drag shul spyod/ /gsang sngags sgrub pa'i sbyin sreg ste/ /

gsang sngags sgrub pa bla na med/ /'jig rten 'jig rten pha rol gyi/ /sbyin sreg gi ni las bgyi'o/ /me lha'i lha dang klu dag dang / /de bzhin rig pa 'dzin pa 'ang dgug /khung bskos de la pad ma'i tshul/ /pad ma rtag

tu bris bar bgyi/ /cho ga ci bzhin khung nang gi/ pad ma la ni ge sar bgyi/ /gru bzhi 'am ni zlum po ste/ /de lta bu ni brko bar bgyi/ /legs par byugs shing shin tu gnag /shin tu sbas shing tshad la dbab/ /tshes grangs

rgyu skar nyid dag dang / /shin tu bkra shis dag la bgyi/ /bkra shis phyag rgya chen po ste/ /bzang pos gtor ma'i las bgyi'o/ /bdug pa me tog la sogs pa/ /bzang po dag ni 'khor bar dgod/ /thog mar me lha bkug nas ni/ /de nas

sbyin sreg las rnams bgyi/ /rig sngags 'chang ba gtsang gyur pa/ /legs bkrus gtsang ma'i gos bgos nas/ /gsang sngags bzlas pa'i cho ga bgyi/ /de la mtshams kyang bcing bar bgyi/ /bdag bsrung gtsug tor bcing ba dang / /gzhan bsrung

dkyil 'khor bcing ba dang / /de bzhin grogs bgyid bsrung ba dang / /rgyun tu arka'i shing sbar te/ /dri yi shing rnams nyid dag dang / /mar dang yungs dkar 'bras yos dag /nyi shu gcig dbul me ston bgyi/ /de nas me'i lha dgug go/ oM na dz+wa la ma hA dz+wa la/

dz+wa la dz+yod snA pra b+ha maN Da la sarba bid A hu ti rag ni rad tuSh+Na dz+wa la/ d+hu ma shwa sa/ artsi ShA mu kha triSh+Na/ ra sh+mi da ba ag nish+tsa bid tu tash+tsa hu ta sha na mu khan te/ sarba de bA nA/ sarba yak+Sha ma hA bIr+ya ma hA dza ba/ ma hA bA la/ nir ma ri shan/

sarba da hA na pra pu la la A kA sha sa mug gang kas sh+tsa a ba pra sad kA shan/ man Da la pu dzi to/ ma Ni Da sarba tra di ba bya ru pa/ bi shA ra da/ A bA ha na sarba da tra gAn/ de ba hu ta/ sha na hu tra/ sha na ta ma si bi d+ha ma kan/ an d+ha kA rA na/ mu ga

ta ra sh+mi ma pri yang gu g+han d+ha pha lA ha ra/ sa ra sa ra/ a gra dza/ sug sh+ma su tIk+Sh+Nash+tsa mr-i ti san tsi bi na/ pri yo ba sh+mi pu b+ha sma b+ha sta tsa b+ha sma bas+t+ra ni/ se ba ka~M/ b+ha sma san tsa d+ha nid t+yan d+hu ma mA ku la/ dzA ya se bA ka sid d+ha ra sa gra tsa ra sarbad

tra pra d+ha pa ri shA/ sarbad tra ni ra ma ri sha No/ nir t+ya sprish+Ta d+hash+Ta na mun tsa si/ dwa tring sha /b+ha ga no dA+e ba ag ni mu kha de bA ta/ e ru tsi ru dzA ba la ba da ka ma hA na ta/ a tha par No de ba de ba na/ bi shA ra da/ a yAn tu sA da shi g+h+ra kar ma

sA da ya tad twata/ oM dz+wa la dz+wa la/ tiSh+tha sa ma yan/ hu ru hu ru hU~M phaT swA hA/ gsang sngags 'dis ni lan bdun du/ /bzlas ni me ni dgug par bgyi/ /gu gul yungs kar mar sbyar la/ /spar bdun spar bas me la dbul/ /

mchod yon snod/ rnams dbul ba yang / /de bzhin spar ba'i spar bas so/ /dri rnams dang ni byug pa dang / /bdug pa rgya cher dbul bar bgyi/ /de bzhin 'bras bu spar bar 'bul/ /de nas chab kyis bsang ba bgyi/ /ci

ltar lha rnams rim bzhin du/ /nye reg dag kyang dbul bar bgyi/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang gis su/ /sbyin sreg las ni yang dag brtsam/ /dri zhim shin tu dag pa dang / /blag sha u dum 'ba' ra dang / /sna ma'i me tog

tsam pa dang / /kar ni ka ra nyid dag dang / /pad ma ud pal thang shing dang / /de bzhin dri bda'i tsan dan dang / /byang chub ljon shing shing dag dang / /de bzhin gzhan yang dri bda'i shing / /'on te 'bras bu'i shing mang dang / /sha mi shi ba'-i las

lags pas/ /mchod yon de bzhin rtswa dag ste/ /de dag gis ni me sbar nas/ /sbyin sreg gi ni las rnams bgyi'o/ /'bras yos tsan dan phye ma dang / /a ka ru dang du ru ka /kun tu ru la sogs pa dang / /du ru kar bcas spri ka

dang / /spang spos pri yang gu blangs te/ /de dag lhan cig sbyar bsres shing / /mar ram mar sar lhan cig rdzi/ /don yod rgyal po'i gsang sngags ni/ /brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas me la dbul/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi

mdun du lan stong rtsa brgyad kyi sbyin sreg bgyi'o/ /lan stong rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang / nam phyed na me lha rang gi gzugs 'bar bar shin tu gnas pa lags nas phyogs bcur blta zhing kun du brtags nas/ rig sngags 'chang la

legs so zhes bgyi ba stsol bar 'gyur te/ rigs sngags 'chang legs so legs so/ /bdag tshim par byas pas rig sngags 'chang khyod kyis sbyin sreg gi cho ga grub kyis mchog slongs shig dang / thams cad sbyin no/ /de

nas rig sngags 'chang gis ci lta bu'i 'dod pa'i mchog rnams blang bar bgyi ste/ ci ltar blangs pa bzhin thams cad stsol bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang gis mchod yon gyi snod dag 'bul zhing gtor ma dbul ba'i

las bgyi'o/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang gis mar dang bsreg pa'i gong bu chen po dag gis sbyin sreg bgyi zhing / 'bras bu'i shing spar nas/ don yod zhags pa'i snying po lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi'o/ /stong

rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang / thab kyi dbus nas skyes pa zhig lus phyed tsam phyung nas/ dngul gyi gzhong pa kha zas kyis bkang ste/ pus mo nub tsam du 'bul bar 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags 'chang gis blangs bar bgyi ste/ blangs

pa tsam gyis nam mkha' la 'phur bar 'gyur zhing / rig sngags 'chang gi lus la me 'bar ba'i 'od zer 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de 'tshal na tshe lo khrir 'gyur ro/ /nam mkha'i rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur ro/ /bskal pa bcu tshun

chod kyi sngon gyi skye ba dran par 'gyur ro/ /don yod rgyal po'i cho ga zhib mo rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor kha ton du gnas par 'gyur ro/ /gal te snod mi len na de'i tshe yang lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sbyin sreg bgyis na/ cher
g.yo bar 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs kyi mdun du mchis na/ rig sngags 'chang la dbugs 'byin par bgyis te/ rig sngags 'chang legs so legs so/ /rig sngags 'chang

khyod kyis sbyin sreg gi cho ga de bsgrubs zin gyis/ mchog slongs shig dang sbyin no zhes de'i tshe rig sngags 'chang gis ci bsams pa'i mchog smras pa/ de'i tshe thams cad stsol bar bgyi'o/ /'phags pa spyan ras

gzigs dbang phyug gis skyes pa de la snod blangs te/ rang gi lag nas rig sngags 'chang la stsol bar bgyid do/ /rig sngags 'chang gis blangs nas zas kyi gong bu de bza' bar bgyi'o/ /'tshal ba tsam gyi mod la

nam mkha' la rdzu 'phrul gyis mchi bar 'gyur ro/ /lu las me'i snying po 'bar ba'i kha dog sna tshogs 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /don yod pa'i rgyal po'i rig sngags 'dzin 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur ro// //'phags pa don yod

zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po/ bam po drug pa/ gang gA'i klung bye ba khri khrig brgya stong dgu bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bye ma snyed dang mnyam pa'i rig sngags 'chang ba'i 'khor los bsgyur ba rnams kyi rig sngags

'chang gis yongs su bskor bar 'gyur ro/ /gang gA'i klung bye ba khri phrag brgya stong dgu bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bye ma dang mnyam pa'i gnas kyi gzhal med khang don yod rab tu gnas pa'i gnas rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /rin

po che sna bdun gyi gzhal med khang ri dang / tshal dang nags tshal dang / bcas pa me tog dang 'bras bu'i shing rnams pa sna tshogs yal ga dang / sbal mig dang / lo ma dang / rtsa ba dang / myu gur bcas pa kha cig ni gser gyi me tog

kha cig ni dngul gyi me tog /kha cig ni rin po che sna bdun las byung ba'i me tog dag go/ gzhan yang lha'i me tog rnam pa sna tshogs pa dag dang / ta ma la dang tsam pa ka dang lcug ma'i me tog dang / ta la dang g+han d+ha par shi ka dang sna

ma dang yu thi ka dang ta ra na dang kub spya ka'i me tog dag dang tshal dang nags tshal dang / skyed mos tshal dga' bar 'gyur ba'i gnas kyi gzhal med khang gis mdzes par bgyis pa'i gzhal med khang thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur zhing

dga' ba dang yid mgu ba dang / y-id du mchi bar 'gyur ro/ /lha'i chu klung dang / 'bab chu dang / rdzing lha'i tsan dan gyi dri'i chab kyis yongs su gang ba de la rin po che sna bdun las byung ba'i gzhal med khang dang / lha'i pad ma dang /

ud pa la dang ku mu ta dang pad ma dkar pos legs par brgyan pa'i chab gser gyi bye ma legs par brdal ba'i gzhal med khang dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /lha'i bu mo dang mi 'am ci'i tshogs dang / dri za'i tshogs kyis dga'

bar bgyis pa/ lha dang lha ma yin dang dri za dang / klu dang rig 'dzin dang / mi 'am ci'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing / lha'i 'byor pa gzhal med khang legs par bstabs pa'i gnas na thams cad du rtse bar bgyi/ dga' bar

bgyid/ dga' mgur spyod par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub kyi snying po la thug pa nas byang chub la mchis kyi bar dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba na yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar du tshe'i tshad gcig tsam du skyong bar bgyid

do/ /de bzhin du grub pa bla na med pa chen po/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug nyid byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du rtag tu rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur te/ de ltar zas kyi gong bu sgrub pa'i cho ga shin tu rnyed

par dka' lags so/ /phyogs bcu mtha' dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang lhan cig 'grogs nas mchi bar 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad las mngon sum du chos nyan pa thos par 'gyur ro/ /

de'i 'od zer 'bar ba'i snying pos stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams snang bar 'gyur ro/ /don yod pa'i zhags pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis

phyag bgyis pa rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi gsang sngags dang phyag rgya rim par phye ba'i cho ga zhib mo mtha' dag rdzogs par bsgrub pa'i cho ga thams cad dang / cho ga zhib mo rgya chen po mtha' dag gi dkyil 'khor 'di kho na nyid du

gnas par 'gyur lags so/ /klu'i rgyal po bye ba phrag brgya stong rnams de'i dbang du gyur nas rtag par rgyun tu mchi bar 'gyur ro/ /lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye

chen po thams cad dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro/ /'og min gyi gnas kyi lha rnams rig sngags 'chang de'i phyi bzhin rtag tu 'brang zhing rtag par rgyun du yongs su bskor bar 'gyur ro/ /lha'i ro bro ba'i mchog dang / ldan

pa'i gzhal med khang rnam pa sna tshogs dag lhun gyis grub par 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du gos dang / lhab lhub dang rgyan sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i gzhal med khang dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de la sogs pa sbyin sreg gi cho ga don yod

pa sgrub pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i grub pa 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /'on te skal ba chung ba sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i sa bon ma mchis pa zhig mchis la des snod de blangs pa tsam gyi mod la rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug

thob par 'gyur te/ lha dang mi'i dpal nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro/ /reg pa tsam gyi mod la tshe lha'i lo brgya khri bzhi stong thub par 'gyur ro/ /de la phyis kyang nad 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad kyis nyon mongs

par mi 'gyur ro/ /phas kyi rgol ba dang mi mdza' ba dang / gdug pa dang rab tu gdug pa thams cad nub par 'gyur ro/ /sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / yi dgas kyi yul thams cad las

yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro/ /sems can thams cad kyi mchod gnas gcig pur 'gyur ro/ /bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang / sems can thams cad blta 'tshal bar 'gyur ro/ /thams cad du rgyas par 'gyur ro/ /tshig

btsan zhing don yod pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /mgum pa'i dus su de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gzigs pa bzhed par 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /dran pa shin du

nye bar gzhag nas dus bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /dus bgyis nas skal ba mnyam par 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur te/ pad ma la rdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhing skye ba dran par 'gyur ro/ /lan 'ga' yang phyir

ngan song du mchi bar mi 'gyur te/ phyir yang ma'i mngal du skye bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad blta ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad blta ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi

zhing du rtag tu mchi bar 'gyur ro/ /dpral bar thig le bgyis na/ thams cad du mi gda' bar 'gyur ro/ /me lha rtag par rgyun du dran par bgyis pa tsam gyis/ rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na mchis nas mchog thams
cad stsol bar bgyid do/ /dgos pa thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /de nas don yod dgongs pa bsgrub par 'tshal na/ rig sngags 'chang des 'bras dang kul ma shar bsres te bsgril la bsgongs nas/ mar dang bu

ram dang / sha kha ra dang / sbrang rtsi lhan du brdzis nas/ bil ba'i tshad tsam du bgyis te/ de'i 'og tu shing ka ra bi ra'i me sbar nas/ bsgongs pa re re la lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis nas/ me'i nang du sbyin sreg bgyis te/

nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum du/ brgya rtsa brgyad tsam sbyin sreg bgyi'o/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang yungs kar dang / me tog ci rnyed pa dang bsres te/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis nas me'i dbus su stsal bar bgyi'o/ /

'bras yos dang / yungs kar la khro bo'i rgyal po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas gtor bar bgyi'o/ /de nas me'i dbus nas me lha lus phyed tsam phyung nas/ rin po che sna bdun las bgyis pa'i snod zas bsgongs pas bkang nas/

rig sngags 'chang la rig sngags 'chang khyod kyis zas bsgongs pa bsgrub pa'i cho ga grub zin gyis/ lha'i zas bsgongs pa chen po long shig ces stobs par bgyid do/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang gis zas bsgongs pa'i snod de blang bar

bgyi'o/ /blangs pa tsam kho nas bcud kyis len du gyur nas/ nam mkha' la 'phur bar 'gyur ro/ /skra cung zad 'khyil bar yang 'gyur ro/ /lpags pa yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags 'chang 'khor los bsgyur bar

'gyur ro/ /rig sngags 'chang gis 'khor los bsgyur ba drug khri brgyad stong gis yongs su bskor bar 'gyur ro/ /me lha gnas dang gzhal med khang dang bcas/ 'khor dang bcas pas dbang du mchis nas/ las thams cad bgyid

par 'gyur ro/ /gang dang gang gis bsgongs pa la reg pa de yang thos pa bsags pa'i rgya mtsho chen por 'gyur ro/ /don yod zhags pa'i snying po byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag bgyis pa rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor phyag rgya dang /

gsang sngags rim par dbye ba dang bcas pa cho ga zhib mo mtha' dag rdzogs par kha ton du gnas pa 'di/ nyin gcig bzhin sh+lo ka stong klog gam 'chang bar bgyid na/ tshe brjes nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro/ /pad ma la brdzus

te skyes nas skye ba dran par 'gyur ro/ /lan 'ga' yang phyis dran pa brjed par mi 'gyur ro/ /tshig btsan par 'gyur te/ sems can thams cad kyi snying du sdug par 'gyur ro/ /mchod pa chen po'i 'os su yang 'gyur ro/ /dpral ba la thig le bgyis na mi

gda' bar gyur nas/ 'byung po dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po thams cad dbang du gyur nas/ gnas kyi sgo thams cad 'byed par 'gyur ro/ /bud med gang zhig bu'i ched du zas bsgongs pa de 'tshal na/ bu gzugs bzang ba mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa kha dog

bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa rnyed nas/ yun ring du 'tsho zhing yid gzhungs pa dang / mkhas pa dang / bstan bcos thams cad la bag tsha ba ma mchis par 'gyur ro/ /de nas skye bo 'bum zas btsal bar sems na/ 'o ma'i thug pa bsgrub par

bgyi ste/ gnas gtsang ma bcom skyungs par shing ka ra bi ra'i lcug mas dkrug cing don yod zhags pa'i snying po gsang sngags bzlas brjod bgyis te/ de nas khro bo'i rgyal po chab dang yungs kar la bzlas brjod bgyis nas gtor bar bya'o/ /

de nas zas bsgongs pa gcig snod kyi nang nas phyung nas/ 'o thug gi nang du stsol lo/ /de nas char bgos te thog mar dkon mchog gsum la bsod snyoms dbul bar bgyi'o/ /de'i 'og tu byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras

gzigs dbang phyug la dbul bar bgyi'o/ /de'i 'og tu 'phags pa 'jam dpal la dbul bar bgyi'o/ /de'i 'og tu dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs dang / skyes pa dang / bud med dang /

khye'u dang / bu mo rnams dang / bkren pa dang / sdug 'phongs pa dang / lam gyis dub pa dang / slongs mo pa rnams la rab tu stsal bar bgyi'o/ /ci tsam du skye bo 'bum ci 'tshal bar kha zas 'tshal du stsal kyang / snod de gang ba'am bri bar

mi mngon zhing de bas par mi 'gyur ro/ /gang dag zas de 'tshal ba de dag sngon gyi sdig pa dang / sgrib pa dang / rtsod pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /nad thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /dgra thams cad dang / phas kyi rgol ba thams

cad dang / mi mdza' ba'i 'jigs pa thams cad kyis tshugs par mi 'gyur ro/ /'byung po dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po'i 'jigs pa thams cad kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro/ /lus mnyen cing 'jam par 'gyur ro/ /nga ro lha

ltar mnyen cing snyan la dga' bar bgyid pa ma yin pa'i dbyangs su mi 'gyur ro/ /rtag tu dub pa'i sdug bsngal thams cad yongs su spangs par 'gyur ro/ /rtag tu ji srid 'tsho ba'i bar du bde ba yang dag par stobs par 'gyur ro/ /

tshe rjes nas bde 'gro thams cad du 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /'o ma'i thug pas lhung bzed bkang nas/ de gnas mthon po bla gab med par dkyil 'khor bgyis te/ dkyil 'khor gyi steng du gzhag nas/ phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa

thams cad la lhung bzed de dbul bar bgyi'o/ /phul ba tsam gyi mod la chu bo gang gA'i bye ma 'bum phrag brgya stong gi bye ma snyed kyi phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa re re'i spyan sngar

lha'i zhal zas ro brgya dang ldan pa'i lha'i zas bsgongs pa dang / lho'i thugs kyis lhung bzed bkang ba dang / lha'i tsan dan gyi dkyil 'khor lha'i me tog sil ma bkram pa yang 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du gtogs

pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dang nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la lha'i zhal zas ro brgya dang ldan pa'i mchog gis bstabs par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs

pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dang / nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa de dag thams cad kyis rig sngags 'chang yon bdag de'i yon sbyong bar mdzad do/ /gang gi phyir yon sbyangs nas/ skal

ba dang mthun pa'i tshe 'di nyid dang / gzhan du dbang phyug chen po thob par 'gyur ro/ /grub pa chen po'i gser gyis 'byor bar 'gyur ro/ /mdzod dang bang mdzod mang pos rgyas par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis

dgongs par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad blta 'tshal bar 'gyur ro/ /lha thams cad kyis de la bsrung ba dang / skyab pa dang / sba ba bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /de nas rgyal po btsun mo'i 'khor dang dpung gi tshogs yan

lag bzhi dang bcas pa dbang du bgyi bar 'tshal na/ rig sngags 'chang des legs par khrus bgyis te/ gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos nas 'o thug mar dang bsres pa 'dis lan brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg bgyi'o/ /sgron shing dang

arka'i shing gi yam bsregs shing gis me sbar bar bgyi'o/ /sbyin sreg lan stong rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang / rgyal po btsun mo'i 'khor dang dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang bcas pa bdag nyid dam/ nor dbang du gyur nas mchis par

'gyur ro/ /nub gsum du bgyis na/ klu'i rgyal po thams cad gnas dang 'khor du bcas pa dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro/ /nub lngar bgyis na 'byung po dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding

dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi ma lags pa thams cad dang / mi thams cad 'khor dang bcas par dbang du gyur nas/ mchis par 'gyur ro/ /nub bdun du bgyis na rig sngags 'dzin thams cad dbang du gyur nas mchis par

'gyur ro/ /nub thams cad du bgyis na/ brgya byin la sogs pa sum bcu rtsa gsum ris kyi lha rnams dang / lha'i bu mo'i tshogs thams cad dang / gtsang ma'i lha'i bu mo thams cad babs nas dbang du 'gyur te/ ji srid 'tsho ba'i bar du bsnyen

bkur bgyid cing mchis par 'gyur ro/ /zla ba nya nas brtsams te mar gyi ngo'i tshes nyi shu gsum mam gnam stong gi bar du dus gsum du lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sbyin sreg bgyis la/ arka'i shing gi yam sreg shing gis me sbar nas gnam stong

gis rdzogs pa dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rang gi gzugs kyis mdun du mchis nas/ rig sngags 'chang legs so zhes bgyi ba stsol bar 'gyur te/ rig sngags 'chang legs so legs so/ /nga mnyes par byas

kyis/ rig sngags 'chang smros shig dang / mchog sbyin te gang gnyer ba de thams cad sbyin no/ /gter smra ba 'am/ nor sgyur bar smra ba 'am/ zhing smra ba 'am/ nam mkha' la 'gro ba 'am/ mi snang bar bya ba 'am/ gsang sngags smra ba 'am/ cho ga

zhib mo 'grub pa de dag thams cad sbyin no/ /rgyal po nyid dam/ blon po nyid dam/ yul bdag nyid dam/ phyug pa nyid dam/ grong brdal 'thob pa 'am/ gos 'thob pa 'am/ ba lang dang / rta dang / ma he dang / rnga mo dang / lug 'thob pa 'am/ nor 'thob pa 'am/

'bru 'thob pa de dag thams cad sbyin no/ /nam mkha' la 'gro ba 'am/ mi snang bar bya ba 'am/ rdzu 'phrul 'thob pa 'am/ ting nge 'dzin 'thob pa 'am gzungs 'thob pa 'am/ phyag rgya dang dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhib mo bsgrub pa dang ro langs

bslangs pa 'am/ rig 'dzin sgrub pa nyid dam ral gri'i rig 'dzin nyid dam/ nam mkha'i rig 'dzin nyid dam/ phug tu 'jug pa 'am/ dur khrod du 'jug pa 'am/ nags su 'jug pa'am ri la rgyu ba de dag thams cad sbyin no/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang

gis ji ltar yid la bsams shing smras pa de dag thams cad stsol bar bgyid do/ /rig sngags 'chang la bstan pa tsam gyi mod la dri med don yod lta ba zhes bgyi ba lus yongs su dag pa 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /tshe brjes nas 'jig rten gyi

khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur te/ pad ma ze ba'i dbus nas rdzus te pad ma las skyes nas skye ba'i skye ba dran par 'gyur ro/ /don yod zhags pa'i snying po byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag bgyis pa rnam par grol ba'i dkyil

'khor phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor rim par dbye ba dang bcas pa/ cho ga zhib mo mtha' dag dang bcas pa 'di rdzogs te/ byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du kha ton du gnas par bgyi'o/ /de nas la du'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga bsgrub par 'tshal na/ rig

sngags 'chang des kha zas la la du stong rtsa brgyad bgyis la/ de nas rig sngags 'chang gis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi'o/ /de nas legs par khrus bgyis te/ gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgo

bar bgyi'o/ /de nas la du mar dang bsres te sbyin sreg bgyi'o/ /shin du dri zh-im po'i shing gi yam bsreg shing g-i me sbar bar bgyi'o/ /stong rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang me'-i dbus nas khye'u zhig byung nas snod lha'i la dus bkang nas dbul

bar bgyid do/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang gis yungs kar la lan bdun bzlas te/ khye'u de'i la du gtor ro/ /khye'u des rig sngags 'chang la smras pa/ rig sngags 'chang khyod ci zhig don du gnyer/ rig sngags 'chang gis 'dod pa

thams cad byin cig ces brjod par bgyi'o/ /des smras pa/ rig sngags 'chang snod kyi la du khyer cig dang / 'dis khyod kyi dgos pa dpag tu med pa 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /'di ni khyod kyi bcud kyi mchog yin no/ /rig sngags 'chang long shig /

'di ni khyod kyi grub pa'i mchog yin no/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang gis snod gang ba de blangs te khye'u la yang khyed kyis kho bo'i grogs gyis shig ces brjod par bgyi'o/ /khye'u yis smras pa/ dgos pa thams cad sgrub pa'i grogs bgyi'o/ /

rig sngags 'chang gang gi tshe/ dgos pa byung ba de'i tshe/ gu gul dang / tsan dan lhan cig bsres la mar dang yungs kar sbyar nas/ don yod lcags kyus lan bdun bzlas te bzlas brjod bgyi'o/ /arka'i shing gi me sbar ro/ /sbyin sreg bgyis

pa tsam gyi mod la/ bdag bkug pas mod la mchis nas dgos pa thams cad bsgrub par bgyi'o/ /las thams cad bgyi'o/ /ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bsnyen bkur bgyis mchis shing bkur stir spyad par bgyi'o/ /bgegs dang log 'dren

dang / 'byung po dang gnod sbyin dang / srin po thams cad zlog par bgyi'o/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang gis la du de la reg par bgyis na/ nam mkha' la 'phur nas/ rig sngags 'chang gi rigs thams cad zil gyis gnon par 'gyur ro/ /

rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los sgyur ba sa ya phrag gnyis dang / bye ba phrag bdun gyis yongs su bskor bar 'gyur ro/ /tshe'i tshad lha'i bskal pa drug khrir 'gyur

ro/ /skra cung zad 'khyil bar yang 'gyur ro/ /la du lhung bzed kyi nang du stsal te/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun du gzhag nas/ don yod rgyal po'i khro bos dbang bskur te/ de nas dge sbyong dang / bram

ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs dang / skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo thams cad la stsal bar bgyi'o/ /longs spyod du stsal kyang bas par mi 'gyur gyi/ slar zhing slar zhing 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /

ji srid du lhung bzed na la du mchis pa de srid du 'phel bar 'gyur te/ ji sr-id du skye bo 'bum 'bum mang zhing phal che bar stsal kyang / gtugs par mi 'gyur ro/ /la du la don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan bdun bzlas

brjod bgyis na/ de'i 'og tu gang du reg pa der yang gser bzang por 'gyur ro/ /la du la lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis te/ klu'i gnas su 'phangs na de'i tshe rgya mtsho chen po mthar gtugs pa'i klu'i rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa

thams cad dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur te/ sgo na char 'bab pa/ bsgo ba bzhin char 'bebs par bgyid do/ /ci bsgo ba bzhin bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /ha cang char ches na bsgo ba bzhin/ ha cang char chen po

'gums par bgyid do/ /rlung dang / grang ba dang / tsha ba dang / ser ba thams cad bsgo ba tsam gyis gcod par bgyid do/ /phug gi sgor la du la lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis nas/ phug gi sgor bsnun na phug gi sgo thams cad
'bye bar 'gyur ro/ /'phrul 'khor dang gtan pa dang / sgo glegs thams cad dum bur bcag par 'gyur ro/ /gnas na gnas pa thams cad phyir byung nas/ rig sngags 'chang gi mdun du mchis te/ bsgo ba bzhin du

bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /nags tshang tshing gi dbus su 'phangs na/ nags tshang tshing gi gnas kyi sgo thams cad phye nas sman gyi rdzas thams cad rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na mchis par 'gyur ro/ /la du la lan bdun bzlas

brjod bgyis te/ dur khrod chen po'i dbus su 'phangs na 'byung po dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang bcas pa'i gnas kyi sgo thams cad 'bye bar 'gyur ro/ /gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po thams cad sgren

mor gyur na/ thams cad dbang du mchis par 'gyur zhing / ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bsgo ba bzhin mchis par 'gyur ro/ /rma ma byung ba'i m-i ro la/ dri chab kyis khrus bgyis la la du la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas

brjod bgyis te/ lag pa gnyis su stsal la/ gos dkar pos ro g.yogs nas/ khro bo'i rgyal po chab dang yungs kar la lan bdun bzlas nas dbang bskur na ci dris pa de dag thams cad smra bar 'gyur te/ bde ba dang lo legs pa dang / lo

nongs pa dang / nad dang / gnod pa dang / 'tshe ba dang / pha rol gyi dpung dang / phas kyi dgra bo dang / mi 'dza' ba'i 'jigs pa dang / mi ngas dang / yams kyi nad de dag thams cad smra bar 'gyur ro/ /lha'i 'jig rten du skye ba 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi

zhing du skye ba smra bar 'gyur zhing / dmyal bar skye ba smra bar 'gyur ro/ /tshe ring ba 'am tshe thung ba smra bar 'gyur ro/ /dus ma lags pa'i 'chi ba smra bar 'gyur ro/ /gter gyi gtam smra bar 'gyur te/ nor bsgyur ba'i gtam mam/ zhing

gi gtam mam mig 'phrul gyi gtam smra bar 'gyur ro/ /cho ga zhib mo 'grub pa dang / gsang sngags 'grub pa dang / phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor 'grub pa smra bar 'gyur ro/ /mig sman 'grub pa smra bar 'gyur ro/ /nam mkha'

la mchi ba dang / mi gda' bar bgyi ba dang / ro langs bslang ba dang / rigs ma dag pa dang / dgra chad pas bcad cing dbang du bgyi ba de dag thams cad smra bar 'gyur ro/ /sgyu thabs smra bar 'gyur ro/ /nyams pa smra bar 'gyur ro/ /'phel

ba smra bar 'gyur ba nas bskal pa las 'das pa'i 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dang / da ltar byung ba'i bar du smra bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang gis chab kyi khar stsal la la du blangs na ro 'gyel bar 'gyur ro/ /la du la

lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis nas/ rgyal po'i sgor bsnun na/ rgyal po'i btsun mo 'khor dang bcas pa bdag nyid dam/ nor dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro/ /grong khyer gyi sgor bsnun na/ grong khyer na gnas

pa'i skyes pa 'am/ bud med dam/ khye'u dang bu mo thams cad dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur zhing / nor chen po 'du ba 'grub pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /mchod pa'i gnas chen por 'gyur ro/ /la du la lan bdun bzlas

brjod bgyis te/ dpal lha mo chen mo'i lag par stsal na/ dpal lha mo chen mo dbang du gyur nas/ nor chen po stsol cing ji srid 'tsho'i bar du mchis par 'gyur ro/ /la du la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis nas/ khug

ma'i nang du stsal te/ mchan khung du bsrel bar bgyis te/ ci tsam bsrel ba de srid du mi gda' bar gyur nas/ gang du stsal ba der 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /gang na shing gcig pa 'am/ 'bab chu gcig par la du la khro bo'i rgyal po lan

brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis te/ dbang bskur nas shing gi drung du brdegs na/ 'dod dgur sgyur ba dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro/ /ci ltar bsams pa'i 'dod pa thams cad nye bar mchis nas yongs su spyod pa dang /

ji srid 'tsho'i bar du mchis par 'gyur ro/ /la du la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis te/ ma mo'i gnas su nag po chen po'i spyi bo'i gtsug tu gzhag la/ khro bo'i rgyal po lan bdun bzlas te/ chab dang yungs kar gyis

dbang bskur ba bgyis na/ de nas sbyor ba mo thams cad dang / mkha' 'gro ma thams cad dbang du gyur nas mngag gzhug pa las thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /la du la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te/ nag po chen po'i
lte ba'i phyogs su gzhag na ma mo'i tshogs thams cad rang gi gzugs kyis mdun du mchis nas/ mchog thams cad stsol bar 'gyur ro/ /las thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /la du la lan brgya rtsa brgyad

bzlas brjod bgyis nas/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi lhung bzed kyi nang du stsal te/ khro bo'i rgyal pos dbang bskur bgyis na/ ji srid du lhung bzed na la du mchis pa de srid du phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad

kyi spyan sngar/ lha'i zhal zas ro sna tshogs kyi ro'i mchog dang ldan pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / nyan thos dang byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po dang bcas pa tshim par bgyis par 'gyur ro/ /

de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dang nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa de dag thams cad kyis rig sngags 'chang de'i yon sbyong ba mdzad par 'gyur ro/ /la du la lan brgya rtsa

brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis te/ khro bo'i rgyal po'i dbang bskur la/ lcags kyu'i rgyal pos chab la bzlas brjod bgyis nas/ me 'thab kyi mtshams bcing bar bgyi'o/ /de nas arka'i yam shing gi me sbar la/ la du de

me thab kyi dbus su gzhag ste/ mar dang yungs kar dang zho dang sbrang rtsi bsres la lan brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg bgyi'o/ /lan brgya rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang / me lha me'i rang bzhin gyi gzugs kyis byung nas/ rig sngags 'chang

la smras pa/ rig sngags 'chang legs so legs so/ /bdag tshim par byas so/ /bdag dga' bar gyur to/ /rig sngags 'chang bdag gis mchog tu dga' ba thob kyis rig sngags 'chang ci ltar yid la bsams pa bzhin 'dod

pa smros shig dang / mchog sbyin no/ /rig sngags 'chang gis ji ltar yid la bsams pa bzhin mchog brjod par bgyi'o/ /me lha des yang thams cad stsol cing dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro/ /las thams cad grub

pa stsol bar 'gyur ro/ /me'i phung po'i dbus su zhugs nas 'od zer stong 'phro ba rnams gangs bzhin du bsil bar 'gyur te/ chab nas 'byung ba bzhin no/ /lag pas me rnams tshugs par bgyid do/ /'bar bzhin du klad pa'i spyi bor gzhag

na/ skra nyag ma gcig kyang 'tshig par mi bgyid de/ de'i dbang du mchi bar mi 'gyur ro/ /'bar bzhin du g.yar gyi nang du bsrel na cung zad dro ba tsam du yang mi 'gyur ro/ /lus la bab na ci ltar tsan dan bzhin du bsil zhing bde bar 'gyur ro/ /gzhan

yang dgos pa sna tshogs bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /gos kyi mtha' mar thum po bgyis na tshig par mi 'gyur ro/ /chab kyi nang du stsal na 'gum par mi 'gyur ro/ /sbyin sreg thams cad kyi cho ga so so'i gzugs su mchis par 'gyur ro/ /thams cad

du dgos pa grub pa stsol bar 'gyur ro/ /dgos pa gang dang gang du bskos pa de dang der dgos pa thams cad grub pa stsol bar 'gyur ro/ /thams cad du gsang sngags dang dkyil 'khor dang cho ga grub pa thams cad lung

'bog par 'gyur ro/ /du ba dang rlung dang me 'bar ba'i shugs kyis dpag tshad stong du mchis shing slar yang ldog par 'gyur ro/ /dgos pa thams cad nye bar ston par 'gyur ro/ /dgos pa thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /

thams cad du grub pa stsol bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas don yod me 'bar ba/ /bla med 'bar bzang bsgrub 'tshal na/ /yid bzhin nor bu lta bu dang / /gzi brjid nyi ma dang mnyam pas/ /phyogs bcu 'khor ra khor yug gi/ /kun nas su ni

gsal bar bgyid/ /sgrub pa rnam pa sna tshogs dang / /mchod pa bla na med pa 'grub/ /bcud kyi mchog de dam pa lags/ /nor sgyur smra ba bla na med/ /gzhan yang mchod pa sna tshogs pa/ /sgrub pa bla na med pa lags/ /ci ltar
nyin bzhin mtshan gda' bas/ /nyin par gyi ni gdugs dang mtshungs/ /lan cig dgos pa sgrub pa na/ /legs par las bgyis nor bu dang / /rdzas bsres legs par bgyis pa la/ /gtsang mas bzlas pa'i las

rnams dang / /gtsang mas spyad pas sgrub pa dang / /don yod chu dang me dang ni/ /me yi shing rnams brjod par bgyi/ /me 'bar 'od dang mtshungs pa ste/ /de dag thams cad gcig spungs yin/ /yam sreg cho ga bla na med/ /

tsan dan dang ni seng ldeng dang / /pa tang ka ra bi ra dang / /arka sha mi smyug ma dag /sh-ir sha ka nA ki ra ka /'o ma'i shing dang byang chub shing / /blag sha dang ni sna ma dang / /g+han d+ha par shi pad ma yi/ /rtsa ba dang ni lo mar

bcas/ /pad ma dkar po ku mu ta/ /ud pal me tog lo ma rtsa/ /bi dza pu ra bil ba shing / /sin du ba ri tsam pa ka /dre ka pi tsu ma d+hi tsa/ /sa ha ba la tsi tra ka /shing de kun ga bsdus pa yis/ /yam sreg shing gis las

bgyis te/ /yungs dkar mar dang zho dang ni/ /sbrang rtsi 'bras yos sbyin bsreg bgyi/ /bzang po'i las las srang gsum dang / /mtshal las gnyis 'gyur gang bskus kyang / /srang gcig tsan dan dkar po nyid/ /srang bcu ldong

ros srang gcig ste/ /de dag bsres pa'i rdzas rnams dang / /de bzhin yung ni nyis 'gyur dag /zhi ga dag ni bskang nas su/ /me thab dbus su gzhug par bgyi/ /sbyin sreg stong ni rtsa brgyad du/ /sh-in du mnyam gzhag legs gsal

ba/ /gtsang ma gtsang mar spyod pa yi/ /gos gtsang legs par khrus bgyis pa/ /dri zhim dri yis bsgos par bgyi/ /ro sna tshogs pa'i gtor ma dang / /me tog 'bras bu nyid kyang dgod/ /bzlas brjod kyi ni sbyin sreg nyid/ /

stong rtsa brgyad ni tshang ba dang / /de nas lha bshos gtor ma dang / /me tog bdug pa mchod yon snod/ /dbul te 'o mas mdag ma dgum/ /'o mas zhi ga zhi bar bgyi/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang gis bzlas brjod stong rtsa

brgyad bgyis nas yungs dkar gyis bsnun par bgyi'o/ /khro bo'i rgyal po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig du dbang bskur bar bgyi'o/ /de nas zhi ga 'bar bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang gis zhi ga de la mchod par bgyi'o/ /

de nas zangs kyi sgrom bu 'am/ dngul gyi sgrom bur zhi ga nas nor bu blangs te/ sgrom bu der gzhag te/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu ci lta ba bzhin du/ 'di yang don yod pa 'bar ba mthu chen po'i mthu dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /mtshan

mo ni zla ba'i 'od bzhin du gda' bar 'gyur ro/ /nyin mo ni nyi ma'i 'od bzhin du gda' bar 'gyur ro/ /nam phyed pa'i dus kyi tshe nor bu de gzhag na 'tsho ba dang / sreg pa dang / 'tshed pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /nam

ho ma bgyid pa yi tshe/ thab kyi dbus su gzhag ste/ sreg blugs kyis sbyin sreg bgyis na/ me chen po 'bar bar 'gyur ro/ /thams cad kyi thams cad du dgos pa rnams sgron mas gsal bar bgyis pa bzhin du 'gyur ro/ /
g.yul ngo chen por g.yul 'gyed pa'i dbus su skyes pa dpa' bo legs par khrus bgyis pa/ gos gtsang ma bgos pa/ ya lad dang go char gtams pas yid bzhin gyi nor bu chen po de spyi bo'i gtsug tu gzhag

nas/ gcig po g.yul gyi dbus su zhugs na/ de nas skyes pa de me 'bar ba gcig pur 'gyur ro/ /de nas g.yul 'gyed pa'i pha rol gyi dpung rnams pham par gyur nas/ phyogs bcur 'khrugs nas 'byer bar 'gyur ro/ /

phyi nas lan 'ga' yang pha rol gyi dpung dang / dgra'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /pha rol gyi dgra dang mi mdza' ba'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /lag pas nor bu gzung nas phug gi gnas su zhugs na/
gnas kyi sgo thams cad 'bye bar 'gyur ro/ /gnas na gnas pa thams cad mdun du mchis par 'gyur ro/ /klu'i gnas thams cad du mchis nas/ lag pas nor bu gzung ste/ gnas kyi nang du zhugs nas/
chab thams cad kyis phyir mi tshugs par 'gyur ro/ /de nas klu thams cad mdun na mchis nas/ bden par dam bca' bar 'gyur ro/ /dbang du gyur nas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du las bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /bsgo ba

bzhin bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /lo tog dang rtswa dang / shing gel pa dang nags tshal thams cad bde bar 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /mnyan cing mdangs dang ldan pa dang gnyen par 'gyur ro/ /gzi brjid dang ldan pa dang / dran pa

dang ldan pa dang mi bde ba yang chung bar 'gyur ro/ /sems can gang dag gis kyang lo tog dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu la longs spyod par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad dang / gzhan ches mang po dag gis dgos pa mang po

bgyid par 'gyur ba ni/ nor bu chen po don yod 'bar ba'i nor bu me 'bar ba chen po lags so/ /de nas don yod snang ba rnam par blta bas/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bkug ste/ rang gi gzugs su lta

bar 'tshal na/ de nas rig sngags 'chang gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgo bar bgyi'o/ /lus legs par bkrus te/ spos chab kyis byug par bgyi'o/ /shing arka'i yam bsreg shing gis me sbar bar bgyi'o/ /yungs dkar

dang / a ga ru dang / tsan dan dang zho dang sbrang rtsi dang mar sbyar bas stong rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg bgyi'o/ /de nas don yod lcags kyu gu gul la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig gi sreg blugs kyis sbyin sreg bgyis na/ 'phags pa spyan
ras gzigs dbang phyug rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na mchis sam/ mchog thams cad bsams pa bzhin yongs su rdzogs par bgyid do/ /ci ltar yid la bgyid cing bsams pa'i mchog stsol bar bgyid do/ /

de nas rig sngags 'chang gis ci ltar yid la bgyis shing bsams pa'i mchog smras pa dang / de'i 'og tu 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis thams cad stsol bar bgyid do/ /de nas mig sman bsgrub par 'tshal na/ rig

sngags 'chang des legs par bkrus te gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgo bar bgyi'o/ /nub gcig smyung ba bgyis te/ des zangs kyi za ma tog bgyis la de nas mig sman so'i bi ra dang yungs dkar nyis 'gyur du bsres pas dgang

bar bgyi'o/ /de nas stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis nas/ thab kyi dbus su bzhag par bgyi'o/ /de'i steng du u sh-i ra dang / yungs dkar dang / tsan dan dang / zho dang sbrang rtsi dang / mar bsres pas lan stong rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg bgyi'o/ /

shing arka'i me sbar bar bgyi'o/ /lan stong rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang / de nas mig sman blangs la gtun gyi steng du legs par zhib tu btags la ldong ros dang / ga pur dang gla rtsir bsres nas slar yang don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan brgya rtsa

brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis la don yod snying po'i rig sngags rgyal pos lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis pa ni thams cad du 'gul la legs par sbyar te/ de nas don yod rgyal pos dbang bskur bar bgyi'o/ /don yod zhags pa'i phyag rgya lan bdun phyag rgya bcing ngo / /de nas

mig sman gyis byugs na nam mkha' la 'phur nas rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi dpon por 'gyur ro/ /skra cung zad 'khyil bar 'gyur ro/ /bskal pa khrir 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ /dpral bar thig le bgyis na mi gda' bar 'gyur ro/ /

mig la bskus te tshig gzhan mi smra bar rgyal po'i pho brang du zhugs na/ rgyal po btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro/ /mchod pa phal po ches cher mchod par 'gyur ro/ /nor 'du ba grub pa chen po thob par 'gyur

ro/ /sgrub pa'i dus sam/ bzlas brjod kyi dus su mig la bskus na/ bgegs dang log 'dren dang / bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams thams cad kyis mi mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /phy-is kyang bgegs byed par mi nus te bar chad bgyid par mi 'gyur ro/ /bde ba

sgrub pa'i cho ga dang bzlas brjod kyi cho ga 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /mig la byugs te skye bo mang po'i nang du zhugs na de dag thams cad dbang du gyur te/ nor dang / 'brus dang / gos dang lhab lhub rgyan phal po che 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /bud med kyang mig mi

'dzums par lta bzhin du bdag nyid dam nor dbang du 'gyur ro/ /mig la byugs te dgon pa chen por zhugs na/ chom po dang / g.yon can dang / rkun po dang gcan zan gdug pa dang / sbrul dang / dbyig dug dang / sbrul gyi dug gi 'jigs pa thams cad

'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ bde legs su slar mchi bar 'gyur ro/ /'thab mo dang rtsod pa dang 'gyed pa thams cad la mig sman bskus na/ smra ba rnams kyi bla na med par 'gyur te/ thams cad du rgyal bar 'gyur ro/ /g.yul ngor g.yul 'gyed pa'i

nang du mchis nas mig la byugs na/ thams cad las rgyal bar 'gyur zhing / 'jigs pa thams cad las bsgral bar 'gyur ro/ /gdug pas zin pa thams cad la mig la bskus na/ gdug pa ma mchis par 'gyur ro/ /rims zhag

gcig pa dang / zhag gnyis pa dang / zhag gsum pa dang / rims zhag bzhi pa thams cad la mig la bskus na/ rims thams cad las grol bar 'gyur ro/ /dug mi bzad par 'tshal ba la mig la bskus na dug ma mchis par

'gyur ro/ /gdon thams cad kyis zin pa la mig la bskus na/ gdon brgyad khri bzhi stong las thar bar 'gyur ro/ /mig bro 'tshal ba la bskus pa tsam gyi mod la byung bar 'gyur ro/ /klad pa phyed bro 'tshal ba yang mig la bskus
