pa tsam gyis byang bar 'gyur ro/ /tshangs pa'i srin po'i gdon dang / rjed byed kyis zin pa la yang mig la bskus pa tsam gyis thar bar 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po khros pas gsod par 'os pa gang su yang rung ba khrid pa la mig la bskus

pa tsam gyis 'jigs pa thams cad spangs pa'i thar bar 'gyur ro/ /nag po chen po'i mig la bskus na rang gi gzugs kyis dus nas mdun na mchis nas mchog thams cad stsol cing dgos pa thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /

ma mo'i tshogs thams cad dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro/ /dpal lha mo'i mig la bskus te/ mig mi 'dzums par don yod rgyal po'i snying po lan bdun bzlas na/ dpal lha mo chen mo mchis nas dgos pa thams

cad dang / 'bru mang po rab tu stsol bar 'gyur ro/ /nyal ba'i tshe mig la bskus nas nyal na/ rmi lam bzang po mang zhing phal po che ba mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rang gi gzugs mthong bar

'gyur ro/ /mchog thams cad stsol bar 'gyur ro/ /dran pa dang blo gros rgya chen por 'gyur ro/ /mig la bskus te tshogs kyi dbus su zhugs na mchod pa chen po thob par 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs

dbang phyug gi gzugs brnyan gyi mig la bskus na/ rtag tu mchog stsol bar 'gyur ro/ /rtag tu blta 'tshal bar 'gyur ro/ /gi wang dang lhan cig sbyar te mig la bskus nas rgyal po'i pho brang du zhugs na dbang phyug

rgya chen po thob par 'gyur ro/ /longs spyod chen po phun sum tshogs par yang 'gyur ro/ /don chen po 'grub par yang 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po'i btsun mo dang blon po'i tshogs dang / 'khor thams cad dga' bar gyur nas thams

cad dbang du gyur te mchis par 'gyur ro/ /dpal lha mo chen mo'i gzugs brnyan gyi mig tu bskus na/ 'byung po thams cad kyi bdag por 'gyur zhing las bgyi ba ci mchis shes thams cad dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro/ /

nag po chen po'i gzugs brnyan gyi dpral ba dang mig la bskus na/ gnod sbyin thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro/ /mi ro'i mig la bskus na ldang bar 'gyur ro/ /gsang sngags dang / dug sbyar ma dang / byad kyis zin pa thams cad kyi mig la bskus na

dug sbyar ma dang / byad dang / gsang sngags thams cad bshig par 'gyur zhing lan 'ga' yang slar zil gyis gnon par mi 'gyur ro/ /bkres pa'i mig la bskus te/ grong du zhugs nas bza' ba dang btung ba'i ston mo lhun gyis grub cing 'thob par

'gyur ro/ /bsod snyoms pa'i mig la bskus te/ bsod snyoms la mchis na/ kha zas sna tshogs mang po dang / yon phal po che 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /sme ba dang ling tog dang / rab rib dang chu bur dang mtshan mo 'thom pa dang g.ya' ba dang / tshag po dang /

mig gi rdzi ma rdung ba dang / mig sle bo de dag thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /mig nad thams cad las sos par 'gyur ro/ /lha'i mig dag pa 'dab bzangs dang mtshungs pa 'dab bzangs kyi mthong ba thob nas thams cad kyi snying du sdug pa

dang dbang du gyur nas nor rnyed pa dang don grub pa yang thob nas/ dbang phyug bla na med par 'gyur ro/ /de nas nor dang 'bru dang gos dang lhab lhub dang rgyan dang rgyan 'phyang thams cad dgug pa dang / 'phel bar bgyid pa dang don yod me lha dgug pa'i sbyin

sreg rgya chen po brjod par bgyi'o/ /grub pa kun gyi bla na med/ /don kun grub pas mod la ni/ /mkhas pa mchog tu dga' bar bgyid/ /dbang phyug skal ba phun sum tshogs/ /mod nyid kho nar thob 'gyur bar/ /the tshom du yang mi bgyi

zhing / /yid gnyis nyid kyang ma lags so/ /gtsang mas gtsang ma'i gos dag dang / /legs par bkrus pas las sgrub bo/ /sbyin bsreg bla na med 'phel ba/ /'di ni rgya chen bsam mi khyab/ /ka ran rtsa ba sdong bur bcas/ /'dab ma

me tog 'bras bur bcas/ /arka'i shing dang blag sha'i shing / /yam bsreg dag gis me sbar la/ /sa bon bdun po 'bras dang bcas/ /'bras yos til dang yungs kar dang / /zho dang sbrang rtsi mar dang ni/ /yungs mar dag dang bsres pa yi/ /

sbyin bsreg stong rtsa brgyad tshang bgyi/ /khro bo'i rgyal po lan stong rtsa brgyad kyis dbang bskur ba tshang ba dang / de nas don yod lcags kyu'i rig sngags kyi rgyal po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas/ gu gul dang ske tshe'i 'bras bu dang / mar du

sbyar bas sbyin bsreg bgyi'o/ /dgos pa thams cad rdzogs pa dang / de'i tshe bza' ba dang btung ba dang gnas mal dang stan dang nad kyi rkyen sman dang / yo byad dang nor dang 'bru dang mdzod dang / bang ba 'phel bar yang 'gyur ro/ /gos sna tshogs dang lhab

lhub dang rgyan dang rgyan phreng dang me tog dang dri dang phreng ba dang / byug pa rnams lhun gyis grub pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /dbang phyug gi 'byor pa rgya chen po 'thob par 'gyur zhing ji srid 'tsho'i bar du mchis par 'gyur ro/ /de nas zla ba yar gyi ngo'i

tshes brgyad la nyin zhag cig mchis nas mig la bskus te/ don yod zhags pa'i snying po lan dgu bcu bzlas brjod bgyis la/ khro bo'i rgyal pos dbang bskur nas/ don yod zhags pa'i phyag rgyas phyag rgya bcings te/ de nas mig la mig sman

bskus na/ nam mkha' la rdzu 'phrul gyis mchi bar 'gyur ro/ /mig sman grub pa'i rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi gtso bo rgyal po 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro/ /skra cung zad yang 'khyil par 'gyur ro/ /bskal pa khrir 'tsho bar

'gyur ro/ /mig sman 'di mig la byugs na nyin par lta ba bzhin du mtshan mo mthong bar 'gyur zhing m-i gda' bar yang 'gyur ro/ /'byung po dang gnod sbyin dang / srin po'i gnas thams cad du zhugs na thams cad kyi dpon por
'gyur ro// //'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po/ bam po bdun pa/ mig sman 'dis mig la byugs nas ma mo'i gnas su zhugs na/ lha gtso bo de dag mig mi 'dzum par
lta bar bgyid la khro bo'i rgyal po lan cig bzlas par bgyi'o/ /de nas ma mo dang gtso bo'i lha thams cad mdun du mchis nas/ mchog thams cad stsol bar 'gyur ro/ /ji srid 'tsho'i bar du las thams cad

sgrub par bgyid pas mchis par 'gyur ro/ /ma mo'i tshogs thams cad kyis yongs su bkur zhing sny-ing du sdug par 'gyur ro/ /rtag par rgyun du bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba ba'i phyir gnas shing rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro/ /

de nas gi wang sgrub pa'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga brjod par bgyi ste/ don yod rgyal po grub pa yis/ /rig sngags 'chang ba bde myong zhing / /lha dang lha min mchod pa dang / /sgrub pa'i don kun 'grub pa dang / /dbang du gyur pa dam pa

dang / /mkha' la mchi ba'i dam pa dang / /mi snang shin tu rnyed dka' dang / /mod la phug tu 'jug pa dang / /nags kyi nang du 'jug pa dang / /r-i sul dag tu 'jug pa dang / /thang dag la ni rgyu ba dang / /klu gnas mtshor ni 'jug

pa dang / /de bzhin chu klung cher bsgral dang / /rdzu 'phrul grub dang skyes pa dang / /de bzhin 'jigs dang sgrib kun dang / /nad kun zhi bar bgyid pa nyid/ /sdig pa thams cad nyams par bgyid/ /g.yul ngor g.yul las rgyal

bgyid de/ /rtag tu dgra kun brlag par bgyid/ /gdon rigs kun kyang tshar gcod cing / /rigs rnams thams cad zlog par bgyid/ /sngon gyi sgrib pa 'jig bgyid cing / /sdig pa thams cad nyams par bgyid/ /dbang

phyug stsol cing skal ba stsol/ /nor dang 'bru rnams 'phel bar bgyid/ /'thab pa 'thab mo rtsod pa dang / /'gyed pa rab tu zhi bar bgyid/ /bc-ing ba dang ni shing sgrog dang / /khong sgril lcags sgrog phye mar rlog /rgyal po
gdug pa khros pa yis/ /gsad par 'os pa sel bar bgyid/ /da lta 'di la rten pa na/ /mi bdag bu sdug bzhin smra zhing / /m-i bde kun las grol bar 'gyur/ /'di ni kun tu sdug pa dang / /gnas kun mchis

par mchod par 'os/ /lus can shin tu snying du sdug /rgyal po btsun mo 'khor bcas pa'i/ /rtag tu snang chen dag tu 'gyur/ /dge sbyong bram ze nyid dang ni/ /rgyal rigs rje'u rigs dmang rigs dang / /bud med kun dang

de bzhin du/ /skyes pa khye'u dang bu mo yi/ /rtag tu gnang chen dag tu 'gyur/ /gi wang bla na med pa po/ /'di la gang dag rtag brten na/ /'phags pa 'jig rten dbang phyug ste/ /mchog sbyin rtag tu mchod pa bgyid/ /tshangs

pa khyab 'jug dbang phyug che/ /nyin dang mtshan du bsrung ba dang / /rtag tu mchog stsol phyir mchis so/ /gzhan yang lha ni mang po dang / /klu yi rgyal po mthu chen dang / /'byung po gnod sbyin srin po dang / /grul bum mi min

lto 'phye che/ /dri za lha min nyid dag dang / /nam mkha' lding dbang mthu chen te/ /de dag thams cad bsrung ba yi/ /ched du nyin dang mtshan dag tu/ /rang dbang nyid kyis gnas par 'gyur/ /gi wang grub pa dam pa po/ /
de ltar stobs dang ldan pa lags/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang ba yis/ /gtsang gyur legs par khrus bgyis nas/ /gtsang ma yi ni gos bgos te/ /gi wang legs par bsgrubs nas su/ /dmar po chen po nyid dag

dang / /gur gum dag dang mnyam sbyar la/ /zangs kyi snod du bkang nas su/ /don yod zhags pa'i gzugs mdun du/ /stong rtsa brgyad ni tshang bzlas nas/ /rgya dar gyis ni kha 'gum mo/ /de nas seng ldeng gi sh-ing dang /

arka'i sh-ing gi yam shing gis me sbar la/ 'bras yos yungs kar dang gu gul dang / 'bras dang / til dang bsres la/ zho dang sbrang rtsi mar du bsres te/ lan stong rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg bgyi'o/ /lan stong rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang / de nas

me zhi zhing me mdag phra mo yang zhi ba dang thal ba blangs te/ snod kyi nang du stsal nas de nas slar yang lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas la/ khro bo'i rgyal pos dbang bskur te/ phyag rgya'i phyag rgyas kyang dbang bskur ro/ /de nas dpral ba'i dbus su

thig le bgyis na nam mkha' la 'phur nas/ rig sngags 'chang chen po'i rgyal po 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi dpon por 'gyur zhing / skra cung zad 'khyil par yang 'gyur ro/ /lo

dgu khri dgu stong du 'tsho bar 'gyur zhing gnas kyi sgo thams cad rtag tu 'byed par 'gyur ro/ /dpral ba la thig le bgyis na mi gda' bar gyur nas/ gnas thams cad du zhugs na gnas thams cad kyi bdag por 'gyur zhing /

'byung po dang gnod sbyin dang srin po'i gnas kyi sgo thams cad 'byed par 'gyur ro/ /'byung po dang gnod sbyin dang / srin po mthu dang bcas pa thams cad kyis yongs su bskor nas mchis par 'gyur ro/ /ji srid 'tsho ba'i bar

du bsgo ba bzhin bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /mig la bskus na ci lta nyin par bzhin du mtshan mo snang zhing thams cad du gter mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /sa'i phug dang thang gi sgo phye ba mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /thang gi gnas su zhugs

nas/ thang gi dgos pa thams cad bgyi ste/ slar yang mchi bar 'gyur ro/ /chu klung chen po'i nang du zhugs na/ khyim dang gzhal med khang ci lta ba bzhin du mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /rin po che thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i gzhal med

khang mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /chab la gnas pa gang lags pa de dag thams cad dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro/ /klu'i mtsho dang gnas su ci ltar rang gi khyim bzhin du 'jug cing 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /lus mtha'

dag byugs te g.yul ngor/ g.yul 'gyed pa'i nang du zhugs na ya lad dang / go cha bgos pa bzhin du mthong nas thams cad las rgyal bar 'gyur ro/ /khar bsrel te rgyal po'i pho brang du zhugs pa na btsun mo 'khor dang bcas

pa dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro/ /gang la tshig smras pa de dag thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /gang la blangs na de dag thams cad ster bar 'gyur ro/ /gang la bsgo ba de dag thams cad bsgo ba bzhin bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /khar 'chos nas/

gang dang gang du mchis pa de dang der skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo thams cad bdag nyid dang nor dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro/ /lag pa g.yas pa la byugs na su reg pa de dbang du 'gyur ro/ /nor dang 'bru dang dbyig

dang bran pho dang bran mo dang las bgyis pa dang zho shas 'tsho ba dang mngag gzhug pa rnams dbang du gyur nas/ bsgo ba bzhin mchis par 'gyur ro/ /mdzub mo g.yas pa la bskus nas ser ba dang sprin dang / 'brug gi dus su sprin

la mngon sum du bstan te bsdigs na grang ba dang rlung dang ser ba rnams zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /dpag tshad gcig kho ra yug du zil gyis gnon par 'gyur ro/ /char ha chang ches na lag pa g.yas pa sprin la mngon sum du bstan pas

ha chang char ches pa gcod par 'gyur ro/ /char mi 'bab pa'i dus su lag pa g.yas pa'i lag 'thil la byugs nas klu gnas pa'i mtsho'i chu la thal mo lan gsum brdabs na/ de'i mod la klu'i rgyal pos char gyi rgyun chen po

gtong bar 'gyur ro/ /gal te mod la char pa mi phebs na de'i tshe lan lnga brdebs pa dang / klu de dag thams cad kyis char gyi rgyun gtong bar 'gyur ro/ /gang gi tshe char pa mi 'bebs pa de'i tshe/ klu thams cad la klad pa'i

nad 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /gal te lan bdun bsnun na klu'i rgyal po thams cad la tshul ma yin pa'i sdug bsngal 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /klu'i rgyal po thams cad kyi rigs phung bar bgyis par 'gyur ro/ /gdon gyis zin pa

thams cad kyi m-ig la bskus na/ bskus pa tsam gyi mod la gdon brgyad khri bzh-i stong rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /r-ims kyis thebs pa rnams kyi dpral ba la thig le bgyis na/ rims zhag gcig pa 'am/ nyin gnyis pa 'am/

nyin gsum pa'am nyin bzhi pa'i r-ims thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /nad kyis zin pa rnams la khrus bgyis na mod la nad thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro/ /sha bkra dang mdze dang rkang shu dang shu ba dang g.yon pa dang / 'brum bu rnams las thar bar 'gyur ro/ /lba ba dang /

lhog pa dang / mtshan bar brdol ba dang / shu ba mched pa dang / 'brum bu phra mo mched pa la byugs pa tsam gyis thar bar 'gyur ro/ /gdug pas zin pa thams cad la byugs pa tsam gyis mi gdug par 'gyur ro/ /dug gis myos par

bgyis pa thams cad la 'tshal ba tsam gyi mod la thar bar 'gyur ro/ /lto na ba dang / skran dang / rmu chu dang mchin pa na ba dang / rtsibs logs na ba dang / chu so na ba dang / gzhang nad dang / tshad pa dang / gcin sri ba dang / gsud pa dang / ma zhu ba dang / rtug skams la

sros na 'tshal ba tsam gyi mod la zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /phyis lan 'ga' yang gnod par bgyid par mi 'gyur ro/ /'tshogs mar gi wang gi ri lu bgyis te/ phug gi sgo dang nye bar mchis nas lag pa g.yas pa la byugs te/ mgo la

thal mo brdabs na/ phug gi sgo rnams 'bye bar 'gyur ro/ /bag tsha ba ma mchis par 'jug ste/ slar cung zad kyang bgegs bgyid par mi 'gyur ro/ /gnas de na gnas pa gang lags pa de dag thams cad dbang du gyur nas mdun na mchis

par 'gyur ro/ /dgos pa sgrub pa chen po thams cad grub par 'gyur ro/ /rkang pa gnyis la byugs te/ me 'bar ba'i nang du zhugs na me lha rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na mchis nas lag pa nas gzung ste/ rig sngags 'chang la rig

sngags 'chang ba dag gi gzhal med khang gi gnas su zhugs shig /rig sngags 'chang gis bsgo ba thams cad bsgrub par bgyi'o zhes smra ba na/ de'i tshe rig sngags 'chang gis bgyi ba ci mchis pa de bsgo bar bgyi ste/ thams cad

bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /dpung pa gnyis la byugs na glang po che bdun gyi stobs dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /brla gnyis la byugs na tshugs pa ma mchis pa'i gyad du 'gyur ro/ /byin pa gnyis la byugs na 'bab chu chen po'i pha rol tu

rgal bar 'gyur ro/ /mgrin pa la byugs nas nags khung du zhugs na/ nags khung gi gnas kyi sgo thams cad bye nas sman gyi rdzas thams cad rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na mchis par 'gyur ro/ /ci 'tshal ba de blang bar bgyi'o/ /gi wang gi ri

lu bgyis te khar bsrel nas ri sul dang sman gshong du zhugs nas skad drag po lan gsum gdon par bgyi ste/ ri sul dang sman ljongs gi gnas gsang ba'i sgo gang dag lags pa bye bar 'gyur zhing / de na gnas pa gang lags pa de

dag thams cad rang rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na mchis par 'gyur zhing / las thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /de nas rtswa dang shing gel pa dang / nags tshang tshing gi sman gyi rdzas gang lags pa dag rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na mchis

par 'gyur zhing / gang dag gi bcud kyi mchog de dag 'dzag la/ bcud bsrung ba de dag kyang rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na mchis nas thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro/ /ci ltar 'tshal ba bag tsha ba ma mchis par dgos pa thams cad

bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /snying gar thig le bgyis nas snying la cung zad ci bsams pa dang / yid la bsams shing brnag pa'i dgos pa de dag thams cad mod la 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /lto la thig le bgyis nas kha zas dang gtung

ba'i ston mo 'dod dgu thams cad thob par 'gyur te/ phun sum tshogs pa thams cad lhun gyis 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /rtsibs logs gnyis la byugs na/ ci ltar bsams shing don du gnyer ba'i gos rnams thob par 'gyur ro/ /sgal

tshigs la byugs na ci ltar yid la bsams pa'i mal dang / stan thob par 'gyur ro/ /rna ba la byugs sam/ gnad dang gnad thams cad kyi gnas su byugs na/ ci ltar bsams pa'i rgyan dang lhab lhub thob par 'gyur ro/ /mjug rdo la

byugs na/ rta'i bzhon pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /nyin gcig bzhin nang par tshig gzhan mi smra bar gi wang gi ri lu re re la don yod rgyal po'i snying po bzlas nas 'tshal te/ nyi ma dang po la tshigs su bcad pa stong bklags na 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /nyin

gcig bzhin nyis 'gyur du bgyis nas bklags na 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /zhag bdun gyis thos pa mang por 'gyur ro/ /zhag bcu bzhi bgyis na mi'am ci mo lta bu'i sgra dbyangs su 'gyur ro/ /lan nyi shu rtsa gcig tu bgyis na thos pa bsags pa'i rgya mtsho

chen por 'gyur ro/ /ka la ping ka'i dbyangs ltar mnyen zhing snyan la rna ba'i dbyangs su 'gyur ro/ /bu'i ched du mar dang lhan cig bstsal na bya rog lta bu dang / mo shams rnams kyis kyang bu rnyed par 'gyur ro/ /btson rar stsal ba dang /

sh-ing sgrog dang / lcags sgrog dang / gtan pa dang / khong sgril la byugs na byugs pa tsam gyi mod la dum bu dum bur 'chag par 'gyur ro/ /'thor bar 'gyur ro/ /tshes brgyad dam bcu bzhi 'am tshes bcwa lnga la don yod rgyal po'i snying po lan

bdun bzlas la khro bo'i rgyal pos rang la dbang bskur nas gi wang gi ri lu dang spos chab bsres pas khrus bgyi'o/ /khrus bgyis pa tsam gyi mod la sdig pa thams cad dang / sngon gyi sgrib pa thams cad rnam par 'jig par 'gyur ro/ /

nub gsum du khrus bgyis na gsang sngags dang phyag rgya dang sgrub pa dang grub pa'i mchog thams cad thob par 'gyur ro/ /phas kyi rgol ba dang mi 'dza' ba dang gdug pa dang sdig pa thams cad kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro/ /

lan 'ga' yang thams cad kyis thams cad du 'jigs pa mi 'byung zhing yongs su thar bar 'gyur ro/ /phyis lan 'ga' yang sdig pa'i dri mas gos par mi 'gyur ro/ /gi wang gi ri lu til mar dang bsres te kha gdong la

byugs na rgyal po'i mdun du mchis nas bu bzhin du spang du 'khyud nas dga' ba chen po 'thob pa dang / rgyal po khro bo'i 'jigs pa thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /lus thog thag tu byugs na gsad par 'os pa'i lus

la yang mtshon gyis phog par mi 'gyur te/ dum bu dum bur 'chag par 'gyur ro/ /mda' 'phangs na lus la 'bab par mi 'gyur zhing gzhu 'chag par 'gyur ro/ /gi wang gi r-i lu mgul du btags nas 'brog dgon pa

dang ri dang / nags tshang tshing bgrod dka' bar zhugs na chom po dang g.yon can dang rkun po dang gnod sbyin dang srin po dang mi dang mi ma lags pa dang gcan gzan gdug pa dang sbrul gdug pa'i 'jigs pa thams cad 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ mi gda'

bar 'gyur ro/ /dpung pa g.yas pa la btags na thams cad du pha rol las rgyal bar 'gyur ro/ /thams cad du mchod gnas chen por yang 'gyur ro/ /thams cad du mthu dang brtson 'grus chen po rdzi ba med pas pha rol zil gyis

gnon par 'gyur ro/ /dpung pa g.yon pa la btags na skyes pa dang bud med dang khye'u dang bu mo thams cad kyi gnang chen du 'gyur te/ thams cad lta 'tshal bar 'gyur ro/ /mchod pa'i 'os chen por 'gyur ro/ /dgos pa mang po 'grub

par 'gyur ro/ /byin pa g.yas pa la btags na dub pa ma mchis par dpag tshad stong du mchis par 'gyur ro/ /gi wang gi ri lu khar bsrel la lag pa g.yas pas yungs kar gyis don yod lcags kyu bzlas nas drangs te tshig

gzhan mi smra bar gnas mthon por 'dzegs te phyogs gang du bsams pa'i skyes pa dang bud med dang khye'u dang bu mo mchis pa'i phyogs der yungs kar gyis gtor na mod la bkug par 'gyur te mchis par 'gyur ro/ /

gal te dpag tshad brgya tsam na gnas pa zhig na yang gdon mi 'tshal bar de zhag gsum gyis mchi bar 'gyur te yid gnyis mi bgyi'o/ /lag pa g.yas pa 'am lag pa g.yon pa la gi wang gi r-i lu btags na gang du reg par nor dang 'bru dang /

dbyig dang nor bu dang mu tig dang shang ka shi la dang / byi ru dang sa le sbram dang / dngul dang gos dang lhab lhub de dag thams cad bkug nas mchis par 'gyur te/ ci 'tshal ba de mchi bar 'gyur ro/ /byan tshang du zhugs nas tshang mang

gi sgor thal mo brdabs na 'tshed pa dang 'tshed pa'i kha zas de dag thams cad bkug nas mchis par 'gyur te ci 'tshal ba de mchis par 'gyur ro/ /spos 'tshong gi tshong khang du mchis na tshong khang gi yo byad thams cad mchi

bar 'gyur ro/ /chang 'tshong gi sgor thal mo brdabs na chang gi bum pa thams cad mchi bar 'gyur ro/ /bang ba'i sgor thal mo brdabs na 'bru thams cad bkug par 'gyur ro/ /bcud 'byin pa'i khyim du zhugs nas 'khrul 'khor la reg par bgyid na bu ram gyi khu

ba dang sha kha ra'i glegs bu thams cad mchi bar 'gyur ro/ /gang du 'tshal bu der mngags par 'gyur ro/ /grong khyer gyi sgor mun tshab tshub na thal mo brdabs na grong khyer na gnas pa thams cad gnyid bskrogs par 'gyur

ro/ /dgra bo'i sgor btab na bskrad par 'gyur ro/ /mtshon cha mkhan gyi khyim du 'phangs na mtshon cha dang / go cha rnams rengs pa dang / rmugs par bgyis par 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po'i sgor btab na phas kyi rgol ba dang / mi mdza' ba dang /

sems can gdug pa thams cad bcings pa dang / rengs pa dang rmugs par bgyis par 'gyur ro/ /dung la byugs nas bus na sgra gang du grag pa de dag tu 'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / byad dang / dug sbyar ma

dang / dug dang / nad las yongs su thar bar 'gyur ro/ /grong khyer gyi sgor bus na yams kyi nad dang / gnod pa dang / mi ngas thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /phyugs lhas su bus na 'o ma thams cad phrogs par 'gyur ro/ /gang du

'tshal ba der mchi bar 'gyur ro/ /ra lug gi lhas su bus na ra lug gi 'o ma phrogs par 'gyur te/ gar 'tshal ba der mchi bar 'gyur ro/ /skye bo'i tshogs chen po'i dbus su bus na thams cad sgren por gyur nas gos

thams cad bkug par 'gyur ro/ /rdza rnga la byugs te khyams mthon po'i steng du brdungs na grang ba dang / rlung dang / ser ba thams cad bcings pa dang gshig par 'gyur te tshugs par mi 'gyur ro/ /dpag tshad brgya

kho ra khor yug tu ser ba bkag par 'gyur ro/ /grong khyer ram/ yul 'khor mtha' dag tu bus na nad dang / yams kyi nad dang / gnod pa dang / 'tshe ba thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang /

rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /mi ngas dang / mu ge'i 'jigs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang dgos pa rnam pa sna tshogs brgya stong dag bgyid par 'gyur te/ thams cad la sbyar bar

bgyi'o/ /de nas sems can thams cad dang thun mong ba zhi ba dang / rgyas pa nad thams cad zhi bar bgyid cing sdig pa thams cad 'jig par bgyid pa/ yams kyi nad dang / gnod pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa/

mu ge'i dgon pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa/ 'byung po dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / gdon dang / rjed byed thams cad brlag par bgyid pa brjod par bgyid ba'o/ /rig sngags 'chang gtsang mar gyur pas legs par khrus

bgyis te/ spos dri zhim pos lus byugs la/ gos gtsang ma bgos la spos dri zhim pos bgos nas byams pa'i sems la mnyam par gzhag cing / sems can thams cad la lhag par brtse ba dang / snying rje chen pos snying gdungs

pas sbyin sreg gi las 'di bgyi ste/ arka'i shing dang / sha mi'i shing dang / shing 'o ma can nam/ ji ltar yang byang chub kyi shing ste/ de dag gi yam sreg shing gis me sbar la/ 'bras yos dang / yungs kar dang / pad ma dang / pad ma'i ldum bu dang / 'dab ma dang /

zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar du bsres pas sbyin sreg bgyi'o/ /don yod zhags pa'i snying po stong rtsa brgyad bzlas nas/ de nas don yod zhags pa khro bo'i rgyal pos dbang bskur te/ don yod zhags pa'i phyag rgyas phyag rgya lan brgya rtsa brgyad bcing ngo / /

de nas sbyin sreg gi dgos pa rnams mthar phyin pa'i mod kho nar dpag tshad gcig khor yug tu yams kyi nad dang / gnod pa dang / 'tshe ba dang / nad dang / mu ge'i dgon pa mi bzad pa dang / rang gi dpung dang / gzhan gyi dpung gi 'jigs pa dang /

phas kyi rgol ba dang / mi mdza' ba'i 'jigs pa thams cad dang / chom po dang / g.yon can dang / rkun po dang / gcan gzan gdug pa dang / sbrul dang / dug mi bzad pa dang / gdug pa dang / bcas pa'i srog chags kyi 'jigs pa thams cad

rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /mi tshugs par 'gyur ro/ /dpag tshad brgyar kho ra khor yug tu rims mi 'byung ste/ gnod pas ma lags/ nad kyis ma lags te/ gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / gnod sbyin rnams kyis mi tshugs te/

rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / nang 'khrug dang 'khrug pa dang / skrod pa dang / mdangs gcod pa dang / 'ching ba dang / sdigs pa rnams kyis mi tshugs te rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /sems

can thams cad bde bar 'gyur ro/ /shin du lo legs shing mdangs dga' la skye bo dang / mi mang pos rab tu gang zhing me tog dang / 'bras bu phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro/ /nor dang / 'bru dang / lo tog rab tu mang po 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /

shin du ro dang ldan pa dang / shin du smin pa dang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /rtswa dang / shing gel pa dang / sman dang / nags tshang tshing dang / myu gu dang / rtsa ba dang / 'bras bu bzang po yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /phyir zhing ji srid 'tsho'i

bar du yul de ni yid du mi mchi ba'i reg pa myong bar mi 'gyur ro/ /yul de na dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs dang / skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo rnams rtag tu nad ma

mchis par 'gyur ro/ /bde bar 'tsho ba dang / yid la dga' zhing mgu bar 'gyur ro/ /byams pa dang / snying rje'i sems kyis gnas par 'gyur ro/ /lha dang / klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang /

mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po de dag thams cad kyang legs par bsrung ba'i phyir rtag tu bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba ba'i phyir dpag tshad brgya kho ra khor yug tu bsrung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs

su bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po bzhi yang dpung dang bcas te/ yongs su skyong ba dang / bsrung ba dang / skyob pa dang / sbed pa bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /gdug pa thams cad bzlog pa dang / bsrung ba dang / yongs su skyong bar 'gyur ro/ /

dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen po'i lha'i bu rnams rtag par rgyun du bsrung ba dang / skyob pa dang / sbed pa bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /lha'i rgyal po sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i bu 'khor dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug

chen po dang / lha'i tshogs kyi 'khor thams cad kyis yul de legs par bsrungs par 'gyur ro/ /gzi byin stsol bar 'gyur ro/ /dpag tshad gcig kho ra khor yug tu sems can thams cad yongs su bsrung ba dang / yongs su skyong bar

'gyur ro/ /dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs dang / skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo thams cad la bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sbed pa bgyis par 'gyur ro/ /zhi ba'i las 'di'i mthus

sems can thams cad sdig pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad las rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis yul de la dgongs par 'gyur ro/ /phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / byang

chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad yang dag par 'du bar 'gyur ro/ /sems can thams cad la dbugs 'byin par ston par 'tshal bar 'gyur ro/ /sems can thams cad yongs su bsrung ba'i don du nyi ma dang / zla ba

rgyu skar gyi tshogs dang bcas pa legs par 'byor bar 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rtag par rgyun du skyes pa dang bud med dang khye'u dang bu mo thams cad lu bu gcig pa bzhin du dbugs 'byin par

'gyur ro/ /yongs su bsrung ba dang / yid kyis brnag pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyid par 'gyur te/ yang nas yang du blta bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas des sbyin sreg gi thal ba dang / dri chu skyo ma bgyis te phyogs bzhi kun du dbang

bskur na mtshams chen po bcad par bgyis par 'gyur ro/ /nad kyis zin pa thams cad kyi nad thams cad nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /rims thams cad la thig le bgyis na rims thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro/ /dri chab dang thal bas khrus bgyis na thams cad kyi sgrib pa dang /

sdig pa thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/ /btson ra na mchis pa 'am/ phyag sbal na mchis pa'i gos la bskus na ral bar 'gyur ro/ /gdug pas zin pa dang / dug gis myos pa thams cad la bskus na gdug par mi 'gyur ro/ /me dgug pa'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga rdzogs s+ho// // de nas pad ma

chen po'i dkyil 'khor 'dir pad ma'i rigs 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor cho ga zhib mo rgyal po chen po brjod par bgyi ste/ 'di n-i ma bsgrubs

par las brgya stong bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /tshes grangs rgyu skar bzang po dang / /shin du bkra shis mchog dge la/ /legs par khrus bgyi gos gtsang bsgo/ byams pa'i sems la mnyam par bzhag /sems can kun la brtse ba dang / /snying rje

dam pas brgyan pa dang / /don yod zhags pa'i rig sngags che/ /grub pa bla med cho ga'i rgyal/ /bklags pas las rnams thams cad dag /'grub par bgyid de som nyi med/ /'jig rten bla ma'i snying po dag /de bzhin gang dag rtag brjod na/ /

lus can rtag tu mchog sbyin gyi/ /phyag na pad ma rtag tu 'gyur/ /ci ltar ga~M gA'i bye snyed kyi/ /sangs rgyas bye ba phrag stong la/ /bsod nams phung po khri phrag bskyed/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba sogs pa dang / /sangs rgyas bya ba bgyid par 'gyur/ /smyung

ba bgyis nas bzlas brjod gcig /mkhas pa'i mis ni brjod bgyid pa/ /dge slong pha dang dge slong ma/ /dge bsnyen pho mos de bzhin du/ /bde ba can du myur du mchi/ /sdug bsngal mi bzad myong 'gyur ba'i/ /nyon mongs pa las thar

bar 'gyur/ /rtag tu sangs rgyas byang chub dag /mthong bar 'gyur te som nyi med/ /de nas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i sny-ing po'i cho ga ci lta ba bzhin du bzlas brjod kyi cho ga brjod par bgyi ste/ bzlas brjod kyi ni las bgyis na/ /

rig sngags 'chang la de nyid 'grub/ /don yod zhags pa'i gzugs brnyan gyi/ /mdun du lci ba'i dkyil 'khor bgyi/ /gru bzhi kho ra khor yug tu/ /tshon rtsi dkar po zhib mo yis/ /gru bzhi lham par thig gdab bo/ /ngos bzhi

rnams su sgo bzhi dag /dbus nas ngos bzhir gshis su dbab/ /tsan dan dkar pos bri ba ni/ /dkyil 'khor mchog la pad ma dang / /'dab brgya gur gum gyis gtor zhing / /pad ma'i ze ba'i dkyil dag tu/ /ma zhom pa yi bum pa ni/ /

spos chab kyis ni bkang ba yi/ /yungs kar ldan pa bzhag par bgyi/ /a ka ru yi bdug pa dbul/ /bum pa gang bar dgod par bgyi/ /me tog sna tshogs brgyan par bgyi/ /mchod yon snod kyang bzhi gzhag go/ /rig sngags 'chang ba gtsang

gyur pas/ /gtsang ma'i gos ni bgo bar bgyi/ /legs bkrus rnam par dag pa dang / /gso sbyong dag ni blangs pa dang / /dkar gsum zas ni 'tshal nas su/ /dus gsum du ni khrus bgyi'o/ /dus gsum bzlas brjod bgyi ba ni/ /don

yod zhags pa'i snying po dag /dus gsum du yang brgya rtsa brgyad/ /'phags pa 'jig rten dbang phyug gi/ mngon sum skyil mo dkrung bcas te/ /bzlas brjod phyag rgya bcings nas su/ /bgrang phreng dag ni blang bar bgyi/ /mdzub mo

dag ni mthe bo dag /brkyang nas zhi zhing dul ba yi/ /yid kyis byams sems mnyam par gzhag /ting 'dzin brtan pas lus snyoms par/ /legs par bzhag te zhi bar lta/ /tshig gzhan mi smra bzlas brjod bgyi/ /bzlas brjod

bgyis pa tsam gyi mod la/ sa chen po g.yo bar 'gyur ro/ /don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya bcings te/ phyag rgya bcings nas sa chen po yang g.yo bar 'gyur ro/ /brtan pa'i sems kyis skrag par mi bgyi'o/ /sems can thams

cad la mchog tu brtse bas/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug don yod zhags pa'i zhabs mthong ba tsam du bris la/ ci tsam na khro bo'i rgyal po lan bdun bzlas so/ /lan bdun bzlas pa tsam gyi mod la sa chen po g.yo

zhing sgra 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi dpral ba nas 'od zer byung nas kun tu snang bar 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags 'chang de yang cher sny-ing dga' ba dang bzhin 'dzum pa dang sh-in du rab tu dga'

bas spu zing zhes bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi gdong du blta bar bgyi ste/ gdong du bltas pa tsam gyi mod la/ bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ngos g.yas pa nas legs so

zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /mig bsgyur bar bgyid cing kun du legs so zhes bgyi ba'i sgra byung na/ rig sngags 'chang gis sgrib pa rnam par dag pa thob nas lus yongs su dag pa chen po dang ldan

par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba sa ya phrag brgya stong la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis blta ba'i 'os su 'gyur ro/ /lus 'jam pa dang shin du gzhon sha chags pa dang

mnyen par 'gyur ro/ /skra cung zad 'khyil pa dang mnyen pa dang / snyan pa'i tshig smra bar 'gyur ro/ /mig yongs su dag pa 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /lus yongs su dag pa dang yid yongs su dag pa dang gnyer ma dang skra skya bo spangs par

'gyur ro/ /sems can thams cad la lta ba dag pa zhes bgyi ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /ci tsam du 'dug ce na gdugs rtse na zer/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rang gi gzugs ston cing dbugs 'byin par

bgyid do/ /lag pa g.yas pa spyi bor gzhag nas mchog thams cad stsol bar 'gyur ro/ /nam mkha' la mchi ba 'am/ mi gda' bar bgyi ba 'am/ lha'i mig 'thob pa 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing la blta ba 'am/ ting nge 'dzin rab tu 'thob

pa 'am/ gzugs su rab tu 'thob pa 'am/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i cho ga zhib mo 'grub pa 'am/ gtsug lag smra ba 'am/ gsang sngags smra ba 'am/ thos pa nyid dang / gter smra ba 'am/ nor sgyur ba smra ba 'am/ mig 'phrul smra ba 'am/

'jig rten du 'gro ba 'am/ phug tu 'jug pa 'am/ klu'i gnas su 'jug pa 'am/ zhing smra ba 'am/ gnod sbyin dgug pa 'am/ srin po dgug pa 'am ro langs bslang ba 'am/ nags khrod du 'jug pa 'am/ ri la rgyu ba 'am/ grong khyer du

'jug pa 'am/ sman blta ba'i phyir 'jug pa 'am/ ral gri rig sngags 'chang nyid dam/ grub pa'i rig sngags 'chang nyid dam/ 'khor los sgyur ba nyid dam/ rgyal po 'thob pa 'am/ yul 'thob pa 'am yul gyi bdag po nyid dam/ dpung

chen po rab tu 'joms pa 'am/ bskrad pa 'am/ rgya mtshor 'jug pa de dag thams cad stsol bar 'gyur ro/ /dgos pa grub pa thams cad stsol bar 'gyur ro/ /ci ltar gang du 'tshal bar yongs su skyong bar 'gyur ro/ /mtshams ma mchis pa lnga rnams

'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /rtag tu bzlas brjod bgyis na/ sems can thams cad la lta ba sgrib pa dang bral ba dag pa zhes bgyi ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /mig sman sgrub par 'tshal bas/ des zla ba yar gyi ngo tshes brgyad la ldong ros

kyi mig sman zangs kyi snod kyi nang du stsal te/ tsan dan gyi dkyil 'khor bgyis la/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun du gzhag nas legs par khrus bgyis te gos gtsang ma bsgos nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs

dbang phyug gi mdun na daskyil mo dkrung bcas ste mchis nas bzlas brjod bgyi'o/ /don yod zhags pa'i phyag rgya'i mtshams bcings bas mtshams bcings bar bgyi'o/ /khro bo'i rgyal po lan bdun du bzlas par bgyi'o/ /
zas dkar gsum 'tshal bar bgyi'o/ /rigs kyi bu pho'am rigs kyi bu mo gang yang rung bas/ 'phags pa'i yan lag brgyad kyi bsnyen gnas la goms par bgyis nas bzlas brjod bgyi'o/ /bzlas brjod bgyis pa

tsam gyi mod la/ zangs kyi snod 'bar ba dang rlangs pa dang dbu ba 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de blangs nas mig la byugs na nam mkha' la rdzu 'phrul gyis mchis nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams

cad mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rnams mthong ba dang / rig sngags 'chang 'khor los sgyur ba chen por 'gyur ro/ /phug gi gnas phye ba thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /gter byung ba thams cad

mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /lha'i gnas thams cad kyi sgo phye ba mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /gang du 'tshal ba der mchi bar 'gyur ro/ /gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha za dang / gdon dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa dang / phas kyi

rgol ba dang / mi mdza' ba thams cad mi gda' bar 'gyur ro/ /tshes brgyad dam/ bcu bzhi 'am/ bcwa lnga la tshig gzhan mi smra bar 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun du skyil mo dkrung bcas te mchis nas/ lan stong rtsa

brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi'o/ /bzlas brjod bgyis pa tsam gyi mod la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug lha'i bdag nyid kyi rang bzhin gyi gzugs kyis mdun du mchis nas/ lag pa g.yas pa spyi bor gzhag pa dang / dri med

'phags kyi lta ba'i cho 'phrul zhes bgyi ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob cing / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gzigs pa'i by-in gyis brlabs bkod pa yang dag par lta ba snang ba zhes bya ba'i rdzu 'phrul thob nas/ tshe'i tshad lha'i bskal

pa stong du 'gyur ro/ /bdag nyid lha'i rang bzhin thob pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med kyis dam pa'i chos kyi gtam gleng bar mdzad

pa mthong par 'gyur ro/ /bde ba can na gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad bsru ba'i slad du/ lha'i gzugs kyis mdun na mchis par 'gyur ro/ /skra cung zad 'khyil bar yang 'gyur ro/ /pad ma

snang ba'i gzhal med khang zhes bgyi ba khang pa brtsegs ma'i gzhal med khang thob par 'gyur ro/ /de nas rang gi lus rdo rje sra ba bdag nyid kyi snying po'-i rang bzhin thob par 'tshal na/ rig sngags 'chang des spos chab des
bum pa bkang nas lan khri nyis stong bzlas brjod bgyis te/ byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun du nyin zhag gcig mchis par 'gyur bas khrus bgyi'o/ /khrus bgyis pa tsam

gyi mod la/ lus rdo rje las byung ba'i rang bzhin du 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad de la gzigs par 'gyur ro/ /tshe lha'i lo khrir 'gyur ro/ /gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / gdon thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro/ /lha

dang klu thams cad kyi dpon por 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten pa'i dgos pa bsgrub pa thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /dran pa tsam mam sems bskyed pa tsam gyi mod la gdon thams cad dang / brjed byed thams cad babs nas thams cad

smra bar 'gyur te/ bden pa 'am mi bden pa 'am yang dag pa 'am/ yang dag pa ma lags pa 'am/ skal ba dang ldan pa 'am skal ba dang mi ldan pa 'am/ byung ba 'am/ ma byung ba 'am/ 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa de

thams cad smra bar 'gyur ro/ /de la sogs te las bgyi ba thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /bran bzhin du las thams cad rtag tu bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /yang na 'jig rten thams cad so sor bsgral bar 'tshal ba 'am/ thams

cad dbang du gyur nas gzhag par 'tshal lam thams cad sems can dmyal ba 'am dud 'gro'i skye gnas sam gshin rje'i 'jig rten las thar bar bgyi bar 'tshal lam/ don yod ye shes bkod pa zhes bgyi ba'-i ting nge 'dzin 'thob

par 'tshal lam/ rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgrub par 'tshal lam/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i cho ga zhib mo bsgrub par 'tshal na/ rig sngags 'chang des gzugs brnyan so so ba bzhin du/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs

dbang phyug don yod pa'i gzugs su bgyis te/ ral pa'i thor tshugs dang ri dgas e na ya'i lpags pas brgyan pa/ phyugs bdag gi cha lugs 'chang ba/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ skyil mo dkrung ngam 'greng ba dang drung na nor

bzangs pus mo g.yas pa phab pa/ g.yon pa khro bo'i rgyal po gdong gyen du lta ba khro bo'i gzugs lag pa drug pa/ 'od dpag med kyi dbu rgyan thogs pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis klubs pa thams cad ring bsrel dang bcas par bgyi ste/ ri'-i

steng gi pad ma'i stan la mchis par bgyi'o/ /gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos te/ dus gsum du khrus bgyis na nyin zhag gcig mchis te/ rig sngags 'chang gis ba'i rnam lngas nye reg bgyi'o/ /chab dang yungs dkar gyi dbang bskur bas/

dbang bskur bar bgyi'o/ /snying rje chen pos gdungs pa'i sny-ing gis blta bar bgyi'o/ /gal te 'di lta bu'i cho gas mi bgyid na/ bklags pa tsam gyi mod la yang 'grub par 'gyur na/ bzlas brjod kyi las kyi cho gas lta

smos kyang ci 'tshal/ yang rig sngags 'chang gang zhig ga~M gA'i klung bye ba phrag brgyad bcu rtsa brgyad kyi bye ma dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la mchod par 'tshal lam/

blta bar 'tshal lam/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya chen po bskyed par 'tshal lam/ sems can thams cad dge ba'i rtsa ba la rab tu bzhag par 'tshal ba 'am thams cad kyi sgrib pa rnam par dag par bgyi bar 'tshal na/ rig sngags 'chang des dge

slong pha 'am/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen pha 'am/ dge bsnyen ma 'am/ rgyal po 'am/ btsun mo 'am/ gzhan su yang rung bas thams cad cho ga 'di bzhin bgyis te/ des ci 'byor pa'i gser las don yod pa'i zhags pa'i gzugs

brnyan bgyi'o/ /de nas kha shar phyogs su bstan te gzhag la gur kum gyi dkyil 'khor bgyi ste/ gru bzhi cha 'byes par li khris thig gdab par bgyi'o/ /dkyil 'khor dbus su pad ma'i phreng ba bgyi'o/ /pad ma'i

phreng ba'i dbus su ril ba spyi blugs dang bgrang phreng bzhag par bgyi'o/ /me tog sna tshogs kyis mdzes par bgyi'o/ /spos chab kyis bkang ba'i bum pa me tog ci 'byor pas legs par brgyan pa bzhi bzhag par bgyi'o/ /mchod yon

gyi snod lnga bzhag par bgyi'o/ /pog phor gyi snod lnga nas a ka ru'i bdug pas bdug par bgyi'o/ /dris bsgos pa'i mar me bcu drug sbar bar bgyi'o/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod par bgyi'o/ /me

tog dang / bdug pa dang / dri dang / phreng ba yang dbul bar bgyi'o/ /'jig rten dbang phyug gi mdun du skyil mo dkrung bcas te mchis nas don yod zhags pa'i phyag rgya bcings te/ bdag nyid la dbang bskur bar bgyi'o/ /khro bo'i rgyal po lan cig bzlas

brjod bgyi'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la dmigs pa yid la bgyis nas/ phyogs bcur yid kyis mchod cing phyag bgyi'o/ /bzlas brjod kyi phyag rgya bcings te bzlas brjod bgyi'o/ /bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad bgyis pa dang sa chen po

g.yo bar 'gyur ro/ /bdag nyid dga' bar gyur nas 'bar bar mthong ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyang / zhal mngon sum du ston pa nye bar ston par 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ral pa'i gseb 'bar

bar gyur nas/ legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /lan brgya rtsa brgyad pa lan gnyis bzlas brjod bgyis na/ grub pa chen po'i rtags ston par 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi phyag brkyang nas rig sngags

'chang gi spyi bor 'jog par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gzigs pa zhes bgyi ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ro/ /don yod zhags pa'i rig sngags 'chang bar 'gyur ro/ /nyi ma'i rtse na de bzhin gshegs pa de dag

kyang mthong bar gyur nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad ston par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /brgya rtsa brgyad pa lan gsum bzlas na 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs

dbang phyug gi gzugs skya reng 'char ka'i dus su mdun du mchis nas pad ma dri ma med pa zhes bgyi ba'-i zhags pa stsol bar 'gyur ro/ /grub pa thams cad stsol bar 'gyur ro/ /rgyal ba 'od dpag med kyang legs so

zhes bgyi ba stsol bar 'gyur ro/ /gang su yang rung bas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs mthong na/ de ni de bzhin gshegs pa drug khri la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur ro/ /de la lha thams cad dang /
tshangs pa la sogs te/ dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen po'i lha'i bu rnams rtag tu blta 'tshal bar 'gyur ro/ /nad thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /mchog thams cad yongs su rdzogs nas/ /

rtag tu rjes su 'brang zhing bsrung ba dang skyob pa dang sbed pa bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /sdig pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro// //'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po/ bam po brgyad pa/ des

ci 'byor pa'i gser las 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug don yod pa'i zhags pa byas la/ de nas zhal shar phyogs su bstan te gzhag la gur gum gyi dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa legs par mdzes pa byas te/ li khr-is thig

btab la dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su pad ma bri/ pad ma'i dbus su ril ba bri/ na ka ra dang bgrang phreng bri/ me tog sna tshogs bkram la bum pa spos chus bkang la/ me tog ci 'byor pas legs par brgyan pa bzhi gzhag /mchod yon gyi

snod lnga gzhag par bya zhing / pog phor lnga nas a ka ru'i bdug pas bdug par bya'o/ /spos sna bcu drug dang ldan pa'i til mar gyi mar me gtam ste/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod pa bya zhing / me tog dang / bdug

pa dang / dri dang phreng ba dag kyang dbul bar bya'o/ /'jig rten dbang phyug la mngon du phyogs te/ skyil mo krung bcas la don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya bcings la bdag nyid la dbang bskur ro/ /khro bo'i rgyal po lan cig

bzlas la phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yid la byas te yid kyis phyag byas la lus kyis kyang phyag byas te/ bzlas brjod kyi phyag rgya bcings la bzlas brjod bya'o/ /brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pas sa chen po g.yo bar

'gyur zhing bdag nyid snying dga' la 'bar bar snang ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad zhal nye bar ston par mdzad do/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi dbu ral pa'i gseb 'bar zhing legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byung ngo / /

brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pa gnyis pas ni/ dngos grub chen po'i mtshan ma ston to/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi phyag brkyang ste/ rig sngags 'chang gi mgo bo'i spyi bor 'jog par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa

thams cad la rnam par blta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags 'chang la don yod pa'i zhags pa 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /tho rangs de bzhin gshegs pa de dag g-i zhal ston par 'gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad ston

par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad gsum pas ni/ skya rengs shar ba'i dus kyi tshe/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rang gi gzugs kyis

mdun na bzhugs te/ pad ma'i dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i zhags pa sbyin par mdzad cing / dngos grub thams cad sbyin par mdzad do/ /rgyal ba 'od dpag med legs so zhes bya ba sbyin par mdzad do/ /gang la 'phags pa

spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi skur bstan pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa stong phrag drug bcu rtsa bzhi la dge ba'i rtsa ba skrun par 'gyur ro/ /lha thams cad dang tshangs pa la sogs pa dbang phyug dang dbang phyug chen po dang lha'i bu

rnams rtag tu lus ston par 'gyur ro/ /nad thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ba dang / mchog thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa dang / rtag tu phy-i bzhin 'brang zhing bsrung ba dang / skyab pa dang sba bar byed par 'gyur ro/ /sdig

pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas dngul las 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug don yod pa'i zhags pa'i gzugs snga ma bzhin du byas pa la/ tsan dan dkar po'i dkyil 'khor du tsan dan dkar po'i dri chab kyis

bkang ba gzhag par bya zhing / mchod yon gyi snod lnga gzhag par bya'o/ me tog sna tshogs pa bgram zhing / tsan dan dkar po'i bdug spos kyis bdugs te/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod par bya'o/ /

dri sna bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa'i t-il mar gyi mar me gtam par bya zhing / bdug spos kyi snod bzhi bcu bzhag par bgyi'o/ /khro bo'i rgyal po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas la rig sngags 'chang gtsang mas gos gtsang

ma bgos te/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya lan bdun bcing ngo / /bzlas brjod kyi phyag rgya byas te/ skyil mo dkrung du 'dug la lag pa g.yon pa'i mdzub mo brkyang ba pad ma'i tshul du byas la/ bzlas brjod lan

brgya rtsa brgyad bya'o/ /lan brgya rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang / shar phyogs nas legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra grag par 'gyur zhing / bdag nyid dga' bar snang ngo / /rgyal po blon po dang btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa dbang du gyur te/ ming brjod pas

dpag tshad stong nas 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /thams cad bgyi ba ci mchis zhes bran bzhin du 'gyur ro/ /gang bsgo ba de byed par 'gyur ro/ /de nyid bla mar 'gyur zhing cher brjod par 'gyur ro/ /brgya rtsa brgyad lan gnyis bzlas pas brgya byin dang /

tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / rlung lha la sogs pa dbang du 'gyur zhing / bsgo ba bzhin byed par 'gyur ro/ /gang bsgo ba byed par 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po bzhi 'khor gnod sbyin gyi tshogs

dang bcas pa rnams dbang du 'gyur ro/ /brgya rtsa brgyad lan gsum du bzlas pas nyi ma dang zla ba nam mkha' las 'bab cing mdun na 'dug par 'gyur ro/ /mtshan mo'i lha dang nam mkha'i lha 'ongs nas mdun na 'dug par 'gyur zhing dbang

du 'gyur ro/ /thams cad ci bgyi zhes pa'i bya ba byed cing 'dug par 'gyur ro/ /brgya rtsa lan bzhi bzlas pas/ klu thams cad dbang du byas par 'gyur ro/ /rgya mtsho'i klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang / nye dga' bo la sogs pa'i bar thams cad

dbang du byas par 'gyur ro/ /zangs las byas pa'i 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug don yod pa'i zhags pa la/ tsan dan dkar po'i dkyil 'khor byas te/ me tog dmar po bkram la/ bdug spos kyi snod bzhi nas bdug par bya

zhing / mar gyi mar me lnga bcu rtsa gnyis gtam par bya'o/ /mchod yon gyi snod bzhi gzhag la/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod par bya'o/ /khro bo'i rgyal po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig rjes su dran par bya'o/ /don yod pa'i

zhags pa'i phyag rgya lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bcing bar bya'o/ /ras la bris pa'i sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar dkyil mo dkrung du 'dug ste/ sems can thams cad la dmigs pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yid la bya'o/ /phyogs

bzhir byams pa'i lta bas blta bar bya'o/ /sems can dmyal ba pa dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / lha ma yin dang / yi dgas kyi yul thams cad yid la bya'o/ /sems can dmyal ba pa chen po brgyad yid la bya zhing snying rje'i sems

kyis blta bar bya'o/ /bzlas brjod kyi phyag rgya pad ma'i tshul du bcings te bzlas brjod bya'o/ /brgya rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang / phyogs bzhi g.yo zhing sgra grag par 'gyur la/ dmyal ba pa'i sems can de dag thams cad yongs su grol bar 'gyur

ro/ /dmyal ba'i sgo thams cad bcad par 'gyur zhing / bcom pa dang thal bar brlag par 'gyur ro/ /dmyal ba'i sems can de dag bde 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /bdag nyid kyang byang chub kyi mthar thug gi bar du dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal gyi

tshor ba thams cad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro/ /lus kyang mtshan bzang pos brgyan par 'gyur zhing / sems can gang dag gis mthong ba de dag thams cad phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro/ /brgya rtsa brgyad lan gnyis bzlas brjod byas pas

ni/ sa'i 'og gi sems can mun gnag snang ba dang bral ba de dag don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i mthus mun gnag dang bral bar 'gyur zhing / 'od zer 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /yongs su grol ba'i sems can de dag 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs

dbang phyug gi gnas su brdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhing rga ba dang / 'chi ba spangs par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub kyi mthar thug gi bar du kun nas mthu 'phags pa dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob par 'gyur zhing / tshe bskal par thub par 'gyur

ro/ /shi nas bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skye bar 'gyur ro/ /byang chub kyi mthar thug gi bar du/ de nyid kyi zhabs drung na gnas par 'gyur zhing / mya ngan thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /tsan dan dkar po dang / gla rtsi dang / ga pur

dang / spos kyi rigs sna tshogs gzhan dag phye ma zhib mor byas te/ yang legs par btags la/ kun tu ru dang / sra rtsi pog dang / gan d+ha ra sa dang / chu dang lhan cig sbyar te/ sha kha ra btab la/ legs par btags pa las 'phags pa spyan ras

gzigs dbang phyug don yod pa'i zhags pa sor bzhi pa'i tshad du byas te/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa ral pa'i thor tshugs dang / e ne ya'i lpags pas gzhag pa/ phyugs bdag gi cha lugs 'dzin pa/ phyag bzhi gcig na pad ma thogs/

gnyis pa na zhags pa thogs/ gsum pa na gsal shing thogs pa/ bzhi pa dbugs 'byin pa/ gdan pad ma 'od kyi dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gis brgyan par bya ste/ g.yas su 'phags ma sgrol ma/ g.yon du dri med 'gro bya'o/ /'jig rten dbang

phyug gi 'og tu ni khro bo'i rgyal po'o/ /gdong du ni 'od dpag med do/ /de nas rigs sngags 'chang gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos te/ dus gsum du khrus bya zhing gos sum phrugs su bgos la tshes brgyad nas tshes bcwa lnga'i bar du dus gsum du

bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad bya'o/ /spos sna tshogs kyis dkyil 'khor byug par bya zhing / mtshon sna lngas bri bar bya ste/ dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su don yod pa'i zhags pa dang / rig sngags kyi lha pus mo btsugs te gyen du lta ba bri bar bya'o/ /grwa bzhir

dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / gshin rje dang / chu lha bri bar bya'o/ /sgo bzhi'i cha 'byes par bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor khor yug tu pad ma bri bar bya'o/ /grwa bzhir spos kyis bkang ba bzhag par bya'o/ /sgo bzhir dri dang gtor ma dang bum pa

bkang ba gzhag go/ dkar gsum gyi gtor ma dang mchod yon gyi snod brgyad gzhag go/ me tog sna tshogs pa bkram par bya zhing / tsan dan gyi bdug pa dbul bar bya'o/ /spos sna brgya nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang ldan pa'i til mar gyi mar me gtam

par bya/ 'phan gdugs bzang po sna tshogs pas legs par brgyan par bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dkyil 'khor du zhal shar phyogs su bstan la mchod par bya'o/ /ras kyi tshon skud sna lnga pa/

srid du khru bcu drug pa/ thor to cig tu gser gyi yang mig thor to cig tu mu tig gi chun bskor btags te/ sbrul 'khyil pa bzhin du bskyil la dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bzhag ste/ gtsang mas gos gtsang mas g.yog par bya'o/ /rig sngags 'chang

dkyil 'khor la mngon du phyogs te/ skyil mo dkrung du 'dug la/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya lan sum bcu rtsa gnyis bcing ba byas la bdag bsrung ngo / /khro bo'i rgyal po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas par byas la/ dkyil 'khor bcing ba dang /

phyogs bcing ba yang bya'o/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang gis bzhin 'dzum gyis brgyan par byas la/ bzlas brjod kyi phyag rgya bcings te/ mi smra bar yungs kar 'bru re re nas bzlas brjod stong rtsa brgyad brjod nas ras kyi srad bu'i steng du gtor bar

bya ste/ stong rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang ras kyi srad bu de 'bar bar 'gyur zhing / 'od zer sna tshogs 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byung bar 'gyur te/ rig sngags 'chang legs so legs so/ /khyod kyis don yod pa'i zhags pa

grub kyis long la dgos pa thams cad byos shig /khyod kyi yid bzhin gyi nor bu chen po gnyis don yod pa'i zhags pa pad ma 'grub pas/ 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dgos pa thams cad sgrub par 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa spyan

ras gzigs dbang phyug de yang 'bar bar 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten dbang phyug gi sku las spos kyi sprin chen po 'byung bar 'gyur te/ spos des dpag tshad tsam du khyab par byed do/ /gang la dri mnams pa tsam gyis nad thams cad dang

bral bar 'gyur/ sdig pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur/ sdug bsngal gyi sgrib pa thams cad dang / byad dang / dug dang / dbyig dug dang / bye ma'i sbyor ba rnams 'jig par 'gyur ro/ /lus thams cad dri ma med par 'gyur ro/ /de nas rig

sngags 'chang gis yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i zhags pa de blangs la gab tshe bzang po'i nang du bcug ste/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs drung du gzhag par bya'o/ /nam dgos pa byung ba'i tshe/ gtsang mas khrus legs par byas

ste blangs bar bya zhing dgos par bya'o/ /nyin re bzhin dus gsum du mchod par bya'o/ /rig sngags 'chang de yang nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur zhing lus yongs su dag pa dang / sngon gyi rig sngags 'chang rnams dang lhan cig rtse zhing

thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro/ /tshe lo stong thub par 'gyur te/ shi nas bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skal ba mnyam pa rnams kyi nang du pad ma'i snying po las rdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi 'khor los sgyur

bar 'gyur ro/ /byang chub kyi snying po'i mthar thug gi bar du tshe bskal pa brgya phrag stong thub par 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug de yang gang gis mthong ba tsam gyis mtshams med pa lnga la sogs pa zad par 'gyur ro/ /sna ma'i

me tog la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas la/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la re re nas dbul bar bya ste/ lan brgya rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang rgyal po dang blon po dang btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa dbang du 'gyur te/ rang nyid nor dang bcas dbyig dang bcas 'bru

dang bcas bran pho dang bcas bran mo dang bcas te las byed par 'gyur ro/ /sna ma'i me tog rnying pa de btus la bla rtsi dang / pri yang ku dang / rgya spos dang / ru sta dang / gur kum dang / spang spos dang / swa ma ka dang / sprig ka dang / na la dang / bo la dang / yungs kar

rnams zhib du btags pa'i phye ma char pa'i chu dang sbyar ba'i ri lu ni dug med par byed pa'i mchog /pad ma zhes bya ste/ thogs mar grags pa dang dpal du byed nad thams cad sel ba dang rims nad thams cad nye bar sel bar byed do/ /

btsog shu dang / 'bras dang / me dbal dang / rkang shu dang / phol mig dang / lhog pa dang / de thams cad la ni bskus na bde bar zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes gsung ngo / /nad de dag thams cad la khrus byas na sdig pa bsel to zhes thub pas gsungs so/ /

tshe sbyin par byed/ rgyal po dag yul sbyin par byed do/ /thig le byas te g.yul ngor song na thams cad las rtag tu rgyal ba dang bud med rnams dga' ba dang dbang du 'gyur bar byed pa'i mchog yin no/ /byad 'joms shing dug dang / dbyig dug dang /

phye ma'i dug dang / gsang sngags kyi sbyor ba dag kyang de bzhin no/ /zas za ba dang khrus byed pa na thig le'i byug pa rtag tu byas na/ de thams cad las grol ba rnams bde bar thar bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes 'jig rten dbang phyug gsung ngo / /glad

pa'i nad mi bzad pa la ni byug par bya'o/ /mig na ba la ni m-ig sman gyi thur mas so/ /so na ba la ni khar mur ro/ /lto na ba la ni chu gron dang ngo / /rtsib logs na ba la ni mar dang byug go/ yan lag dang nying lag na ba la ni bsku bar bya'o/ /

dbang du bya ba ni lag mthil bsku bas so/ /nad tshabs che ba la ni sku mnye dang khrus bya'o/ /gnod sbyin gyi gdon bsal ba la ni sna nas btang ba'i las bya'o/ /bdug pas ni gdon thams cad las rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro/ /

rgyas thebs pa la ni 'tshogs mar thig le bya'o/ /snying na ba la ni chu dron dang lan tsha bsres pa'o/ /khyim zhi bar bya ba la ni 'bras yos dang gsum sbyar bas zh-i ba chen por 'gyur ro/ /thams cad du lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas nas so/ /'thab pa dang /

rtsod pa rnams la ni ba lang g-i lc-i bas dkyil 'khor byas la me tog bkram ste/ dr-i chus bkang ba bzhi gzhag cing 'o mas bkang ba bzhi dang / mchod yon gyi snod bzhi dang / pog phor bzhi gzhag ste/ a ka ru dang du ru kas bdug go/ gu gul la

lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te bdug par bya'o/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la dri chab kyis mchod par bya'o/ /khro bo'i rgyal po yungs kar la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te phyogs bzhir gtor bar bya'o/ /don yod pa'i

zhags pa'i snying po lan dgu bcu rtsa gcig bzlas na/ 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa rnams la smra ba'i mchog tu 'gyur ro/ /g.yul 'gyed pa las rgyal bar 'gyur ro/ /rang gi dpung dang gzhan gyi dpung yan lag bzhi pa thams cad las rgyal

bar 'gyur ro/ /gal te brgya byin rang dang / lha ma yin lhan cig pas kyang ma yin na/ mi rnams kyis lta ci smos/ brgya byin dgug par 'dod na pad ma la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ brgya byin gyi ming nas brjod la 'phags pa spyan

ras gzigs dbang phyug la re re nas dbul bar bya zhing dri chab kyang dbul lo/ /gu gul dang mar dang yungs dkar la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ shing arka'i me sbar la tshes bcu bzhi la sbyin sreg bya'o/ /bzlas brjod

kyi cho ga rdzogs pa dang brgya byin lha'i dbang po 'ongs nas mdun du 'dug ste/ bsgo ba bzhin byed cing thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro/ /brgya byin gyi go 'phang ma gtogs pa gang blangs pa de sbyin par byed de de ni sems mi bzod do/ /tshangs pa

rdog pas mnan te lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas na brgya rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang / tshangs pa rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na 'dug ste/ mchog thams cad sbyin par byed do/ /yid la ci 'dod pa sgrub par byed do/ /gu gul la lan dgu bcu bzlas te/

khyab 'jug la bdug cing chu dang yungs dkar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te spyi bor gtor na/ khyab 'jug rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na 'dug cing las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro/ /gzugs sna tshogs kyi bar du ston to/ /

hi ran n+ya ka shi bu la yang sbyin par byed cing khyab 'jug chen po'i stobs kyi shugs dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /dbang phyug chen po'i zhal mthong bar 'dod na/ rna ba g.yas par lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ yungs dkar la

lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas nas spyi bor gtor ro/ /gu gul gyi bdug pas bdug cing / arka'i chu la lan bdun bzlas te dbul bar bya'o/ /de nas dbang phyug chen po'i gzugs 'gul bar 'gyur zhing legs so zhes bya

bar sgra 'byung ngo / /de nas dbang phyug chen po rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na 'dug par 'gyur zhing / rang gi tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro/ /'dod pa'i mchog thams cad sbyin par mdzad do/ /mchog

gang 'dod pa thams cad sbyin par byed do/ /nag po chen po dgug par 'dod pas gu gul la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ khrag dang chang dbul bar bya zhing / yungs dkar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas nas/ nag po chen po'i steng du

gtor na khrugs par 'gyur te/ bran bzhin du las thams cad byed par 'gyur zhing / gar mngags pa der 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /'khor gyi tshogs dang bcas pa dbang du 'gyur ro/ /gnod sbyin gyi gnas thams cad kyi sgo 'bye bar 'gyur zhing gang 'dod

pa byed do/ /thams cad byams par 'gyur zhing las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro/ /mi smra bar mtshan mo'i dus mtshams gsum du lan nyi shu rtsa re re bzlas na mtshan mo'i lha 'khor dang bcas pa dang / mtshan mo rgyu ba dang / nyin par rgyu ba'i

lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa thams cad dbang du 'gyur te/ las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro/ /thams cad rang gi gzugs kyis rtag

tu mdun na nye bar gnas so/ /mtshan mo longs spyod par gzhal med khang thams cad sbyin par byed do/ /gtsang ma gos gtsang ma bgos te/ khrus legs par byas nas bden par smra zhing byams pa'i sems nye bar gzhag nas sems

can thams cad la rtag tu brtse ba dang snying rje chen pos lhag par dmigs te bzlas brjod rtag tu bya'o/ /bzlas brjod kyi cho ga rim par phye ba'o/ /de nas rtag tu las thams cad byed pa dge ba zhi ba rgyas pa drag shul spyod pa bsrung

ba nad thams cad sel ba/ byad 'jig pa/ dbang du byed pa/ sbyin sreg gi cho ga bshad par bya'o/ /khyim srung bar 'dod pas arka'i yam sreg sh-ing dang / pad ma dang / yungs mar bsres pa las sbyin sreg lan brgya rtsa brgyad

byas te/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas la/ khro bo'i rgyal po lan bdun bzlas brjod byas na/ khyim chen po bsrung bar 'gyur ro/ /'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / khrag khrug

thams cad dang / phyir rgol ba dang / mi mdza' ba thams cad dang / rims thams cad dang / yams kyi nad dang / nad 'go ba thams cad dang / gdon thams cad dang / mu ge'i gnod pa dang / mi ngas dang / skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang /

bu mo'-i mi ngas thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /lha thams cad kyang bsrung ba dang skyab pa dang sba bar byed par 'gyur ro/ /dbang phyug dang dbang phyug chen po yang rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang bar 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa spyan

ras gzigs dbang phyug kyang rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par sku ston par bzhed par 'gyur ro/ /sbyin sreg gi mar dang / yungs kar dang / gu gul gyi sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas na/ yul dang / yul 'khor dang / grong khyer dang / yul

gru dang / ri khrod dang / ljongs rnams zhi ba chen por 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyan sngar zla ba nya la me tog dkar po dang / g+han d+ha pri yang ku dang / rgya spos rnams yungs mar dang bsres te sbyin sreg stong

rtsa brgyad byas na rgyal po dang / blon po btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa dang / yul gru dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / rta dang / glang po che dang / ba lang dang / ma he rnams dbang du 'gyur ro/ /shi a pa marga'i yam sreg shing zho dang

sbrang rtsi dang / mar bsres pa dang / me tog dkar po rnams las lan brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg byas na yul gru stong 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyan sngar zho dang sbrang rtsi dang mar bsres pa dang pad ma'i

sdong po'i yam sreg shing rnams las brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg byas na mtshan mo zad pa dang ti na ra brgyad brgya 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /me tog ku mud dang / pad ma sdong bu dang / rtsa ba dang / 'dab mar bcas pa dang / yungs dkar

bsres te shing seng ldeng gi me sbar la sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad byas na/ log 'dren thams cad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro/ /zla ba yar gyi ngo tshes brgyad la smyung ba bgyi ste/ gtsang mas khrus legs par

byas la gos dkar po bgos te tsan dan dang pri yang ku'i shing dang / 'bras yos dang / mar dang / yungs dkar bsres pa'i sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas na nam phyed kyis dus su gnod sbyin mo 'ongs nas zong lnga stong sbyin par

'gyur ro/ /zla ba mar gyi ngo tshes bcu bzhi la nyin zhags gcig smyung ba byas te/ rgya mtshor 'gro ba'i chu klung gi 'gram du song la/ shing bil ba'i me sbar te/ shing bil ba'i me tog dang mar bsres pa stong rtsa brgyad sbyin bsreg byas na/ de'i 'og tu

gnod sbyin mo thams cad kyis brgyan pa 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /nam phyed na rin po che'i za ma tog thogs nas 'ong bar 'gyur te rig sngags 'chang des blang bar bya'o/ /gdong du mig blta bar bya'o/ /yang brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas

brjod byas pa dang rkang pa'i drung du snod bor nas btud de rig sngags 'chang 'gum mo zhes zer ro/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang gis khro bo'i rgyal po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bya'o/ /de nas gang gi tshe dgos pa byung ba de'i tshe

nam phyed la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas na gnod sbyin mo 'ong bar 'gyur te/ dgos pa thams cad byed cing bran bzhin du las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro/ /zla ba mar gyi ngo tshes bcu bzhi la gang na gter yod pa der song ste

stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas la/ gtor ma'i cho ga yang gzhag par bya zhing / 'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa la mchod pa byas la sna ma'i me tog dang / pad ma'i 'dab ma dang / yungs kar dang / mar bsres pa rnams las

sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas te/ chu dang / yungs kar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas nas sa la brdabs na/ de'i 'og tu gter thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur te/ blangs la dkon mchog gsum gyi sku skal dbul bar bya zhing lhag ma rang

gis blang bar bya'o/ /ba ru ra'i shing gi me sbar la til dang / 'bras so ba dang / mar bsres pa las sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas na/ rgyal po btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa dang dpung gi yan lag bzhi dang bcas pa dang / nor dang / 'bru dang

bcas pa dang / dbyig dang / gser dang / bcas pa dbang du 'gyur te/ ji srid 'tsho'i bar du gnas par 'gyur ro/ /yungs kar dkar po dang / tsam pa ka'i me tog dang / pad ma'i yam sreg shing dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar bsres pa'i sbyin bsreg stong rtsa

brgyad byas na yul thams cad dbang du 'gyur zhing / bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dbang du 'gyur ro/ /'bras phub lan tshwa dang ldan pa las lan dgu bcu rtsa gcig sbyin bsreg byas na/ rigs bzhi'i 'jig rten

dbang du 'gyur ro/ /a ga rda'i shing gis me sbar la sbrang rtsi dang mar bsres pa dang / arka'i me tog las sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad byas la/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod pa byas na/ nyin re bzhin ti na ra brgya

'thob par 'gyur ro/ /pa la sha'i yam bsreg shing dang 'bras yos las sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas na/ gser brgya phrag stong thob par 'gyur ro/ /dkon mchog gsum la mchod pa bya zhing bgo bsha byas na yang 'byung bar

'gyur ro/ /tshes bcwa lnga zla ba nya ba la smyung ba byas te/ rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i chu klung ngam/ chu klung chen po'i nang rkad pa nub tsam du zhugs te/ lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas nas/ yungs kar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas

na khros pas chu klung de la brdab par bya'o/ /de nas chu'i nang nas bu mo zhig byung nas rin po che mang po zhig sbyin par byed de blangs la phyed kyis dkon mchog gsum la mchod par bya zhing / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang

phyug la yang mchod par bya'o/ /tshes bcwa lnga zla ba nya ba la smyung ba byas te/ nam phyed na bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod pa byas nas/ a pa mar ga'i yam sreg shing dang / sbrang rtsi dang /

mar dang / sra rtsi pog sreg pa la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas la/ rang gi ming gis sbyin bsreg stong byas na sdig pa sgrib pa thams cad las grol bar 'gyur zhing nad thams cad dang / gnod pa thams cad las grol bar 'gyur ro/ /

phyir rgol ba thams cad dang / mi mdza' ba thams cad 'jig par 'gyur ro/ /shing arka dang / til dang / yungs kar dang / gu gul dang / mar bsres pa la sbyin sreg byas na/ zhi ba chen por 'gyur ro/ /'bras yos dang / 'o ma dang / mar dang / yungs kar

dang / tsan dan dkar po bsres la sbyin sreg lan brgya rtsa brgyad byas na rgyas pa dang mchog tu dge bar 'gyur ro/ /tshes bcu bzhi la ka ra bi ra'i me tog dang / lan tsha sna bdun bsres pa dang / shing tsher ma can gyi yam sreg shing yungs kar la bsres pa

drag shul spyod par bya'o/ /char mi 'bab pa'i tshe pad ma dang tsan dan dang / yungs dkar dang / mar bsres pa la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te/ sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad byas nas khro bo'i gsang sngags lan bdun bzlas na ji sr-id 'dod pa de

srid du char gyi rgyun chen po 'bab par 'gyur ro/ /thal ba de blangs la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te nam mkha' la gtor na char ha cang ches pa zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /phyogs bzhir gtor na mtshams chen po bcad par 'gyur ro/ /sprin la sngon

du phyogs te gtor na rlung dang sprin dang / ser ba rnams 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /gzhan gyi sde gnon pa ni t-il dang 'bras so ba'i sbyin sreg gis so/ /pha rol gyi dpung zlog pa ni sa bon bdun gyi sbyin sreg gis so/ /phug sgrub pa ni shing

arka'i sbyin sreg g-is so/ /arka'i lo ma dang / mar bsres pa'i sbyin sreg byas na phug gi sgo thams cad 'byed par 'gyur ro/ /nags su 'gro ba'i tshe ku mu da dang / rgya spos dang / yungs kar dang / mar bsres pas nags

kyi phug gi sgo thams cad 'byed par 'gyur zhing sman gyi dngos po thams cad rang bzhin du gnas par 'gyur ro/ /shing pa la sha'i me sbar te na le sham brgya stong sbyin sreg byas nas/ brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang /

dbang phyug chen po dang / nyi ma 'ongs nas mdun du 'dug par 'gyur ro/ /sna ma'i me tog dang / kar ni kA ra'i me tog dang / ud pal rnams mar dang bsres pa las sbyin sreg brgya stong byas na/ zla ba dang nyi ma 'ongs nas mchog sbyin zhing lus la

'od zer btang nas nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /a shwad thas yam sreg shing byas la/ shu ti dang / nye'u shing dang / ar ka dang / tsan dan dang / yungs kar dang / nas dang / mar bsres pa las nyi ma bdun gyi dus mtshams gsum du sbyin sreg nyi shu rtsa

gcig byas nas rgyal po btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa dbang du 'gyur ro/ /gdon dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po thams cad chad pas bcad na 'bras so ba dang / yungs kar dang / lan tshwa'i sbyin sreg bgyis te/ thams cad la don yod

pa'i zhags pa bcings bar bya zhing khro bo'i phyag rgya dang gsang sngags lhan cig rjes su dran par bya'o/ /sbyin sreg gi cho ga'o// // de nas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po cho ga'i rgyal po chen po ras kyi sku gzugs mthong ba tsam gyi mod la mnar

med pa'i mthar thug pa dang / mtshams med pa lnga byed pa byung bar 'gyur ba bshad par bya ste/ ras khru do gru bzhi lham pa kha tshar ma chad pa skra med pa thag ran bzang ba/ shin du dkar ba/ shin tu sbyangs pa la ri mo mkhan mi smra ba'i dka'

thub can bsnyen gnas la gnas pa/ gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos pa/ zas dkar gsum za ba/ dus gsum du khrus byas pa/ lhag ma ma yin pa'i tshon rtsi snod sar par gzhag ste/ pir sar pas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs

dbang phyug bzhengs pa 'am bzhugs pa 'am skyil mo dkrung du bzhugs pa bri bar bya ste/ ral pa'i thor tshugs kyis brgyan pa/ e ne ya'i lpags pa bsnams pa/ phyugs bdag gi cha lugs 'chang ba/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan

pa/ phyag bcu drug pa zhal zhi ba spyan phye ba/ dbu rgyan la rgyal ba 'od dpag med bzhugs pa/ zhal g.yas pa'i thor tshugs la zla tshes kyis brgyan pa/ phyag gnyis rdo rje'i thal mo sbyar ba las gyen du pad ma'i tshul du bya'o/ /phyag

gnyis ma thur du kun tu zhal gyi phyag rgya bya'o/ /phyag gnyis bzlas brjod kyi phyag rgya byas la mdzub mo g.yas pa brkyang ste/ pad ma'i tshul du byas la bar na bgrang phreng 'dzin pa bya'o/ /phyag gnyis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag

rgya bya'o/ /phyag gcig na rtse gsum pa/ gnyis pa na pad ma/ gsum pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i glegs bam/ bzhi pa na don yod pa'i zhags pa/ zhags pa tha mal pa 'dra ba/ lnga pa dbugs 'byin pa/ drug pa na ril ba spyi blugs/ bdun pa

na rin po che sna tshogs kyis bkang ba'i snod/ brgyad pa na me tog sna tshogs kyi snod thogs par bya zhing / 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa sku me tog sna tshogs kyis bkra bas mdzes par bya'o/ /ri po ta la'i khang pa brtsegs pa shin tu

mdzes pa/ gru bzhi lham pa/ ka ba bzhi zug pa/ khri 'phang stegs bu mdzes pa dang ldan pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyis mdzes par brgyan pa/ pad ma'i phreng bas mdzes par byas pa/ rdo rje'i phreng bas brgyan pa/ me tog sna tshogs dang chu shing gi

yal gas mdzes par byas la/ g.yas logs kyi steng na nyi ma/ g.yon logs na zla ba/ gnas gtsang ma'i rigs kyi lha'i bu dag lag na me tog sna tshogs mang po thogs te/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed pa bya'o/ /ri pad ma

'dra ba zhig snying pos mdzes par byas shing / sdong po dang ldan pa/ mtshos mdzes par byas pa/ mtsho nyas gang zhing chu srin ma ka ra dang / ngang pa dang bzhad dang shang shang te'u dang / ngur bas brgyan pa/ nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyis legs par brgyan pa'i

ri de'-i steng du pad ma'i gdan dang seng ge'i khri bya'o/ /g.yas phyogs kyi phyi rol khang pa'i gnas su dbang phyug bya'o/ /g.yon du dbang phyug chen po rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan par bya'o/ /nang gi gnas su 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs

dbang phyug go/ g.yas su 'phags ma sgrol ma lus btud de 'dzem bag dang bcas pa bya'o/ /g.yon du dri med 'gro lag pa dbugs 'byin pa dang nor bzangs pus mo gtsugs par bya'o/ /pad ma'i snying po'-i dbus kyi

gnas su khro bo'i rgyal po khros pa'i gzugs can/ lag pa bzhi pa'-i lag na mtshon cha thogs pa ste/ zhags pa dang / dbyug to dang / rtse gsum dang / pad ma'o/ /pad ma'i gdan la skyil mo dkrung phyed bcas pa lus cung zad btud pa/

mgo'i steng g.yas g.yon du drang srong bstod rabs byed pa bya'o/ /de nas 'og gi g.yas g.yon du rdo rje'i zom chen po/ lag na rdo rje'i tshogs mang po 'dug pa dang / gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / rlung lha dang / dbang po dang /

lha'i tshogs dag bya'o/ /g.yas phyogs kyi mtsho dang / ri'i bar du brgya byin dang tshangs pa bya'o/ /g.yon phyogs su rgyal po chen po bzhi go cha bgos pa bya'o/ /de'i 'og tu pad ma'i rigs mdzes ma lag pa 'brel pa

bya'o/ /lha mo dpal chen mo dang / dbyangs ldan ma dang / 'jigs byed ma dang / mtshan mo'i lha dang / sa'i lha mo dang / lo tog gi lha mo bya'o/ /dbang phyug gi drung du khro gnyer can bya'o/ /dbang phyug chen po'i drung du gos dkar mo'o/ /ri dang / pho nya mo'i

bar du srin mo ral gcig ma'o/ /ri'i 'khor yug tu gru bzhi rin po che sna bdun gyis spras pa bya zhing / ljon shing dang / lcug ma sna tshogs dang / me tog gis brgyan cing / mtshe'u mdzes pa/ me tog sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa dang / seng ge dang / stag gis

gang ba dang / klu'i phru gu dang / grul bum dag bya'o/ /g.yon du gsang ba pa lnga bya'o/ /'og tu klu'i rgyal po chen po lnga bya'o/ /thams cad brag gi stan dang / lag na rin po che'i me tog gi phor pa thogs te/ bcom ldan 'das la blta bar

bya'o/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs kyi drung du rig sngags 'chang pus mo gtsugs te/ lag na me tog dang / pog phor thogs pa bcom ldan 'das la blta bar bya'o/ /steng gi bang rim du thub pa chen po rgyal ba 'od

dpag med dang / shAkya'-i rgyal po dang / 'jig rten dbang po'i rgyal po bya'o/ /ras kyi sku gzugs 'di mthong ba tsam gyi mod la/ tshe rabs brgya stong du mnar med pa bsags pa dang / mtshams med pa lnga'i las byas pa de dag thams cad

'jig par 'gyur/ rnam par 'jig par 'gyur zhing / sems can de dag thams cad kyang yongs su grol bar 'gyur na/ sems can dag pa rnams lta ci smos/ dad pas mos pa rnams dang / dkon mchog gsum mchod pa don du gnyer ba de dag ni/ tshe

'di nyid la 'bras bu che ba dang / phan yon mang po dag tu shes par bya'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ga~M` gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag drug bcu rtsa bzhi'i drung du dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur zhing / de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang

ldan par 'gyur ro/ /ras kyi sku gzugs 'di mthong ba ni 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug don yod pa'i zhags pa'i gzungs kyi snying po dngos su mthong ba yin no/ /ras kyi sku gzugs 'di mthong ba tsam gyis 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs

dbang phyug dgongs par 'gyur zhing sku yang ston par 'gyur ro/ /nyams thags pa tsam gyi mod la sku ston par 'gyur zhing mchog thams cad sbyin par 'gyur ro/ /don yod pa'i zhags pa'i gzungs kyi snying po 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /nad kyis

thebs pa dang / nad tshabs chen pos gzir ba dang / nad sna tshogs dang / sdug bsngal brgya stong gis dkrugs pa de dag thams cad kyis mthong ba tsam gyi mod la/ nad thams cad dang / sdug bsngal thams cad dang / gdon thams cad yongs su

grol bar 'gyur zhing / sgrib pa dang / nad dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gtogs pa dag kyang / mthong ba tsam gyi mod la yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro/ /ras kyi sku gzugs 'di 'khor mang pos mchod pa dang / bkur

sti chen po dang / sil snyan skrol ba mang po dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan gyis legs par brgyan par bya ste/ grong khyer chen po 'am/ rgyal po'i pho brang ngam/ gtsug lag khang ngam/ ljongs sam/ khyim 'am/ grong du zhugs nas ras kyi

sku gzugs bzhugs pa tsam gyi mod la/ 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'thab mo dang / khrag khrug dang / mu ge'i dgon pa dang / mi ngas dang / rang gi dpung dang / gzhan gyi dpung gi 'j-igs pa zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang /

sha za dang / srul po dang / lus srul po dang / skem byed dang / grib gnon zhi bar 'gyur zhing / bde ba dang / lo legs pa dang / dga' ba dang / mi mang po bde ba mang bar 'gyur ro/ /dga' ba dang yid bde ba mang bar 'gyur ro/ /pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi rjes su

'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /'di mthong ba tsam gyis thams cad bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skye bar 'gyur ro/ /bskal pa stong phrag bdun bcu'i tshe rabs su tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro/ /pad ma'i 'od dri ma med cing rnam par dag pa'i rgyal po

zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ma thob pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /pad ma rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los bsgyur ba nyid 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /ri mo'i sku gzugs

bsgrub pa'i cho ga dang cho ga zhib mo'o// // de nas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i cho ga zhib mo chen po'i dkyil 'khor bshad par bya ste/ chu klung gi 'gram 'am/ pad ma'i 'tshe'u 'am/ ud pa la'i tshe'u 'am/ me tog gi bskyed mos tshal lam/

'bras bu'i kun dga' ra ba 'am/ khang bzang sa gzhi dag cing sa gzhi yongs su sbyangs pa/ rtswa dang shing bal dang / skra dang / phub ma dang / sol ba dang / phyag dar gyi phung po dang / gyo mo dang shing dang / bong ba dang / gseg ma dang / thod pa'i rus pas gang ba rnams

spangs pa'i sa gzhi'i phyogs na mtshe'u dang / 'bab chu dang / 'bab chu byang phyogs nas 'bab pa dang / nye ba na chu yod cing sh-in tu mdzes pa/ lho phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / shar phyogs gang na ljon shing gis mdzes par byas pa/

gang nyams dga' ba/ kha dog dang / gzi by-in du ldan pa'i gnas de lta bu rnyed nas chu dang yungs kar la bzlas te/ kun tu gtor ro/ /sa gzh-i de lta bu sbyang ba ni mchog yin no/ /khro bo'i rgyal po yungs kar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te/

phyogs bzh-ir gtor na/ kun nas dpag tshad brgya tshun chad phyogs bcings pa dang / dkyil 'khor bc-ing ba dang / mtshams bc-ing ba byas par 'gyur ro/ /sdang ba thams cad dang / bgegs dang / log 'dren thams cad skad cig kyang mi gnas par

phyogs bzhir byer te 'dong ngo / /srog chags sdang ba dang / sdang ba'i sems can dang / sdang ba'i gcan gzan khro bo gang yin pa de dag thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur zhing lha thams cad srung bar 'gyur ro/ /gnas kyi phyogs der mkhas pas dkyil

'khor byas te/ gru bzhi lham pa ngos re re zhing khru sum bcu rtsa gnyis gzhal bar bya zhing / cha 'byes pa gru bzhi pa cha mnyam zhing mdzes pa sgo bzhi dang / rta babs bzhir ldan pa/ 'bras kyi phye ma'i tshon sna bzhir sbyar la/ de nas dkyil 'khor bri bar bya ste/

tshon lnga'i thig skud kyis thig btab nas/ tsan dan dkar po'i phur bu btab ste/ zla ba yar gyi ngo tshes brgyad dam/ tshes bcwa lnga'i tshes grangs dang / rgyu skar bzang po bsdams te/ dkyil 'khor gyi mchog bri bar bya'o/ /dang po ni dkar pos bri'o/ /

gnyis pa ni dmar pos so/ /gsum pa ni ser pos so/ /bzhi pa ni nam mkha'i kha dog gis so/ /lnga pa ni m-ig sman gyi kha dog gis te/ dkyil 'khor gyi dbus kyi snying po 'jigs pa med pa cha rnam par mdzes shing / gsal bar pir sar

pa dang tshon dang snod sar pas bri bar bya ste/ dkyil 'khor gyi snying por pad ma 'dab ma stong pa khor yug stegs bu dang bcas pa bri zhing / pad ma'i phreng ba tshon gyis mdzes pa bris la/ de'i dbus su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thub pa chen po

shAkya'i rgyal po dang / 'od dpag med dang / 'jig rten dbang po'i rgyal po gzhag go/ g.yas su mgon po 'jig rten dbang phyug don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cha byad 'chang ba gsang sngags kyi rjes su 'brang bar bya'o/ /g.yon du phyag na

rdo rje rnga yab dang rdo rje thogs pa bzhin khro gnyer can 'od 'bar bas bskor ba'o/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi drung du lha mo sgrol ma dang dri med 'od 'phro bya'o/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi 'og tu

dkar sham chen po dang / gos dkar mo dang / dkar mo chen mo lag na dbyug pa dang / ril ba spyi blugs thogs pa'o/ /de'i 'og tu srin mo ral pa gcig pa mche ba gtsigs pa thod pa'i phreng ba thogs pa/ sbrul gyi mchod phyir thogs pa lag

pa bzhi pa/ lag pa g.yas g.yon gnyis na rdo rje dang / dgra sta dang / g.yas pa'i gung mo lha dang / log 'dren la bsdigs par bya'o/ /g.yon du 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bram ze'i cha lugs 'chang ba ral pa'i thor

tshugs kyis bzhugs pa/ 'od dpag med kyi thor tshugs kyis brgyan par bya'o/ /g.yas g.yon du dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen po bya'o/ /de'i 'og tu dpal lha mo dang / lha mo dbyangs can ma dang / mtshan mo'i lha mo dang / sa'i lha mo dang / lo thog gi lha mo dang /

'bras bu'i lha mo bya'o/ /de'i 'og tu 'khor yug tu gshin rje dang chu lha dang rlung lha la sogs pa bya'o/ /ral pa'i thor tshugs kyis brgyan pa'i drang srong gzhag par bya'o/ /grwa rgyal po chen po bzhi go cha bgos

pa gzhag par bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor gyi snying po'i dbus dang bar bar du lcags kyu dang / dgra sta dang / rdo rje dang / dbyug pa dang / zhags pa dang / lcags sgrog bya'o/ /phyi rol du tshangs pa dang / drag po dang / lha mo u ma dang / tshangs pa'i drung du lha mo
