gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs shing lung bstan pa lags te/ de bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis rig sngags 'chang thams cad mchog
tu grub par bya ba'i phyir dang / sems can thams cad bsgral ba'i phyir dmyal ba dang / yi dgas kyi gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten sel ba sngon gyi sgrib pa dang / sdig pa mi zad pa 'joms pa ngan
song thams cad sel ba/ 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sdig pa dang / sgrib pa nges par sreg par byed pa/ yongs su bsgrags par bgyi'o/ /mtshams med pa lnga dang / sangs rgyas dang byang chub

sems dpa' spong ba dang / dam pa'i chos spong ba dang / mtshams med pa la gzhol ba dang / 'phags pa'i dge 'dun la 'khu ba dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad

spong bar byed pa de dag gis mnyan pa dang / mthong ba tsam dang / sdom pa tsam dang / lan cig 'bad pa dang / 'chad pa tsam gyis thams cad byung bar 'gyur ro/ /nga mthong ba tsam gyis thams cad zad par 'gyur/ byang bar

'gyur ro/ /rims thams cad dang / nad thams cad dang / dri ma dang / ser sna dang phrag dog thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /nyon mongs pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten dang

'jig rten las 'das pa'i sdug bsngal skye ba dang / rga ba dang 'chi ba dang / nad dang mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /'thab pa dang /

rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / phung bar byed pa dang / brdeg pa dang / bsdigs pa dang / gsod pa dang / g.yul 'gyed pa dang / shags 'gyed pa dang / btson du 'dzin pa dang / lcags su 'jug pa dang / rkun ma dang /

zol ba dang / mi rgod dang / seng ge dang / glang po che dang / ma he dang / nad ngan pa dang / dmu chu dang / sha bkra dang / mdze dang / 'brum bu dang / g.yon can dang / shu ba dang / shu bran dang / g.yan pa dang / klad pa na ba dang /

gzhogs phyed na ba dang / dom dang / dred dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / yi dgas dang / sha za dang / rjed byed dang / sbrul ma rungs pa dang / kha gdug pa dang / sbrul nag po dang / srog chags go na dang /

dug dang bcas pa'i srog chags 'jigs pa sna tshogs dang bcas pa dang / me dang / chu dang / dug dang / mtshon dang / g.yang sa dang / khyim rdib pa dang / grang ba dang / rlung dang / nyi tshan dang / byi ba kha bdug

pa'i 'jigs pa thams cad ni klags pa dang / kha thon byas pa dang / mthong ba tsam gyis thams cad rnam par zhig par 'gyur/ phung bar 'gyur/ mod la phye mar blags par 'gyur ro/ /yongs su thar bar 'gyur ba 'di la

dogs par mi bya/ yid gnyis bskyed par mi bya/ the tshom mi bya/ sems gnyis su 'gyur ba bskyed par mi bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag rtag tu mngon du dran par bgyi ba dang / rtag tu yid la byed pa'i blo 'byung bar bgyi'o/ /don

yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po dang / khro bo'i rgyal po'i snying po yang bzlas par bgyi'o/ /rmad du byung ba rnam par lta ba/ don yod pa rnam par 'phrul pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor

de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rmad du byung ba'i cho 'phrul rnam par snang mdzad kyi byin gyis brlabs / dam tshig chen po'i dkyil 'khor don yod par rnam par lta ba'i zhags pa'i snying po ni rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par dus

thams cad du yid la kha ton du brjod par bya'o/ /rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par rjes su dran pa bsgom par bya'o/ /de dag dran pa bsgom pa tsam dang / dran pa tsam gyis 'jig rten dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i yon
tan phun sum tshogs pa thams cad thob par 'gyur ro/ /phyir mi ldog pa zhes bya'o/ /phyir mi ldog pa'i gnas la rab tu gnas par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dgongs pa dang / lung ston

pa dang / byin gyis rlob par 'gyur na/ lta ba dang / klog pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug mthong ste phyag 'tshal ba dang / mchod pa dang / dran pa dang / dus gsum du

shin tu gsol bar yid la byed pa dang / mchod cing phyag byed pa de lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ sems can de ni nga dang 'dra ba yin par rig par bya'o/ /'jig rten dbang phyug gis byin gyis brlabs pa'i lus yin par rig par

bya'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi brlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs pa dang / dbang bskur bas dbang bskur ba yin par rig par bya'o/ /gang zhig lan mang du shin tu lhag par byed pa lta smos kyang ci

dgos te/ sems can de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po yin par rig par bya'o/ /bdag kyang dus thams cad du rtag tu rjes su dran par bgyi'o/ /dus thams cad du mthong ba sbyin par bgyi'o/ /bsam pa dang re ba
thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o/ /de'i tshe bdag gis sems can thams cad myur ba myur bar byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gzhag par bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan
'das bdag ni go cha chen po brtan par khas blangs pa la 'chel ba lags pas sems can thams cad bsgral ba'i phyir re ba'i mchog thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs
pa bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /sems can dag pa'i mchog legs so legs so/ /
'di ni mchog tu dkon pa ste/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i cho ga de'i ming 'dzin pa tsam gyis sems can yongs su grol bar 'gyur na/ lta ba dang / klog pa dang / sgrub pa dang / smyung ba'i cho ga byed pa

dang / sdom pa la gnas pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/ sems can de ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro/ /sems can dag pa dus la bab pa gang yin par shes na smros
shig /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal du lta zhing bzhin 'dzum ste/ don yod pa rnam par lta ba'i zhags pa'i snying po
smras so/ /dus gsum du gshegs shing bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rang sangs rgyas dang / 'phags pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'phags

pa byams pa la sogs pa 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyi mchog la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'phags pa rdo rje 'chang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / lus ngan po dang / drang srong gi
tshogs kyi mchog la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /

'di lta ste/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta/ a ba lo ki te pA sha hri da yi/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ d+harma d+hA tu gar r+b+he/ tsa ra tsa ra/ ma hA pad ma b+hu dze/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ ma hA pA sha d+ha re/ ba ra ba ra ba ra/ rash+mi sha ta sa ha sra/ pra te maN Di ta/ sha rI re/

ta ra ta ra/ bi pu la te dza d+ha re/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ ShaT pA ra mi tA pa ri pU ra Ni/ ka la ka la/ ma hA brah+ma/ be sha d+ha re/ ma la ma la/ sarba pA pa a ba ra na mA la ki bi Sha/ nA sha ni/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ bo d+hi satwa/ bi shud

d+he b+hu ru b+hu ru/ ma hA sa twa/ ba da sa le/ ya ma ba ru Na/ ku be ra na ma skr-i te/ hu ru hu ru brah+ma/ biSh+Nu ma he shwa ra/ ku mA ra/ nan di ke shwa ra/ I shwa ra/ ma he shwa ra pra tra/ ban de ta/ bad de ta/ ma ma skri te/ bi bi d+ha ma Ni

mau li d+ha re/ a mi tA b+hA dzi na/ ma ku Ta/ d+ha re/ de bya/ ma Ni ka na ka /badzra bai dUr+ya/ ma ra ka ta/ pad ma rA ga /in dra nI la di bya mug ti ka /a lang kri ta/ shwa rI ra/ shwe ta/ yad dz+nyo ba bI ta d+ha ra/ dza Ta

ma ku Ta/ maN Ti ta nA ma/ tsan dra rA dzi ta/ pad ma d+ha ra/ pad ma A sa na/ pad ma b+hu dza/ tri lo tsa na/ tri shU ra d+ha ra/ bA sha d+ha re/ sarba ta thA ga ta/ a b+hi Shi ka ta/ sa ra sa ra/ sarba pA pa/ pra sha ma na ka ra/ ma hA kA ru

ni ka /tu ru tu ru/ sarba ba ra du ya ka /bo d+hi bo d+hi/ sarba ta thA ga ta a ba lo ke te/ bo d+hi maN Ta/ a ba lo ki te/ lo ke shwa ra/ ma he shwa re/ ma hA tsan ta ma Ni/ d+hA ra bi shwa r+'u pa/ ma hA sau mya/ ba dan ma hA kA ru Ni

ka /bud d+ha bud d+ha/ bo d+ha ya bo d+ha ya/ b+ha ga bAn/ sarba ta thA ga ta/ a ba lo ki ta gar+g+he/ ma hA puN+ya/ te dza d+ha ra pra ba ra sid d+hi ka ra sarba byi d+hi ha ra/ sarba satwA ya pa ra sarba duHkhaHpra mo tsa ka /ma hA kA ru ni ka na mo
stu te swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gi 'di ni rmad du byung ba rnam par lta ba'i zhags pa'i snying po'o/ /don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'o/ /rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor 'jig rten las 'das pa'i

gzungs kyi snying po'o/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po'o/ /gzugs sna tshogs chen po sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin rnam par 'phrul pa/ phyag stong mnga' ba/ dbu stong mnga' ba/ spyan

stong gis rnam par gzigs pa/ phyag brgya stong gis byin gyis brlabs pa/ gang gA'i klung bye ba khrag khrig stong phrag bcu'i bye ma'i rdul shin tu phra ba dang mnyam pa'i dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor du rjes su zhugs pa/

de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid gsang ba la 'jug pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhing du 'jug pa/ byang chub kyi snying por bgrod pa/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba/ chos kyi sgron me 'bar ba/ bdud

la sogs pa ma rungs pa thams cad kyi bdud 'joms pa/ chos kyi dung 'bud pa/ chos kyi rgyal mtshan sgreng ba/ dmyal ba thams cad sel ba/ cho ga zhib mo thams cad grub par mdzad pa/ cho ga sgrub pa thams cad
kyi mchog sa bcu chen po la so sor 'jog pa/ phyir mi ldog pa'i gnas la rjes su 'jug pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dbang bskur ba dang / byin gyi brlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs pa/ don yod pa'i

mchog phun sum tshogs pa thob par mdzad pa/ don yod pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i rnam par sprul pa/ don yod par sems rgya mtsho snyed yang dag par 'dzin pa/ don yod par sems can sa bon la so sor 'jog pa/ don
yod par byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa la 'jug pa/ don yod par de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa yongs su sgrogs pa/ don yod par de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchod pa

dang / bsnyen bkur gyi sprin rab tu byed pa/ don yod par sems can thams cad mi 'jigs pa'i khyim du 'dzud pa/ don yod par sbyin pa chen po'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs pa/ don yod par lha rdzas kyi me

tog dang / bdug pa dang / dri dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / chos gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / gos dang / rgyan dang / chos gos sna tshogs dang / rin po che bdun gyi char

'bebs pa/ don yod pa'i tshe yongs su brjes te sangs rgyas kyi zhing kun tu brgyan pa sna tshogs su de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang dag par lta ba/ don yod par bsod nams kyi phung po chen po rab tu rdzogs
pa/ don yod par dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po skyed pa/ don yod par de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang dag par mthong ba dang / grub pa dang / cho 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa ston pa/ don yod par
dbang phyug sgrub pa/ don yod par rig sngags dang / dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya dang / rim par phye ba dang / cho ga zhib mo yang dag par ston pa/ don yod par grub pa mthong ba/ don yod par cho
ga mthong ba/ don yod par tshe rab tu 'phel ba/ don yod par snyan par grags pa rab tu ston pa/ don yod par 'khor ba las rab tu sgrol ba/ don yod par skye ba dang / rga ba dang / 'chi ba las yongs

su sgrol ba/ don yod par mchog rab tu sbyin pa/ don yod par bzlas brjod dang cho ga rab tu rdzogs pa/ don yod par dran pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rab tu rdzogs pa/ don yod par rig 'dzin 'khor los sgyur ba thob pa yang
dag par ston pa/ don yod par lha'i gnas dang / gzhal med khang sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyi lha'i gnas su 'jug pa/ don yod par dga' ldan gyi gnas su 'jug pa/ don yod par 'og min gyi gnas kyi bar
du 'jug pa/ don yod par sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi gnas su brgya byin lha'i rgyal por 'jug pa/ don yod par ri rab chen po lag pa gcig gis sgul ba/ don yod par rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs ston pa/ don yod par mi

snang ba ston pa/ don yod par stobs 'phel ba/ don yod par gling bzhi la dbang ba'i 'khor los sgyur ba so sor 'thob pa ston pa/ don yod par yid bzhin gyi nor bu chen po'i rin po che sna tshogs kyi char 'bebs pa/ don

yod par 'bru'i char 'bebs pa/ don yod par gos kyi char 'bebs pa/ don yod par rgyan dang / chos gos dang / mu tig gi chun 'phyang dang / gdub 'khor dang / gser gyi tsong tsong dang / gdu bu dang / dpung rgyan sna tshogs

kyi char 'bebs pa yang dag par ston pa/ don yod par ro rnam pa sna tshogs ro'i mchog ro brgya'i kha zas kyi char 'bebs pa/ don yod par sems can sna tshogs grol ba ston pa/ don yod par bstan bcos dang / tshigs le'ur byas

pa dang / tshul dang 'dul ba dang / mdo sde dang / lung bstan pa dang / tshigs su bcad pa dang / ched du brjod pa dang / gleng gzhi dang / de lta bu byung ba dang / skyes pa'i rabs dang / shin tu rgyas pa dang / rmad du byung

ba'i chos kyi man ngag sna tshogs dang / chos mngon pa dang tshogs kyi gtam yang dag par ston pa dang / don yod par theg pa chen po rnam pa sna tshogs rgya mtsho la 'jug pa rab tu ston pa/ don yod par gnod sbyin dang / srin

po dang / 'byung po dang / sha za dang / yi dgas dang / grul bum dang / rjed byed dang / bgegs dang / log 'dren sna tshogs nyes pa dang / gsod pa dang shin tu sel ba yang dag par ston pa yin no/ /bcom ldan 'das de ltar

na yon tan chen po can gyi gzungs ngan song thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ba/ thams cad du mi 'jigs pa'i gnas rab tu ston pa/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam legs pa'i lam rab tu ston pa/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i

lam rab tu ston pa/ phyir mi ldog pa'i gnas dang / sangs rgyas nyid sbyin par mdzad pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das don yod par rnam par lta ba'i zhags pa'i snying po'i gzungs chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang

phyug gi snying po yon tan khyad par yongs su bsgrags pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po gsang ba la rab tu gnas pa lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas byang
chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /sems dpa' chen po mchog tu dkon pa'i gzungs 'di'i snying po 'jig rten las 'das pa rnam par 'phrul pa bshad pa dang /
de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pa/ gsang ba'i snying po/ yongs su bsgrags pa legs so legs so/ /de dag ni sems
can thams cad la lam mchog shin tu mchog tu gyur pa/ gya nom pa/ bla ma/ bla na med pa/ mchog tu dkon pa'i gzungs kyi snying po gsang ba yongs su bsgrags pa ste/ gang gi 'khor ba'i rgya

mtsho'i chu bo chen po dang / srid pa'i rgya mtsho las sems can pha rol tu sgrol ba yin no/ /spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rigs kyi bu pho 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge slong pha 'am/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge
bsnyen pha 'am/ dge bsnyen ma 'am/ dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ rgyal rigs dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmang rigs gang la la zhig gam/ sems can gzhan gang yang rung bas don yod par rnam

par lta ba'i snying po 'di dang / rmad du byung ba rnam par lta ba don yod pa'i snying po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rmad du byung ba'i de kho na nyid

rnam par 'phrul pa/ rnam par snang mdzad kyi byin gyis brlabs/ dam tshig chen po dkyil 'khor gyi ming 'dzin pa tsam gyis kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po sogs par 'gyur ro/ /bsod nams kyi phung po chen po dang ldan

par yongs su 'dzin par yang 'gyur ro/ /gang gA'i klung 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig dgu bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bye ma'i rdul phra rab dang mnyam pa'i/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs

rgyas mngon du mthong ba dang / mngon du chos thos pa dang / mngon du dbyangs thos pa dang / mngon du lung bstan pa thos par 'gyur ba'i sems can chen po de dag gis ni bsod nams kyi phung po shin tu che ba dang /

dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po yongs su gzungs bar 'gyur ro/ /sems can de gzungs gang yin pa dang / dkyil 'khor dang / cho ga dang / mi sna tshogs da ltar thos pa dang / yang na klog pa po dang / yang na lta ba tsam mthong ba

ni de dang mnyam pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu pho 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de ni bsod nams kyi phung po chen po'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan par 'gyur ba yang de dang mnyam pa yin na/ dka' ba byed pa lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ de

bzhin gshegs pa dang mnyam pa nyid du thos pa dang mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /gang dag gzungs 'di'i dkyil 'khor 'bad de stobs dang / brtson 'grus pha rol gnon par byed pa dang 'bri ba dang / klog pa dang / bzlas

brjod kyi cho ga byed pa dang / dkyil 'khor gyi cho gas sgrub par byed pa dang / 'bad par byed pa de ni dka' ba chen po la zhugs pa yin te/ de dang mnyam pa yin no/ /dka' ba gang zhe na/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra

bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas bskal pa grangs med pa gsum du dka' ba la zhugs pa dang / sangs rgyas te chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i bar yin no/ /rigs kyi bu pho 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo
'am/ dge slong pha 'am/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen pha 'am/ dge bsnyen ma 'am/ dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ rgyal rigs sam/ rje'u rigs dang / dmang rigs gang yin pa 'am/ sems can gzhan gang

yang rung bas gzungs 'di'i dkyil 'khor dang / cho ga stobs chen po dang / pha rol gnon pa'i brtson 'grus kyis sgrub par byed pa 'di ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i cho ga 'tshol ba yin no/ /'di lta ste/ 'bri ba dang /

klog pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / bzlas brjod dang / cho ga dang / dkyil 'khor lta ba dang / 'jug pa dang / dam tshig dang / phyag rgya bcings te sgrub pa dang / 'di lta ste/ thos pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog

pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / sems pa dang / dus gsum du lan gsum don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po dran pa dang / khro bo'i rgyal pos dbang bskur ba dang / gzungs 'di

yang lan nyi shu rtsa gcig tu bzlas brjod dang / cho ga dran pa dang / byams pa dang / snying rje dang / byams pa'i snying brlan pa dang / sems can thams cad la snying brtse ba lhur byed pa de ni dka' ba

spyod pa chen po la zhugs pa yin no/ /bskal pa grangs med pa gsum du dka' ba spyod pa la zhugs pa dang 'dra ba 'am/ lhag pa yin no/ /de'i tshe 'di nyid la 'bras bu chen po thob par 'gyur ba dang / 'jig rten
las 'das pa zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas nyid du so sor gnas pa yin no// //'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po/ bam po bcu gsum pa/ bsod nams

kyi phung po chen po'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags par 'gyur ro/ /rtag tu 'jig rten dbang phyug rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro/ /rtag tu phyag g.yas pa byang chub sems dpa' de'i spyi bo la 'jog par 'gyur ro/ /rtag tu

mchog sbyin pa mdzad par 'gyur ro/ /rtag tu zhal mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /de ltar na yon tan chen po brjod pa'i gzungs dang / dkyil 'khor dang phyag rgya dang / cho ga 'di ni mchog tu dkon pa yin no/ /gzungs dang
dkyil 'khor dmar po 'am/ /yang na gur gum kha dog dang / /sa rdul dkar po snum pa ni/ /mar sar 'dra ba 'jam pa yin/ /sa yi khyad par dbye ba de/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis bsngags/ /
byang chub snying po sa der mtshungs/ /ring bsrel bzhugs pa'i mchod rten dang / /de ni mtshungs par gyur pa yin/ /brkos pa'i nang du mkhas pa yis/ /slar yang sa de dgang bar bya/ /ji
srid dong bu mnyam par gang / /de ni dkyil 'khor yang dag pa'o/ /yung dang lhag pa bsngags pa min/ /'dir ni 'grub pa med par bstan/ /khru ni sum bcu rtsa gnyis tshad/ /mkhas pas dkyil
'khor thig dag gdab/ /yang na khru ni bcu drug dang / /yang ni khru ni bcwa lngar bya/ /mnyam zhing grwa bzhir legs par dbye/ /ba yi lci ba dag dang ni/ /sa dang bsres te bsku bya ba/ /shin tu zhen
par bsdig pa dang / /'jam zhing mnyen par bya ba yin/ /de la dkyil 'khor thig gdab pa/ /sna tshogs tshon gyis kun du dbye/ /sgo bzhi rnam par 'byes pa dang / /rta babs bzhi dang ldan par bya/ /

dkyil 'khor dbus kyi snying po ni/ /rnam par phye ste gru bzhi tshad/ /khru gsum yang na khru bzhi ni/ /thig skud mtshon gyis rnam par dbye/ /nang gi thig ni tshad dag tu/ /mdung rtse gsum pa dag dang ni/ /

nor bu rin chen sna tshogs bya/ /bar gyi thig gi tshad dag tu/ /pad ma dang ni rdo rje dag /kun du bri bar bya ba yin/ /phyi yi thig gi tshad dag tu/ /rdo rje rnam pa'i stegs bu dang / /rin chen sna tshogs gzhal med khang / /

stegs bu dag kyang bri bar bya/ /pad ma'i dbus su gzhal med khang / /gzhal yas khang pa gnas par bya/ /dkyil 'khor dbus kyi pad ma la/ /rnam par snang mdzad thub pa bya/ /g.yon du 'od ni dpag med pa/ /g.yas

phyogs su ni de bzhin gshegs/ /shAkya'i rgyal po dag dang ni/ /don yod rgyal po 'jig rten gyi/ /dbang phyug mgon la mngon sum du/ /btud de thal mo sbyor ba ni/ /phyag bzhi par ni bya ba yin/ /phyag gnyis kyi

ni sna tshogs pa'i/ /me tog rnams ni 'chang ba dang / /rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan par bya/ /'od dpag med pa'i mdun du ni/ /khro bo'i rgyal po phyag bzhi pa/ /btud de thal mo sbyor ba dang / /lha rdzas me tog sna tshogs pa/ /lag pa

gnyis na thogs pa dang / /sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan par bya/ /dbus kyi dkyil 'khor legs brgyan pa/ /sna tshogs dar gyis mdzes par bya/ /don yod zhags pa'i phyag rgya che/ /pad ma gdan dang rnam rgyan pa/ /'bar ba'i nang na
yod par bya/ /grwa bzhir dag ni byas na ni/ /gnyis kyi bar gyi cha bzhi ste/ /dbus kyi gnas su 'jigs med pa/ /shar gyi gnas su gnas pa ni/ /lha mo sgrol ma rnam par brgyan/ /g.yas kyi gnas su gnas pa

ni/ /gos dkar mo ni rnam par brgyan/ /nub kyi gnas na gnas pa ni/ /lha mo dkar mo rnam par brgyan/ /byang gi gnas na gnas pa ni/ /lha mo pad ma mdzes dga' brgyan/ /dkyil 'khor phyi rim grwa rnams su/ /rgyal

chen bzhi ni gzhag par bya/ /bar gyi gnas su gzhag pa ni/ /ral pa gcig pa gtum mo shar/ /nub tu pho nya bzhin sgyur ma/ /g.yas phyogs su ni bzhin sgyur ma/ /rdo rje lcags sgrog bya ba yin/ /byang du srin mo khro gnyer

gdong / /kun kyang me dbus 'jigs pa med/ /dkyil 'khor dbus su dgod pa bzhin/ /phyi rol thig le pad mo'i phreng / /rdo rje rtse gsum gzhag pa ni/ /kun tu 'bar ba phreng bar bcas/ /phyi rol dkyil 'khor kun tu ni/ /bri bya rtags

dang phyag rgya dang / /lha ni dbang phyug dbang phyug che/ /tshangs pa khyab 'jug gshin rje dang / /chu lha dbang po lus ngan po/ /dbang sgyur dga' ldan gnas dag gi/ lha nas 'og min gnas kyi bar/ /lha rnams bri bar bya ba yin/ /sum bcu rtsa gsum

lha rnams dang / /rtag ni rnam pa sna tshogs dang / /kun kyang pad mo'i gdan la gnas/ /de bzhin chos kyi 'khor lo dang / /rdo rje rtse lnga rdo rje dang / /zhags pa dang ni dgra sta dang / /legs mthong 'khor lo de bzhin no/ /mdung rtse gsum

dang paT+Ta dang / /ngos la dbyug pa tho ba dang / /rdo rje dkyil 'khor pad ma'i phreng / /'khor lo dung dang dga' da dang / /ral gri dang ni gtor ma rab/ /bum pa gang ba dag dang ni/ /mi snang ba yi 'bag sha dang / /pad ma dang ni uta pa la/ /rgyal

mtshan gdugs dang nor bu dang / /dbyug pa dang ni rdo rje dang / /grwa bzhir rdo rjes mtshan pa yin/ /nor bu rdo rje dag dang ni/ /dgra sta rdo rje dag dang ni/ /phyag rgya bzhi dang dga' ba 'khyil/ /bya ma bum dang kun de dang / /ril ba b+h+ring ga ri

dang ni/ /ri dgas e na'i lpags pa dang / /mchod phyir thogs pa'i snam bu dang / /steng du rgyu skar bcas pa yi/ /zla ba nyi ma de bzhin no/ /kun kyang 'bar ba'i nang du 'dug /so sor cha ni dbye bar bya/ /mkhas pas shar gyi sgor

bri ba/ /'gying bag mthong na 'jigs su rung / /lag na rdo rje 'jigs pa med/ /rdo rje 'chang ba 'bar ba'i nang / /ki li ki la gtum po che/ /lho phyogs kyi ni sgo ru gzhag /nub du rdo rje ping ga la/ /mthong na 'jigs su rung

ba yi/ /byang du nges par gnod mdzes bya/ /phyi rol dkyil 'khor kun du ni/ /pad ma'i phreng dang ut+pal phreng / /grwa dag dang ni grwa rnams su/ /klu'i rgyal po bzhi rnams bri/ /sgo srung ba dag bri ba ni/ /nor bu bzang dang gang

ba bzang / /stobs kyi lha dang lngas rtsen yin/ /sgo yi gnas kyi bar dag tu/ /chu bo bzhi ni bri bya ba/ /gang gA dang ni si ta dang / /pag shu dang ni sin du yin/ /phreng ba'i nang rol thog dag tu/ /dpal gyi lha mo ba san te/ dpe

med ma dang sa yi lha/ /lo tog sman gyi lha mo dang / /sgra dbyangs ma dang 'jigs ldan ma/ /de bzhin mi yi lha dag dang / /'phrog ma dang ni dung can ma/ /gtum mo dang ni me tog so/ /de dag bri bar bya ba yin/ /khrus byas 'bri

mkhan gtsang ma yis/ /gtsang ma'i snod du tshon rnams ni/ /lhag ma min pas kun du bri/ /zas ni dkar gsum grub par bya/ /khyad par 'dod pas zas ngan pa/ /spang bar bya ba nya dang sha /btsong dang sgog skya ke'u rnams

dang / /'dres pa spong bar bya ba ni/ /log 'dren glags tshol spang phyir ro/ /khrus byas gos ni gsar ba bgos/ /gtsang mas dkyil 'khor bri bar bya/ /dkyil 'khor rnam pa sna tshogs kyis/ /kun tu brgyan par bya

ba ni/ /ba dan rnam pa sna tshogs dang / /rnam pa sna tshogs mda' dang ni/ /lha rdzas dar ni dpyang ba dang / /ba dan yang ni dpyang bar bya/ /mtshon skud sna lnga'i srad bu yis/ /kun tu yongs su bskor bar bya/ /zangs las
byas pa'i pad ma'i tshad/ /sor bzhi 'dab ma bye ba de/ /mdzes pa grwa bzhir gzugs par bya/ /snying po dkyil 'khor grwa rnams su/ /pad ma brgyad ni gzhal ba dag /gser las byas pa bzhi gzhag cing / /de

bzhin dngul las byas pa bzhi/ /kun du byi ru'i phreng ba dang / /mu tig phreng ba de bzhin no/ /kun du gser gyi srad bu dang / /rin chen sna tshogs gzhag par bya/ /snying po'i dkyil 'khor thig bar du/ /gser gyi snod ni bzhi dag

dang / /dngul gyi snod ni bzhi gzhag go/ dngul gyi bum pa gang ba bzhi la dngul dang gser dang zangs las byas pa'i me tog spras pa'i mgo lcogs kyis spras pa gzhag par bya'o/ /gser gyi bum pa bzhi gzhag pa
la mu tig dang / byi ru dang / pad ma rA ga dang / margad dang / in dra nI la dang / dngul dang / gser dang / me tog gis sras pa'i mgo lcogs gzhag par bya'o/ /gla rtsi dang / ga pur dang /

gur gum dang / lha rdzas kyi tsan dan gyi phye mas gser gyi snod bkang ba dang / dngul gyi snod kyi nang du gser gyi me tog dang / dngul gyi me tog dang / zangs kyi me tog mu tig gis brgyan cing rin po che rnam pa
sna tshogs spras pa gzhag par bya/ cod pan gyi rgyal mtshan bzhi gzhag par bya/ rin po che'i rgyal mtshan bzhi gzhag par bya/ tshon sna tshogs can dang / dar dmar po dpyang bar bya/ dngul gyi
pog phor bzhi gzhag ste/ gla rtsi dang / ga pur dang / gur kum gyi bdug pas bdug par bya/ sa las byas pa'i bum pa gser gyis g.yogs pa'i nang du dri chab rnam pa sna tshogs kyis bkang

ste/ rin po che sna bdun dang ldan par bgyis la bkang ba la dar gyis bcings la rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'i steng du zangs las byas pa'i me tog gzhag nas snying po'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du pad ma'i steng du

gzhag par bya'o/ /de nas phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor thog thag tu dri dang / phye ma dang / byug pa dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu la sogs pa rnam pa sna tshogs dang / mchod yon gyi chab kyis dngul gyi snod dang / zangs kyi

snod bkang ba drug bcu rtsa bzhi gzhag par bya'o/ /lcags kyi snod bum pa gang ba drug bcu rtsa bzhi gzhag par bya'o/ /me tog dang / mgo lcogs dang / por phor bkang ba drug bcu rtsa bzhi gzhag par bya'o/ /

gzhag par bya ste bdug pa sna tshogs kyis bdug par bya'o/ /sgo bzhir dri chab kyi bum pa dar gyis brgyan cing spud pa gzhag par bya'o/ /sna ma'i me tog gi gdul bu'i steng du mda' la ba dan btags pa drug bcu rtsa bzhi

btsugs te/ tshon sna tshogs kyis bkra bar byas pa'i mda' dang / nor bu'i phreng ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyis dkyil 'khor brgyan par bya'o/ /de nas phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor thog thag tu sa dang bsres pa'i ba'i lci

bas dkyil 'khor byas la dri chab kyis bskus te tshon sna lnga'i srad bus thig btab la sgo bzhi rnam par phye ste seng ldeng gi phur bu tshad sor bcu gnyis pa drug bcu rtsa bzhi gdab bo/ /tshon sna lnga'i srad bus dkyil 'khor
kun du bskor bar bya'o/ /bum bu dang / bum pa dang / bya ma bum drug bcu rtsa bzhi gtor ma sna tshogs kyis bkang ba gzhag go/ kham phor zlum po drug bcu rtsa bzhi gtor ma sna tshogs kyis bkang ba

gzhag go/ gtor ma tshul sna tshogs pa/ drug bcu rtsa bzhi so sor bzhag go/ tshogs kyi gtor ma gzhag go / snod tshon sna lnga pa drug bcu rtsa bzhi kha zas rnam pa sna tshogs kyis bkang ba dang / bca' ba rnam pa sna tshogs blugs pa dang / gtor ma dkar po rnam pa sna tshogs gzhag go/ yo byad thams cad kyis yongs su gang ba/ ro rnam pa sna tshogs kyi gtor ma gzhag go / 'bras bu sna tshogs dang / me tog sna tshogs dgram mo/ /phreng ba brgya nyi
shu rtsa gcig dkyil 'khor du dpyang bar bya ste/ byang phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor la drug bcu rtsa bzhi/ snying po'i dkyil 'khor la sum bcu rtsa gnyis gdags so/ /me mar gyi sdong bu bzhi bud par bya'o/ /

gtor ma brgya drug bcu rtsa bzhi dang dkyil 'khor thog thag tu mar me bud par bya'o/ /chang dang sha dang / beg tsong dang / sgog skya dang / ke'u dang / tshod sngon dang / la phug spangs pa'i gtor ma

gzhan rnam pa sna tshogs gzhag par bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol grwa bzhir don yod pa'i zhags pa'i mdo sde bklag par bya'o/ /sgo re rer bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bklag par bya

ste/ /chos klog pa legs par 'khrus byas te/ lha rdzas kyi gos kyis dkris te gtsang ma la dri rnam pa sna tshogs kyis bsgos pa'i gos gtsang ma bgos te/ chos kyi stan shin du brgyan pa lha rdzas kyi stan la

'dug nas tshig 'jam po 'jam po tshig mnyen pos bklag par bya'o/ /nub kyi phyogs cha la dkyil 'khor mthon po la bde ba can bkod pa bri pa 'od dpag med dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug dang / mthu chen

po thob pa'i gzugs bri ba'i ras kyi sku gzugs dkyil 'khor la mngon du phyogs par gzhag par bya'o/ /shar gyi phyogs cha la dkyil 'khor grwa bzhi mthon po byas la rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor la shAkya thub pa dang /

'phags pa rdo rje 'chang ba dang / don yod pa'i zhags pa'i khro bo'i gzugs bris pa ras kyi sku gzugs dkyil 'khor la mngon du phyogs par gzhag go/ lho'i phyogs cha la ri 'dra ba'i gnas mthon po byas la de bzhin
gshegs pa 'jig rten dbang phyug rgyal po dang / 'jam dpal dang / sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang / don yod pa'i zhags pa ras la bris pa'i dkyil 'khor la mngon du phyogs par gzhag go/ byang gi
phyogs cha la khro bo'i rgyal po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad dang / byams pa dang sa'i snying po bris pa'i ras kyi sku gzugs dkyil 'khor la mngon du phyogs par gzhag go/ stegs bu'i

rnam par mthon por byas pa thams cad legs par brgyan par bya'o/ /dar gyi phreng bas brgyan par bya'o/ /rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa dang / bum pa gang ba gzhag pa dang / dris dkyil 'khor bya ba dang / ro'i

mchog rnam pa sna tshogs bza' ba'i ngo bo rnam pa du ma'i kha zas kyi ro 'bul ba dang / 'bras bu rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i bsod snyoms gzhag pa dang / tsan dan dang / a ga ru dang / du rus ka dang /
ga bur dang / gla rtsi dang / gur gum dang bsres pa'i bdug pa ras kyi sku gzugs la dbul bar bya'o/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang bas dus gsum du khrus bya zhing / gos lan gsum brjes te/ dus gsum du

bzlas brjod dang cho ga bya'o/ /tshes brgyad nas brtsams te tshes bcwa lnga tshang gi bar du don yod pa'i zhags pa lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bya'o/ /khro bo'i rgyal po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bya'o/ /don yod pa'i zhags

pa'i lcags kyu nyi shu rtsa gcig dang / don yod pa rnam par lta ba'i zhags pa'i snying po 'jig rten las 'das pa rnam par 'phrul pa lan nyi shu rtsa gcig dang / rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor byang chub sems dpa' thams

cad kyis phyag byas pa stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi zhags pa'i snying po stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya'o/ /zla ba nya la thug gi bar du zas dkar gsum bza' bar bya'o/ /tshes bcwa

lnga'i nyin mtshan thog thag tu don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po dpag tu med par bzlas brjod bya'o/ /mtshan thog thag bzlas brjod byas kyang ngal ba med pa dang / lus snyoms pa dang bral bas bzlas brjod bya'o/ /byams
pa dang / snying rje'i lhag pa'i bsam pa'i sems su bya'o/ /bzlas brjod kyi cho ga zin nas dkyil 'khor gyi bya ba mtshams bcad pa dang / phyogs bcing ba dang / bdag srung ba dang / gzhan

bsrung ba dang dkyil 'khor bsdam pa byas nas/ de nas 'khor rnams dkyil 'khor du dam tshig la gzhug par bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor du gzhug pa dang / dkyil 'khor gyi las zin nas mchod pa brtsam mo/ /mchod pa'i cho ga

zin pa dang / de nas bzlas brjod brtsam par bya ste/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi spyan sngar 'dug nas/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po bzlas brjod byas la khro bo'i rgyal po brgya rtsa brgyad kyis dbang bskur ro/ /

bzlas brjod lan nyi shu rtsa gcig dang / dbang bskur ma thag tu ras kyi sku gzugs dang / dkyil 'khor thams cad kun du 'bar zhing 'od zer sna tshogs 'byin cing legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byin par 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags

'chang ba'i snying dga' zhing lus 'bar bar 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug shin du 'bar zhing 'od 'phro ba nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od zer can don yod pa'i zhags pa tshangs pa'i cha byad 'chang

ba dkyil 'khor gyi dbus kyi nang nas mngon du gshegs te phyogs bcu'i dkyil 'khor kun la rnam par gzigs shing rig sngags 'chang ba legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra phyung ste/ phyag g.yas pa brkyang ste rig sngags
'chang ba'i spyi bo la gzhag ste dkyil 'khor gyi mchog shin du brgyan cing spras pa 'di ni shin du bzang ba yin te/ legs so legs so/ /'di rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor don yod pa'i zhags pa rnam par
'phrul pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag byas pa de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi gsang ba/ lha dang /

klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / srin po rnams kyi dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor bdud thams cad pham par byed pa'i dkyil 'khor

bgegs dang / rnam par log 'dren thams cad 'joms pa/ bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / rje'u'i rigs dang / dmangs rigs dang / tha na byol song gi gnas su gtogs pa'i bya

yang rung ste/ sems can thams cad 'khor ba'i gcong rong las sgrol ba yin no/ /'di ni sdig pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad dang / dmyal ba dang / sdug bsngal dang / nad dang / skye ba dang / rga ba dang / 'chi ba las yongs su thar

bar byed cing 'jigs pa med pa'i khyim du 'jug par byed pa yin no/ /'di ni rnam par thar par byed pa dkyil 'khor chen po snying po dang / gsang sngags su bcas pa rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor byang chub sems dpa'

thams cad kyis phyag byas pa 'di rig sngags 'chang ba de dang des ming brjod pa dang / gang dran pa tsam la sogs pa dang / lta ba dang / nyan pa dang / ming 'dzin pa yang 'khor ba'i pha rol du rgal bar 'gyur ro/ /phyir mi ldog

pa nyid du sa bcu bgrod nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /de gang zhe na/ gang zhig dkyil 'khor chen po 'di 'dra ba mngon du mthong ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i

gzungs 'jig rten las 'das pa'i gsang sngags kyi tshig bzlas brjod byed pa dang / klog pa dang / dran pa dang / 'chad pa dang / lan 'ga' smyung bas mthong ba dang / thang cig dang / skad cig dang / yud tsam gyis
mthong ba ni nga dang mnyam pa dang / mnyam pa yin no zhes smra'o/ /bdag ni sems can de la de bzhin gshegs pa yin par yang 'dzin te/ 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa yin pas spyi bos bskur bar

bgyi'o/ /rig sngags 'chang bas zung shig dang / mchog ji ltar 'dod pa dang / ji ltar yid la re ba dang / bsam pa thams cad rjes su gzung zhing sbyin par mdzad do/ /de'i tshe rig sngags 'chang bas yid la

ji ltar bsams pa'i mchog smras na/ de thams cad sbyin par mdzad cing don yod pa'i ye shes bkod pa rnam par grol ba dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang gang gA'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam

pa khrag khrig stong phrag bcu'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ro/ /rdzu 'phrul gyis nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /dkyil 'khor de'i dam tshig tu zhugs pa ni dam tshig shes pa'i rjes su zhugs pa yin te/ de dag thams

cad sa bcu la rab tu gnas pa yin/ 'di lta ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba'i phyir mi ldog pa thob par 'gyur ba yin/ lung bstan pa dang byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur

ba yin/ de ni mngal na gnas par skye ba'i tha ma ste/ phyi mngal na gnas pa'i dri mas gos par mi 'gyur ro/ /shi nas bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skye bar 'gyur ro/ /de pad mo'i nang nas rgyan thams cad

kyis brgyan par skyes par 'gyur ro/ /tshe rabs kun tu tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro/ /don yod pa'i rgyal po'i phun sum tshogs pa cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor de bzhin gshegs pa

thams cad kyis snying po chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba/ dam tshig chen po 'di kha ton byed na phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad sangs rgyas kyi zhing na byang chub kyi snying po la bzhugs pa mthong bar
'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyan sngar legs so zhes bya ba thob par 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu skye ba blangs pa legs par skye ba yin pas legs so legs so/ /phyir mi ldog par
bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rab tu gnas pa yin no/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad dang phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'od zer 'bum bye bas

mdzes par gyur cing bsod nams kyis brgyan pa'i phyag gser gyi mdog can brkyang nas spyi bor phyag 'jog cing dbugs 'byin par yang mdzad do/ /byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du chos 'phel ba'i gtam mngon

sum du sgrogs par mdzad do/ /tha na dkyil 'khor chen po rol mo'i sgra rnga bo che dang / rnga bran dang dung dang / rdza rnga dang / rol mo'i sgra gang dag grag pa la sems can gang dag gis sgra de thos nas rna ba'i bu ga tsam du

song ba de thams cad phyir mi ldog par 'gyur zhing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rab tu gnas par 'gyur ro/ /tha na byol song gi skye gnas su gtogs pa bya'i rna bar sgra thos pa de dag thams cad

kyang phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar na rnam par 'phrul ba'i cho 'phrul chen po dang ldan pa rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga mthu chen po rnam par 'phrul pa yin no/ /rigs kyi bu pho 'am/ rigs kyi
bu mo 'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma 'am/ sems can gzhan gang yang rung ba dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ rgyal rigs sam/ rje 'u'i rigs sam/ dmangs

rigs sam/ 'ga' zhig gis rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga 'di 'khor mang po'i nang du klog pa dang sems can gang gis sgra de thos nas sgra dbyangs de dang ming thos pa rna ba'i bu gar song bar
gyur pa de dag thams cad sgrib pa dang / sdig pa mi zad pa las bral bar 'gyur ro/ /sngon gyi sgrib pa dang / sdig pa las rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro/ /phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs

pa thams cad kyi sras su rig par bya'o/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi sras kyi thu po yin no/ /rtag par 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug grogs mdzad cing rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro/ /rtag tu

dbugs 'byin pa mdzad par 'gyur ro/ /mthar byang chub kyi snying po la gnas kyi bar du rjes su srung bar mdzad do/ /sems can gang zhig dkyil 'khor de'i sa phyogs su song ste/ sa gzhi snang ba tsam mthong ba de dag thams

cad kyang phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro/ /nyon mongs pa thams cad bsregs shing sgrib pa thams cad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro/ /de'i sa rdul rlung gis bdas te lus la phog pa gang yin pa de dang / tha na sems can

thams cad ngan pa yang rung ste/ de dag thams cad phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba'i gnas la rab tu gnas par 'gyur ro/ /sdig pa thams cad las yongs su grol ba dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rtag tu
mthong ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dgongs par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis dbugs phyung bar 'gyur ro/ /lha thams cad kyis bsrungs bar 'gyur ro/ /

bsod nams kyi phung po chen po yongs su gzung bar 'gyur ro/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar na sgra thos pa tsam dang / ming 'dzin pa tsam gyis 'bras bu chen po thob par 'gyur ro/ /de nas rnam par

grol ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi sbyin bsreg gi cho ga bshad par bya ste/ sdig pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad sreg cing sdug bsngal drag po las rnam par grol bar 'gyur ba dang / nyon mongs pa drag po'i rgya mtsho dang / 'khor ba las
sgrol ba 'grub pa phyir mi ldog pa'i gnas bla na med par dbugs 'byin par mdzad pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam bla na med pa ston pa/ sangs

rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' ston pa/ lha'i stegs sbyin bsreg byas pa tsam gyi mod la the tshom med par/ me lha dang / dbang po dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / dbang phyug dang /

gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / lus ngan po dang / gzhon nu rnams sbyin sreg byas pa 'di tsam gyi mod la thams cad 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /the tshom med par lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang /

mi 'am ci dang / lto phye chen po dang / srin po dang / sha za dang / grul bum thams cad 'ong bar 'gyur zhing / de'i mod la rig sngags 'chang ba'i rkang pa gnyis la rtag tu 'dud par byed do/ /de bzhin du nyin mtshan du kun du srung

bar 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / phyag na rdo rje bdag nyid chen po dang / gnod sbyin gyi dbang po chen po bcu yang phyogs bcur srung ba byed de/ mi srun pa ma rungs pa sel cing dmyal ba dang / 'jigs pa mi bzad pa dang /

dug drag po dang / sems can ma rungs pa rnams sel bar byed do/ /de ma thag tu bsod nams chen po'i lhun po dang / bsod nams chen po'i phung po bla na med pa skye bar 'gyur ro/ /tsan dan srang nyi shu dang / a ga ru

srang lnga dang / du ru ska srang bdun dang / ga pur dang / gla rtsi srang gcig gi bzhi cha re re dang / gur kum srang gcig dang / lce pog kun du ra srang lnga dang / gu gul srang bdun dang 'di rnams gcig tu sres te/ phye mar

byas la kha ra dkar po dang / sbrang rtsis ri lu zho re'i tshad tsam du byas pa stong rtsa brgyad dang / yungs dkar dang / 'bras yos bsres te ri lu dang / bsres nas mar gyi nang du smyugs te sbyin sreg bya'o/ /shing su ra

b+hi dang / shing arka dang / shing sha mya'i yam sreg shing gi me sbar te sbyin sreg gi cho ga bya'o/ /gang dang gang gi tshe stong rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg byas na de dang de'i tshe sdig pa dang / sgrib pa drag po thams cad sreg par 'gyur ro/ /

de dang de'i tshe de nad thams cad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro/ /de dang de'i tshe gcong thams cad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro/ /de dang de'i tshe 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can bud med dang / skyes pa dang /

khye'u dang / bu mo dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs la sogs pa thams cad kyi sdig pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur ro/ /sdig pa thams cad dang /

byur thams cad dang / gnod pa thams cad dang / 'khrug pa thams cad dang / 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / g.yul 'gyed pa dang / shags 'gyed pa thams cad dang / rang gi 'khor dang / gzhan gyi 'khor gyi 'jigs
pa thams cad dang / phyir rgol ba'i dgras 'jigs pa thams cad dang / sems can ma rungs pa thams cad dang / rkun po dang / zol ba dang / mi rgod pa dang / gcan zan gtum po'i 'jigs pa thams cad rab tu

zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /sems can de dag thams cad 'jigs pa med par 'gyur ro/ /bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmangs

rigs gang dag gis de'i dri tshor ba de dag thams cad kyang phyir mi ldog par 'gyur/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rab tu gnas par 'gyur ro/ /tshe brjes nas thams cad bde ba can gyi

'jig rten gyi khams su 'gro bar 'gyur zhing / pad mo'i nang nas rdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro/ /byol song gi skye gnas su gtogs pa rkang gnyis pa dang / rkang bzhi pa rnams kyis de'i dri tshor ba tsam gyis

thams cad nges par phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro/ /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur zhing mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /rig sngags 'chang ba de ji la ji ltar

sbyin sreg byed pa de lta de ltar de'i lus dri ma med cing yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/ /stong rtsa brgyad tshang na rig sngags 'chang ba'i lus 'bar bar 'gyur ro/ /phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas mang po'i sku mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /

de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku de dag gis rig sngags 'chang ba la legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byin te/ rig sngags 'chang ba legs so legs so/ /'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i mchog / rnam par grol ba'i

dkyil 'khor 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga yin no/ /'di ni bdud thams cad rab tu 'joms pa'i sbyin sreg chen po'i cho ga yin no/ /'di ni gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / brjed byed dang /

bgegs dang / log 'dren tshar gcod pa'i sbyin sreg chen po'i cho ga yin no/ /'di ni byang chub kyi snying por song ste/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i sbyin sreg chen po'i cho ga yin no/ /'di ni byang chub kyi lam bla na med pa yin no/ /de nas

de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku de dag thams cad kyis phyag g.yas pa gser gyi kha dog lta bu brkyang ste/ rig sngags 'chang ba'i mgo'i spyi bo la phyag 'jog par mdzad do/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rang gi ngo bo nyid

kyi rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ don yod pa'i zhags pa dang / tshangs pa'i cha byad 'chang ba/ dbu lcang lo cod pan gyis brgyan pa/ pad ma dang / mdung rtse gsum pa dang / zhags pa thogs pa/ rig sngags 'chang ba'i mdun na

bzhugs te bka' stsol pa/ rig sngags 'chang ba khyod kyis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga chen po grub pa legs so legs so/ /zung shig

dang / mchog ji lta ba dang / ji ltar 'dod pa de thams cad sbyin no/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang bas ji ltar 'dod pa'i mchog smras na de thams cad thob par 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug gis

phyag brkyang ste/ rig sngags 'chang ba'i mgo'i spyi bo la phyag gzhag pa dang / phyag gzhag ma thag tu rig sngags 'chang nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du 'gro bar 'gyur

ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mngon sum du mthong ba thob par 'gyur ro/ /phyir mi ldog pa dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i gnas thob par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhing du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis

dbang bskur ba thob par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhing la bsnyen bskur byas nas bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med byang chub sems dpa'i

'khor dang bcas pa chos 'chad pa/ byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du mngon sum du thob par 'gyur ro/ /de nas ho~M khung bshad par bya ste/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sbyin sreg gi gnas bla na med pa'i pad ma kha bye ba 'dra bar

byas pa/ zlum po khru gsum pa sa dang ba'i lci ba bsres pa dang ldan par byas te/ pad ma'i snying po la ho~M khung zabs su brko ba dang / thab ka kun du khru gang ba brko bar bya'o/ /nang du pad ma bcu drug pa 'bur du byas pa gzhag la/

tshon sna tshogs kyis pad ma de brgyan par bya'o/ /pad ma'i phyi 'khor du dkyil 'khor gru bzhir byas la dri sna tshogs kyis gtor ba dang brgyan par bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor kun du bum pa gang ba bzhi dang / dngul gyi snod gang ba

bzhi dang / mchod yon gyi chus bkang ba gser gyi snod bzhi dang / ro sna tshogs kyi gtor ma gzhag pa ni gtor ma dkar gsum rnam pa sna tshogs dang 'bras bu rnam pa sna tshogs gzhag pa dang / dri dang me tog sna tshogs

kyis gtor te/ phreng ba rnam pa sna tshogs spyangs la/ dkyil 'khor kun du tshon sna lnga'i ba dan gyis mda' la brgyan te gzugs pa dang / sgo bzhi cha dbye ba dang / bum pa bzhag pa ni legs par brgyan cing dri chus yongs

su bkang bar bya'o/ /sgo bzhir chos smra ba shin du brgyan pa'i stan la 'dug ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bklag par bya'o/ /grwa bzhir chos smra ba chos kyi stan legs par brgyan pa la 'dug nas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i

mdo' sde bklag par bya'o/ /gser gyi me tog dang / dngul gyi me tog dang / zangs kyi me tog dang / rin po che sna bdun gyis mchod par bya'o/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang bas khrus byas gos gtsang ma bgos dri zhim pos bsgos te/

gtsang mar byas pa la ru lu la don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya'o/ /khro bo'i rgyal po brgya rtsa brgyad kyis dbang bskur ro/ /don yod pa rnam par lta ba'i 'bar ba rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi zhags

pa'i snying pos stong rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg bya ba ni mi smra bar byams pa'i sems dang / snying thag pa nas brtse ba dang / snying rje bar bya ba ni las bla na med pa yin no/ /dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa'

sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di lta ste/ \u0f00 pad ma pA Ni/ tsa ra tsa ra pad ma b+hu dze/ dz+wa la dz+wa la hU tA sha ni/ b+hu ru b+hu ru/ bi mo k+Sha b+hu dze/ da ha da ha/ sarba ma

lan/ a mo g+ha pA ni ba ra de/ hU~M hU~M nir da ha/ pA pa~M/ sha ma sha ma ni/ lo kod tA ra Ni/ sa man+ta raSh+mi ba re bar tu ru tu ru/ pra ba re/ a mo g+ha sid d+hi/ \u0f00 b+hUr+b+hu ba/ na mo stu te swA hA/ de ni rnam par grol ba'i dkyil

'khor 'bar ba zhags pa chen po'i snying po dang / gzungs kyi sbyin sreg gi cho ga 'jig rten las 'das pa bla na med pa yin no/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang bas thal ba des rmad du byung ba chen po'i bya ba thams cad bya'o/ /

thal ba des gang gi lus la byugs pa de ni sgrib pa dang sdig pa thams cad las grol bar 'gyur ro/ /dpral bar thig le byas na de ma thag tu zhag bzhi pa'i rims las thar bar 'gyur ro/ /zhag gnyis pa dang / zhag gsum pa

dang / mtshan mo pa dang / nyin par pa dang / nam phyed pa dang / nyin phyed pa dang / lo gcig pa dang / zla ba gcig pa dang / zhag bdun pa dang / rtag pa'i rims lan 'ga' yang gnas shing phyir 'ong bar mi 'gyur ro/ /dpag tshad

brgya 'das te 'bros par 'gyur ro/ /'tshogs mar thig le byas na stong phrag brgya rtsa bzhi las thar bar 'gyur ro/ /thams cad kyang phyogs bcur dpag tshad stong du 'bros par 'gyur ro/ /thal ba'i rdul bya rog gi

mchu la gos pa phyogs kyi gnas gang du lhung ba der gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha za dang / yi dgas dang / grul bum dang / brjed byed dang / bgegs dang / log 'dren phyir gnas par mi 'gyur ro/ /thams cad

'bros so/ /phyogs kyi gnas der lhung na lhar 'ong bar mi 'gyur ro/ /snying gar thig le byas na nad thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro/ /lte ba'i gnas su thig le byas na lto ba'i nang gi nad thams cad mod la sos par 'gyur ro/ /

gdug pas zin pa la bskus na dug med par 'gyur ro/ /dug gis myos pa la byin na dug med par 'gyur ro/ /thal bas khrus byas na byad dang / g.yengs byed dang / sngags dang / dug thams cad rnam par zhig par 'gyur ro/ /

sha bkra dang / mdze dang / 'bras dang / shu phran mched pa dang / 'brum bu dang / lcags 'dra ba'i mtshan dang / dang / me dbal dang / 'brum phran rnams byung na chu dron po dang sbyar te bskus la mar la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas
pas bskus na mod la nad thams cad las yongs su thar bar 'gyur ro/ /sprin logs su gtor na sad dang / ser ba thams cad mi 'bab bo/ /rlung ldang ba logs su gtor na rlung bsdams par 'gyur ro/ /

phyogs bzhir gtor na mtshams chen po bcad par 'gyur ro/ /yul 'khor kun du gtor na me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / lo tog dang / me tog gi ljon shing dang / shing gi yal ga dang / ldum ra dang / kun dga'

ra ba dang / ri dang / rtswa dang / shing gel pa dang / sman dang / nags tshal thams cad legs par bsrungs par 'gyur ro/ /yul 'khor la dpag tshad brgya tshun cad kun du mtshams chen po gcad pa byas par

'gyur ro/ /grong khyer gyi sgo bzhir gtor na der 'jug pa dang / phyir 'byung ba'i sems can bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / rje rigs dang / dmangs rigs dang /

byol song gi skye gnas su gtogs pa rkang gnyis pa dang / rkang bzhi pa dang / ri dgas dang / bya de dag thams cad sgrib pa dang / sdig pa dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /dgongs pa tsam gyis nad dang / sdug bsngal thams cad

las grol bar 'gyur ro/ /nad thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /tshe yongs su brjes nas bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su 'gro zhing / sangs rgyas nyid du gnas kyi bar du phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba'i gnas thob

par 'gyur ro/ /dur khrod dam/ ro bsreg pa'i steng du thal bas gtor na/ dmyal bar skyes pa'i sems can de dag thams cad mod la dmyal ba nas thar te/ mngon par dga' ba 'am/ bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro/ /
grong khyer ram/ gtsug lag khang ngam/ lha'i gnas sam/ grong ngam/ khyim mam/ dgon pa'i gnas sam/ yul 'khor kun du gtor na mtshams chen po bcad cing zhi ba chen por 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po'i

pho brang gi sgor gtor na rgyal po dang btsun mo'i 'khor dgra thams cad las legs par bsrungs par 'gyur ro/ /skye bo mang po'i nang du gtor na skye bo mang po de dag thams cad sgrib pa dang / nad thams cad dang
bral bar 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang bye ba stong phrag brgya byed pas rang 'dod pa la rang gi blos thams cad du sbyar bar bya'o/ /de nas rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po
'jig rten las 'das pa'i sku gzugs ras la bri ba bshad par bya'o/ /dar ram ras gtsang ma legs par btags pa tshad khru do 'am/ khru gsum 'am/ khru bzhi pa de'i dbus su don yod pa'i
zhags pa/ 'jig rten dbang phyug /tshangs pa'i cha byad 'chang ba/ dbu lcang lo cod pan gyis brgyan pa/ cod pan rgyal ba 'od dpag med dang g.yas su zla ba tshes pa can gyis brgyan pa/ phyag bzhi pa/

rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ skyil mo dkrung btas ce bzhugs pa bri ba ni ri bo po ta la lcug ma me tog can sna tshogs kyis gang ba/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi lcug mas gang ba bya'o/ /de'i steng du rgyan
thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ seng ge'i khri bya'o/ /seng ge'i khri'i steng du pad ma'i gdan bya'o/ /de'i steng du 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bzhugs par bya ste/ pad ma dang / mdung rtse gsum
pa dang / zhags pa thogs shing gzugs de phyag dbugs 'byin pa bya'o/ /dbu'i gong man chad gzhal med khang chen po lha rdzas rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa/ dbus su mtho ba dang bcas pa bya'o/ /

dbus mtho ba'i steng du de bzhin gshegs pa bdun tshad dang mthun par pad ma'i gdan la bzhugs shing rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de'i gong gi dbus su de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad

dang / 'od dpag med dang / spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'od dang / de bzhin gshegs pa gsum rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ skyil mo dkrung bcas te gzhal med khang gi nang na bzhugs par bya'o/ /'phags pa spyan

ras gzigs dbang phyug gi 'od mdom gang la 'khor bar de bzhin gshegs pa sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan par bya/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i nye 'khor kun du 'od zer 'bar ba sna tshogs dang / mdung rtse gsum pa'i phreng ba

bya'o/ /de nyid kyi nye 'khor du lha sum bcu rtsa gnyis bya'o/ /gong gi dbus su rdo rje 'chang ba khro gnyer can rdo rje gsor bar bya'o/ /de nas tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / lha'i dbang phyug chen po dang /

sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi dbang po dang / 'og min gnam gyi lha'i bu dga' ldan gyi lha'i bu dang / 'phrul dga'i lha'i bu dang / zla ba dang / nyi ma'i lha'i bu dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / lus ngan po dang / gzhon nu dang / me lha dang /

nag po chen po dang / dga' ba'i dbang phyug dang / dga' bo dang / nye dga' bo dang / stobs lha dang / gang ba bzang po dang / nor bu bzang po dang / gnas gtsang ma'i rigs kyi lha dang / sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha dang / gzhan 'phrul

dbang byed kyi lha'i bu rnams me tog sna tshogs dang / nor bu rin po che sna tshogs lag pa nas 'phrul pa dang / mtshon cha sna tshogs thogs par bya// //'phags pa don yod zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po/ bam po

bcu bzhi pa/ lha rnams kyi phyi rol thog thag tu pad ma'i phreng ba rdo rje dang / mdung rtse gsum pas spras pa'i pad ma'i phreng bas kun du 'khor bar bya/ g.yas phyogs su 'phags ma sgrol ma skyil mo dkrung phyed du bcas te bzhugs

pa/ uta pa la dang / nor bu rin po che phyag na thogs pa/ brgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhal du blta bar bya'o/ /de'i rgyab tu khro gnyer ma me tog sna tshogs 'chang ba/

rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa bya'o/ /g.yon du dkar mo zhes bya ba ni skyil mo dkrung phyed du bcas te bzhugs pa/ ku mu da dang / nor bu rin po che lag na thogs pa rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa 'phags pa spyan

ras gzigs dbang phyug la blta bar bya'o/ /dkar mo de'i rgyab tu pad ma mdzes dga' ma/ me tog sna tshogs thogs pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa bya'o/ /lha mo sgrol ma dang / dkar mo'i 'og du pha rol tu phyin pa

bcu'i lha mo thams cad kyang dbu yid tsam 'dud pa/ na bza' dkar mo gsol pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa bzhengs pa bya'o/ /g.yas phyogs su srin mo ral pa gcig ma gtum mo skyil mo dkrung phyed du bcas te

bzhugs pa/ phyag bzhi la zhags pa dang / dgra sta dang / ral gri dang / rdo rje lag na thogs pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la blta bar bya'o/ /g.yon du pho nya mo zhal mche ba gtsigs pa/ phyag

bzhi la rdo rje dang / dgra sta dang / zhags pa dang / mdung rtse gsum pa phyag na thogs pa/ skyil mo dkrung phyed du bcas te bzhugs pa/ 'bar ba'i nang na 'jig rten dbang phyug la blta bar bya'o/ /ri bo po ta la'i ngos kyi gseb tu klu'i rgyal

po dga' bo dang / bsnyen dga' bo dang / klu'i bu mo klu'i gnas dang bcas pa bya ste/ me tog sna tshogs thogs shing / gong du bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten dbang phyug la 'thor bar bya'o/ /ri'i smad du lha mo dpe med ma dang / lha mo ba sa na ti dang /

sa'i lha mo dang / dpal lha mo dang / lha mo 'jigs ma dang / sgra dbyangs ma dang / lcags sgrog ma dang / dung can ma ste/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ me tog sna tshogs dang / nor bu rin po che thogs pa bya'o/ /gzhal med

khang gi gong du mchod rten chen po brgyad phreng bar sbrengs la mchod rten gyi rgyan ji lta bar brgyan par bya'o/ /mchod rten gyi 'og g.yas rol du bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi snying por gshegs pa la 'jig rten dbang

phyug mngon du mchod pa mdzad pa bya'o/ /'phags pa rdo rje 'chang ba phyag na rnga yab thogs pa bya'o/ /de'i 'og tu drang srong dang / lha'i bu me tog sna tshogs kyis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya'o/ /g.yon phyogs
su bcom ldan 'das chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba bya ste/ kun dga' bo dang / rdo rje 'chang ba lag na rnga yab kyis bcom ldan 'das la mngon du g.yob par bya'o/ /g.yas phyogs su 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs

dbang phyug don yod pa'i zhags pa bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed pa bya'o/ /g.yon phyogs su khro bo'i rgyal po bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed pa bya'o/ /de'i 'og tu drang srong dang / lha'i tshogs bcom ldan 'das

la mchod pa byed pa bya'o/ /rang gi sku gzugs kyi g.yon dang g.yas kyi phyi rol thog tag tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs brgya rtsa brgyad pad mo'i gdan la tshad ji bzhin du skyil mo dkrung bcas te bzhugs pa rgyan thams

cad kyis brgyan par bya'o/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi seng ge'i gdan gyi zhabs drung du rig sngags 'chang ba pus mo btsugs te/ me tog dang / pog phor dang / bgrang phreng lag na thogs te 'phags pa

spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mngon du lta bar bya'o/ /ri mo mkhan khrus byas shing gos gtsang ma bgos te/ gtsang bar byas la ro sna tshogs pa'i zas dkar gsum bza' bar bya'o/ /snod sar pa gtsang ma'i nang

nas tshon lhag ma ma yin pas bri bar bya'o/ /'di yang kha zas mi gtsang ba sna tshogs dang / gos ngan pa mi gtsang ba yongs su spang bar bya'o/ /tshig ngan pa dang / sems ngan pa yongs su spang bar bya'o/ /chang dang / sha dang /

beg tsong dang / sgog skya dang / ke'u dang 'dres pa yongs su spang bar bya'o/ /nyi ma re re zhing ba'i rnam lnga la reg par bya'o/ /dri ma dang bral zhing ser sna dang / phrag dog dang bral bar bya'o/ /byams pa dang / snying rje'i lhag pa'i

bsam pa dang / dkon mchog gsum la dang ba lhag par bya ste ras kyi sku gzugs bri bar bya'o/ /ga pur dang / gla rtsis bsgos pa'i tshon sna tshogs kyis bri bar bya'o/ /dben zhing 'du 'dzi yongs su spang bar bya'o/ /rmugs pa dang /

gnyid yongs su spang bar bya'o/ /de ltar ri mo bri ba ni las legs par byas pa yin no/ /zla ba yar gyi ngo la bri bar bya'o/ /rgyu skar shin du bkra shis pa dang / tshes grangs dang nyi ma shin du bkra shis pa la brtsam par bya'o/ /

rgyu skar rgyal ni bkra shis pa yin te de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bsngags pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa/ lha thams cad kyis rjes su gzung ba yin no/ /rigs kyi bu dang /

rigs kyi bu mo dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs dang / bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo

gang la la zhig don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag byas pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rnam par gzigs pa/ byang chub chen po'i dkyil 'khor gsang ba/ rnam par grol ba'i

dkyil 'khor gsang ba/ ras kyi sku gzugs chen po mthong ba ni sku gzugs mthong ba tsam gyi mod la sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad las rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro/ /mtshams med pa lnga byed pa dang / mtshams med pa

la gzhol ba dang / dam pa'i chos yongs su spong ba dang / 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa dang / sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad spong bar byed pa rnams

kyang mthong ba tsam la sogs pas sdig pa thams cad phye mar klog go/ rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro/ /sdom pa chen po yang dag par 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /gang gA'i klung gi bye ma bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag

dgu bcu rtsa dgu snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub snying po la mngon du gshegs pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba mthong ba dang 'dra bar rig par bya'o/ /ras kyi sku gzugs 'di mthong ba ni gzhal med khang

dang bcas pa'i ri bo ta la na 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas te mngon du bzhugs pa mngon du mthong ba dang 'dra ste/ 'di la the tshom mi bya'o/ /yid gnyis bskyed par mi

bya'o/ /sems kyi skad cig gcig rab tu dang ba byas na/ bsod nams kyi phung po chen po yongs su gzung bar 'gyur ro/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po sogs pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang
phyug gis dgongs te mchog sbyin par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis yongs su gzung bar 'gyur ro/ /lus dang sems yid las byung ba'i yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/ /dbang po thams cad yongs

su dag par 'gyur ro/ /dri ma dang bral zhing ser sna dang / phrag dog dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten pa thams cad dga' ba dang / bla mar lta bar 'gyur ro/ /tshe ring por 'gyur ro/ /nad thams cad dang bral bar
'gyur ro/ /shi nas bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skal ba mnyam par skye bar 'gyur ro/ /tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro/ /pad ma'i nang nas rdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro/ /mthong ba tsam gyi mod la

phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag tu med pa'i sku gzugs 'di gang gis mchod pa de ni phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchod par 'gyur ro/ /'di ni mngal na gnas pa'i tha ma

yin te/ phyis ma rig pa'i mun pa'i nang du ltung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de ltar na mi mnyam pa dang 'dra ba yin te/ ras kyi sku gzugs kyi cho ga 'jig rten las 'das pa sgrub pa'i cho ga 'di ni dam pa yin no/ / de nas

gsang sngags kyi cho ga 'jig rten las 'das pa sgrub pa brjod par bya'o/ /gang gis dran pa tsam gyi mod la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mngon sum du mthong nas 'dug pa dang / phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing

thams cad sgo phye ste 'dug pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis mngon du mthong ba sbyin par mdzad pa dang / dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad mngon du bsrung ba dang / skyob pa dang / sbed par mdzad pa dang / dkyil 'khor

dang / phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags dang / snying po dang / cho ga zhib mo thams cad mngon du 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten las 'das pa'i lus su 'gro ba yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/ /dus gsum du gshegs shing so so na bzhugs

pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i 'phags pa'i tshogs mchog thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'phags pa rdo rje 'chang ba dang / dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad dang / rig pa'i rgyal

po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /oM a mo g+ha a ba lo ki te ma hA maN Da la pad me sarba bo d+hi satwa na ma skr-i te/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ sa man ta a ba lo kri te/ a mo g+ha ma hA brash+pu/ be sha d+ha ra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka bo d+ha ya/ bo d+ha ya/

ma ha bo d+ha ni/ bo d+hi bo d+hi/ pad ma bi bo d+ha ni/ sarba pA pa an d+ha kA ra/ pra sha ma ni/ sarba dur ga ti/ b+ha ra ka /ma hA kA ru Ni ka /ba hu bi bi d+ha/ be sha d+ha ra/ sarba ta thA ga ta gar+b+he/ hu ru hu ru/ a mo g+ha gar+b+he/ tu ru tu ru/ a mo g+ha pA

sha haste/ mu ru mu ru/ bi mo k+Sha b+hu dze/ k+Shi Ni k+Shi Ni/ sarba A ba ra Na bi shud d+he/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ sarba ta thA ga ta/ pa ri pU ra Ni/ ta ra ta ra/ tA ra ya mAn/ a ba lo kA ya/ pad ma b+hu dze/ ma Ni ka na ka /bi b+hu Shi ta/ bA hu/ da ma da ma/

dur dAn tA nAn/ ma hA bo d+hi satwa ba ra da/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka /sarba de ba ga Na na ma skr-i ta/ r-i Shi ga Na/ sta bi ta/ sha ta sA ha sra tsan tra sUr+ya/ a hi re ga /rash+mI/ /ra ba b+hA si ta/ ma ha pa shu pa ti/ be sha d+ha ra/ pa ra ma/ shud d+ha satwa/ a ba lo ki

ti ta/ lo ke shwa ra/ ma he shwa ra/ pa ra ma/ kA ru Ni ka /maN Da le shwa ra/ su pra bud d+ha/ ma hA pad ma/ b+hu dze shwa ra/ ma hA bid+ya d+ha re shwa ra/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka /ma hA bi mo k+Sha/ maN Da la/ d+ha ra sarba ta thA ga ta/ gu h+ya/ mu drA sa ma

ya d+ha ra/ ma hA bid+ya d+ha ra/ ma hA ma Ni/ mau li d+ha ra/ a mi tA b+ha/ mu ku Ta/ d+ha ra/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ sa man ta/ a ba lo ki ta/ lo ke shwa ra/ ma he shwa ra/ pA sha d+ha re/ shwa ra/ pa ra pa ra/ pa ra ma/ ma hA mai tri/ a ba lo ki te/ sarba satwa/

san ta ra ga /sid d+hi/ si d+h+yA shwA/ pa ri pU ra ka /ma hA ba ra/ pra mo da/ na mo stu te swA hA/ 'di ni thams cad rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag byas pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa

thams cad kyi gsang ba/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po'i mchog /gsang ba sdig pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad yongs su sbyong ba/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam rnam par sbyong ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad

kyi rigs 'jug pa yin no/ /dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /oM bI ra bI ra/ ma hA maN Da la/ bi shwa rU pa Sha Ta pA ra mi tA/ pa ri

pU ra ka /sarba bo d+hi sa twa/ na ma skr-i ta/ pa ra ma bi pu la/ bi mo k+sha d+ha ra/ ma hA pA sha /bi lo ki ta/ a mo g+ha pA sha dz+wa li ti ma hA dz+wa la a ba lo ki ta/ ma hA ma Ni b+hip+Ta d+ha ra/ sa man ta a ba b+hA si ta/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ ma hA ga ma b+hi ra/ bi mo k+sha pA sha d+ha ra/

ba la bo d+h+yang ga /A kaR+Sha ka /oM brah+ma rU pa/ ma hA a mo g+ha pA sha hU~M hU~M/ phaT phaT/ sarba satwa/ bi lo ki ta/ pa ra pra da/ na mo stu te swA hA/ 'di ni rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po 'jig rten
las 'das pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa'o/ /dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /oM

bi bud d+h+ye/ bi bud d+h+ye/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka /ta ra ta ra ta rA ya/ ma ra arna ba pa ran/ ma hA d+hu dza bi lo ka ya hU~M phaT swA hA/ nye ba'i snying po'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa'

sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /oM a mo g+ha pA sha /ma hA dA na pA ra mi ta/ pa ri pU ra ya/ hU~M da ra da ra/ bi bi d+ha/ bi tse tre/ sarba satwa u

pa b+ho ga /sarba ta thA ga ta/ ma hA dA na/ pU dza me ge/ pra brta ya/ ta ra ta ra/ tA ra ya/ ma hA pad ma pA Ni hU~M phaT swA hA/ 'di ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i zhags pa chen po'i snying po ste/ gang gis yungs 'brum

tsam yang sbyin pa byin te dran pa tsam gyis lan bdun bzlas brjod byas na mchod sbyin sbyin pa rnam par 'phrul pa chen po shin du rgyas pa chen po'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /
de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /oM a mo g+ha shI la/ sa~M b+ha ra

sa~M b+ha ra/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ ma hA shud d+ha satwa/ pad ma bi b+hU Shi ta/ b+hu dza d+ha ra d+ha ra/ sa man ta/ a ba lo ki te/ hU~M phaT swA hA/ gzungs 'di smyung ba byas te/ gso sbyong gi yan lag brgyad gzung nas mi smra bar lan nyi shu rtsa

gcig dran par bya'o/ /de nas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po bzlas brjod bya'o/ /bzlas brjod byas pa tsam gyi mod la tshul khrims yongs su dag pa chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /tshul khrims kyi pha

rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /tshul khrims kyi dri zhim po'i dri mang po lus las 'byung zhing phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten du grags par 'gyur ro/ /gang zhig nyi ma re re zhing gzungs 'di dran na de ni

rtag tu tshul khrims yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/ /dge slong gang la la zhig tshul khrims zhig cing nyams par smyung ba byas te/ 'di bzlas brjod byas pa tsam gyi mod la tshul khrims yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/ /tshul
khrims mang po dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po la

phyag 'tshal lo/ /oM ma hA bIr+ya/ a mo g+ha bi lo ki te/ ba ra ba ra/ dri D+ha/ bIr+ya/ ma ha ba la/ ba la ba la/ ma hA bo d+h+yang / ba la bo d+ha ni/ hU~M phaT swA hA/ gzungs 'di dus rtag tu yongs su dag pa'i yid kyis dran par

byas na dran pa tsam gyi mod la brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du nam yang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag

'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /oM a mo g+ha k+Shan te/ sarba bo d+hi satwa k+Sha mi Na/ k+Sha Na k+Sha Na/ ma hA mai tri/ kA ru Na/ sarba sa d+ha/ bad sa la/

ma hA kA ru Ni ka /sarba sa twa k+Sha mi Na/ hU~M phaT swA hA/ gzungs 'di sems can du gyur pa thams cad la bzod pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / brtse ba'i sems kyis dmyal ba na gnas pa dang / byol song gi skye gnas su gtogs pa ri

dgas dang / bya gang dag 'das pa gang yin pa dang / gnas pa gang yin pa dang / skye ba gang yin pa de rnams la snying rje ba'i phyir gang zhig gzungs kyi mchog dran par byed na/ dmyal ba'i sems can las thar bar 'gyur zhing

skye bo mang po gnas pa gang yin pa rnams grol bar 'gyur ro/ /nam sangs rgyas kyi zhing la gnas kyi bar du bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal

lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta/ ma hA a mo g+ha/ kA ru NA/ d+h+yA na sa mA d+hi/ sarba bi mo k+Sha/ a pra kam pya ka /tsu ru

tsu ru hU~M phaT swA hA/ gzungs 'di 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la dmigs nas yid rtse gcig tu byas te dran par byas na dran pa tsam gyi mod la des bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /

gzhan yang ting nge 'dzin stong phrag brgya so sor thob par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du bzhugs par 'gyur ro/ /bzlas brjod byas pa tsam gyis ting nge 'dzin thams cad la dbang sgyur bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs

pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /oM a mo g+ha/ ma hA pradz+nyA/ a ba b+hA sa/ s+pha ra Na/ bud d+hi/

pra sa ra pra sa ra/ sa man ta bud d+hi/ a ba lo ki ta/ b+ha ga bAn pradz+nyA/ a ba lo ki ta/ tsak+Shu ShA ma hA pradz+nyA/ pra ra da/ pA Ni/ ma hA pradz+nyA/ pad ma d+ha ri Na/ b+hU dze hU~M phaT swA hA/ gzungs 'di dran pa tsam gyi mod la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa

yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /thabs dang shes rab sna tshogs kyi dge ba chen po'i blo 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par pha rol tu phyin pa bcu'i blo dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad

dang / 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i shes rab dang blor 'gyur ro/ /lan 'ga' yang pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ /sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus

dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi blo nyams par mi 'gyur ro/ /byang chub la thug gi bar du rab tu rmongs par mi 'gyur ro/ /don yod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi gzungs chen po yin no/ /dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /

byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad ya thA/ oM a mo g+ha bi mo k+Sha/ maN Da la ma hA da b+hU ta bi ma le/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hi ra d+hi ra/ ma hA b+hU ta/ a mi tA

b+ha/ ma ku Ta/ d+ha ra hU~M phaT swA hA/ dkyil 'khor der yungs kar dang / dri chab dang ldan pa'i bum pa la sngags bzlas brjod byas nas chus kun du chag chag btab na chag chag btab pa tsam gyi mod la dkyil 'khor kun du sa sbyangs te yongs su

dag par 'gyur ro/ /ji ltar shel gong dang / rin po che dag pa dri ma med pa mdzes pa de 'dra ba'i sa gzhir 'gyur ro/ /shin du dag pa dang / shin du nyams dga' ba dang / shin du yid du 'ong ba'i sa gzhir 'gyur ro/ /shin du sa gzhi spa bar 'gyur ro/ /

sa phyogs de'i bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs gang dag 'khod pa de dag thams cad phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la rab tu gnas par 'gyur ro/ /

de dag thams cad phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro/ /shi nas bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skye bar 'gyur ro/ /tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro/ /nam bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang

rgya'i bar du bsod nams kyi phung po'i dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po sogs par 'gyur ro/ /gang dag byol song gi skye gnas su gtogs pa ri dgas dang / bya de dag phyogs der 'gro zhing rab tu 'jug pa de dag thams cad yongs su grol

bar 'gyur ro/ /bde 'gro'i lam la rab tu gnas par 'gyur ro/ /gang gis de'i sa lag par 'ongs te reg pa de dag thams cad nad dang bral ba dang / nyon mongs pa dang bral ba dang / rims dang bral ba dang / sgrib pa med pa dang /

sdig pa dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /de dag phyis lus la tshor ba'i nad 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rtag tu bde bas tshim pa'i lus su 'gyur ro/ /sa yongs su sbyong ba'i rigs sngags so/ /dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /

byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad ya thA/ oM a mo g+ha dru ma/ la ta pr-i k+Sha/ sha kha pa tra pad+ma pha la/ bi Ta pa a ro ha/ na hi DA ga /

push+ka ri Na/ ud sa hr-i da/ sun da ra pra bra ba Na/ bi bi d+ha/ bi tsid tra/ pa ri sho d+ha ya/ pad ma b+hu dze/ sa ma sa ma/ sa man te na/ pa ri maN Da la/ pa ri sho d+ha ya/ ma la ma la/ bi ma la bi ma la/ su pa ri shud d+ha/ pad ma u pa li b+ha

dza la ma lA na bi shud d+ha/ sho d+ha ya sho d+ha ya/ pa ra ma ma hA shud d+hA ya/ hU~M phaT/ na mo tri b+hu ba ne hU~M phaT swA hA/ 'dis tsan dan dang / pad ma du srang bdun btung bar bya'o/ /khrus byas pa tsam gyi mod la khro bo'i rgyal pos bdag nyid

dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /khrus byas pa tsam dang / dbang bskur ba tsam gyis bdag rang gi phyi nang yongs su dag cing dri ma med par 'gyur ro/ /sdig pa dang / sgrib pa dang / dug dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /nyon mongs pa dang nad dang bral

bar 'gyur ro/ /rga ba la sogs pa dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /bgegs dang / log 'dren dang / bdud la sogs pa thams cad las yongs su thar bar 'gyur ro/ /gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha za la sogs pa

thams cad yongs su spangs par 'gyur zhing bar chad bya ba'i phyir rig sngags 'chang ba'i drung du slar 'ong nus par mi 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags 'chang bde bar sgrub pa dang / bde bar nyal ba dang / bde bar sad pa dang / nam 'tsho'i

bar du bde bar gnas pa dang / dri ma thams cad spang ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mngon sum du
mthong ste shi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur ro/ /bde ba can gyi khams su skal ba mnyam par skye bar 'gyur ro/ /pad mo'i nang nas rdzus te skyes nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med mngon sum du mthong bar

'gyur ro/ /rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa dang / lus mtshan dang dpe byad kyis brgyan pa dang / tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro/ /mthar byang chub la thug gi bar du sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro bar 'gyur

ro/ /rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po cho ga zhib mo 'di mtha' dag rdzogs par kha ton byed par 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pas bka' stsal pa'i mdo sde gzhung sna tshogs rnam

pa du ma kha ton byed par 'gyur ro/ /bskal pa stong phrag brgya tshun chad du skye ba dran par 'gyur ro/ /oM a mo g+ha pad ma/ bi ma le/ pra sa ra/ sa man ta/ mu khe swA hA/ char phye ste thig gdab pa'i sngags so/ /oM a mo

g+ha bi d+ha/ rU pa bi tsid tra/ gan d+ha ra san d+ha ra/ pra ba ra/ b+hu dze swA hA/ tshon rtsi'i sngags dang / sku gzugs gzhag pa dang / mtshon cha'i rtags bri ba'i sngags so/ /oM a mo g+ha sa man ta pa ri maN Da la/ pA sha bad b+he hU~M/ yungs kar la

lan bdun bzlas brjod byas pas dkyil 'khor bsnam par bya'o/ /oM a mo g+ha/ sa man ta/ da sha dig ma hA si man/ ban d+ha ya/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ hU~M phaT swA hA/ yungs kar la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas pas mtshams gcad pa'o/ /

oM a mo g+ha rak+Sha Na/ pA sha ha ste/ b+hu ru b+hu ru swA hA/ yungs kar dang dri chab la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas pas bdag bsrung ba'o/ /oM a mo g+ha ts+'u Da ma Ni/ h+'u ru h+'u ru/ nA ga pA sha bad d+he hU~M swA hA/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod

byas pas spyi gtsug bcing ba'o/ /oM a mo g+ha rak+Sha/ sa man te na/ ma hA pA she/ d+hu ru d+hu ru swA hA/ slob ma dang grogs rnams bsrung ba ste yungs kar dang / thal ba la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas te bsrung bar bya'o/ /

oM a mo g+ha/ dza la bi ma le/ su ru su ru swA hA/ dri chu la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas pas khrus bya ba'i sngags so/ /oM a mo g+ha a mr-i ta bin du tsa ra tsa ra swA hA/ nye reg bya ba'i sngags so/ /oM a mo g+ha di bya ba ste tsu ru tsu ru

swA hA/ gos kyi sngags so/ /oM a mo g+ha b+hu dza ka /ka ba tsa/ ba ra de/ tsi ri tsi ri swA hA/ go cha'i sngags yin te yungs kar dang / gur gum gyi chus bya'o/ /oM a mo g+ha brah+ma b+hu dze bar+yan te na pra sa ra swA hA/ mchod phyir thogs kyi sngags

so/ /oM a mo g+ha tsU DA ma Ni pad me/ a b+hi Shiny+tsA ya/ ma ma sarba ta thA ga ta a b+hi She ke+e ma Ni ma Ni swA hA/ dbang bskur ba'i sngags so/ /oM a mo g+ha pad ma sa sun d+ha ra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+ha ra Ni/ maN De hU~M/ stan gyi gsang

sngags so/ /oM a mo g+ha sa man ta pa r+yang ke/ b+hu bi swA hA/ skyil mo dkrung bca' ba'i sngags so/ /oM a mo g+ha su ra d+hi/ pad me pa ra pa ra hU~M`/ me tog gi sngags so/ /oM a mo g+ha bi bi d+ha/ gan d+ha/ pra sa re+e/ pUr+NA b+hu dze

swA hA/ dri'i sngags so/ /oM a mo g+ha bi bi d+ha le pa na pra ba re pi ri pi ri swA hA/ byug pa'i sngags so/ /oM a mo g+ha ga ga na s+pha ra Na/ ma yai b+hu ra b+hu ra hU~M/ bdug pa'i sngags so/ /o~M` a mo g+ha shu kla sa ra sa ra sa a gla d+ha ra bi d+ha ra

hU~M/ gtor ma'i sngags te thams cad du bya'o/ /oM a mo g+ha pra ba ra/ nu pi lo ki ni/ ki ri ki ri hU~M/ zas dang gtor ma'i sngags so/ /oM bi bi d+ha/ a mo g+ha/ pha la/ pa ra pa ra hU~M/ 'bras bu'i sngags so/ /oM a mo g+ha ad b+hud g+han d+ha

ba re hU~M/ mchod yon gyi sngags so/ /oM a mo g+ha/ bi bi d+ha/ ma Ni/ b+hU Sha Na/ ba re/ dz+wa la dz+wa la hU~M/ rgyan dang / thod dang / dar dpyang ba dang / mda' dang / tshon sna lnga dang / thig skud kyi sngags so/ /oM a mo g+ha/ b+hi bi d+ha/ b+hA dza ne/ dza ya dza ya swA hA/

snod kyi sngags te thams cad du sbyar ro/ /oM a mo g+ha pra ba ra b+ha ba na b+ha be tha ra tha ra swA hA/ gzhug pa'i sngags so/ /oM a mo g+han ma ska ra Na/ sarba ta thA ga ta/ an dza le hU~M/ phyag 'tshal ba dang thal mo sbyar ba'i sngags so/ /oM a

mo g+ha tsakre du ru du ru pra du ru swA hA/ bskor ba'i sngags so/ /oM a mo g+ha sa man ta b+ha ba b+ha ba swA hA/ spyan drang ba'i sngags so/ /oM a mo g+ha tsin tA ma Ne A kaR+Sha ya du ru du ru swA hA/ gsol ba gdab pa'i sngags so/ /oM a

mo g+ha ni maN ta Na bi mo k+Sha maN De le mi li mi li swA hA/ snyan gsan dbab pa'i sngags so/ /oM a mo g+ha ma hA ra sh+mA+e dz+wa las ha sre dz+wa la dz+wa la man te / mar me'i sngags so/ /oM a mo g+ha pA sha ha ste pra sa ra gad tsha swa b+hA ba nan bi sardzi to si sa ra sa ra

hU~M phaT swA hA/ slar gshegs su gsol ba'i sngags so/ /oM a mo g+ha pA sha ban d+ha sa man d+ha ma hA sa ma ya dri D+he hU~M phaT swA hA/ dam tshig gi sngags so/ /oM a mo g+ha sa man te/ pra ba ra/ sa ra sa ra/ pra sa ra ma hA

b+hu te shwa ra/ d+hi ri d+hi ri hU~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ gsang sngags 'dis la du dang / mo da ka dang / zan dang / rtsa ba dang / sdong bu dang / gtor ma dkar po dang / tshogs chen po'i gtor ma sbyin pa dang / me tog dang / bdug pa'i sbyin pa

byas na phyis bgegs byed nus par mi 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten las 'das pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi/ /phyag rgya de nas brjod bya ste/ /gang gis gzung ba tsam gyis ni/ /sdig pa thams cad zhi bar 'gyur/ /las dang nyon mongs sgrib pa dang / /
dug rnams thams cad rnam par bcom/ /rnam grol dkyil 'khor rigs kyi ni/ /dam tshig phyag rgya yang dag yin/ /lag gnyis pad ma 'drar byas la/ /sor mo rnams ni mnyam gzhag ste/ /gung mo lcags kyu 'dra

bar bya/ /lag gnyis mnyam par gzhag pa yi/ /phyag rgya rnam grol dam tshig 'di/ /don yod zhags par byin gyis brlabs/ /'jig rten 'das pa khyad par gyi/ /lam gyi 'bras bu thob par byed/ /oM pad ma b+hu dze
