pad ma bi ma le swA hA/ dam tshig rtse mo'i rtse shes pas/ /rdo rje pad ma rtag tu bya/ /gung mo cung zad bskums nas ni/ /lag gnyis pad mo 'dra bar bya/ /gang gis phyag rgya 'di mthong ba/ /'jig rten rnams kyi dbang
phyug dag /mtshungs pa med par 'gyur ba yin/ /rnam grol phyag rgyas dogs med par/ /sangs rgyas mtshungs med 'gyur ba yin/ /byang chub sems dpa' kun gyis ni/ /phyag byas pa yi phyag rgya 'di/ /

rnam grol dkyil 'khor rmad du byung / /oM pad me su pad me/ bi mo k+Sha maN Da la/ pad ma b+hu dze swA hA/ rdo rje bcing ba mnyam gzhag ste/ /rdo rje pad mo gung mo ni/ /bskums na de bzhin gshegs kun gyi/ /

rnam grol gsung ba'i phyag rgya 'di/ /yang dag 'grol bar rab tu bstan/ /phyag rgya 'di ni bstan pas ni/ /ngan par byas pa thams cad 'jig /oM a mo g+ha badzra pad ma b+hu dze mi li mi li swA hA/ lag gnyis
thal mo khong stong las/ /mdar na nor bu 'dra bar bcing / /nor bu'i phyag rgya rdo rje 'dra/ /yid bzhin nor bur brjod pa yin/ /las ni don yod thams cad byed/ /don yod mchod pa'i
char 'bebs shing / /don yod pha rol phyin drug rdzogs/ /don yod sangs rgyas rnams dang ni/ /byang chub sems dpa' mthong ba yin/ /don yod rnam grol dkyil 'khor gsang / /mtshams med lnga po sbyong bar

mdzad/ /oM a mo g+ha ma Ni ma Ni/ ma hA ma Ni pad ma ma Ni swA hA/ rdo rje pad ma'i thal mo sbyar/ /pad ma kha bye 'dra bar rgyas/ /gung mo lcags kyu 'dra ba yi/ /phyag rgya 'di ni mchog tu bzang / /phyag rgya 'di ni mthong tsam gyis/ /

'bras bu chen po rmad du byung / /'jig rten 'das pa khyad par 'phags/ /dus gsum sangs rgyas mthong ba yin/ /oM a mo g+ha/ badzre ma hA pad me/ dza le su dza le/ ma hA dza le swA hA/ snying gar rdo rje pad ma nyid/ /rdo rje bcing ba

phun sum tshogs/ /mdzub mo lcags kyu 'dra ba ni/ /bcing bar bya ba phyag rgya 'di/ /gzi brjid chen po dag dang ni/ /stobs chen pha rol gnon pa dang / /thams cad grub par byed pa'i gnas/ /thams cad grub par
rab tu sbyin/ /'jig rten 'das pa grub pa che/ /sangs rgyas nyid phyir bla na med/ /sdig pa thams cad 'phrog pa grub/ /gsang sngags grub pa bla na med/ /oM a mo g+ha sid d+he/ sarba ta thA ga ta

sid d+he/ a ba lo kA ya sid d+he/ ma hA bi pu la sid d+he/ ku ru ku ru swA hA/ rdo rje thal mo mnyam gzhag ste/ /gung mo gshibs te bsgreng ba dang / /srin lag mthe bo so sor 'gyed/ /gung mo yid tsam dgug bya ba/ /

pad ma'i dbang phyug sems dpa' che/ /'jig rten dbang phyug bla ma ste/ /rtag tu rnam grol dkyil 'khor ni/ /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis/ /phyag rgya byas pa 'di yin no/ /phyag rgya 'di dang don yod pa'i

zhags pa'i snying po'i phyag rgya dang / phyag rgya de dag mthong ba ni 'jig rten dbang phyug mthong ba dang 'dra ba yin no/ /phyag rgya mchog 'di mthong ba ni rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor mthong ba dang 'dra ba yin te/ phyir mi ldog

pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /phyag rgya 'di bcings pa tsam mthong ba'i mod la dam tshig thams cad shes par 'gyur ro/ /mthong ba dang gzung ba tsam gyi mod la 'bras bu chen po 'thob cing mod la sangs rgyas dang byang chub bla na
med pa yin no/ /dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po phyag 'tshal lo/ /oM a ba lo ki ta ma ha shud d+ha

sa twa sa ra sa ra/ sa man ta a ba b+hA sa/ kuN Da la/ d+ha la/ a mi tA b+ha/ ma ku Ta d+ha/ dza Ta ma ku Ta/ na ba badzren dra/ maN Di la/ tsa ra tsa ra/ sam b+ha ra/ b+hu ba ne shwa ra pad ma b+hu dze swA hA/ phyag rgya chen po bdun po de dag ni 'jig rten

las 'das pa byang chub snying po'i lam gyi 'bras bu ston pa/ rtag tu 'jig rten dbang phyug bla ma 'jig rten mgon po'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba yin no/ /phyag rgya bdun n-i phyag rgya chen po bye ba phrag bdun gyis yongs su

bskor ba yin te/ phyag rgya chen po bdun po de gang du bcings shing phyag rgya mchog gzung ba ni phyag rgya chen po bye ba phrag brgya bcings par 'gyur ro/ /gzung bar 'gyur ro/ /de dag thams cad mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur

byas par 'gyur ro/ /bstod par 'gyur ro/ /ming 'dzin pa byas par 'gyur ro/ /phyag rgya bdun po de dag ni gsang sngags sgrub pa thams cad dang / kun du las thams cad la sbyar bar bya'o/ /thams cad byed pa'i

phyag rgya 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam bla na med pa yin no/ /gang zhig phyag rgya de dag bcings pa mthong zhing khrus legs par byas te/ gtsang mas sgrub par byed pa 'di ni ngan 'gror 'gro bar mi 'gyur/ sngon

gyi sgrib pas dmyal ba mthong bar mi 'gyur/ phyag rgya bcings pa tsam gyi mod la yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag bdun gyi drung du dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags par 'gyur ro/ /
bsod nams kyi phung po chen po kun du bzung bar 'gyur ro/ /pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /sa bcu la rab tu gnas par 'gyur ro/ /phyir mi ldog pa'i gnas rab

tu thob par 'gyur ro/ /mtshams med pa lnga byed pa dang / dam pa'i chos spong ba dang / 'phags pa la skur ba 'debs pa dang / mnar med pa la gzhol ba rnams kyis ji ste phyag rgya gzung ba tsam dang / bstan pa tsam

gyi mod la sdig pa de dag thams cad rnam par zhig par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis yongs su gzung bar 'gyur ro/ /lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang /

sha za rnams las legs par bsrungs par 'gyur ro/ /dbang phyug dang dbang phyug chen po dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / gzhon nu rnams rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bsrung ba dang / sba ba'i

phyir rgyun du rjes su 'brang ba byed par 'gyur ro/ /sems can thams cad dga' ba mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /mchod rten du gyur pa yin par 'dod pa dang / lus ring bsrel gy-i snying po yin par 'gyur ro/ /rdo rje ltar
mkhregs pa'i lus su 'gyur ro/ /dug gis mi tshugs/ mes ma yin/ mtshon gyis ma yin/ chus ma yin/ dbyig dug gi 'jigs pas ma yin/ seng ges ma yin/ gcan gzan gtum pos ma yin/ dug mi

bzad pas ma yin/ rkun po dang / mi rgod kyis ma yin/ khyim rdib pas ma yin/ gnod sbyin dang / srin po'i gdon yang 'ong bar mi 'gyur ro/ /nad thams cad 'jug par mi 'gyur/ lus la dug sbyar ma dang / byad dang

sbod stong gi 'jig pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rtag tu sdig pa can gyi rmi lam mthong bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa lta ba mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' lta ba mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /

rtag tu 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mthong ste/ rtag tu mchog sbyin pa mdzad par 'gyur ro/ /lha thams cad kyang rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par 'dis mthong bar dgyes par 'gyur ro/ /rtag tu yon tan dang bsod nams 'bar ro/ /dpal

gyis lus shin tu 'bar ba'i lus su 'gyur ro/ /thams cad du 'di mchod par 'os pa chen por 'gyur te/ rgyal po dang / blon po dang / bram ze dang / khyim bdag dang / btsun mo'i 'khor gyis mchod par 'os pa chen por 'gyur ro/ /lha'i gnas

sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bar du yang dgyes par 'gyur te/ rtag tu dgyes par ston pa bzhed par 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags 'chang bas khrus byas gos gtsang ma bgos te gtsang mar byas la dri sna tshogs kyis lus bsku ba dang / bdug

pa sna tshogs kyis bdug pa byas la/ tsan dan dkar po dang / gur kum gyis lag pa gnyis bskus te/ ga bur dang / bla rtsis bsgos pa'i sa phyogs gtsang mar ras kyi sku gzugs kyi spyan snga 'am/ sangs rgyas

kyi sku gzugs kyi spyan snga 'am/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar skyil mo dkrung bcas te 'dug nas phyag rgya 'di bcing bar bya'o/ /mchod rten ring bsrel can gyi drung du phyag bcing bar

bya'o/ /sangs rgyas la mchod pa'i cho gas yon chab la sogs pa dbul bar bya'o/ /byams pa dang / snying rje'i sems su bya'o/ /sems can thams cad la lhag par brtse ba dang / snying rje'i sems bsgom par bya'o/ /

sems can thams cad la bu gcig pa dang / 'dra bar shes par bya'o/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug yid la dran par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas yid la byed pa dran pa bsgom par bya ste/ phyag rgya chen po bdun po de dag

bcing ba byas na phyag rgya bye ba phrag bdun bcings par 'gyur ro/ /de nas mthu brjod par bya'o/ /mthu ni 'jig rten las 'das pa yang dag par mthong ba dang / don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho 'phrul dang / rang bzhin gyi sku mngon du mthong

ba yin no/ /rgyal po 'am/ btsun mo'i nang du 'am/ skye bo mang po mang du tshogs pa dang / dge slong gi tshogs kyi dge 'dun gyi nang du 'am/ 'khor du bcad pa'i nang du 'am/ rig byed bzhi tshogs pa dang / dge sbyong dang /

bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs dang bcas pa de dag g-i nang du de dag don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho 'phrul 'jig rten las 'das pa mod la mngon du

mthong ba dang / 'das pa 'am/ ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i 'chi ba dang / skye ba dang / skyes nas yang dag par dge ba dang / mi dge ba'i 'bras bu dang / dge ba dang mi dge bas shi ba dang / skyes nas phyug po 'am/ dbul po 'am/ rgyal

po thob pa 'am/ lha'i longs spyod dang / lha'i gnas sum bcu rtsa gnyis dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / rtag tu dbang phyug chen por 'gyur ba dang / klu'i skye gnas dang / yi dgas dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin

po gsang ba pa rnams kyis dmyal ba mi bzad par skye ba dang / mtshams med pa la thug gi bar du mthong ba dang / bram ze'i rigs sam/ rgyal rigs sam/ gzhan yang rigs du ma sna tshogs par skye bar mthong ba dag 'jig

rten mgon po'i mthus mngon du mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten pa'i las bsgrub par bya ba de dag thams cad bstan par bya ste/ rgyal ba dang / rnam par rgyal ba dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa dang / mi ngas dang / yams kyi

nad dang / pha rol gyi 'khor ram/ rang gi 'khor la gnod pa dang / dgra dang / phyir rgol ba dang / 'gyed pa dang / g.yul sprod pa dang / tshe ring ba dang / tshe thung ba dang / nad 'byung ba dang / nad med pa dang / char 'bab pa dang /

shin du char 'bab pa dang / char mi 'bab pa dang / dus ma yin par 'bab pa dang / dar ba dang / rgud pa dang / 'byor pa dang / mi 'byor pa dang / 'ong ba dang / 'gro ba dang / nor dang / 'bru rnyed pa dang / 'phel ba dang / 'bri ba dang /

lo nyes pa mthong ba dang / 'khor ba na da ltar gyi las gang cung zad legs par byed pa dang / nyes par byed pa dang / dge ba 'am/ mi dge ba 'am/ 'bri ba 'am/ 'phel ba 'am/ skye ba legs par skye ba 'am/ ngan par skye ba dang / bu
'byung ba/ bu pho 'am/ bu mo 'am/ bu bzang po 'am/ bu ngan pa 'am/ bsod nams can nam/ bsod nams med pa mngal na gnas pa de dag bden pa nyid du mthong ste/ las kyi cho ga legs par byas pas the tshom

mi bya'o/ /tshes grangs dang / rgyu skar dang / nyin mtshan brjod par bya mi dgos kyi bzlas brjod dang / gtor ma dang / gtsang sbra dang / bkru bshal dang / shin du khrus bya ba dang / gos gtsang ma bcang ba dang / bden par smra ba dang /

byams pa'i sems dang / bla ma legs par mnyan pa de gzung ba kho nar bya'o/ /zas dang / skom gtsang ma dang / chang dang / sha dang / beg tsong dang / sgog skya dang / ke'u dang / 'dres par byas pa'i 'dres pa'i zas yongs

su spang ba dang / shin du spags pa dang / de dag ni khyad par 'dod pas yongs su spang bar byas na las 'di ni mod la thams cad mngon du mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /dka' thub spyod pa la brnyas sems mi bya/ ma gus
pa mi bya'i lkog tu yang mi bya'o/ /rjes su bstan pa de dag ni mchog yin no/ /bsgrub par bya ba mchog de dag ni/ 'jig rten dbang phyug mgon pos bka' stsal pa yin no/ /dngul las me long chu zhing du

sor bcu drug pa byas la zangs las pad mo'i gdan sdong bu dang bcas par bya'o/ /me long gi gong du dngul lam/ gser las 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug tshad sor bzhi pa/ gdan pad mo phyag bzhi la

mdung rtse gsum pa dang / zhags pa dang / pad ma dang / nor bu rin po che thogs par bya ba ni 'jog sbyong legs par byas pa/ 'jam po 'od phyin pa tsam du sbyang bar bya'o/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang bas me long gi

gong gi 'jig rten dbang phyug gi sku la ring bsrel gzhag par bya'o/ /ga pur dang / gla rtsis sku la mchod par bya'o/ /me long gi nye 'khor thog thag du dngul gyi me tog dang / gser gyi me tog rin po che sna

tshogs kyis spras pa'i phreng ba gdags par bya'o/ /dbang bskur ba'i dar gdags par bya'o/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang bas me long de la nyi ma re re zhing dus gsum du don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya ste/ ci tsam brgya stong tshang gi bar du bya'o/ /khro bo'i rgyal pos dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /de nas me long 'bar bar 'gyur ro/ /gcig kho nar kha dog sna tshogs par 'bar bar 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten dbang phyug gi

sku gzugs de las lha rdzas kyi chu 'dzag go/ 'od zer sna tshogs 'byung ngo / /de nas rig sngags 'chang ba'i lus 'bar zhing dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /don yod par dga' ba dri ma med pa zhes bya ba don yod pa'i zhags pa'i
snying po cho ga zhib mo grub pa 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /lus shin du dri ma med cing yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang bas 'jig rten thams cad kyi mngon sum don yod pa'i zhags pa

rnam par 'phrul pa 'grub pa bstan par bya dgos pas/ de nas rig sngags 'chang bas sa dang ba'i lci ba bsres pa'i dkyil 'khor rgyar khru bzhi 'phang du khru do pa byas la shin du mkhregs pa shin du 'jam

par bya'o/ /thig skud kyis rnam par phye ste/ tshon sna tshogs rnam par dbye zhing sgo bzhi rnam par phye nas dkyil 'khor gyi sgo rnam par phye ste/ pad ma 'dab ma brgyad tshon gyis gsal bar bri zhing pad ma'i dkyil du

ge sar dang ze ba bya'o/ /stegs bu gru bzhi la rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa dang / stegs bu grwa bzhir rgyal po chen po bzhi go cha bgos pa/ gtum pa/ 'jigs par byed pa'i gzugs bri bar bya'o/ /stegs bu'i

dbus kyi gnas par bar du lha dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / gzhon nu dang / lus ngan po dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / lha dbang phyug dang / phyag na rdo rje dang /

ral pa gcig pa dang / sgrol ma dang / dkar mo dang / khro gnyer ma dang / rdo rje pho nya mo rnams tshon sna tshogs kyis bri zhing rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ me tog sna tshogs thogs pa bya'o/ /stegs bu'i phyi rol du mdung rtse

gsum pa'i phreng ba dang / rdo rje'i phreng ba dang / pad ma'i phreng ba kun du bya'o/ /phreng ba'i bar dbus dang / grwa'i bar du lha mo brgyad dang 'jigs byed ma dang / dpe med ma dang / ba san ti dang / dpal sgra dbyangs dang / sa'i lha mo dang /

dung can ma dang / pus pa dan ti rnams rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ me tog sna tshogs dang rin po che'i snod thogs par bya'o/ /phyi rol thog thag du phreng ba'i bar bar du dri sna tshogs kyis dkyil 'khor bsku zhing

tsan dan dkar po dang / gur kum gyis mchod pa sna tshogs bya'o/ /ga bur dang / bla rtsis mchod cing / dkyil 'khor kun du dar sna tshon sna lnga'i rgyal mtshan dang / mda' dang / rta babs kyis brgyan par bya'o/ /dngul gyi

snod bzhi cung peng gis bkang ste gzhag par bya'o/ /dngul gyi snod bzhi gtor ma dkar gsum gyis dgang bar bya'o/ /dngul gyi snod bzhir mchod yon gyi chu gzhag par bya'o/ /snod brgyad dri sna tshogs kyi gtor mas

dgang bar bya'o/ /'bras bu rnam pa sna tshogs gzhag par bya'o/ /kha zas bza' ba dang / gtor ma rnam pa sna tshogs gzhag par bya'o/ /dri sna tshogs dang / byug pas dngul gyi snod bkang ste gzhag par bya'o/ /

'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po/ bam po bcwa lnga pa/ de nas gsang sngags la 'jug pa rnams kyi dgos pa thams cad so sor 'grub par 'gyur ba ni oM zhes bya ba don yod pa'i zhags

pa pad ma gtsug gtor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du gsang sngags yi ge gcig pa'o/ /'jig rten mgon po'i spyan sngar 'bum dran par byas na sa dang po la gnas par 'gyur ro/ /sngon gyi sdig pa bsags pa sems can
dmyal ba mi bzad pa gang ci yang rung ba de dag thams cad ji ltar rlung gis phyag dar gtor ba bzhin 'jig par 'gyur/ dngos grub thams cad thob par 'gyur ro/ /don thams cad rjes su 'jug par 'gyur/

de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / gang dkyil 'khor gyi lha gzhan dag kyang dgyes par 'gyur la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rtag tu mchog sbyin pa mdzad do/ /gsang sngags oM zhes bya ba dran nas
tshe 'phos pa ni 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /gsang sngags kyi yi ge gcig pa'o/ /oM b+hu yi ge gnyis pa 'bum bzlas brjod byas na sa gnyis pa 'thob par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs

pa snang ba mtha' yas kyi spyan sngar 'dug par 'gyur zhing mchog thams cad rjes su sbyin par mdzad/ sdig pa thams cad kyang rnam par dag par mdzad/ sngon gyi nad kyang sos par 'gyur/ nor gyi dbang phyug nor

bu bzang po'i bu dbang du gyur zhing nye bar gnas par 'gyur ro/ /mi gang gis kyang phyir zhing bar chad byed nus par mi 'gyur/ tshe 'phos nas ri gru 'dzin du skye bar 'gyur/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i dngos grub kyang thob
par 'gyur ro/ /oM pad me gsang sngags kyi yi ge gsum pa 'bum bzlas brjod byas na sa gsum pa la yang dag par 'jug par 'gyur/ pad ma yangs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags gang yin

pa thams cad la zhugs par 'gyur/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gzhon nu'i cha byad can mdun na bzhugs pa 'gyur zhing 'dod pa thams cad kyi mchog rjes su sbyin par mdzad/ don yod pa'i zhags pa pad

ma gtsug gtor gyi dkyil 'khor ston par mdzad/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor rnams ston par mdzad/ thams cad du dngos grub rjes su sbyin par mdzad do/ /oM pad ma hrI/ gsang sngags

yi ge bzhi pa 'bum bzlas brjod byas na sa bzhi pa la 'jug par 'gyur/ 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa'i sku mdog gser gyi kha dog can mdun na bzhugs shing dpung pa brkyang nas phyag spyi bor 'jog par

mdzad la rig sngags 'chang ba la legs so zhes bya ba rjes su sbyin par mdzad de/ rig sngags 'chang tshur shog khyod kyi sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad yongs su dag ste/ rang gi ngo bo thams cad shin du dri ma med par yongs

su dag go/ mi'i 'jig rten 'di nas tshe 'phos nas nga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'ong zhing tshe rabs dran par 'gyur/ phyir zhing nam yang mngal na gnas pas gos par mi 'gyur/ 'jig rten pa'i dgos pa thams cad

'grub par 'gyur ro/ /oM pad ma b+hu dze/ gsang sngags yi ge lnga pa 'bum bzlas brjod byas na sa lnga pa la gnas par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad ma'i bla ma rab tu ston

par mdzad/ sgrib pa thams cad yongs su zad par 'gyur/ rig sngags 'chang la legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byin par 'gyur te/ rig sngags 'chang legs so legs so/ /khyod la bsod nams kyi phung po chen po skyes te/ rig

sngags 'chang khyod dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po bskyed pas rig sngags 'chang khyod tshe brjes na de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig dgu bcu rtsa gnyis kyi drung du dge ba'i rtsa ba mtshungs par bskyed par 'gyur zhing nga'-i sangs rgyas

kyi zhing du skye bar 'gyur/ khyod kyis don yod pa'i zhags pa pad ma gtsug tor gyi snying po dang / gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya chen po rim par phye ba grub cing rig sngags 'chang khyod sgrib pa dang sdig pa thams cad

spangs kyis bya ba thams cad gyis shig /yid la bya ba'i sgrub pa thams cad ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin de dag thams cad shin du grub par 'gyur ro/ /oM pad ma a ba lo ki te/ gzungs sngags yi ge drug pa 'bum bzlas brjod byas na

sa drug pa 'thob ste 'jug par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad snang ba mdzad par 'gyur/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul phra mo snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams gzigs shing mngon sum du ston pa mdzad/ dbugs 'byin par mdzad do/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad ma gzigs pa'i rgyal

mtshan rig sngags 'chang de la yang dag par dbugs 'byin par mdzad do/ /rig sngags 'chang nga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas byang chub snying po'i mthar thug gi bar du tshur shog /las byas pa ni shin du yongs su

zad cing khyod kyis sems can dmyal ba'i sgo rnams bcad/ khyod kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi sgo rnams ni phye/ khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sa bon dang / rigs kyi spyi ni khong du chud/ khyod kyis

don yod pa'i zhags pa pad ma gtsug gtor gyi snying po dang / gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor ni grub/ khyod kyis thams cad du gnas kyi sgo rnams ni phye bas 'jig rten dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i las sgrub pa rnams ji ltar

yid la byas pa bzhin las thams cad byos shig /oM pad ma dz+wa la hU~M d+h+rig / yi ge bdun pa 'bum bzlas brjod byas ma thag tu ting nge 'dzin pad ma dri ma med pa sgrib pa dang bral ba dag pa zhes bya ba thob par 'gyur la/ ting nge

'dzin gang thob pas lus shin du 'bar bar 'gyur zhing 'od zer kha dog sna tshogs su 'gyur/ sa bdun pa la gnas par 'gyur/ lus kyi snang ba gang gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sangs rgyas

kyi zhing thams cad kyi gnas rnams snang bar byed cing / gang dang gang du 'od zer rin po che 'bar ba sna tshogs dag 'bab pa las me tog gi char sna tshogs pa rnams 'byung bar 'gyur la/ de bzhin gshegs pa tham+sa cad

la mchod par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dri ma med pa'i pad ma 'od zer 'bar ba gser gyi mdog can dpung pa brkyang ste/ phyag g.yas pas rig sngags 'chang gi spyi bor

'jog cing legs so zhes bya ba yang sbyin la dbugs 'byin par mdzad de/ rig sngags 'chang legs so legs so/ /'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi snying po gsang ba bzlas brjod kyi cho ga mchod pa'i mchog yin

no/ /'di ni 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po gsang ba gces pa'i dkyil 'khor don yod pa'i zhags pa pad ma gtsug tor gyi snying po yang dag pa'o/ /rig sngags 'chang khyod kyis dkyil 'khor mtha' dag

rdzogs pa dang / pad ma gtsug tor gyi snying po cho ga zhib mo dang / don yod pa'i zhags pa rnam par sprul pa grub kyis rig sngags 'chang nga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du song la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa gyis shig / oM a mo g+ha ma

Ni pad me/ gzungs sngags kyi snying po yi ge brgyad pa 'bum bzlas brjod byas na lus shin du yongs su dag cing dri ma med par 'gyur/ bzlas brjod byas pa tsam gyis nor bu rin po che chen po shel ltar phyi nang shin du yongs su
dag ste/ de ltar rig sngags 'chang gi lus yongs su dag par 'gyur/ sa brgyad pa la gnas par 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rang gi lus yongs su dag

pa rang gi gzugs kyi ngo bo ston cing / rig sngags 'chang gi mdun na gnas la rig sngags 'chang yang dag par dbugs 'byin par mdzad de/ phyag g.yas pa mgo'i spyi bor 'jog par mdzad/ legs so zhes bya ba yang
sbyin par mdzad de/ rig sngags 'chang legs so legs so/ /rig sngags 'chang khyod lhag pa'i bsam pa dam pa dga' ba la zhugs so/ /rig sngags 'chang sangs rgyas kyi zhing mnyam par 'brel ba'i 'jig rten

rnam par blta bar tshur shog /der khyod kyis sangs sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed par 'gyur ro/ /khyod kyis don yod pa'i zhags pa pad ma gtsug tor gyi snying po dkyil 'khor gsang ba grub kyis 'jig rten dang

'jig rten las 'das pa'i sgrub pa dam pa bya ba thams cad gyis shig /oM pad ma lo tsa ni hu ru hU~M/ gzungs sngags kyi snying po yi ge dgu po 'bum bzlas brjod byas na sa dgu pa la gnas par 'gyur/ 'phags pa

spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi sras kyi gtso bor 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig dgu bcu rtsa dgu dag rig sngags 'chang la mngon sum du ston

cing / sangs rgyas kyi yul rnam par sprul pa sna tshogs ston par mdzad/ rig sngags 'chang gi spyi bor thams cad kyi phyag 'jog par mdzad/ legs so zhes bya ba yang sbyin par mdzad de/ rig sngags 'chang

chen po legs so legs so/ /khyod kyis nga la zhing sbyang ba'i las legs par bsgrub pa byas so/ /khyod kyis 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa sangs rgyas nyid du sgrub pa ste/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i

dkyil 'khor cho ga zhib mo sgrub pa dang mdo sde lung bcas pa sgrub pa 'jig rten gyi 'dren pas bstan pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad grub pa yin no/ /oM pad mo Sh+ti Sha bi ma le hU~M phaT/ gsang sngags kyi snying po yi ge

bcu pa 'bum bzlas brjod byas na phyir mi ldog pa nyid du gyur nas sa bcu pa la gnas par 'gyur zhing / lha dang mi'i skye dgu dag 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o zhes brjod la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i

byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur/ don yod pa'i pad ma gtsug tor gyi 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur te the tshom mi bya'o/ /gsang sngags bcu pa'i sgrub pa de kho na nyid kyi dngos grub bla na med pa 'di ni don yod pa'i

zhags pa'i snying po rnam par sprul pa bzlas brjod tsam gyis 'grub pa yin te/ bdag gis sngar bstan pa thams cad la lhag par zhen pa/ gtsang ma/ gtsang sbra spyod pa/ gos gtsang ma bgos pa/ byams pa'i sems dang snying

rje skyes pa/ bden pa smra ba/ bla ma la gus pa/ dkon mchog gsum la dad pa che ba/ bla ma dang slob dpon la rtag tu mchod pa byed pa 'di ni bzlas brjod kyi cho ga yin te/ sangs rgyas kyi byang chub bla na med par bstan to/ /
de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la rab tu 'dzum la lag na rdo rje skor bzhin du mgo btud nas smras

pa/ sems dpa' chen po gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi don yod pa'i zhags pa pad ma gtsug tor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi snying po gsang ba chen po rgyal po 'di ni shin du rnyed par dka' ste/ gzungs sngags kyi snying

po re re po 'di dag ni bzlas brjod tsam gyis sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed par 'gyur na/ spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gang ches ngal zhing dub par bzlas brjod bsgrub pa dang / cho ga rgyas par bsgrub pa lta smos kyang

ci dgos/ nyin zhag gcig bsnyen gnas la gnas shing zas bslangs pa dang / 'bras bu dang / ldum bu dang / rtsa ba bza' ba zos nas rig sngags 'di bsgrubs na spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug de'i dngos grub ji lta bu

zhig 'byung bar 'gyur/ spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis smras pa/ lag na rdo rje nyin zhag gcig smyung ba la gnas shing nyin zhag gcig tsam bzlas brjod byas pa tsam gyis 'bras bu 'grub par 'gyur ba ni lag na

rdo rje rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma 'am/ gzhan yang dge sbyong mgo bregs pa/ rigs kyi gtso bo bram ze 'am/ rgyal rigs sam/ skyes pa 'am/
bud med dam/ khye'u 'am/ bu mo 'am/ rje'u rigs sam/ dmangs rigs gang la la skad cig thang cig yud tsam 'am/ dus tshigs gcig gam/ dus tshigs gnyis sam/ dus tshigs gsum yongs su rdzogs par gzhan

mi smra bar don yod pa'i zhags pa pad ma gtsug tor gyi snying po khro bo'i rigs kyi gsang sngags rim par phye ba gzungs sngags chen po 'di lan cig dran nam/ klog gam ming gzung ba yang dran nam/ lag na rdo rje dus tshigs

gcig tu dran pa tsam gyis kyang de'i mtshams med pa byed pa mnar med par gzhol ba/ bskal par gnas pa yang de yis thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur la/ sdig pa dang sgrib pa bsags pa rnams zad par 'gyur/

lus yongs su dag cing dri ma med par 'gyur/ sgrib pa dang sdig pa dang bral bar 'gyur/ tshe brje ba 'phos nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du pad ma dag las rdzus te skye bar 'gyur/ tshe rabs su tshe rabs dran par 'gyur/

nams kyang ngan 'gror 'gro bar mi 'gyur/ bskal pa bye ba 'bum phrag brgyad bcur 'khor los sgyur ba mchog tu 'gyur/ bskal pa bye ba 'bum phrag brgyad cur 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du bde ba myong bar 'gyur bskal pa

'bum phrag drug bcu rtsa gnyis su 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par dga' bar bde ba myong bar 'gyur/ bskal pa 'bum phrag bdun bcu rtsa gnyis su 'jig rten gyi khams 'jig rten rnam par gzigs par skye bar 'gyur/

tshe rabs su tshe rabs dran par 'gyur/ bskal pa 'bum phrag drug bcu rtsa gnyis su nor bu 'chang ba'i 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur/ bskal pa khri phrag brgyad cur 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gnas

ri gru 'dzin du bde ba myong bar 'gyur/ bskal pa stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgur 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur/ bskal pa 'bum phrag brgyad cur dga' ldan gyi lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur/

bskal pa 'bum phrag sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi nang du brgya byin nyid byed par 'gyur/ bskal pa 'bum phrag lnga bcu rtsa gnyis su phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su 'jug par 'gyur/ bskal pa stong phrag nyi shur 'khor los

sgyur ba'i rgyal srid la spyod par 'gyur te nams kyang ma'i mngal du skye bar mi 'gyur zhing gang dang gang du skye bar 'gyur ba thams cad du rdzus te skye bar 'gyur/ thams cad du tshe rabs dran par 'gyur te/ lag na rdo rje de ltar rig

sngags lan cig dran pa tsam gyis dge ba'i rtsa ba bsod nams kyi phung po chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /lag na rdo rje gal te gang zhig zhag gcig gam/ lan cig smyung ba la gnas te bzlas brjod dang bcas pa byed na lag

na rdo rje de ni tshe 'di nyid la mi bdag nyid kyi ngo bo nyid sgrib pa dang bral nas don yod pa chen po dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob bo/ /don yod pa bkod pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob bo/ /pad ma gsal ba rnam par

'phrul pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob bo/ /don yod pa'i dri ma med par snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob bo/ /don yod pa rnam par gzigs pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob bo/ /pad ma gtsug tor mthar phyin

pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob bo/ /don yod pa 'bar ba'i gtsug tor gyi snying po gsang ba grub pa 'thob bo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig dgu bcu rtsa gnyis dang / de bzhin gshegs pa

gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur/ bsod nams kyi phung po chen po dang ldan par 'gyur/ tshe brjes nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du pad ma dag las rdzus te skye bar 'gyur te

'di ni don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po cho ga zhib mo dang / don yod pa pad ma gtsug tor gyi cho ga mtha' dag rdzogs pa dang / phyag rgya dang bcas pa cho ga zhib mo mtha' dag rdzogs par kha ton du lobs par

'gyur zhing / don yod pa'i rig sngags 'chang 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro/ /don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po pad ma gtsug tor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi snying po gsang sngags grub pa'i cho ga ste/ bsgrub pa'i
cho ga gnyis pa'o// // de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rjes byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bcom ldan 'das

don yod pa pad ma gtsug tor gyi dkyil 'khor don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po bya ba'i cho ga dang sgrub pa'i cho ga dang bcas pa bshad par gsol/ bcom ldan 'das rig sngags 'chang kun gyis 'grub pa/ bsam

pa yongs su rdzogs pa/ dngos grub sgrub pa'i cho ga de kho na bshad du gsol/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na

rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so/ /lag na rdo rje bya ba'i cho ga dang / sgrub pa'i cho ga bshad par bya yis nyon cig /lag na rdo rje gsang sngags rtsa ba don yod pa'i zhags pa pad ma gtsug tor gyi snying po gsang ba 'di'i rig sngags

'chang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma lan cig tsam dran pa yid la byed pa yongs su dag pa'i bdag nyid snying rje chen po dang / byams pa dang ldan
pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pas sems can la dmigs pa'i sems can gang yang rung ngan song gsum du skye bar mi 'gyur te/ sems can dmyal ba 'am/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas sam/ yi dgas kyi yul rnams kyi
gnas de dag med de/ de ltar sems can thams cad sgrub pa dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /lan gnyis brjod pa tsam gyis nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /lan gsum brjod pa tsam

gyis dug dang / 'brum bu dang / 'bras dang / lhog pa dang / rkang shu dang / mdze dang / g.yan pa la sogs pa thams cad 'jig par 'gyur ro/ /lan bzhi brjod pa tsam gyis dbyig dug dang / byad thams cad sel bar 'gyur ro/ /lan lnga brjod

pa tsam gyis 'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /lan drug brjod pa tsam gyis 'jigs pa dang / gdon dang / rims thams cad 'jig par 'gyur ro/ /lan bdun brjod pa tsam gyis

dus ma yin par 'chi bas 'jigs pa thams cad dang / sems can thams cad kyi nad dang / yams kyi nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /lag na rdo rje de lta bas na sems can thams cad kyi don du nyin re zhing gzhan mi smra

bar lan bdun dran par bya'o/ /sems can gang la la sems can dmyal bar gzhol ba shi ba dang / dge slong gang la la bslab pa'i sdom pa dang / tshul khrims kyi sdom pa ral ba dang / mkhan po dang / slob dpon la gus par ma

byas pa shi ba de'i don du bye ma gtsang ma blangs la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas na/ dur khrod dam/ ro bsregs pa 'am/ 'chad pa der bye ma gtor bar bya'o/ /gang dang gang na sems can gang dag gi rus pa yod sar bye ma gtor

ma thag tu de dang der bye ma bab pa'i sems can dmyal ba 'am/ yi dgas sam/ sha zar skyes pa 'am/ gnod sbyin nam/ srin po'i skye gnas su skyes na de de'i mod la tshe brjes nas thams cad mtho ris su gzhol bar 'gyur

zhing nams kyang sems can dmyal bar gzhol bar mi 'gyur ro/ /yang na gro ga la bris nas mchod rten gyi nang du bcug pa'i gnas der rkang pa gnyis pa 'am/ rkang pa bzhi pa gang dag nye bar 'ongs pa de dag thams cad grib ma

phog pa tsam gyis sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag cing thams cad mtho ris su gzhol bar 'gyur ro/ /tha na ri dgas dang / bya dang / tha na ldang sko ska dang / ne'u le dang / sdigs pa dang / sbrul dang / khyi dang / ru sbal dang /

lag 'gro dang / dkyil 'khor de la grib ma bab pa tsam gyis thams cad kyi las kyi sgrib pa rnams rnam par dag par 'gyur zhing de dag thams cad mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du gzhol bar 'gyur ro/ /dung la lan

bdun bzlas brjod byas nas gnas mthon por bus na sems can gang dag dung de'i sgra thos pa skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang / ri dgas dang / bya dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gtogs pa de dag thams cad

mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du gzhol bar 'gyur ro/ /gang dag tshul khrims yongs su dag pa dang / sems can gang dag sbyin pa la dga' ba dang / gang dag bsnyen gnas la nye bar gnas pa dang / gang dag skyabs gsum

gzung ba dang / gang dag byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pas bsdams pa de dag kyang dung gi sgra thos nas sems can de dag thams cad phyir mi ldog par 'gyur zhing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'thob

par 'gyur la/ tshe rjes nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur te/ tshe rabs su tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro/ /tsan dan la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas nas dge 'dun gyi kun dga' ra ba 'am/ mchod rten gyi 'khor

sa 'am/ dge 'dun gyi nang ngam/ skye bo mang po'i nang ngam/ rgyal po'i pho brang du bdugs na gang dag der dri mnams pa'i sems can de dag thams cad sangs rgyas kyi sku yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /chos gos
la bdugs nas gang gi lus la gyon pa de'i sdig pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad rnam par 'jig par 'gyur ro/ /lus la bab pa tsam gyis dri ma dang / ser sna dang / skyon thams cad spangs par 'gyur ro/ /gos

bcangs pa tsam gyis 'jig rten thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro/ /bdag nyid kyis gos de bdugs nas rgyal po'i pho brang du zhugs na rgyal po btsun mo dang / 'khor dang bcas pa dbang du 'gyur/ mchod gnas chen por

'gyur/ 'jig rten thams cad kyi bla mar yang 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa'i dge 'dun gyi nang du zhugs na dge slong thams cad kyi mchod gnas chen por 'os par 'gyur ro/ /skye bo mang po'i nang du zhugs na nor chen po 'phel bar

'gyur zhing mchod pa chen po'i 'os su 'gyur ro/ /ri'i rtse mo nyi ma 'char ba'i khar bdugs nas gsang sngags rtsa ba lan bdun bzlas brjod byas na mod la nyi ma 'bab par 'gyur zhing 'dod pa mchog kun rjes su sbyin par byed do/ /

gu gul dang bsres nas lha chen po'i mdun du bdug par bya zhing gsang sngags rtsa ba lan bdun byab pa byas na mod nyid la lha chen po 'bab par 'gyur zhing rig sngags 'chang gi mdun du 'dug nas bsam pa thams cad

yongs su skong byed do/ /bo la dang / tsan dan dang / gu gul bsres nas sred med kyi bu'i mdun du bdug par bya zhing gsang sngags rtsa ba lan nyi shu gcig lus kyi yan lag la byab pa byas na sred med kyi bu rang

gi gzugs kyis mdun na 'dug cing 'dod pa mchog kun rjes su sbyin par byed la/ dngos po sna tshogs kyang sbyin par byed do/ /yungs kar dang bsres nas tshangs pa la bdug cing gsang sngags rtsa ba lan bcu bzhi

byab pa byas na/ tshangs pa rang g-i gzugs kyis mdun na 'dug la mchog thabs sbyin par byed do/ /pad ma'i phye ma dang bsres nas nag po chen po dang / ma mo'i tshogs la bdugs na nag po chen po dang / ma mo'i

tshogs 'khor dang bcas pa rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na 'dug cing mchog dang / bya ba sgrub pa thams cad sbyin par byed do/ /na ga puSh+pa dang / sbrul gyi shun pa dang / bsres pa'i bdug pa klu'i mtshor bdug cing

gsang sngags rtsa ba lan bdun yungs kar la bzlas brjod byas nas klu'i mtshor gtor la/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i mdo lan cig brjod cing dran par byas na klu dang / klu mo dang / klu'i bu pho dang /
klu'i bu mo thams cad gnas kun nas byung nas rig sngags 'chang gi rkang pa gnyis la 'dud cing gang bsgo ba de dag thams cad byed la 'dod pa thams cad sbyin zhing dbang du 'gyur ro/ /lan gsum sbyar

na klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho yang 'ong ngo / /klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang / nye dga' bo yang 'ong zhing thams cad bsgo ba bzhin byed la dbang du gyur nas 'dug go/ gnod sbyin dang / srin po dgug par 'dod pas dur khrod kyi

nang du mi ro bsregs pa'i sol bas bdugs la/ gsang sngags rtsa ba gsang mthon pos lan bdun brjod cing dran na gnod sbyin dang srin po dag rgyug cing 'ong la/ rig sngags 'chang gi rkang pa gnyis la btud nas

rje btsan bka' stsol cig ces zer ba dang / de'i tshe rig sngags 'chang gis de bsgo ba ji lta ba bzhin du byas na bsgo ba thams cad byed la mngag pa'i las byed par 'gyur zhing ji srid 'tsho'i bar du 'dug go/ thod

pa sbyar ba la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas nas thod pa bkang ba'i bdug pas bdugs na 'byung po thams cad kun nas 'ong zhing thams cad dbang du 'gyur la/ las byed par 'gyur ro/ /gnod sbyin mo dbab par 'dod pas

btsag gis gnod byin mo bris la/ ba lang gi lci ba'i dkyil 'khor byas par phyes pad ma'i ri mo bri zhing phye'i gtor ma pad ma lta bur byas pa gzhag la bdug pa 'dis bdug cing / gsang sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya/ yungs

kar la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas na gnod sbyin mo la brdeg pa byas na gnod sbyin mo rang gi gzugs kyis mdun du 'dug cing / lha'i 'jig rten gyi bar du 'gro la slar yang 'ong ste/ don gsang ba thams cad bsgo ba tsam gyis

byed par 'gyur ro/ /yang na ma 'am chung ma 'am/ sring mo yin no zhes smra bar bya ste/ gal te mar byas na bu la sdug pa longs spyod dang / gzhal med khang thams cad kyi nang du 'jug la rgyal po'i bu bzhin yongs su skyong bar byed do/ /

gal te sring mor byas na rnam thos la 'gran par 'gyur ro/ /gal te chung mar byas na sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi bdag po ltar dga' ba'i longs spyod dag la rtser 'jug par byed do/ /lha mo dpal la bdugs la/ gsang sngag+sa

rtsa ba lan bdun bzlas brjod bya zhing lha mo dpal gyi mgo la byugs na lha mo chen mo dpal rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na 'dug cing / nor gyi phung po chen po 'bul bar byed de/ nam 'tsho'i bar du khyim na 'dug cing nor chen po

nyid 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /rnam thos kyi bu la bdugs na gser srang stong sbyin par byed do/ /nor bu bzang po'i bu la bdugs na gser gyi dong tse stong sbyin par byed do/ /tshal gseb du bdugs na tshal na gnas pa'i lha rang

gi gzugs kyis mdun na 'dug cing rdzas dang / sman thams cad rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na 'dug go/ ri rnams la bdugs na rtswa dang / shing gel pa dang / sman dang rdzas thams cad 'bar bar 'gyur ro/ /grong khyer bzhi'i

sgo rnams su bdugs na grong khyer kun du yams kyi nad dang / gnod pa dang / nad 'go ba dang / nad thams cad dang / 'thab pa dang / thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /'brog tu bdug+sa

na rkun mo dang / g.yon can dang / gnod byed dang / seng ge dang / stag dang / sbrul dang / dred dang / dom gyi 'jigs pa thams cad 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing ri dgas gtum po'i 'jigs pa thams cad 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /
rims thams cad la bdugs na rims thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro/ /sdig pa thams cad 'gegs pa tsan dan gyi bdug pa bsgrub pa'i cho ga ste gsum pa'o// // de nas thig le yang dag par bshad par

bya ste/ rigs kyi rgyal po'i gsang sngags bsgrub pa ni nyi ma'i gzi brjid dang mtshungs shing skar ma'i rnam pa ltar 'bar ba yin te/ gzi brjid kyi rgyal po de gnyis kyis 'bar bar 'gyur ba ni bsod nams kyi

phung po rnam par 'phel lo/ /lha rnams kyi nang na lha'i dbang po dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang bcas pas rtag tu mchod pa'i gnas su 'gyur gyis rig sngags 'chang gis the tshom mi bya'o/ /

dpral ba'i steng du thig le byed pa ni rtag tu mdzes pa yin te/ nyi ma ltar 'od zer gyi dra ba stong gis gsal shing shel ltar dag pa mdog dkar sham dri zhim pa dang / glang po che'i bya ba dang / dpral ba dang / ba lang gi gnas ltar

skyon med cing mnyam par mthun la shin tu dul ba/ ded dpon gcig pu'i nor bur gyur cing gsang sngags 'bum bzlas pas legs par bsgrub pa/ gser dang / gos ltar kun du 'bar ba ni thig le yin no/ /smin mtshams

kyi bar dpral ba na shin du phra ba rtag tu rtag par mdzes pa ni zla ba nya ba mkha' la 'gro ba lta bu yin la/ skye bo'i dbus na gsal ba ni rgyu skar gyi rgyal po zla ba dbus na gnas pa bzhin rang gi 'khor gyi dbus na lha rnams kyi rgyal po

brgya byin lta bu yin la/ skye bo'i dbus na ni 'jig rten gyi rgyal po gdugs gcig pa ltar 'bar ba yin/ 'jig rten gyi nang na gdugs gcig pa bde bar gshegs pa ltar shin du dul ba yin la shAkya'i rigs kyi rgyud ltar sems can

thams cad la phan par 'dod pa de bzhin du nor bu mchog rnam par dag pa ni sems can thams cad la phan par 'dod pa yin no/ /lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten na ji ltar 'jig rten dbang phyug gcig pu ltar mchog dang / rab mchog

sems can thams cad kyi don du sbyin par byed de de ltar thig le nor bu'i mthu ni 'dod pa thams cad rab tu sbyin par byed do/ /lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang bcas pa dbang du 'gyur zhing sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi bdag po dbang du 'gyur

bar rjes su 'gro ba dang / dri za dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po 'dong bar gyur pa thams cad kyang dbang du 'gyur ba ni mkha' la skar ma ltar dpral bar rtag tu dbang du gyur pa yin te/ sems can thams cad

kyi mgo bos rkang pa'i drung du rtag tu 'dud la me yis mi 'tshig /chu yis mi khyer zhing lus la dug dang / sbyar ba'i dug dang / phye ma'i dug dang / byad mi bzad pa dang / ngan sngags dang / sdang ba'i rnam pas mi tshugs par 'gyur ro/ /

nor bu lta bu'i mthus de dag thams cad kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro/ /rims dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / nad dang / rlung dang / glad nad chen po la thig le byas pa lta bur mod la de dag thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur/ sems

can btson du gzung ba 'am/ chad pas bcad pa 'am/ bcing bar 'os pa la thig le lta bu byas pas de dag thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro/ /smin mtshams dpral bar thig le lta bu byas na de'i mod la gnod sbyin stong dang

srin po drag po'i gzugs can gdon stong rnams lus la 'jug par mi 'gyur zhing / glang po che dang / ri dgas kyi bdag po'i khyu dang / chom rkun dang / shod kyi lam dang / ri'i lam dang / ri sul dang / ngam grog dang / glog dang /

grang ba dang / sbrul dang / sngang 'jigs kyi 'jigs pa thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /thig le lta bu'i mthus dgra'i sde stong snyed kyi nang na 'gyed pa las myur ba nyid du rgyal bar 'gyur/ g.yul dang / 'thab mo dang / tha snyad

mod nyid la zhi bar 'gyur/ de'i tshe nor bu gtsug gi spyi bor btags pa gang yin pa dang / thig le yang byas nas 'khor lo la byugs la pha rol gyi dmag tshogs g.yul gyi nang du zhugs na bdag nyid gcig pus dpung gi
tshogs yan lag bzhi pa las rgyal bar 'gyur/ 'dis thams cad du zhugs pa tsam gyis pham pa byas par 'gyur zhing phyogs bcur 'bros la thams cad 'jigs par 'gyur ro/ /thig le byas nas rgyal po'i pho

brang du zhugs na rgyal po dang / btsun mo dang / 'khor dang bcas pa dbang du gyur nas nye bar 'khod do/ /ji srid 'tsho'i mchod gnas su 'gyur ro/ /dpung pa g.yas par nor bu btags la yan lag dang / yan lag dag tu

thig le byas na thams cad du rgyal ba 'thob cing reg pa tsam gyis dbang du 'gyur la/ don gang dang gang bsgrubs pa de dang de thams cad 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /ri lu dag ni khar bcug nas/ /lhan cig 'dug la

smras na ni/ /thams cad dbang du 'ong bar 'gyur/ /rgyal po dang ni btsun mo 'am/ /dge sbyong dang ni bram ze dang / /rgyal rigs dang ni dmangs rigs nyid/ /skyes pa dang ni bud med dang / /khye'u dang bu mo rnams kyang rung / /de dag thams

cad dbang du 'gyur/ /kun du mngag pa'i las rnams byed/ /ri lu zos pa tsam gyis ni/ /nad rnams thams cad rnam par 'jig /gang gi nyin bzhi pa yi rims/ /gang dag khong skem nad kyis nyams/ /gang zhig rtag pa'i

rims kyis btab/ /gang du 'thab mo 'byung ba dang / /de bzhin skye bo sdang sems can/ /bdag la grib gnon gzhan grib gnon/ /skem byed skem pa brjed byed dang / /gang zhig gdon gzhan mi bzad pa/ /sdig pa'i las ni kun du

spyod/ /sngon gyi las ni mi zad pa/ /de kun skad cig tsam gyis 'jig /ri lus khrus byas tsam gyis ni/ /'bras dang shu bar 'gyur rnams dang / /lhog pa dang ni rkang shu dang / /mtshan par rdol dang me dbal dang / /khyi rngo mdze dang rkang

pa'i nad/ /mi zad de rnams kun dang ni/ /gang dag nor rgyas sdang bas zin/ /byugs pa tsam gyi mod la ni/ /thams cad dug med zhi bar 'gyur/ /ri lu thams cad las byed pa/ /lha rdzas shi ba sos par byed/ /ri lu dag ni 'chang byed cing / /

thig le dag ni byas pa yis/ /thams cad du ni mchod pa 'thob/ /thams cad du ni nor dag 'du/ /dpal 'dod pa ni dpal 'thob cing / /'bru 'dod 'bru'i phung po 'phel/ /lha rnams dag ni dga' 'gyur zhing / /klu rnams kyang ni dga'

dang bcas/ /gnod sbyin srin po dri za dang / /lha min mkha' lding mi 'am ci/ /lto 'phye chen po thams cad dang / /'byung po rnams kyang dga' dang bcas/ /rtag tu phyag bya'i gnas 'gyur zhing / /thams cad dbang du gyur nas 'khor/ /

'khor kun bran byed ci bya zer/ /gang zhig ri lu de dag bsten/ /ri lu thig le rtag byed la/ /de bzhin gshegs kun dgongs pa mdzad/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang / /de nyid rig la rtag tu ni/ /mchog sbyin dus kun gzigs par

mdzad/ /bsod nams phung po stong dag ni/ /nyi ma re re sogs par byed/ /'jig rten pa yi bde spyad cing / /'jig rten pha rol shin du bde/ /tshe brje ba ni 'phos nas su/ /bde ba can du mod la 'gro/ /gang dang gang du skye bar ni/ /tshe

rabs rtag tu tshe rabs dran/ /lag na rdo rje gnod sbyin che/ /gnod sbyin bye bas yongs bskor cing / /g.yel ba med par nyin mtshan du/ /dus kun du ni srung ba dang / /skyob dang sbed dang srung bar byed/ /gang zhig bu ni med pa dang / /

bu med bu ni 'dod pa la/ /ri lu gcig ni sbyar nas su/ /mnyam par gzhag pas gsang sngags ni/ /mkhas pas zla ba yar gyi ngor/ /'bum ni tshang bar bzlas nas su/ /zla ba nya ste bcwa lnga la/ /skyes pa bud med
khrus bya zhing / /yan lag yan lag thig le bya/ /dkon mchog gsum ni legs mchod cing / /bram ze dag kyang mchod ston byed/ /bsrung ba'i cho ga byas nas su/ /gtor ma dkar gsum mang po bsham/ /bdag nyid

rgyan gyis brgyan nas su/ /gos gtsang rnams ni bgos bar bya/ /byams pa'i sems la yang dag gnas/ /snying rje sems can sdug par byed/ /bsam pa dag cing des pa dang / /bla ma rtag tu gus par bya/ /me tog

sna tshogs rab dgang zhing / /spos dang byug pa sna tshogs dang / /du rus tsan dan sa la ki/ /lha yi bdug pas bdug bya zhing / /bu ram 'o ma bdun dang ni/ /ri lu legs sbyar bza' byar bya/ /gsang ba 'di 'thungs mod la ni/ /

btung dang kha zas bza' bar bya/ /mgon po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang / /mchog sbyin mdzad par mchod par bya/ /byams mdzad de yi zhabs drung du/ /mtshan mo nyal dang nang par ni/ /mthong ba mchog 'di thob par

'gyur/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang / /mchog sbyin rang gzugs ston mdzad cing / /mchog nyid dam pa sbyin par mdzad/ /bud med de ni bu skyed cing / /gzugs bzang mchog tu lta na sdug /stobs ldan gzugs ni phun

sum tshogs/ /lha yi dpal gyi rjes su 'gro/ /chos ldan mkhas shing gsal ba dang / /tshe ring dbang phyug tshad med 'gyur/ /dpa' bo dgra las rgyal ba dang / /sdang ba thams cad 'joms par 'gyur/ /yang na dran pa'i blo bskyed

par 'dod pas thos pa la brten nas 'dug cing rig sngags 'chang gtsang ma zhag bdun du nyin re zhing mar dang 'o ma bskol ba der ri lu bdun bcug ste/ zan ma zos pa'i sngon rol du lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas

nas 'jam tsam pa 'thungs la phyis kha zas bza' bar bya/ zhag bdun gyis thos pa'i rgya mtsho chen po bsags par 'gyur te bstan bcos thams cad dang / chos lugs dang / 'dul ba dang / snyan dngags dang / brda

sprod pa dang / mdo'i sde dang / dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa'i sde dang / tshigs su bcad pa'i sde dang / gleng gzhi'i sde dang / ched du brjod pa'i sde dang / de lta bu byung ba'i sde dang / skyes pa rabs kyi sde dang / chos mngon pa dang / rtsis dang /

cho ga zhib mo dang / gsang sngags dang / phyag rgya thams cad dang / theg pa chen po thams cad kha ton du lobs par 'gyur ro/ /zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig tu sbyar ba byas na stobs chen po'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol gnon par

'gyur te/ glang po che khri'i stobs su 'gyur ro/ /zla ba gcig tsam sbyar ba byas na lo lnga brgyar 'tsho zhing gnyer ma dang / skra dkar spangs la skra lcang lo 'khyil zhing 'khyil par 'gyur ba dang / lus kyi mdog dkar sham lta bur

'gyur ro/ /lo gcig tu sbyar na lha'i sman bcud kyis len mchog la 'jug cing nam mkha'i steng du lha rnams dang lhan cig mthun par 'gyur la/ brgya byin dang yang lhan cig 'gran par 'gyur/ lha rnams kyi lha mo'i

tshogs dang / lha'i gzhal med khang na rtse zhing dga' bar byed la rin po che sna bdun gyi gzhal med khang gi gnas na gnas par 'gyur/ nyi ma lta bur 'od gtong zhing rgyu la gnas pa bzang po rnams kyis 'gro bar byed/ gzi brjid shin

tu gsal ba mi bzod cing rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/ /zhes bya ba la the tshom mi bya'o/ /las thams cad bsgrub pa'i thig le dang / ri lu bsgrub pa'i cho ga ste bzhi pa'o// // de nas mi snang bar bya ba dang / nam mkha' la 'gro ba

sman gyi mchog don yod pa'i mthus grub par bshad par bya ste/ rig sngags 'chang ba rnams kyi grub pa'i mchog de kho na nyid yin no/ /sman dngul chu dang / brah+ma k+Shi ra dang / su bar Na k+Shi ra dang / shel sngo sangs dang / ku

k+Shi dang / su gan d+hi dang / king kuSh+Tha skyon med pa dang / uta pa la bzang po dang / pad ma k+Sha dang / gu gul dang / phe lu pad tra dang / gur kum dang / na ga puSh+pa dang bcas pa dang / spong spos dang / shi ri Sha'i me tog dang / tsan dan dkar po

dang / bcas pa bsres nas zhib tu btags pa'i phye ma la don yod pa pad ma gtsug tor gyi gsang ba rigs kyi rgyal po'i sngags kyis shin du brtson par lan brgyad brgya bzlas brjod bya zhing khro bo'i gsang sngags

lan brgyad stong bzlas brjod byas pas lan nyi shu rtsa gcig tu dbang bskur la/ yi ge gcig pa lan 'bum bzlas brjod bya/ de'i tshe gzungs sngags bcu po so sor lan nyi shu rtsa re re bzlas brjod bya ste/
gsang sngags thams cad rdzogs par bzlas brjod byas nas sman don yod pa rgya che ba gsal ba zhes bya ba sman gyi mchog / bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs drung du gzhag la

grib ma la bskam par bya'o/ /yang don yod pa'i zhags pa'i gtsug tor gyis lan brgyad brgya bzlas brjod byas nas snod kyi kyi nang du bcug la nam dgos pa byung ba de'i tshe thams cad du bsgrub pa'i dgos pa thams cad la

sbyar bar bya'o/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang gtsang mar gyur pas lus legs par khrus byas la spos chus byugs te/ gos gtsang ma bgo bar bya/ sman gyi mchog 'di yungs mar gyis sbrus la rang gi lus la byug par bya ste/

lan cig bskus pa tsam gyis mi snang bar 'gyur la/ gnas gsang bar bya ba'i sgo bcad pa thams cad mthong bar 'gyur/ gnas thams cad du ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du 'jug par 'gyur/ don thams cad byed par 'gyur/ 'byung po

dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / sha za la sogs pa'i gtso bo rgyal por 'gyur zhing de dag thams cad dbang du 'gyur te/ ci bgyi zhes bya ba byed la ji srid 'tsho'i bar du nye bar gnas nas las su bya ba'i dgos pa thams cad

kyi rjes su 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /klu'i gnas kyi sgo bcad pa thams cad na 'dug la klu 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad mdun du 'khod nas bya ba thams cad la ci bgyi zhes bya ba byed par 'gyur zhing las su bya ba dang /

dgos pa thams cad byed par 'gyur/ ji srid 'tsho'i bar du nye bar 'khod cing nyin mtshan du gnas la de nas klu thams cad bsgo ba bzhin byed par 'gyur ro/ /sman la sing ha dzi hwa dang / ba'i 'o ma dang sbyar bas mgo

kun byugs na ji lta ba yid la byas pa dang rang gi blos 'dod pa'i ngo bo sna tshogs par byed/ gnas su gtogs pa thams cad ji ltar 'dug pa bzhin ston par byed/ gnas su gtogs pa thams cad 'khor gyi nang na ji

ltar rnam par sprul pa'i gzugs sna tshogs ston par byed/ ji srid 'tsho'i bar du 'phel ba rnams ston par byed cing bya ba thams cad byed do/ /spos kyi til mar dang sbrus nas byin pa dang / rkang pa la bskus na nam mkha' la 'phags

par 'gyur zhing / nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur la gang du 'dod pa der 'gro bar 'gyur/ chu'i steng du 'gro zhing nams kyang phyis sa la rkang pa 'jog par mi 'gyur/ lag pa g.yas pa la bskus na gang dang gang la lag pa reg pa

de 'ong bar 'gyur la sus kyang mthong bar mi 'gyur/ bud med gzhon nu'i 'o ma dang bsres nas mig la bskus nas rgyal po'i pho brang du zhugs na mthong bar mi 'gyur zhing / don 'dod pa gang yin pa byed do/ /don gyi rdzas gang

yin pa blangs kyang sus kyang mi mthong ngo / /bud med gang dang phrad na sus kyang mi mthong la ji srid 'tsho'i bar du 'dug kyang sus kyang mi shes so/ /khar byugs nas gang dang gang na bro gar byed pa dang / bzhad gad byed pa nyid

kyi nang du zhugs na bya ba thams cad byed la lus ni sus kyang mi mthong ngo / /bum pa la byugs nas chus bkang na chu'i rgyun snang la bum pa de ni mi mngon no/ /gzhong pa chus bkang ba de'i dbus su byugs na chu de

gang bar snang la gzhong pa de ni mi snang ngo / /bdag nyid la byugs nas bum pa chus bkang ba lag na thogs na bum pa las chu 'byung ba ni snang la mi de'i lus ni mi snang ngo / /mig la bskus nas skye bo mang po'i nang du zhugs

na mi mthong bar 'gyur la/ de'i sgra ni thos shing rang gi lus ni mi mngon no/ /gnas su gtogs pa thams cad du zhugs na rang gi lus khrus ma byas kyi bar du mi mthong ngo / /su yang rung ba'i mig la bskus la lus la

yang bskus na de dag thams cad mi mthong bar 'gyur zhing / gang dang gang du 'gro ba de dang der mi snang bar 'gyur la khrus byas pa tsam gyis phyir snang bar 'gyur ro/ /lus kun bskus nas mdzod chen po'i nang du

zhugs na mi mthong bar 'gyur la gser dang / dngul dang / 'phra men dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / byi ru dang / dung dang / man shel dang / rdo rje dang / bai dUr+ya dang / margad dang / mthon ka dang / gos dang / spud pa dang / rgyan dang / lhab

lhub gang yang rung ba nyid 'dod na thams cad blangs nas song na sus kyang mi mthong la gar dga' bar 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /ji srid du khrus ma byas pa da srid du rang mi mthong la khrus byas na thams cad du mthong ngo / /

rig sngags 'chang bud med kyi nang du 'jug par 'dod pas gtsang mar khrus bya'o/ /de nas spos chus khrus bya'o/ /de'i 'og du ba gcin gyis khrus bya'o/ /yang gur kum gyis khrus bya'o/ /de'i 'og tu ba'i rnam lngas

khrus bya'o/ /de'i 'og tu ba'i til mar dang lhan cig bsres pa des lus bsku bar bya'o/ /de'i 'og tu bud med gzhon nu'i nu zho dang sbyar bas mig la bskus la de nas ri lu gsum dpung pa g.yas pa la gdags par bya'o/ /

de nas gos gtsang ma bgos nas gsang sngags brjod cing dran par byas la rgyal po'i pho brang du zhugs na mi mthong bar 'gyur/ te lus sus kyang mi mthong ngo / /nyi ma gcig gam/ nyi ma gnyis sam/ nyi ma bdun nam/ nyi ma

bcu bzhi 'am/ nyi ma nyi shu rtsa gcig du khrus byas la bud med de dag gi nang na rtse zhing dga' bar byed la/ yongs su spyod par byed kyang sus kyang mi shes la 'jug cing phyir 'gro ba na sus kyang glags mi rnyed de/ ji srid du khrus

ma byas pa'i bar du rang gi lus mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /phug du 'jug na lus kun spos kyi til mar gyis byugs la phug du zhugs na phug gi sgo thams cad phye bar 'gyur gyis/ gnas de'i nang du zhugs la ji lta ji ltar

las su bya ba de lta de ltar gyis shig /chu'i nang du zhugs na ji ltar khyim gyi nang na 'dug pa bzhin chus mi rlan la/ chu gos par yang mi 'gyur ro/ /me'-i nang du zhugs na mes lus la mi reg cing / tsan dan ltar
bsil bar 'gyur ro/ /klu'i gnas mtshor zhugs na gnas na 'khod pa rnams kyis de mi mthong gis ji ltar rang gis yid la las su bya bar 'dod pa'i las kyi rnam pa gzhan dag kyang gyis shig /

mi snang bar bya ba ri lu'i bsgrub pa'i cho ga'o// // 'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po/ bam po bcu drug pa/ phyag rgya gsum ni rnam sprul pa/ /phyag rgya de dag yang dag bstan/ /bzang po

gtso bo chen po ste/ /mchog dang rab mchog nyid yin no/ /phyag rgya gya nom bla na med/ /'jig rten 'dren pas bstan pa yin/ /snying po de nyid gyur pa ste/ /phyag rgya dkyil chen legs par bsgrubs/ /sangs rgyas byang chub phyag rgya 'di/ /

dus gsum gtogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs/ /kun gyis 'di ni byin gyis brlabs/ /phyag rgya dus gsum gshegs pa yi/ /de bzhin gshegs pas phyag rgyar btab/ /de bzhin sangs rgyas chen po pa/ /thub pa snang mdzad kyis

kyang btab/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dkyil gyi/ /gsang nyid kun du bzhugs pa yin/ /de nas gsang sngags gsang ba nyid/ /dngos grub bla med bshad par bya/ /oM a mo g+ha hri da ya pad ma uSh+NI Sha sA d+ha ya/ b+ha ra

sam b+ha ra/ ma hA pad me swA hA/ bskul ba dang / spyan drang ba dang / gshegs su gsol ba'i sngags so/ /oM pad ma uSh+NI Sha a mo g+ha maN Da le hU~M/ dkyil 'khor bsrung ba dang / phyogs bcing ba dang / mtshams bcad pa dang /

dri chab dang / chu dang / yungs kar bsres pa la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas pas bya'o/ /oM pad ma shi kha re hU~M/ spyi gtsug bcing ba yin te/ lan bdun bzlas brjod byas pas so/ /oM pad ma uSh+NI Sha a mo g+ha dza le

hU~M/ khrus bya ba'i sngags te yungs kar dang / chu la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas pas so/ /oM bi ma le shud d+he hU~M/ nye reg bya ba'i sngags so/ /oM sang ts+tsha da ya pad me hU~M/ gos bgo ba'i sngags so/ /oM mi li mi li shud d+he hU~M/ lus

yongs su sbyang ba'i sngags te/ ba'i rnam lnga'i chu la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas pas so/ /oM pad ma uSh+NI Sha a mo g+ha a b+hi Shiny+tsa Ad ma shud d+he hU~M/ dbang bskur ba'i sngags te dri chab la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas

pas so/ /oM pad ma ka ba tse dr-i D+ha ban d+ha hU~M dz+wa la swA hA/ go cha'i sngags te/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas pas so/ /oM badzra a d+hiSh+Tha na pad me hU~M/ byin gyis brlab pa'i sngags so/ /\u0f00 dz+wa la pad me d+ha ra d+ha ra hU~M/ sa'i sngag+sa so/ /

oM pad ma a shra ya/ ru ha tsa la tsa la hU~M/ gdan gyi sngags so/ /oM di bya pad me ma~M/ me tog gi sngags so/ /oM pad ma a mo g+ha saM ba ra ni swA hA/ bdug spos kyi sngags so/ /oM pad ma gan d+ha i shwaM ra hU~M/ byug spos kyi

sngags so/ /oM pad ma pra ki ra ne d+ha ra Ni sa me swA hA/ 'bras yos dang me tog dgram pa'i sngags so/ /oM pad ma dz+wa li su gan d+ha ba ti hU~M/ mchod yon dbul ba'i sngags so/ / shug la ba re ra sa ya shud d+he hU~M/ lha bshos

kyi sngags so/ /\u0f00 su ru su ru kum b+ha ba ti swA hA/ gtor ma'i sngags so/ /oM ma hA pad ma a shri ni sA d+ha ya hU~M/ gtor ma zar gzhug pa'i sngags so/ /oM pha la bi shud d+he pra ba ra hU~M/ 'bras bu'i sngags so/ /oM pra ba ra puSh+pe dza

ya swA hA/ phreng ba'i sngags so/ /oM dz+wa la dz+wa la ya ra sa ra sA gri Ni hU~M/ gtor ma bcos pa'i sngags so/ /oM pad ma dI pa ya dz+wa la hU~M/ mar me'i sngags so/ /oM sa ma pad ma b+ha ba ne shu sa ra hU~M/ 'jug pa'i sngag+sa so/ /

oM pad ma uSh+NI Sha a mo g+ha mu ni hU~M/ phyag bya ba'i sngags so/ /oM tsakra maN Da le sa man ta pad me hU~M/ bskor ba'i sngags so/ /oM sa man ta pra ki ra Na pad me saM b+ha ra hU~M/ me tog dor ba'i sngags so/ /

oM pad ma sa ma ya uSh+NI Sha ma hA a mo g+ha sa ma ya hU~M/ dam tshig gi sngags so/ /oM sa man ta sA d+ha ra Na pad me hU~M phaT/ skyil mo dkrung gi sngags so/ /oM a pA ri mi ta dz+wa la pad me hU~M/ bgrang phreng gi sngags so/ /

oM sha ta sa ha sra dz+wa la ti pad ma d+ha ra d+ha ra hU~M/ bzlas brjod kyi sngags so/ /oM sa man ta d+ha ri sha pad me hU~M/ rmi lam gyi sngags so/ /oM sa man ta rak+Sha ra ni pad me hU~M/ bsrung ba'i sngags so/ /oM sa man ta me ru dr-i D+ha si ri

hU~M/ ra ba'i sngags so/ /oM sa man ta dz+wa lA ma la gar+b+he/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ ma hA pad ma dz+wa le hU~M/ me'i sngags so/ /oM d+hu ru d+hu ru pra sa ra/ d+hu sa ri man tre swA hA/ sreg blugs kyi sngags so/ /oM sa man ta a ba lo ki ta gu h+ye/

bA yu dzA be pad ma be ge ni swA hA/ nam mkha' la 'gro ba'i sngags so/ /oM shu b+ha sta d+ha ra Ni pad ma b+hu dze hU~M/ mtshon cha'i sngags so/ /oM sa man ta A kar Sha Ni pra sa ra gu h+ye hU~M/ drang ba'i sngags so/ /na mo tri b+hu ba na/ I shwa ra yA/

lo ke shwa ra ya/ ma he shwa ra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ sa man ta/ a ba lo ki ta/ gu h+ye/ A gats+tsha b+ha ga bAn d+hi ri d+hi ri/ ma hA bi ri/ ma Ni kan badzra bai dUr+ya/ ma ra ka ta pad ma rA ga /in dra nI la/ ma hA mug ti kA/ bi b+hU Shi ta sha rI ra/ ma hA pad me b+hu

dza/ a mo g+ha pA sha d+ha ra/ sa man ta/ a ba lo ki ta/ ba ra dA ba ra dA ya ka /dz+wa la dz+wa la/ sa man ta/ a ba lo ki ta/ A gats+tsha A gats+tsha/ b+ha ga bAn/ shI g+h+ra~M sa ma ya/ ma nu sma ra/ bi bi d+ha be Sha d+ha ra/ ya ma ba ru Na/ ku be ra na

ma skri ta/ I shwa ra/ ma he shwa ra/ pad me shwa ra/ e hi b+ha ga bAn/ shI g+h+ra~M A gats+tsha/ sarba bid+yA maN Da la/ sa ma ya ma nu sma ra/ da ri sha na swa ra pan/ bi bi da te dza d+ha ra/ sa man ta ra sh+mi/ dz+wa la gar+b+ha sha rI ra/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka

sau ma mya mu kha/ pa ri pU ra Na/ tsan+d+ra maN Da la/ na ba tsan+d+ra dza Ta d+ha ra/ a mi tA b+ha/ mu ku Ta d+ha ra ya/ ma hA brah+ma be sha d+ha ra/ tri lo tsa na a mo g+ha b+ha ra d+ha/ b+hu ru b+hu ru/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka /pad ma pA sha a ba lo ki te/ shud d+ha sa twa/
ba ra dA ya/ na mo stu te swA hA/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gshegs su gsol ba'i sngags so/ rig sngags 'dis gu gul nag po la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas nas 'phags pa
spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bdug par bya'o/ /bdugs pa tsam gyi mod nyid la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs kyis ston par mdzad cing mchog thams cad sbyin par mdzad do/ /

gal te mtshams med pa lnga byed pa mnar med par gzhol ba des kyang bdugs pa tsam gyis nges par ston par mdzad na/ dge slong tshangs par spyod pa bsam pa dag pa dad pa can mos pa la lta smos kyang ci dgos/
mod nyid la rang gi gzugs rang gi ngo bo yongs su dag pa ston par mdzad cing / mchog thams cad sbyin par mdzad la don yod pa chen po'i dngos grub sbyin par mdzad do/ /drag po la bdugs na gzugs mngon
sum du mdun na 'dug cing / 'dod pa dang / dngos grub thams cad sbyin par byed do/ /sred med kyi bu la bdugs na gzugs brnyan 'gul zhing / tshig 'byin la yid la bsams pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par

byed/ rtag tu rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur/ stobs dang / shugs dang / brtson 'grus dang / pha rol gnon par byed pa'i dngos grub sbyin par byed do/ /ma mo'i gnas su nag po chen po la bdugs na nag po chen po ma mo'i

tshogs dang bcas pa dbang du gyur nas 'dug la las dang bya ba thams cad grub par byed/ thams cad du dngos grub chen po sgrub par byed do/ /tshogs kyi dbang phyug la bdugs na/ bgegs dang log 'dren thams

cad bcings par 'gyur ro/ /'dod pa'i dbang phyug la bdugs na sdang ba dang / bdug pa dang / bar chad byed pa gzhan gang yin pa de dag thams cad bcings par 'gyur zhing mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po'i sgor

bdugs na rgyal po'i btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa bkug nas dbang du gyur te/ nye bar gnas pa 'dod pa dang bya ba thams cad byed do/ /nyi ma shar ba'i tshe nyi ma la mngon du phyogs nas bdugs na nyi ma

'bab cing 'dod pa'i dngos grub thams cad sbyin par byed do/ /zla ba nya la bdugs na zla ba 'bab cing dbang phyug 'byor pa chen po sbyin par byed do/ /rnam thos kyi bu la bdugs na nor 'phel ba chen po sbyin par
byed do/ /lha mo chen mo dpal la bdugs na dpal 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /gdon thams cad la bdugs na bdugs pa tsam gyis 'bab cing phyogs bcur 'bros so/ /zin pa 'am ma zin pa la bdugs na mod la 'ong ngo / /

dur khrod kyi mi ro la bdugs na ro langs ldang bar 'gyur ro/ /thod pa la bdugs na 'bab cing gar byed/ glu len rgyug par byed cing sbod stong byed do/ /rdo rje la bdugs na 'bar ro/ /mdung rtse gsum pa la bdugs na 'bab par byed do/ /'khor

lo la bdugs na nam mkha' la 'gro'o/ /thag pa la bdugs na sbrul bzhin 'khril bar byed do/ /rdza ma dang / bum pa la bdugs na 'bab par byed cing rang nyid 'gyur bar byed la phan tshun 'gro bar byed do/ /lhung bzed la bdugs

na rang nyid 'gro bar byed do/ /ral gri la bdugs na 'bab par byed cing 'bar bar byed la rang nyid 'gro bar byed do/ /dung la bdugs nas bus na sgra gang du grag pa de dag 'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / yams

kyi nad dang / gnod pa dang / 'go ba'i nad dang / 'khrug pa dang / nad thams cad dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad dang / sdig pa dang / gdug pa thams cad dang / dgra thams cad las thar bar 'gyur zhing sgrib pa thams cad zad par 'gyur ro/ /

rims thams cad la bdugs na/ rims thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /rims nyin bzhi pa la bdugs shing gsang sngags kyang rjes su dran na rims nyin bzhi pa ku co 'don cing 'bros par 'gyur ro/ /klu'i mtshor bdugs na mod

nyid la char gyi rgyun chen po 'bebs par byed do/ /char ches na gnas mthon por bdugs na char ches pa gcod par byed do/ /sprin la mngon du phyogs nas bdugs na grang lhags dang / rlung dang / ser ba thams cad gcod par byed

la/ lo gcig gi bar du mtshams chen po bcad par 'gyur ro/ /ri mthon po'i rtser bdugs na/ phyogs bzhi thams cad kyi pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang / phyir rgol ba dang / phas kyi dgra thams cad dang / dpag tshad stong gi bar du rmugs

pa dang / rengs pa dang / bcings par 'gyur la dpag tshad stong gi bar du mtshams chen po bcad par 'gyur ro/ /bdag nyid la bdugs na sems can thams cad la mchod pa'i gnas chen por 'gyur la sems can thams cad dbang du

'gyur ro/ /bu mo la bdugs na bag mar blangs par 'gyur ro/ /tshong zong la bdugs na rin che bar lon par 'gyur ro/ /bang ba la bdugs na 'bru 'phel ba mang por 'gyur ro/ /btung ba'i gnas su bdugs na btung ba

'phel ba mang por 'gyur ro/ /gos la bdugs na gos thob par 'gyur ro/ /me tog dang 'bras bu la bdugs nas gang la byin pa de dag bdag nyid dam nor gyi sgo nas dbang du 'gyur ro/ /phreng ba la bdugs la gsang sngags lan bdun

bzlas brjod byas na gang gi mgo la bcings pa de la 'bab par byed cing / ya mtshan byung ba dang 'byung ba smra'o/ /'phags pa rdo rje 'chang la bdugs na rig sngags chen po'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur zhing / 'phags pa rdo rje 'chang
ston par mdzad la dgos pa thams cad sgrub par mdzad do/ /gnod sbyin mo yi gzugs bris pa la bdugs la gsang sngags lan bdun dran par byas na/ gnod sbyin mo 'ongs nas 'dod pa thams cad sbyin zhing las

thams cad byed par 'gyur la ji srid 'tsho'i bar du nye bar 'dug go/ sbyor ba mo la bdugs na/ sbyor ba mo thams cad dang / mkha' 'gro ma thams cad dbang du gyur nas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du nye bar 'dug go/ 'dod dgur

sgyur ba'i gzugs can ma la bdugs na 'dod dgur sgyur ba'i gzugs can ma 'ongs nas chung mar bya'o zhes smra na ji srid 'tsho'i bar du yo byad dang / longs spyod du bya ba thams cad sgrub par byed la 'dod pa'i

yon tan lnga la rtse bas dga' bar 'gyur ba dang / rnam thos kyi bu la 'gran par 'gyur ro/ /dril bu la bdugs nas sgra dkrol na 'jigs pa thams cad las thar bar 'gyur la/ bsrung ba chen po byas par 'gyur

khyim gyi nang du dkrol na 'byung po dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / yi dgas dang / brjed byed dang / grib gnon thams cad byung nas phyogs bcur bros par 'gyur ro/ /oM a mo g+ha pA sha pad ma uSh+NI Sha/ ta ra ta ra/ a pa ta ra tu/

b+ha ban gats+tsha tu/ swa b+hA ba nan/ tu ru tu ru/ ma hA pad ma b+hu dze swA hA/ slar gshegs su gsol ba'i sngags te/ bdug spos gu gul dang / chu dang yungs kar dang bsres pa la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas na thams cad

du slar gshegs su gsol ba'i sngags byas par 'gyur ro/ /gsang sngags rim par phye ba'i cho ga dang bsgrub pa'i cho ga'o/ // / de nas lha mo chen mo sgrol ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa

spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas lha'i mchod pa'i sprin chen
pos mchod de/ lan gsum bskor ba byas nas mgo btud de thal mo sbyar nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bcom ldan

'das rig sngags chen po 'jig rten du cher bstan lags so/ /gsang ba chen po'i dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya rim par phye ba dang / cho ga zhib mo dang / don yod pa'i zhags pa pad ma gtsug gi rig sngags kyi rgyal

po chen po'i snying po rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi don dang / sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde bar bgyi ba'i slad du 'dzam bu'i gling du gzhag lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang don yod

pa pad ma gtsug tor gyi rig sngags kyi rgyal po de'i snying po dang / cho ga zhib mo don yod par sgrol ba dri ma med pa pad ma gtsug tor gyi zhags pa zhes bgyi ba rig sngags kyi rgyal po'i snying po bshad par bgyi ste/

rig sngags 'chang gang gis dran pa tsam gyis bdag bkug cing g.yar drangs par 'gyur/ rig sngags 'chang gi rig sngags sgrub cing yongs su spyod pa la rim gro bgyi ba dang / rig sngags 'chang sgrub pa'i dngos grub mchog

stsal bar bgyi ba dang / bsam pa thams cad yid bzhin du yongs su bkang bar bgyi ba de bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khor mang po 'dus pa'i mngon sum du rig sngags kyi rgyal po bshad par bgyi'o/ /

de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas lha mo sgrol ma la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /lha mo chen mo sgrol ma rang gi rig sngags kyi rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs kyis

shod cig /de nas lha mo chen mo sgrol ma bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar don yod par sgrol ba dri ma med pa pad ma gtsug tor gyi zhags pa zhes bya ba rig sngags kyi snying po smras pa/ na maHs+t+rai yang d+h+wi kA nA~M/ ta thA ga tA nA~M

shAkya rA dza ya a d+hiSh+Tha na na ma skr-i tA nA~M/ na mo rad na tra yA ya/ na maHAr+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi sa twA ya/ ma hA sa twA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ na maHtwA ra yai/ ma hA de bi/ oM tA rA Ni tA ra Ni tA re/ pad ma bi b+hU Shi ta tA re/ ma

Ni ka na ka bi tsid tri ta ma la/ dza Ta ma ku Ta nan/ di ta pad me/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ pad ma pA sha b+hu dze/ a mo g+ha pA sha ha ste/ tA ra ya b+ha ga ba ti/ ma hA sid d+hi ba ra de/ tu ru tu ru/ ma hA tA ra Ni/ ba ra d+he/ sad+ha ya sa d+ha ya/ sid d+he/ a mo g+ha

ba ra de swA hA/ oM a mo g+ha pad mi ni tA re swA hA/ snying po'o/ oM ma Ni tA re hU~M/ nye ba'i snying po'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di ni bdag gi gsang sngags nor bu rin po che chen po'i snying po/ don yod pa'i zhags pa
pad ma gtsug tor gyi rig sngags kyi snying po'i zhags pa cho ga zhib mo'i rig sngags 'chang ba rnams kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba dang / sems can thams cad la mchog stsal ba rab tu stsal
bar bgyi ba'i slad du rjes su stsal ba lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'di'i yo byad dang / cho ga bshad par bgyi ste/ du ru ka dang / gu gul dang / sprig ka gcig tu bgyis la
gsang sngags kyi snying po 'dis lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis nas bcom ldan 'das bdag la bdugs na bdugs pa tsam gyi mod la bcom ldan 'das bdag dgug pa dang / g.yar drangs par 'gyur
lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das rig sngags 'di sgrub pa'i tshe rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na mchis shing bsam pa thams cad yid bzhin du dngos grub rjes su stsal bar bgyi/ bgegs dang / log 'dren thams

cad bzlog par bgyi/ gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha za thams cad bzlog par bgyi/ 'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyi/ bsam pa thams cad yid bzhin du
rdzogs par bgyi/ bde legs dang / dge legs bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das mchis nyal ba na bdug spos kyi rgyal po 'dis bdag la bdugs shing / bdag gi snying po nor

bu rin po che chen po'i snying po gsum po de dag lan nyi shu rtsa gcig brjod na bdugs pa tsam gyi mod dang / dran pa tsam gyis bcom ldan 'das bdag nyid kyi ngo bo rang gi gzugs yongs su dag pa bstan cing / mngon
sum du mchis par bgyi/ mchog thams cad rjes su stsal bar bgyi/ byung ba dang 'byung ba'i bka' mchid bgyi'o/ /dran pa tsam gyi mod la don yod pad ma gtsug tor gyi zhags pa'i snying po 'di dran pa tsam
gyis/ bcom ldan 'das bdag rig sngags 'chang de'i mdun du mchis shing bsam pa thams cad yid bzhin du yongs su rdzogs par bgyi/ sdang ba dang / sdig pa thams cad dang / bgegs dang / log
'dren thams cad so sor bzlog par bgyi/ dngos grub chen po bsgrub pa rjes su stsal bar bgyi/ bkra shis kyi sgra thams cad 'byung bar bgyi/ rig sngags kyi dngos grub thams cad rjes su stsal bar bgyi/
cho ga zhib mo dang / dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya rim par phye ba'i dngos grub thams cad rjes su stsal bar bgyi/ bsod nams dran pa'i dngos grub thams cad rjes su stsal bar bgyi/ dus
ma yin par 'chi ba thams cad so sor bzlog par bgyi/ sdig pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag par bgyi/ rtag tu rjes su 'brang bar bgyi/ rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par rig sngags 'chang gi
bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad so sor bzlog par bgyi/ nad thams cad bsal bar bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das rig sngags 'chang 'gum pa'i tshe rnam par shes pa tha ma la bab pa de/ bcom ldan 'das
bdag gis rtag tu mngon sum du bstan cing mdun na nye bar mchis par bgyi/ sangs rgyas yid la bgyid pa shin du dran pas dus las 'da' bar bgyis pa dang / ji ltar sbrul lpags pa brjes pa bzhin du lus

brjes nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can gyi skal ba dang mnyam par pad ma dag las rdzus te skye la rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa dang / tshe rabs su tshe rabs dran par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis
yongs su gzung zhing byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ lus rdo rjer 'gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du chud par 'gyur/ sa bcu la gnas par yang 'gyur/ phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par yang 'gyur/
de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis lung bstan par yang 'gyur/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad bskyed par yang 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mngon sum du ston par 'gyur/ bsod nams kyi tshogs thams cad

bsags par 'gyur/ sdig pa dang / sgrib pa dang / sdig pa thams cad yongs su dag par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i dam tshig rtogs pa dang / gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i
dam tshig byang chub kyi snying po'i mthar thug pa'i bar du 'tshal bar 'gyur ba lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas lha mo chen mo sgron ma la legs so zhes bya ba

byin te/ lha mo chen mo legs so legs so/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'di khyod kyis bshad pa mchog tu legs so/ /cho ga zhib mo 'di yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / rig sngags 'chang de yang yongs su bsrung ba'i phyir

dang / yongs su bskyang ba'i phyir dang / dngos grub rab tu sbyin pa'i phyir khyod kyis yongs su bskyang bar bya'o/ /de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang /

dbang phyug chen po dang / lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang / tshogs kyi bdag po nag po chen po dang / rig sngags dang dkyil 'khor kyi lha du ma dang / nor bu bzang po'i bu dang / lnga len dang / gar mkhan mchog dang / stobs can dang /

stobs po che dang / ljang sngo dang / dung can dang / de bzhin du 'jigs byed dang / dbyangs ldan ma dang / dpe med ma dang / lha mo chen mo dpal dang / ral pa gcig ma dang / me tog tshems te thams cad 'dus nas mthun par
stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar nas btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /

bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe rig sngags 'chang de dang / rig sngags smra ba rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma 'am/ gzhan

yang skyes pa 'am/ bud med dam/ khye'u 'am/ bu mo gang zhig don yod pa'i zhags pa gtsug tor 'di sgrub par bgyid dam/ klog par bgyid dam/ 'don dam/ tha na ming tsam yang 'dzin par bgyid na/ bcom ldan 'das
de la bdag cag kun nas mthun par rtag tu rjes su 'brang zhing bsrung bar bgyi/ yongs su bskyang bar bgyi/ gzi brjid gzhug par bgyi/ dngos grub chen po'i bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi bsam

pa thams cad kyi mchog yongs su rdzogs par bgyi/ nyes par bgyis pa thams cad so sor bzlog par bgyi/ sdig pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad yongs su sbyang bar bgyi/ byang chub kyi mthar thug gi bar du rtag tu rjes

su 'brang bar bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad du grogs po dag legs so legs so/ /khyod kyis bya ba de ltar yin te rig sngags kyi rgyal po chen po 'di ngas gtams shing yongs su gtang ngo zhes bka'

stsal to/ /don yod pa'i zhags pa pad ma gtsug tor rdo rje chen po'i snying po gsang ba rdzogs s+ho// //rnam par thar pa chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi snying po gsang ba bstan pa bklags pas grub pa cho ga zhib mo rgyas
pa mchog tu gsang ba mtha' dag rdzogs pa yongs su rdzogs s+ho// // de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la
gtugs nas mig mi 'dzums par bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal du bltas nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di na bdag la pad ma yangs pa'i dkyil 'khor pad ma'i rigs kyi snying por

gyur pa gsang ba de kho na nyid bstan pa mchis te/ rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi gsang ba'i don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po khro bo'i rgyal po rig sngags kyi rgyal po'i snying po bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar ngo bo tha dad

pa dang / phyag rgya tha dad pa dang / sngags tha dad pa dang / dkyil 'khor dang / gzugs bri ba yongs su bsgrags par bgyi/ sems can thams cad rjes su gzung ba'i slad du/ rig sngags 'chang ba rnams kyi de kho nar gyur pa ni 'di

lags te/ rig sngags 'chang ba thams cad kyi gnas gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor pad ma yangs pa'i dam tshig don yod pa'i zhags pa bsgrub pa'i cho ga rjes su stsal bar bgyi na bcom ldan 'das de bdag la gnang bar mdzad

cing / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dam tshig byin gyis brlabs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dang / pad ma'i rigs dang / nor bu'i rigs dang / rdo rje'i rigs dang / spyi'i dam tshig 'grub par 'gyur/ spyi'i

byin gyis brlabs dang / rig sngags kyi rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor dang / gzugs bri ba dang / phyag rgya rim par phye ba la rjes su 'jug par 'gyur/ cho ga zhib mo bsgrub pa thams cad kyi dngos grub de kho na nyid du 'gyur/ de bzhin

gshegs pa thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i dam tshig byin gyis brlabs kyi de kho na nyid du 'gyur lags so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom

pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas byang chub sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ snying rje chen po dang ldan pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i dam tshig rnam par

thar pa chen po'i dkyil 'khor rnam par 'phrul pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dam tshig dkyil 'khor chen po dang / phyag rgya rim par phye ba cho ga zhib mo de'i dus la bab par shes na shod cig /ngas byin gyis brlabs

shing rjes su yi rang la phyag rgya chen pos btab nas byin gyis brlabs so/ sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin

gyi brlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs so/ /sems can thams cad kyi don du de kho na nyid kyi dngos grub bla na med pa phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor dang / dam tshig chen por byin gyis brlabs so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bzhin 'dzum zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor rnam par 'phrul pa bkod pa/ don yod pa mthong ba'i

ting nge 'dzin mngon du byas nas ting nge 'dzin des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'-i 'jig rten gyi khams na sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad 'od zer gyis snang bar byas/ lha'i gnas thams cad snang bar byas/ klu'i gnas thams cad snang bar

byas/ gnod sbyin dang srin po'i gnas thams cad snang bar byas/ 'byung po'i gnas thams cad snang bar byas/ lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po'i gnas thams cad snang bar byas/ sa'i

'og tu gtogs pa 'og na gnas pa thams cad snang bar byas/ bar snang gi gnas nam mkha' la rgyu ba'i lha rnams snang bar byas shing stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kun nas g.yo ba chen por gyur pa

dang / g.yo ba'i mthu des de dag thams cad bskul bar gyur to/ /bskul ba tsam gyi mod nyid la/ de dag thams cad lhags te/ ri gru 'dzin na 'khor mang po 'dus par mthun par lhags nas 'khod do/ /de nas byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'khor mang po 'dus par mkhyen nas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cha byad du zhugs shing bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas/ 'di ltar
de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba thams cad du rigs spyi'i dam tshig gi tshul du zhugs la/ ral pa'i thor tshugs kyis brgyan zhing / rgyal ba 'od dpag med thor tshugs su thogs pa/ tshangs pa'i gzugs can

phyag bcwa brgyad pa rang gi ngo bo zhags pa thogs pa/ thal mo sbyar ba/ sku phyed na phyag g.yon pa brten pa/ mdung rtse gsum pa bsnams pa/ ril ba spyi blugs dang / bgrang phreng bsnams pa/ pad ma bsnams pa/

pad ma'i phyag rgya bsnams pa/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang / rgyal mtshan bsnams pa/ me tog gi phur ma dang / bI dza pu ra bsnams pa/ dbugs 'byin par mdzad pa/ rin po che'i char 'bebs par mdzad pa/ thal mo sbyar ba'i

phyag rgya mdzad pa/ spyi bor phyag rgya mdzad pa/ dam tshig gi phyag rgya mdzad pa/ pad ma yangs pa'i phyag rgya mdzad pa/ rdo rje'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya mdzad pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang / nor bu'i phyag rgya mdzad
