pa/ gzugs zhi ba/ spyan gsum pa/ mchod phyir thogs pa/ gdan pad ma/ sku 'od zer sna tshogs 'bar ba/ sgrol ma bdun rjes su 'brang ba/ pha rol tu phyin pa bcus bskor ba/ brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / gshin

rje dang / chu lha dang / lus ngan pos bskor ba/ dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / tshangs pa dang / lha'i bu dang / sred med kyi bu dang / dbang chen dang / rgya mtsho dang dga' bo dang / nye dga' bo 'khor dang bcas pa bcom
ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i spyan sngar 'khod nas mig mi 'dzums shing bzhin 'dzums pas/ me tog sna tshogs pa rnams bcom ldan 'das la 'thor te/ 'di lta ste/ me tog shwa la dang / ta ma la dang /

tsam pa dang / a ti mug ta ka dang / sho kA bar ta sha dang / kha bye 'khyil pa dang / gan d+ha pa ra Shi ka dang / mthon ka dang / mthon ka chen po dang / ka dam pa dang / mdog mdzes pa dang / su man n+ya ka dang / skya snar dang / cher gsal

ba dang / dri med gzi brjid dang / dri dga' dang / rab sim dang / pa lA sha dang / za ba dang / ma raN Ta ka dang / gzi brjid bsil dang / dri med dang / gzi yangs ldan dang / shin du bstan dang / lha dga' dang / yid dga' dang / yu thi ka dang /

pad ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad ma dkar po dang / uta pa la dang / uta pa la dmar po dang / ta ra Na gu h+ya dang / gser dang / dngul dang / rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs kyi me tog rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed pa

ni mngon sum du rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor gsang ba don yod pa'i rgyal po 'di smras so/ /dus gsum du gshegs shing bzhugs pa sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin

gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba rigs kyi dam tshig la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal po don yod pa rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor kyi rigs dang / phyag rgya thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa

dang / da ltar byung ba'i rang sangs rgyas dang / nyan thos kyi dge 'dun thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /yang dag par rtogs pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /blo gros chen
po dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi mchog rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan

ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /drang srong chen po de dag dang / 'phags pa'i tshogs kyi mchog de dag la phyag 'tshal nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhal nas byung ba/ don yod pa'i

rgyal po rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi snying po de bzhin gshegs pas mngon sum du gsungs pa 'di 'khor mang po'i nang du bdag gis da bzlas kyis/ bdag gi dgos pa thams cad grub par gyur cig / 'jigs

pa thams cad du bsrung bar gyur cig / // tad ya thA/ \u0f00 tsa ra tsa ra/ tsi ri tsi ri/ tsu ru tsu ru/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA/ bi ri bi ri/ pi ri pi ri/ tsi ri tsi ri/ pa ra ma ma hA kA ru Ni kA/ si ri si ri/ tsi ri tsi ri/ pi ri pi ri/

bi ri bi ri/ ma hA pad ma hasto/ ka la ka la/ ki li ki li/ ku lu ku lu/ ma hA shud d+ha/ satwa/ e h+ye hi/ bud d+ha bud d+ha/ d+hA ba d+hA ba/ ka Na ka Na/ ki Ni ki Ni/ ku Nu ku Nu/ pa ra ma shud d+ha sa twa/ ka ra ka ra/ ki ri ki ri/ ku ru ku ru/

ma hA s+tha ma pra ba ta/ tsa la tsa la/ san tsa la/ bi tsa la/ e Ta Ta/ e Ta Ta/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ b+hi ri b+hi ri/ b+hu ru b+hu ru/ e h+ye hi ma hA kA ru Ni kA/ ma hA pA shu pa ti/ be sha d+ha ra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ sa ra sa ra/ tsa ra tsa ra/ ha ra ha ra/ hA hA hA hA/ hI hI

hI hI/ hU hU hU hU/ oM kA ra brah+ma be Sha d+ha ra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ ta ra ta ra/ sa ra sa ra/ pa ra pa ra/ tsa ra tsa ra/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ ra sh+mi sha ta/ sa ha sra pra ti/ maN Di ta sha rI ra/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ ta pa ta pa/ b+ha b+ha bAn/ sau ma

A di t+ya/ ya ma ba ru Na/ ku be ra/ brah+ma in dra/ r-i Shi/ de ba ga Na/ a b+h+ya ri tsa ta tsa ra Na/ su ru su ru/ tsu ru tsu ru/ pu ru pu ru/ mu ru mu ru/ sa nad ku mA ra/ ru dra bA sa ba/ biSh+Nu d+ha na da/ de ba r-i Shi nA ya ka /ba hu bi bi d+ha be Sha d+ha ra/ d+ha ra

d+ha ra/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ tha ra tha ra/ g+ha ra g+ha ra/ ya ra ya ra/ la ra la ra/ ha ra ha ra/ ma ra ma ra/ pa ra pa ra/ tsa ra tsa ra/ ba ra ba ra/ ba ra da ya ka /sa man ta a ba lo ki te/ bi lo ki te/ lo ki shwa ra/ ma he shwa ra/ mu hu mu hu/ mu ya mu ya/
many+tsa many+tsa// //bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bdag dang sems can thams cad 'jigs pa thams cad dang / gnod pa thams cad dang / yams kyi nad thams cad dang /

gdon thams cad dang / nad thams cad las bsrung du gsol/ bsrung du gsol/ gnod pa dang / 'ching ba dang / brdeg pa dang / bsdigs pa dang / rgyal po dang / chom rkun dang / gnod byed dang / me dang / chu dang / dug dang /

mtshon las yongs su thar bar mdzad pa/ ka Na ka Na/ ki Ni ki Ni/ ku Nu ku Nu/ tsa ra tsa ra/ in dri ya/ ba la bo d+h+yang ga /mA ra ka /tsa tu rA r+ya sat+ya/ sam pra kA sha ka /ta ma ta ma/ da ma da ma/ sha ma sha ma/

sa ma sa ma/ ma hA ta mon d+ha kA ra/ bi d+ha man/ Sha Ta pA ra mi tA/ pA ri pU ra ka /mi li mi li/ Ta Ta Ta Ta/ Tha Tha Tha Tha/ Ti Ti Ti Ti/ Tu Tu Tu Tu/ e ne ya tsa ra ma kri Ta/ e h+ye hi e h+ye tI shwa ra/ ma hA ta b+hu ta/ ga na b+hany+dza ka /ku ru

ku ru/ pa ra pa ra/ ka Ta ka Ta/ ma Ta ma Ta/ bi shud d+ha/ bi Sha ya/ ni bA si na/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA/ shwe tA yadz+nyo ba bi ta ya/ rata na ma kuT/ mA lA d+ha ra/ sarba dz+nyA shi ra si kr-i ta/ ma kuT ma hA ta b+hu ta/ ka ra ta la na sa mA d+hi/ bi mo k+Sha/ a pra

kam pya/ ba hu satwa/ san ta ti/ pa ri pA tsa ka ma hA kA ru Ni ka /sarba karma A ba ra Na bi sho d+ha ka /sarba byA d+hi pir mo tsa ka /sarba A sha pa ri pU ra ka /sarba satwa/ sa mA shwA sa ka ra/ na mo stu te swA hA/ oM brah+ma/ be sha d+ha ra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/

d+hi ri d+hi ri/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ sa man ta/ dz+wa la a mo g+ha hU~M/ don yod pa'i snying po/ a yi ge gcig po ni kun nas gsang ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dam tshig dang / pad ma yangs pa'i dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa
rigs thams cad kyi spyi'i yin te/ bklags pas grub pa'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis snying po yi ge gcig po kun nas de bzhin gshegs

pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi gsang ba spyi'i rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor smras pa tsam gyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos shing lha'i me tog gi char rab tu bab la/ kun nas

rin po che'i char rab tu bab bo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa gang gA klung gi bye ma snyed bye ba khrag khrig stong kun nas gshegs nas nam mkha'i dkyil la rdzu 'phrul gyis bzhugs so/ /don yod pa'i rim par phye ba'i sprin lha'i rin po

che sna bdun phab la 'bab pas khebs pa dang / lha'i rin po che sna bdun gyi me tog rnams dang / lha'i rgyan dang / gos sna tshogs pa'i char bcom ldan 'das dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs don yod pa'i rgyal po'i

tshul du zhugs pa la mchod pa dang / bkur sti bya ba'i phyir rab tu phab bo/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis kyang legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byin par mdzad de/ sems dag pa chen po khyod kyis sangs rgyas

'byung ba mchog bstan pa legs so legs so/ /'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi gsang ba'i phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor dang / rig sngags kyi gnas rim par phye ba rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor dang /

yi ge gcig pa'i rjes su zhugs pa ni stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su nyi ma gcig shar ba yin no/ /gang 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i

'jig rten gyi khams rdul phra mo snyed kyi sangs rgyas 'byung ba rdzogs par sangs rgyas 'byung ba gcig gis thams cad kyi rjes su zhugs pa yin zhing / snying po yi ge gcig gis rjes su zhugs pa yin la phyag rgya dang /

dkyil 'khor rim par phye ba dang / dam tshig gcig gis rjes su zhugs pa yin no/ /don yod pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba bzang po 'di ni don yod pa'i gsang sngags

kyi zhags pas drangs shing sku gcig gi dam tshig la bkod pa yin te/ de nas don yod pa'i zhags pa zhes bya bar byin gyis brlabs so/ /snying po yi ge gcig pa'i gzungs sngags ni rtag tu bklags pas grub pa/ de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la legs so/ /zhes bya

ba byin te/ snying rje chen po dang ldan pa legs legs so/ /de kho na nyid bsgrub pa grub pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs spyi'i dam tshig thams cad grub pa/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po bsgrub pa bklags pas 'grub pa 'di

ni mchog tu bzang ba yin gyis yon tan gyi phung po shod cig / snying po yi ge 'di ni don yod pa'i zhags pa sgrub pa'i cho ga bsgrub pa bde ba/ bklags pas grub pa phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor dang / sku gzugs
ri mo dang bcas pa bsgrub pa'i cho ga bla na med pa yin no/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan

don yod pa'i zhags pa pad ma yangs pa'i dkyil 'khor dang / pad ma'i rigs kyi rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor dang / de kho na nyid kyi dam tshig gsang ba chen po dang / rigs spyi'i sgrub pa bklags pas 'grub
pa 'di'i yo byad dang / cho ga bshad par bgyi yis bcom ldan 'das kyis byin gyis brlab tu gsol/ bcom ldan 'das gang gis dran pa tsam gyis bdag mdun na nye bar mchis shing bsam pa thams cad yid
bzhin du yongs su rdzogs par bgyi/ rig sngags kyi dngos grub thams cad rjes su stsal bar bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug legs so legs so/ /de ltar khyod kyis

sems can thams cad bsgral bar bya zhing / rig sngags 'chang rnams kyi dngos grub dam pa mchog de khyod kyis rab tu sbyin par gyis shig /don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po gsang ba'i dam tshig dang / yi ge gcig po rigs

spyi'i rjes su zhugs pas de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs kyis yo byad dang / sgrub pa'i cho ga shod cig /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bcom ldan 'das

kyis dbugs phyung ba dag thos nas/ snying shin du dga' ste/ yo byad dang / cho ga smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis mngon sum nyid du sdig pa bsreg cing ma lus par zad par bgyid pa/ sems can dmyal ba rtsa nas 'byin

pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga smras pa/ dkyil 'khor gru bzhir byas nas su/ /dbus su pad ma'i 'khor lo bya/ /tshon rtsi sna tshogs rnam par dbye/ /pad ma ze ba'i dbus su ni/ /spyan ras gzigs dbang bzhugs par bya/ /

bum pa bkang dang pad rnams kyi/ /dkyil 'khor kun nas brgyan par bya/ /me tog sna tshogs legs par dgram/ /spos dri bzang pos bsgos pa yi/ /mar me'i phreng ba kun du bud/ /mchod yon chu dag gzhag par bya/ /

a ga ru dang du ru ska/ /bdug spos snod bzhi dag nas bdug /rig sngags 'chang ba khrus byas nas/ /gos gtsang bgos te smyung ba la/ /nye bar gnas nas tshes brgyad dam/ /bcu bzhi 'am tshes ni bcwa lnga ste/ /zla ba yar gyi

ngo la bsgrub/ /shar du kha bltas 'dug nas su/ /don yod zhags pa dus gsum du/ /nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bya/ /snying po 'am brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas/ /yi ge gcig po 'bum du ni/ /mtshan mo bar chad med par bzlas/ /

skya ring shar nas 'jig rten dbang / /ze ba'i dbus na 'bar 'gyur zhing / /'gul 'gyur 'gul ba de yis ni/ /dmyal ba chen po bcu drug gi/ sgo rnams dag ni bye bar 'gyur/ /dmyal ba'i gnas nas shugs chen gyis/ /
g.yo la g.yos pa tsam des ni/ /dmyal ba'i tshor kun rnam par 'jig /dmyal ba de yang rnam par 'joms/ /sems can dmyal ba de dag ni/ /thar nas phyogs bcur rgyug pa yi/ /dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal kun
las grol/ /mtho ris lam du zhugs par 'gyur/ /dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi sdug bsngal thams cad du dud 'gro rnams las yongs su grol bar 'gyur/ bdag nyid kyi sgrib pa dang / sdig pa dang / sdug bsngal
mi bzad pa thams cad mthar gtugs par yongs su zad par 'gyur/ 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro/ /gal te sdig pa thams cad zad par gyur na/ de'i tshe
'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi sku mdog gser gyi mdog can du ston par mdzad la mchog thams cad sbyin par mdzad do/ /don yod pa dri ma med pa'i ye shes rgya mtsho bkod pa zhes bya

ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur/ sgrib pa dang bral ba sems kyi rgyan rnam par dag pa'i bdag nyid kyi ngo bo thob par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu

po rnams mod nyid la mngon sum du ston par mdzad la/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyi phyag g.yas pa mgo'i spyi bor 'jog par mdzad/ bsod nams kyi phung po chen po dang ldan par 'gyur/ dge ba'i rtsa

ba chen po yongs su gzung bar 'gyur/ 'jig rten pa kun gyis gcig pu mchod pa chen po byas par 'gyur/ gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / lus ngan dang / zla ba dang / nyi ma dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug

chen po rang gi gzugs kyis mngon sum du ston cing nye bar 'khor la kun nas bsrung ba dang / skyob pa dang / sbed pa byed par 'gyur/ dngos grub dang / dgos pa thams cad grub par 'gyur/ gal te sdig pa thams cad

zad par ma gyur na/ de'i tshe 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi sku mdog gser gyi kha dog can du mi mthong / des sgrib pa dang / sdig pa lhag ma lus par shes par bya ste/ de nyid du bzlas brjod kyi cho ga smyung ba

byas pa dang / sdig pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad rtsa ba dang bcas pa thams cad phyung bar 'gyur ro/ /gal te bzlas brjod kyi cho ga smyung ba gsum pa byed na bzlas brjod kyi cho ga gsum rdzogs pa dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzig+sa

kyi phyag g.yas pa brkyang nas rig sngags 'chang bteg ste mod la 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du 'od dpag med kyi spyan sngar 'jog par mdzad la mngon sum du bzhugs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med

kyis dbugs 'byin par mdzad cing phyag spyi bor 'jog par mdzad de/ tshe dpag tu med par 'gyur ro/ /gal te sems can gzhan rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ skyes pa 'am/

bud med dam/ khye'u 'am/ bu mo 'am/ tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba gang zhig sdig pa dang / sgrib pa zad par 'dod na rig sngags 'chang khrus byas la gos gtsang ma bgos/ smyung ba byas pa des dkyil 'khor

la mngon du phyogs par gzhag la/ rig sngags 'chang cho ga byed pas gsang sngags rjes su dran par byas nas rma bya'i sgros byab par bya'o/ /de tsam gyis yon tan gyi khyad par thob par 'gyur te/ sdig pa dang /

sgrib pa thams cad zad par 'gyur/ nad thams cad dang / gdug pa thams cad dang / na ba thams cad dang / mtshams med pa thams cad zad par 'gyur te the tshom med do/ /sgrib pa dang bral ba nyid thob par 'gyur zhing tshig
gzung bar 'os par 'gyur/ lha thams cad kyis gzung zhing kun nas bsrung bar 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung thob par 'gyur/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gzigs bzhed par 'gyur/ tshe

ring ba dang / sgrib pa dang / nad dang bral bar 'gyur/ tshe 'phos nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur/ tshe rabs su tshe rabs dran par 'gyur/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bsod nams kyi tshogs thams cad dang ldan par

'gyur te/ snying rje dang / byams pa chen po yid la bya ba rtse gcig tu bya zhing smyung ba dang / bzlas brjod bya'o/ /sdig pa dang sgrib pa zad par bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i cho ga'o// // 'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags
pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po/ bam po bcu bdun pa/ dkyil 'khor bshad par bya ste/ gru bzhi po ko la'i tshad du cha legs par phye ba/ gru bzhi dang / sgo bzhi yod pa/ them skas kyi rim pa can du

tshon sna tshogs kyi skud pas thig gdab cing dkyil 'khor gyi snying po mdzes par bya/ dkyil 'khor gyi dbus kyi snying po pad ma mchog kha phye ba 'dab ma brgya rtsa brgyad pa/ snying po dang / ze ba shin du mdzes pa/ snying

po las pad ma byung ba/ kha phyed bye ba dang / lag pa gnyis byung bas pad ma'i 'dab ma 'dzin pa bris par dngul gyi snod kyi nang du sman bkang ste dar gyis kha g.yogs nas pad ma'i 'dab ma'i steng du gzhag par bya/

'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rtag tu tshangs pa'i cha byad du bzhugs pa/ dar gyi cod pan bcings shing brgyan pa pad ma'i steng du bzhugs par bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor phyi rol kun du phyag rgya'i rtags rnam+sa

gsal bar br-i'o/ /sgo sgor don yod pa'i zhags pa pad ma'i steng du gzhag pa kha dog dang 'od zer 'bar ba bri'o/ /grwa grwar bum pa gang ba bri'o/ /dkyil 'khor kun du 'phan dang / bum pa gang ba dang / 'bras bu dang /

me tog bsres pa mdzes pas brgyan par bya'o/ /gtor ma rnam pa sna tshogs gzhag par bya'o/ /mchod yon gyi chu dbul bar bya/ tsan dan dang / a ga ru'i bdug spos dang / spos sna tshogs dbul bar bya/ dkyil

'khor kun du mar me'i phreng ba dang / me tog phreng ba dgod cing kun du 'bras yos dang / yungs kar dgram par bya'o/ /rig sngags 'chang gtsang mar gyur pas legs par khrus bya zhing / gos gtsang ma bgos pa 'jigs pa

med pas zla ba yar gyi ngo nya la bsgrub par bya ste/ sems can thams cad la brtse bar gyur cing byams pa'i sems dang / snying rje'i bdag nyid can gyis bsgrub par bya'o/ /gang gis lag gis gzung ba tsam dang / reg pa tsam gyi mod

la de dga' ba 'thob cing sdig pa thams cad 'jig par 'gyur/ sngon gyi sgrib pa rnams 'jig par 'gyur/ mtshams med pa byed pa rnams las grol bar 'gyur/ mod la nad thams cad 'byang zhing ngan 'gro thams cad 'jig par byed pa

bsod nams chen po'i stobs kyi dngos grub sman gyi de kho na nyid mthong ba ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyis lung bstan cing de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis bsngag+sa

pa/ 'dren pa 'jig rten dbang phyug gis sprul pa/ dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad kyis bsngags pa rig sngags 'chang gi dbang po thams cad kyis phyag byas pa/ lha thams cad kyis bsrung ba/ klu'i dbang po thams cad rjes su

'brang ba/ sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i dbang po dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / ku be ra dang / nyi ma dang / zla bas mchod pa/ de bzhin du rgyu skar gyi tshogs dang / gza' kun dang / mjug

rings dang / de bzhin du gza'i khyim dang / thams cad du bkra shis kyis mchod pa/ cho ga zhib mo thams cad dang / de bzhin du dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya dang / bzlas brjod thams cad dang / gsang sngags thams cad kyi rjes su zhug+sa

pa/ rigs spyi'i de bzhin gshegs pa gang gA'i klung bye ma snyed bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag drug bcu rtsa bzhi'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis sman gyi mchog dbang bskur ba/ dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams

kyis lung bstan pa/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu thams cad dang mthun pa'i sman gyi rdzas bkra shis pa bye ba khrag khrig gam/ lhag par gyur pa gzhan gang yang med do/ /sman de lta bu ni rtag tu mchog gtso bo 'byin pa/ 'jig

rten dbang phyug dang 'dra ba yin no/ /de'i phyir thams cad sman 'chang bar 'dod pas gnas gang yang rung bar sbyar bar bya ste/ gtsang ma legs par khrus byas pa des sbyar bar bya'o/ /ji lta ji ltar bkra shis kyi bsam
pa yid la byed pa de lta de ltar bsam pa yid la byed pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/ sbyar ba tsam gyi mod la thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ 'dod pa thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/

rig sngags 'chang gtsang mar gyur pa/ gos gtsang ma bgos pa spos chus legs par khrus byas la nyin re sman re re don yod pa'i rgyal pos bzlas brjod byas te zos na/ zos pa tsam gyi mod la de bzhin gshegs
pa thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis dgongs shing snang ba rnam par dag pa 'thob par 'gyur/ nyin zhag gsum du sbyar

na ngag rnam par dag pa 'thob bo/ /nyin zhag lngar sbyar na dran pa rnam par dag pa 'thob bo/ /nyin zhag bdun du sbyar na rig sngags chen po'i cho ga zhib mo rnam par dag pa 'thob bo/ /nyin zhag bcu bzhir sbyar na don yod

pa'i zhags pa de kho na nyid kyi dngos grub kyi dam tshig chen po 'thob bo/ /nyin zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig tu sbyar na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dam tshig dang / phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor chen po'i dam tshig

gi dngos grub 'thob bo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba de kho na nyid kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub 'thob bo/ /zla ba gcig gi bar du sbyar na 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi dngos grub sgyu ma lta

bus brgyan pa thob cing tshe lo stong thub par 'gyur ro/ /zla ba gsum du sbyar na lus yongs su dag pa dang / mdog yongs su dag pa 'thob bo/ /lo gcig tshang bar sbyar na don yod pa'i dngos grub rig sngags 'chang
'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur te/ mig mthon mthing mdog bung ba lta bu skra ral bu 'khyil bar 'gyur/ tshe lo bdun pa lta bu'i gzugs dang mthun par 'gyur la/ tshe bskal pa 'bum thub par 'gyur ro/ /

bdar nas bdag nyid la byugs na/ gang dri mnams pa tsam gyis bgegs dang / log 'dren dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha za dang / yi dgas dang / skem byed dang / brjed byed dang / grib gnon thams cad

dang / gdon thams cad dang / gdug pa thams cad dang / dgra thams cad dpag tshad stong du 'bros so/ /gal te myur du mi 'bros na ni spyi bo dum bu 'bum du 'gas shing yan lag dang / yan lag rnams zhig par 'gyur
la/ bu dang chung mar bcas pa 'jigs par 'gyur/ sngon gyi sdig pa dang sgrib pa rnams kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur/ sems can dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur ba mtshams med pa lnga dag 'jig par 'gyur/ rmi lam

ngan pa dang / ltas ngan pa dang / mi shis pa dang / bkra mi shis pa'i dngos po thams cad 'jig par 'gyur/ spos bsnams pa tsam gyis rgyal po dang / rgyal po'i blon po dang / bram ze dang / khyim bdag dang / rgyal rigs

dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs ci bgyi zhes bya ba byed la dbang du gyur nas 'khod do/ /byugs pa tsam gyis 'bras dang / phol mig dang / lhog pa dang / me dbal dang / rkang shu dang / g.yan pa dang / mdze dang /

khyi rngo dang / shu ba dang / 'brum bu phra mo dang / rma dang / khong gi rma yongs su sos par 'gyur/ dug thams cad dang / zos pa dang / dug myos dang / sbyar dug drag po dang / dug sbyar ma dang / sbyar dug phye ma dang /
byad rnams la bskus pa tsam dang / chu dron po 'thungs pa tsam gyis dug med par 'gyur ro/ /dri tsam gyis klu'i rgyal po 'jog po'i dug kyang med par 'gyur ro/ /rims nyin bzhi pas thebs pa la dpral

bar bskus nas ku co 'don cing 'bros so/ /rims thams cad dang / nyin gcig pa dang / nyin gnyis pa dang / nyin gsum pa dang / rlung las gyur pa dang / mkhris pa las gyur pa dang / bad kan las gyur pa dang /

'dus pa las gyur pa dang / lba ba dang / pho ba'i nad dang / mchin pa na ba dang / lto na ba dang / skan dang / gcin sri ba dang / rtsib logs na ba dang / mgul pa na ba dang / kha na ba dang / 'khyil zhing na ba dang / tshad pa dang /
'doms na ba dang / yan lag dang nying lag na ba chu dron po 'thungs pa tsam gyis yongs su sos par 'gyur ro/ /gzhogs phyed na ba dang / mgo na ba dang / mig na ba dang / rna ba na ba la bskus pa tsam

gyis sos par 'gyur ro/ /thig le byas na chom rkun dang / gnod byed dang / me dang / chu dang / byi ba za bas 'jigs pa dang / gcan gzan khro bo'i 'jigs pa las thar bar 'gyur zhing / 'jigs pa thams cad las yongs

su thar bar 'gyur ro/ /lag pa gdengs pa'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur/ mi ma yin pa gang gis kyang mdangs 'phrog par mi nus shing bar chad bya bar mi nus so/ /mkha' 'gro ma thams cad mthong ba tsam gyis

dbang du gyur nas 'khod do/ /rgyal po btsun mo dang / 'khor dang bcas pa'i mchod gnas chen por 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang gang dang gang du sbyar ba rang gi blos bye ba phrag 'bum sbyar na las grub par byed de/ sman gyi mchog

shin du 'bad pas bsgrub par bya'o/ /sman gyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'o// // de nas de'i phyir gser gyi ri lu'i dkyil 'khor bshad par bya ste/ 'jig rten dbang phyug gi don yod pa'i snying po/ de bzh-in gshegs pa thams cad

kyi don yod pa'i rnam par gzigs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa pad ma gtsug tor gyi rgyal po zhes bya bas byin gyis brlabs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen snying
pos byin gyis brlabs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten dbang phyug 'od kyis bka' stsal pa/ gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag
dgu bcu rtsa dgus gsungs shing bsngags pa/ byin gyis brlabs pa/ dbang bskur ba/ rjes su thugs rang bar mdzad pa/ lung bstan pa/ mgon po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi

gtsug tor gyi nor bu cod pan 'chang ba/ rgyal ba 'od dpag med kyi gtsug tor gyi mtshan nyid kyi thig le yid bzhin gyi nor bu rgyal mtshan gyi nor bu chen po'i rgyal po mchog tu grub pa/ rig sngags dang / dkyil 'khor dang /

phyag rgya dang / cho ga zhib mo thams cad kyi gsang ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dam tshig spyi/ sku'i snying po gang gis mthong ba tsam la sogs pa 'dis tshad bstan par lta su zhig gis nus mod kyi/ 'on

kyang de bzhin gshegs pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed bye ba dang / dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rdzogs par mngon sum du mthong ba dang 'dra bar 'gyur zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa de dag nyid mngon sum du mchod

par gzung ba dang / lung ston pa 'thob par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi mngon sum du dge ba'i rtsa ba bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /nor bu gser gyi kha dog tu bstan pa'i ri lu 'di gang

gis mthong zhing 'chang ba ni dge ba'i rtsa ba bsod nams kyi phung po chen po bskyed bskyed par 'gyur/ nor bu ri lu 'di mthong ba tsam gyis sgrib pa dang / sdig pa dang / gdug pa dang / mtshams med pa lnga dang / mnar med

par gzhol ba dang / dam pa'i chos spong ba dang / 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa dang / sngon gyi tshe rabs nas bsags pa'i sgrib pa thams cad rnam par 'jig cing spangs par 'gyur/ rims dang / nad thams cad
las yongs su thar bar 'gyur/ gang gi lag na sman 'di yod par gyur pa'i sems can de ni lung bstan par 'gyur ro/ /ri lu gang la yod pa ni/ /phyir mi ldog par lung bstan cing / /mgon po sa bcu dag la
gnas/ /rtag tu mchod rten gyur pa ste/ /sku gdung snying po'i bdag nyid can/ /rtag tu sangs rgyas bdag nyid 'gyur/ /dus gsum dag la zhugs pa yi/ /sangs rgyas de bzhin gshegs pa gang / /
sangs rgyas dpa' bo de kun gyi/ /sras gcig tu ni brjod pa yin/ /'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras/ /thugs las skyes dang zhal las skyes/ /chos kyi dbyings sprul chos las skyes/ /'jig

rten dbang phyug mchog sbyin mgon/ /rtag tu rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur/ /phyag g.yas rtag tu spyi bor ni/ /'jog mdzad 'di ni the tsom med/ /ri lu mthong ba tsam gyis ni/ /sdug bsngal kun las rab tu grol/ /sgrib pa thams cad

rnam par 'dag /de ni ngan 'gror 'gro mi 'gyur/ /phyir zhing gnas mchog zhi ba 'thob/ /'jig rten 'dren pa 'od dpag med/ /mgon po rtag tu mngon sum mthong / /bde ba can du 'jug par byed/ /gang na de yi mngon
dga' ba/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa/ /rtag tu mi 'khrugs par 'gyur zhing / /de bzhin mi g.yo mi 'gul te/ /sems dpa' ri rab che dang mnyam/ /gzung du med pas mtsho dang 'dra/ /de la bgegs
dang log 'dren dag /nams kyang 'jug par mi 'gyur la/ /sems dpa' phyag bya'i gnas su 'gyur/ /gang la nor rgyal 'di yod la/ /rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag /dpung dang bcas pa bkol dang bcas/ /

rtag tu bsrung phyir gnas byed de/ /'dir ni nyin mtshan de bzhin no/ /lha tshogs thams cad bsrung bar ni/ /the tshom med par byed par 'gyur/ /gzi brjid dpal yang rab tu 'phel/ /de la legs par 'jug par

'gyur/ /'jigs med rtag tu rmi lam ni/ /dngos po chen po sna tshogs mthong / /gru 'dzin ri la gzhal med khang / /tshal dang bcas shing rin chen bcas/ /gnas dang bcas pa mthong bar 'gyur/ /lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang / /

dri za lha min gsang ba pa/ /nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci/ /de bzhin lto 'phye 'khor dang bcas/ /byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor rnams ni/ /kun nas bskor ba mthong bar 'gyur/ /rin chen lha yi seng ge'i gdan/ /

khang pa brtsegs pa rin chen dang / /nor bu chen pos brgyan pa dang / /'jig rten dbang phyug thub pa'i gtso/ /pad ma snying po la zhugs nas/ /don yod zhags pa'i phyag rgya dang / /dkyil 'khor bcas pa'i chos ston to/ /gsung kun thob par gyur

nas ni/ /thub pa rang gi ngo bo mthong / /de ltar rmi lam bzang rmi ba/ /nyin gcig bzhin du mthong bar 'gyur/ /nor bu rgyal po'i mthu ni de 'dra bas/ /de bas mi yis 'bad pa chen pos zung / /dge sbyong bram ze nyid dang rgyal rigs dang / /dmangs

rigs nyid dam yang na rgyal po 'am/ /btsun mo slas sam dpung gi gtso bo 'am/ /skyes pa 'am bud med khye'u dang bu mo dag /nor bu'i rgyal po rtag tu 'chang byed pa/ /de ni ston pa nyid dang 'dra bar 'gyur/ /chom rkun gyis ni mi

slus shing / /gnod byed kyis ni 'jigs mi 'gyur/ /'jigs pa mi bzad brgyad las thar/ /de la dug dang sbyar ba'i dug /sbyar dug drag pos mi tshugs shing / /de la byad kyis tshugs mi 'gyur/ /gang la nor bu'i rgyal po yod/ /
de la nad kyis mi tshugs shing / /na bas ma yin sdig pas min/ /pad ma chu yis mi chags ltar/ /rtag tu chags pa med par gnas/ /g.yul 'gyed pa yi nang na 'am/ /'thab pa 'am 'gyed pa 'am rtsod pa

na/ /lan thebs rtag tu rgyal bar ni/ /thob par 'gyur te the tsom med/ /de nas rdzas ni bshad bya ste/ /sman ni bkra shis dang ldan pa/ /grub pa'i mtha' ste mchog tu gtsang / /'jig rten mgon dang mnyam par gsungs/

a ga ru dang / tsan dan dang / pad ma dang / ud pa la dang / shi ri sha'i me tog dang / a pA marga dang / me ru dang / na la da dang / chu srin gyi sen mo dang / ka na ka'i 'bras bu dang / tsan dan gyi 'bras bu dang / pad ma'i 'bras bu dang /

rdo dreg dang / me da dang / btsod dang / sU ka ri dang / ma ka TI dang / dzA ya dang / bi dzA ya dang / pa ri pe la ba dang / ra sa dang / bI rA dang / d+h+ya ma ka dang / rgya spos dang / bu sA dang / a par ta ka dang / ru sta dang / bya gra na kha dang /

pad tra dang / tra tsa dang / ka dam ba rA dang / pri yang ku dang / gi'u wang dang / spri ka dang / smig rkang dang / yungs kar dang / nA ga puSh+pa dang / e lA dang / ldong ros dang / gur kum dang / ga pur dang / gla rtsi dang / spang spos dang / na le

sham dkar po dang / su ma dang / nye'u shing dang / shu ti dang / sbrang rtsi dang / tsam pa ka ste/ de bzhin rdzas ni de dag kun/ /su bar Na ni dkar pos sbyar/ /ri lu nam gcig tsam du ni/ /skyes bu mkhas pas bya ba yin/ /su bar Nas ni

bkab nas su/ /rdzas rnams bsres nas sbyar bar bya/ /cha rnams 'phel bar bya ba ste/ /gla rtsi yis ni dri bskyed do/ /phye ma zhib mor btags nas su/ /tsan dan dkar po'i chu sbyar nas/ /grib ma la ni bskam par bya/ /

tshes brgyad nas ni brtsams nas su/ /tshes ni bcwa lnga nya yi bar/ /nyin gcig bzhin du don yod pa'i/ /rgyal pos brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas/ /khro bo'i rgyal po nyin gcig bzhin/ /lan bdun bar du dbang bskur ro/ /phyag

rgyas dbang bskur bar yang bya/ /de nas tshes ni bcwa lnga ste/ /nya la chu dang yungs kar dag /dkyil 'khor du ni gzhag par bya/ /de nas nor bu'i rgyal po dang / /gzhag pa'i dkyil 'khor bshad par bya/ /cha rnams ma

nor legs par dbye/ /rgyar ni ko la'i ched du bya/ /shin du 'jam la dbyibs lta legs/ /tshon rtsi sna tshogs 'byes par dang / /dkyil 'khor mchog ni thig gdab bo/ /sgo bzhi gdod cing grwa bzhi dod/ /kun nas shin du

cha phye zhing / /dkyil 'khor snying po cha phye ba/ /tshad dang shin du ldan par bya/ /pad ma chen po bzhi dag dang / /de bzhin phyag dang spyan du bcas/ /don yod dngos grub bri bar bya/ /nor bu rgyal po 'chang ba yis/ /phyag rgyar bcas pa bri bar

bya/ /chu yi rgya mtsho'i nang du nang du ni/ /las kyi rdo rje legs par bri/ /dkyil 'khor snying po dam pa la/ /kun nas kha khyer rnam pa dang / /me tog sna tshogs pa dag bri/ /dkyil 'khor phyi rol kun du ni/ /nor bu pad ma legs par bri/ /

sgo bzhi yi ni gnas rnams su/ /pad ma zhags pa mdung rtse gsum/ /rdo rje'i tshul mchog legs par bri/ /grwa bzhi yi ni gnas rnams su/ /lag na nor bu yod pa bri/ /pad ma'i steng na rab tu gnas/ /dkyil 'khor

bzang po pan phran dang / /bum pa bkang dang me tog dang / /bdug pa 'bras bu rnams kyis brgyan/ /gtor ma rnam pa sna tshogs dag /ci bdog bungs cher gzhag par bya/ /kun du mar me phreng ba dang / /mchod yon chu dang a ga ru/ /

tsan dan bdug spos dbul bar bya/ /nor bu rgyal po 'jigs med pa/ /snod bzung legs par bkang nas su/ /rgya dar la yis kha g.yogs te/ /dkyil 'khor de nyid rig pas gzhag /dkyil 'khor snying por 'jig rten dbang / /

gzhag ste de nas las rdo rje/ /snod kyi steng du gzhag pa ni/ /nor bu dkyil 'khor bya ba yin/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang gis don yod pa'i rgyal po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bya/ khro bo'i rgyal pos lan bdun dbang

bskur bar bya/ de nas gsang sngags yi ge gcig po 'bum tshang bar bzlas brjod bya ste/ 'bum bzlas brjod byas na nor bu'i rgyal po 'bar bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang gi lag /g.yas dang ldan pas

gzung nas ni/ /chang pa dam du bsdam par bya/ /bsdams pa tsam gyi mod dag la/ /rdzu 'phrul gyis ni mkha' la 'gro/ /nor bu dri ma med pa don yod pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa bkod pa zhes bya ba/ rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los sgyur ba 'thob la

'khor rig sngags 'chang 'khor los sgyur ba bye ba phrag 'bum yod par 'gyur/ khung gi sgo thams cad phye bar 'gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad phye bar 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dam tshig dang / dkyil

'khor dang / phyag rgya dag kha ton du lobs par 'gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du 'jug par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal ba dang / 'dud pa dag gis gsong por smra bar byed/ thams cad du yang don
yod pa'i dkyil 'khor rnam par thar ba'i dkyil 'khor rnam par phye ba thob par 'gyur/ tshe bskal pa 'bum phrag bdun bcu rtsa gnyis su ring bar 'gyur/ don yod pa'i pad ma'i 'khor lo mdun nas 'gro bar

'gyur ro/ /gal te 'bar bar ma gyur na sngar bstan pa'i yon tan gyi khyad par rnams thob par 'gyur la/ mnyam pa nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'dra ba'i nor bu rgyal po'i ri lu ni 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las

'das pa'i las rnams sgrub pa yin no/ /tshe brjes nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur la/ gang dang gang du skye ba'i tshe rabs thams cad du tshe rabs dran par 'gyur/ nor bu'i ri lu 'di mthong ba tsam

gyis dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa mngon sum du mthong zhing lta bar 'gyur/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mngon du mthong zhing rtag tu lta bar 'gyur/ rang gi lus la yod pa de yang phyir mi ldog par rig

par bya'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring bsrel gyi snying po mchod rten dang mnyam pa zhes bya ba ste/ 'di la som nyi dang yid gnyis bskyed par mi bya'o/ /mthong ba dang reg pa tsam gyi mod la sngon gyi las kyi sgrib
pa grangs dang bgrang ba'i tshul gyis bskal pa 'bum du bsags pa/ mnar med pa'i gnas su 'gro bar 'gyur ba/ mtshams med pa lnga byed pa/ 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa/ dam pa'i chos spong ba

de dag thams cad dus gsum gyi bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gi mthu dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi nor bu'i rgyal po'i mthus

thams cad zad par 'gyur/ sems can dmyal ba'i 'gro ba dag las yongs su thar bar 'gyur/ bde 'gro'i lam la gzhol bar 'gyur/ tshe brjes nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro/ /de lta bas na

legs par sgrub pa mthar thug par bya zhing bsgrub par bya/ mthu stobs kyis sbyar bar bya/ shin du gsal zhing rab tu gsal ba'i bsam pa 'bad pas sbyar bar bya/ rang gi sha dang khrag kyang yongs su btang nas btsal bar bya zhing

cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po yongs su btsal bar bya ba yin na phyi rol gyi dngos po nor dang / 'bru dang / dbyig dang / gser dang / dngul dang / gos dang / rgyan rnams yongs su btang nas yongs su btsal bar bya ba lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ srog

btang bar bya'i de gtang bar mi bya'o/ /don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po rnam par thar ba'i dkyil 'khor rim par phye ba sgrub pa 'di brtsal bar bya zhing bsgrub par bya'o/ /'di'i dus phyi ma'i tshe na sems can thams cad la sangs rgyas

kyi mdzad pa byed par 'gyur/ sems can thams cad yang dag pa nyid kyi dad pas sangs rgyas nyid du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ phyir mi ldog par 'gyur zhing nams kyang ngan 'gro log par 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro/ /

nor bu'i ri lu sgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'o// // de nas de'i phyir don yod pa yangs pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po don yod pa chen po'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i dngos grub kyi sman nor bu dang / gsang sngags rnams

bshad par bya ste/ sman nor bu dang / gsang sngags dang / dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya'i mthus des phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe na rig sngags 'chang rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi
dam tshig spyi'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor rnam pa sna tshogs sgyu ma lta bu'i ngo bo nyid bstan pa yang dag par ston par mdzad/ bklags pas grub pa/ rigs kyi dam tshig spyi'i gsang ba thams cad du
nye bar ston par mdzad do/ /rig sngags 'chang rnams kyi ngal ba 'bras bu med pa gzhan du 'gyur ba med do/ /ngal ba dang / dub pa dang / 'bad pa'i bzlas brjod kyi cho ga 'bras bu med par mi

'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir rang gi sems kyi rgyud dad pa dang / gus pa dang / gsang chen dang / gsang bar bya ba gzhan la bstan par mi bya ste/ dngos grub med par mi 'gyur ro/ /de lta bas na gsang sngags sgrub pa ni

shin du gsang bar bya zhing legs par smyung ba byas la 'bad par bya/ kha zas ngan pa spang bar bya/ gos ngan pa dang / sems ngan pa yang yongs su spang bar bya/ mi srun pa dang / mi bden pa dang / phra ma dang / sems can sran par byed pa dang /

gsang sngags rku ba dang / cho ga zhib mo rku bar byed pa dang / phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor rku bar byed pa de dag gi rtogs pa ni gang na yang med de/ dus gsum gyi mgon pos smad cing byang chub sems dpas kyang smad la/ mgon po 'phags pa

spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis kyang smad pa yin no/ /sems can sdong dum bsregs pa 'di/ /gsang ba sun 'byin ma rungs pa/ /'jig rten 'di dang pha rol tu/ /rtag tu smad par bya ba yin/ /lha rnams kyis ni yongs su btang / /ma

rungs pas ni bdud kyis zos/ /ma rungs pas ni bgegs kyis zos/ /bslab gzhi tshul khrims nyams pa dang / /mgon po'i bstan pa sun 'byin pa/ /de la dngos grub ji ltar 'byung / /de la skyob pa gang yang med/ /mgon

med kun du smad pa yin/ /de bas de la dngos grub ni/ /chung ngu 'ang med la nyes pa yis/ /gsang sngags dang ni sman mi grub/ /nyes pa de dag rang gis byas/ /gzhan yang ma rungs byed pa yin/ /de bas sems can mkhas

la sbyin/ /slob pa 'dod cing yon tan dga'/ /snying rje'i bdag nyid byams la gnas/ /sems can kun la brtse ba'i mchog /de yi lag tu sbyin bya ste/ /de yi dngos grub bla na med/ /gsang ba 'di ni shin du gsang ba

yin te/ 'jig rten dbang phyug gi snying po gsang ba de yang rig sngags 'chang rnams kyi de kho na nyid kyi gsang ba dang / gsang sngags dang / phyag rgya sgrub sla ste/ bklags pas 'grub pa de bzhin du sman nor bu 'di la rtag tu

'jug cing dngos grub kyi de kho na nyid rab tu ston par byed pa yin no/ /rig sngags 'chang ni bdag nyid kyis/ /mchog tu gsang ba bsgrub bya ba/ /rig sngags 'chang ni gtsang ma yis/ /khrus byas gos gtsang gyon byed

la/ /'dir ni nyin zhag smyung ba dang / /dad dang gus pas mchod pa bya/ /don yod 'khor lo sgrub byed pas/ /dngos grub dkyil 'khor dam pa bsgrub/ /sman spri ka dang / tsan dan gyi phye ma dang / a ga ru dang / pad ma ge sar dang / pad

ma dang / pad ma'i ldum bu dang / pad ma'i 'dab ma dang / de bzhin du gi'u wang dang / ldong ros dang / tsam pa ka dang / su ma na ste/ de bzhin cha ni mnyam sbyar te/ /phye ma dag tu byas nas ni/ /de nas don yod rgyal po yis/ /

tshes brgyad nas ni bcwa lnga'i bar/ /brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas brjod bya/ /khro bo'i rgyal pos brgya rtsa brgyad/ /bzlas brjod byas nas dbang bskur ro/ /de'i 'og tu cha lngar bya ste/ mig bsku ba dang / ri lu dang / phye ma dang / til mar tshos pa

dang kha gdong bkru zhing khrus bya'o/ /mig sman ni so'u byi re dang lhan cig sbrus la don yod pa'i rgyal pos brgya stong bzlas brjod bya'o/ /ri lu ni sbrang rtsi dkar po dang lhan cig sbru'o/ /phye ma ni 'jig rten dbang phyug la phul ba'i

me tog dang lhan cig sbru'o/ /til mar btsos pa ni bra ma ti la ste/ shing pa la sha'i mar dang lhan cig sbru'o/ /kha gdong bkru ba ni tsan dan dkar po'i chu dang lhan cig sbru zhing su ma na dang / gur kum dang / spos chus

lhan cig sbrus la so sor brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya/ khro bo'i rgyal pos nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas nas dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang nyin zhag gcig smyung ba byas pas gcig tu

sbrus te/ dngul gyi snod kyi nang du bcug la/ so sor brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas nas shar phyogs kyi sgo nas dkyil 'khor du gzhag par bya ste/ dkyil 'khor mchog la phyag dang bskor ba byas la de nas

so sor dar gyis kha bcad de/ dkyil 'khor gyi snying por gzhag la don yod pa'i rgyal po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya/ khro bo'i rgyal po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas dbang bskur bar bya/ dbang bskur

bar byas nas kyang rig sngags 'chang gis dbang bskur bar bya/ de nas dkyil 'khor snying por ni/ /'jig rten dbang phyug mchod bya ste/ /bdug spos lnga dag dbul bya ba/ /a ga ru dang tsan dan dang / /spri ka

gu gul du ru ka /mchod yon snod ni lnga dbul zhing / /gtor ma lnga ni dgang bya ste/ /ro ldan sna tshogs dag gis dgang / /ro ldan 'bras bu sna tshogs pa'i/ /gtor ma cha lnga dbul bar bya/ /kun du phreng

ba nyi shu dang / /mar me nyi shu lnga dag dang / /spos kyi phye ma lnga dag dang / /spos kyi cha lngar phye bas byug /'phan phran nyi shu rtsa lnga gdags/ /tshon rtsi lnga yis mdzes par bya/ /gser dang dngul gyis g.yogs

pa yi/ /bum pa gang ba nyi shu lnga/ /rin po che ni lnga gzhug go/ sgo bzhi grwa bzhir bum pa brgyad/ /brgya dang nyi shu rtsa lnga nyid/ /dkyil 'khor me tog 'bras yos dang / /yungs dkar nyid kyis mngon par dgram/ /
slob dpon bla ma mchod pa ni/ /gos dang snod dang yon gyis so/ /thub pa 'jig rten dbang phyug ltar/ /ston pa'i 'du shes bskyed nas su/ /dkyil 'khor slob dpon mchod byas nas/ /de nas dkyil 'khor
gshegs par gsol/ /de nas las rnams bya ba ni/ /ji ltar yid la sna tshogs bya/ /don yod chen po'i gzhal med khang / /rig sngags 'chang gis rtag tu gsang / /de nyid dngos grub bsgrub sla ba/ /de bzhin

nor bu sman sngags so/ /don 'di shin du bkra shis te/ /mkhas pa mi yis bya ba yin/ /phra ma'i tshig kyang mi bsten te/ /brdzun ni nam yang smra mi bya/ /'di ni bsgrub pa'i de nyid de/ /de la 'grub pa the tsom med/ /

'dir ni dkyil 'khor bshad par bya/ /kun nas gru bzhi lham pa ste/ /grwa bzhi cha ni legs par dbye/ /ko la'i tshad de legs pa dang / /sna tshogs tshon gyi thig skud kyis/ /dkyil 'khor dam pa thig gdab bo/ /dkyil 'khor

dbus kyi snying por ni/ /'khor lo bzang po bri bar bya/ /dbus kyi lte bar pad mo yis/ /'khor lo gsal ba bri bar bya/ /pad ma'i snying po gser dang ni/ /dngul lam tsan dan las byas pa/ /'bar bar 'jig rten dbang phyug

bzhugs/ /'khor lo kun du rtsibs dang ni/ /mu khyud dag gis cha dbye'o/ /dkyil 'khor snying po'i grwa rnams der/ /lha yi dbang po tshangs pa dang / /khyab 'jug dbang phyug chen po bri/ /kun du kha khyer rnam pa dang / /

pad mas phreng ba rnams bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor phyi rol kun du ni/ /rtags dang phyag brgya rnams bri ste/ /rdo rje dgra sta mdung rtse gsum/ /ral gri zhags pa tho ba dang / /gshin rje be con pad ma gdugs/ /dbyug to mda' bo

rnams so/ /grwa rnams kun du phreng ba dang / /me tog rnam pa sna tshogs dgram/ /sgo sgo der ni dkyil 'khor gyi/ /lha ste gshin rje chu lha dang / /lus ngan dang ni gzhon nu bri/ /dkyil 'khor grwa bzhi rnams su ni/ /rgyal
po chen po bzhi po dag /go cha legs par bgos pa dang / /khro bar lta ba 'jigs byed bri/ /'di ni dkyil 'khor mchog yin te/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni dgos pa rnams/ /legs par yongs su rdzogs par ni/ /

rig sngags ji bzhin bstan pa yin/ /de nas legs par khrus byas la/ /gos gtsang bgos pa 'jigs med pas/ /sman mchog gzung ste las bya'o/ /rmongs pa'i dra ba sna tshogs dang / /sgyu ma lta bu'i rnam sprul pa/ /gang

gis ngan 'gro thar 'gyur ba/ /sems can kun la bstan par bya/ /rtag tu dga' dang dad pa dang / /gus pa de nyid thob par 'gyur/ /rig sngags 'chang gis bsgrub pa'i mchog /dngos grub de nyid thob par 'gyur/ /rig

sngags 'chang gis sngar khrus byas la rdzas kyi dri chab gtsang ma don yod pa'i rgyal pos brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya/ tsan dan gyi chu la brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas nas skra yan chad tsam byugs la tshod zin

par bskus nas kha gdong bkru bar bya'o/ /mig sman la brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas nas bskus na mig bzang bar 'gyur ro/ /brgya rtsa brgyad tshang bar bzlas brjod byas nas bdag nyid dang phyogs bcur gtor ro/ /de bzhin

du til mar brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas nas skra yan chad bsku ba dang / tshod zin par bsku ba dang / lus rkang mthil yan chad bsku'o/ /yi ge gcig po yid la bya ba la sems byams pa nyid la gnas nas rgyal po dang / btsun

mo'i sgo 'am/ skye bo'i nang ngam/ 'dus pa chen po 'am/ dge 'dun gyi nang ngam/ tshogs dang phrad pa 'am/ de bzhin du gzhan dag kyang rung ste/ de dag thams cad kyis 'jig rten mgon po'i gzugs dang kha dog

tu mthong zhing sa'i steng nas rkang pa khru gang tsam gyis spags te 'dug la/ ji lta ji ltar 'dul ba rnams kyi dad pa de lta de ltar gzugs rnams ston par byed de/ rgyal po 'am/ 'khor los sgyur ba 'am/ mi'i seng ge 'am/
phag gam/ sred med kyi bur ston pa 'am/ tshangs pa 'am/ sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi dbang po 'am/ dbang phyug chen po mig gsum pa 'am/ gzhon nu 'am/ chu lha 'am/ gshin rje 'am/ rnam thos
kyi bu 'am/ de bzhin du rgyal po chen po bzhi 'am/ nag po chen po 'am/ dga' byed dbang phyug gam/ ser skya 'am/ gsang ba pa 'am/ lag na rdo rje stobs po che 'am/ nor bu bzang po'i bu 'am/
gang ba bzang po 'am/ stobs kyi lha 'am/ gar mkhan mchog gam/ rlung ngam/ drang srong nyid de ji ltar gzugs rnam pa sna tshogs yid la byas pa thams cad ston par byed do/ /me tog dang / 'bras bu sna

tshogs pa nyid 'byung bar byed do/ /de bzhin du dge 'dun gyi nang du zhugs na de sangs rgyas kyi gzugs dang / gzugs sna tshogs su snang zhing gzhal med khang gi rnam pa dag kyang ston par byed do/ /ji ltar 'dod par 'gyur ba yid
la byas pa de ltar gzugs rnams ston par byed do/ /'khor tshogs pa 'am/ dgon pa 'am/ 'chag sa dag kyang sman nor bu dang / gsang sngags kyi mthus gzugs sna tshogs su ston par byed do/ /'gron po 'brog

gi nang du phyin pa nyam thag pa/ 'jigs pa mi zad pa/ chu med pa/ dgon par mgon med pa/ sdug bsngal drag po de lta bu'i nang du chud pa'i skye bo sdug par gyur pa/ skyabs med pa/ mgon med par gyur pa/ skyob pa med pa/

dpung gnyen med par gyur pa na de la rig sngags 'chang gis phye ma 'dis phyogs bzhir mtshams gcad par bya/ phye mas dkyil 'khor gyi tshul du ri mo bris la ri lu lnga dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su gzhag go/ yungs dkar

la til mar gyi rgyal pos bskus la don yod pa'i rgyal po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya/ khro bo'i rgyal pos brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas te dbang bskur nas khro bo'i rgyal po hU~M zhes bya bas phyag rgya bcings la sa la

bsnun cing phyogs bzhir gtor bar bya ba phyag rgya dang ldan par byas pa tsam gyis chu bzang po rnam pa sna tshogs 'bab cing rdzing 'byung bar 'gyur/ tshal dang / nye ba'i tshal dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu sna tshogs

dang ldan pa'i gzhal med khang 'byung bar 'gyur/ phye ma'i dkyil 'khor de las grong khyer dang / khang bzangs 'byung bar 'gyur/ khyim gyi gnas lnga stong 'byung bar 'gyur zhing bde ba dang / lo legs pa
dang / nyams dga' ba dang / skye bo dang / mi mang pos gang ba 'byung bar 'gyur/ nyo tshong dang / ba lang dang / ma he dang / rta dang / glang po'i gnas dag 'byung bar 'gyur/ dge sbyong dang /

bram ze dang / tshong pa dang / khyim dang / khang pa bzang po dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ ji srid du bsams pa de srid du 'dug go/ chu dang yungs dkar la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas nas phyogs bzhir gtor na mi snang

bar 'gyur ro/ /yungs kar de g.yul 'gyed pa'i nang du gtor na dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang ldan par 'byung bar 'gyur te/ des pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang / dgra 'jigs shing 'joms par byed pa las rgyal bar 'gyur

ro/ /grong khyer gyi phyogs bzhi kun tu gtor na 'obs 'bad cing ra ba kha khyer gyis bskor la grong khyer kun tu skyes bu go cha bgos pa dag snang bas grong khyer mnan pa 'am/ gtse bar sus kyang mi nus so/ /mtshan mo'i dri'i til mar

de nyid yungs kar la bskus te/ brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas nas chang pa gang me'i nang du gtor/ chang pa gang phyogs bzhi kun tu gtor na kun nas mar me phreng ba 'byung bar 'gyur la/ ji srid dgos pa de srid du 'bar ro/ /gtsug
lag khang ngam/ dgon pa 'am/ ri 'am/ phug gam/ 'chag pa'i gnas sam/ khyim du gtor na mar me'i phreng ba 'byung bar 'gyur la/ chu dang yungs kar gyis mi snang bar 'gyur/ grong khyer gyi sgor yungs kar

gtor na gtor ba tsam gyi mod la dgra thams cad dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyi grong khyer mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /gang na phyir rgol ba dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs gnas pa'i grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ tshal

gyi nang ngam/ dgon pa'i gnas su gtor na 'brog dgon pa 'byung bar 'gyur la/ thams cad phan tshun ngo mi shes nas 'jigs shing skrag pa chen pos rab tu 'bros par byed do/ /dgra'i tshogs kyi nang du gtor na mtshon

cha thams cad dang / 'gyed pa'i go cha thams cad mi snang zhing gcer bur 'gyur ro/ /zhal che 'gyed pa'i nang du gtor na 'gyed zla gtso bo gcer bur 'gyur ro/ /dgra'i steng du gtor na me 'bar ba 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag

la sogs pa yid la ji ltar byas pa'i las 'bum snyed byed do/ /de nas las rgya chen po byed par 'dod pa'i rig sngags 'chang gtsang ma legs par khrus byas pa spos kyis lus bskus pa des/ yungs kar dang / til mar gyi rgyal

pos bskus pa la brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas nas/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la gtor bar bya/ khro bo'i rgyal pos lan bdun dbang bskur nas phyag rgya bcas pa'i lag pas ri lu spyi bor gzhag la phye mas

gdab par bya/ til mar gyi rgyal pos rkang pa la byug par bya/ don yod pa'i rgyal po lan cig dran par bya ste/ yongs su sbyang ba'i las lhan cig bya ba legs par byas pas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug

gi gzugs g.yo ste gar dga' bar 'gro la/ gzugs brnyan gang du 'gro ba de nyid du rang 'gro'o/ /lha'i steng du gtor na lha'i gnas nas 'pho zhing gar dga' ba der 'gro'o/ /phye mas lha'i steng du gtor la khro

bo'i rgyal po hU~M zhes bya bas mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /til mar gyi rgyal po la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas la bdag nyid kyi pus mo dang / byin pa la bskus na nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /rkang mthil

la bskus na sa'i steng na rkang pa sor bzhi tsam mi reg go/ rdo'i steng du rkang pa gzhag pa dang / rkang rjes byung ba'i steng du rdza ma dang / bum pa dang / bum bu gzhag pa'i rkub la bskus na sor bzhi tsam gyi tshad du
nam mkha' la 'dug go/ yungs kar la bzlas brjod byas nas mes sbyin sreg byas pa'i thal ba de blangs nas lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas la/ til mar gyis sbrus pa la khro bo'i rgyal pos brgya
rtsa brgyad dbang bskur nas mig la bskus na mig gsum ston cing dbang phyug chen po'i gzugs su ston par byed do/ /thal bas lus la byugs na tshangs pa'i gzugs su ston to/ /shing pa la sha dang parna
sha bsres pas lus byugs na sred med kyi bu'i stobs dang / shugs dang / gzugs su ston to/ /til mar chen pos khar bskus la thal bas dpral bar thig le byas na gzhon nu'i gzugs

su ston to/ /yungs kar gyi 'bru kha dog sna tshogs can la til mar chen po byugs pas bskus la don yod pa'i rgyal pos brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya/ phyag rgyas brgya rtsa brgyad dbang bskur cing khro bo'i rgyal pos
brgya rtsa brgyad dbang bskur la/ de nas dngul gyi snod kyi nang du gzhag /de nas las thams cad byed de nam mkha' la gtor na nor bu dang rin po che'i char 'bab par ston to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mchod

pa'i tshe nam mkha' la gtor na me tog gi char sna tshogs 'bab par 'gyur/ 'dus pa'i nang du nam mkha' la gtor na 'bras bu dang nor gyi rgyun sna tshogs pa ston to/ /tshal gyi nang du gtor na me tog dang 'bras

bu sna tshogs pa ston to/ /ri phug tu gtor na rdzas dang sman sna tshogs ston to/ /mchod rten rnying pa 'am/ gtsug lag khang ngam/ lha'i gnas su gtor na yo byad thams cad kyis yongs su gang zhing rdzogs pa

khang pa bzang po yangs pa gnas kyi mchog ston to/ /grong khyer stong par gtor na 'tsho ba'i yo byad thams cad phun sum tshogs shing yongs su rdzogs pa dang / yul gyi rgyal po dang / slas dang / bkrabs

pa dang / mdun na 'don pa dang / blon po dang / skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dag ston to/ /yang khro bo'i rgyal po'i hU~M zhes bya bas gtor na dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa ston to/ /

dur khrod kyi nang du gtor na shi ba'i rus pa gang dang gang la bab pa de dang de gang du sems can dmyal ba 'am/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten nam/ lha ma yin nam/ nam mkha' lding ngam/

dri za 'am/ mi 'am ci 'am/ lto 'phye chen po 'am/ bya 'am/ nya ba 'am/ ru sbal gyi rigs su skyes pa 'am/ lha'i 'jig rten nam/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skyes pa de'i rus pa 'am/ thod pa la tshig 'byung bar 'gyur la

gang du skyes pa de'i gtam yang smra'o/ /gang dang gang gi skye gnas su skyes pa de thams cad smra la thabs ji ltar bya ba de smra'o/ /yungs kar des kyang rus gong 'brel pa 'am/ shi ba'i ro 'am/ rus pa 'thor ba la bab na bab pa tsam

gyi mod la sems can dmyal ba las yongs su thar nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro/ /zong bkram pa'i nang du gtor na thams cad mi mngon par 'gyur ro/ /nam mkha' la gtor na skar ma rnams mi mthong bar

'gyur ro/ /skye bo mang po'i nang du gtor na thams cad gcer bur 'gyur ro/ /'dus pa'i nang du gtor na thams cad bro rdung bar byed do/ /dge 'dun gyi nang du gtor na dge slong thams cad bsam gtan thob par 'gyur ro/ /

tshogs kyi gtso bo la gtor na rnal 'byor spyod par 'gyur ro/ /mkha' 'gro ma'i tshogs kyi nang du gtor na thams cad bong bu dang / wa dang / khyi'i gzugs can du 'gyur ro/ /sbyor ma'i sgor gtor na sbyor ma thams cad 'bar la

ma he'i gzugs can du snang ngo / /shi ba'i steng du gtor na bro brdung bar byed do/ /thod pa'i steng du gtor na bro brdung bar byed cing rgyug la phan tshun rgyug par byed do/ /lam gyi bzhi mdor gtor na gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang /
'byung po thams cad rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na nye bar 'khod la ji srid 'tsho'i dbang du gyur nas 'khod do/ /nyin gcig bzhin bdag nyid la gtor na mchod pa chen po'i gnas su 'gyur te/ gzhan yang rang
gi blo rnams kyis las 'bum snyed byed do/ /don yod pa chen po rnam par 'phrul pa'i dkyil mkhor sgyu ma lta bu'i cho ga'o// // 'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po/
bam po bcwa brgyad pa/ de nas de'i phyir 'gugs pa chen po dang / lag na rdo rje'i gzugs bstan pa'i cho ga bshad par bya ste/ gang gis lha rnams myur du 'ong ba dang / phyag na rdo rje'i

gzugs myur du ston to/ /rdo rje'i sku dang stobs po che/ /rta 'grin dang ni mgul sngon dang / /de bzhin rta ni rgod ma'i kha/ /bdud rtsi 'khyil ldan gzugs po che/ /log 'dren rnams ni rab 'joms dang / /khro

rgyal de bzhin 'jigs byed spyan/ /ki li'i ki li'i rgyal po che/ /khro bo chol pa stobs po che/ /de bzhin rdo rje sa 'og gzugs/ /rdo rje rtse mo de nyid dang / /klu chen rab 'joms spyan yang dang / /sog
ma med ni 'dul ba dang / /de bzhin thigs khro khros chen dang / /de bzhin mche ba gtsigs mdzad dang / /rgyal po chen po rdo rje'i sgrog /klu yi dbang po stobs kyis gnon/ /mgon po gos sngon gyon pa
dang / /dbyug sngon dgra las rgyal ba dang / /'jig rten dbang phyug pad ma'i lte/ /phyag na pad ma pad ma phyug /de bzhin 'jigs pa brgyad sel dang / /de bzhin mchod rten 'jig rten bla/ /sna tshogs

gzugs ste bzang po dang / /sred med bu dang tshangs pa dang / /drag po dang ni dbang phyug dang / /nag po chen po gzhon nu dang / /gshin rje dang ni chu lha nyid/ /nyi ma dang ni zla ba dang / /rgyu skar sgra
gcan mjug rings dang / /de bzhin gza' dang lha ma yin/ /nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci/ /gnod sbyin srin po lto 'phye che/ /'byung po dpal ldan rnam thos bu/ /de bzhin yul skyong mig mi bzang / /

'phags skyes de nyid mthong ba dang / /mi'u thung dang ni drang srong gzugs/ /nor bu bzang sras gang ba dang / /sna tshogs gzugs can ston pa dang / /rgyal po dang ni ded dpon dang / /tshong dpon de bzhin khyim bdag dang / /

bram ze dang ni rgyal rigs dang / /dge sbyong stag dang seng ge dang / /khyu mchog de bzhin nags kyi lha/ /shing lha de bzhin nags kyi lha/ /shing lha de bzhin lo tog lha/ /gang gA swa ti ya mu na/ /zla ba skal ldan ru sbal

nya/ /lag 'gro dang ni thod pa can/ /skal yod de bzhin 'bras bu dang / /me tog rgyal rlabs chen po dang / /sna tshogs gzugs dang rnam sna tshogs/ /de ltar dgug pa bstan pa dang / /de ltar slar gshegs gsol ba nyid/ /sbyin sreg

dra ba 'di nyid ni/ /sgyu 'phrul chad byung gsang sngags grub/ /rdzas grub nor bu til mar grub/ /don yod zhags pa bsgrub pa'i phyir/ /de nyid dngos grub rab ston pa/ /mchod rten dgon pa gtsug lag khang / /lha

yi gnas dang de bzhin grong / /grong khyer nyid dang 'bab chu'i dngo / /mtshe'u dang ldeng ga chu bo dang / /rdzing dang de bzhin char 'bab dang / /'brug sgrogs dang ni glog 'gyu dang / /gzhan yang me ni 'bar ba dang / /dud pa'i

phung po bde 'gyed dang / /skyes bu go cha gyon pa dang / /de bzhin mtshon cha sna tshogs mthong / /khyu mthong grub pa mthong ba dang / /de nyid rmad du byung ba ste/ /rdzas nyung sbyar ba nyung gyur kyang / /de nyid dngos grub bla na
med/ /sems can rnams la phan 'tshal nas/ /bcom ldan de nyid bdag gis bshad/ /rig sngags 'chang rnams bklags pas 'grub/ /dbul po rnams ni nor 'thob cing / /sdang ba rnams ni byams par bgyid/ /mu stegs

gzhan rnams dad par bgyid/ /mkhas pa rnams ni dga' bar bgyid/ /gdul ka rnams ni thar pa 'tshal/ /dge slong rnams ni bsam gtan thob/ /ting 'dzin bla na med pa thob/ /chos 'dod rnams ni sangs rgyas mthong / /sdig pa byed rnam+sa

sdig pa 'jig /mi rigs byas rnams thar pa 'thob/ /mtshams med lnga rnams rnam dag don/ /dbugs ma phyin rnams dbugs 'byin mchog /ma dul ba rnams de bzhin 'dul/ /ma rgal ba rnams sgrol ba'i gru/ /thar pa'i lam du

'gro bar gnas/ /ma grol ngan 'gro kun las 'gro/ /sdig pa kun las rnam par grol/ /lung ma bstan pa lung ston byed/ /skyon dang dri ma sdig pa rnams/ /thams cad mod la spong bgyid de/ /de la sogs pa'i las rnams ni/ /

bklags pas grub pa bgyid pa lags/ /'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten 'das/ /don gyi dngos grub bla na med/ /gang dang gang du sbyor ba bgyid/ /dgos pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ /yid la bsams pa 'grub par 'gyur/ /'dir ni yid kyis

rnam bsams pa/ /ji ltar yid la 'dod pa dang / /ji ltar ngo bo kun bsams pa/ /de ltar rnam 'phrul ston par bgyi/ /tshes grangs rgyu skar sbyar mi 'tshal/ /smyung ba bgyi ba mi 'tshal te/ /cho ga ji bzhin dus ci bzhin/ /cho ga rig sngags rgyal po

bzlas/ /rig sngags 'chang ba gtsang gyur cing / /legs par khrus bgyis gos gtsang dag /bgos pa bden par smra ba dang / /bla ma la ni gus byed pa/ /rtag tu byams pa'i sems la gnas/ /sems can kun la brtse ba'i mchog /sdom la

gnas shing tshangs par spyod/ /chos ma yin pa spong byed pa/ /gal te de nyid grub 'dod na/ /chang dang sha dang kun dong dang / /'dres dang zo 'phra sbags pa spangs/ /sems can ngan pa sun 'byin pa/ /rig sngags rku dang cho ga rku/ /chos rku

gsang sngags rku ba dang / /de bzhin yi ge rku ba dang / /ser sna rtag tu spang bar gyis/ /de dag la ni dngos grub med/ /ma rungs pa 'i dam tshig nyams/ /yid bcug pa ni med par byed/ /sdig pa'i chos ni kun du spyod/ /de bzhin

gshegs pa kun gyis smad/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis smad/ /rtag tu chos kyi sdong dum 'gyur/ /shi nas sems can dmyal bar gzhol/ /rtag tu smad pa'i gnas su 'gyur/ /dbul po lus ni skam pa dang / /mdze

dang khyi rngos 'debs pa dang / /sdug bsngal rkun ma chos sun 'byin/ /chos rku ba'i lus can ni/ /'jig rten 'dir ni bder mi 'gyur/ /'jig rten pha rol ga la bde/ /sems can dmyal bar gzhol ba yin/ /de lta bas

na chen po 'dod pas ni rtag tu dam pa'i chos kyi rjes su 'brang bar bya zhing rtag tu dkon mchog gsum dang / pha dang ma dang bla ma dang / ston pa ni skyob pa dang / skyabs pa dang / dpung gnyen mdzad pa/ ston pa/ mchog sbyin pa/ dngos

grub dang / mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa/ rga shi las thar bar byed pa/ dbang phyug sbyin pa/ nor sbyin pa/ longs spyod sbyin pa/ dang po mchog bskyed pa de nyid 'jig rten gyi bla ma/ mgon po 'jig rten dbang phyug chen po dbang phyug mgon po/

mchog sbyin par mdzad pa/ gzugs sna tshogs ston par mdzad pa/ dngos grub sna tshogs sbyin par bgyid pa/ mgon po sdug bsngal sna tshogs las yongs su thar bar bgyid pa/ nad sna tshogs sbyong bar grub pa/ rin po che sna tshogs rab tu

sbyin par bgyid pa/ 'jig rten sdig pa sna tshogs sel bar bgyid pa/ bla ma la gus pa sna tshogs bgyid pa lags te/ de lta bas na rtag tu 'bad pas dgos pa thams cad rab tu sbyin par bgyid pa/ rtag tu 'bad pas shin du

gus par bgyis pa lags so/ /de nas rdzas kyi sman grub pa dang / bzlas brjod kyi cho ga bshad par bgyi ste/ seng ge'i lce dang / snying dang / mig dang / de bzhin du nya phyis kyi phye dang / ldong ros dang / bram+ha'i lo ma dang /

gu gul dang / pad ma dang / pad ma ze ba dang / uta pa la sngon po dang / nag pus pa dang / li shi dang / rgya spos dang / de bzhin du gi'u wang dang / gla rtsi dang / ga bur dang / gur kum dang / tsan dan dkar

po dang / sprig ka dang / te dza ba ti ste de ltar cha mnyam par byas pa de dag thams cad phye ma zhib mor byas la dngul gyi snod bkang ste dar gyis g.yog /don yod pa'i rgyal po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun du

dus gsum du khri bzlas brjod bya'o/ /dus gsum du khro bo'i rgyal pos lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas pas dbang bskur zhing phyag rgyas kyang nyi shu rtsa gcig tu dbang bskur ro/ /khri tshang nas cha lnga byas te

phye ma dang / til mar dang / nor bu dang / mig bsku ba dang / til mar tshos pa dang cha lnga'o/ /phye ma'i pad ma mu ru ka'i phye ma dang sbyar la bzlas brjod bya'o/ /khro bo'i rgyal pos ni lnga stong ngo / /til mar ni ma hA ru ti ras

'grub ste brgya stong bzlas brjod bya'o/ /khro bo'i rgyal pos bzhi stong ngo / /nor bu ni sbrul gyi khrag gis sbrus te khri chig stong bzlas brjod bya'o/ /khro bo'i rgyal pos lnga stong lnga brgya'o/ /mig sman ni rma bya'i mig chu dang / 'ug pa'i mig dang /

glad pa dang sbyar la khri chig stong bzlas brjod bya'o/ /khro bo'i rgyal po stong rtsa brgyad do/ /bram+ha tai la srang nyi shu/ gan d+har ba te'i la srang brgyad/ yungs mar la srang bcu drug /'o ma la srang brgya/ ba ser mo grub pa'i 'o ma dang /

ba'i lci ba dang / ba gcin srang bdun/ du ru ka'i srang gnyis te rdzas 'di rnams chu dang bsres nas pad ma'i sdong bus dkrug cing zangs snod du btso'o/ /mnyam par gzhag pas gsang sngags bzlas/ /cho ga dag gis bsrung
bar bya/ /cho ga bzhin du gtor ma sbyar/ /me tog bdug spos dag gis bdug /til mar mchog ni bsgrub par bya/ /chung ngur ma bud grub pa mchog /spos kyi shing gis bud pa bzang / /'di ltar grub par

shes pa dang / /khro bo'i rgyal pos dbang bskur ba/ /nyi shu gcig tu dbang bskur ro/ /til mar de ni snod gtsang ma/ /zangs snod yang na dngul snod bzang / /smyig ma'i snod du gzhag par bya/ /de nas rig sngags

brgyad stong dang / /khro bo'i rgyal po brgyad stong nyid/ /so so dag tu bzlas brjod bya/ /dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs pa der gzhag par bya ba ni ji ltar dkyil 'khor gyi cho gar bya ba de ltar byas nas gzhag cing slob

dpon gyi las kyang bya ste/ ji ltar dkyil 'khor bsgrub pa dang / 'jug pa dang / dam tshig dang / phyag rgya dang / dbang bskur ba dang / mchod pa dang / dkyil 'khor bskor ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / spyi'u gtsug bcing

ba dang / phyag rgya bcing ba dang / bsrung ba'i cho ga dang / nye reg bya ba dang / gos bgo ba dang / mchod phyir thogs pa ste dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon kun gyi de dag thams cad bstan par bya'o/ /de nas dkyil 'khor gyi dbus kyi snying por

gzhag la rig sngags 'chang sbyangs ba'i cho ga byas pas 'phags pa don yod pa'i snying po stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya/ khro bo'i rgyal pos kyang stong rtsa brgyad du dbang bskur/ phyag rgyas kyang stong rtsa brgyad du dbang bskur la/ phyag rgya bcing+sa

nas rnam pa gsum 'dra bar dbang bskur ro/ /de nas las thams cad byas te yungs kar dkar po grub pa la rig sngags 'chang gis brgyad stong bzlas brjod byas la pad ma'i mchog gtso bo gtsang ba/ gtsang mar byas pa/ legs

par bkrus pa/ sbyangs pa/ phye ma zhib tu btags pa thal ba lta bu la brgyad stong bzlas brjod byas nas snod dgang / gu gul dang / tsan dan dang / a ka ru dang / sprig ka la brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas nas snod kyi nang du bkang

la/ dbus kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa'i steng du so sor gzhag go/ de nas khro bo'i rgyal pos dbang bskur cing phyag rgyas kyang dbang bskur ba byas na/ gang gi tshe don du bya ba byung ba'i tshe bya ba thams cad byed do/ /gser ram/

yang na dngul lam/ zangs las pad ma'i tshad du byas pa 'dab ma nyi shu rtsa gcig dang / snying po dang / ze ba can dang / de bzhin du sor bcu gnyis pa'i tshad la sdong bu sor bcu drug pa'i tshad rdo rje'i rnam pa can du bya/

skud pa dmar po'i zhags pa pad ma'i tshon dmar pos bzhen pa/ gzhon nus bkal ba grub pa/ de dag la brgya stong bzlas brjod bya/ khro bo'i rgyal pos dbang bskur cing phyag rgyas kyang dbang bskur ba byas la mkhas

pas gsang ba'i gnas su gzhag go/ gang gi tshe don du bya ba byung ba de'i tshe las thams cad grub pa stan to/ /shin du gtsang zhing gtsang bar bya ste/ su la yang mi sbyin no/ /sangs rgyas rnams la sku brnyas par gyur pa/

dam tshig nyams pa yang ba la bgegs 'jug par 'gyur zhing / 'phral du mtshams med pa lnga byed pa rmongs pa'i dra ba de la dngos grub rnams kyang shes par mi 'gyur ro/ /gzhan ni bla ma la gus shing / /sangs rgyas

chos la brten byed pa/ /'phags pa'i tshogs la dang ba dang / /byams sems snying rje'i bdag nyid can/ /de yi lag tu rab tu sbyin/ /bdag gi srog bzhin gtad par bya/ /de dag dngos grub mchog sbyin te/ /klags dang mthong ba

tsam gyis ni/ /ji ltar yid la byas pa bzhin/ /rjes su mthun pa'i las byed do/ /'jig rten 'dir ni rtag tu bde/ /'jig rten pha rol bde ba yin/ /'gro ba lam ni bde bar 'gro/ /gang na 'od dpag med pa bzhugs/ /bde ba can

du rtag tu 'gro/ /rdzus te skye ba'i pad ma las/ /rgyan rtags kun gyis rnam par brgyan/ /tshe rabs dag ni dran 'gyur te/ /sngon gyi tshe rabs dran par 'gyur/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang rmongs pa chen po'i dam tshig ston par

'dod pa gtsang mas legs par khrus bya/ gos gtsang ma bgos nas nyin zhag gcig smyung ba byas pas lag na rdo rje dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug zhal mngon du gzhag ste/ me tog dang bdug spos

dbul zhing 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi sku gzugs dang / phyag na rdo rje'i sku gzugs la mchod pa yang bya/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la a ga ru'i bdug spos kyis bdug /lag na rdo rje
la gu gul gyi bdug spos kyis bdug /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la lha bshos dkar po 'bul/ lag na rdo rje la ro sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i lha bshos phul la/ nyin par don yod pa'i rgyal po

bzlas brjod bya/ mtshan mo 'khro bo'i rgyal po ngal ba med par bzlas brjod bya ste/ kha gdong khro gnyer med pa dang / dri ma dang ser sna med pas nam langs kyi bar du bzlas brjod byas pa dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs

dbang phyug 'bar bar 'gyur la/ lag na rdo rje yang pus mo 'dzugs par 'gyur te/ de gnyis kyi mig nas 'dzag pa/ rig sngags 'chang gis blangs nas thig le byas na mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /mig la bskus na nam mkha' la

'gro'o/ /khar bcug na rig sngags dang cho ga zhib mo dang / dkyil 'khor mngon du 'gyur ro/ /lag na rdo rje'i stobs dang / shugs dang / brtson 'grus kyis pha rol gnon par 'gyur/ lag na rdo rje'i rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na nye bar

'dug cing 'dod pa thams cad kyi mchog rjes su sbyin par byed la/ rang gi gzugs kyis spyod par byed/ lag na rdo rje'i stobs dang / shugs dang / brtson 'grus kyis pha rol gnon pa rjes su sbyin par byed/ de ltar lag na rdo rjes 'gugs

par 'gyur ro/ /nyi ma 'char ba'i dus su til mar chen po ran par bdag nyid la bsku/ mig sman gyis mig byug /phye mas gtor zhing bdag nyid thig le bya/ nor bu mgo la gzhag nas gu gul gyis bdug /bdag nyid gos ngur

smrig bgos nas sangs rgyas yid la bya ba bsgom zhing / zhi ba dang dul ba'i yid kyis sde can gyi nang ngam dge 'dun gyi nang du 'jug par bya'o/ /de nas dge slong de dag gi sde can gyi nang du zhugs sam/ dge 'dun gyi nang du zhugs

pa'i rig sngags 'chang de bcom ldan 'das kyi sku dang / mdog dang / rtags dang / spyod lam du mthong ste/ mtshan nyi shu rtsa brgyad yod pa 'od mdom gang ba/ stan pad ma/ brgya byin dang / tshangs pa'i mdun gyi bdar ba'i lha

tshogs sna tshogs kyis gzugs mthong bar ston to/ /dge slong de dag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang / mdog tu mthong nas thams cad zhabs gnyis la 'dud par byed do/ /rig sngags 'chang des brnyas par mi bya zhing /

bdag la bstod par yang mi bya/ brnyas pa tsam gyis khyod kyi bsod nams yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur bar bya'o/ /'phags pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun rdzu 'phrul chen pos stobs bcu dang ldan par dbugs dbyung bar bya ste/ rgyu des na brnyas par mi

bya'o/ /de nas grong khyer dang / rgyal po'i pho brang du 'jug par bya/ de nas 'dus pa'i nang du 'jug par bya/ de nas grong dang / tshang tshing dang / yul dang / ri brags kyi nang du 'jug par bya/ de nas btsun mo'i nang du 'jug par bya ste/

yul gyi skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo de dag thams cad kyis kyang sangs rgyas kyi sku dang / mdog dang / rtags dang / dbyibs su mthong zhing mchod pa chen po dang / rim gro sna tshogs byed par 'gyur la/ de bzhin gshegs pa

sangs rgyas yin no zhes smra ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i cho ga 'thob bo/ /yungs kar dang / til mar gyis rang gi 'khor gyi spyi bor gtor cing byugs na/ thams cad lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam

mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po'i gzugs su ston to/ /rkang pa til mar gyis bskus na sa'i steng nas sor brgyad tsam gyis dpags te nam mkha' la 'gro ste/ ji srid du ma bkrus pa de srid du sangs rgyas kyi cha byad

du ston to/ /mgon po spyan ras gzigs mthong bar 'dod pa'i rig sngags 'chang de nang par sngar langs nas gtsang ma khrus byas te/ gos gtsang ma bgos nas khang steng du 'dug la yungs kar la til mar gyis byugs nas phyogs bzhir gtor na/ rgyal po

dang / blon po dang / rgyal rigs dang / bram ze dang / btsun mo dang / skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo thams cad sgyu ma chen pos rmongs par 'gyur ro/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang des nor bu bzhis dbu brgyan dang phreng ba

byas la mgo la gdags so/ /til mar gyis yan lag tsam la bsku bar bya/ 'phral bar la thig le bya/ mig sman gyis mig bsku/ phye mas bdag nyid la gdab/ ras bzang po yug gcig bgo/ byang chub sems dpa'i cha

byad du bgyi ba dang / nor bu dang / gdu bu dang / dpung rgyan dang / gser skud kyis bcings na de dag thams cad rgyan dang / spud pa dang / nor bu dang / dngul dang / rdo rje dang / bai d+'ur+ya sna tshogs kyis lus brgyan par snang ngo / /lag

na pad ma thogs na/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs su snang ngo / /yid la ji ltar bsams pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i tshul dang / 'jigs pa brgyad dang / tshangs pa'i tshul dang / yid bzhin nor bu dang / rgod ma'i kha

dang / mgul sngon dang / rta mgrin du ston to/ /ji ltar gzugs yid la byas pa de ltar ston te/ ji srid du thig le yod cing dbu rgyan thogs pa de srid du tshul sna tshogs ston par byed do/ /til mar dang / yungs kar dang bsres na/ king

kuSh+Tha dang lhan cig sbrus nas lag pa g.yas na rdo rje/ dpral bar dbang phyug chen po'i thig le byas nas pad ma'i phye mas gtor la/ nor bu spyi gtsug tu bcing / mig sman gyis mig bsku/ gu gul gyis bdugs la shes rab can khro

bo'i lta ba'i tshul byas na mngon sum du rdo rje 'chang gi gzugs su snang ste/ de la the tsom mi bya'o/ /ji srid du bdag khrus ma byas pa de srid du rdo rje'i gzugs can du snang la las sna tshogs byed cing mi dang / 'jig rten thams

cad kyis rdo rje 'chang nyid du sems te/ de la the tsom mi bya'o/ /seng ge'i khrag gis til mar dang nor bu sbrus nas lus la bskus na mi'i seng ge chen po'i gzugs su ston to/ /phag gi khrag gis sbrus nas lus la bskus

na phag gi gzugs chen por ston to/ /til mar dang / phye ma lhan cig sbrus nas yung ba dang / shing pa la sha'i mdog tu byas la lus la bskus na sred med kyi bu'i gzugs su ston to/ /rig sngags 'chang gis pad

ma dang / til mar lhan cig sbrus la lus la bskus na dbang phyug chen po'i gzugs su ston to/ /shing arka'i lo ma dang / til mar dang / mnyam par sbyar la lus la bskus na tshangs pa'i gzugs su ston to/ /

glang po che'i khrag dang til mar sbyar nas lus la bskus na tshogs kyi dbang phyug chen po'i gzugs su ston to/ /ra'i khrag dang sbrus nas lus la byugs na ra'i gzugs su ston to/ /til mar dang / thing shing dang / pad ma'i phye ma dang /
glang po che'i khrag dang lhan cig sbyar nas lus la bskus na nag po'i gzugs mngon sum du rang gi gzugs su ston la/ gang dang gang dag la thig le byas na ma mo'i tshogs kyi gzugs su ston to/ /sbrul

gyi khrag dang / lpags pa dang / til mar gyi rgyal po dang lhan cig sbrus la sgal tshigs su bsku zhing / dpung pa g.yon par yang bskus na klu'i rgyal po chen po'i gzugs su ston te/ ji lta ji ltar khrag dang sbyar zhing ji lta ji

ltar yid la bsams pa de lta de ltar gzugs ston to/ /de nas gzhal med khang lta bar 'dod na yungs kar la til mar gyis bskus nas dge 'dun gyi nang du steng 'og tu gtor/ phye mas nor bu rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo

kun du bskus na dge 'dun rgan rims su bkod pa'i dbus su gzhal med khang chen po rgyan gyis brgyan pa ston/ dge slong rnams kyi steng du gtor na dge slong thams cad gzugs sna tshogs yin la/ ji ltar byas pa
bzhin rgyal po'i gzugs su snang ba dang / gzhan dag blon po dang / gzhan dag bkrabs pa dang / gzhan dag mdun na 'don pa dang / gzhan dag yongs su spyod pa'i gzugs su ston la/ yungs kar ma bskus pas

gtor na slar yang dge slong rnams su snang ngo / /shing arka'i 'o ma yungs kar la bskus nas dge 'dun gyi dbus su dge slong rnams kyis mal stan gyi steng du gtor na/ ji ltar dge slong thams cad 'khod pa ltar snang ngo / /

ral pa'i thor tshugs kyis brgyan pa la gtor na rgan po 'khar ba thogs pa sgur po ltag dgye skra dkar can nyam chung bar snang ngo / /mal stan gyi steng du yungs kar gtor ba gal te mtshan thog thag gzhag na gzugs

gzhan du mi 'gyur ro/ /lug gi steng na snod yod pa la gtor na de thur ma'i gzeb dang / sbrul nag po snang ngo / /snod kyi steng du gtor na kham phor du snang bar 'gyur ro/ /btung ba'i snod sbrang rtsis byugs pa'i

steng du gtor na phyag dar gyi phung por snang ngo / /grong khyer gyi sgo dang grong khyer kun du gtor na grong khyer kunas mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /grong khyer kun la yungs kar dang pad ma'i phye ma gtor na skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo

mi snang ba thams cad snang bar 'gyur ro/ /seng ge'i khrag dang sbyar nas dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi steng du gtor na lam gyi bzhi mdo thams cad du seng ge'i gzugs su ston to/ /sde drag cing gtum la yan lag mchog gi gzugs

dang ldan pa'i steng du gtor na thams cad wa'i gzugs su snang la phyogs bcur rgyug go/ g.yul 'gyed sar gtor na thams cad gnyid log par byas par 'gyur la mtshon cha thams cad dang / go cha thams cad mi snang

bar 'gyur ro/ /me'i nang du gtor na mi snang ba rnams snang bar 'gyur ro/ /til mar dang sbyar nas me'i nang du gtor na rtag tu 'bar bar 'gyur ro/ /chu'i nang du gtor na chu mi mngon par 'gyur ro/ /bum pa chus

bkang ba la gtor na srog chags chu'i nang na gnas pa thams cad chu'i nang nas 'byung zhing thang la gnas so/ /tshal gyi nang du yungs kar gyis gtor na me tog dang 'bras bu mi snang bar gyur pa thams cad snang zhing shing skam po

dang / tshal gyi mthar me tog dang 'bras bu thams cad ston to/ /nam mkha' la gtor na phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi nang ngam/ 'dus pa'i nang ngam/ skye bo mang po'i nang du me tog gi char rnam pa sna tshogs dag 'bab ste/
lha'i dri legs par smin pa yid dga' ba sim par byed pa 'bab bo/ /las dang ldan pa 'am/ bzo'i gnas kyi las te/ las kyi snod thams cad la til mar gyi rgyal pos byugs la phye mas bsku/ pad ma chen

po'i phye mas 'khor gyi gnas bsku/ yungs kar gyis phyogs bzhir gtor la/ de nas las kyi bzo bzang po ji lta ba bzhin ston par 'dod na las kyi snod de dang de dag nyid g.yo la/ las kyi bzo'i tshul bzang

pos mthar phyin pa rnam pa du ma dag ston par byed la nyo tshong byed pa 'byung ste/ gal te phyir bzlog pa ma byas na rin ji lta ji lta ba de lta de ltar nyo tshong byed do/ /chu dang yungs kar gyis bzlog pa byas na mi snang bar 'gyur la dpag

tshad brgya tsam gyi bar du khrid na de dang de nyid du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /rdza mkhan gyi 'khor lo la phye mas byug cing yungs kar chags par byas la/ pad ma chen po'i phye mas gtor nas 'jim pa gzhag la snod kyi ngo bo ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin

bya ste/ snod kyi ngo bo dngul las byas pa 'am/ gser las byas pa 'am/ zangs las byas pa 'am/ lcags las byas pa 'am/ lcags lnga las byas pa rin po che bzang po sna tshogs kyis spras pa ji lta ba de lta bu'i snod

bkra ba rnam pa sna tshogs dag 'byung bar 'gyur la/ nyo tshong byed pa yang 'byung ste/ rin chen pos tshong byed do/ /yungs kar gyi phye ma dang / pad ma'i phye ma lhan cig sbyar nas tshong dus kyi dbus su gtor na kun du zong bkram pa'i snod mi

snang bar byas pa thams cad snang bar byed do/ /thag pa'i steng du gtor na sbrul chen po ston to/ /khyim dang / ra ba'i ngos dang / sgo dang / shing sbyar ba dang / ka ba'i steng du gtor na khang pa dang / ra ba dang / 'khor gyi khyams rnams

sbrul du ston to/ /ji srid du chu dang yungs kar gyis bzlog pa ma byas pa/ de srid du sbrul rnams 'dug go/ bzlog pa byas na mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /gtsug lag khang ngam/ lha'i gnas sam/ khang bzangs kyi ngos

la gtor na sbrul chen por snang ngo / /lha'i steng du gtor la mig sman gyis bsku/ ri lus thig le byas na lha'i gzugs brnyan de ku co 'don cing 'gro ste/ gar 'dod pa der 'gro'o/ /bzlog pa byas na phyir 'dug go /
sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs kyi zhabs la byugs la phye mas gtor na sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs g.yo bar mdzad/ bzhud par mdzad do/ /'jug par mdzad do/ /'chag par mdzad do/ /tsan dan la bzlas brjod byas

nas bdugs na phyir bzhugs so/ /bum pa sbrang rtsis bskus pa rnams la gtor na g.yo bar byed do/ /ji tsam du phyir bzlog pa ma byas pa de tsam du g.yo'o/ /chu dang yungs kar gyis bzlog na phyir 'dug go/ de nas rdo rje

bskyod par 'dod na spos kyi dkyil 'khor byas la me tog bkram ste/ gu gul gyis bdug pas bdug /de yang yungs kar dang / phye ma dang bcas pas gtor la don yod pa'i rgyal po lan bdun bzlas brjod byas na/ rdo rje dkyil

'khor las langs nas nam mkha' la 'gro bar byed/ 'phar bar byed/ 'dug par byed/ 'bar bar byed cing / phan tshun 'gro bar byed/ mtho bar 'gro bar byed/ dma' bar 'gro bar byed/ rnam par 'gro bar byed/ 'bar ba

chen pos 'bar bar byed de ji srid du bzlog pa ma byas pa de srid du nam mkha' la 'gro'o/ /chu dang yungs kar gyis bzlog pa byas na de nyid du snang ngo / /de nas 'khor lo bskyod par 'dod na dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa byas
la spos sna tshogs kyis bris nas me tog dgram pa yang bya/ gu gul gyi bdug pas kyang bdugs nas 'khor lo la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas la til mar gyi rgyal pos bskus/ lte ba'i dbus su thig

le byas nas dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su gzhag par bya/ de la yang yungs kar dang / pad ma chen po'i phye mas gdab par bya/ 'khor lo kun nas gu gul gyi bdug pas bdug cing se gol gyi sgra yang byas na 'khor lo

de dkyil 'khor las langs nas nam mkha' la 'phar zhing sdang ba thams cad la 'bab par byed de/ gal te g.yul 'gyed par 'bab na/ de'i tshe dgra thams cad kyi mgo gcod par byed/ sdang ba thams cad dang phyir rgol

ba thams cad la bab na 'jig par byed/ bgegs thams cad la 'bab pa dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha za dang / rjed byed dang / gdon rnams la 'bab pa dang / klu sdang ba thams cad

la bab na 'jig par byed de/ ji srid du bzlog pa ma byas pa de srid du 'phar ro/ /chu dang yungs kar gyis bzlog pa byas na slar dkyil 'khor la 'dug go/ mdung rtse gsum pa bskyod par 'dod na dkyil 'khor byas la

thod pa gzhag par bya/ me tog dgram pa yang bya/ gu gul gyi bdug pas kyang bdugs la/ mdung rtse gsum pa la til mar gyi rgyal pos bsku/ phye mas gdab cing thig le bya/ rtse'i rgyun gsum la pad ma chen po'i phye mas

gtor nas thod pa'i steng du gzhag par bya/ yungs kar gyis gtor zhing hU~M zhes se gol byas na mdung rtse gsum pa 'bar bar byed/ ldang bar byed/ nam mkha' la 'gro bar byed/ kun du 'bar bar byed/ 'gro bar byed/ phyogs

bcur 'phar bar byed de/ ji srid du bzlog pa ma byas pa de srid du 'bar bar byed do/ /chu dang yungs kar gyis bzlog pa byas na slar dkyil 'khor la 'dug go/ dung la til mar gyis byugs la phye mas gtor la thig le bya/ yungs

kar gyis kyang phyi nang gtor la bus la ji srid du sgra thos pa de srid kyi skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo thams cad bro brdung bar byed/ rgyug par byed/ mchong bar byed cing phyogs bcur rab tu rgyug par byed do/ /

g.yul ngor bus na 'gyed pa'i mi thams cad dang / mtshon cha thams cad dang / go cha thams cad btang nas bro brdung bar byed de/ gcer bur 'byung bar byed/ phyogs bcur rgyug par byed do/ /gal te dung lan

bdun bus na phyir rgol ba dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs des nyon mongs pa skyed par 'gyur te/ ji srid du bzlog pa ma byas pa de srid du mchong zhing phyogs bcur rgyug go/ spos chus bzlog cing khrus byas

na phyir bde bar gnas par 'gyur la/ rtag tu rgyal ba dang / dpal gyi mchog sbyin par 'gyur ro/ /de nas sgyu ma de kho na nyid sgrub pa'i gsang sngags dang / rnam par 'phrul pa'i dngos grub kyi dkyil 'khor bshad

par bya ste/ sgyu 'phrul gyi dra ba rnam par 'phrul pa'i dkyil 'khor gang du dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs shing / kun nas brgyan par yungs kar dang til mar gyi rgyal po dang / phye mar bsres pas byug pa dang / thig les kyang dbang
