bskur cing pad ma chen po'i phye mas byugs la lag pa'i phyag rgya dang / hU~M zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod na brjod pa tsam dang / yungs kar gtor ba'i mod la/ gtor ba'i snod dang / snod rdza ma dang / bum pa dang / bum pa bkang ba thams

cad dang / mtshon cha thams cad dang / dkyil 'khor gyi steng nas nam mkha' la sor bzhi tsam gyis dpags te 'dug la ji srid du dkyil 'khor gyi las su bya ba thams cad rdzogs rdzogs kyi bar du nam mkha' la 'dug go /

las su bya ba thams cad zin nas dkyil 'khor gyi yo byad dri chab kyi cho gas dbang bskur na gtor ma dang / snod rdza ma dang / bum pa dang / bum pa thams cad rang nyid 'phar bar byed la/ slar yang rang gi gnas su 'dug
go/ go cha de lta bu ni dkyil 'khor thams cad la bya ste/ thams cad du ya mtshan ston par snang la/ byas pa tsam gyis las thams cad sgrub par 'gyur te/ the tsom mi bya'o zhes bshad do/ /de'i phyir

pad ma'i dngos grub bshad par bya ste/ gser ram dngul lam zangs las shin du legs shing mdzes pa snying po dang / ze ba dang bcas shing sdong bu tshad dang ldan par byas la/ 'dab ma phyed kha phye ba 'khor bar

'dab ma drug cu rtsa bzhi yod pa khru gang tsam gyi tshad sdong bu dang / snying po dang / ze ba'i tshad sor bzhi tsam du byas pa la til mar gyi rgyal pos bsku/ pad ma'i phye ma dang / mig sman dang / mig bsku ba dang /

thig ler byas pa dang bcas pas kun legs par bskus la/ pad ma'i sdong bu'i bar du nor bu rin po che gzhag nas lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya/ khro bo'i rgyal pos lan bdun gyi bar du dbang bskur nas
rig sngags 'chang gtsang ma legs par khrus byas la/ gos gtsang ma bgos pas til mar gyis bdag nyid la bsku bar bya/ mig bsku ba dang / thig le dang / bdug pas bdag nyid kyi lus la bdug par bya'o/ /

lag pa g.yas pa la nor bu gdags/ lag pa g.yon pa pad ma gzung la bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug ste/ 'khor gyi nang du bcom ldan 'das la pad ma'i mchod pa 'bum bya ste/ pad ma 'bum 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /mchod

pa'i cho ga byas nas chu dang yungs kar gyis btab na yang 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /pad ma sprul pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad chu'i nang du bor na pad ma mgal me bskor ba ltar 'khor bar 'gyur la/ pad ma 'bum rnams char du 'bab

par 'gyur ro/ /pad ma'i chu'i nang du gzhag par bya ba ni mtsho bran nam/ ldeng ka 'am/ chu bo 'am/ chu bo chen po 'am/ 'obs sam/ rdzing ngam/ mtsho'i nang gang yang rung ba'i gnas su gzhag na gnas de dang de thams

cad du pad ma'i mtsho chen po 'byung ste/ ji srid du pad ma ma ma phyung ba de srid du/ dus rtag tu pad ma'i mtshor 'dug ste/ ston ka dang / dgun nam/ dpyid dam/ sos ka tsha ba'i dus su rtag tu pad ma'i mtshor 'dug go/ tshal

gyi 'gram du zhugs nas yungs kar la til mar gyis bskus pa phye ma dang sbyar nas me tog gang yang rung ba zhig lag gis gzung ste bskor la yungs kar gyis gtor na/ tshal gyi mtha'i shing thams cad la me tog rgyas

par snang ngo / /dge 'dun gyi nang ngam/ tshogs pa'i nang ngam/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor ram/ skye bo'i nang du me tog ji snyed pa lag gis bskor la/ yungs kar gyis gtor na me tog mang po 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /chu dang
yungs kar gyis thams cad du zlog par byed pa yin no/ /'bras bu ji snyed pa lag gis gzung nas yungs kar gyis gtor na 'bras bu'i char 'bab par 'gyur ro/ /gos lag pas bzung nas yungs kar gyis gtor te

te bskor na gos dang bla re sna tshogs ston par byed do/ /rgyan lag pas gzung nas yungs kar gyis gtor na/ lha'i rgyan bzang po sna tshogs pa lag tu 'byung bar 'gyur zhing skye bo 'dus pa thams cad kyi rgyan du byed la thams

cad la rgyan btags par 'gyur ro/ /yungs kar dang chus bzlog par bya'o/ /yungs kar la til mar gyis bskus phye mas bsgo/ gi'u wang dang / gur kum dang / shing kun dang / snu hwa'i 'o mas kyang bsgos la de dag

gcig tu byas nas grib ma la bskam mo/ /de nas 'bras bu gcig kha bcug la phyogs bzhir gtor na kha nas me 'bar bar snang zhing lus las 'bar ba sna tshogs 'byung bar snang ste/ ji srid du yungs kar kha na yod pa'i

bar du lus las 'od zer 'bar ba kha dog rnam pa sna tshogs 'byung ngo / /til mar dang lhan cig btags pa'i snying por bya/ kong bur til mar gyi rgyal pos bkang ste mar me 'bum ston par byed do/ /me thab khang bu'i

nang du bcug na ji srid du ma phyung ba de srid du me 'bar ston to/ /mar me'i sdong bu'i nang du bcug la ma phyung na rtag tu 'bar ro/ /mgal me 'bar ba'i nang du bcug na 'bar ba'i phreng ba 'bum snyed du snang ngo / /gtor

ma'i rdza ma dang / bum pa'i nang du gtor na gtor ma'i rdza ma dang / bum pa thams cad 'bar bar snang ngo / /lag cha dang / mtshon cha thams cad la byugs na gcig tu 'bar bar 'gyur ro/ /bdag nyid kyi lus la

byugs la ri lu gtsang ma spyi bor gzhag na lus thams cad gcig tu 'bar bar snang ba nas lus ril bsregs pa ltar snang ngo / /'o ma dang yungs kar gyis gtor na lus slar snang bar 'gyur ro/ /lag pa dang rkang pa la

bskus la/ ri lu gtsang ma 'bar ba lag pa g.yas pas gzung ba 'am/ rkang pa'i mthe bos gzung na lag pa dang / rkang pa gcig pu 'bar ba dang / 'brel bar snang ngo / /'dus pa'i nang ngam/ skye bo 'dus pa mang po'am/

rgyal po'i 'khor ram/ sde can gyi nang ngam/ rig byed bzhi'i nang thams cad du yan lag nyams par snang ngo / /dri chab dang / yungs kar gyis gtor na lus slar rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /mtshan mo'i ri lu bsregs pa

lam gyi bzhi mdor gzhag nas yungs kar gyis phyogs bzhir gtor na mar me 'bum phrag bye ba snang ngo / /kun nas phyogs bzhir chu dang yungs kar gyis bzlog par bya ba yin no/ /tshal chen po'i mtha' dang / nang du gtor la shing

gcig la ri lu gtsang ma gzhag na shing dang / rtswa dang / shing gel pa dang / 'dab ma dang / lo ma thams cad gcig tu 'bar bar snang ngo / /ri'i rtse mor mar me bus nas ri kun du gtor na ri kun nas gcig tu 'bar zhing mched par snang

la sems can thams cad kun nas ngo mtshar du 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /rkun ma dang / g.yon can dang / gnod byed dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang / sdang ba dang / phyir rgol ba dang / phas kyi dgra thams cad dang / sdang sems can

nas ri dgas gtum po dang / bya la sogs pa'i bar ri la gnas pa rnams de'i mtshan mo nyid phyogs bcu kun du bros zhing ha ha zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byin to/ /spos chab kyis bzlog par 'gyur ro/ /gzugs brnyan gyi steng du

gtor la/ gtsang ma'i ri lu 'bar bar gzhag na gzugs brnyan thams cad gcig tu 'bar bar 'gyur te/ spos chu dang / yungs kar gyis bzlog par 'gyur ro/ /mar me'i ri lu shar phyogs kyi sgor sbar te gnas gtsang

mar gzhag dkyil 'khor gcig byas nas gtor ma'i cho ga bum pa bkang ba gzhag /grong khyer kun du yungs kar gyis gtor zhing don yod pa'i rgyal po yang dran par byas na grong khyer kun nas mar me'i phreng ba 'bar ba gcig

tu snang ngo / /grong khyer gyi sgo bzhir dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga byas la shar phyogs kyi sgo nas zhugs na gang grong khyer na gnas pa skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo de dag thams cad dga' ba chen po rgya che bas

tshim par 'gyur ro/ /grong khyer de nas gang sdang ba'i sems can phyir rgol ba dang / phas kyi dgra dang / chom rkun dang / g.yon can dang / gnod byed dang / glags tshol bar gyur pa/ gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / yi dgas dang /

sha za dang / brjed byed dang / mi ma yin pa gang yang rung ba grong khyer de na gnas pa de dag la long du gyur cing gdugs la ngu zhing ha ha zhes sgra 'byin cing grong khyer gyi sgor byung nas phyogs bcur rab tu 'bros so/ /grong khyer de yang kun
nas gnod pa med cing 'khrugs pa med par 'gyur/ 'jigs pa dang / gnod pa dang / nad 'go ba dang / 'khrug pa thams cad dang / nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur/ mtshan mo 'das nas spos chu dang / yungs
kar gyis grong khyer sgor gtor zhing dbang bskur na bzlog par 'gyur ro// //'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po/ bam po bcu dgu pa/ ldong ros dang / thing shing gyi

phye ma dang / yungs kar dang / ma hA tre+e la dang / arka'i 'o ma dang / pha gu'i 'o ma dang / gcig tu sbyar ro/ /nya'i mig khris pa dang bcas pa dang / nA ga pus pa dang / pad ma'i chu ba rnams kyang lhan cig tu phye ma zhib mor

bya'o/ /phye ma snga ma legs par sbyar la chus ri lur byas pa dang / phye mas gzhan yang bcang ngo / /phye mas 'di dang pad ma chen po'i phye ma bcang ba lhan cig tu bsres pa'i phye mas lus bskus la phyogs bzhir yungs

kar gtor te/ ri lu khar bcug la hU~M zhes bya ba bsdams te brjod na de'i lus las chu 'dzag cing / de kho na bzhin du rna ba gnyis kyang rdzas kyi chu 'byung bar snang / lus las spos kyi rigs yid du 'ong ba rab tu sim

par byed pa 'byung ba ni nad thams cad grub par snang ste/ rgyal ba'i phyag bzhin no/ /yungs kar gyi phye ma blangs te nam mkha' la gtor la ri lu lag pas bskor na char chen po 'bab par 'gyur ro/ /ri lu nam

mkha' la 'phangs na mi 'bab bo/ /g.yul chen po 'gyed pa'i nang du phye ma de yungs kar dang bsres te nam mkha' la gtor la ri lu de yang khar bcug ste/ steng du bltas la hU~M zhes bya ba'i sgras bos la/ gnam lcag+sa

chen po 'bab ste yid mi 'chad pa dang sdug bsngal bskyed par 'gyur ro/ /chu'i nang du zhugs te phye ma gtor la yungs kar dang / ri lu chu'i nang du gdab par bya/ phyogs bzhir yungs kar gtor te/ trai las lus

bskus na klu chen po'i gzugs su snang ngo / /ri lu dang yungs kar me'i mdog lta bu chu dang bsres pa'i yungs kar nam mkha' la gtor na 'brug sgra chen po 'byung zhing glog chen po gsal ba snang bar 'gyur ro/ /chu'i nang nas

byung na mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /khron pa'i nang du btab na chu lud nas phyogs kun du chu 'bab par 'gyur ro/ /rdza ma 'am/ bum pa 'am/ rdze'u 'am/ ril ba b+h+r-ing ga ra 'am/ ril ba la phye mas byugs te/

de'i steng du yungs kar gyis gtor na chus bkang ste khrus byas na de chu 'bab par snang zhing de'i snod ni mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang dgos pa mang po byed de mchog tu grub pa yin no/ /de nas rin po che'i ched du 'bru mar gyi rgyal po

byas te 'bru mar gzhan dang / de bzhin du til las 'bru mar gyi rgyal po de bzhin du sbyar ro/ /lag pa dang rkang pa gzhag la 'dir nyam drod kyang shes par bya'o/ /gzhag pa thams cad nyam drod shes par bya ba ni mar sar bzhin du 'jam par

'gyur zhing skad cig de nyid la mtho ba dang / dma' ba ji ltar yid la 'dod pa bzhin du ri yang 'gyur ro/ /snying po thur ma 'dra ba dang / zlum po 'am/ yang na lcug ma lta bur byas pas ka ba yang 'dud pa dang / ri yang dma' ba 'am/

yang na mthon por 'gyur bar byed do/ /yungs kar dang pad ma chen po'i phye ma lhan cig bsres pa 'bru mar gyi rgyal pos bsgos pa phyogs bzhir kun du gtor na ri thams cad mi snang zhing 'brog dgon par snang bar 'gyur ro/ /yang na mi

bgrod par mi nus pa'i ri'i rtse mo na seng ge dang / stag gis gang ba lcug ma dang tsher ma can gyi shing ljon pa sna tshogs kyis gang ba 'am/ rtsub pa 'am/ dub bu 'am/ khong stong du snang bar 'gyur ro/ /ci ste rig sngags 'chang

'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi pho brang ri po ta la'i gzhal med khang mthong bar 'dod na de nas rig sngags 'chang gis zhag bdun gyi bar du nas kyi 'o thug gi zas zos te gtsang ma shin du khrus byas pa gos gtsang

ma bgom pas ri'i gseb du zhugs la/ sa phyogs gtsang ma'i gnas der shing dri zhim po'i me sbar ba la yungs kar phye ma dang bsres pa 'bru mar gyi rgyal po dang sbyar la 'bras so ba dang bsres pa stong rtsa brgyad zhag

bdun du dus gsum du sbyin sreg bya'o/ /lha bshos dang gtor ma dkar po 'bul lo/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang gis tshes brgyad la nyin zhag gcig smyung ba byas la shin du khrus byas pa gtsang mas spos sna tshogs
kyis lus bskus gos bzang po gtsang ma bgos te/ 'bru mar gyi rgyal pos rang gi lus bskus phye mas lus byugs mig sman gyis mig bskus/ thig le byas la nor bus mgo bcing zhing mgul
pa dang / lag pa dang / dpung pa dang / rked par yang bcings la yungs kar dang mtshal bsres pas ri'i phyogs bzhir gtor bar bya/ pad ma chen po'i phye ma de yang phyogs bzhir gtor rang
gi lag pa g.yon pas zhags pa dang / pad ma gzung zhing g.yas pas rnam par lta ba snang ba dang / don yod pa chen pos dri ma med pa'i phyag rgya gzung ste/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i mdo lan cig bzlas
brjod byas na ji ltar don yod pa'i zhags pa'i mdo sde bshad pa las bstan pa de ltar ri po ta la'i gzhal med khang mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags 'chang de yang 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang

phyug gi gzugs su snang bar 'gyur ro/ /ji ltar ri po ta la'i gzhal med khang bzhin du ri de la yang gzhal med khang snang ste/ ri de la rin po che'i shing ljon pa sna tshogs snang ngo / /me tog sna tshogs kyi gzhal med

khang snang ngo / /sA la dang / tA la dang / ta ma la dang / tsam pa ka dang / a sho ka dang / a d+hi mug ti ka dang / ba ri sha ka dang / ka dam pa dang / nI la dang / pA Ta la dang / pA lA sha dang / u dum bA ra dang / dong ka'i me tog

sna tshogs dang / sna ma'i me tog dang / ta ra na dang / na ba ma li ka dang / ku pa pya ka sna tshogs snang bar 'gyur ro/ /bya'i tshogs sna tshogs kyis legs par brgyan pa dang / ri dag+sa kyi tshogs sna tshogs kyis gang ba snang bar

'gyur ro/ /gang gi tshe phyir bsdu ba byed par 'dod pa de'i tshe gnas gzhan du 'gro bar bya'o/ /gzhan yang dgos pa sna tshogs pa sna tshogs la rang gi blo gros la ji ltar snang ba bzhin bya'o/ /dgos pa thams cad la rab tu sbyar

ba ni bklags pa tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /don yod pa chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi rig sngags 'chang gi cho ga gsang ba'o// // don yod pa'i sgyu ma rnam par 'phrul pa zhes bya ba'i sgrub pa'i cho ga ni/

de nas de'i 'og tu phyag rgya bri ba'i dkyil 'khor bshad par bya ste/ rtags mtshon phyag rgya'i de nyid ni/ /pad ma rgyas dang sna tshogs mtshon/ /pad ma kha ni phyed bye ba/ /phyag dag na ni rab tu 'dzin/ /phyag gnyis phyung zhing

brkyang nas kyang / /bskum pa 'am 'dzin stangs de nyid kyis/ /kun nas phreng ba 'bar ba'i rtags/ /mtshon cha phyag rgya bsnams pa ni/ /'di lta ste/ ral gri dang / mdung thung dang / mda' bo che dang / mdung

rtse gsum pa dang / yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang / rgyal mtshan dang / rdo rje dang / rdo rje phreng zlum dang / las kyi rdo rje dang / zur gsum ma zhes bya ba dang / 'khor lo dang / dung dang / tho ba dang / zhags pa

dang / dgra sta dang / dbyug tho dang / me tog gi thum po dang / bum pa gang ba dang / rin po che'i snod dang / pad ma'i phreng ba dang / rdo rje'i phreng zlum dang / uta pa la'i phreng ba dang / me tog gi phreng ba dang / pad ma dang / ut+pa la

dang / zla ba dang / ri rab dang / me long dang / klu dang / nyi ma'i rgyal mtshan dang / gdugs dang / be con dang / gshin rje'i be con dang / chu srin gyi kha dang / sngags de'i phreng ba dang / mdung rtse gsum pa'i phreng

zlum dang / bsdigs pa dang / bsgyings pa dang / dbugs 'byin pa dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / mchog sbyin pa dang / thal mo sbyar ba dang / glegs bam bsnams pa dang / mkhar sil dang / lhung bzed dang / gdugs

dang / dbu rgyan dang / nor bu brgyus pa dang / gser skud dang / mu tig gi phreng ba dang / gdu bu dang / dpung rgyan dang / rna cha dang / me'i thab khung ngo / /kun nas 'bar phreng phyag rgya de/ /sna tshogs rmad du byung bas smras/ /

mtshon cha sna tshogs bsnams pa yi/ /pad ma 'dzin la rab tu gnas/ /ras la bris pa 'am dkyil 'khor ram/ /rtsig pa 'am gang yang rung ba la/ /tshon rtsi rnam pa sna tshogs kyis/ /gang du bris pa mthong ba de/ /ngan 'gro

sems can dmyal bar ni/ /phyir yang 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten dbang gis rtag mchog sbyin/ /sdig pa thams cad rnam par spangs/ /gang zhig nyes byas mi zad pa/ /mtshams med lnga po byed pa nyid/ /mnar

med pa yi gnas dang ni/ /dmyal ba gzhan du gzhol ba gang / /phyag rgya de dag mthong tsam gyis/ /'gro ba thams cad zad par 'gyur/ /skye dang 'chi las rnam par grol/ /'khor ba'i rgya mtsho rgal bar 'gyur/ /de dag skye ba

phyi mar ni/ /phyir yang mngal gyis mi gos te/ /yang dang yang du pad ma las/ /rdzus te skye ba dag tu 'gyur/ /rtag tu bde ba can du 'gro/ /gang na 'dren pa tshe dpag med/ /bzhugs pa'i spyan sngar rtag tu der/ /skye 'gyur

the tsom mi za zhing / /don rnams bde bar 'grub 'gyur zhing / /rig sngags sna tshogs bde bar 'grub/ /bde bar dkyil 'khor 'grub 'gyur zhing / /rtag tu mi ldog sa gnas 'gyur/ /phyag rgya 'di dag mthong tsam

gyis/ /sangs rgyas byang chub dang mnyam 'gyur/ /dus gsum gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas la/ /bla med dge rtsa bskyed par 'gyur/ /'jig rten 'di dang pha rol tu/ /bsod nams phung po chen po 'thob/ /de nas dkyil 'khor rab

bshad pa/ /de nyid 'grub pa'i phyag rgya rnams/ /'jig rten 'di dang pha rol tu/ /'dod pa thams cad rab tu sbyin/ /sdig pa thams cad mod la sel/ /gang zhig mtshams med byed pa dag /mi bzad mnar med gnas pa

yi/ /sdig pa thams cad 'jig par 'gyur/ /dmyal ba'i sgo rnams bcad nas ni/ /mtho ris sgo phye the tshom med/ /sgo phye gyur pa rnams la ni/ /sangs rgyas zhing rnams snang bar 'gyur/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad

kyi dgongs pa/ mgon po 'jig rten dbang phyug gi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor mthong ba tsam gyis sems can phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro/ /phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor 'di mthong na shi 'phos pa'i mod la bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro/ /

dkyil 'khor 'di zhugs pa tsam gyis gang na thub pa 'dren pa 'od dpag med bzhugs pa'i pho brang du myur du 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /dkyil 'khor gru bzhi lham pa la/ /kun nas cha nas mdzes par bya/ /gru bzhi go la'i tshad tsam

la/ /sgo bzhi them skas bzhi yis brgyan/ /shin du legs par bskus dang ldan/ /'jam zhing mnyen la mnyam pa yi/ /sa yi cha dang ldan pa la/ /dkyil 'khor shes rab can gyis dbye/ /dkyil 'khor de nyid thig

btab la/ /phyag rgya bri ba rnam par dbye/ /phyogs bzhi'i cha ni mnyam pa yi/ /dbus na dkyil 'khor snying po yin/ /gru bzhi pa la kun nas kha khyer gyi rnam pa dang / mdung rtse gsum pa'i phreng ba rnam par dbye'o/ /

gru bzhi pa'i dbus su phyag na don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya kun nas 'bar ba bla na med pa dang / phyag rgyan gyis brgyan pa tshon rtsi sna tshogs kyis bri'o/ /dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol gyi gnas su

phyag rgya bri ba yang shin du 'byes par bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor kun nas gos dang / ba dan dang / rgyal mtshan gyis brgyan la kun du yungs kar dkar po gtor ro/ /phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor kyi phyi rol gyi gnas su phyogs bzhi kun

du bya ba ni ba lang gi lci ba sa dang bsres pa shin du legs par byugs pa dang ldan pa la tshon rtsi'i phye mas kha khyer gyi rnam pa dang / kun nas pad ma'i phreng ba rgya chen po dang / mtshon cha bris la 'di'i sgo yang rnam par dbyes par bri'o/ /

ji ltar phyag rgya dang mthun pa'i ro sna tshogs kyi gtor ma gzhag par bya ste/ phyag rgya re re la yang mchod yon phul la/ dbyib mo dang / phru ba dang / bum pa dang / kha phor dang / rdze'u gtor mas bkang la gzhag go /
kun du bum pa gang ba dang / /bdug spos kyi ni snod dag dang / /me tog 'bras bu sna tshogs dang / /gtor ma dkar po dag gis bkang / /me tog rnam par bkram byas la/ /kun du phreng bas gzhag
par bya/ /phreng ba bzang po gzhag nas kyang / /de bzhin kun du bdug spos dbul/ /a ka ru dang / tsan dan dang / du ru ska dang / sa la ki dang / spri ka dang / gu gul dang / sra rtsi pog dang /
sgron shing dang / gla rtsi dang / ga bur gyi bdug pa 'di dag gis bdugs la/ gtor ma dang / me tog dang / lha bshos dbul lo/ /phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor du 'jug pas don yod pa'i rgyal po dran par byas

te bskor la phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor la phyag bya zhing phyag rgya thams cad la me tog bkram zhing me tog gtor ro/ /gang phyag rgya'i de kho na nyid gsang ba 'di dang / phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor 'di sgrub pa gang dgos pa la

sngar dkyil 'khor phyag rgya dang bcas pa la mchog tu mdzes par byas la/ phyis las thams cad bya'o/ /rig sngags 'chang ba gtsang ma yis/ /gtsang ma yi ni gos bgos la/ /ji ltar dkyil 'khor cho ga bzhin/ /

dkyil 'khor du ni gzhag par bya/ /ji ltar dkyil 'khor la dgos pa/ /de bzhin du ni las bya'o/ /phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor bla med pa/ /dkyil 'khor 'dir ni zhugs tsam gyis/ /thub pa snang mdzad kyis gsungs pa'i/ /spyi yi rigs

ni thams cad du/ /phyag rgya dkrigs dang gtams rnams kyis/ /dam tshig kun du shes par 'gyur/ /spyi rigs kun gyi cho ga yi/ /dam tshig rjes zhugs de bzhin no/ /dkyil 'khor kun du zhugs pa dang / /rgyal bas lung ni bstan
par 'gyur/ /kun gzigs de bzhin gshegs pa yi/ /phyag ni spyi bor 'jog par mdzad/ /chos kyi ro ni bdud rtsi yi/ /gzi brjid mod la 'jug par 'gyur/ /rnam snang mdzad gsungs dkyil 'khor du/ /don

yod dngos grub stsol bar mdzad/ /phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor gang bzhugs pa/ /kun du spyi yi rigs rnams kyi/ /don yod dngos grub mchog myur thob/ /sangs rgyas bye ba gang gA'i klung gi bye ma khrag khrig brgya stong phrag

dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i drung du dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur ro/ /bsod nams kyi phung po chen po dang ldan par 'gyur te/ yon tan gyi phan yon 'di dag ni tshe 'di yin par khong du chud par bya'o/ /bde ba can gyi

'jig rten gyi khams su pad ma las rdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro/ /tshe rabs su tshe rabs dran zhing 'od zer bye ba 'bar ba'i lus dang ldan zhing / tshe bskal pa brgya stong dpag tu med par 'gyur ro/ /yon tan thams cad dri

ma med par snang ba don yod pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa bstan pa bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob ste/ gang ting nge 'dzin thob pas sgyu ma chen po lta bu'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul ston par byed do/ /

dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi lha'i spyi'i rigs de bzhin gshegs pa'i rig kyis byin gyis brlabs kyi rjes su 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / lto 'phye chen

po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa thams cad dbang du gyur nas rtag tu rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis dkyil 'khor 'byor par gzigs nas bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang

sba ba mdzad par 'gyur ro/ /sems can thams cad phyi bzhin 'brang zhing mchod pa chen po byed par 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po btsun mo dang / 'khor dang bcas pa rnams kyis mchod pa'i 'os chen por 'gyur ro/ /sems can thams
cad gcig tu bla mar byed par 'gyur ro/ /nad thams cad med par 'gyur ro/ /sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/ /mtshan ma bri ba'i phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'o// // de nas sbyin sreg

gi cho ga'i dkyil 'khor bshad par bya ste/ rig sngags 'chang ba rnam dag gi/ 'di nyid sgrub pa bsgrub pa'i phyir/ /spyi yi rigs rnams thams cad kyi/ /cho ga zhib mo bla med yin/ /gang gis sbyin sreg byas tsam
gyis/ /phyogs kun rnam par gzigs pa yi/ /de bzhin gshegs gnas byon 'gyur zhing / /byang chub sems dpa' dgongs par 'gyur/ /rig sngags dngos grub rjes stsol cing / /rtag tu bsrung ba mdzad par
'gyur/ /mgon po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs/ /the tsom med par myur du byon/ /mgon po 'khor bcas gnas nyid na/ /rang gi gzugs su mthong bar 'gyur/ /'dod pa thams cad rtag tu stsol/ /

rtag tu mchog ni stsol ba nyid/ /nyin dang mtshan du rtag par ni/ /rnam par gzigs 'gyur the tsom med/ /dkyil 'khor bshad par bya ba ste/ /dkyil 'khor gru bzhi shin du mdzes par bya ba ni rgya chen po ko la'i tshad

tsam la/ legs par byugs pa shin du 'jam pa/ shin du gsal ba gru bzhi sgo bzhi dang / them skas bzhi dang ldan pa/ rnam par dbyes pa mchog tu mdzes pa dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi snying por yang bya'o/ /me

yi gnas kyi dkyil 'khor ni/ /gru bzhi nyid kyi rnam pa la/ /kun nas them skas bzhi dag dang / /steng du grwa ni bzhi pa bya/ /rtag tu pad ma'i snying po dang / /snying po rgyas pa'i steng du yang / /kun nas 'dab ma mdzes par bya/ /

grwa grwar pad ma'i phreng ba bya/ /de bzhin du grwa gnyis kar rdo rje pad ma dang bcas pa'o/ /gsum par mdung rtse gsum pa pad ma dang bcas pa'o/ /bzhi par 'khor lo pad ma dang bcas pa'o/ /lnga par bum pa gang ba gzhag go /

sna tshogs tshon gyis rnam mdzes pa'i/ /kun nas 'dab ma'i myu gu bya/ /rin chen snod ni bkang ba dang / /me tog phreng dang ngang pa dang / /phye ma pad mar bcas pa dang / /de bzhin me tog rigs dag nyid/ /de bzhin sna tshogs

rgyan brgyan pa'o/ /nub kyi gnas dang grwa dag tu/ /pad ma'i 'dab ma ut+pa la bcas/ /bum pa dur bas bkang ba bri/ /rtsa ba'i bum pa dbu ma la/ /'dir ni kha khyer thig kyang gdab/ /de nas dkyil 'khor mdzes bya

ba/ /thig gis kun nas cha mnyam zhing / /sgo bzhi mdzes par bya ba ni/ /tshon sna lnga yi skud pas gdab/ /me 'bar mdog can bri ba ni/ /kun nas 'bar ba'i phreng ba can/ /grwa dang grwar ni me lha bri/ /lus ni me
mdog 'bar ba dang / /lag na me 'bar 'dzin pa dang / /mtshan ma sna tshogs gzhan dag kyang / /cho ga bzhin du bri bar bya/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni cho ga bzhin/ /ba dan mda' dang sna lnga yi/ /skud pas
bum pa gang dkris dang / /de bzhin bdug spos snod dag gis/ /kun nas dkyil 'khor brgyan par bya/ /sna tshogs gzugs can rgya che yi/ /sna tshogs ro yi gtor ma gzhag /rdze'u dang kham phor rnam

gsum gyi/ /dkar pos dkar ba gzhag par bya/ /rdze'u dang dbyib mo bum pa ni/ /gtor mas bkang ba kun du gzhag /'bras bu rnam pa sna tshogs gzhag /kun nas me tog dgram bya zhing / /phreng ba sna tshogs gzhag

par bya/ /'bras yos yungs kar gtor nas ni/ /kun du mar me 'bar ba dang / /sna tshogs dri dang de bzhin du/ /dri yi phye ma lha bshos dang / /dkyil 'khor kun la gzhag par bya/ /dkyil 'khor dag ni thams cad

la/ /blugs gzar dUr ba rtag tu bzhag /shing ni arka shi mi dang / /yungs kar 'bras ni so ba dang / /zhun mar dang ni mar dkar dang / /kun du tsan dan dkar po dag /sbyin sreg cho gar 'dir gzhag ste/ /dus
gsum rtag tu rig 'dzin gyis/ /sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad du bya/ /rig pa 'dzin pa gtsang ma yis/ /gtsang ma yi ni gos bgos la/ /dkar gsum gyi ni zas bza' zhing / /gzhan ni bza' dang spyad mi bya/ /
dkyil 'khor gyi ni nub sgo nas/ /dkyil 'khor shes pa 'jug bya zhing / /dar b+ha'i stan la skyil dkrung du/ /shar phyogs kha bltas 'dug par bya/ /byams pa'i sems la mnyam gzhag ste/ /don yod rgyal

po dran bya zhing / /snga dro'i dus su sbyin sreg bya/ /gung la slob ma gzhug bya zhing / /spyi yi rigs kyi sreg blags ni/ /phyem red dus su bya ba'o/ /gang zhig dkyil 'khor du zhugs la/ /sbyin sreg dkyil 'khor de nyid dang / /grub

pa kun du cho ga yi/ /bdag nyid dbang bskur me kun gyi/ /sbyin sreg byed pa'i mchog tu gsungs/ /kun du gnas ni thams cad na/ /rgyas pa gnas 'jog rwa gcig dang / /gar ge de bzhin phur bu dang / /mdun na 'don pa me lha

ni/ /sbyin sreg byed pa 'jig rten par/ /mtshungs zhes ston pas lung bstan to/ /'jig rten 'das pa'i las sgrub pa/ /rig 'dzin dbang po chen po dang / /phyag na rdo rje tshangs pa dang / /khyab 'jug dbang phyug chen po dang / /mnyam pa bas
kyang lhag pa nyid/ /me yis sbyin sreg byed pa la/ /de bzhin gshegs kun byin gyis rlob/ /gal te zhag bdun dus gsum du/ /de la sogs pa'i las rnams ni/ /me la sbyin sreg byed pa la/ /mod la mngon shes

lnga thob ces/ /de skad 'jig rten 'dren pa gsung / /las ni byas nas de nas ni/ /sbyin sreg la ni brtsam par bya/ /sreg blugs sbyin sreg byas tsam gyis/ /las rnams thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ /lha rnams rtag tu 'ong 'gyur zhing / /de

bzhin gshegs kun dgyes par 'gyur/ /byang chub sems dpa' byon nas ni/ /mod la mthong ba'i sbyin par mdzad/ /sdig pa thams cad bsreg par 'gyur/ /shin du mi bzad sngon gyi las/ /sreg blugs tsam gyi mod la bsregs/ /'bar

ba'i me yis phye leb bzhin/ /de la sogs pa'i sdig pa ni/ /bsreg 'gyur 'dir ni the tsom med/ /sdang ba'i phyir ni rgol nyid dang / /dga' zhing yid ni bde ba dang / /lus can dag ni thams cad la/ /rtag tu dga' bar byed cing gnas/ /rtag tu

me yi lha nyid ni/ /rgyun du mthong bar 'dod pa yis/ /me la sbyin sreg byas tsam gyis/ /me lha nyid ni bzhugs gyur te/ /rtag tu las rnams thams cad mdzad/ /rgyun du phyi bzhin 'brang bar 'gyur/ /lha ni rtag tu 'ong 'gyur zhing / /thams cad du ni

mthong ba ster/ /rgyu skar zla ba nyi ma dang / /gshin rje dang ni chu lha dang / /rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag /dpung bcas gzhon par bcas pa yang / /nyin dang mtshan du rtag par ni/ /rjes 'brang bsrung 'gyur the tsom med/ /ci ste rig sngags 'chang

don yod pa'i rgyal po'i snying po sgrub par 'dod na rig sngags 'chang gtsang ma des shin tu khrus byas la gos gtsang ma bgo bar bya/ nyin zhag gcig smyung ba bya zhing / shing arga'i yam sreg shing gi me sbar la pad ma dang /

zhun mar dang / 'bras so ba'i sbyin sreg brgyad brgya byas nas sreg blugs lan cig byas pas mtshams med pa lnga byed pa yang 'grub par 'gyur te/ 'di la the tshom dang yid gnyis bskyed par mi bya'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams

cad kyi spyi'i rigs kyi dngos grub 'dod na rig sngags 'chang des byang chub kyi shing gi me sbar la rigs spyir pad ma dang / ut+pa la sngon po dang / yungs kar dkar po dang / zhun mar bsres pa'i sbyin sreg brgyad brgya byas na de bzhin gshegs

pa thams cad kyi spyi'i rigs kyi dngos grub 'thob ste thams cad cho ga chen po zhib mo dang / sbyin sreg chen po'i cho gar 'gyur ro/ /de nas pha rol gyi dmag tshogs gzhom par 'dod na rig sngags 'chang gtsang ma des shin du khrus byas la gos

gtsang ma bgos te seng ldeng gi me sbar la zho dang / zhun mar dang / yungs kar dang / gu gul gyi sreg blugs kyis sbyin sreg brgyad stong byas na dpag tshad stong tshun chad kyi pha rol gyi dmag tshogs bcing ba byas par 'gyur ro/ /pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang /

dgra gzhom par 'dod pa dang / dpung gzhig par 'dod na de nas rig sngags 'chang gis shing ka ra ba ka'i me sbar la/ sbrul gyi lpags pa brjes pa dang / ske tse'i sa bon dang / lan tshwa 'bras sA lu dang bsres pa yungs kar mar dang sbyar

ba'i sbyin sreg byas na dpag tshad stong tshun chad kyi pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang / dgra la gnam lcags chen po dang / rlung grang mo 'bab pas phongs pa dang / yid mi bde ba bskyed par 'gyur/ dgra thams cad rnam par 'jig

par 'gyur ro/ /klus char 'bebs par 'dod na rig sngags 'chang des nyin zhag gcig smyung ba byas la/ shin du khrus byas pa gtsang mas dri sna tshogs dang / me tog phreng ba dang / yungs kar dang / sha ta pus pa zhun mar

dang sbyar ba'i sbyin sreg mtshan gcig la dus gsum du byas na klu'i rgyal pos char gyi rgyun chen po 'bebs te/ 'dzam bu'i gling mtha' dag tu zhag bdun gyi bar du char 'bab par 'gyur ro/ /char de nyid ha cang ches na thal

ba nam mkha' la gtor na ha cang char ches pa 'chad par 'gyur ro/ /yang me lha 'ong bar 'dod cing rang gi gzugs su mthong bar 'dod na rig sngags 'chang gtsang ma des gos gtsang ma bgos la nyin zhag gcig gnas

par gyur pas shing sna ma'i me sbar la 'bras so ba dang / zhun mar dang / bu ram sha kha ra dang bcas pa dang / tsha ba gsum dang / sna ma'i me tog bsres pa brgyad stong sbyin sreg bya'o/ /brgyad stong tshang ba dang /

me lha me'i nang nas lus phyed phyung ste 'dug nas rig sngags 'chang la ci bgyi bka' stsol cig ces zer zhing ji ltar rig sngags 'chang gi cho ga'i don du 'gyur ba de bzhin du smra'o/ /thams cad sbyin pa zhes bya ba mchog

thams cad sbyin pa zhes bya ba bdud rtsi 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i me'i kha/ kha'i mchog sbyin par byed do/ /gang bdud rtsi 'bar ba'i me'i kha thob pas gang du dbugs phyung ba dang / rngubs pa der me 'bar ba 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /gang

du phu zhes byas pa der me 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /mun gnag du dbugs phyung na me 'bar te/ snang bar 'gyur ro/ /tsan dan dkar po'i sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas pas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug nyid kyi gzugs ston par

mdzad do/ /sa bon bdun gyi sbyin sreg gis nad thams cad zhi bar byed do/ /'bras so ba'i sbyin sreg gis ni rgyal po dbang du byed do/ /phub ma dang lan tshwa'i sbyin sreg gis ni zhe 'gras par byed do/ /'bras yos dang yungs kar

gyi sbyin sreg gis ni sems can thams cad dbang du byed do/ /yungs kar dang / gu gul dang / zhun mar gyi sbyin sreg gis ni gnod sbyin 'gugs so/ /ka ra bI ra'i me tog dang / gu gul zhun mar dang sbyar ba'i sbyin sreg
gis ni srin mo 'gugs so/ /de bzhin du 'dir las thams cad byed do/ /sbyin sreg gi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'o// // ri mo'i dkyil 'khor gyi sgrub pa'i cho ga bshad par bya ste/ kun du thun mong
sgrub pa'i mchog /dge ba'i las kun byed pa ste/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mthong 'gyur zhing / /bla med bsod nams chen po sogs/ /don yod rgyal po de nyid ni/ /rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs dag tu/ /'jig rten

'dren pa snang bar bya/ /mthun dang dngos grub sna tshogs pa'i/ /'jig rten 'dren pa'i gzugs bya ba/ /grub pa sna tshogs byed pa'i gnas/ /so so'i gzugs su bya ba ni/ /ras sam yang na dar dag la/ /'jigs pa med

pas gzugs bya'o/ /don yod pa yi rgyal po ni khru gang tsam gyi tshad dam yang na tshad shin du rnam par 'byed pa pad ma'i mdog lta bu phyag brgyad pa/ dbu gsum pa/ de bzhin du spyan gsum pa/ zhi ba'i zhal du bri bar bya

ste de bzhin du zhags pa 'dzin pa dang pad ma 'dzin pa dang mdung rtse gsum pa dang / ril ba spyi blugs 'dzin pa dang / yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang / be con dang dbugs 'byin pa dang / bgrang phreng dang / me tog thum po

'dzin par bya'o/ /g.yon du ni dkar mo'o/ /g.yas su 'phags ma sgrol ma thal mo sbyar la dbu yid tsam 'dud pa rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ral pa'i thor tshugs
can/ dbu rgyan 'od dpag med kyis brgyan pa/ g.yas phyogs kyi dbu zla ba tshes pas brgyan pa/ ri dgas kyi lpags pa mnabs pa/ mchod phyir thogs pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ 'od 'dom gang dang

ldan pa'o/ /nang rim du pad ma'i phreng ba'o/ /rim pa gnyis par rdo rje phreng ba lcags kyu dang bcas par bya'o/ /rim pa gsum par nor bu rin po che'i phreng ba dang / rin po che sna tshogs mdzes pa'o/ /rim pa bzhi par

mdung rtse gsum pa'i phreng ba'o/ /rim pa lnga par kun nas 'bar ba'i phreng ba'o/ /steng dang g.yas phyogs kyi gnas su dbang po dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po me tog sna tshogs thogs par bya'o/ /

g.yon du gzhon nu dang / gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / lus ngan dang / dbang phyug dang / lha'i bu rnams bya ba ni me tog sna tshogs thogs par bya'o/ /lha mo sgrol ma'i rgyab du khro bo'i rgyal po don yod pa'i zhags pa bya ba ni khros pa/ gtum

po'i gzugs 'chang ba/ phyag bzhi pa/ 'bar ba'i nang du bzhugs pa/ sku rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ ral pa 'chang ba/ 'od dpag med kyi dbu rgyan can/ spyan gsum pa/ g.yas pa zla bas brgyan cing ral gri 'dzin pa dang

zhags pa 'dzin pa dang / mdung rtse gsum pa 'dzin pa dang / dgra sta 'dzin par bya'o/ /dkar mo'i rgyab tu rig sngags kyi rgyal po dbu gsum pa bya ba ni/ zhi ba'i zhal ras can rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ dbu rgyan rgyal ba 'od dpag med can thogs

pa/ pad ma 'dzin pa/ nor bu rin po che 'dzin par bya'o/ /'og tu pho nya mo dang / dbyangs can dang / dung can ma dang / dpal mo dang / gnas ma dang / dpe med ma dang / ral pa gcig ma dang / pho nya mo zhi ba dang / lo tog gi lha dang /

sa'i lha dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi bya'o/ /steng dang g.yas g.yon du sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs skyil mo dkrung bcas pa sor bzhi pa'i tshad tsam bya'o/ /nyi ma dang / zla ba'i lha rgyu skar dang bcas pa bya'o/ /ri mo'i gzugs kyi phyi rol gyi rim pa kun du

phyag rgya dang / phyag mtshan sna tshogs rdzogs par bri'o/ /klu rgyan bya zhing kun nas 'bar ba dang bcas par bya'o/ /rig sngags dngos grub bla med pa'i/ /ri mo'i cho ga'i gnas 'di ni/ /sdig pa thams cad mod la sel/ /mtshams med

lnga po sbyong bar byed/ /phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa grub pa 'di ni spyi'i rigs thams cad du 'jug pa ston pa yin no/ /phyi'i rigs thams cad kyi de kho na nyid kyi ri mo'i dkyil 'khor 'di ni dus gsum du gshegs pa'i

sangs rgyas dang / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpas kyang byin gyis brlabs pa'o/ /don yod pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi ri mo 'di ni thub pa rnam par snang mdzad kyis brlabs pa ste/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i de kho na nyid snying por

gyur pa de kho na nyid gsang ba 'di mthong ba tsam gyis rnam par thar pa 'thob cing lung bstan par 'gyur ro/ /mthong ba tsam gyis cho ga zhib mo bla na med pa thams cad 'grub bo/ /rnam par snang mdzad 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po

dang ldan par snang ba bye ba gang gA'i klung gi bye ma brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags cho ga bla med pa/ /spyi rigs yang dag 'byung ba ni/ /thub pa rnam snang mdzad kyis bstan/ /de bzhin gshegs

rigs grub pa dang / /gang yang pad ma'i rigs de bzhin/ /nor rigs de nyid 'byung ba dang / /rdo rje'i rigs gang bla med pa/ /spyi rigs 'di nyid mthong ba ni/ /ri mo mthong ba'i khyad par yin/ /phyir yang ngan 'gror mi 'gro zhing / /dmyal

ba ngan 'gro'i sgo bcad de/ /mtho ris kyi ni sgo yang phye/ /bla na med pa ston pa yi/ /phyag rgya'i ri mo'i dkyil 'khor 'di/ /bsod nams bla na med pa yin/ /ci ste don yod pa'i 'jig rten dbang phyug gi gzugs mthong bar 'dod na rig sngags

'chang des tsan dan dkar po las 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug don yod pa'i zhags pa sor brgyad kyi tshad tsam la/ gnad kyi gnas kyi cha'i sor tshad shin du rnam par mdzes pa/ dbu dang / mgur dang / rked pa dang / pus

mo dang / yan lag dang / zhabs kyi tshigs dang / phyag sor gyi tshigs dang / sen mo thams cad mnyam zhing mdzes pa dang / ral pa dang / sen mo tshad shin du mdzes shing cod pan gyi rgyal ba'i g.yas phyogs na zla gam

zhi ba'i gzugs can spyan gsum pa/ phyag bzhi shin du mdzes pa dang / dbu skra shin du mdzes pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i gzugs dang ldan pa/ zhags pa 'dzin pa/ g.yon pa 'od dpag med can phyag na pad

ma bsnams pa/ phyag g.yas pa mdung rtse gsum pa dang / dbugs 'byin cing rtag tu mchog sbyin par mdzad pa/ pad ma'i gdan la bzhugs par bya'o/ /sgrol ma dang / dkar mo yang 'od 'dom gang dang bcas par dgod do/ /

mgon po shin du mdzes pa/ nor bu dang / mu tig gi rgyan gyi mtshams su gser gyi rgyan gyis g.yogs pa'i con pan nam/ yang na spyi gtsug tu ring bsrel gzhag par byas la/ tsan dan dkar po'i dkyil 'khor bya zhing gur

kum dang / gla rtsi dang / ga pur gyis mchod la dkyil 'khor gyi snying po 'di'i dbus su pad ma ge sar dang bcas pa'i 'dab ma sum bcu rtsa gnyis pa bris la de'i dbus su 'jigs pa med pas 'jig rten dbang

phyug dar gyi cod pan gyis bcings pa gzhag la/ a ga ru dang / tsan dan gyi bdug pa dbul zhing me tog dgram par bya/ me tog gi phreng bas mchod par bya'o/ /rig sngags 'chang gtsang mar gyur pa shin du khrus byas pa gos

gtsang ma bgos pas/ smyung ba byas la mgon po 'jig rten dbang phyug la mngon du phyogs par skyil mo dkrung bcas te 'dug la mchod yon dang / lha bshos phul la byams pa'i sems la mnyam par gzhag ste/ sangs rgyas

rjes su dran pa bsgom mo/ /sems can thams cad la brtse bar gyur pa'i ting nge 'dzin yang bsgom zhing shin du yongs su sbyar ba legs par spyod cing gzhan 'jigs pa med pas bdag bsrung ba dang / phyogs bcing ba dang /

dkyil 'khor bcing ba bsrung ba dang bcas pa yang byas la bzlas brjod de nyid stong rtsa brgyad dang / phyag rgya yang stong rtsa brgyad brtsams na 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'bar zhing g.yo ba dang / bdag kyang 'bar ba dang snying

dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mchog sbyin par mdzad pa'i phyag spyi bor gzhag ste legs so legs so/ /rig sngags 'chang khyod kyis mchod pa dam pa dang / gsang sngags kyi cho ga

chen po byas so/ /sgrub pa dam pa byas so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyi rigs 'di dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs thams cad kyi cho ga zhib mo gsang ba dang / phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga dang /

thams cad du spyi'i dngos grub rig sngags 'chang khyod la 'grub kyis/ khyod kyis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po rjes su zung shig dang / rig sngags 'chang ji ltar yid la byed pa de ltar 'dod pa dang / mchog thams cad

ji ltar yid la bsams pa de thams cad rjes su sbyin no/ /'di ni khyod kyi skye ba'i 'khor ba tha ma yin te skye ba dang / rga ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mngal du gnas pa las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags 'chang khyod shi 'phos nas bde ba can

'jig rten gyi khams su pad ma las skye bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyur/ mngon sum du chos nyan par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub kyi snying po la gnas kyi bar tshe'i tshad bskal pa brgya stong

dpag tu med grangs med bgrang du med par 'gyur ro zhes tshig tu gsung ngo / /de nas rig sngags 'chang gis khro bo'i rgyal po me tog gam/ cod pan la mngon par gtor na/ des na 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rang

gi skur bzhugs te/ rig sngags 'chang nam mkha' la 'gro zhing don yod pa'i ye shes bkod pa dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob bo/ /yangs pa chen pos rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor don yod pa'i zhags pa'i

dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro/ /sku gzugs bsgrub pa de kho na nyid ces pa 'di gal te rig sngags 'chang skal ba chung ba mnar med par gzhol ba/ mtshams med pa lnga byed pas de lan cig nges par bsgrubs pa tsam gyis

mdun du rang gi gzugs kyis nges par mchis par 'gyur ro/ /gal te de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas la sdang bas khrag dbyung bar sems bskyed pa des kyang de bzhin gshegs

pa thams cad dang / dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis dgongs pa'i dam tshig chen po'i byin gyis brlabs de rig sngags 'chang bsgrub na rmi lam du bdag gi gzugs mthong ba stsal bar bgyi zhing yid la

bsams pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o/ /mchog thams cad rjes su stsal bar bgyi zhing sdig pa'i sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag par bgyi'o/ /dri ma med par rnam par thar pa'i 'od zer gyi dkyil 'khor la rnam

par lta ba zhes bya ba ting nge 'dzin 'thob bo/ /sad nas 'jig rten pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i 'os chen po gcig pur 'gyur ro/ /skye bo thams cad kyis mchod par bya ba chen por 'gyur ro/ /sgrib pa dang bral zhing

rnam par dag pa/ sgo kun du dri ma med par snang ba zhes bya ba'i lus yongs su dag pa 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /sems can gang dag gis de mthong bar gyur pa de dag thams cad sgrib pa dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /nad thams cad dang bral zhing

nyon mongs pa dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /gdol pas kyang dad pa dang / gus pas sgrub pa rnam pa gsum dang / cho ga gzhan gyis kyang nges par yid la bsams pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyi/ rang gi gzugs kyis

mthong ba stsal bar bgyi na/ mir gyur pa dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba sdom brtson can gyis lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te/ dran pa tsam gyis bdag rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na mchis par bgyi zhing yid la bsams pa thams cad

yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ste/ 'di la the tsom dang yid gnyis bskyed par mi bya'o/ /de lta mod kyi bcom ldan 'das sems can tshe gcig pu pa de la rig sngags bsgrub pa'i dngos grub rjes su stsal bar bdag gis rngo mi thog lags

so/ /gang yang phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na dge slong dag dang / rig sngags 'chang ba'i sems can ser sna can/ sems gya gyu ba/ gnyis su mi byed pa/ ngo gnyis can/ ser sna can/ byas pa mi gzo ba/ pha rol
gyi rdzas la brkam chags can/ gsang sngags rku ba/ yi ge rku ba/ gdug pa/ phrag dog che ba/ khangs pa/ gzhan gyi rdzas 'phrog pa/ mkhan po dang slob dpon phyag rgya dang dkyil 'khor ston
pa'i bla ma la ma gus pa/ rig sngags kyi cho ga zhib mo 'di ston pa la ma gus pa nyid brkam chags can/ byas pa mi gzo ba nyid dag 'byung ste/ sems can de dag la bskyang bar bstan pa 'am/ dngos grub

bstan par rngo mi thog lags so/ /bdag la yang brnyas par bgyid pa'i sems can de lta bu mang du 'byung ste/ bdag la yang sun par bgyid pa/ bdag la yang ma gus par bgyid pa/ kun nas mnar sems dang sdang bas

khrag 'byin par bgyid pa dag 'byung ngo / /bdag la yang 'khrug par bgyid pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dang / spyi'i rigs kyi dam tshig sun par bgyid pa'i sems can de ni smad par
'os pa zhes brjod par bgyi'o/ /rig sngags kyi cho ga zhib mo dang / dam tshig kun nas 'joms par bgyid pa'i gdol pa zhes rig par bgyi'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba kun nas 'joms pa
zhes rig par bgyi'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po dang / gsang ba dang / dkyil 'khor kun nas 'joms pa zhes rig par bgyi'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dam tshig dang / gsang
ba dang / rig sngags 'chang gi dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya kun nas 'joms pa zhes rig par bgyi'o/ /de dag gis bdag la smad pas sems can de dag gi sdig pas gdol pa zhes bgyi ste/ dge slong dag

dang / rig sngags 'chang de dag ni smad par 'os par rig par bgyi'o/ /tshig pa ka ba tshig pa lta bu/ rig sngags nyams pa/ log 'dren gyis zin pa dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad kyis smad pa zhes bgyi'o/ /
'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa chud gzan pa/ rig sngags nyams pa/ dmyal bar gzhol ba de dag ni bdag gis ma nongs te/ bdag gis yongs su spangs pa ma lags so/ /de lta mod kyi
dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su spangs pa/ dus gsum du gshegs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yongs su spangs pa/ rdo rje'i dam tshig dang / dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya thams

cad spangs pa/ thub pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi dam tshig chen po'i dkyil 'khor dang / dam tshig yongs su spangs pas bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad dang / sdang ba thams cad kyis zin cing nad kyis yongs

su zin par 'gyur ba de dag ni bdag gis ma nongs te/ bdag gis yongs su ma spangs so/ /de lta mod kyi rig sngags bsregs pa/ dkyil 'khor dang dam tshig bsregs pa/ phyag rgya byed pa dang bcas par bsregs pa/ gsang ba

bsregs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam tshig dang rigs sun par byed pa/ sdig pa'i dge slong mang po de dag ni des na bskal pa mang po rdul phra mo bsags pa'i bskal par sdug bsngal nyams su myong ste/ 'jig rten 'di

dang 'jig rten pha rol gyi bde ba can med do/ /de lta bas na sems can rig sngags kyi ched du rig sngags rjes su sems pas byams pa'i sems su bya'o/ /gang gi drung du phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags rim par phye ba dang / rig sngags gsang

ba rnyed par 'gyur ba de la des gus pa chen po dang / bla mar bgyi ba chen po bskyed par bgyi/ pha dang ma dang 'dra ba'i sems bskyed par bgyi/ pha dang ma'i gus pa bgyi/ ston pa'i gus pa bgyi/ rang gi sha dang / khrag dang /

rkang yang gtang bar bgyi/ gos dang / rgyan dang / btung ba dang / stan dang / bgo bas rim gro dang mchod pa bgyi ste/ de la ni bdag gis mchod par bgyi/ rjed pa dang bla mar bgyi'o/ /rtag tu rjes su 'brang bar bgyi/

dran pa tsam gyis kyang bdag gi gzugs mthong ba rjes su stsal bar bgyi/ rgyun du rjes su 'brang bar bgyi/ bdag rgyun du rjes su 'brang ba ni ji ltar chab kyi nang du til mar gyi thigs pa stsal ba ltar dngos grub kun du mchi bar
bgyi/ rgya mtsho'i dus rlabs bzhin du thams cad du mchi bar bgyi'o/ /bdag gis zhags pa dang / lcags kyus dmyal ba thams cad drang bar bgyi/ bde bar gshegs pa'i lam la so sor gzhag par bgyi/

stobs dang / brtson 'grus dang / gzi brjid chen po 'jug par bgyi/ thams cad du bsgrub pa dang / dngos grub dang / mchog stsal bar bgyi'o/ /de nas tsan dan gyi gzugs 'di mthong bas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs

dbang phyug nyid kyi gzugs mthong ste/ de mtshungs par 'tshal bar bgyi ste bdag ni rang gi gzugs kyis rgyun kho nar gnas par bgyi'o/ /gang na cho ga 'di gnas pa de mchod rten dang bcas par mtshungs par rig par bgyi'o/ /sa

phyogs de ni ston pa bla ma bzhugs pa'i gnas su rig par bgyi'o/ /gang na dus gsum du gshegs pa'i spyi'i dam tshig gnas pa 'di sangs rgyas kyi gnas so zhes rig par bgyi'o/ /de gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor rmad

du byung ba zhes rig par bgyi'o/ /lha thams cad kyi gnas dang dam tshig go zhes rig par bgyi'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs thams cad kyi gnas byang chub kyi snying po dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang /

bdud 'dul ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po yang dag par ston pa'i gnas so zhes rig par bgyi'o/ /sa phyogs 'di rin po che sna bdun gyi gzhal med khang gi gnas bkod pas brgyan par rig par

bgyi ste/ de la the tsom dang yid gnyis bskyed par mi bya'o/ /de nas de'i 'og tu gnas thams cad du gtogs pa'i dngos grub chen po sgyu ma chen po'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i gnas byed par 'dod pa dang / dgos pa
thams cad byed par 'dod na rig sngags 'chang des dri sna tshogs las 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs sor bcu drug pa shin du mdzes pa/ sku shin du tshad dang ldan pa/ phyag drug pa/ de
bzhin du zhal gsum pa bya ste/ dang po ni zhi ba'i zhal ras can tshangs pa'i cha byad 'chang ba/ spyan gsum pa/ ral pa'i thor tshugs kyis brgyan pa/ 'od dpag med pa'i dbu rgyan 'chang ba/ zla
gam can no/ /zhal g.yas pa ni khro bo'i rgyal po gzugs can/ gzugs bsgyur ba/ spyan gsum pa/ ral pa'i thor tshugs kyi steng gi ral pa la 'od dpag med pa'i dbu rgyan 'chang ba/ zla gam
g.yas phyogs na gnas pa'o/ /g.yon pa ni zhal khro gnyer can/ khros pa'i lta stangs su lta ba/ spyan gsum pa/ ral pa'i thor tshugs 'chang ba/ 'od dpag med pa'i dbu rgyan 'chang ba/ g.yas phyogs zla
gam can/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis legs par brgyan pa/ zhags pa thogs pa/ pad ma thogs pa/ mdung rtse gsum pa thogs pa/ dgra sta thogs pa/ dbugs 'byin pa/ rin

po che'i dbyug pa thogs pa/ pad ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa'o/ /g.yas na lha mo sgrol ma thal mo sbyar cing 'dud pa'o/ /g.yon na dkar mo thal mo sbyar te yid tsam du 'dud pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/
me tog sna tshogs kyis legs par brgyan par bya'o/ /zhabs kyi drung du rig sngags 'chang gser gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ lag na me tog thogs pa/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la kha bltas
nas pus mo btsugs te 'dug par bya'o/ /tshon rtsi tshad dang tshad ma 'dres par spyan dang / smin ma dang / mchu dang / sen mo'i gnas kyis gnas su sbyar bar bya'o// //'phags pa
don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po/ bam po nyi shu pa/ de nas rdzas bshad par bya ste/ 'jigs pa med pas spos kyi rigs tsan dan dang / ta ga ra dang / pu shel tsi dang /

li shi dang / nA ga pus pa dang / spri ka dang / rgya skyegs dang / kha bar Ni kha dang / spang spos dang / na la da dang / gur kum dang / gla rtsi dang / ga bur dang / sgron shing dang / gan da pri yang ku dang /

kun du ru dang / sha kha ra dang / pad ma ge sar dang / du ru ka dang / til mar dang / spra tshil dang / lhan cig sbyar ba'i phye ma zhib mo shin du 'jam pa/ shin du mnyen pa/ mchog 'di gtsang ma gtsang sbra spyod pas

thub pa/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dge zhing shin du dul ba/ rab tu zhi ba'i rnam par shin du mdzes par bya'o/ /gsang sngags brgyad stong bzlas brjod byas pas/ lan cig bsgrubs pa ni mchog yin

te/ 'di yongs su rdzogs nas khro bo'i rgyal pos thams cad la mngon du gtor te de nas rig sngags 'chang gis las brtsam mo/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang gtsang mar gyur pas gos gtsang ma bgos te/ shin du khrus
byas la dris byugs pas dkyil 'khor gru bzhi shin du mdzes pa gsal ba/ ko la'i tshad tsam gyi dkyil 'khor bzang po legs par byugs pa shin du gsal ba bya'o/ /dri sna tshogs kyis byugs pa shin du

'jam pa la tsan dan dkar po dang / gur kum gyis dbus su las kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par phye ba bri bar bya'o/ /'dir ni pad ma yang byas te/ 'dab ma brgya rtsa brgyad pa ge sar dang snying por bcas pa/ shin du mdzes

pa/ shin du bzang ba/ tsan dan dang gur gum gyis bri bar bya ste/ der tshon rtsi gzhan ni spyad par mi bya'o/ /bum pa spos chus bkang ba dang / de bzhin du dri chu dang / gtor ma dang / gtor ma thams cad dri sna
tshogs kyis bsgos pa dang / ci yod pa'i gtor ma gzhag ste/ de nas 'dir dkyil 'khor bya ba ni gnas sam dgon pa 'am/ khyim mam gang du gnas par gyur pa der khru gang tshad dam khru do 'am khru gsum

mam lhag par yang bya'o/ /de bzhin du bdug spos dang / tsan dan dang / a ga ru dang / du ru ka dang / kun du ru'o/ /ba dan kha dog sna tshogs pas dkyil 'khor kun nas brgyan par bya'o/ /me tog phreng ba

dgram zhing / /dri dang byug pa de nyid dang / /kun du mar me'i phreng ba'o/ /de nas dri las byas pa'i 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su pad ma'i ge sar gyi steng du gzhag pa la/ rig

sngags 'chang mngon du phyogs par skyil mo dkrung bcas te 'dug nas gzhan mi smra bar bzlas brjod brgyad stong brtsam par bya'o/ /brgyad stong rdzogs pa dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi sku las 'od zer sna tshog+sa

'byung zhing cher g.yo bar 'gyur/ rang gi lag pa g.yas pa 'bar bar 'gyur ro/ /gzugs brnyan las rig sngags 'chang legs so/ /khyod kyis 'dod pa'i las thams cad grub bo/ /don yod pa chen po'i 'khor lo rnam par

'phrul pa'i dngos grub dang / thams cad du dgos pa grub pa de kho na nyid grub bo/ /khyod kyis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po 'di mchog tu grub bo/ /khyod kyis sgrub pa'i cho ga rgya cher mchog tu grub bo zhes sgra 'byung ngo / /

de nas rig sngags 'chang gis dgos pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga ji ltar dgos par bya ste/ slob ma gzhug pa dang / dam tshig ni 'dir dgos pa zhes bya'o/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang gis gang gi

tshe dgos pa byung ba de'i tshe dri las byas pa'i mgon po la sngar mchod pa bya ste/ de nas dgos pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mdun du gzhag la/ bzlas brjod brgyad

brgya byas na dgos pa sna tshogs rmi lam du ston cing ji ltar bsams pa thams cad ston par 'gyur ro/ /de'i mdun du tsan dan dkar po las dkyil 'khor byas la/ tsan dan dkar po'i sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad bya'o/ /de nas

thal ba la bzlas brjod lan brgya rtsa brgyad bya ste/ rang gi lus mtha' dag khyab par bsku zhing / thal ba de nyid dang / yungs kar gyi byug pa phyogs bzhir gtor na 'jig rten dbang phyug gi gzugs ji lta ba de ltar

'jig rten thams cad kyis mngon sum du mthong ste/ ji srid du phyir bsdu ba ma byas pa de srid du 'jig rten dbang phyug gi gzugs su snang bar 'gyur ro/ /dri chu dang yungs kar gyis mngon du gtor na phyir bsdu ba byas par 'gyur ro/ /thal

ba des rab tu bdugs te dur khrod kyi nang du zhugs na 'byung po'i dpung dang 'khor dang bcas pa mdun na nye bar gnas par 'gyur ro/ /gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha za thams cad mdun na nye bar gnas shing dbang du gyur nas

gnas te/ bdag dang nor gyis bgyi ba ci mchis shes bya ba byed do/ /rang la byugs te tshogs kyi nang ngam/ dge 'dun gyi nang du zhugs na ston pa mthong ba ji ltar rig sngags 'chang snang zhing mthong ste/ mchod pa'i 'os chen por

'gyur ro/ /phyag bya ba'i 'os su 'gyur/ don dang mchod pa chen po 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /thal bas lus bskus te klu'i mtshor zhugs na klu'i rgyal po stong phrag drug bcu rtsa brgyad thams cad dbang du gyur nas gnas te bka'

bzhin byed par 'gyur zhing ji srid 'tsho'i bar du nye bar gnas par 'gyur ro/ /rang la byugs te rgyal po'i pho brang du zhugs na/ rgyal po btsun mo dang 'khor du bcas pa rnams dbang du 'gyur te/ ci bgyi zhes bya ba byed cing mdun na

nye bar gnas par 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten gyi bla ma ji lta ba de bzhin du mchod pa chen po 'byung bar 'gyur/ don chen po dang mchod pa chen po 'thob par 'gyur/ ji srid 'tsho'i bar du nye bar gnas par 'gyur te/ ston pa 'dren

pa ji lta ba bzhin no/ /gang dang gang la thal bas reg pa tsam gyis de dang de'i nad thams cad bral bar 'gyur/ sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur ngan 'gro'i sgo thams cad gcad par 'gyur/
mchog tu bde ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /shi 'phos nas bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skye bar 'gyur ro/ /byas pa mi gzo ba/ gsang sngags kyi gdol pa/ ma gus pa/ bla mar mi byed pa/ rlom

sems can/ nga rgyal dang ldan pa/ bdud kyi phyogs pa/ skyes bu gti mug can/ bsogs pa la zhen pa/ khengs pa/ nga rgyal can de dag gis gang du yang dngos grub yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /de dag yun

ring por thar pa mi rnyed pas dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / gang yang rig sngags kyi dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams kyis smad pa/ skye ba brgyud par rang gi rgyud la dngos grub bsregs pa/ 'jig rten

'di dang pha rol chud gson pa dag ni ma gtogs te/ de lta mod kyi 'dir bdag gis cung zad kyang ma nongs te/ sdug bsngal mang po dang chen po'i sems can dgrol bar rngo mi thog lags so/ /sangs rgyas thugs rje chen pos bka'

stsal pa'i yid la bgyi ba bskal pa bgrangs par yid la bgyis pas dgrol bar rngo mi thog lags so/ /de lta mod kyi sdug bsngal mang po brgyud par nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro/ /dngos grub ni byams pas 'thob ste/ byams pa dang /

gsang sngags kyi go cha bgos pa/ byams pa'i ral gri thogs pa/ sems can thams cad la phan zhing mnyes gshin pa la de kho na nyid sgrub pa'i dngos grub 'di dag 'jig rten 'dren pas rjes su gnang ngo / /mgon po 'di

mthong ba tsam gyis spos kyi gzugs kyi 'jig rten mgon po mthong ba dang / 'jig rten 'dren pa rang gi gzugs su mngon sum du mthong ba mtshungs pa nyid du khong du chud par bgyi'o/ /sangs rgyas bye ba gang gA'i klung gi bye

ma dang mnyam pa mngon sum du mthong ba kho na dang / 'jig rten gyi mgon po mthong ba mtshungs pa kho nar khong du chud par bgyi ste/ 'di ltar shes par bya'o/ /de nas phyir mi ldog pa'i gnas rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los
sgyur ba chen po sgrub par 'dod pa'i dge slong ngam/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ rgyal po 'am/ blon po chen po 'am/ rig sngags 'chang ngam/ gzhan gang yang rung ba'i rig sngags 'chang gis

phyir mi ldog pa'i gnas thob par 'dod pa dang / dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas mthong bar 'dod pa dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gnas mthong bar 'dod pa dang / rig sngags 'chang gi

dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad mthong bar 'dod pa dang / 'phags pa rdo rje 'dzin mthong bar 'dod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs thams cad kyi spyi'i dam tshig mthong bar 'dod na cho ga 'di bsgrub par bya ste/ snying po

dang bcas/ bya ba dang bcas pa des myur ba dang / shin du myur ba dang / mgyogs par 'jig rten thams cad kyi mngon sum du cho 'phrul rmad du byung ba gsang ba ston par mthong ste/ 'di la som nyi dang nem nur bskyed par mi

bya'o/ /the tsom dang yid gnyis bskyed par mi bya'o/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang gis 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gser gyi mdog can sor bzhi'i tshad tsam/ tshangs pa'i cha byad 'chang ba/ ral pa'i

thor tshugs kyis brgyan pa bya ste/ shin du tshad dang ldan pa/ cha byad mdzes pa/ cha shin du rnam par mdzes pa/ phyag gnyis pa/ spyan gsum pa/ 'od dpag med pa'i dbu rgyan can/ g.yas na zla ba tshes pa/ phyag

g.yon na pad ma dang / ril ba spyi blugs bsnams pa/ phyag g.yas mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa/ sku'i nang ga bur dang / gla rtsi dang ring bsrel gyis bkang ba/ g.yas na lha mo sgrol ma dngul las byas pa thal mo sbyar te yid tsam

'dud pa/ gser gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang / g.yon na dngul las dkar mo thal mo sbyar te yid tsam 'dud pa pad ma'i gdan la bzhugs par bya'o/ /steng gi g.yas phyogs na 'od dpag med skyil mo dkrung bcas te
bzhugs pa dang / g.yon na shAkya'i rgyal po skyil mo dkrung bcas te bzhugs pa dgod par bya'o/ /'od 'dom gang dang bcas pas legs par brgyan par bya zhing / gnad dang gnad shin du rnam par dbyes pa/

skra dang / dpral ba dang / smin ma dang / shangs dang / snyan dang / zhal dang / mgul pa dang / dpung pa dang / nu ma dang / rked pa dang / brla dang / pus mo dang / byin pa dang / zhabs dang / phyag gi sor mo mnyam

zhing thams cad du mdzes pa/ sku chu zheng gab cing mtho dman ran pa/ mchod phyir dkar po thogs pa 'chang ba bya'o/ /las shin du yongs su rdzogs shing shin du mthar phyin pa dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug

gi gzugs zin par rig nas/ de nas rig sngags 'chang gis rgyu skar bzang po'i zla ba nya 'am/ tshes brgyad dam/ bcwa lnga 'am/ bcu gsum mam/ bcu bzhi 'am/ rgyu skar bkra shis pa rgyal gyi nyi ma dang mthun pa

rnyed nas dkyil 'khor bsgrub par bya ste/ dkyil 'khor shin du mdzes par bya ba ni gru bzhi la cha legs par phye ba/ ko la'i tshad tsam la them skas bzhis brgyan pa/ khru gsum par rnam par dbye bar bya ste/ chung ba dang

lhag par ni mi bya'o/ /legs par byugs pa shin du 'jam pa/ snyi ba/ mnyen pa/ dbyibs legs pa la tshon rtsi sna tshogs kyis rnam par dbye zhing dkyil 'khor dam pa thig gdab pa ni shin du rnam par mdzes pa/

sgo bzhi pa la dkyil 'khor gyi dbus kyi snying por pad ma'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor don yod pa'i zhags pa'i dkyil 'khor bri'o/ /phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor gyi gnas su cha rnam pa brgyad du phye la/ lho'i grwa'i gnas

su de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs tshon sna tshogs kyis bri'o/ /de nas byang gi grwar bri ba ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor tshon rtsi sna tshogs kyis rnam par bkra bar bri'o/ /de nas nub kyi grwar bri ba ni nor bu'i rigs

kyi dkyil 'khor sna tshogs kyis rnam par bkra bar bri'o/ /de nas shar gyi grwar glang po che'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor tshon rtsi sna tshogs kyis rtag tu shin du mdzes pa dang / shin du gsal bar bri'o/ /shar phyogs kyi sgor

ri po ta la me tog dang shing ljon pa sna tshogs kyis legs par brgyan pa ri'i lha dang bcas pa bri'o/ /lho phyogs kyi sgor ri rab klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang nye dga' bos kun nas dkris pa dang / sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i ris kyi lha bri'o/ /

byang phyogs kyi sgor ni spos kyi ngad ldang dri za'i tshogs kyis gang ba shing ljon pa sna tshogs kyis shin du mdzes pa bri'o/ /nub phyogs kyi sgor ri ti se lha rnams kyi gnas me tog sna tshogs dang / 'khri shing dang / shing ljon pa sna

tshogs mchog gis rtag tu gang ba bri'o/ /legs par zin nas kun du ni mdung rtse gsum pa'i bar phreng ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su de bzhin gshegs pa dang / rdo rje'i rigs nyid gzhag go/ nor bu'i rigs

su de bzhin gshegs pa gzhag cing de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dang / thams cad du rdo rje 'dzin pa gzhag na spyi'i rigs 'grub po/ /lha mo sgrol ma ni ri po ta la la gzhag go/ ri rab la ni gos dkar mo'o/ /dpe med ma ni

ti se'i rtse mor ro/ /sgrol ma bdun ni spos kyi ngad ldang la gzhag go/ shar phyogs kyi sgor pho nya mo zhi ba pho nya mo bdun gyis yongs su bskor ba'o/ /lho phyogs kyi sgor ni srin mo ral pa gcig ma srin mo bdun gyis yongs

su bskor ba'o/ /nub phyogs kyi sgor rdo rje lu gu rgyud lu gu rgyud bdun gyis yongs su bskor ba'o/ /byang phyogs kyi sgor khro gnyer can mo khro gnyer can bdun gyis yongs su bskor ba'o/ /de nas 'jigs pa med pas

mgon po 'jig rten gyi bla ma'i gzugs gser gyi mdog can ring bsrel dang ldan pa don yod pa'i rgyal po rnam par 'phrul pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi snying po pad ma rgya chen po'i dkyil 'khor du gzhag par bya'o/ /grwar rgyal po chen

po bzhi stobs po che go cha bgos pa/ drag shul gyi gzugs can/ mtshon cha 'bar ba thogs pa gzhag par bya'o/ /gang zhig thub pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi sprul pa/ spyi'i rigs yang dag par 'byung ba/ don yod pa'i rgyal po rnam

par 'phrul pa/ 'jig rten dbang phyug mchog sbyin pa dang bcas pa/ don yod pa'i zhags pa rnam par 'phrul pa bsgrub pa'i ched du cho ga sna tshogs dran par bya'o/ /sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /rnam thar dkyil 'khor

de nyid ni/ /legs par sgrub pa mthong tsam dang / /bklags pas dngos grub bla med 'gyur/ /de bas rtag tu 'bad pa yis/ /sgrub par byed pa mi mkhas so/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang gtsang mar gyur pa shin du khrus byas pa gos gtsang

ma bgos pas dar dang ba dan sna tshogs bzang pos dkyil 'khor brgyan par bya'o/ /ro bro ba'i mchog rgya chen pos snod sna tshogs legs par bkang ba dang / gser dang dngul gyi snod du mchod yon dbul zhing ro sna tshogs kyi
gtor ma gzhag par bya'o/ /gzugs rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i kha zas kyi gtor ma bo/ /

me tog sna tshogs bkram zhing gtor ma sna tshogs kyis bkang ba dang / bum pa dang / rdze'u dang / phor zlum dang / kham phor dang / dbyib mo dag kyang dgang ngo / /kun du dri chus bsgos pa yi/ /rgya chen gtor ma kun

du'o/ /sna tshogs pa yi pog phor nas/ /sna tshogs bdug spos dbul ba ni/ /a ga ru dang / tsan dan dang / sprig ka dang / du ru ka dang / kun du ru dang / gu gul dang / sgron shing dang / shri be Sha dang / sa ra

dang / sa ra dza ra sa dang / de bzhin du ga bur dang / gla rtsi dang / gur kum dang / sha kha ra kha'i bdug spos 'di dag ni rab tu phul/ thams cad du sgrub pa bla na med pa yin no/ /sna tshogs pa yi dri dag dang / /phye ma byug pa

sna tshogs nyid/ /shes rab can gyis kun du ni/ /dkyil 'khor dag la gzhag par bya/ /lha rdzas kyi rin po che sna bdun gyi me tog dang / dngul gyi me tog dang / zangs kyi me tog dang / byi ru dang ni mu tig dang / in dra nI la dag dang ni/ pad

ma rA ga dag kyang ngo / /gser dang dngul gyi bum pa rin po che sna bdun can yang gru bzhir gzhag par bya'o/ /'bras yos dang / yungs kar dang bsres pas dkyil 'khor kun du gtor ro/ /kun nas me tog phreng ba ni/ /rmad byung dkyil 'khor la gzhag

cing / /kun nas mar me'i phreng ba yang / /dkyil 'khor rmad du byung la bzhag /rig sngags 'chang nyin gzhag gcig gnas par gyur pas yang bzlas brjod rgya cher byas la cho gas bsrung ba dang / phyogs bcings ba dang / kun nas dkyil 'khor

bcing ba byas la dkyil 'khor gyi las bya'o/ /de nas slob ma gzhug par bya ste/ bla ma mkhan po 'am/ slob dpon nam/ pha 'am/ rgyal po 'am/ blon po chen po la dam tshig dang / phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor gsang ba bstan te/

mgon po 'jig rten gyis bla ma mthong zhing dkyil 'khor rmad du byung ba mthong nas phyag bya zhing mchod pa dang / me tog dang / bdug spos dbul ba byas la bskor ba bya'o/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang gis thams cad la byams pa'i sems

mnyam par gzhag ste/ skyil mo dkrung bcas nas 'dug la mi smra bar ya mtshan du snang bar mthong gi bar du don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po bzlas brjod byas la dkyil 'khor kun du khro bo'i rgyal pos lan brgya rtsa brgyad dbang bskur zhing

yungs kar dang / chu dang me tog gis dkyil 'khor kun du lan brgya rtsa brgyad gtor ba'i mod la rtag tu phyag rgya lan brgyad brgyad bcings la dkyil 'khor kun du me tog dang / bdug spos dang / dri phul nas mgon po 'jig rten dbang

phyug don yod pa'i zhags pa mthong na don yod pa nyid mchod par bya'o/ /de nas mgon po phyag na rdo rje dang / rig sngags kyi rgyal po bla na med pa mchod pa byed do/ /de nas lha mo sgrol ma dang / kun du lha mo thams cad la'o/ /

de nas dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad la'o/ /de nas ri'i rgyal po rnams la gnas pa'i ri'i lha thams cad la'o/ /thams cad dang sgo srungs la rtag tu mchod pa bya'o/ /de nas phyogs bzhi kun du rig sngags 'chang

gis rtag tu mchod nas skyil mo dkrung bcas te 'dug la 'jigs pa med pas lag pa'i phyag rgya bcing bar bya'o/ /byams pa'i sems dang snying rje'i lhag pa'i bsam pa nyid kyis don yod pa'i zhags pa rtag tu dran par bya

zhing sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom mo/ /gsang sngags brjod ma thag tu dkyil 'khor dang sa gzhi g.yo zhing gang dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa'i mod la snying dga' ba dang / sems bde ba 'thob bo/ /'od zer bye ba kha dog sna tshogs rnam par

bkra ba 'byung zhing dkyil 'khor gyi snying po na don yod pa'i zhags pa 'gul bar 'gyur/ dkyil 'khor gyi snying po 'bar bar 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / de bzhin du phyag na rdo rje 'bar bar 'gyur/ dkyil 'khor la gnas

pa'i lha/ lha mo thams cad 'bar bar 'gyur/ lha g.yo bar 'gyur zhing dkyil 'khor kun nas legs so zhes sgra grag par 'gyur ro/ /de nas ji ltar gser bkod pa de ltar dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi snying po dang / mgon po de

bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug dang / phyag na rdo rje dang / sgrol ma dang / dkar mo gser gyi mdog gis bkod pa chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi nang nas bzhengs par 'gyur/
sku gser mdog can gzugs bzang pos bdag nyid kyi rang gi ngo bo ston pa snang bar 'gyur/ phyogs bcu kun du rtag tu gzigs par 'gyur ro/ /thams cad du rtag tu sems brtan por bya ste/ rig sngags 'chang

byams pa dang bcas pa'i sems brtan por gyur pas me tog dang rol mo'i sgra dbul zhing don yod pa'i rgyal po yang dran par bya'o/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pas phyag gser gyi mdog can brkyang ste/ rig sngags 'chang gi

spyi bor gzhag nas legs so zhes bya ba sbyin par mdzad cing rig sngags 'chang khyod kyis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po dang / cho ga zhib mo mtha' dag dang / dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya rim par phye ba grub ste/

skyes bu dam pa khyod bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su lung bstan gyis rang gi ngo bo nyid kyis yongs su dag nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du skyes bu dam pa khyod rang

gi ngo bo phyir mi ldog pa dang / don yod pa'i rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur bar byos shig /dkyil 'khor 'di la brten pa'i skye bo dge ba dang lhag pa'i bsam pa la zhugs pa/ sems can thams cad bla na med pa'i mya ngan

las 'das par lung bstan gyi bar du phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro/ /ji ste sems can ngan pa rig sngags kyi gdol pa dag der zhugs na gzugs brnyan las khrag 'dzag cing sgra mi zad pa 'byung ste/ mgon po 'di mi mthong / sa 'di

g.yo bar mi 'gyur/ dkyil 'khor 'di 'bar bar mi 'gyur te/ de'i tshe rig sngags 'chang la rmi lam du ston te de nyid kyang gzhan du mi 'gyur ro/ /ji ltar mngon sum pa de bzhin du rmi lam du ston cing yid la bsams pa thams cad yongs

su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /de lta bas na rig sngags 'chang gis legs par brtag cing so sor brtags te/ sems can dkyil 'khor du zhugs par bya'o/ /sgrub pa po bden par smra ba dang / dbang po yang dag par bsdams pa/

sems can thams cad la byams pa/ sems can thams cad la brtse ba can/ gzhan la yang dag par smra ba/ tshig brtags pa dad pa can/ gus pa dang ldan pa nyid/ mar 'dzin pa/ phar 'dzin pa/ dkon mchog gsum la mchog tu gus pa/

rtag tu bla ma la gus pa nyid kyi sems can 'di dag gzhug par bya'o/ /rab tu bag yod pa dang / rtag tu gtsang zhing gtsang sbra dang ldan pa dang / kha zas ngan pa dang / lhag ma dang / 'bags pa dang / 'dres pa dang / gcig tu bsres pa dang / chung zad bkrus

pa dang / chang dang / sha dang / kun dong dang / sgog skya dang / ki'u dang bsres pa'i kha zas dag spang bar bya zhing / rang gi kha 'phro yang spang bar bya'o/ /lhag ma ni rtag tu spang bar bya ste/ 'di dag sgrub pa'i cho ga la dran par bya'o/ /lag pa 'bags pas gdong la reg par

mi bya/ lhung bzed dor bar mi bya'o/ /rtag tu kham phyed phyed du gcod pa dang / mchog tu 'bags pa 'di dag nam yang bza' bar mi bya'o/ /gtsang mas zas gtsang ma bza' zhing lag pa'i sor mo bsdams pas kha gdong

la sogs pa la mi reg par 'di dag za ba nyid ni mchog tu mdzes shing blo dang ldan pa yin no/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang gis las shin du yongs su rdzogs par byas shing dkyil 'khor gyi bya ba legs par rdzogs na de la khrag 'dzag par mi

'gyur ro/ /de nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi phyag brkyang bas rig sngags 'chang gi lag pa nas gzung nas dkyil 'khor gyi nang du 'jug par mdzad cing shin tu ni dri ma med par snang ba zhes bya ba'i nor bu nyid kyi mgul pa nas

bkrol te rig sngags 'chang gi mgul du 'dogs par mdzad do/ /spyi bor phyag 'jog par mdzad cing 'di la sras kyi thu bo zhes gsung ngo / /mgul par nor bu bcings pa tsam gyi mod la de nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs

pa thams cad kyi spyi'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i dam tshig dang dkyil 'khor mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du rigs thams cad du don yod pa'i rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro/ /don yod

pa'i rgyal po'i cho ga zhib mo dang / dkyil 'khor chen po rtag tu mngon du 'gyur zhing rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo nyid smin mtshams na 'dug par 'gyur ro/ /rgya chen po dri ma med par snang ba don yod pa'i ye shes rnam par 'phrul pa zhes bya

ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob ste/ gang ting nge 'dzin rjes su thob pas 'jig rten pa thams cad kyi dngos grub rnam par 'phrul pa'i cho 'phrul ston par 'gyur ro/ /phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor dang / cho ga zhib mo dang / sgrub pa dang / dam tshig

dang / gsang ba thams cad kyi mthu chen po ston par 'gyur ro/ /don yod pa chen po'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad ston par 'gyur ro/ /don yod pa'i dam tshig gi byin gyis brlabs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i

gsang ba'i dam tshig mtha' yas pa thob ste/ gang dam tshig thob pas dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig dang mtshungs par shes par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam tshig mnyam pa nyid kyi rnam par 'phrul pa ston par 'gyur

ro/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'i bya ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byas nas spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ring srel dang bcas pa de yang sa phyogs dben pa'i gnas gtsang mar gos gtsang ma'i gdan bshams la de'i steng du

gzhag par bya'o/ /a ga ru'i bdug spos 'bul zhing nyin gcig bzhin du nang par sngar gzhan mi smra bar bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad bya ste/ rig sngags kyi rgyal pos mchod pa dbul bar bya'o/ /de nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug

gi gzugs brnyan 'bar bar 'gyur te/ nyin gcig bzhin du 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gzugs brnyan smra bar 'gyur/ tshig 'byin par 'gyur ro/ /da ltar gyi bzhin du de thams cad smra bar 'gyur te/ dge ba dang / mi dge ba dang /

'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de thams cad smra bar 'gyur ro/ /tshe ring ba 'am/ tshe yongs su zad pa de thams cad ston cing smra bar 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po brje ba 'am/ dgra 'thab pa 'am/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs 'thab pa 'am/

lo nyes pa dang / mi ngas dang / dgon pa dang / nad dang / na ba dang / gdon dang / gnod pa dang / 'tshe ba dang / grang ba dang / rlung dang / tsha ba dang / ser ba dang / chom po'i 'jigs pa dang / rkun po'i 'jigs pa dang / gcan gzan gtum po'i

'jigs pa dang / sbrul gdug pa'i 'jigs pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa dang / 'bras bu 'phel ba dang / 'bru 'phel ba de thams cad smra bar 'gyur zhing de'i thabs thams cad kyang rab tu ston par 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags

'chang la nyin gcig bzhin du khyad par du gyur pa rnam pa mang po rab tu ston par 'gyur ro/ /kha cig la bstan par mi bgyi ste/ sdang sems can rig sngags kyi gdol pa rkun ma byas pa/ mi gzo ba/ brlang ba/ 'phags

pa'i dge 'dun la 'khu ba/ 'phags pa'i dge 'dun la 'phrog pa/ bslab pa mi 'dod pa dang yang dag par ldan pa de dag gi lag tu bstan par mi bgyi/ rna bar bsgrags par mi bgyi/ skra'i rtse mo tsam du snang ba yang bstan par mi

bgyi'o/ /cho ga zhib mo 'di ni yi ge'i 'bru gcig tsam yang bstan par mi bgyi'o/ /rjes su 'jug par mi bgyi'o/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang dngos grub mchog thob par 'gyur te/ mchog tu yid brtan pa/ rnam par thar pa mchog gi

dkyil 'khor gsang ba thob par 'gyur ro/ /gang gi drung nas rig sngags kyi rgyal po'i rig sngags kyi dkyil 'khor chen po lag tu 'thob par 'gyur ba de la ston pa dang / bla ma'i 'du shes bskyed par bgyid/ bdag dang 'dra bar mchod pa sna

tshogs kyis gus par bgyid na bdag la gus pa dang bla mar bgyis pa lags/ mchod pa dang rjed pa bgyid pa lags so/ /de lta bas na dad pa'i rjes su 'brang bas byams pa bsgoms pa dang / snying rje bskyed pas dngos grub chen po 'thob par

'gyur ro/ /ji ste bgyi ba 'di las 'da' bar mi bgyid pa'i sems can de la bdag gis rtag par rgyun mi 'chad par dran pa dang / bdag brjod pa tsam gyis rang gi shin du yongs su dag pa'i rang gi ngo bos bdag mdun na mchis par bgyi zhing

yid la re ba thams cad dang mchog yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o/ /ji ste bdag ji ltar dam bcas pa las gzhan du bgyid na bdag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la bslus pa lags so/ /rig sngags kyi gdol pa rkun

mar gyur pa la ni mi bgyid de/ dam bcas bzhin du smra bar mi bgyid de/ rig sngags 'chang gis rtag tu gtsang bar bgyi/ rtag tu 'dzum pa dang / rtag tu byams pa dang / snying rje bsgom pa yid la bgyid na/ de la bdag gis

rtag tu yon tan phun sum tshogs pa thams cad 'thob par 'gyur bar bgyi/ de dge ba'i spyod pa thams cad dang ldan par bgyi/ don yod pa yangs pa chen po'i dngos grub rjes su stsal bar bgyi'o/ /sems can thams cad kyi

bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba la/ rgya mtsho'i dus rlabs ltar thams cad kun du mchi bar bgyi'o/ /ngan song dang / ngan 'gro dang / log par ltung ba thams cad yongs su zad par bgyi ba'i slad du bdag dga' bas

kun du mchi bar bgyi'o/ /sems can gang la byams pa dang / snying rje mchis pa'i sems can pha rol de rnams kyi bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o/ /de bas na rig sngags 'chang gis shin du sdom pas

bsdams shing rig sngags brjod par bgyi'o/ /yongs su gtong ba'i lag par bgyi zhing spar chums par mi bgyi ste/ lag pa brkyang bar bgyi'o/ /gtong ba mang bas de bzhin gshegs pa dam tshig la gnas par bgyi'o/ /sngar

legs par spyad par bgyi ste/ don yod pa'i rgyal po'i spyad pa bgyi zhing rtag tu yid la bgyi'o/ /de nas bdag dang chos kyi mchog la dga' ba zhes bgyi'o/ /rang gi gzugs brnyan bya ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'o// //

de nas khro bo'i rgyal po bshad par bya ste/ don yod rgyal po rmad byung che/ /kun du dngos grub thogs med cing / /dkyil 'khor kun la dbang bskur ba/ /sdang ba thams cad rab tu 'joms/ /bdud dang bgegs ni rnam par 'jig /

gnod sbyin srin po gsang ba pa/ /'byung po thams cad rab tu 'bros/ /gdon gyi gtso bo skrod byed cing / /sdang ba thams cad rab tu 'joms/ /sdang ba'i klu rnams rnam 'jig cing / /'jigs phongs rnams la mi 'jigs stsol/ /
rig 'dzin rnams la grub stsol ba/ /don yod zhags pa'i dngos grub mchog /dus gsum gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas ston/ /spyi yi rigs ni rab ston pa/ /don yod spyi yi gsang ba ni/ /rtag tu gzhan min snying po
nyid/ /khro bo'i rgyal po bla med pa/ /de ni bdag gis rab tu bshad/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug don yod pa'i rgyal pos

khro bo'i gzugs su gnas te sdang ba thams cad 'jigs par byed par gyur cing lag na zhags pa thogs te khro bo 'di smras so/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga ta Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa ra badzra d+ha re b+h+yaH /oM tsa ra tsa

ra/ tsu ru tsu ru/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka /tsi ri tsi ri/ bi ri bi ri/ ma hA pad ma ha ste/ ka la ka la/ ku lu ku lu/ ma hA s+thA ma prA ba te/ tsa ra tsa ra/ tsa tsa ra ni shA tsa re/ shwa ra e h+ye hi/ bud d+ha bud d+ha d+hA ba d+hA d+hA ba d+hA ba/ ki Ni ki Ni/ pa ra ma shud

d+ha sa twa/ ka ra ka ra/ ki ri ki ri/ ma hA pa shu pa ti/ be Sha d+ha ra/ hA hA hI hI hU hU/ oM ka ra brah+ma be Sha d+ha ra/ sa ra sa ra/ ba ra ba ra/ ba ra ra sh+mi sha ta sa ha sra/ pra ti maN+Da ta/ sha rI ra dzA ya/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ su ru su ru/ mu

ru mu ru/ sa nad ku mA ra/ ru dri biSh+Nu ba sa ba/ d+ha na da/ r-i Shi nA ya ka /b+ha hu bi bi d+ha/ be Sha d+ha ra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ sa man+ta a ba lo ki ta/ bi lo ka ta/ lo ke shwa ra/ ma he shwa ra/ mu ya mu ya/ mun tsa mun tsa/ ban d+ha ban d+ha/ trA Da na

ta ra dza na/ ra dza ta ska ra/ ag ni u da ka /bi Sha shas+t+ra pa ri mo tsa ka /ka Na ka Na/ tsa la tsa la/ bo d+h+yang ga / tsa tu rA r+ya sa t+ya sa~M pra kA sha /ta ma ta ma/ sa ma sa ma/ sa ma sa ma sa ma/ ma hA ta mo na d+ha kA ra/ pra sha ma na/ mi

li mi li/ e ne ya/ tsarma pa ri ka ra/ e h+ye hi/ ma Ta ma Ta/ bi shud d+ha bi Sha ya/ ni bA si na/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka /shwe ta yadz+nyo pa bI ta/ rat+na ma ku ta mA lA d+ha ra/ sarba dz+nyA shi ra si kr-i ta/ ka ra pu Ta/ sa ma d+h+ya pra ka~M pya/ ShaT+pA ra mi

tA/ pa ri pU ra ka ma hA/ sarba satwa san ta/ ti pa ri pA tsa ka /sarba ma ra d+hi duSh+Ta pra marda ka /sarba sid d+h+ya A shA pa ri pU ra ka /a b+hi Shiny+ts+ya tu mAn/ sarba ta thA ga tA b+hi She kai ra/ b+ha ga bAn/ a mo g+ha rA dza hU~M phaT/ na maHstu te

swA hA/ khro bo'i rgyal po don yod pa'i zhags pa'o/ /oM bi kri ta daM/ a mo gA sa mA ye a ba Shi na ts+ya man/ sarba bid d+ya a mo g+ha a b+he She kai/ /hU~M mi li mi li swA hA/ de khro bo'i rgyal po'i snying po'o/ /de nas 'phags

pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi don yod pa chen po'i snying po gsungs ma thag tu de nas ri chen po ta la rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yo bar brtsams te/ klu'i tshogs ni 'khrugs so/ /lha tshogs thams cad ni dga' bar gyur to/ /

sdang ba'i gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / bgegs dang / log 'dren ni 'bar bar gyur to/ /bdud la sogs pa sdang ba ni yang dag par rab tu zhi bar gyur to/ /ngan song gi sdug bsngal thams cad ni rab tu zhi'o/ /dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad ni

mchog tu dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /sdang ba dang / rab tu sdang ba thams cad dang / gdon thams cad ni mi snang bar gyur to/ /nad thams cad las ni rnam par grol lo/ /nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa thams cad las ni yongs su grol lo/ /me tog gi char

chen po rab tu bab ste de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod par gyur to/ /sems can thams cad ngan song gi sdug bsngal thams cad las yongs su grol bar gyur to/ /de nas dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dang / dkyil

'khor la rten pa'i lha rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la tshig gcig tu legs so zhes bya ba byin te legs so legs so/ /snying rje chen po can mchog du don yod

pa'i rig sngags 'di smras zin gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs thams cad dang / rigs spyi'i dam tshig dang / snying po dang / khro bo'i de kho na nyid gsang ba dang / dkyil 'khor dang / sgrub pa'i cho ga don yod pa'i rgyal po'i

dkyil 'khor rab tu smros shig /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po khro bo'i rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor de bzhin gshegs pa'i

spyan sngar bshad do/ /dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa shin du mdzes pa ko la'i tshad tsam shin du rnam par mdzes pa'i grwa bzhi dang / sgo bzhi dang / them skas bzhi dang / rta babs dang / mda'i kha khyer dang / kun nas rdo rje'i rnam

pa dag kyang bya ste/ tshon rtsi sna tshogs rnam par mdzes pa'i thig skud kyis dkyil 'khor thig gdab par bya'o/ /ri mo mkhan gtsang mas snod sar pa dang pir gtsang mas dkyil 'khor dam pa legs par bri'o/ /dkyil

'khor snying po rnam dbye ba/ /dbus su legs pa rnam phye la/ /kun nas pad ma'i phreng ba dang / /rdo rje mdung rtse gsum pa dgod/ /dbus su 'khor lo rta bri ba/ /shin du blta sdug 'khor lo dgod/ /dbus der rgyal ba gzhag par bya/ /

shAkya'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs/ /g.yas su khro bo'i rgyal po yi/ /'jig rten dbang phyug 'dren pa po/ /g.yon du rdo rje 'dzin gzhag pa/ /rnga yab rdo rje lag thogs gzhag /de'i 'og tu 'od zer dang ldan par bya ba ni lcags kyu dang / dgra sta dang /

go cha dang / dbyug pa dang / zhags pa dang / dgra sta lu gu rgyud can dang / mdung rtse gsum pa dang / glegs bam mo/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi 'og tu dkar sham chen mo dang / gos dkar mo dang / dkar mo chen mo ral pa can dang /

dbyug pa dang / ril ba spyi blugs phyag na thogs pa bya'o/ /de'i 'og tu srin mo ral pa gcig ma zhes bya ba ni mche ba 'jigs su rung zhing mi sdug pa sbrul se ral khar thogs pa/ phyag bzhi pa/ g.yas pa na rdo rje dang dgra sta/ g.yon pa'i sor

mo gcig lha ma yin dang log 'dren la sdigs shing khrag 'dzag pa'i mgo'i co to nas 'dzin pa dang / khrag gi snod yongs su 'dzin pa/ glang po che'i lpags pa rlon pa'i stod g.yogs 'phyang ba dang / smad g.yogs can bya'o/ /mtha'i
