grwar pad ma dang rdo rje gzhag pa ni 'bar ba'i phreng ba can shin du bzang po gzhag par bya'o/ /shar phyogs kyi sgor rdo rje 'jigs byed mig / de'i sku 'bar ba'i phreng ba can gzhag par bya'o/ /lho phyogs kyi sgor ki li ki li zhes bya

ba'i rdo rje'i log 'dren de nyid rdo rje dang / dgra sta dang / zhags pa phyag na thogs par bya'o/ /nub phyogs kyi sgor pad ma chen po'i rigs mdzes ma zhes bya ba'i pho nya mo bya ba ni/ phyag na pad ma thogs par bya'o/ /byang phyogs kyi sgor

rdo rje chen po'i rtse mo zhes bya ba'i cho gas rdo rje dang zhags pa phyag na rdo rje thogs pa'o/ /de nas 'jug pa'i sgor tsan dan gyi chu gur kum dang / gla rtsi dang / ga bur gyis bsgos pa'i chus bum pa bkang la ras dkar pos dkris shing rgyan gyis

brgyan pa rin po che sna bdun can rtag tu gzhag par bya'o/ /ji snyed pa'i gtor ma sna tshogs yongs su bshams pas kyang mchod par bya/ rnam pa sna tshogs pas dkyil 'khor legs par brgyan par bya'o/ /bdug spos kyis bkang ba dang /

mar me'i phreng ba dang / me tog dang / dri dang / byug pas mchod par bya'o/ /ji srid 'jug gi bar du slob ma rnams cho gas bsrung la/ de nas don yod pa'i snying po bzlas brjod bya zhing don yod pa'i khro bos dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /dbang bskur

ba tsam gyis kyang dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis yongs su gzung bar 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten gyi mgon po'i byin gyi rlabs kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs thams cad kyi dam tshig gi rjes su zhugs par 'gyur

ro/ /don yod pa'i zhags pa'i rigs kyi dam tshig dang / dngos grub thams cad mngon du 'gyur ro/ /gang bsams pa dang gang bcol ba de thams cad 'byor bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du dam tshig thams cad kyi rjes su zhugs par

'gyur ro/ /dam tshig dang / dkyil 'khor dang / gsang sngags dang / phyag rgya dang / cho ga zhib mo thams cad mngon du 'gyur ro/ /sdig pa dang / gdug pa dang / las kyi sgrib pa thams cad las rnam par grol

bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan thams cad dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /lha dang / lha ma yin dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / gsang ba pa dang / rig sngags 'chang gi gnas phug dri ma med pa dang

nam mkha'i rjes su rgyu ba dang / chu na rgyu ba dang / nags dang / skyed mos tshal na spyod pa'i rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los sgyur ba'i drug cha la thams cad du dbang du 'gyur ro/ /gsang sngags thams cad kyang 'di'i mngag

gzhug par 'gyur ro/ /gang zhig de la mi phan par 'dod pa'i lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa

gang rig sngags 'chang la mi phan par sems pa de thams cad kyi de dag gi gnas dang lus nyid rnam par gzhig pa'i phyir sdig pa rnams 'bab par 'gyur ro/ /de nas dngul las khro bo'i rgyal po sor bcu gnyis kyi tshad tsam byas

te/ shin du mdzes pa/ shin du tshad dang ldan pa/ zhal gsum pa/ ral pa'i thor tshugs kyis brgyan cing rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ rgyal ba 'od dpag tu med pa'i dbu rgyan can/ zla ba dbu la thogs pa/ zhal dang po khro bo'i gzugs

g.yon pa dang g.yas pa zhi ba'i gzugs zhal cung zad 'dzum pa/ spyan gsum pa/ phyag bzhi pa/ pad ma 'dzin pa/ zhags pa 'dzin pa/ ral gri dang mdung rtse gsum pa 'dzin pa'o/ /g.yas su lha mo sgrol ma me tog

'bul ba/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o/ /g.yon du lha mo rig sngags kyi rgyal mo nor bu rin po che chen po 'bul ba/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o/ /'jig rten dbang phyug gi zhabs kyi drung du rig sngags 'chang pus

mo btsugs pa/ lag na pog phor dang bgrang phreng thogs te bcom ldan 'das la blta'o/ /gzugs brnyan de nyid kyi mdun du tsan dan dkar po'i dkyil 'khor bya zhing gur kum gyis mchod pa bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor de'i

steng du khro bo'i rgyal po gzhag ste/ de'i spyan sngar bzlas brjod stong phrag brgya bya'o/ /de nas gzugs brnyan de 'gul zhing g.yo bar 'gyur/ 'chag par 'gyur/ 'od zer 'byung bar 'gyur/ tshig 'byin par 'gyur/ legs
so zhes bya ba sbyin par 'gyur/ phyag g.yas pa spyi bor 'jog par 'gyur/ yid la bsams pa dang mchog thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags 'chang de yang bdag nyid 'bar bar 'gyur/ nam

mkha' la 'phags par 'gyur zhing don yod pa yangs par snang ba/ dngos grub dri ma med par grags pa zhes bya ba'i rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los sgyur ba brgya stong phrag drug bcu rtsa brgyad po

rnams kyi gtso bo dang rgyal por 'gyur ro/ /tshe lha'i bskal pa khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bdun bcu rtsa gnyis su 'gyur ro/ /bskal pa'i mjug rdzogs te de nyid kyi mtshan mo 'das pa dang / byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /ji

ltar bde ba can bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams 'di gzhal med khang gi rnam par 'phrul par 'gyur zhing tshe'i tshad bskal pa dpag tu med par 'gyur ro/ /don yod pa'i rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya dang / cho ga zhib mo

thams cad kyi chos ston par 'gyur ro/ /de'i 'og tu 'jig rten pa'i sgrub pa ni de nyid kyi spyan sngar bzlas brjod brgyad stong bya'o/ /bzlas brjod rdzogs pa'i mod la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug khro bo'i rgyal po rang gi

gzugs kyis mdun na bzhugs par 'gyur te/ 'jig rten pa'i cho ga zhib mo dang / gsang sngags dang / phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor thams cad dang / mig 'phrul dang / bzhad gad dang / phur pas gdab pa dang / bsreg

pa dang / 'phang ba dang / gsad pa dang / dbang du bya ba dang / sgyu ma bstan pa dang / bdag bsrung ba dang / gzhan bsrung ba dang / mi snang ba'i cho ga smra ba dang / nor bsgyur ba smra ba dang / sa gzhi smra ba dang /

rgyu ba dang / nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang / chu rgal ba dang / me dang / chu dang / dug dang / mtshon cha las rgal ba dang / rmongs byed dang / rmugs byed dang / rengs byed dang / bcing ba dang / rgya mtsho chen po

bskyod pa dang / ro langs bslang ba dang / shi ba gso ba dang / zla ba dang nyi ma dbab pa dang / dgug pa dang / bden pa bstan pa dang / nad la sogs pa thams cad rab tu zhi ba dang / dgos pa thams cad 'grub

par 'gyur ro/ /gnod sbyin dgug pa dang / srin po dgug pa dang / 'byung po dgug pa dang / klu dang lha dgug pa dang / bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dgug pa dang / btang ba dang / dgos pa la

sogs pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /dran pa tsam gyi mod la dngos grub thams cad thob par 'gyur/ las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro/ /bklags pa tsam gyis las dang / dngos grub dang / sgrub pa thams cad

ston par 'gyur/ phyir rgol ba dang / dgra dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang / 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / sdang ba'i sems can thams cad phyir zlog par 'gyur ro/ /dran pa tsam gyis mchog tu

'grub par 'gyur te/ skal ba ngan pa dang / nor chud za ba dang / mi 'khrugs 'grub pa dang / sdig pa'i rmi lam ngan pa dang / ltas ngan pa dang / sgrib pa dang / sdig pa gzhig par bya ba la mchog tu grub pa yin

no/ /khro bo'i rgyal po'i zhabs nas gzung ste/ bzlas brjod stong rtsa brgyad byas na sngon bsags pa'i bsod nams dang skal ba mngon du 'gyur te/ tshe'i mthar thug gi bar du dpal chen po dang / che ba nyams

su myong bar 'gyur ro/ /zhal du bltas te bzlas brjod stong rtsa brgyad byas na dbang phyug chen po'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro/ /rked pa'i gnas nas gzung ste/ bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad byas na sngon gyi tshe
rabs rjes su dran par 'gyur/ rgyal po btsun mo dang / 'khor dang bcas pa rnams dbang du gyur nas gnas te/ bdag nyid dang nor gyis ji srid 'tsho'i bar du nye bar gnas par 'gyur ro/ /cod pan la lan
brgya rtsa brgyad yongs su bzlas te/ khro bo'i rgyal po'i dbu la bcings na nges par dbang bskur ba 'thob par 'gyur te/ 'di la the tsom dang yid gnyis bskyed par mi bya'o// //'phags pa don yod
pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po/ bam po nyi shu gcig pa/ de nas phyag na rdo rje don yod pa'i rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pa'i cho 'phrul gyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor der nam
mkha' las babs nas/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i mdun du bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa chen po dang / bkur sti mngon du byas te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan brgya stong du bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das
kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas phyag 'tshal te song nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gang na ba de
logs su song ste phyin nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la lha rdzas kyi mchod pa chen pos mchod pa byas so/ /me tog dang / bdug spos dang / dri dang /
phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / gos dang / rgyan dang / lhab lhub dang / sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis mchod nas lan bdun bskor ba bya ba byas so/ /ri po ta la'i gzhal med

khang na gnas pa'i lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po de dag gis kyang mchod pa byas so/ /dkyil 'khor gyi

lha de dag la yang mchod pa byas so/ /'khor chen po de dag la yang mchod pa byas so/ /lhan cig lhags pa'i 'khor de dag thams cad la yang mchod pa dang / mngon du bstod pa dang / phyag byas nas gnod sbyin

gyi sde dpon chen po phyag na rdo rje yud tsam zhig cang mi smra bar 'dug par gyur to/ /de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po phyag na rdo rje 'gying bag can/ brjid bag gi 'gros kyis langs nas bcom ldan 'das
gang na ba der logs su song ste phyin nas rdo rje gsor zhing bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba
btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag bgyis pa rnam par

thar pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhib mo 'di shin du zab pa/ shin du rtogs par dka' ba/ rgya mtsho chen po lta bur shin du zab pa/ ri rab chen po lta bur shin du mi g.yo zhing mi sgul ba/ mchog tu rnyed par dka' ba shin du

gzung bar dka' ba'i phyag rgya mang po dang / gsang sngags mang po dang / dkyil 'khor sgrub pa mang po dang / ri mo'i sku gzugs bri ba mang po dang / sgrub pa gsang ba rnam pa mang po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par

'phrul pa mang po dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rnam par 'phrul pa don yod pa bklags pas 'grub par 'gyur ba mang po la bcom ldan 'das bdag mchog tu ya mtshan du gyur na ji ltar sgrub par

rngo thog /ji ltar nges par gzung bar rngo thog lags/ gsang sngags tha dad pa dang / phyag rgya tha dad pa dang / dkyil 'khor sgrub pa tha dad pa dang / ras kyi ri mo'i sku gzugs tha dad pa dang / gtor ma tha dad pa dang / me tog dang /

bdug spos dang / dri dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / mchod yon dang / zhabs bsil dang / spyan drang ba dang gshegs su gsol ba dang / dgug pa dang / dam tshig dang / khrus dang / smyung ba dang / phyag rgya bcing ba dang /
rab tu 'jug pa dang / bzlas brjod dang / sbyin sreg dang / slar gshegs su gsol ba/ nges par bzung ba 'am/ dran par bgyi bar rngo thog /bcom ldan 'das rmongs pa chen po sems kyi spyod pa rmugs par
gyur pa'i rigs kyi bu rnams sam/ rigs kyi bu mo rnams sam/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma 'am/ dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ rgyal rigs sam/ rje'u rigs sam/ dmangs

rigs kyis rig sngags 'chang de rnams kyi don yod pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po 'di nges par gzung bar ji ltar rngo thog /rig sngags 'chang de rnams kyis ji ltar bsgrub par rngo thog /bcom ldan 'das bdag gi snying la
mchog tu ya mtshan skyes pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis the tsom bcad pa'i slad du bka' stsal du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das the tsom bcad pa'i slad du zhus pa lung bstan du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de

bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /lag na rdo rje dngos grub kyi spyod pa gsang ba rnam pa sna tshogs gsang sngags sgrub pa po bsgrub

pa la gang gi tshe dngos grub las dbugs phyung ba de'i tshe blon chen po'i chen por 'bogs par 'gyur/ dngos grub chen po'i chen po 'grub par 'gyur/ bsod nams kyi phung po chen po'i chen po rab tu skye bar
'gyur/ dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po'i chen po dang ldan par 'gyur/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi dngos grub chen po'i chen po 'thob par 'gyur/ lag na rdo rjes gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das dngos grub gang gis

bsgrub pa'i cho ga'i dngos grub 'thob par 'gyur ba'i dngos grub dam pa de gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje gang la yungs kar gyi 'bru tsam gyi byang chub kyi sa bon gyi 'bras
bu thob pa yod pa de la lag na rdo rje dngos grub dam pa mchog tu 'gyur ro/ /lag na rdo rje rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma 'am/
dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ rgyal rigs sam/ rje'u rigs sam/ dmangs rigs sam/ gzhan gang yang rung ba bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo gang gi lag tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i

sku'i ring bsrel yungs kar gyi 'bru tsam gcig thob par gyur la des ring bsrel de za ma tog gi nang du bcug ste nyin gcig bzhin du mchod pa dang / dkyil 'khor dang / khrus la sogs pa byed cing bdug pa dang / dri

dang / phreng ba dang / byugs pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag gis mchod pa byed na lag na rdo rje rig sngags 'chang de dngos grub dam pa dang / mchog dang / bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur

ro/ /gang dang gang du dgos par sbyar ba de dang der dngos grub chen po mchog tu 'gyur ro/ /ring bsrel yungs kar gyi 'bru tsam zhig la mchod pa byas pa de rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge sbyong
ngam/ bram ze 'am/ rgyal rigs sam/ rje'u rigs sam/ dmangs rigs sam/ gzhan bud med dam/ skyes pa 'am/ khye'u 'am/ bu mo de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig stong
phrag gang gA klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa la skad cig gcig gis mchod pa byas par 'gyur/ rjed pa dang / gus pa dang / bstod pa dang / phyag byas par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de dag

gis drung nas bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi drung du dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur/ de dag gi drung du bsod nams kyi phung po chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /
de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi drung du rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma 'am/ gzhan gang su yang rung ba/ dge sbyong ngam/

bram ze 'am/ rgyal rigs sam/ rje'u rigs sam/ dmangs rigs sam/ skyes pa 'am/ bud med dam/ khye'u 'am/ bu mo de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs

pa thams cad kyis lung bstan par 'gyur ro/ /shes rab dang / thabs la mkhas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dpag tu med par 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags 'chang chen po'i dngos grub dpag tu med par 'gyur ro/ /don yod pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i

dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags kyi dngos grub dpag tu med pa 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag byas pa rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor

gyi cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po chen po'i rig sngags rim par phye ba'i dngos grub dpag tu med pa 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /lag na rdo rje de ltar ring bsrel yungs kar gyi 'bru tsam zhig la mchod pa byed pa de yon tan chen

po'i chen por brjod pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi ting nge 'dzin 'thob par yang dag par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar dngos grub chen po'i chen po 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /de lta mod kyi lag na rdo rje khyod song

la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la yongs su dris shig dang / dris pa de'i lan ldon par 'gyur ro/ /de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje dga'

ba dang / mgu ba dang / yid rangs pa dang / rab tu dga' ba dang / dga' ba dang / yid bde ba bskyed nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ song nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gang na ba de logs su song ste phyin nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag

byas te/ lan gsum bskor ba byas nas bzhin 'dzum pa dang / gdong khro gnyer med pas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mig mi 'dzums par lta zhing / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun du 'dug nas

rdo rje gsor zhing gdong du bltas te rtog cing 'dug go/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so/ /lag na rdo rje khyod mi g.yo bar mdun du 'dug

ste rdo rje gsor zhing nga la ci zhig blta/ ci zhig yongs su dri bar 'dod/ ci zhig gsol ba 'debs par 'dod/ lag na rdo rje de nga la smros shig /lag na rdo rje khyod la skabs phye'i yongs su dris shig dang / dris pa de thams cad lung bstan pas khyod kyi

sems rangs par bya'o/ /de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po phyag na rdo rjes byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bcom ldan 'das don yod

pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i cho ga zhib mo shin tu rtogs par dka' ba shin du zab pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag bgyis pa/ rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor gsang sngags mang po dang / phyag rgya mang
po dang / dkyil 'khor sgrub pa mang po dang / ras kyi sku gzugs bri ba mang po yongs su bsgrags pa 'di bcom ldan 'das ji ltar nges par gzung bar nus/ dngos grub ji ltar shes par bgyi/ rgya mtsho chen
po ltar zabs che ba/ ri rab dang mtshungs par mi g.yo ba/ nam mkha' ltar mtha' thug pa ma mchis pa/ shin du rtogs par dka' ba/ 'di ltar shes par bgyi/ gnas ni gang / 'gro ba ni gang / 'byung ba ni

gang / sgrub pa'i gnas ni gang / dngos grub dam pa'i gnas ni gang / snga ma ni gang / phyi ma ni gang / dbus ni gang / tha ma ni gang lags/ mang du yongs su zhu'o/ /dkyil 'khor dang phyag rgya rim par phye ba dang gsang sngags

dang sgrub pa'i cho ga dang / dam tshig so so tha dad pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi don yod pa'i rgyal po chen po'i cho ga zhib mo/ byang chub sems dpa'

thams cad kyis phyag bgyis pa/ rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po rim par phye ste rjes su gzung ba de nges par gzung bar ji ltar nus/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gi the tsom chen po dang / mchog tu ngo mtshar du gyur

pa de thugs rje chen pos bdag la bka' stsal du gsol/ ji ltar grub na phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags dang bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor rim par phye ba dang / ras kyi ri mo'i cho ga mtha' dag nges par gzung bar 'gyur ba/
the tsom bcad pa'i slad du'o/ /sems dpa' chen pos bka' stsal du gsol/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po phyag na

rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so/ /lag na rdo rje yun ring po zhig nas spobs pa gang zhig skyes te/ nga la yongs su 'dri lag na rdo rje nyon cig dang bshad par bya'o/ /gang yang phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan

'das ni kha dog gcig pa/ rtags gcig pa/ chos gcig la zhugs pa/ dbyings dang khams dang / snying po gcig pa/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba gcig pa'o/ /de lta mod kyi lag na rdo rje gang 'das pa dang / ma byon

pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs pa nyid dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang / sku tshe'i 'du byed sna tshogs pa nyid dang / sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa sna

tshogs pa nyid dang / lung bstan pa sna tshogs pa nyid dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi dge 'dun sna tshogs pa nyid dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs sna tshogs pa nyid dang / gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi sku tha dad pa nyid du yang dag par shes

so/ /de lta mod kyi lag na rdo rje de bzhin du 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po don yod pa'i zhags pa byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag byas pa/ rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di yang

gcig nyid las de thams cad du rjes su 'gro'o/ /sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa sna tshogs kyis rnam par 'phrul pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi dngos grub kyi gnas dang / sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'i gnas/

bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa la ji lta ji ltar dul bar byed pa de lta de ltar dngos grub rjes su 'thob cing de lta de ltar bsam pa dag pa 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /de lta de ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba chen pos bskyed par 'gyur ro/ /de lta

de ltar bsod nams kyi phung po chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /de lta de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dgongs par 'gyur ro/ /de lta de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i yul la rnam par 'phrul pa sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rdzu

'phrul gyi cho 'phrul dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /de lta de ltar gzungs dang / ting nge 'dzin yongs su dag par 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /de lta de ltar dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rgyal

mtshan gyi rtse mo'i dpung rgyan gyi ting nge 'dzin dang / nyon mongs pa spong ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par 'thor ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'od zer rab tu 'gyed pa'i ting nge 'dzin

dang / dga' ba spong ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / stobs bkod pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos la rnam par blta ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / lag na rin chen phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dri ma med pa'i 'byung gnas kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par

snang mdzad kyi snying po'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nyi ma rab tu grol ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rin po che'i snying po'i ting nge 'dzin dang / zla ba'i snying po'i ting nge 'dzin dang / kun du blta ba'i 'od zer gyi ting nge 'dzin dang / chos kyi

sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyi gtsug la rnam par blta ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yul la rnam par 'phrul pa kun du bkod pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sgron ma 'bar ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chags pa med pa'i ting

nge 'dzin dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i 'byung gnas kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / zla ba rdzogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / shin du rab tu gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / shin du sangs rgyas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'gro ba yongs su dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /

nyi ma kun du lta ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yid gnyis yang dag par 'joms pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / kun du phyag rgya'i rnam pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / kun nas dkyil 'khor yongs su dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid

la kun du lta ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dkyil 'khor yongs su dag pa yang dag par 'dzin pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / kun du lta ba'i 'od zer gyi ting nge 'dzin dang / pad ma bkod pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / don yod pa kun du lta ba'i ting nge 'dzin

dang / don yod pa dri ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / kun du don yod pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rgya chen po dbugs 'byin pa don yod pa rin po che'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dpung rgyan gyi ting nge 'dzin dang / dpung

rgyan rgyal mtshan gyi ting nge 'dzin dang / rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i dpung rgyan gyi ting nge 'dzin dang / sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / don yod pa'i lcags kyu'i ting nge 'dzin dang / pad ma'i lcags kyu'i

ting nge 'dzin dang / dri ma med pa'i lcags kyu'i ting nge 'dzin dang / kun nas 'dren pa'i lcags kyu'i ting nge 'dzin dang / don yod pa'i 'od zer gyi lcags kyu'i ting nge 'dzin dang / kun du lta ba'i gzi brjid kyi ting nge 'dzin dang /

rtogs pa dri ma med pa thob pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / kun du lta ba rab tu gsal ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi gtso bo lnga bcu rtsa gnyis po 'di dag

'thob par 'gyur te/ ting nge 'dzin re re yang 'khor bye ba brgya stong phrag gang gA'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa de thams cad rjes su 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /lag na rdo rje don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po rnam par 'phrul pa

'di'i byin gyis brlabs kyis kyang don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po klog pa dang / 'chang ba dang / brjod pa dang / sgrub pa dang / phyag rgya 'ching bas yon tan de dag 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /lag na rdo rje don yod pa'i zhags pa'i

snying po 'chang ba dang / brjod pa dang / klog pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum dran par byed na lag na rdo rje sems can de dngos grub don yod pa 'thob par 'gyur te/ rnam par 'phrul pa don yod pa

dang / de bzhin gshegs pa blta ba don yod pa 'thob pa dang / gzungs don yod pa 'thob pa dang / ting nge 'dzin don yod pa 'thob pa dang / bsod nams sogs pa don yod pa 'thob pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul la rnam

par 'phrul pa don yod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i yul la rnam par 'phrul pa don yod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis rlabs kyi rnam par 'phrul pa don yod pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs pa

don yod pa dang / byang chub kyi snying por 'gro bar don yod pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba don yod pa dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i gnas su 'gro ba don yod pa dang / blo rgyas pa don yod pa dang / shes rab zab mo

rnam par 'phrul pa don yod pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa bcu yongs su rdzogs pa don yod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa dang / rim gro dang / bla ma dang / gus par bya ba don yod pa de'i phyir lag

na rdo rje don yod pa'i zhags pa zhes ming du gdags pa byas na lag na rdo rje rig sngags 'chang rnams la ji ltar rmongs pa skye bar 'gyur/ sems 'khrug par 'gyur/ dran pa dang blo gros rmongs par 'gyur te/ de'i gnas ni

mi snang na su zhig smra bar nus/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes ni don yod pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes gang yin pa de don yod pa zhags pa'i ming du dmigs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ye shes ni don yod pa ste/

ye shes don yod pa gang yin pa de don yod pa'i zhags pa'i ming du dmigs so/ /sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rnam par 'phrul pa ni don yod pa ste/ sgyu ma lta

bu gang yin de don yod pa'i zhags pa'o/ /ye shes gang yin pa de zhags pa'o/ /de snying po'o/ /snying po gang yin pa de don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ spyan ras gzigs

dbang phyug gi snying po zhes don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i ming du dmigs so/ /gang yid la sems pa dang / gang don du gnyer ba de thams cad 'dren par 'gyur/ 'gugs par 'gyur/ len par 'gyur te/ shin du ring po

nas ye shes kyi zhags par 'gyur ro/ /lag na rdo rje de bas na de don yod pa'i snying po'i ming du dmigs so/ /lag na rdo rje gang gis ting nge 'dzin 'di 'thob pa de la ji ltar rmongs pa skye bar 'gyur/ blo dman par 'gyur te

gnas 'di ni mi snang ngo / /lag na rdo rje gzhan yang gzungs kyi sgo du ma 'thob ste/ gang gis gzungs 'thob pa des don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i cho ga zhib mo 'di'i gsang sngags mtha' dag rdzogs pa dang /

gsang sngags dang / phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags rim par phye ba dang / dkyil 'khor kha ton nyid du gnas te thams cad so sor yang dag par shes so/ /'di lta ste don yod pa'i rgya mtsho zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang / don

yod pa'i lcags kyu zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang / don yod pa'i pad ma'i lcags kyu zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang / don yod par rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang / don yod pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi za ma tog ces

bya ba'i gzungs dang / don yod pa lhun po'i snying po yangs pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang / don yod pa dri ma med pa'i pad ma zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang / don yod pa'i 'od zer rab tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang / don yod

pa'i yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang / don yod pa rnam par 'phrul pa'i 'od zer zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang / don yod pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang / don yod pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i gzungs

dang / don yod pa rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang / don yod pa yangs pa snang ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang / don yod pa'i dngos grub ces bya ba'i gzungs dang / don yod pa dri ma med pa'i 'byung gnas zhes bya

ba'i gzungs dang / don yod pa blo rgyas pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang / don yod pa'i 'bar ba'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang / don yod pa nyi ma'i snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems

dpa' thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor gsang ba don yod pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'thob ste/ gang gis gzungs de rnams thos pa tsam gyis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag byas pa/ rnam

par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags rim par phye ba'i dkyil 'khor mtha' dag rdzogs pa dang / gsang sngags dang / cho ga dang / cho ga zhib mo rgya chen po kha ton du gnas shing thams cad so sor

yang dag par shes te/ gang gis mthu 'di rab tu thob pa la rmongs pa skye bar mi 'gyur/ dran pa nyams par mi 'gyur/ dran pa zhan par mi 'gyur/ dran pa rmugs par mi 'gyur/ dran pa 'khums par mi 'gyur/ dran

pa mi brtan par mi 'gyur/ dran pa gzhan du rgyu bar mi 'gyur/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / nga rgyal dang / ser sna dang / phrag dog gi rjes su 'gro bar mi 'gyur/ dran pa sdig pa can du mi 'gyur/

dran pa 'jig rten pa'i mi dge ba byed par mi 'gyur te/ rtag tu blo yangs shing rab tu gsal bar 'gyur ro/ /rtag tu mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i dran pa dang / blo rgya mtsho lta bur 'gyur ro/ /rtag tu dran pa zab cing rgya mtsho

chen po bsags pa lta bur 'gyur ro/ /lag na rdo rje don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i gzungs cho ga zhib mo de ltar go skabs yangs pa la gang gis gzungs 'di thob pa de lag na rdo rje ji ltar dran pa rmongs par 'gyur/

gzhan yang tshad med grangs med dpag tu med pa'i lus yongs su dag pa dang / yid yongs su dag pa dang / sems yongs su dag pa dang / mdangs yongs su dag pa dang / mig yongs su dag pa dang / rna ba yongs su dag pa dang /

sna yongs su dag pa dang / lce yongs su dag pa dang / dbang po yongs su dag pa 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po bklags pa tsam dang / mnyan pa tsam dang / mthong ba tsam dang / lhag pa'i bsam

pa tsam gyis de rnams yon tan gyi phan yon chen po'i 'di thob ste/ gang gis mthu 'di rab tu thob pa de la lag na rdo rje ji ltar rmongs pa skye bar 'gyur/ de lta mod kyi lag na rdo rje yud tsam zhig sdod cig dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor

mang po'i dbus su ji ltar mngon sum du 'gyur ba bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bab par bstan par bya'o/ /don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag byas pa rnam par

thar pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rnam par 'phrul pa'i cho 'phrul gyi rdzu 'phrul dam pa'i yul gyi mthu chen po'i chen po bstan par bya'o/ /de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po phyag na rdo rjes byang chub sems dpa' sems

dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi drung nas don yod pa'i yon tan bkod pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di dag dang / gzungs kyi sgo 'di dag mngon sum du thos nas dga' ba dang / mgu ba

dang / yid rangs pa dang / rab tu dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes te/ snying dga' bas dga' ba chen po nyid thob par gyur nas smras pa/ bdag lus dang sems shin du sbyangs pas yongs su dga' ba yid la bgyid

pas gnas par bgyi'o/ /yid la bgyid pa mchog tu dga' ba ngo mtshar du gyur pa dang / som nyir gyur pa dang bral ba dang / 'gyod pa ma mchis pas gnas par bgyi'o/ /rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag bgyis pa/ 'phags

pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i mthu'i rnam par 'phrul pa 'di ni mchog tu rnyed par dka' ba'o/ /de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po phyag na rdo rjes byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la dri ma med par kun du snang ba'i nor bu rin po che chen po chos kyi dga' bar phul nas rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas nas/ lan gsum bskor ba byas nas song ste ched du

brjod pa 'di ched du brjod cing 'gying bag dang / brjid bag gi 'gros kyis song nas rang gi stan la 'dug ste/ bzhin 'dzum pas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal du bltas nas snying yongs su dga' bas bcom ldan 'das la
rtog cing 'dug go/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ngo mtshar mchog tu rmad du byung ba snying rje dam pa rgya chen po'i lhag pa'i bsam pa'i dmigs
pas sems can thams cad bsgral ba'i phyir 'od zer dri ma med par snang ba'i nor bu rin po che chen po de phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phul te nam mkha' la 'phags so/ /byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis nor bu rin po che de nam mkha'i dkyil du 'phags ma thag tu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di cher g.yos par

gyur to/ /'od zer gyi snang ba chen po nyi ma bye ba brgya stong bas lhag pa'i 'od zer byung bar gyur to/ /snang ba gang gis 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can thams cad kyi lus la reg pa tsam gyis sdig pa thams cad dang /
dmyal ba dang / yi dgas dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du ngan song gi 'gro ba las yongs su grol bar gyur to/ /gang yang gling bzhi pa'i yi dgas dang / dmyal ba de

dag la yang snang ba des snang bar gyur pas nyi tshe ba'i dmyal ba rnams kyi gtub pa med par gyur te/ sems can de dag kyang yongs su thar nas bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skal ba mnyam par skyes

te/ lus yongs su dag par gyur to/ /gang yang mnar med pa'i dmyal ba chen po bcu drug po de dag kyang 'od zer gyi snang ba des reg pas dmyal ba de dag thams cad du pad ma'i mtsho byung bar gyur cing / sems
can de dag kyang yongs su thar nas rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan te/ bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skal ba mnyam par pad ma las rdzus te skyes so/ /grang ba'i dmyal ba gang yin pa
de dag kyang dro zhing bde ba dang / reg na bde bar gyur to/ /tsha ba'i dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag kyang bsil bar gyur cing / reg na bde ba dang / rab tu dga' bar gyur to/ /gang yang

dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba ri dgas dang / bya dang / tha na sbrang bu dang / sha sbrang dag kyang 'od zer des reg pas dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba de dag thams cad dga' ldan du lha rnams kyi nang du skyes
so/ /sems can gang dag bcings par gyur pa de dag kyang 'od zer des reg pas sems can bcings pa las yongs su grol bar gyur to/ /su mi 'dod pa dang / lcag sgrog dang / lcags kyu

lu gu rgyud kyi bcing ba de dag kyang dum bur gyur to/ /gang snod ma yin pa de yang 'od zer des phog pas mthong ba yongs su dag pa 'thob bo/ /gang sha bkra dang mdze'i nad kyis lag pa dang / rkang pa dang / rna ba dang /

sna ma tshang ba yang 'od zer des phog pas lus yongs su rdzogs pa dang / lus yongs su dag par gyur to/ /gang 'bras bu'i shing ljon pa dang / me tog gi shing ljon pa'i shing ljon pa yongs su skams par gyur pa yang 'od zer

des reg pas me tog dang / 'dab ma dang / 'bras bu byung bar gyur to/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing du gtogs pa gang du 'od zer bab pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du gtogs pa de na yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing so so'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa

yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag gang gA'i klung gi bye ma dgu bcu rtsa dgu snyed bzhugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa so so'i rin po che sna bdun gyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i gzhal med khang dang / seng ge'i

khri dang bcas pa'i gzhal med khang byung bar gyur to/ /nam mkha'i dkyil gang du 'od zer gyi snang bas reg pa'i nam mkha'i dkyil der yang phyogs bcur kun du rin po che'i rang bzhin gyi sprin brtsegs pas khebs par 'gyur te

lha rdzas kyi nor bu rin po che chen po sna tshogs kyi char rab tu 'bab bo/ /lha rdzas kyi rgyan dang / cod pan dang / dpung rgyan dang / gdu bu dang / do shal dang / se mo do dang / rna brgyan dang / gser gyi skud pa sna tshogs kyi char rab tu

'bab bo/ /tshon kha dog rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i lha rdzas kyi gos rmad du byung ba sna tshogs kyi char rab tu 'bab bo/ /lha rdzas kyi me tog sna tshogs kyi char rab tu 'bab bo/ /lha rdzas kyi byug pa sna tshogs kyi char rab tu 'bab bo/

lha rdzas kyi bdug pa sna tshogs dang / tsan dan sbrul gyi char rab tu 'bab bo/ /tshon kha don sna tshogs pa'i lha rdzas kyi gos dang / ba dan sna tshogs kyi char rab tu 'bab bo/ /lha rdzas kyi me tog sna tshogs pad ma dang / ku mu ta dang /

pad ma dkar po dang / uta pa la sngon po dang / pa ri sha ka dang / tsam pa ka dang / a d+he mug ta ka dang / a sho ka dang / skya snar dang / ka dam pa dang / man dA ra ba dang / man dA ra ba chen po'i me tog gis char rab tu bab te/ phyogs

bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa'i las byed do/ /bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i yang rin po che sna bdun gyi khang pa brtsegs pa yang dag par gnas par gyur te/ gru bzhi pa ka ba bzhi dang / sgo bzhi

dang ldan pa shin du 'bar ba/ lha rdzas kyi me tog sna tshogs lan kan gyis yongs su bskor cing mu tig gi dra ba sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa gser gyi dril bu sna tshogs 'phyang ba gos sna tshogs kyi phreng bas mdzes par byas pa/ chu

shing gi rgyal mtshan sna tshogs bsgreng ba/ nor bu rin po che sna tshogs bkram pa/ grwar lha rdzas kyi rnga yab sna tshogs kyis mdzes par byas pa/ go skabs rgya che ba'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po 'byung zhing snang ngo / /nam

mkha'i dkyil na yang lha rdzas rnams kyi me tog dang / bdug spos dang / dri dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / chos gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / rol mo'i sgra sna tshogs dang / sil snyan dang / pheg

rdob pas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed cing 'khod de/ de ltar don yod pa'i cho 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i byin gyis rlabs rmad du byung ba chen po rab tu bstan cing ya mtshan rmad du byung ba'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul

pa chen po'i chen por bstan to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i cho 'phrul 'di bstan nas rnam par 'phrul pa'i bkod pa chen

pos rang gi stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan brgya stong du mar bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon du bltas nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu
gzar te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag la don

yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag bgyis pa/ phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor rim par phye ba/ gsang sngags kyi snying po gsang ba rig sngags

kyi rgyal po chen po bdag gi snying po gsang ba/ rig sngags kyi rgyal po don yod pa'i lcags kyu dang / don yod pa'i khro bo'i lcags kyu dang / rig sngags kyi rgyal po don yod par 'dren pa/ nor bu rin po che chen po gsum

mchis te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis de bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khor mang po'i nang du yongs su bsgrags par bgyi'o/ /gang gi dran pa tsam gyis don yod pa'i snying po'i cho ga zhib mo'i phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor dang /

gsang sngags dang cho ga rim par phye ba mtha' dag rdzogs par mngon du gnas par 'gyur te thams cad so so nyid du gnas so/ /gsang sngags 'dis gzir bas thams cad mdun du gnas so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas

byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la legs so/ /zhes bya ba byin te/ sems can dag pa chen po khyod kyis spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po rig sngags kyi rgyal po

don yod pa'i lcags kyu smras pa legs so legs so/ /rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi don dang / sems can thams cad kyi don chen po'i phyir sems can thams cad dag pa chen po khyod kyis de'i dus la bab par shes na da smros shig /

de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das kyis bskul bar rig nas bzhin 'dzum zhing mig mi 'dzums par bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su mngon

du phyogs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khor mang po'i nang du 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po'i lcags kyu don yod pa'i zhags pa 'di smras so/ /dus gsum du gshegs shing so so na bzhugs

pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'phags pa rdo rje 'dzin rig sngags kyi dbang po chen po 'khor gyi tshogs dang bcas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dkyil 'khor gyi

rig sngags kyi lha thams cad dang / phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags rim par phye ba dang / cho ga zhib mo thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rang sangs rgyas dang / 'phags pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun 'das pa dang / ma byon
pa dang / da ltar byung ba thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'phags pa byams pa la sogs pa dga' ldan gyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'khor gyi tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'phags pa de bzhin
gshegs pa 'od dpag med bde ba can na gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /phyogs bcu mtha' yas mu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dang /

dkyil 'khor gsang ba dang / gsang sngags dang / phyag rgya rim par phye ba cho ga zhib mo dang bcas pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rig sngags dang / dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi sku sems can thams cad la byams pa kun nas don yod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi rig sngags
kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bgegs dang / log 'dren dang / sdang ba dang / bdud la sogs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar mdzad pa'i sems dpa' chen po mchog sbyin lcags

kyu la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad ya thA/ oM A kar Sha ya/ pad ma hasta/ ma hA a mo g+ha a~M gu shi/ tsa ra tsa ra/ tsa tsa ra/ sany+tsa ra/ sa man te na/ ma hA pA sha /ang gu sha /b+hu dza ba ra da b+hu dza ang gu sha pA sha d+ha ra/

d+ha ra d+ha ra/ sa man ta mu dra/ man tra maN+Da la/ pa Ta la/ d+ha ra a~M gu sha /pA she na/ d+ha ra ya hU~M hU~M/ ma hA bra ma ma/ be Sha d+ha ra/ a mo g+ha rU pa/ a~M gu sha d+ha ra/ ta ra ta ra/ ta ta ra/ san tA ra ya/ ma hA mu dra/ maN+Da li/ a mo g+ha

a~M gu sha ba ra da/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka /kri lo tsa na/ pa shu pa ti/ be Sha d+ha ra/ I shwa ra/ ma he shwa ra/ pa ram kA ru Ni ka /ma hAkh+ha te shwa ra ya ma ba ru Na/ na ma skr-i ta/ ku mA ra/ trai lo kya ba ra da/ dam ka sha ma ka /shA sa ka /rak+Sha ka /

ma hA bid+yA/ a mo g+ha/ maN+Di la/ pU dzi ta/ rad na ma ku Ta/ mA la d+ha ra/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ ma hA ang gu sha ak+Sha d+ha ra hU~M hU~M/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ sam b+ha ra sam b+ha ra/ sa man+t+ra drA pU ra ya hU~M hU~M/ hri da ya ang gu shi / a ba lo kA ya/

mAn sA d+ha ya sid d+hi ra/ A kar Sha ya/ mu dra man tra/ maN+Da la/ pa Ta lam/ sa ma ya/ big+h+naM pra sA d+ha ya mA ram/ ha ra ha ra/ sarba pA pa ki la bi sha ma la/ mA da sar r+ya/ hu ru hu ru/ ma hA ang gu shi/ hU~M hU~M/ bud d+ha bud d+ha/

bo d+ha ya bo d+ha ya/ tu ru tu ru/ ma hA bo d+hi sa twa a~M gu sha rat+na pA sha~M d+ha ra/ nA nA bi tsi tra I b+ha ra na bi b+hu Shi ta/ a mi tA b+ha/ dzi nam ku Ta d+ha ra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ pad ma pA sha a~M gu sha d+ha ra/ sarba bid+ya man+t+ra maN+Da la/ pra b+ha ra/

sA d+ha ya sA d+ha ya/ bi shwa r+'u pa d+ha ra/ sa ha sra ne+e tra/ sau mya mu kha/ pa ra ma kA ru Ni ka satwa bad sa la/ sarba man tra mu dra/ pra sA d+ha ka /ma hA ba ra da sa tA na ma stu te/ a mo g+ha a~M gu sha /pad ma b+hu dza swA hA/
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis 'di smras ma thag tu ri po ta la chen po brag dang / nags tshal dang / skyed mos tshal du bcas pa'i gnas kyi gzhal

med khang rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos te/ lha rdzas kyi me tog gi char chen po 'bab bo/ /don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag byas pa/ rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor phyag

rgya dang / gsang sngags dang bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor rim par phye ba'i cho ga zhib mo 'di yang so sor le 'ur phye ba mtha' dag rdzogs par nam mkha' la gnas so/ /gang gsang sngags kyi yig 'bru yang gser la be du

r+yas yi ger bris pa sprin gyi rim pa na snang ste/ yi ge'i phreng ba mnyam zhing gsal la zur phyin par bris pa/ thig gi phreng ba gshibs pas brgyan pa snang ngo / /gang lag pa'i phyag rgya yang pad ma'i nang nas byung ba/ phyag rgya bcing
ba sna tshogs 'od zer 'bar ba nam mkha' la gnas so/ /gang mtshan ma'i phyag rgya yang rin po che sna bdun gyi pad ma la rab tu gnas pa nam mkha' la gnas par gyur to/ /gang ras kyi ri mo'i sku gzugs/

gzugs rnam pa sna tshogs 'dzin pa/ rnam par bkra ba cho ga dang / yo byad dang bcas pa rim par phye ba bris pa yang nam mkha' la gnas so/ /gang dkyil 'khor rim par phye ba de dkyil 'khor rnam pa sna tshogs gru bzhi pa/

grwa bzhi cha mnyam pa rnam par phye ba dkyil 'khor shin du spras shing brgyan pa/ gzugs rnam pa sna tshogs kyis mdzes pa'i gzhal med khang yang nam mkha' la gnas so/ /dkyil 'khor chen po na gnas pa'i rig

sngags kyi lha pho nya dang / khro bo dang bcas pa gzhal med khang na rjes su rgyu ba dag kyang nam mkha'i dkyil na gnas te/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed do/ /phyogs so so'i de bzhin gshegs pa mang po bye ba

khrag khrig brgya stong gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang phyogs bcu kun gyi nam mkha'i dkyil na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku bzhugs par gyur to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku de dag thams cad kyis kyang byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug legs so legs so/ /rig sngags kyi mchog dam
pa don yod pa'i lcags kyu'i rig sngags kyi rgyal po mtha' dag rdzogs par smras pa/ gang gis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhib mor gsang sngags dang /

phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags rim par phye ba de dag thams cad don yod pa'i lcags kyu'i gsang sngags kyi zhags pas kun nas drangs so/ /'khor 'di'i nang na nam mkha'i dkyil na rab tu gnas pa de phyi ma'i tshe phyi
dus na rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma 'am/ dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ rgyal rigs sam/ rje'u rigs sam/ dmangs rigs sam/
gzhan su yang rung ba bud med dam/ skyes pa 'am/ khye'u 'am/ bu mo rig sngags 'dzin pa thams cad kyis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i lcags kyu 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po'i gzungs 'di

dran par byed na lan cig dran pa tsam gyis kyang mod la don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag byas pa/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po rnam par thar pa'i

dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags dang / dkyil 'khor rim par phye ba dang / cho ga zhib mo de thams cad so sor de la kha ton nyid du gnas te/ de dag thams cad rim gyis dran pa dang / blo rgya mtsho bsags pa dang /

shes rab 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /gsang sngags dang / phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags rim par phye ba so so la blo 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /nam yang blo dman par mi 'gyur zhing nam yang brjed ngas par mi 'gyur ro/ /
de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ mchog chen po sbyin pa/ lag

na pad ma/ mchog tu snying rje can khyod kyis cho ga rgya chen po smras pa legs so legs so/ /de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po phyag na rdo rjes rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i cho 'phrul gyi yon tan mtha'
yas pa 'di mthong nas dbugs cher 'byin par gyur cing mchog tu dga' ba chen po thob bo/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan

'das kyi spyan sngar 'khor 'di'i nang du 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po don yod pa'i lcags kyu'i bya ba'i yo byad dang cho ga bshad do/ /bcom ldan 'das de nas rig sngags 'chang gang

'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po don yod pa'i zhags pa byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag bgyis pa rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di bsgrub par 'tshal ba dang / gang yang bu 'am/
rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge slong pha 'am/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma 'am/ dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ rgyal rigs sam/ rje'u rigs sam/ dmangs rigs sam/

gzhan su yang rung ba bud med dang / skyes pa 'am/ khye'u 'am/ bu mo don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po 'di klog par 'tshal ba dang / bstan par 'tshal ba dang / bzlas brjod kyi cho ga bgyi bar 'tshal ba dang / mtha'

dag rdzogs par bsgrub par 'tshal ba des sngon rol du phyogs bcur thal mo sbyar te/ phyag 'tshal nas shar phyogs su kha bltas te mchis la gzhan mi smra bar don yod pa'i lcags kyu'i snying po 'di lan gsum
dran par bgyi zhing / yang thal mo sbyar te phyag bgyi'o/ /de nas dran pa tsam gyi mod la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang

phyug bkug par 'gyur te/ ri po ta la'i gzhal med khang dang bcas pa dang / 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang /
lto 'phye chen po dang bcas pa bkur bar 'gyur ro// //'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po/ bam po nyi shu gnyis pa/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po byang chub sems

thams cad kyis phyag bgyis pa/ rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor phyag rgya dang bcas pa gsang sngags rim par phye ba'i cho ga zhib mo dang / sgrub pa'i cho ga'i rnam pa rgya chen po mtha' dag rdzogs pa 'di yang bkur bar

'gyur ro/ /dkyil 'khor na gnas pa'i rig sngags kyi lha 'khor dang bcas pa bkug par 'gyur te/ thams cad yid rab tu dga' bar gyur pas dngos grub dam pa rjes su stsol bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas don yod pa'i rgyal

po'i snying po dran par bgyi ste/ ji ltar shin du rgya cher yid la bgyis pa de ltar sgrub par 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug nyid kyi kha nas dran pa mnyan zhing rgya che ba dang / blo dang mdangs dri ma ma mchis

par 'jug par bgyid de/ zhugs pa tsam gyi mod la lce pad ma'i 'dab ma lta bur 'jam par 'gyur zhing / kha nas uta pa la'i dri 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /dbyangs snyan cing mnyen pa dang / 'jam pa dang / zab pa

pa dang / tshig rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/ /mi 'am ci'i dbyangs dang / sgra snyan pa dang / dbyangs mnyen pa dang / dga' bar byed pa'i dbyangs su 'gyur zhing ka la ping ka'i dbyangs su 'gyur ro/ /ji ste dus gsum du

lan gsum du dran par bgyi na gsang sngags dang / cho ga zhib mo dang / dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya rim par bye ba dang / cho ga thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs spyi'i dngos grub de rdzogs par 'gyur zhing spyod par 'gyur ro/ /

bgegs dang log 'dren dang bdud la sogs pa sdang ba'i 'jigs pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /sngon gyi sgrib pa dang / dmyal bar mchi ba'i sdig pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs

dbang phyug gi snying po/ rig sngags kyi rgyal po chen po don yod pa'i lcags kyu 'di lan gsum dran par bgyis pa tsam gyis skad cig de nyid kyi mod la bdag rang dang / rang gi gnas kyi khang pa dang / slob ma dang /

bsnyen bkur dang / 'khor dang bcas pa mi gtsang ba yang gtsang bar 'gyur/ yongs su ma dag pa yang shin du yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/ /dri ma dang bcas pa yang shin du dri ma ma mchis par 'gyur ro/ /zhe sdang dang bcas

pa yang zhe sdang dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /gti mug dang bcas pa yang gti mug dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /'dod chags dang bcas pa yang 'dod chags dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /sgrib pa dang bcas pa yang sgrib pa dang bral bar
'gyur ro/ /bgegs dang bcas pa dang / bdud dang log 'dren gyis yongs su zin pa yang bgegs dang / log 'dren dang / bdud la sogs pa dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /sems kyi sdig pa yang sdig pa dang bral bar

'gyur ro/ /thun mong ma yin pa yang thun mong du gyur cing bsrungs par 'gyur ro/ /mi smra ba'i brtul zhugs ma mchis par yang mi smra ba'i brtul zhugs chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /smyung ba ma bgyis pa yang smyung ba
bgyis par 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags kyi gnas dang yul dang dkyil 'khor thams cad du tshangs par mi spyod pa yang tshangs par spyod pa chen por 'gyur ro/ /tshangs pa'i gnas chen po la gnas par 'gyur ro/ /

dge ba mi spyod pa yang dge ba chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /chos mi spyod pa yang chos spyod pa chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /bsod nams mi bgyid pa yang bsod nams kyi phung po chen po 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /dul ba'i

spyod pa ma mchis/ pa yang dul ba'i spyod pa chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags ma mthong ba dang / dam tshig ma mchis pa yang dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags

mthong ba dang / dam tshig 'tshal bar 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags kyi gnas dang 'khor thams cad du sangs rgyas dang / chos mthong bar mi 'tshal ba yang byang chub dang / chos dang / dam tshig dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems

dpa' thams cad kyis ma bsams pa yang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis bsams par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi sa bon gyi yul du ma gyur pa yang byang chub kyi sa bon dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /pha rol tu phyin pa drug

gi spyod pa dang mi 'bral zhing / pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba la mkhas par 'gyur ro/ /tshul khrims dang mi 'bral zhing ting nge 'dzin rab tu 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /sbyin pa dang yongs su gtong ba dang mi

'bral zhing sbyin pa dang / yongs su gtong ba dang / sbyin pa'i tshogs chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /bzod pa dang mi 'bral zhing bzod pa chen po'i bzod pa'i rjes su spyod par 'gyur ro/ /brtson 'grus dang mi 'bral zhing brtson

'grus kyi stobs chen po'i go cha brtan pa bgos par 'gyur ro/ /bsam gtan dang mi 'bral zhing bsam gtan chen po 'thob pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /shes rab dang thabs la mkhas pa zhan pa yang / shes rab dang thabs la mkhas pa rgya chen por

'gyur ro/ /rig sngags dang / gsang sngags nyams pa dang / gsang sngags dang / phyag rgya yongs su tshang ba dang / cho ga la mkhas par 'gyur ro/ /dge ba'i bshes gnyen chen po'i lam la rab tu gnas par 'gyur ro/ /
'jig rten thams cad du snying du sdug pa dang / bla mar bgyis par 'gyur ro/ /sems can thams cad kyis mchod pa dang / mngon du phyag bgyi bar 'gyur ro/ /tshig btsun par yang 'gyur ro/ /

bsam pa yongs su dag par yang 'gyur ro/ /de ltar don yod pa chen po'i cho ga rgya chen po 'di dag ni thams cad du dngos grub don yod pa/ mchog tu rnyed par dka' ba/ dge ba don yod pa 'di don yod pa'i lcags kyus 'dren par bgyid do/ /

dngos grub thams cad 'gugs par bgyid do/ /sgrub pa thams cad 'dren par bgyid do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ji snyed pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad dang /
mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad dang / de bzhin nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / don dam pa dang / stong pa nyid 'dren par bgyid de don yod pa'i lcags kyu 'dis 'dren par

bgyid/ yangs par bgyid/ dngos grub mchog 'dren par bgyid do/ /de ltar mthu che ba dang / phan yon che ba dang / yon tan chen por brjod pas bsod nams kyi 'bras bu chen po stsol bar bgyid do/ /de ltar dge

ba'i rtsa ba chen po dang ldan zhing kun du sogs par bgyid pas rig sngags kyi rgyal po don yod pa'i lcags kyu/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po ni mchog tu grub pa bla na med pa lags so/ /
de nas rig sngags 'chang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma 'am/ dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ rgyal rigs sam/ rje'u rigs sam/
dmangs rigs sam/ gzhan su yang rung ba/ bud med dam/ skyes pa 'am/ khye'u 'am/ bu mo 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rang gi gzugs kyis dgug par 'tshal ba dang / 'phags pa spyan ras
gzigs dbang phyug bdag nyid kyi rang gi gzugs su mthong bar 'tshal na des cho ga 'di bgyi'o/ /gtsang ma shin tu khrus bgyis pa/ gos gtsang ma bsgos pa/ ba'i rnam lnga'i chus bsangs pa'i mchod phyir
thogs btags pas ras dmar po'i skud pa'i mchod phyir thogs kha dog bzang po gnas bdun du yongs su gzung ste/ 'tshogs ma dang / spyi gtsug bcing ba dang / gnas gsum po dpung pa gnyis su bcing ba

dang / lag ngar gnyisu bcing ba dang / de nas rked par bcings pas/ sa phyogs gtsang mar 'dug nas sam/ gnas gzhan gang yang rung ba dben zhing 'khrug pa ma mchis pa dang / dkyil 'khor gyi stegs gru bzhi pa shin tu rnam par mdzes

pa khru bzhi'i tshad tsam la 'phang sor brgyad kyi tshad tsam kun nas zlum po legs par byugs pa shin du 'jam pa bgyi'o/ /de nas tshon sna tshogs kyi skud pas rnam par mdzes par thig gdab cing tshon rtsi sna tshogs kyis

bri bar bgyi'o/ /snying po'i dkyil 'khor ni khru gang tsam gyi tshad la gru bzhi pa rnam par phye ba/ shin du mdzes pa/ gru bzhi kun nas kha khyer gyi rnam pa can bgyi'o/ /dbus su pad ma bgyi'o/ /'dab ma brgya rtsa brgyad pa/

'dab ma thams cad la lcags kyu bri zhing dbus kyi snying po ge sar dang bcas pa rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa bgyi'o/ /'od kyi phreng ba zlum po tshon rtsi sna tshogs kyis rnam par mdzes par bgyi'o/ /snying po'i dkyil

'khor gyi grwa bzhir lcags kyu dang zhags pa kun nas zlum po yang bgyi'o/ /phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor kun du mtshan ma'i phyag rgya sna tshogs kyang bri bar bgyi'o/ /dkyil 'khor gyi grwa bzhir rnam par phye bar rgyal

po chen po bzhi 'bar ba'i nang na go cha bgos pa/ drag shul gyi gzugs can 'jigs par bgyid pa bri'o/ /sgo bzhi rnam par phye bar yang dkyil 'khor gyi lha bri bar bgyi ste/ shar phyogs kyi sgor rdo rje 'chang zhi ba'i

gzugs can bzhin 'dzum pa/ rdo rje 'gying bag can du 'dzin pa/ ri rab kyi steng na 'bar ba'i nang na mchis pa bri'o/ /lho phyogs kyi sgor khro bo'i rgyal po drag shul gyi gzugs can 'jigs par bgyid pa/ pad ma dang

zhags pa thogs pa/ me tog kha phye ba'i steng na 'bar ba'i nang na mchis pa'o/ /nub phyogs kyi sgor dbang po rdo rje thogs pa/ mig gsum pa ri'i steng na 'bar ba'i nang na mchis pa bri'o/ /byang phyogs kyi sgor don yod

pa'i zhags pa gdong khro gnyer can/ pad ma dang zhags pa thogs pa/ pad ma'i 'dab ma'i steng na 'bar ba'i nang na lcags kyu dang lhan cig mchis pa bri'o/ /dkyil 'khor kho ra khor yug tu gos dang / ba dan dang /

mda' dang / rgyal mtshan kun gyis brgyan par bgyi'o/ /tshon sna lnga'i skud pas kho ra khor yug tu dkri bar bgyi'o/ /gtor ma thams cad dkar po gzhag go/ dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol kun du dngul dang gser gyi snod

rnam pa sna tshogs pa gzhag go/ snying po'i dkyil 'khor kho ra khor yug tu dngul gyi snod bkang ba bzhi dang / 'o mas bkang ba bzhi dang / mchod yon dang / zhabs bsil ba'i snod bzhi dang / dri'i snod bzhi dang / dris

bkang ba'i snod bzhi dang / dngul gyi pog phor a ga ru dang / tsan dan dang / du ru ka'i bdug spos bsregs pa bzhi gzhag go/ phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor kho ra khor yug tu sa las byas pa'i snod bkang ba dang / gtor
ma'i snod bum pa yongs su bkang ba drug bcu rtsa bzhi dang / bdug pa sna tshogs bsregs pa'i pog phor brgyad 'jigs pa med par gzhag par bgyi'o/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang gis tshes bcu bzhi nas zla

ba nya tshes bcwa lnga'i bar gyi nyin zhag gcig smyung ba bgyis pas 'bras yos dang / yungs kar la don yod pa'i rgyal po'i snying pos lan brgya rtsa brgyad yongs su bzlas pas dkyil 'khor du gtor bar bgyi'o/ /

yungs kar dang / dri chab la khro bo'i rgyal pos lan brgya rtsa brgyad yongs su bzlas pas dkyil 'khor kun du gtor zhing dkyil 'khor dbang bskur bar bgyi'o/ /dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol du mar me drug bcu rtsa bzhi

spar bar bgyi'o/ /me tog ji snyed pa mang po dgram zhing kho ra khor yug tu phreng ba gzhag par bgyi'o/ /rig sngags 'chang gis don yod pa'i lcags kyus yungs kar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig yongs su bzlas pas
dkyil 'khor kun dang / phyogs bzhi dang / steng dang / 'og tu gtor na dkyil 'khor bcing ba bgyis par 'gyur ro/ /phyogs bcing ba dang / spyi gtsug bcing ba dang / bdag bsrung ba bgyis par 'gyur ro/ /
bgegs dang / log 'dren dang / 'byung po dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / bdud la sogs pa thams cad bcings par 'gyur ro/ /lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang /

nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po gang dag mthong ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bslab pa'i gzhi 'dzin pa de thams cad bkug par 'gyur ro/ /dkyil 'khor kun nas bsrung ba'i slad du

gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / gzhon nu dang / ku be ra dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung dang / 'khor dang bcas pa/ lcags kyu dang / zhags pas bkug par 'gyur te/ dkyil 'khor kun nas bsrung ba dang /
bskyab pa dang / sba ba bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /'og gi sa'i lha mo sa'i 'og na gnas pa rnams dang lhan cig dkyil 'khor bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba ba'i slad du mchis par 'gyur ro/ /steng nas

nam mkha' la tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / brgya byin dang / mtshan mo'i lha dang / nyi ma dang / zla ba rgyu skar dang bcas par bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba ba bgyis par 'gyur ro/ /
de nas rig sngags 'chang gis phyag bgyi ba'i las bgyi ste/ rig sngags 'chang gis rtswa ku sha'i steng du shar phyogs kyi sgor dkyil 'khor la mngon du phyogs par skyil mo dkrung bcas te mchis la gzhan

mi smra bar don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan brgya rtsa brgyad yongs su bzlas pa bgyis la/ dkyil 'khor gyi snying por 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gzhag par bgyi zhing me tog re re la bzlas

brjod bgyis pas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun du dor bar bgyi'o/ /de nas khro bo'i rgyal pos yungs kar gyi 'bru re re la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis pas gtor bar bgyi'o/ /de nas

'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po don yod pa'i zhags pa'i lcags kyus bzlas brjod stong rtsa brgyad bgyis pas dbul bar bgyi'o/ /ri lu re re la bzlas brjod bgyis pa'i bdug spos dbul bar

bgyi'o/ /yungs kar re re la bzlas brjod bgyis la/ snying po'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du dor bar bgyi'o/ /stong rtsa brgyad rdzogs pa dang / thun tha ma'i nam nangs kar gya nom pa/ yid du 'ong zhing dga' ba dang / rab tu dga' bar

bgyid par sa g.yo bar 'gyur zhing / sgra mnyen pa dang / snyan cing 'jebs pa dang / yid du 'ong ba zab mo zab mo dang / ka la ping ka dang / mi 'am ci'i sgra dbyangs lta bu 'byung bar 'gyur te/ rig sngags 'chang gi sems brtan por

bgyi zhing mchog tu dga' ba yid la bgyid pas bzlas brjod bgyi'o/ /de nas dkyil 'khor gyi snying po nas 'od zer rnam pa sna tshogs mang po 'byung zhing phyogs dang / phyogs mtshams kun du mchi zhing snang bar 'gyur te/ nam

mkha'i dkyil na sprin brtsegs pa'i phung po bzhin du 'od zer gyi gdugs su gyur nas gnas par 'gyur ro/ /de nas sngon ma byung ba'i dri ma zhim po rmad du byung ba 'byung bar 'gyur zhing lha'i tsan dan dang / go shir sha'i tsan

dan dang / tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po dang / ga bur dang / gla rtsi'i dri 'byung ste/ dpag tshad brgya kho ra khor yug tu dri gnas par 'gyur ro/ /lha rdzas kyi bdug spos kyi dri zhim po sngon ma byung ba bai dUr+ya sngon po'i sprin brtsegs pa

lta bu'i bdug spos kyi sprin nam mkha'i dkyil na gnas par yang 'gyur te/ phyogs bcu kun du bdug spos kyi dri rgyas par 'gyur ro/ /de nas snying po'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug

bdag nyid kyi rang gi gzugs kyis 'byung bar 'gyur te/ tshangs pa bzang po'i cha lugs can/ ral pa'i thor tshugs kyis brgyan pa/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i gzugs lag pa bzhi pa/ pad ma dang / zhags pa thogs

pa/ rgyal ba 'od dpag tu med pa'i dbu rgyan can/ dbu rgyan zla ba tshes pas brgyan pa/ mdung rtse gsum pa thogs shing dbugs 'byin pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos brgyan pa/

rang gi 'od dang gzi brjid kyis shin du 'bar ba/ bzhin 'dzum zhing nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od zer gyi snang ba dang ldan pa/ khru brgyad tsam gyi lus bzang pos dkyil 'khor gyi snying po'i pad ma'i stan las langs te/ nam mkha'

la mchis nas zhi ba'i gzugs can byams pa'i sems dang / snying rje chen po yid la bgyis pas dkyil 'khor kun du lta zhing phyogs bcur rtog par bgyid do/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang la legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra

'byung ste/ rig sngags 'chang chen po legs so legs so/ /lag pa g.yas pa brkyang ba'i lag mthil shin du bzang po 'od zer bye ba brgya stong phrag stong gis legs par brgyan pa'i lag pa rig sngags 'chang gi spyi bor
'jog par 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi lag pa spyi bor gzhag ma thag tu de nas rig sngags 'chang de nam mkha' la mchis te/ don yod pa'i zhags pa dang / lcags kyu rgya chen po

'od zer snang ba bkod pa rnam par 'phrul pa zhes bya ba sgyu ma lta bu'i shugs kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob ste/ ting nge 'dzin gzhan yang bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi bye ma snyed 'thob bo/ /
kun du don yod par lta ba nor bu'i snying po rgya chen por grags po don yod pa'i lcags kyu'i gzugs/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po'i gzungs 'thob par 'gyur te/ gang gis gzungs

thob pa'i mod la don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags rim par phye ba'i cho ga zhib mo byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag bgyis pa/ rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor mtha' dag rdzogs

par kha ton nyid du gnas so/ /gzhan yang pad ma rgya chen po'i dkyil 'khor mtha' dag dang / rdo rje'i rigs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dang / nor bu'i rigs dang / glang po che'i rigs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa

thams cad kyi rigs kyi dam tshig dang / gsang ba chen po'i snying po dang / phyag rgya dang bcas pa'i gsang sngags rim par phye ba gsang ba dang / cho ga zhib mo'i rnam pa thams cad kha ton nyid du gnas so/ /rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor

los sgyur ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag gang gA klung gi bye ma dgu bcu rtsa gnyis pa rnams kyi gtso bo dang / mchog dang rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro/ /de nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang

phyug gis rig sngags 'chang de la smras pa/ rig sngags 'chang ji ltar yid la byed pa dang / bsam pa smros shig dang / mchog de thams cad rjes su sbyin par bya'o/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang gis ji ltar yid la bsams pa dang /

mchog mngon par 'dod pa de thams cad smra zhing mchog yid la re ba thams cad sbyin par 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dgos pa sna tshogs da ltar byung ba rnams smra zhing 'das pa dang /

ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba smra'o/ /lo legs pa dang / lo nyes pa dang / bde ba dang / nad dang / 'jigs pa dang / lhag par 'jigs pa dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang / rang gi dmag tshogs dang / phyir

rgol ba dang / dgra bo dang / yams kyi nad dang / mi ngas dang / gnod pa dang / nad 'go ba dang / 'tshe ba dang / gza' 'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / 'tshang 'dru ba dang / 'gyed pa dang / g.yul 'gyod pa dang / char

ches pa dang / char dkon pa dang / dus ma yin pa'i char dang / tshe ring ba dang / tshe thung ba dang / tshe yongs su zad pa dang / dus ma yin par 'chi ba dang / 'byor pa dang / rgud pa dang / dge ba dang / mi dge ba dang / skye ba dang / 'gag pa dang /

'grub pa dang / mi 'grub pa dang / bgegs dang / bgegs med pa dang / bdud kyi bar chad dang / 'bru 'phel ba dang / nor 'phel ba dang / nad mang ba dang / nad dang bral bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa de thams cad byang chub sems dpa'

sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rig sngags 'chang la smra bar 'gyur ro/ /sems can dmyal ba dang / yi dgas dang / lha ma yin gyi 'jig rten dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang /

'byung po dang / sha za dang / grul bum dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas pa ri dgas dang / bya'i skye ba dang / 'chi ba de thams cad phyin ci ma log par smra zhing

de dag gi thams cad kyang ston par 'gyur ro/ /lhar skye ba dang / klur skye ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro zhing skye ba dang / rgyal po nyid dang / bud med dang / skyes pa nyid dang / bu rnyed pa de thams cad smra bar 'gyur

ro/ /bram ze'i rigs su skye ba dang / rgyal rigs su skye ba dang / khyim bdag gi rigs shing sA la chen po lta bur skye ba de thams cad smra bar 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang rigs mthon po dang / dma' ba dang / dmang pa'i
rigs su skye ba sna tshogs de dag thams cad ston cing smra la/ thabs kyang ston par 'gyur ro/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang gis ji ltar bsams pa'i don de thams cad 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug

mngon sum du smra zhing thams cad gtam zer ro/ /gzhan yang 'jig rten pa'i mchog sna tshogs dang / sgrub pa dang / grub pa de thams cad de stsol bar bgyid de/ 'di lta ste nor bsgyur ba smra ba dang / zhing smra ba dang / mig sman

gyi dngos grub dang / mi snang ba dang / mig 'phrul dang / gter smra ba dang / phug tu 'jug pa dang nags su 'jug pa dang / spo ba dang / dbang du bya ba dang / dbab pa dang / ro langs bslang ba dang / nad zhi bar bya ba dang / gos 'thob pa

dang / grong 'thob pa dang / yul gyi bdag po nyid dang / chu klung chen po rgal ba dang / dug bza' ba dang / gsang sngags sna tshogs sgrub pa'i dngos grub dang / 'jigs pa chen po brgyad zhi bar bya ba dang / dgug pa dang / dran pa de

thams cad stsol bar bgyid do/ /gzhan yang ji ltar yid la bgyid pa de thams cad stsol bar bgyid do/ /de dag thams cad kyi dgos pa thams cad don yod pa'i zhags pa'i lcags kyu'i snying pos 'dren cing / don yod pa'i zhags

pas bcing bar 'gyur ro/ /bsams pa dang / don du gnyer ba dang / yid la re ba'i dgos pa de thams cad shin du ring po nas kyang don yod pa'i zhags pas bcings nas thams cad drangs te/ lag tu thob par 'gyur ro/ /sgrub pa

mchog gi dngos grub kyi de kho na nyid thams cad 'grub par 'gyur te/ mi snang bar gyur/ rig sngags 'chang nam mkha' la mchi bar 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten gyi khams gang du sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang du mchi 'tshal ba de

dang de thams cad du mchi bar gyur te thams cad du gtso bor 'gyur/ thams cad du mchod par 'gyur ro/ /ci ste rmi lam du mthong bar 'tshal na gu gul la lan brgya rtsa brgyad yongs su bzlas nas/ nyal kar 'phags
pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bdug spos su phul te nyal na/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rgyal po'i cha byad du mthong ba stsol cing / gang bsams pa dang / gang du gnyer

ba dang / gang dris pa de thams cad smra bar 'gyur ro/ /ji ltar bsams pa'i mchog stsol cing sgrib pa dang sdig pa thams cad ma mchis par 'gyur ro/ /stobs dang / brtson 'grus dang / mdangs 'jug par 'gyur

ro/ /tshangs pa dgug par 'tshal zhing mthong bar 'tshal na/ de'i tshe shing arka'i 'o ma dang / gu gul dang / rgya skyegs ri lur bgyis pa la bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad bgyis la/ tshangs pa la bdug spos su phul

nas/ tshangs pa rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na ma mchis shing mchog 'tshal ba thams cad rjes su stsol to/ /tshangs pa'i 'jig rten la thug pa'i bar gyi tshangs pa'i gnas dang / gzhal med khang mthong bar 'gyur zhing

tshangs pa'i gzugs kyi cha byad 'chang ba'i mchog stsol bar 'gyur ro/ /lha'i gnas thams cad du mes po yin no zhes tshig mngon par brjod par 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten thams cad dang / 'dzam bu'i gling pa'i mi

bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs de thams cad thams cad du tshangs pa'o zhes sems par 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po btsun

mo dang / 'khor du bcas pas mchod pa'i sprin chen po bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /de nas sred med kyi bu dgug par 'tshal ba des lha'i gnas su sred med kyi bu'i gzugs brnyan gyi mdun du nye bar sbyin sreg gi cho ga bgyi ste/

rig sngags 'chang gtsang mar gyur pa shin du khrus bgyis pa gos gtsang ma bgos pa/ sna ma dang shing arka'i yam sreg shing gi me sbar ba la gu gul dang / yungs dkar dang / sbrang rtsi dang zhun mar bsres pa'i

sbyin sreg brgya stong bgyi'o/ /brgya stong rdzogs pa dang / sred med kyi bu rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na mchis shing rig sngags 'chang la rig sngags 'chang legs so legs so zhes smra'o/ /sgrub pa dam pa 'di

don yod pa'i lcags kyus 'gugs shing rig sngags kyi rgyal po'i chos lugs chen pos bkug na rig sngags 'chang ci zhig bya/ dgos pa ni ci zhig yod/ mchog ni ci zhig don ci gnyer ba de smros shig dang / thams

cad rjes su sbyin par bya'o/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang gis don gang yid la bsams te smras pa de thams cad stsol bar 'gyur/ gzugs sna tshogs pa'i mchog kyang rjes su stsol bar 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang gzugs

sna tshogs pa mchog gtso bo dang dgos pa'i las sgrub pa'i mchog rjes su stsol bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas lha chen po dgug par 'tshal na rig sngags 'chang gtsang ma shin du khrus bgyis pa gos gtsang ma bgos pa

des lha'i gnas su mchis pa la lha chen po'i mdun du gu gul dang / pad ma'i phye ma dang zhun mar bsres pa'i sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad bgyi'o/ /stong rtsa brgyad rdzogs pa dang / lha chen po rang gi gzugs kyis mdun

na mchis par 'gyur ro/ /de nas nag po chen po dgug par 'tshal na rig sngags 'chang shin du khrus bgyis pa gos gtsang ma bgos pas dur khrod du mchis la/ zla ba mar gyi ngo'i tshes bcu bzhi la nyin zhag gcig

smyung ba bgyis pas pad ma sar ba'i phye ma dang / gu gul dang / ra'i khrag dang / yungs kar dang / zhun mar dang sbyar ba brgyad stong don yod pa'i lcags kyu'i bzlas brjod kyis dur khrod kyi shing gi me la bzlas brjod

bgyi'o/ /ra khrag gi gtor ma dang 'bras thug po che'i chan gyi lha bshos dang / me tog dmar po dbul bar bgyi'o/ /las 'di yongs su rdzogs par bgyis na nag po chen po ma mo'i tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas pa
mdun na mchis shing rig sngags 'chang la legs so zhes bya ba gsol te/ rig sngags 'chang legs so legs so/ /sgrub pa'i cho ga bzang po 'dis bdag yongs su ma gus rig sngags 'chang smros shig

dang mchog rjes su sbyin par bgyi'o/ /mchog 'dod pa thams cad rjes su long shig dang / ji ltar yid la byed pa re ba de thams cad rjes su sbyin par bgyi'o/ /khyod bsrung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba'i don du bdag

rtag tu rjes su 'brang bar bgyi'o/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang gis mchod yon dang zhabs bsil dbul bar bgyi'o/ /ji ltar bsams pa de mngon sum du smras na/ gang don du gnyer ba de thams cad 'thob cing thams cad
du rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro/ /thams cad du thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /dran pa tsam la sogs pas las thams cad bgyid cing nye bar gnas par 'gyur ro/ /rtag tu lta zhing spyir thams cad bgyid
par 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang dgos pa sna tshogs dang / las su bgyi ba bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /ma mo'i tshogs kyi 'khor thams cad dbang du gyur nas gnas te/ las thams cad bsgo ba bzhin du bgyid par
'gyur te/ nam yang nyams par mi bgyid do/ /thams cad rjes su 'brang zhing las thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /ci ste 'dod pa'i gzugs can ma dgug par 'tshal na de nas rig sngags 'chang

gtsang ma shin tu khrus bgyis pa gos gtsang ma bgos pas shin du dri zhim po'i dris lus lhag par bsgos la/ gang na me tog gi shing ljon pa mchis pa der mchis la/ zla ba mar gyi ngo'i tshes bcu bzhi'i nyin

zhag gcig smyung ba bgyis pas shin du dri zhim pa'i dri'i shing gi me sbar ba la pu shel tse dang / ta ka ra dang / spang spos dang / yungs kar dang / zho dang sbrang rtsi dang / zhun mar dang / sbyar ba'i sbyin sreg lan stong rtsa brgyad

bgyi'o/ /gla rtsi dang / ga bur dang / tsan dan gyi chus bsgos pa'i 'bras yos dang / me tog gis bkang ba'i mchod yon gyi snod bum pa sar pa brgyad stsal lo/ /dkar gsum gyi gtor mas bkang ba ga bur gyis bsgos

pa'i gtor ma'i bum pa gsum stsal lo/ /me tog shin du dri zhim po stsal bar bgyi zhing gla rtsi dang / tsan dan dang / ga bur dang / kun du ru'i bdug spos stsal bar bgyi'o/ /de nas las yongs su rdzogs pa dang /

'dod pa'i gzugs can ma bzang mo de lha'i gzhal med khang du mchi zhing mdun na mchis te/ de mthong nas ma 'am/ sring mo 'am/ chung ma 'am/ las byed pa 'am/ mngag gzhug ma 'am/ pho nya ma rnams ji lta bur

ji ltar tshig tu brjod pa de la smros shig dang / ci ste mar gyur na de'i tshe bu bzhin du snying nas yongs su skyong bar bgyid do/ /nor dang / 'bru dang / dbyig dang / gser dang / gos dang / rgyan dang / lhab lhub dang / mal chas yongs su

skyong bar bgyid do/ /ci ste sring mor gyur na de'i tshe longs spyod thams cad kyis yongs su skyong bar bgyid do/ /ji ltar yid la bsams pa'i bud med dpag tshad brgya'i pha rol nas kyang bkug ste/ yongs su longs

spyad pa'i phyir yongs su spyod par bgyid cing phyir yang de nyid du gtong bar bgyid do/ /ci ste chung mar gyur na de dang / lha rdzas kyi gzhal med khang dam pa yongs su longs spyod pa'i gzhal med khang mthong ste/ lha rdzas kyi bza' ba

dang btung ba dang / longs spyod stsol bar bgyid do/ /ro bro ba'i mchog ro brgya dang ldan pa ches khyad par du 'phags pa'i longs spyod stsol bar bgyid do/ /mchog tu dga' ba'i rtsed mos 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga'i longs

spyod la yongs su spyod par bgyid do/ /lha rdzas kyi dri dang / me tog dang phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / lha rdzas kyi gos dang / rgyan dang / lhab lhub kyis brgyan pa'i gzhal med khang du 'gyur ro/ /nor dang / 'bru dang /

mdzod dang / bang ba yongs su gang zhing mchis par 'gyur ro/ /nor bu dang / gser dang / rdo rje dang / bai dUr+ya dang / gser dang / shang ka shI la dang / byi ru dang / dngul dang / sa le sbram dang / dngul sgog

dpag tu med pa thob pa'i gter stsol bar bgyid do/ /rta dang / ba lang dang / ma he dang / phyugs dang / bran pho dang / bran mo rab tu mang po mang por 'phel zhing mchis par 'gyur ro/ /mal cha'i longs spyod sna tshogs stsol

bar bgyid do/ /lha rdzas kyi chung ma'i longs spyod bud med gzugs sna tshogs pa'i 'khor brgya dang ldan pa nyin gcig bzhin du gnas par 'gyur ro/ /yo byad thams cad phun sum tshogs pas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du

gnas par 'gyur ro/ /tshe lha'i lo stong thub par 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags 'chang gis bag yod par bgyi ste/ dkon mchog gsum la mchog tu gus pa dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / rdo rje 'dzin

la mchog tu gus par bgyi'o/ /rtag tu sbyin pa la mngon par dga' bar bgyi zhing sems can thams cad la mchog tu snying brtse bar bgyi'o/ /gzhan du mi smra bar bgyi'o/ /gal te las byed par gyur na de'i tshe rgyal po la bgyi ba
bzhin du las thams cad bgyid de/ shin du yongs su rdzogs kyi bar du las la mngon par brtson par 'gyur ro/ /ji ste mngag gzhug par ma gyur na gnas gang du mngag pa de'i gnas thams cad du mchi ste/

dpag tshad stong gi pha rol du mchi zhing / skad cig gis slar yang mchi'o/ /thams cad du gter chen po 'byin par bgyid 'dren par bgyid do/ /dpag tshad stong gi pha rol nas bud med 'gugs par bgyid cing / nor dang /
'bru dang / glang po che dang / ma he dang / rta dag 'gugs par bgyid de/ slar yang gtong bar bgyid do/ /bag yod pas bsgo bar bgyi ste/ bdag nyid shin du ring po'i yul dang / gnas su 'phen par bgyid/

gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / lha ma yin gyi gnas su 'degs par bgyid de/ der srog gi bar du chad du 'gyur bar mi bgyid do/ /ji ste pho nya mor gyur na phyogs bcu thams cad du mchi ste/ lha'i
'jig rten du mchi'o/ /klu'i 'jig rten du mchi'o/ /lha ma yin gyi gnas su mchi'o/ /nam mkha' lding gi gnas su mchi'o/ /mi 'am ci'i gnas su mchi'o/ /lto 'phye chen po'i gnas su mchi'o/ /gnod sbyin

dang srin po'i gnas su mchi'o/ /'byung po'i gnas su mchi zhing thams cad du pho nya'i bya ba bgyis nas slar mchi'o/ /skad cig gis dpag tshad stong du mchi zhing mchi'o/ /skad cig gis dpag tshad stong du thams

cad du phyin nas pho nya'i bya ba bgyid do/ /ji srid sa'i 'og gi bar du 'jug cing phyir yang mchi'o/ /bya ba shin du yongs su rdzogs par bgyis nas bdag yod pas thams cad bgyi ste/ nyin gcig bzhin du mchod

yon dang / rkang pa bkru ba stsal bar bgyi'o/ /thams cad kyi gnas thams cad du phyin cing bya ba 'grub pa/ bla na ma mchis par 'gyur ro/ /de nas gnod sbyin mo dgug par 'tshal na rig sngags 'chang des gzhan

gyis ma reg pa'i shing leb sar pa la gnod sbyin dang / gnod sbyin mo rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa bri bar bgyi zhing gnas dben zhing 'khrug pa ma mchis pa gtsang ma'i gnas su gzhag par bgyi'o/ /rig sngags

'chang gtsang ma shin du khrus bgyis pas gos gtsang ma bgos pas 'o ma dang / 'bras thug po che'i chan gyi gtor ma stsal bar bgyi'o/ /shing ka ra ba ra'i me sbar ba la yungs dkar dang / gu gul dang / ra'i khrag

dang / zhun mar dang / bsres pa'i sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad bgyi'o/ /stong rtsa brgyad rdzogs pa dang / me tog dmar po stsal na gnod sbyin mo de yang rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na mchis te/ rig sngags 'chang

slongs shig ces smra bar 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags 'chang gis khyod nga'i ci bgyi zhes bya ba byed pa yin no/ /nga'i las thams cad byed pa yin no/ /nga la dbyig mang po byin cig ces brjod par bgyi'o/ /de'i tshe gnod

sbyin mo de ltar lags so zhes smras nas mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /gang gi tshe dgos pa byung ba de'i tshe yungs kar dang / gu gul la yongs su bzlas nas mer gtor na de mchi zhing ci bgyi zhes bya ba thams cad bgyid par

'gyur ro/ /dbyig stong stsol bar 'gyur/ ji srid 'tsho'i bar du mchis par 'gyur/ rtag tu ci bgyi ba'i bya ba bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /de nas lha ma yin gyi bu mo dgug par 'tshal na rig sngags 'chang des spra tshil las
lha ma yin gyi bu mo rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa bgyi'o/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang gis gnas 'khrug pa ma mchis pa dang / dben pa dang / sa phyogs gtsang ma'i gnas su gzhag par bgyi'o/ /rig sngags
'chang gtsang ma shin du khrus bgyis pa gos gtsang ma bgos pas zhag gsum zan bcad par bgyis la/ de'i mdun du skyil mo dkrung bcas te mchis la gu gul gyi bdug spos stsal cing dkar gsum gyi gtor

ma stsal bar bgyi'o/ /don yod pa'i lcags kyus bzlas brjod yungs dkar la bzlas pas bu mo de la lan stong rtsa brgyad rdeg par bgyi'o/ /las yongs su rdzogs pa dang / de nas lha ma yin gyi bu mo de rang gi gzugs

kyis mdun na mchis te/ gang dang gang du dgos pa de dang der dgos pa'i rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro/ /de'i las thams cad bgyid par 'gyur/ thams cad du mchi bar 'gyur/ ji srid 'tsho'i bar du mchis par 'gyur

ro/ /ji ste srin po dang / srin mo dgug par 'tshal na gu gul dang / ba lang gi sha skam po dang lhan cig bsres pa la don yod pa'i lcags kyus lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis pas dur khrod du mtshan thog thag bdugs
