na srin po'i gnas thams cad kyi sgo phye bar 'gyur te srin po dang / srin mo rnams dbang du gyur nas gnas te/ ci bgyi ba'i bya ba bgyid par 'gyur/ ci bsgo ba de bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang zhing ji srid 'tsho'i bar du
mchis par 'gyur ro/ /gdugs gcig bzhin du dngul chu srang khri stsol bar bgyid do/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang gis cha gsum du dbye bar bgyi ste/ cha gcig ni dkon mchog la mchod par bgyi'o/ /

cha gnyis pa ni gcig bzhin du sbyin par gtang ngo / /srin mo rnams la zan dang / tshod sngon rlon pa'i gtor ma stsal bar bgyi'o/ /de nas srin po 'khor dang bcas pa de rnams tshim par 'gyur ro/ /de nas srin po 'khor

dang bcas pa shin tu mgyogs par 'gyur te/ shugs chen pos dgos pa thams cad grub cing nam yang gzhan du bgyid par mi 'gyur ro/ /gtor ma gtsang ma stsal bar bgyi'o/ /ji ste sha za dang / sha za mo dgug par 'tshal

na ba lang gi mkhris pa dang / de'i so dang / gu gul dang / shing arka'i 'o ma sbyar te/ lam gyi bzhi mdor bdug par bgyi zhing / lhag ma dang 'bags pa'i gtor ma stsal na/ sha za mo de mchi zhing rig sngags 'chang gi

mdun du mchis te/ ci bgyi ba'i bya ba bgyid pa'i bran du 'gyur/ las thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /dpag tshad stong gi pha rol tu mchi zhing skad cig gis slar yang mchi'o/ /dgos pa thams cad sgrub par bgyid do/ /

dus gsum du gtor ma lhag ma'i gtor ma sgo drung du stsal bar bgyi'o/ /nyin gcig bzhin du gser gyi 'dong tse brgya sngags su 'jog par 'gyur te/ des thams cad zad par bgyis na phyir zhing 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /ji ste

rgyal po'i btsun mo dgug par 'tshal na rig sngags 'chang gtsang ma shin du khrus bgyis pa gos gtsang ma bgos pa des yungs kar dkar po dang / skye tshe'i sa bon dang / 'gi'u wang dang / pad ma'i 'dab ma dang / rgyam tshwa dang /

lan tshwa bsres pa la lan brgya rtsa brgyad yongs su bzlas na phye ma'i rdzas su bgyis la yungs dkar dang / skye tshe'i sa bon dang / sbrang rtsi'i sa bon lan cig mnyes la yang lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis

te lam gyi rgyal po'i sgo 'am/ lam gyi bzhi mdo 'am/ lam po che 'am/ grong khyer gyi sgor gtor na gang der gom pa bor ba tsam gyis dbang du gyur nas gnas te ci bgyi ba'i bya ba bgyid do/ /rgyal po btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas

pa bkug cing dbang du 'gyur ro/ /thams cad du ci bgyi ba'i bya ba bgyid cing / bsgo ba bzhin bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /gang bslangs pa de ster te dngul dang / gser dang / gos dang / rgyan dang / lhab lhub dang / spud pa dang / bzhon pa

dang / mal cha dang / 'bru la sogs pa stsol bar bgyid do/ /gang smras pa de bgyid cing gang bsgo ba bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /de'i yul gcig tu yang 'jig rten gsum po thams cad kyis mchod pa chen po bgyid par 'gyur zhing

thams cad du dbang bskur ro/ /de nas bram ze dbang du bgyi bar 'tshal na/ rig sngags 'chang des nas dang / til dang / 'bras sa lu dang / zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / zhun mar dang bsres pa'i sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad bgyis na/ rig byed

bzhi dang ldan pa'i bram ze thams cad kyis spyi bor bkur ba gcig pur 'gyur ro/ /thams cad du mchod pa bgyid par 'gyur zhing bram ze thams cad la bgyid pa thogs pa med par 'gyur ro/ /rgyal rigs dbang du bgyi bar

'tshal na til dang / 'bras thug po che dang / sran mud ga dang / zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / zhun mar bsres pa'i sbyin sreg bgyi ste/ sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad kyi bar du bgyis na thams cad la dbang bsgyur zhing mchod pa'i 'os chen por

'gyur ro thams cad dbang du 'gyur bar bgyid do/ /ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bgyid de ci bgyi ba bgyid cing bsgo ba bzhin bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /de nas dmangs rigs dbang du bgyi bar 'tshal na lan tshwa dang / 'bras sA lu'i phub ma dang / su mu

kha'i sa bon dang / zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / zhun mar sbyar ba'i sbyin sreg brgya stong bgyis na dmangs rigs thams cad bran du gyur nas gnas te/ ji srid 'tsho'i bar du mchis par 'gyur ro/ /dgra dang phyir rgol ba dang /

phas kyi dgra thams cad bzlog par 'tshal na rig sngags 'chang des shing mngar gyi shing gi me sbar ba la/ sa bon bdun dang / zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / zhun mar dang sbyar ba'i sbyin sreg brgyad stong bgyi'o/ /brgyad stong rdzogs pa

dang / dgra dang phyir rgol ba dang / phas kyi dgra thams cad bzlog par 'gyur ro/ /pha rol gyi dmag tshogs thams cad bzlog par 'tshal na shing tsher ma can gyi me sbar ba la 'bras yos dang / yungs kar dang / zho dang / sbrang
rtsi dang / zhun mar dang sbyar ba'i sbyin sreg brgyad stong bgyi'o/ /brgyad stong rdzogs na pha rol gyi dmag tshogs thams cad bzlog par 'gyur ro/ /g.yul 'gyed pa bzlog par 'tshal na

skye tshe'i sa bon dang / gu gul dang / b+hang ga'i sa bon dang / zhog chu dang / zhun mar dang sbyar ba'i sbyin sreg bgyis na g.yul 'gyed pa'i nang du son pa'i sems can thams cad slar bzlog par 'gyur zhing / thams

cad du rgyal ba thob par 'gyur ro/ /de nas gdon thams cad las thar bar bgyi bar 'tshal na rig sngags 'chang des bdug pa 'di sbyar bar bgyi ste/ k+She ma ka dang shing mngar dang / /tsa rong dang ni gu gul dang / /

mu ra ya k+Sha mu ra dang / /b+hu ta ke shi mnyam par gzhal/ /phub ma dang ni pa la ka /khyim bya'i sgo nga'i shun lpags dang / /sbrul lpags dang ni yung rnam gnyis/ /b+ha ga'i sa bon ba lang mkhris/ /nya dang legs par
sbyar bgyis te/ /ra yi gcin gyis bsgos pa la/ /lcags kyu'i gsang sngags bzlas pa yis/ /bdug pa dam pa'i gtso bo 'di/ /thams cad du ni rigs pa ste/ /stong phrag brgyad bcu rtsa bzhi gdon/ /gang dag
sa steng gnas pa rnams/ /bdug pa'i dri 'dis 'jig 'gyur zhing / /mi bzad gdon rnams 'bros par 'gyur/ /phyogs bcu dag ni g.yo 'gyur zhing / /sum bcu'i lha dang ri rab g.yo/ /gnod sbyin srin po'i
gnas dag dang / /sdang ba'i srog chags chen po 'tshig /gzhan yang sna tshogs dug bcas pa'i/ /srog chags thams cad 'jig 'gyur ba/ /dri tsam gyis ni dogs pa med/ /bdug pa 'dis ni bdug byas na/ /der
ni rims nad mi gnas te/ /nyin gcig pa yi rims dang ni/ /nyin gnyis pa dang bzhi pa'i rims/ /gang yang mi bzad khyab 'jug rims/ /de dag thams cad 'jig 'gyur zhing / /skad cig gis ni gtan nas
'joms// //'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po/ bam po nyi shu gsum pa/ de nas mig bsku ba'i sman brjod par bya'o/ /gdon thams cad
'joms pa gang gis mig bskus pa tsam gyis gdon ma rungs pa 'bros par 'gyur ro/ /ro stod kyi nad thams cad 'joms par 'gyur te/ mig bskus pa tsam gyis de thams cad med par 'gyur te dogs

pa mi bya'o/ /mig gi nad ni ling tog dang / skya bor gyur pa dang / rab rib dang / chu bur can dang / chu zag pa dang / tshag po dang / ha sa rA dza dang / byis pa'i mchi ma dang / mig tu sme ba byung ba dang / khrag dang /

rlung dang / bad kan dang / mkhris pa dang / rdul 'byung ba dang / 'brum bu dang / g.ya' ba dang / mig skams pa dang / mdongs pa dang / klad pa na ba dang / klad pa'i gzhog phyed na ba dang / kha nad dang / kha na ba

dang / dpral ba na ba de dag thams cad 'joms par 'gyur ro/ /mig sman gyis mig bskus pa tsam gyis rims thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ba dang / nad thams cad sel ba dang / mod la nyon mongs pa thams cad
spong ba dang / sdig pa thams cad rnam par 'jig par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar na mig sman mchog tu grub pa/ bgegs thams cad sel ba dang / ma rungs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa/ sems can thams cad la

dbang byed pa/ thams cad du rgyal bar byed pa/ mig sman rtag tu mchog tu dkon pa/ gsad pa la thug pa thar bar byed pa/ btson ra nas gang thar bar byed pa/ rgyal po dag gang la khros pa las rgod cing smra bar

'gyur te/ nam 'tsho'i bar du rtag tu bu bzhin yongs su skyong zhing gnas pa/ dug thams cad mod la med par byed pa ni/ mig sman mchog yin no/ /bsam pa ngan cing sdang ba'i sems can dang / dgra dang phyir rgol

pa dang / dgra dang / 'gyed pa dag mig sman gyis bskus pas mthong na dbang du 'gyur te gnas so/ /ma he gtum po dang / glang po che dang / rlung dang / ser ba dang / steng ka mthon po nas g.yang du ltung ba dang / me'i

phung po dang / khyim rdib pa dang / g.yang sar ltung ba rnams mig sman gyis mig bskus pas mthong na zhi bar 'gyur zhing / gzhan yang bya ba rnam pa sna tshogs byed de 'di la dogs par mi bya'o/ /yung ba dang / skyer

pa dang / na le sham dang / pi pi l-ing dang / shi ri ga ber dang / 'bras bu gsum dang / ut+pal sngon po dang / ldong ros dang / gur kum la sogs pa'i mig sman dang / rgyam tsha dang / spang spos dang / rgya mtsho'i sbu

ba dang / dung phye dang / 'di rnams lhan cig tu phye ma zhib mor byas pa la gsang sngags lan bdun bzlas te ga bur dang / gla rtsi mnams pa'i mig bsku ba'i sman lcags kyu'i rig sngags kyi rgyal po'i gsang

sngags stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas te/ mig bskus na dri ma thams cad sel zhing sdig pa dang / gzhan sdug bsngal thams cad las grol bar 'gyur ro/ /mun pa thams cad kyi nang du nyi ma bzhin du skye bo
thams cad kyi nang du mdzes par 'gyur ro/ /de nas ri lu bshad par bya ste/ sdig pa thams cad rnam par 'jig pa/ nad thams cad sel bar 'grub pa/ bgegs thams cad med par byed pa/ gdon thams
cad rnam par 'joms pa/ sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sbyong ba/ mod la dug thams cad med par byed pa/ nyon mongs pa'i dri ma thams cad sel ba/ bcings pa thams cad gcod par byed pa/ g.yul thams cad
las rgyal ba sbyin zhing dge ba/ dgra thams cad rab tu 'joms pa/ rtag tu dug thams cad 'joms pa/ rgyal po'i sgor mdzes par 'gyur ba/ nor dang 'bru 'phel bar 'gyur ba/ rgyal po dang / rkun po dang /

chu dang / me dang / dug dang / glang po che med par byed pa/ sbrul ma rungs pa dang / byi ba'i dug gis 'jigs pa dang / khyim 'jigs pa dang / ri snyil ba dang / seng ge dang / stag dang / dom la sogs pa rab tu rgyu

ba dang / gnod pa dang / bcings pa'i tshe 'gro bar dka' ba 'byung ba dang / nad dang rims 'joms pa dang / dus ma yin par 'chi ba med par byed pa/ tshe dang nad med par byed pa 'phel ba/ skyes pa dang / bud med dang /

gzhon nu ma rnams mchog tu bde bar 'gyur ba ste/ gang gis ri lu bcangs na thams cad du rgyal ba 'thob cing gdon 'byung bar mi 'gyur/ rnam par log 'dren gyis ma yin no/ /gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang /
'byung po dang / sha za dang / brjed byed ma rungs pa rnams ri lu mthong ba tsam gyis phyogs bcur 'bros par 'gyur ro/ /'dis byis pa gsod par mi byed do/ /sman 'di la reg pa tsam gyis khyim der dus ma
yin par 'chi ba dang / na ba thams cad dang / nad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro/ /'bras dang / phol mig dang / lhog pa dang / 'brum phran mched pa dang / shu ba dang / g.yan pa dang / mdze dang /
'brum bu mched pa dang / sha bkra la bskus pa tsam gyis byang bar 'gyur ro/ /lus thams cad du zhugs pa'i nad la chu dron po dang 'thungs pa tsam la sogs pas yongs su byang bar 'gyur ro/ /'jigs skrag

pa thams cad las rtag tu rgyal bar 'gyur ro/ /'jigs pa chen po las thams cad rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro/ /gnas thams cad du song ba la sbyar ba byas na thams cad 'kho bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas rdzas su bya ba

ni pu shel tsi dang / tsan dan dang / rgya spos dang / ru sta dang / rdo dreg dang / bad tra dang / tsha ma ka dang / sha mi dang / pad ma pa tra dang / uta pa la dang / na la da dang / 'bras bu gsum dang / tsha ba gsum dang / sug

smel dang / btsod dang / su ga ri dang / ra dza n+ya rnam gnyis dang / spri ka dang / sra rtsi pog dang / gur kum la sogs pa dang / rab tu ldan pa dang / de dag kun bsres te/ zhib mor btags la kha ra dang / chu dang /

sbyar bas ri lu byas la gsang sngags brgyad brgya bzlas brjod byas te/ grib ma la skams pa de ni sman grub pa yin te/ thams cad rgyal bar byed cing dge ba yin no/ /rnga dang / rnga bo che dang / dung la ri lu

mchog bskus te/ gnas mthon por song ste/ dung gi sgra dang / rnga bo che dang / rdza rnga ji srid du thos pa de srid tsam du 'jigs pa med par 'gyur ro/ /dug dang bcas pa ni thams cad dug med par 'gyur te dogs par

mi bya'o/ /nad thams cad dang / mi ngas thams cad dang / yams kyi nad dang / lo nyes thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /bde zhing legs pa nyid du 'gyur ro/ /gang dag mtshams med pa byed pa'i sems can

sdig pa can dmyal ba la gzhol ba dag gis sgra thos pa tsam gyis sdig pa thams cad byang ste/ bde bar 'chi ba'i dus byas nas bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro/ /gos la bdugs na bdag nyid mchod pa chen po 'thob cing

thams cad la dbang byed par gnas pa dang / don grub pa bla na med pa yin no/ /nor dang 'bru rab tu 'phel zhing dgos pa sgrub pa bla na med pa yin no/ /thams cad mchod pa dang / rtag tu tshig gzung ba 'os par

'gyur ro/ /rgyal po gang la khros pa las rgod cing smra bar 'gyur ro/ /bud med rnams kyi gnang chen du 'gyur zhing rtag tu nad med par 'gyur ro/ /rtag tu brtson 'grus dang ldan pa dang / stobs dang ldan pa dang / rtag tu

dpal dang gzi brjid dang ldan pa dang / rtag tu glang po che bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa dang / shi nas mtho ris su skye bar 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug

gis yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag la mchis pa ni don yod yangs pa'i lcags kyu zhes bya ba don yod pa'i lcags kyu'i gzungs chen po'i cho ga zhib mo'i dkyil 'khor dang / don yod pa'i zhags

pa'i snying po dang / dkyil 'khor chen po lta ba dang / bsgrub pa dang / bklags pas 'grub pa/ don yod pa chen po rnam par 'phrul pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi dam tshig grub pa lags so/ /gang gis pad

ma rgyas pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po mtha' dag dang / phyag rgya dang / rim par phye ba dang / gsang sngags dang / cho ga dang / bde bar sgrub pa mtha' dag ni rigs kyi spyi thams cad kyi dam tshig chen po'i rjes su 'jug pa 'grub

pa 'gyur ba lags so/ /'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dang pad ma'i rigs dang / rdo rje'i rigs dang / nor bu'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor chen po 'od dpag tu med pa'i snying po mchog dang po rdo rje rin

po che rtse mo'i mchog dang po'i dkyil 'khor kyi dam tshig las thams cad du rjes su zhugs shing dam tshig shes par 'gyur ba dang / thams cad du byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ba de rig sngags 'chang ba de thams cad

mchog tu grub par bgyi ba'i phyir dang / sems can thams cad la rjes su brtse ba'i slad du bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khor mang po'i dbus su bsgrags par bgyi'o/ /rigs bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi

bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo rnams kyi sdig pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad rnam par gzhig pa'i phyir bshad par bgyi'o/ /grub pa yang dag par rjes su stsal bar bgyi'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de
bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /sems can dag pa chen po khyod kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams dag cing

shin du yongs su dag pa yin te/ legs so legs so/ /rig sngags 'chang ba thams cad dang / sems can thams cad dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs dang /

bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo rnams la bstan par bya ba bshod cig /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la rigs pa thams cad kyi spyi grub pa dam tshig gi rjes
su 'jug par byin gyis brlabs so/ /ngas kyang de dag byin gyis brlabs so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar don yod pa'i rgyas pa'i

pad ma'i snying po'i dkyil 'khor chen po bshad pa/ don yod pa'i lcags kyu'i yang dag pa mchog grub pa/ sgrub pa dam pa ni sa dang ba'i lci bas dkyil 'khor gru bzhi bya ba ni shin du mdzes pa shin du 'jam por

bya'o/ /tshon sna lngas rnam par dbye ba ni grwa dang bcas par rnam par dbye bar bya'o/ /tshon sna tshogs kyis bri ba dang / dkyil 'khor gru bzhir thig gdab pa ni mnyam par thig gis dbye bar bya ste/ sgo bzhir cha dbye bar

bya'o/ /chu zheng du khru bzhi tshad tsam du dbye bar bya'o/ /dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi snying po ni tshad khru do par byas la/ tshon sna lnga'i sgal bu dang / tshon sa las dbye bar bya'o/ /dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi snying po la pad

ma dkar po kha bye ba zlum por bya'o/ /pad ma kha bye ba'i dbus su zhags pa dang / lcags kyu dang / pad ma gnas par bya ba ni klu mgo gdengs ka 'dra ba lcags kyu dang bcas pa dang / lag pa dang bcas pas pad ma'i

lcags kyus 'dzin pa dang / 'bar ba'i nang na 'dug par bya'o/ /tshon sna tshogs kyis bri'o/ /pad ma kha bye ba'i phyi rol gyi sgal bu ni lcags kyu dang bcas pa'i sgal bur bya'o/ /nang dang phyi'i bar du ni rin po che sna tshogs

kyis brgyan par bya'o/ /lcags kyu'i phyi rol gyi sgal bu ni zla ba yid du 'ong ba dri ma med pa'i me tog gis bya'o/ /zla ba yid du 'ong ba dri ma med pa'i phyi rol gyi sgal bu ni mdung rtse gsum pa bri bar bya'o/ /mdung rtse

gsum pa'i phreng ba'i phyi rol gyi sgal bu ni phyag rgya phyag na thogs pa bri bar bya ste/ mtshon cha sna tshogs dang / me tog rnams so/ /kun la 'bar ba'i phreng ba dang / 'od zer kha dog sna tshogs bri bar bya'o/ /

phyag gi phyag rgya'i phyi rol gyi sgal bu ni stegs bu dang 'dra bar bya'o/ /stegs bu'i phyi rol gyi sgal bu ni 'khor bar lcags kyu bri bar bya'o/ /snying po'i dkyil 'khor gyi grwar ni rgyal po chen po bzhi go bgos pa lcags

kyu dang / mdung rtse gcig pa thogs pa 'bar ba'i nang na 'dug pa rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa skyil mo dkrung phyed du bcas te/ pad mo'i gdan la 'dug par bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol thog thag tu
'jigs pa med pas phyag mtshan rnams thams cad pad ma la 'dug pa bri bar bya'o/ /sgo bzhi gnas su pad ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams bri ba ni shar gyi sgor lag na rdo rje/ lhor ral pa gcig ma/ nub tu

rdo rje lcags sgrog ma/ byang du pho nya mo dang / rig sngags kyi lha mo rnams bri bar bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol gyi sgal bu ni me tog gi stegs bu 'dra ba bya'o/ /phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor ni kun du

ba'i lci bas bya'o/ /phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor de la nas phyes pad ma bri bar bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor kun du bum pa gang ba dang / dar btags pa'i mda' dang / dri'i snod bkang bas brgyan cing byug pa'i chu dgang ba dang /

bdug pa'i snod kyis brgyan pa dang / me tog sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa dang / dri chab dang / mchod yon gyi chab dang / 'bras dang / yon chab dang / dngul gyi me tog dang / gser gyi me tog dang / zangs kyi me tog gis 'jigs

pa med par brgyan par bya'o/ /mu tig dang / byi ru dang / rin po che bai dUr+ya dang sngon po dang / margad dang / pad ma rA ga rnams kyis de bzhin du brgyan to/ /dkyil 'khor kun du dung dang / bil ba dang / rtswa dar b+ha dang /

gser dang / dngul gyis brgyan par bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor gyi don du mchod pa'i phyir dkyil 'khor gyi lha bkra shis pa rnams dang / sgo bzhi'i gnas su dri chab kyi bum pa dar gyis brgyan te gzhag par bya'o/ /dkyil

'khor gyi phyi rol thog thag tu ro sna tshogs kyi gtor ma gzhag pa dang / bum bu dang / bya ma bum dang / bum pa dang / rte gu dang / kham phor dang / bum pa gang ba rnams byas te gzhag go/ pog phor dang / gtor ma bzang

po sna tshogs dang / /me tog sna tshogs dgram par bya/ /phreng ba bzang pos brgyan par bya/ /tshon sna lnga pa'i ba dan gdags/ /tshon sna lnga pa'i srad bu seng ldeng gi phur bu la btags pa gzugs par bya/ kun du mar me'i

phreng ba dang / mar me'i sdong bu bzhi yang de bzhin no/ /mkhas pas dkyil 'khor gyi nang du bdug pa dbul ba ni a ga ru dang / tsan dan dang / du rus ka dang / spri ka rnams kyis bdug pa ga bur dang / gla rtsis bsgos pa bya'o/ /
dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol gyi bdug pa ni gu gul dang / sil la ki dang / kun du ra'i bdug pa dbul bar bya'o/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang bas gos sar pa bgos te/ gtsang mar byas nas maN+Dal gyi las su bya

ba'i cho ga dang / lcags kyu'i rig sngags bzlas brjod bya ba dang / slob ma gzhag cing dkyil 'khor gyi dam tshig dang / phyag rgya dang / ba'i rnam lnga la reg par bya ste/ mkhas pas phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags brjod

cing don yod pa'i lcags kyu'i rig sngags chen po ni thams cad la sbyar bar bya'o/ /mtshams bcing ba dang / phyogs bcing ba dang / spyi gtsug bcing ba dang / 'jug pa dang / dam tshig dang / khrus bya ba dang / gos bgo

ba dang / phyag 'tshal ba dang / bskor ba dang / de dag thams cad la sbyar bar bya'o/ /sbyin sreg dang / bzlas brjod kyi cho ga zhi ba dang / rgyas pa dang / mngon spyod dang / dgug pa dang / spyan drang ba dang / gshegs su

gsol ba dang / de bzhin du yang dag par sprul pa dang / las thams cad la rig sngags 'chang bas thams cad du sbyar na myur zhing rdzogs par 'chang zhing des na grub pa bla na med par 'gyur ro/ /bgrang phreng dang / 'khrig

ma'i gdub bu dang / srad bu se ral kha gtsang ma dang / rtswa dar b+ha dang / yungs kar dang / chu dang bsre ba dang / rtswa dar b+ha'i stan la mchod phyir thogs te/ skyil mo dkrung bcas nas las bya zhing pad ma dang / mchod yon

gyi dkyil 'khor la dbul ba dang / de dag rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par dus thams cad du nges par bya'o/ /don yod pa'i lcags kyu'i rig sngags dran par bya ste/ grub pa mchog dang / las thams cad sgrub pa dang / gang

dang gang dgos pa la dran par bya'o/ /gsang sngags de nyid kyis slar gshegs su gsol lo/ /gsang sngags gzhan dang bsre bar mi bya ste/ phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags 'di ni dpa' bo gcig tu klags pas grub
pa'i mchog /sangs rgyas thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis kyang byin gyis brlabs pa ste/ yang dag par 'grub cing

mchog sbyin par byed pa yin no/ /don yod pa'i lcags kyu'i dkyil 'khor dam pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di mthong ba ni sdig pa thams cad rnam par 'dag cing sgrib pa dang / sdig pa thams cad dang / sngon gyi sgrib pa mi bzad pa rnams sngar

bsags pa rnams rnam par zhig par 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten pa'i grub pa bde ba dang / 'jig rten pha rol tu 'bras bu chen po bde ba dang / shi ba'i dus byas nas bde ba can du song ste/ pad ma'i nang nas rgyal ba'i spyan sngar

rdzus te skye ba dang / kha ton byed na tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ba dang / gang zhig 'chad pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong phrag bye ba khrag khrig snyed thams cad kyi sgo phye ste 'dug cing gang du 'dod pa der 'jug

par 'gyur ro/ /rgyal ba thams cad kyis rnam par gzigs shing spyi bor phyag gzhag ste/ dbugs 'byin par mdzad cing dus kun du bla na med pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par 'gyur ro/ /'di ni skye ba'i tha ma yin te/ chos

kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i bar dang / byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug gi bar du yin gyi/ gzhan du skye bar mi 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten 'di na dga' bar 'gyur zhing bla ma dang / chos can dang / nor gyi mchod pa dang / sems can

kun gyis mchod par 'os pa ni ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa bzhin du 'gyur ro/ /nor dang 'bru 'phel ba dang / gos dang rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang / rgyal po dang / btsun mor bcas pa thams cad bya ba ci yod ces bran

bzhin du gnas par 'gyur ro/ /lcags kyu'i dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa ni phyir mi ldog pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /'di ngan 'gror yang 'gro bar mi 'gyur zhing rtag tu bde zhing dga' ba dang / sems can thams cad dga'
ba dang / byams par 'gyur ro/ /lha thams cad kyis lus can shin du bsrungs par 'gyur ro/ /tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po rnams kyis mchod par 'gyur ro/ /bsod nams kyi phung

po 'phel bar 'gyur zhing nyi ma bzhin du gzi brjid 'bar bar 'gyur ro/ /sdug cing bzang ba mchog tu blta bar 'os par 'gyur ro/ /dpal gyis dus rtag tu 'bar zhing shin du rgyas par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs

pa 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig dgu bcu rtsa gnyis gang gA'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi drung nas dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po yongs su gzung bar 'gyur ro/ /bsod nams chen po dang ldan par
'gyur ro/ /lcags kyu'i dkyil 'khor du gang zhig zhugs pa tsam dang / dkyil 'khor de lta bu la me tog gcig dbul ba dang / ril bu gcig tsam gyi bdug pa dbul ba'i sems can de dag ni gang gA'i klung gi

bye ma dgu bcu rtsa dgu pa 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi me tog sna tshogs kyis legs par brgyan par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing re rer yang gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dgu bcu rtsa

dgu 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la sna tshogs kyi mchod pa byas par 'gyur ro/ /bdug pa mang po rnam par phye ba'i sprin las tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po dang / gor shir sha' bdug pa

'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa'i sprin rim par phye ba rab tu 'khrigs par 'gyur ro/ /de la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis legs so zhes bya ba rab tu sbyin par
mdzad de/ rigs kyi bu legs so legs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la mchod pa 'di ni mchog tu grub pa bla na med pa yin no/ /de dag gis me tog dang / bdug pas dkyil 'khor mchod pa ni bsod

nams kyi phung po'i dge ba chen po yongs su rdzogs pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /sgrub pa chen po 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rtag tu

mchog sbyin pa mdzad par 'gyur ro/ /rtag tu mthong bar bzhed par 'gyur ro/ /rtag tu rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro/ /rtag tu don yod pa'i lcags kyu grub pa grub par 'gyur ro/ /tshig gzung bar bya bar 'gyur ro/ /

rtag tu bzhin 'dzum par 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / lus ngan po dang / gzhon nu dang / dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / lha'i bu rnams bsrung ba dang / sbed pa dang / skyob

pa'i phyir rjes su 'brang ba chen por 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis phyag rgyas btab cing byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro/ /de'i sa phyogs kyang mchod rten snyam du sems shing mchod rten ring
bsrel can du 'gyur ro/ /sems can gang dag de la blta ba'i phyir song ba'i sems can de dag sdig pa dang / sgrib pa dang / dug thams cad las yongs su thar bar 'gyur ro/ /'jigs pa dang / rims dang /

mya ngan thams cad las bral bar 'gyur ro/ /nad dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /rtag tu sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis dgos par 'gyur ro/ /rtag tu 'jig rten thams cad kyi bla mar 'gyur
ro/ /dgra thams cad las phyir rgol ba thams cad dang / mi mdza' ba'i 'jigs pa las thar bar 'gyur ro/ /dus ma yin pa'i 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa las yongs su thar bar 'gyur ro/ /'di nas shi na bde ba can gyi
'jig rten gyi khams su skye bar 'gyur ro/ /tha na ri dgas dang / bya dag gnas te phyogs su nye bar song ba de dag sgrib pa thams cad dang / de'i sngon gyi tshe la yongs su bsags pa de dag lhag ma
ma lus par yongs su byang bar 'gyur ro/ /de dag thams cad bde 'gro la gzhol bar 'gyur ro/ /ngan song dang ngan 'gro'i 'jigs pa med par mthar byang chub la thug gi bar du'o// //

de nas don yod pa'i lcags kyu ras la sku gzugs bri ba'i cho ga brjod par bya ste/ gnas thams cad du bla na med pa grub pa ni sdig pa thams cad mod la bsreg par byed pa dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad 'phrog
pa de bzhin du nad thams cad sel ba/ sgrib pa thams cad sbyong ba/ 'jigs pa thams cad las rnam par thar ba/ sems can thams cad la phan par bya ba'i phyir gang dkyil 'khor chen por kun du lung bstan
pa mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa/ mchog tu dkon pa yid la re ba thams cad 'phral du yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba/ bkra shis thams cad sgrub pa/ bsod nams thams cad sogs pa/ myur du nor dang / 'bru

sbyin par mdzad pa/ sgrub pa yang dag pa grub par bya ba'i phyir gsang sngags 'grub pa/ bzlas brjod 'grub pa/ yid la re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'grub pa/ pha rol tu phyin pa bcu yongs su rdzogs

pa de kho na nyid rnam par mthong ba zhes bya ba'i bsod nams chen po skye bar 'gyur ro/ /nam byang chub yang dag par thob kyi bar du dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po rab tu skye bar 'gyur ro/ /don yod pa'i lcags kyu cho 'phrul

chen po'i ras kyi sku gzugs chen po mthong ba la sogs pa ni phyis ngan 'gro'i gnas su mi 'gro zhing sdig pa'i las kyis mi gos pa dang / sngon gyi sgrib pa dang / sdig pa thams cad rnam par 'jig pa dang / sdig pa

thams cad rnam par sel ba dang / ngan song las thar bar 'gyur ba dang / dmyal ba mi bzad pa rnams las thar bar 'gyur ro/ /tshe rabs kun du bde ba dang / da ltar gyi 'di la mchog tu dkon pa'i bde ba lhun gyis grub

pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /bkren pa yang longs spyod dang / phyug po mtshungs pa med pa mchog mod la thob par 'gyur ro/ /lha'i dpal thob par 'gyur ro/ /'khor bzang po bdog par 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po rnams kyis bla mar

bya zhing rtag tu dus thams cad du mchod par 'os par 'gyur ro/ /dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs dang / bud med dang / skyes pa rnams rtag tu dbang du bya ste/ sdug cing

thams cad bsnyen bkur byed cing 'dug pa ni ras kyi sku gzugs la mchod pa bla na med pa yin no/ /ras gru bzhi khyon kun khru gang ngam/ khru do pa la legs par btags pa/ ras 'jam po thag ran bzang po mnyen po shin

du dag par bkrus pa gtsang mar byas pa 'am/ yang na dar yug gam/ yang na mon dar ram/ shun phrags la zla ba yar gyi tshes bcwa lnga tshang ba'i bar du ras kyi sku gzugs bla na med pa bri bar bya'o/ /snod gtsang ma sar

pa'i nang du tshon lhag ma ma yin pa blugs te/ ras kyi sku gzugs gsal bar bri ba ni tshon sna tshogs kyis rnam par dbye bar bya'o/ /dbus su 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mgon po bri ba ni skyil mo
dkrung bcas te bzhugs pa/ spyan gsum pa/ zhal gsum pa/ mchog tu bzang ba/ zhal dang po ni mdzes shing sdug pa/ dbu lcang lo dang thor tshugs kyis brgyan pa/ cod pan la 'od dpag med kyis brgyan pa/

dbu skra 'khyil bar bya'o/ /me tog gi phreng ba bcing bar bya'o/ /phreng ba'i gong du 'od dpag med bya'o/ /cod pan la zla ba phyed pa dang 'od 'dom gang bya'o/ /kun du lcags kyu bya'o/ /kun du 'bar ba'i phreng ba bya'o/ /phyag bzhi la phyag g.yon na pad ma'i
lcags kyu g.yas na mdung rtse gsum pa'i lcags kyu/ g.yon gcig na don yod pa'i zhags pa'i lcags kyu/ g.yas gcig na rdo rje lcags kyu dbugs 'byin par bya'o/ /gdan seng ge'i pad mo bya'o/ /
g.yon du lha mo sgrol ma'o/ /g.yas su dkar mo ste/ me tog sna tshogs thogs pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal du lta ba rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ pad ma la bzhugs pa/ 'bar ba'i nang na

bzhugs par bya'o/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rgyab tu rin po che'i shing lcug phran dang / yal ga dang / chas pa rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras par bya'o/ /ne tso dang / ri skyegs dang /

shang shang te'u dang / rma bya dang / bya ka la ping ka rin po che'i gseb na rgyu bar bya'o/ /shing gi gong spyi bo la khang bu rtsegs ma dang bcas pa'i gzhal med khang gi nang du de bzhin gshegs pa gsum rgyan
thams cad kyis brgyan pa bzhugs par bya'o/ /spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi g.yon du srin mo ral pa gcig ma bya'o/ /g.yas su lag na rdo rje khros pa'i gad mo 'byin pa'i gzugs mche ba gtsigs

pa skra gyen du brdzes pa/ lcang lo dang cod pan gyis brgyan pa/ rdo rje thogs shing rdo rje gsor ba/ nam mkha' la blta bar bya'o/ /smad du gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / lus ngan po dang / gzhon nu dang / rgyal po

chen po bzhi bya'o/ /gong du dbang po dang / dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen po lha'i bu bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed pa bya'o/ /g.yas phyogs su tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po rnams
btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed pa'o/ /g.yon du dga' bo dang / bsnyen dga' bo dang / klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho rnams bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed pa'o/ /g.yas kyi gnas gcig tu rig

sngags 'chang 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs drung du pus mo btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal du lta zhing me tog sna tshogs kyi sdong bu dang / pog phor dang / bgrang phreng lag na thogs

pa bya'o/ /phyogs bzhi ngos kun du ris bskor ba la ri dgas kyi tshogs sna tshogs kyis gang ba/ shing sna tshogs me tog dang / lcug ma can bya'o/ /'bras bu sna tshogs can gyi shing dang lcug ma bya'o/ /gnas so
sor drang srong rnams dang / grul bum gyi shing bya'o/ /tshul de ltar don yod pa'i lcags kyu ras la bris te/ gnas gtsang ma dben par gzhag la rig sngags 'chang bas 'bad pa chen pos mchod par bya'o/ /

a ga ru dang / du rus ka dang / tsan dan gyi bdug pa dbul bar bya'o/ /ci nus par don yod pa'i lcags kyu'i rig pa'i rgyal po bzlas brjod bya'o/ /nyi ma re re ras la sku gzugs bris pa mthong ba tsam gyi mod
la mtshams med pa lnga la sogs pa'i sdig pa dang / sgrib pa dang / mnar med par gzhol ba dang / dam pa'i chos spong ba rnams yongs su dag cing zad par 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten dang / 'jig rten las
'das pa dang / sdug bsngal gyi 'jigs pa mi bzad pa dang / nad thams cad yongs su zad pa dang / rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/ /rnam par 'jig par 'gyur ro/ /dri ma dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /ser sna dang

phrag dog dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /gzungs grub pa chen po so sor thob par 'gyur ro/ /mthong ba tsam gyi mod la de ma thag tu 'bras bu chen po rnyed pa rgya chen por 'gyur ro/ /lan 'ga' yang log par ltung bar 'gro

bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong ba thob par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis dgongs par 'gyur ro/ /lha thams cad kyis rgyun du bsrungs zhing rjes su gzung bar 'gyur ro/ /

ras kyi sku gzugs 'di'i 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mthong ba tsam gyis 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mngon du mthong ba dang 'dra bar rig par bya'o/ /gang zhig ras kyi sku gzugs 'di la

legs par 'gyur ba'i tshul gyis bya ba byed pa dang / mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur byed pa de ni phyogs bcu kun gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung gi bye ma dgu rtsa dgu dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa 'bum phrag

bye ba khrag khrig snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing la mchod par 'gyur ro/ /de nas rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing na rab tu bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi bsod nams kyi phung po chen po yongs su gzung bar 'gyur ro/ /

dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyir mi ldog pa'i gnas thob par 'gyur ro/ /dge ba bsam pa yongs su dag pa chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /de nas byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag gis rig sngags 'chang thams cad grub par bgyi ba'i phyir dang / sems

can gyi don dang / phan pa dang / bde bar bgyi ba'i phyir dang / sdig pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad las yongs su grol bar bgyi ba'i phyir don yod pa'i lcags kyu'i rig sngags kyi rgyal po rim par phye ba rnams bstan pa

lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das yang bdag la mchis pa ni don yod pa'i lcags kyu'i khro'i rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor te/ rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi khro bo chen po'i las grub tu 'gyur ba dang / bsam pa dang / yid la re ba

thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba dang / ma rungs pa brtson pa med pa/ brtse ba'i bsam pa med pa ni gnod sbyin dang / srin po thams cad dang / 'byung po dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto

'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa thams cad thag 'jug pa/ ma rungs pa'i bgegs dang / log 'dren thams cad rab tu dul bar mdzad pa/ bdud la sogs pa ma rungs pa thams cad rab tu zhi ba dang / phung bar byed pa/ sems

can ma rungs pa thams cad skrag par byed pa/ phyir rgol ba dang / dgra thams cad 'ching ba dang / gcod pa dang / 'bigs pa dang / brdung ba dang / gtor ba dang / lus rnam par zhig par byed pa de ni/ bcom ldan 'das 'dir bdag gis pad mo

rgyas pa'i dkyil 'khor don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po cho ga zhib mo'i dkyil 'khor gyi skabs su bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khor mang po'i nang du don yod pa'i khro bo'i lcags kyu'i brjod par bgyi ste/ dkyil 'khor dang cho ga zhib

mo thams cad du bsrung bar byed pa 'chos par byed pa/ dam tshig 'dzin pa gnas thams cad la rjes su skyong ba ste/ de ni sgrub par byed pa/ sgrub pa 'grub par byed pa'i mchog de bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs brtse ba chen po'i slad du bcom

ldan 'das khro bo'i rgyal po chen po byin gyis brlab cing rjes su gnang ba mdzod cig dang / rig sngags 'chang thams cad mchog tu 'grub pa'i snying po dag sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba'i slad du bcom

ldan 'das rjes su stsal bar bgyi'o/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /spyan ras

gzigs dbang phyug phyag rgya chen pos phyag rgyas btab ste/ ngas kyang byin gyis brlabs/ /sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis kyang phyag rgyas btab cing byin gyis

brlabs kyis smros shig /spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rig sngags 'chang thams cad gsang ba pa lags na rdo rje dang / rdo rje 'chang ba dang / rdo rje'i snying po thams cad dam tshig la gnas pa'i lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang /

dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po thams cad kyis yongs su gzung ba smros shig /spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su
rdzogs pa'i go skabs dang / mchog grub par byos shig /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das kyis bkas bsgo zhing dbugs

phyung ba thos nas snying dga'/ smin ma bskums/ dpral ba phyed khros par byas/ gdong khro gnyer du byas/ mche ba ni gtsigs/ spyan ras gzigs kyi lus 'khor mang po'i nang du bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas

don yod pa'i zhags pa khro bo'i rgyal po 'di smras pa/ dus gsum na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / 'phags pa rdo rje 'chang ba dang / dkyil 'khor chen po'i lha

rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i rang sangs rgyas dang / 'phags pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /yang dag par song ba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /yang dag par

zhugs pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu blo gros can la phyag 'tshal lo/ /drang srong chen po'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rgyal tshab tu dbang bskur ba byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad

la phyag 'tshal lo/ /khams gsum pa'i bdag po nag po chen po ma mo'i tshogs kyis bskor ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo/ /khro bo'i rgyal po rig sngags kyi rgyal po chen po'i

tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad ya thA/ oM bi kr-i ta/

ba ta na/ ma hA kro d+ha rA dzA b+ha yang ka ra/ ma hA daMSh+Ta/ aT+Ta Ta hA sa/ dz+wa la dz+wa la ma hA dz+wa la/ mA la ma hA ro dra/ rU pa b+ha yang ka ran/ ha na ha na/ sarba duSh+Ta/ yak+Sha/ rAk+Sha sAn/ da ha da ha/ sarba duSh+Ta/ nA gA nAn/ pa tsa pa tsa/ sarba duSh+Ta/

big+h+na bi nA ye kAn pA ta ya/ pA ta ya/ sarba duSh+Ta sa twAn/ b+ho b+ho ma hA kro d+ha rA dza ma Ni/ ka na ka /badzra/ bai dUr+ya/ a lang kr-i ta/ sha rI rAn/ badzra pa ra shu pA sha hastA ya/ ma hA pad+ma ang ku sha /b+hu dzA ya/ ma hA pad ma A sa nA ya/ ma hA

pad mi bi ka tsa gar+g+hA ya/ a mo g+ha a pra ti ha ta/ ba la pa rA kra mA ya/ sa hA sra/ bi ya/ sarba b+hu ta/ b+ha yang ka rA ya/ sarba de ba b+ha ba na/ kA ma pa ud b+ha bA ya/ ma hA bi kr-i ta/ ba da nA ya/ nA ra sing ha mu khA ya/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ badzra dz+wa la/

d+hu ru d+ha ru/ ma hA tsaN Da/ be ka d+ha ra/ tsa ra tsa ra/ tsa tsa ra/ tsa tsa ra/ ni sha tsa tsa ra/ I shwa ra/ b+h+r-i ku TI mu kha/ hU~M hU~M phaT/ sa ra sa ra/ pra sa pra sa ra/ sarba pA pa/ ki li bi Sha ha ra/ ma hA ma ni/ te dza d+ha ra/ pad ma hasta/ oM pad ma ang

ku sha b+hu dze/ ta rA ya/ man tra ma ya/ big+h+na~M/ shA sa ya/ duSh+Ta na nA sha ya/ sarba pA pa ba ra Na hU~M phaT swA hA/ pA sha hastA ya swA hA/ pad ma d+ha rA ya swA hA/ sa ma shwA sa k+Sha ya swA hA/ a mo g+ha ba ra pa da rA ya swA hA/ kro d+ha ra dza b+ha yang

ka rA ya swA hA/ brah+ma be Sha d+ha rA ya swA hA/ trai lo kya pU dzi tA ya swA hA/ ya ma/ ba ru Na ku be+e ra/ na maH kr-i tA ya swA hA/ badzra d+ha ra pU dzi tA ya swA hA/ ma hA kA la mA tr-i ga Na/ ban di ta/ pU dzi tA ya swA hA/ de ba ga Na/ ban dri tA ya swA hA/

nA ga A kaR+Sha ya swA hA/ oM b+ha ra b+ha ra/ b+hi ri b+hi ri/ b+hu ru b+hu ru/ sarba maN+Da la a d+hi ta sa ma ya swA hA/ sarba mu drA a d+hi ta mu drA ya swA hA/ oM a mo g+ha ba ra de/ ma hA da~MSh+T+rA/ a~M ku sha badzre hU~M/ ma hA pad ma/ a shwA sa d+ha

ra na mo stu te a mo g+ha a~M ku sha hU~M phaT swA hA/ khro bo'i rgyal po chen po'i gzungs 'di smras pa dang / lha'i gnas dang bcas pa dang / ri rab dang bcas pa'i rgya mtsho gnas dang bcas pa dang / gzhal med khang

rnams kun du 'gul lo/ /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnam pa drug tu g.yos so/ /ma rungs pa'i klu dang / lha ma yin dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha za thams
cad dang / bdud la sogs pa dang / log 'dren ma rungs pa dang / gnod sbyin ma rungs pa rnams kha bub tu 'gyel lo/ /ma rungs pa thams cad kyi khyim kun du tshig te 'bar ba/ kun du 'bar/ rab tu 'bar/

'bar ba gcig tu gyur cing bsregs pa dang / ngu zhing 'gre ldog ste/ tshor ba drag po mi bzad pa chen po myong ngo / /lha thams cad shin du 'khrugs shing skrag go/ bdud kyi rigs rnams bred nas khas btags so/ /

'jig rten gsum gyi bdag po thams cad kun du 'khrugs so/ /rgya mtshor gnas pa'i klu dang / rgya mtsho'i klu chen po dga' bo dang / bsnyen dga' bo dag kyang kun du 'khrugs shing shin du skrag ste snying 'dar ro/ /

gzhan yang sa'i steng na klu stong phrag brgya gnas pa dang / rgya mtsho'i chu'i nang gi klu gang dag dang / ri la gnas pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad kun du 'khrugs skrag cing gcig tu 'bar bar gyur cing gdungs so/ /

rgyal po chen po bzhi rnams gnas na 'dug na yang skrag go/ nag po chen po dang / tshogs chen po'i gtso bo dang / ma mo'i tshogs kyis bskor ba de dag thams cad skrag cing snying 'dar ro/ /gnas la brten pa'i bdud kyi
gnas rnams 'dar ro/ /'bar kun du 'bar te gnas dang bcas par bsreg go/ de nas 'khor de'i nang gi lha dang / klu rnams bcom ldan 'das kyi steng rol nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir me tog

sna tshogs 'thor ro/ /lha rdzas kyi rgyan spud pa sna tshogs dang / chos gos kyi char pa 'bebs so/ /mchod pa'i las byed cing tsan dan gyi chu'i char pas sa la chag chag 'debs so/ /lha rdzas kyi gser dang / dngul gyi me

tog dang / rin po che sna bdun rnam pa sna tshogs kyi char pas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed do/ /de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po phyag na rdo rje lus 'bar zhing rdo rje gsor te/ shin du 'gying bag tu seng ge'i 'gros
kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ga la ba de logs su song ste nye bar phyin nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bcom ldan 'das spyan ras gzigs

dbang phyug gi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ zla ba yid du 'ongs pa dri ma med pa'i me tog gi rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa'i phreng ba bcom ldan 'das phyag na pad ma la phul te/ zla ba yid du 'ong ba dri ma med pa'i

me tog gi phreng ba rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa 'di dbu la longs spyod pa'i phyir dang / bdag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du thugs rje chen po bzhes su gsol/ gang gis bdag yun ring por phan pa dang / bde bar 'gyur

lags so/ /khro bo chen po'i yang chen po bshad cing gang dran pa tsam gyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnam pa drug tu g.yos so/ /gang dag bdud ma rungs pa dang / gang dag klu ma rungs pa dang /

gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha za ma rungs pa dang / log 'dren ma rungs pa rnams khyim dang bcas te/ lus kun du tshig cing rab tu 'bar nas kha bub tu 'gyel cing sreg go/ shi la thug pa dang srog skams par

'gyur ba'i don yod pa'i lcags kyu khro bo'i rgyal po ni dus thams cad du mgo'i spyi bor blang bar bgyi'o/ /bcang ngo / /bsgom mo/ /mchod do/ /rgyas par bgyi'o/ /rig sngags 'chang gang gi lag na khro bo'i rgyal po 'chang bar 'gyur ba dang /

rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs kyi lag na thogs pa 'am/ lus la thogs pa

'am/ lta ba 'am/ dri ba 'am/ tha na khro bo'i rgyal po nyan pa tsam de yang bcom ldan 'das bdag gis khur du bskur bar bgyi'o/ /spyi bos blang bar bgyi'o/ /bsrung bar bgyi'o/ /yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o/ /bsam pa dang / yid

la re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o/ /grub pa chen po'i chen po rjes su stsal bar bgyi'o/ /gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / bgegs dang / log 'dren ma rungs pa thams cad so sor bsal bar bgyi'o/ /

rtag tu rjes su 'brang zhing bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar bgyi'o/ /rtag tu dus thams cad du mthong ba rjes su stsal bar bgyi'o/ /rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par yo byad thams cad kyis mi brel cing phun sum tshogs par

yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o/ /lus la stobs dang / brtson 'grus dang / gzi brjid bskyed cing bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi grogs bgyi'o/ /dgra thams cad so sor bsal bar bgyi'o/ /nor dang / 'bru dang / bza' ba dang /

btung ba dang / gos dang / spud pa dang / rgyan rjes su stsal bar bgyi'o/ /bu gcig pa 'dra bar rjes su bskyang bar bgyi'o/ /dad pa dang / gus pas dus kun du mchog tu mos par bgyi'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces khyod kyis khas blangs pa mchog tu bzang po byas pa 'di legs so legs so zhes smras te/ lag pa g.yas pa

brkyang nas zla ba yid du 'ong ba dri ma med pa'i me tog gi phreng ba rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa blangs te/ lag na rdo rje la rjes su brtse ba'i phyir dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis yongs su longs spyod pa'i phyir dang / dkyil 'khor na

gnas pa'i lha thams cad kyis yongs su longs spyad pa'i phyir dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa thams cad dkyil 'khor gang yin pa 'dir

'dug cing dam tshig la gnas pa rnams yongs su longs spyad pa'i phyir ji lta ba bzhin du 'dug ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu'i gong du gtor ro/ /de nas phreng ba de nam mkha' de la gtor ma thag tu phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi

dbu'i steng du zla ba yid du 'ong ba/ dri ma med pa'i me tog de khang bu brtsegs pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa/ 'od 'tsher ba/ ka ba bzhi dang / sgo bzhi legs par rnam par 'byes pa/ gru bzhi lham pa/ chu zheng shin du rgya che ba/ shin du nang

yangs pa/ me tog ka da l+ya dag gis mdzes pa/ gzhal med khang sna tshogs yongasu gyur te gnas so/ /de dag byang chub sems dpa'i dbu'i steng thad kar yang de bzhin du zla ba yid du 'ong ba dri ma med pa'i me tog rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa'i khang

bu rtsegs pa'i gzhal med khang du shin du gnas so/ /de lag na rdo rje dbu'i steng gi thad kar yang zla ba yid du 'ong ba dri ma med pa'i me tog khang bu rtsegs par shin du gnas so/ /de 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi steng thog thag tu

yang zla ba yid du 'ong ba'i dri ma med pa'i me tog khang bu brtsegs pa nor bu rin po che chen po lha'i bu dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po rnams lag na rnga yab thogs nas g.yob cing 'dug go/ de dag kyang 'khor 'dus pa chen po

mang pos yongs su bskor cing mdun du byas so/ /dkyil 'khor gyi rig pa'i rgyal po'i lha de dag thams cad kyang nam mkha' la zla ba yid du 'ong ba dri ma med pa'i me tog khang bu rtsegs pa'i phreng ba rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa

khang bu rtsegs pa'i nang na 'khod pa ni nyi ma dang zla ba spa ba bzhin dang / nam mkha' la zla ba nya ba ni rgyu skar dang / skar ma'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba spa ba bzhin du spa bar gnas so/ /me tog de dag gi nang na lha rdzas kyi zla ba yid du

'ong ba dri ma med pa'i me tog sna tshogs dang / lha rdzas kyi pad ma dang / ku mu ta dang / pun da ri ka dang / man dA ra ba dang / ma hA man dA ra ba dang / me tog ro tsa dang / ma hA ro tsa dang / me tog sa la dang / tA la ga dang / me tog ta

ma la dang / tsam pa ka dang / me tog a d+hi mu ka ta dang / me tog a sho ka dang / me tog pa ta la dang / me tog nI la dang / ma hA nI la dang / me tog gan d+ha baR+Sha ka dang / me tog su ma na dang / ta ran dang / ku ya ka'i me tog

gi char gyi rgyun phab bo/ /bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa dang / dkyil 'khor chen po la mchod pa'i phyir dang / lha rdzas kyi chos gos spud pa dang rgyan sna tshogs kyi char ji srid du char 'bab cing phyogs bcu'i de bzhin

gshegs pa thams cad la mchod do/ /de ltar na cho 'phrul che ba'i che ba dag snang ngo / /rol mo'i sgra yan lag lnga pa dag kyang ma brdungs par nam mkha' la sgra 'byung ngo // //'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i
snying po'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po/ bam po nyi shu bzhi pa/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang

phyug la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ sems can dag pa chen po mchog tu dkon pa'i khro bo'i rgyal po 'di smras te/ rig sngags 'chang thams cad mchog tu grub par bya ba'i phyir ma rungs pa thams cad 'joms pa/

sdig pa thams cad sreg pa bshad pa legs so legs so/ /'di ni phyi ma'i dus na rig sngags 'chang ba rnams kyis lan cig dran pa tsam gyis dgos pa thams cad byed par 'gyur/ yid la re ba thams cad yongs su

rdzogs par 'gyur/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mthong ba'i sbyin par 'gyur/ gnas thams cad gtogs pa'i grub par chen po rab tu ston par 'gyur/ rig sngags 'chang ba rnams kyis yangs shing rgya che

ba'i chen po thams cad byed par 'gyur/ phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na 'di ni 'jig rten las 'das pa gcig po mchog 'grub par 'gyur te/ las grub pa yang dag par grub pa'i phyir ro/ /de nas khros pa'i gad rgyangs spyi gtsug

'bar ba zhes bya ba'i gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po gnod sbyin chen po stong phrag brgya'i bdag po stobs che ba/ brtan zhing pha rol gnon pa chen po gang gis lag mthil gcig gis ri'i rgyal po lhun po chen po 'gul bar byed pa

lha'i gnas gzhal med khang dang bcas te/ rgya mtsho chen po na gnas te/ 'khor bye ba phal po che dang ldan pa/ drag po gzi brjid drag po stobs che ba/ pha rol gyi dpung 'joms par byed pa de stan las langs nas/ bcom
ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su song ste nye bar phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la btud de 'di

skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis khro bo'i rgyal po chen po'i gzungs rig sngags kyi rgyal po shin du mi bzad pa'i gsang

sngags bshad pas ni bcom ldan 'das gzhal med khang dang bcas pa bsregs so/ /gnod sbyin du ma stong phrag bye ba khrag khrig 'khor dang bcas pa 'bar ba gcig tu gyur te bsregs so/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag ni zhigs te

tshig cing zhu bar gyur to/ /bcom ldan 'das de la bdag gis ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/ bdag la skyob pa su lags/ dpung gnyen du 'gyur ba su lags/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni srog rnam par zhig go/ dus kyi zhags pas

bcings so/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag la phan gdags su gsol/ bde bar gshegs pa bdag la bskyab tu gsol/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas khros pa'i gad rgyangs spyi gtsug 'bar ba gnod sbyin

gyi sde dpon chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po khyod ma 'jigs par khro bo'i rgyal po lcags kyu'i dkyil 'khor gyi rjes su song shig /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po

'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la skyabs su nye bar song shig /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'di ni khyod kyi skyabs dang / dpung gnyen dang / skyob pa dang /

rten du 'gyur te/ gang gis 'khor gyi tshogs dang bcas pa'i gnod sbyin stong phrag brgya'i srog dang bral bar mi 'gyur ba yin no/ /kye gnod sbyin chen po myur ba myur bar song ste skyabs su 'gro bar byos shig /de nas khros pa'i

gad rgyangs gtsug phud 'bar ba'i gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po bcom ldan 'das kyis dbugs phyung ba rtogs nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ga la ba de logs su song

ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la ngu zhing brgyal nas lag pa brkyang ste zhabs la btud nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag bskyab tu gsol/

thugs rje chen po bdag bskyab tu gsol/ bdag la srog stsal bar mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni bsregs shing gcig tu 'bar bar gyur to/ /bcom ldan 'das gnod sbyin du ma stong phrag brgya bye ba 'khor dang
bcas pa srog dang 'bral bar 'gyur ro/ /shes pa ni stor/ stobs dang brtson 'grus spro bar byed pa ni nyams na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gi lus su zhig gso bar bgyid/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs

dbang phyug gis khros pa'i gad rgyangs spyi gtsug 'bar ba'i gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /kye gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nyon cig /nga ji srid ston gyi bar du yud tsam zhig sdod cig /

gnod sbyin gyi bdag po khyod kyis 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can mang po la rnam par gtse bar byas/ khyod kyis bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo mang po ni zos na khyod kyis 'phags pa'i spyan mang po ni

nyams par byas/ khyod kyis rig sngags dang / dkyil 'khor dang / cho ga zhib mo mang po'i bar chad ni byas/ grub pa rnams ni med par byas/ ma grub pa rnams kyang med par byas/ skal ba can mang po ni med par byas/

skal ba med pa ni yod par byas/ mi 'tshe ba dang / srog dang longs spyod kyi bde ba ni med par byas/ 'tshe ba dang srog rnam par 'jig pa ni 'phel bar byas/ khyod kyis legs par bshad pa ni yongs su bor/ khyod

kyis nyes par bshad pa dang / ser sna ni mang du byas/ rig sngags 'chang thams cad dang / sems can thams cad la khyod nag po dang / rnam par 'jig par rab tu gnas/ khyod kyis ngan sems thams cad ni spel/

khyod kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams ni nub par byas/ lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten na khyod shin du mi bzad pa sdig pa can yin/ gshin rje'i gnas dang bcas/ bdud dang bcas/ tshangs pa dang bcas pa'i nang na khyod gcig pu

ngan sems can bar chad byed par skyes pa yin te/ rgyu des na gnas skabs 'di 'dra ba thob pa yin pas kye gnod sbyin gyi bdag po dam tshig dang / bslab pa dang / sdom pa khas blang ba dang / dge ba'i chos byos shig /'on

tang kho bo khyod kyi skyabs dang / dpung gnyen du 'gyur bar bya'o/ /khyod sdug bsngal bas nyams thag pa dang / bcings pa mi bzad pa dang / me 'bar ba mi bzad pa'i 'jigs pa las ngas yongs su thar bar bya'o/ /

mtho ris kyi lam du 'jug par bya'o/ /de nas khros pa'i gad rgyangs spyi gtsug 'bar ba gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po 'khor gnod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs gnyis la btud nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das deng

slan chad byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug khyod kyi bka' lung bzhin bgyis te dam tshig la gnas par bgyi'o/ /chos kyi rjes su sems pa dang / dkon mchog gsum la

skyabs su mchis pa la gnas par bgyi'o/ /khro bo'i rgyal po 'di dang / rig sngags kyi rgyal po lcags kyu'i gzungs dang / cho ga zhib mo dang / gang yang rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo dang / dge slong dang / dge slong

ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma rnams yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o/ /don yod pa'i lcags kyu'i gzungs rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'di 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / 'don pa dang / bzlas brjod kyi cho ga kun spyod

pa de la ni bdag gnod sbyin brgya stong du ma rnams kyis 'og dang / bla dang / phyogs bzhi kun du bsod nams su dmigs te/ bsrung ba dang / sba ba dang / bskyab par bgyi'o/ /yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o/ /lus la stobs

dang / spro ba dang / gzi byin mang du bskyed par bgyi'o/ /de'i yul phyogs su 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / mtshang 'bru ba dang / ma legs pa dang / lo nyes dang / mi ngas dang / rims dang / gnod pa dang / 'khrug pa dang /

nyams thag par byed pa'i gdon dang bcas pa dang / nad dang / gcong dang / nyon mongs pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyi'o/ /rab tu bsal bar bgyi'o/ /rkun po dang / zol po dang / mi rgod dang / gcan gzan khro bo'i

'jigs pa bsal bar bgyi'o/ /dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa las so sor bzlog par bgyi'o/ /rmi lam ngan pa dang / ltas ngan pa dang / bkra mi shis pa byung ba thams cad so sor bzlog par bgyi'o/ /char ches pa dang /

char mi 'bab pa dang / dus ma yin pa'i char dang / sad dang / than pa dang / byi ba'i 'jigs pa rnams so sor bsal bar bgyi'o/ /dben pa dang / nyams dga' ba dang / lo legs pa dang / 'byor pa sbyar bar bgyi'o/ /sems can

mi dge ba spyod pa las bzlog par bgyi'o/ /dge ba la sbyor bar bgyi'o/ /sems can dge ba spyod pa rnams kyi grogs bdag 'khor dang bcas par bgyi'o/ /yang dag par dad pas rjes su bsgrub par bgyi'o/ /bud med dang /

skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / sems can thams cad bu gcig pa bzhin du yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o/ /chos la zhugs pa'i yid dang / ngo tsha shes pa dang / khrel yod pas gnas par bgyi'o/ /

thams cad du bdag mchi bar bgyi'o/ /ji ltar rang gi srog 'di yongs su bskyang ba bzhin du gzungs dang / rig sngags grub pa 'di yang yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o/ /spyi bos blang bar bgyi'o/ /khur du bkur bar bgyi'o/ /

sgrub par 'grub pa chen po stsal bar bgyi'o/ /bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad dang / sems can ma rungs pa dang / gnod sbyin chad pas so sor bzlog par bgyi'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po

'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis khro bo'i gad rgyangs spyi gtsug 'bar ba gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po legs so legs so/ /khyod kyis de

bzhin du bya bar rigs so/ /sems can thams cad rjes su gzung ba chen pos gzung bar bya'o/ /rig sngags 'chang ba la bdag nyid kyis bsrung ba dang / bcang bar bya'o/ /de nas gnod sbyin gyi bdag po de skyabs gsum

la gnas shing dkyil 'khor chen po'i dam tshig dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bslab pa'i tshig 'dzin pa la gnas par gyur to/ /rigs thams cad kyi dam tshig dang ldan par gyur to/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das

shAkya thub pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /yon tan gyi phung po mchog tu bzang ba la gnod sbyin gyi bdag po khas len du bcug cing gzhag pa

legs so legs so/ /khro bo'i rgyal po'i cho ga nye bar spyad pa de smros shig /rig sngags 'chang de rnams ji ltar mchog 'grub par 'gyur ba dang / lan cig dran pa tsam gyis ji lta ji ltar myur ba myur bar las sgrub pa 'grub par

'gyur ba dang / ji ltar dran pa tsam gyis ji ltar bsams pa dang / yid la re ba 'byor par 'gyur ba dang / don yod pa'i lcags kyu'i khro bo'i rgyal po 'di myur du 'grub par 'gyur ba de ltar byin gyis brlabs kyis byin

gyis rlobs shig /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' lung stsal ba rtogs nas nye bar bshad pa'i cho ga smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das rig sngags

'chang ba/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang yin pa 'am/ gzhan dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs dang / bud med dang / skyes pa dang /

khye'u dang / bu mo rnams khro bo'i rgyal po 'di bsgrub par 'dod na/ de zla ba yar gyi ngo tshes bcwa lnga la 'bras chan dang / 'o ma za zhing nang par sngar langs la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar skyil

mo dkrung bcas te 'dug nas mi smra bar gaN+Di brdung ba'i dus la bab kyi bar du 'bras chan khyor ba bkang ste/ gtor ma brgya rtsa brgyad dbul ba byas na/ des khro bo'i rgyal po sgrub pa'i cho ga de dag 'grub par 'gyur zhing mchog tu

'grub par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar bsgrubs nas de nas bzlas brjod gcig dang / dran pa gcig gis thams cad du 'grub par byas na thams cad du bya ba thams cad mchog tu 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang ba las

byed par 'dod cing / don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po sgrub par 'dod na khro bo'i rgyal po lan cig dran par bya'o/ /dran pa tsam gyi mod la bgegs dang / log 'dren thams cad skrag par 'gyur zhing dpag tshad tshun chad du rig sngags

'chang ba'i drung du 'ong bar mi nus te/ rgyang ring po ring po na 'dug go/ 'di lan cig dran pa tsam gyis bzlas brjod dang / cho ga dang / sgrub pa bde bar 'grub cing dgos pa sgrub pa thams cad grub pa bla na med pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /

'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mchog sbyin pa mdzad par 'gyur ro/ /dpag tshad tshun chad du 'bar ba'i lcags kyu chen po 'phags du ri chen po tsam 'byung bar 'gyur te/ dpag tshad gsum gyi tshad tsam dang / 'og

tu g.yang sar gyur te/ su yang 'ong mi nus so/ /lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa dang bcas pas gnas der 'ong bar mi

nus na/ mi ma yin pa phal pa dang / bgegs dang log 'dren rnams kyis lta smos kyang ci dgos te gnas med do/ /rig sngags 'chang ba 'jigs pa med par yang dgos pa thams cad grub bsgrub par byed do/ /bgegs med
par thams cad du sgrub pa 'grub pa 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang las thams cad bya bar 'dod cing gdon bsal bar 'dod na/ gu gul dang / yungs kar la lan cig bzlas brjod byas te/ gdon

la bdug pa sbyin par bya'o/ /yungs kar gyis brdeg par bya'o/ /lan cig dran par bya'o/ /lag pa g.yas pa'i mdzub mos khros pas bsdigs par bya'o/ /bdug pa dang / brdeg pa dang / dran pa lhan cig tu byas na mod la gdon

thams cad 'jig par 'gyur ro/ /ji ste nag po chen po rang nyid dam/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po 'am/ sgra gcan nam/ 'jigs byed kyang 'jig par byed na/ gdon gzhan 'ong bar lta ga la 'gyur te/ mod la gcig tu 'jig

par 'gyur ro/ /'byung po dang / gdon gyis yongs su zin pa thams cad la dur khrod kyi thal ba la lan cig bzlas brjod byas te/ spyi bor gtor zhing lan cig dran par byas na/ mod la 'byung po dang gdon 'bros par 'gyur ro/ /

na la da dang / an da ni dra ka pa tsa dang / gu gul dang / ha sa dang / ba la ka dang / ma tu la dang / pad ma dang / puSh+pa rnam gnyis dang / ra dzi ni dang / yungs kar dang / shing kun dang / na ra pad ma dang / bi sha ra dang / tsan tri ka
rnams ra'i gcin gyis sbrus te/ ri lu nas kyi mdzel ma tsam byas te/ grib ma la bskams la/ lcags kyu lan bdun bzlas pa byas nas las thams cad la bdug pa mchog gi ri lu gcig bdug pa

byas na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams ri dang nags tshal dang / gcong rong dang bcas pa rnams 'gul lo/ /rgya mtsho chen po ni 'khrugs so/ /ri rab chen po ni g.yos so/ /sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi gnas

gzhal med khang dang bcas pa ni cher g.yos te 'gul lo/ /lha thams cad skrag go/ lha ma yin thams cad ngu zhing phyogs phyogs su 'bros so/ /sa ni g.yos so/ /klu gang dag rgya mtsho na gnas pa dang / gnod sbyin

dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / yi dgas dang / brjed byed dang / gsang ba pa dang / tshangs pa'i srin po dang / bgegs dang / gdon mi bzad pa gzhan ma rungs pa de dag thams cad dri tshor ba tsam gyis rnam par zhig
par 'gyur te/ dogs par mi bya'o/ /lus rnam par zhig par 'gyur/ bcom ste rus pa lhags par 'gyur/ 'chi bdag gi zhags pa'i khar 'gro bar 'gyur/ des rnam par zhig par 'gyur ba de la dogs par mi

bya'o/ /dug dang bcas pa ni mod la dug med par 'gyur ro/ /klu 'jog po dang / nor rgyas kyis gal te zin pa 'am/ sbrul gyis zin pa la bdug pa dang / byugs pa tsam gyis thams cad du dug med par 'gyur ro/ /

gang dag 'jig rten na dug sna tshogs mi bzad pa yod pa la bdug pa'i dri tsam dang bskus pa dang / ri lu tsam gyi mod la dug thams cad med par 'gyur te/ the tshom mi bya'o/ /'bras dang / phol mig dang / lu ta dang /

shu ba dang / sha bkra dang / rkang shu dang / mdze dang / 'brum bu dang / lhog pa rnam pa mang po dang / nad mched pa dang / lba ba'i phreng ba dang / khong 'bras dang / rkub na ba dang / skran dang / 'khru ba dang / rtsib

logs na ba dang / snying ga na ba dang / gre ba 'gags pa dang / rna ba na ba dang / so na ba dang / mig na ba dang / mgo bo na ba dang / gzhog phyed na ba la ri lus bskus pa tsam dang / chu dron 'thungs pa tsam dang /
bdug pa tsam dang / mnams pa tsam gyis thams cad de ma thag tu rab tu zhi bar 'gyur te/ thams cad la ri lu dam pa lan cig bzlas brjod byas te byin na thams cad du dgos pa thams cad byed pa bla na

med pa yin no/ /shin du char che ba dang / char mi 'bab pa dang / dus ma yin pa'i char dang / rlung dang / ser ba dang / 'byung po dang / ma mo'i gnas dang / mtsho klu de dag thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro/ /char dus

su 'bebs so/ /lo tog dang / 'bras bu dang / me tog yod par 'gyur ro/ /phyis ser ba mi 'bab bo/ /sad dang rlung dang than pa mi 'byung ngo / /phun sum tshogs pa thams cad grub par byed cing bkra shis pa thams

cad grub par byed do/ /rims drag po ma rungs pa kun du 'jug pa'i rims mi bzad pa dang / 'das pa mi bzad pa drag po'i rims dang / rims drag po'i 'jigs pa chen po dang / me 'bar ba shin du che ba dang /
zhag bzhi pa'i rims mi bzad pa dang / grang ba'i rims sdug bsngal che ba dang / rims gang dag 'chi ba'i zhags pa 'bar ba/ 'khrug pa drag po mi bzad pa dang / zlos pa'i rims gso dka' ba dang / nyin

gcig pa'i rims dang / nyin gnyis pa'i rims dang / nyin gsum pa'i rims dang / de bzhin du rlung las gyur pa dang / bad kan las gyur pa dang / mkhris pa las gyur pa dang / mchil ma las gyur pa'i rims dang /

rims rnying pa dang / zug gzer dang / gzhang 'brum dang / gcin snyi ba mi bzad pa dang / rims thams cad la bdug pa tsam gyis the tshom med par rnam par 'jigs par 'gyur ro/ /nam mkha' lding gi gdon dang / gang dag mi
'am ci'i gdon dang / lto 'phye chen po'i gdon dang / mi ma yin pa'i gdon dang / gang dag gzhan mi'i gdon thams cad bdug pa bdugs pa des mod la thams cad rnam par bral bar 'gyur ro/ /lcags kyu'i gsang

sngags dam pa lan cig dran par byas na/ skem byed dang / skams pa dang / rjed byed dang / gdon ra za yag sh+mA dang / bdag nyid ngan par byung ba dang / grib gnon dang / 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa gang du skye bo zhe sdang ba rnams 'byung

ba dang / gang du gnod pa dang / 'khrug pa dang / nyon mongs pa mang po rnams la yid du 'ong ba bdug pa tsam gyis thams cad las de thar bar 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po khros pa dang / gang zhig rkun po dang / mi rgod kyi nang du song ngam/

gcong rong bgrod dka' ba'i nang du song ngam/ dog pa mi bzad pa'i nang du chud pa la lcags kyu lan cig dran pa dang / bdug pa mchog gis bdugs na thams cad du rtag tu bde bar 'gro ba dang / gang dang gang du 'gro ba

na bde bar 'gyur ro/ /de'i lus la mes mi tshugs/ chu chen pos khyer bar mi 'gyur ro/ /lcags kyu'i rig sngags dran pa dang / bdug pa mchog gis bdugs na thams cad du pha rol du phyin pa dang bde zhing legs pa shin du
rgyas par 'gyur ro/ /de'i lus la mtshon gyis mi tshugs/ dug gis ma yin/ gsang sngags mchog tu drag pos ma yin/ de la drag pos ma yin/ nad kyis ma yin/ nyon mongs pa drag pos ma yin no/ /gsang

sngags dran pa tsam dang / bdug pas bdag bdug pa ni thams cad du 'jigs pa thams cad las thar bar 'gyur te/ 'di la dogs pa mi bya'o/ /dgra dang phyir rgol ba'i mi sems can ma rungs pa mi bzad pa rnams dang /

'thab mo 'gyed cing g.yul 'gyed pa na bdag nyid bdug pas bdug cing rig sngags lan cig dran par byas nas thams cad du rgyal bar 'gyur te/ mthong ba tsam la dogs par mi bya'o/ /gang zhig rig sngags 'grub par mi

'gyur ba dang / gang zhig bgegs kyis zin te nyams pa dang / blo zhan cing le lo can la bdug pa 'di sbyar bar bya zhing gsang sngags lan cig bzlas brjod byas na des mchog tu dkon pa 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /skal ba

med pa bdag nyid bdug pa dang / ri lu mchog gis bkru ba dang / mig bsku ba dang / mchog thig le byas na thams cad du skal ba can dang / dga' ba dang / dbang phyug mtshungs pa med par 'gyur ro/ /nor dang 'bru 'phel zhing rgyal

po dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro/ /thams cad du stobs thogs pa med par 'gyur ro/ /thams cad du mchog grub pa dang / rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par dus thams cad du gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po bzhi bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang /

sba bar bya ba'i phyir nyin mtshan du rjes su 'brang zhing gnas par 'gyur ro/ /bsrung ba'i phyir rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung 'khor dang bcas pa rig sngags kyi rjes su 'breng bar 'gyur ro/ /bde ba thams cad kyis tshim

par thob par 'gyur ro/ /gnas gcig nas ri lu bdun blangs pa las khro bo'i lcags kyu lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bya'o/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang ba 'am/ gzhan gang yang rung ba nas dge sbyong dang /
bram ze bkren pa sdug phongs pa'i bud med dam/ skyes pa 'am/ khye'u 'am/ bu mo'i don du ri lu gcig gis khrus bya/ gcig gis bdag bdug /gcig gis gos bdug /gcig ni ba'i rnam lnga dang sbyar te btung
bar bya/ gcig ni mgo'i spyi bor gzhag /cig ni dpung pa g.yas par gdags/ ri lu gcig ni rked par btags na thams cad du 'byor pa thob par 'gyur zhing thams cad du mchog bla na med pa 'grub par 'gyur/

bsam pa 'grub par 'gyur/ rgud pa thams cad rnam par zhig par 'gyur ro/ /rma dang / nyam chung ba dang / de bzhin du chag grugs dang / bgegs kyis zin pa dang / gdon ra za yag sh+mAs zin pa de dag thams cad rab tu sbyar ba

tsam gyis rnam par zhig par 'gyur te/ dogs par mi bya'o/ /sgrib pa thams cad rnam par zhig par 'gyur te/ sngon bsags pa'i sgrib pa thams cad mod la rnam par zhig par 'gyur te/ gsang sngags bsten pa dang / gsang

sngags dran cing dran pa dang / bdug pa mchog gis bdugs par byas pas dogs par mi bya'o/ /mnar med pa dang / mi bzad pa'i sdig pa dang / dug dang / sems can ma rungs pa dang / las ngan pa dang / phung ba rnams thams cad

mod la med par 'gyur ro/ /mes phye ma leb bzhin rtag tu myur du sreg par 'gyur ro/ /gsang sngags lan cig dran par bya zhing bdug pa 'dis bdug na dus ma yin par 'chi ba thams cad zhig par 'gyur ro/ /thams cad du sbyar ba

la dogs par mi bya'o/ /'khor los sbyar ba thams cad kyi khro bo'i lcags kyu spyi gtsug 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i bdug pa'i rgyal pos khyim dang / sgo chen por nam nangs ka dang / mun sros khar bdug cing gsang sngags lan

cig dran par byas na/ khyim gyi nang der gang dag mi snang bar 'dug par 'gyur ro/ /gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha za dang / rjed byed dang / grib gnon ma rungs pa dang / mi ma yin pa thams cad snang bzhin du phyir

'byung zhing ngus te/ kyi hud zer ba'i sgra 'byin par 'gyur ro/ /khyim gang yin pa 'gul ba dang / khyim dang rta babs rnams 'bar bar 'gyur zhing dmyal ba'i srungs ma mi bzad pa thams cad khyogs bslad par 'gyur ro/ /

gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / dri za dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / klu mthu bo che thams cad bdug pa'i dri bla na med pas skrag par 'gyur ro/ /bsam
pa ngan pa gang dag gnas pa'i khyim thams cad 'bar ba dang / lus bsregs pa dang / phyogs dang / phyogs mtshams 'khrul ba dang / bdug pa'i rgyal po'i mthus 'jigs pa mi bzad pa thams cad rab tu zhi

bar 'gyur ro/ /g.yul 'gyed pa dang / 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / 'thab cing 'gyed pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur zhing rtag tu rgyal bar 'gyur ro/ /bde zhing legs par rgyal ba 'grub pa dang / thams cad du

dpal thob par 'gyur ro/ /lha dang / lha ma yin dang / dri za dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / klu rnams kyis bsrung ba'i phyir nyin mtshan du rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du rjes su skyong ba dang / dus thams cad bla na

med pa'i gzi byin skyed par byed do/ /khro bo lcags kyu bla na med pa grub pa'i thig le brjod par bya'o/ /thig le skar ma lta bu ni/ /lha yi nyi ma bzhin du dpa'/ /nyi ma bye ba'i 'od dang mtshungs/ /bsod nams gzi brjid dag

gis 'bar/ /mun khrod sgron chen 'od bzhin du/ /mun pa'i nang na snang bar 'gyur/ /tshogs kyi dkyil na mdzes pa ni/ /skar ma'i tshogs ldan zla ba bzhin/ /bsod nams bye ba stong phrag dang / /dpag med gzhal du

med pa yis/ /lus 'di dag ni brgyan par 'gyur/ /mkha' la rin chen mchod sdong ltar/ /mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos brgyan/ /ri lu sten pa byas na ni/ /lus ni bsod nams tshogs kyis bskyed/ /gang zhig lus ni

'bar ba dang / /shin du bzang po kho nar 'gyur/ /'jig rten mgon po dus rtag tu/ /phyag ni spyi bor 'jog par mdzad/ /rtag tu mchog ni sbyin pa dang / /kun du bla med grub par 'gyur/ /cho ga zhib mo 'grub pa dang / /

gsang sngags 'grub cing phyag rgya dang / /dkyil 'khor 'grub cing dkyil 'khor gyi/ /rim par phye ba 'grub 'gyur te/ /kun du 'grub pa bla na med/ /'gi'u wang dang / gur gum dang / ru lta cha snyams te sbyar
la khro bo'i lcags kyu'i gsang sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas la/ tshangs par spyod pa mnyam par gzhag pa/ khrus legs par byas pa/ gos gtsang ma bgos shing gtsang mas zla ba yar

gyi ngo tshes bcu gsum skar ma rgyal la bab pa'i tshe chu gtsang ma dang zhib tu btags la rgya shug gi 'bru tsam byas te grib ma la bskams la/ gang gi tshe dgos pa brtsom pa de'i tshe/ khro bo'i lcags kyu lan

nyi shu rtsa gnyis bzlas brjod byas te smin mtshams su thig le bya'o/ /smin mtshams su thig le bzang po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis rlabs kyis brlabs pa mtshan nyid bzhin du thig le byas te

byin gyis brlabs pa byas pa'i mod la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor gyi mtshan nyid rnam par mdzes pa'i thig le dang mnyam par mtshungs par brgyan par 'gyur ro/ /thams cad du mchod par bya ba

dang / rtag tu bla ma la gus pas dam tshig ma nyams pa dang / rgyal po dang mtshungs pa'i blon po dang / btsun mo'i nang du song na thams cad dga' bar 'gyur zhing thams cad du mchod par 'os par 'gyur ro/ /sems can

kun gus pa dang / dga' ba ji ltar 'jig rten 'dren pa la bya ba bzhin byed do/ /nor dang / 'bru dang / lha'i dpal thob par 'gyur ro/ /lha thams cad kyis mchod par 'gyur ro/ /dbang po dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug

dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / 'jig rten skyong ba grags chen dang / klu rnams kyis rtag tu mchod par 'os pa chen por 'gyur ro/ /gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / gsang ba pa dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha'

lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis rtag tu mchod pa chen por 'gyur ro/ /dbang phyug dang / stobs dang / brtson 'grus dang / tshe 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /nad med pa dang / rims nad med pa dang /

sdig pa thams cad spangs pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad las rnam par grol ba dang / nyon mongs pa'i dri ma dang / sdig pa dang / dgra thams cad rab tu 'joms pa dang / dmag gi g.yul 'gyed pa'i nang du rtag tu

thams cad du rgyal bar sbyin par 'gyur ro/ /dgra dang / phyir rgol ba rnams las gnas thams cad du rtag tu kun du rgyal ba chen po sbyin par 'gyur ro/ /thig le de lta bu byas te khro bo'i lcags kyu lan cig dran par byas
la yungs kar la lan cig bzlas brjod byas te phug gi sgor gtor na phug thams cad sgo gdangs par 'gyur ro/ /ji ltar dga' bar 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /lan gsum zhugs kyi bar du sgo gtan 'jug pa'i

gnas su khro bo'i lcags kyu 'ba' zhig bzlas brjod byas na de'i tshe lha'i bu mo rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa bzang zhing mdzes pa blta bar 'os pa mchog tu mdog sdug cing 'phrig pa dang ldan pa/ dpal gyis shin du dpa'

zhing 'bar ba/ bzhin 'dzum pa/ lus ngo tsha tsha ltar byed pa/ 'gros 'gying bag tu 'ong bar 'gyur te/ spyi bo yid tsam btud nas gser gyi snod rin po ches bkang ba thogs te rig sngags 'chang la 'bul bar byed do/ /rig

sngags 'chang bas cang mi smra bar bya'o/ /rin po che'i snod kyang blang bar mi bya'o/ /gsang sngags 'ba' zhig dran par bya zhing yungs kar gyis gzhon nu ma brdeg par bya'o ci ste gzhon nu ma de rtug pa 'byin cing bzhin bsgyur ba khro bo'i gzugs mchu 'phyang

ba/ mche ba gtsigs pa/ skra ral pa ser la gyen du brdzes la ral pa cod pan gyis brgyan par ston na rig sngags 'chang bas skrag par mi bya'o/ /khro bo'i lcags kyu 'ba' zhig dran par bya'o/ /yang yungs kar gyis

mgo'i spyi bor brdeg cing khros pa'i gzugs kyis dran par byas na/ de'i tshe sa la 'gyel te 'gre ldog cing kye rig sngags 'chang thugs rje can khyod rig sngags 'chang khyab 'jug gi gzugs can gum mo gum to/ /

de nas rig sngags 'chang bas rjes su brtags te kha chu dbu bar 'byung na/ rig sngags 'chang bas de blangs la rkang pa byin pa bskums na rlung gi phung po bdun pa'i rlung la zhon te nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /

rig sngags 'chang ba'i 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur zhing rig sngags 'chang ba'i 'khor brgya phrag bye ba dgu bcu rtsa dgus bskor bar 'gyur ro/ /skad cig tu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi mthar song

zhing slar yang 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /gal te reg na ni skyes nas lo bcu lon pa dang 'dra zhing skra yid tsam 'khyil zhing 'khyil ba/ rna cha gdu bu dri ma med cing spen tog 'phyang ba dang / 'khrig ma gdu bus brgyan pa/ lus pad ma 'dra zhing

dkar sham du 'gyur ro/ /tshe bskal pa stong phrag bdun bcu rtsa gnyis thub par 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags 'chang ba'i 'khor los sgyur ba stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa gnyis kyi 'khor gyis bskor bar 'gyur ro/ /gnas thams cad du

dpon por 'gyur ro/ /gal te thig le byas te mi snang bar gyur na gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po thams cad kyi khyim sgo phye ste 'dug par 'gyur ro/ /gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po 'khor dang bcas pa

thams cad bgyi ba ci mchis zhes dbang du 'gyur zhing bka' bzhin du 'dug go/ mngags pa'i dgos pa thams cad byed par 'gyur ro/ /khyim thams cad du re rer yang dpon po dang / bka' bzhin byed pa'i rgyal por 'gyur ro/ /

gal te 'tshogs mar thig le byas na brgya byin dang / lha rnams kyi dbang po sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i ris kyi bdag po'i lha dang / sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi ris kyi lha'i bu dang bcas pa thams cad kyis mchod par 'gyur te/

rig sngags 'chang ba la bya ba thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur ro/ /shin du mthong ba'i lha'i rigs kyi lha rnams dang lhan cig tu rtse dga' kun du spyod par 'gyur ro/ /tshe lha'i lo stong legs par thob par 'gyur

ro/ /lte ba'i gnas su thig le byas te klu mtshor zhugs pa tsam gyis mod la klu rgyal po dpung dang g.yog tu bcas chung ma dang / bu mo gzhon nu ma 'am/ thams cad mdun na 'dug cing 'di skad smra ste/ rig

sngags 'chang ba bka' stsol cig dang / las bgyi ba dang / dgos pa thams cad bgyi zhing nam 'tsho'i bar du nye bar gnas par bgyi'o/ /yo byad thams cad kyis mi brel bar bsgrub par bgyi'o/ /klu'i lha'i longs spyod

mchog tu longs spyad pas brtse bar bgyi'o/ /lha'i lo stong gi bar du rjes su gnas par bgyi'o/ /nor thams cad rjes su stsal bar bgyi'o/ /rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs gser dang / dngul dang / bai dUr+ya dang /

shang kra shi la dang / byi ru dang / sa le sbram dang / gser dang / mu tig dang / in dra nI la dang / ma mar ka ta dang / pad ma rA ga dang / bai dUr+ya dang / shin du bzang po rnams su stsal bar bgyi'o/ /lha rdzas kyi bza' ba

mchog dang / lha rdzas kyi nor gyi phung pos bang mdzod rnams rab tu dgang bar bgyi'o/ /shin du char ches pa gcad par bgyi'o/ /char dkon pa na char dbab par bgyi'o/ /dus ma yin pa'i char gcad par bgyi'o/ /

dus su char dbab pa dang / dus su char pa'i rgyun 'byung bar bgyi'o/ /lha rdzas kyi me tog sna tshogs dang / lha rdzas kyi 'bras bu sna tshogs nye bar bsgrub par bgyi'o/ /nam 'tsho'i bar du gnas te bsnyen bkur

bgyi'o/ /rig sngags 'chang ba'i rkang pa spyi bos blangs bar bgyi'o/ /rig sngags 'chang ba de'i tshig dang bsam pa rjes su bskyang bar bgyi'o/ /dpung pa gnyis kyi bar du thig le byas na glang po che stong gi stobs yod
par 'gyur te/ phyir rgol ba dang / dgra thams cad kyi stobs kyis mi thub par 'gyur ro/ /'thab cing dmag gi g.yul 'gyed pa thams cad kyi nang du pha rol gnon pa'i stobs thogs pa med pa rgyal ba

sbyin par 'gyur ro/ /lha ma yin kun las kyang rgyal bar 'gyur ro/ /lha thams cad 'di la bsrung ba dang / sba ba dang / bskyang ba'i phyir rtag tu zham ring du 'brang bar 'gyur ro/ /'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang /
'gyed pa dang / dngogs 'byin pa dang / mtshang 'bru ba dang / g.yul 'gyed pa thams cad du rgyal ba sbyin par 'gyur ro/ /lto bar thig le byas te khro bo'i lcags kyu'i rig sngags lan cig dran par byas

la yid la ji ltar bsams pa ji bzhin byas na ci 'dod pa'i kha zas thob par 'gyur te 'khor nyi shu dang bcas pas ji ltar 'dod pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /sker thig le byas te khro bo'i lcags kyu sker lan cig bzlas brjod

byed cing rgyal po'i pho brang du song na ji tsam 'dod pa'i gos dang / spud pa dang / rgyan thob par 'gyur ro/ /rtag tu rgyal po dang / btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pas mchod par bya bar 'os pa'i mchog tu 'gyur ro/ /dbang phyug

chen po'i chen po thob pa grub par 'gyur ro/ /lag mthil du thig le byas te lan cig bzlas brjod byas na gang la reg pa de dbang du 'gyur ro/ /gang 'dod pa de thams cad sbyin zhing bsgo ba de thams cad byed par 'gyur

ro/ /lag pa g.yas pa la bskus la lan cig bzlas brjod byas te/ grong khyer gyi sgo la brdabs na grong khyer na gnas pa'i gnod sbyin dang / srin po thams cad dbang du 'gyur te/ mdun na gnas shing de thams

cad bsgo ba bzhin byed par 'gyur ro/ /grong de na skye bo gang dag gnas pa bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo de thams cad dbang du 'gyur te/ 'dug cing ji srid grong khyer der 'dug par 'dod pa de srid du thams cad ci bya ba

thams cad byed cing gnas pa dang mdun na 'dug par 'gyur ro/ /lag pa g.yon pa la bskus te/ rgyal po'i sgo la brdabs na ji srid 'dug par 'dod na de srid du thams cad dbang du gyur pa sbyin par 'gyur ro/ /

lag pa g.yas pa la bsku zhing lan cig bzlas brjod bya ste/ phug gi gsang ba'i sgo la brdab pa byas na gsang ba'i khyim thams cad sgo phye ste 'dug cing khyim na gnas pa de thams cad dbang du gyur te 'dug go /

rkang pa gnyis la bsku zhing gsang sngags lan cig dran par byas te dur khrod na song na dur khrod na gnas pa'i gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha za thams cad mdun na gnas shing dbang du 'gyur ba dang / khyim gyi sgo

thams cad phye ba dang / thams cad bya ba ci yod pa byed par 'gyur ro/ /brla gnyis la bskus te nags tshal gyi nang du zhugs na zhugs pa tsam gyis khyim na gnas pa thams cad mdun na gnas shing khyim gyi sgo thams cad
