phye ste 'dug par 'gyur ro/ /sman gyi rdzas thams cad dang / rtswa dang / shing gel ba'i sman dang / rtswa dang mgo lcogs kyi nags tshal gyi rang gi ngo bo thams cad ji ltar 'dod pa blangs pa bzhin du mdun na 'dug par 'gyur ro/ /
dpal lha mo chen mo'i nu ma'i bar du bsku zhing khros pas gsang sngags lan cig bzlas brjod byas shing gu gul la bzlas brjod byas te/ bdug pa dbul zhing mig mi 'dzums par bltas na dpal lha mo chen mo

bka' stsol cing mchog thams cad sbyin par byed do/ /nor shin du mang po rnyed pa sbyin par mdzad do/ /dpal lha mo chen mo rtag tu khyim na gnas par 'gyur ro/ /yo byad thams cad kyi yongs su skyong bar 'gyur ro/ /nam 'tsho'i

bar du bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur ro/ /ma'i 'os dang lhan cig tu bdar la lan cig bzlas brjod byas te mig la bskus na gter thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /mtshan mo yang nyin par bzhin du mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /mchu'i thor

to la thig le bya zhing lan cig bzlas brjod byas na gang la smra ba de dbang du 'gyur zhing gang 'dod pa de thams cad thob par 'gyur ro/ /tshig gzung bar bya bar 'gyur ro/ /kha nas ut+pa la'i dri mnam par 'gyur ro/ /gdon la

thig le byas na zin pa dang / ma zin pa 'bab par 'gyur ro/ /gdon thams cad la thig le bya zhing lan cig gsang sngags dran par byas na mod la tshangs pa'i srin po la sogs pa'i bar du thams cad ngu zhing 'bros par

'gyur ro/ /thig le tsam dang dran pa tsam gyis thams cad las yongs su thar bar 'gyur ro/ /'jigs pa thams cad la thig le byas na yongs su thar bar 'gyur ro/ /phrag pa gnyis la thig le bya zhing khro bo lan

cig dran par byas na phrag pa gnyis 'bar bar 'gyur ro/ /mtshal dang sbyar te dri chab dang bsres nas lag pa dang rkang pa bsku zhing gsang sngags lan bdun dran par byas nas phu zhes byas na me 'bar bar 'gyur te/ ji tsam 'dod

kyi bar du 'bar ba 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /mchu la bsku zhing bzlas brjod byas na dbugs rgyu ba rnams me 'bar ba 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /lus mtha' dag bsku zhing gsang sngags mang du bzlas brjod byas na lus mtha'

dag 'bar 'gyur ro/ /chu dang yungs kar gyis bskrad nas bum pa dang / bum pa la zhi ba'i thig le byas te/ dri chus steng du gtor ba dang bcas pa byas na phyir yang gnas par 'gyur ro/ /ral gri dang / gtun shing dang /

dgra sta dang / 'khor lo dang / gdung rtse gsum dang / rdo rje dang / tho ba dang / mda' bo che dang / mdung la bsku zhing rjes su dran par byas na skad cig tu thams cad 'bar bar 'gyur ro/ /lhung bzed la bskus na 'bar

bar 'gyur ro/ /mgo la bskus na skra 'bar bar 'gyur ro/ /dung la bskus te de gnas mthon por bus na sgra gang thos pa tsam gyis sems can thams cad kyi khro ba thams cad dang / sdig pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar

'gyur ro/ /ngan pa dang / ma rungs pa thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /sprin logs su bus na rlung sprin dang / ser ba thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /grong khyer gyi sgo bzhir bus na/ byur dang gnod pa thams cad dang /

lo nyes dang / nad ma rungs pa dang / 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / mtshang 'bru ba dang / mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /'byung po dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang /

sha za dang / yi dgas dang / skem byed dang / grib gnon gyi 'jigs pa thams cad 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rims thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /nad thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /gsang sngags dang / byad dang /

sbod gtong dang / dug gi 'jigs pa thams cad las yongs su thar bar 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po'i sgor bus na pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyis 'jigs pa thams cad dang / dgra dang / phyir rgol ba'i 'jigs pa thams cad

rab tu zhi bar 'gyur zhing lan 'ga' yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /ba lang 'chi ba dang / phyugs 'chi ba dang / mi 'chi ba dang / rta 'chi ba dang / glang po che 'chi ba dang / rnga mo 'chi ba dang / byur dang / lo nyes dang / nad dang /

mig nad dang / nad thams cad kyi 'jigs pa chen po 'byung ba la khang pa'i steng du skad drag po lan cig dung sgra bud cing bzlas brjod byas na/ bus pa tsam gyi mod la thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /char mi 'bab

pa'i tshe/ klu'i gnas mtsho 'gram du bus na mod la klu'i rgyal po rnams char pa'i rgyun gtong bar 'gyur ro/ /char ches pa'i tshe sprin logs su bus na shin du char che ba zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /lan 'ga' yang mtshan ma ngan

pa dang / bkra mi shis pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /mtshams chen po gcad na ri mthon po'i khar bus te/ ji tsam dung sgra thos pa de tsam tshun chad mtshams chen po gcad par byas par 'gyur ro/ /dkyil 'khor

mtshams gcad na bskor zhing bus na dkyil 'khor gyi mtshams gcad pa byas par 'gyur ro/ /de nas khro bo'i rgyal po'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga sgrub pa bla na med pa thams cad bya ba la sems can thams cad zhi

bar bya ba la nas dang yungs kar dang mar bsregs la shing ar ka'i me bus te/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sbyin sreg byas pa tsam gyis dpag tshad kyi nang kun du zhi ba chen por 'gyur ro/ /yams kyi nad kyi gnod pa

thams cad dang / 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /lan brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg byas na dpag tshad stong kun du zhi ba chen po'i las byas par 'gyur ro/ /rgyas pa byas

na yungs kar dang / 'bras sA lu dang / kha ra dang / sbrang rtsi dang mar dang bsres te/ sbyin sreg bya ba ni lan bdun sbyin sreg byas na dpag tshad brgya kun du rgyas pa chen por 'gyur ro/ /lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sbyin sreg

byas na dpag tshad brgya tshun chad rgyas pa chen por 'gyur ro/ /lan brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg byas na dpag tshad brgya stong kun du rgyas pa chen por 'gyur ro/ /shing dri mi zhim pa'i me bus te/ 'bras kyi phub ma dang / lan tsha

dang / yungs kar mar dang bsres te shing tsher ma can gyi yam sreg gis me sbar te sbyin sreg lan bdun nam/ nyi shu rtsa gcig gam/ brgya rtsa brgyad byas na yid la ji ltar sems shing 'dod pa thams cad du mngon spyod

kyi las rnams byed par 'gyur ro/ /gsang sngags grub par 'dod na 'bras yos dang / yungs kar dang / zho dang / sbrang rtsi rnams mar dang sbyar te/ shing a ka'i yam sreg shing gis me spar te sbyin sreg lan bdun

byas na rang gi khro bo'i gsang sngags grub pa grub par 'gyur ro/ /lan bcu bzhi byas na don yod pa'i lcags kyu grub par 'gyur ro/ /nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod dang sbyin sreg byas na don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po

'grub par 'gyur ro/ /lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod sbyin sreg byas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi spyi grub par 'gyur ba 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dang / nor bu'i rigs dang /

pad ma'i rigs dang / rdo rje'i rigs rnams so/ /gzhan yang khro bo chen po stong phrag brgya mchog tu grub pa chen por 'gyur ro/ /til dang / 'bras dang so ba dang / zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar rnams sbyar te

chang pa bdun sbyin sreg byas na bram ze thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro/ /lan brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg byas na/ brgya byin la sogs pa lha thams cad lha'i tshogs dang bcas pa yang 'ong zhing rig sngags 'chang ba

la bsnyen bkur byed cing dbang du 'gyur ro/ /nyi ma dang zla ba dag kyang 'ong bar 'gyur zhing rig sngags 'chang ba'i rkang pa la 'dud par 'gyur ro/ /gnod sbyin dang / srin po dbang du bya na 'bras sA lu dang /

til dang / yungs kar dang / gu gul dang / zho dang / sbrang rtsi rnams mar dang bsres te sbyin sreg lan nyi shu rtsa gcig byas na gnod sbyin dang / srin po'i tshogs rnams dbang du 'gyur ro/ /klu char 'bebs par bya na

'bras yos dang / yungs kar dang / na ga pus pa dang / zho dang sbrang rtsi rnams mar dang sbyar te/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sbyin sreg byas na des na klu rnams char pa'i rgyun chen po 'bebs par 'gyur te/ ji tsam

'dod par char pa'i rgyun gtong zhing 'bebs so/ /shin du char che ba gcod na de nyid kyi thal ba nam mkha' la gtor na shin du char che ba gcod par 'gyur ro/ /pha rol gyi g.yul bzlog par 'dod na ske tshe'i 'bru dang /

byas na zho dang sbrang rtsi rnams mar dang sbyar te/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sbyin sreg byas na thams cad du rgyal bar 'gyur ro/ /'thab rtsod dang / 'gyed pa rnams kyi smra ba'i lan thebs par 'gyur ro/ /nad thams cad zhi bar

bya ba la/ sran ku lan tha dang / zho dang sbrang rtsi rnams mar dang sbyar te sbyin sreg lan nyi shu rtsa gcig byas na nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /bud med dbang du bya na su ma na'i me tog gis lan nyi shu
rtsa gcig sbyin sreg byas na bud med thams cad mchog tu dbang du byed pa'i dam pa yin zhing thams cad du mchog grub par 'gyur ro/ /de nas sdig pa thams cad rnam par sbyang bar 'dod na rig sngags
'chang ba de 'bras sA lu dang / til dang / yungs kar dang / pad ma'i 'dab ma dang / zho dang / sbrang rtsi rnams mar dang sbyar te/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sbyin
sreg byas na sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/ /'on te khro bo'i rgyal po sgrub par 'dod na seng ldeng gi phye ma dang / yungs kar dang / gu gul rnams
mar dang sbyar te sbyin sreg byas na thams cad du khro bo'i gsang sngags grub pa chen po 'grub par 'gyur zhing khro bo'i gsang sngags thams cad spyan drangs par 'gyur ro// //
'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po/ /bam po nyi shu bzhi pa rdzogs s+ho// // //
oM badzra sa twa sa ma ya/ ma nu pA la ya/ badzra sa twa twe no pa tiSh+Tha/ dri D+ho me b+ha ba/ su to Sh+yo me b+ha ba/ a nu rak+to me b+ha ba/ su po Sh+yo me b+ha ba/ sarba

si d+d+hi ma me pra ya ts+tsha/ sarba kaR+ma su tsa me/ tsit+ta shri ya~M ku ru hU~M` ha ha ha ha ho b+ha ga bAn sarba ta thA ga ta badzra ma me mu ny+tsa badzrI b+ha ba ma hA sa ma ya satwa a// // //maM ga la~M b+ha ba tu//

shu b+ha mastu sarba dzA ga ta~M/ shub+ha~M`/ /a ye d+harmA he tu pra b+ha bA/ he tun+te ShAn+ta thA ga to h+ya ba ba ta/ te ShAny+tsa yo ni ro d+hA/ e ba~M bA ting ma hA shra ma NaH bkra shis// yang zhus she/

@#/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya a mo g+ha pA sha hri da ya~M nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa don yod zhags pa'i snying po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ 'phags pa don yod zhags pa la

phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das po ta la ke'i ri'i rtse mo 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang

phyug gi gnas sa ma la dang / ta ma la dang / tsam pa ka dang / mya ngan med pa dang / a ti mug ta ka la sogs pa mang po dang / sna tshogs pa'i rin po che'i sdong pos yang dag par brgyan par dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po stong

phrag bcwa brgyad dang / byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu dang / gnas gtsang ma'i lha'i bu stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun du byas nas mang po dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so/ /

dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu rnams gtsor byas nas chos ston to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug stan las langs nas bla gos phrag

pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ gang bcom ldan 'das la de yis thal mo sbyar zhing phyag 'tshal nas zhal 'dzum par gyur pas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan

'das bdag la don yod zhags pa'i snying po zhes bya ba yod de/ gang sngon bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig na 'jig rten rnam par gzigs pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams su/ 'jig rten gyi dbang po rgyal po de bzhin

gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas las bdag gis blangs te/ gang yang bdag gis dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen po gtsor byas pa'i gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu brgya stong mang

po yang 'dus so/ /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don yod pa'i ye shes kyi gtso bo'i ting nge 'dzin bcu pa brgya stong bdag gis rab tu rnyed do/ /gzhan yang gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das sa gzhi'i

phyogs gcig tu rab tu spyod pa las rtogs par bya ste/ bcom ldan 'das de'i tshe sa phyogs de dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / tshangs ris gtsor byas pa'i lha'i bu stong phrag bcu gnyis kyis bsrung ba dang /

bskyab pa dang / sbed pa'i don du gnas par 'gyur ro/ /gang 'dir don yod zhags pa'i snying po rab tu spyod na bcom ldan 'das sa'i phyogs gcig po de mchod rten du 'gyur ro/ /sems can gang dag don yod zhags pa'i

snying po nyan pa de dag ni sangs rgyas mang po bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong la mchod par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' gang 'dir don yod zhags pa'i snying po thos pas bdag gis dge ba'i rtsa bskyed

par 'gyur ro/ /gang kha cig bcom ldan 'das sdig pa'i skyon byed pa/ sdig pa'i chos thams cad la yang dag par spyod pa/ 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa/ dam pa'i chos la smod pa/ mnar med pa la gzhol ba/

sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang 'phags pa nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas la smod pa po de gal te 'gyod par gyur cing slan chad gcod cing sdom par gyur na/ bcom ldan 'das des re shig
de nyid smyung bar gnas pa gcig gis de bzlas na de'i skye ba 'di'i las yongs su dag cing yongs su zad par 'gyur ro/ /phyir slon par 'gyur ro/ /rims nyin gcig pa 'am/ nyin gnyis pa 'am/ nyin gsum pa

'am/ nyin bzhi pa 'am/ de'i phyir khrag tu 'khrug pa 'am/ tshad pa 'am/ lag pa na ba 'am/ rkang pa na ba 'am/ mgo na ba 'am/ ha la ha la yis btags pa 'am/ mdze'am/ rkang shu 'am/ 'brum bu phra mo 'am/
lhog pa 'am/ 'bras sam/ bye'u 'bras sam/ g.yan pa 'am/ mtshan bar rdol ba 'am/ 'brum bu 'am/ brjed byed dam/ khyab par na ba 'am/ gsod pa 'am/ 'ching ba 'am/ brdeg pa 'am/ bsdigs pa 'am/ mi snyan
par brjod pa 'am/ mdor bsdu na bcom ldan 'das lus kyi na tsha 'am/ sems kyi sdug bsngal lam/ rmi lam ngan pa mthong bas de'i las yongs su dag cing zad par 'gyur ro/ /sngar nyid nas dag pa'i sems can

dad cing lhag par mos pa rnams shin du yongs su byang bar 'gyur ro/ /gal te bcom ldan 'das 'khor bzhi po dang rigs bzhi pos ji snyed du bdag la sgyu dang g.yos kyang mchod par byed/ gang 'dir don yod zhags pa

pa'i snying po nyan par byed pa dang / don 'dzin par byed pa/ 'chang bar byed pa/ klog par byed pa/ 'bri bar byed pa/ 'brir 'jug par byed pa/ kun chub par byed pa/ sems can gzhan rnams nyan du 'jug par byed pa 'am/

tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gtogs pa'i rna bug tu gtugs te zlos par byed/ sngags kyi tshig 'di sems par byed pa dang / dor ba med pa/ gzugs med pa/ rnam par mi rtog pa/ yang dag par 'byung ba med pa/ yun

ring du 'byung ba med pa/ sgyu med pa/ gos pa med pa/ mnyam pa'i sems g.yeng ba med pa/ phung po lnga dang bral ba'i sbyor ba 'dis ni sangs rgyas rjes su dran par bya'o/ /de dag la phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas brgya stong

gis zhal ston par 'gyur ro/ /khyed kyis bzlas pas sdig pa bshags par 'gyur ro/ /ji snyed po tir bri ba byas nas khyim du bzhugs su gsol bar bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das mang pos ci bya ste/ phan tshun 'gran pas

nyan pa 'am/ rje dpon gyis 'jigs pas sam/ gzhan gyi rjes su 'jug pas sam/ gzhan smad par bya ba'i ched du nyan pa ni 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi byin gyis brlabs su mkhas pas shes par bya'o/ /de dag

gi rna bug tu de'i sgra grags par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ gang la la'i skyes bus tsan dan nam/ ga bur ram/ gur gum 'am/ gla rtsi bar zhing brgyad cing rngo ba 'am/ sa la bzhibs nas bdag nyid la byugs na/

de la tsan dan nam/ ga bur ram/ gur kum mam/ gla rtsi bar ba'am brgyad pas de ltar dri'iphro bar mi 'gyur ro/ /yang dri zhim po yang de nyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das de ltar kho nar bdag gi don yod zhags pa'i snying po 'di la yang gang

la la zhig gis 'phya zhing smod pa dang / snga ma ltar ji snyed bdag la sgyu dang g.yos mchod pa byed pa de dag ni bcom ldan 'das rmu rgod kyi sems can de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur ro/ /'dod pas dka' bar 'dzin par

brjod de phyi ma la yang ngo / /gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang de ru tshul khrims dang ting nge 'dzin dang shes rab dang bsod nams kyi tshogs kyi dri dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur ro/ /tshul khrims kyi dri zhim po nyid du byed do/ /gang yang bcom

ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma 'am/ de las gzhan pa'i kha cig don yod zhags pa'i snying po ched du byas nas dkar po'i phyogs kyi

tshes brgyad la smyung bar gnas par byas te/ lan bdun du don yod zhags pa'i snying po tshig tu mi brjod par yongs su bzlas na/ de la bcom ldan 'das mthong ba'i chos nyid la phan yon nyi shu tham pa so sor 'dod par

bya'o/ /nyi shu po gang zhe na/ gang de'i lus la nad mi 'byung ba dang las kyi dbang gis nad byung ba yang myur du zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /snum zhing yid du 'ong ba'i lus dkar bar yang 'gyur ro/ /skye bo mang po'i yid du 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /

dbang po sbubs su nub pa dang nor rnyed par yang 'gyur ro/ /nor yod pa yang rkun pos khyer bar mi nus so/ /mes mi 'tshig go/ /chu yis mi khyer ro/ /rgyal po'i yid kyis kyang 'phrog par mi nus so/ /de'i las kyi mtha'

rgyas par 'gyur ro/ /de'i lus la chu'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rlung dang char pa'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /lan bdun du don yod zhags pa'i snying po chu 'am thal ba la yongs su bsngags te/

phyogs dang mtshams dang steng dang 'og gi zhing la bcing ba byas na nye bar 'tshe ba thams cad nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /mdangs za bas mdangs 'phrog par mi nus so/ /sems can thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /dgra yis

'jigs pa 'byung ba yang myur du zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /mi yis 'jigs par mi 'gyur ro/ /khyab par na ba'i 'jigs pa dang / /mkha' 'gro ma'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /nyon mongs pa drag po yang 'byung

bar mi 'gyur ro/ /me dang chu dang mtshon gyis 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro/ /lhas kyang rgyun du nye bar bsrung ba dang / skyob pa dang sbed par 'gyur ro/ /gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang de ru byams pa dang snying rje dang

dga' ba dang btang snyoms dang bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ /phan yon nyi shu po 'di dag so sor 'dod par bya'o/ /gzhan yang chos brgyad so sor 'thob ste/ brgyad po gang zhe na/ 'chi ba'i dus su 'phags pa spyan ras

gzigs dbang phyug dge slong gi gzugs kyis zhal yang dag par ston par 'gyur ro/ /bde bar tshe'i dus byed par 'gyur ro/ /mthong ba 'khrul pa med do/ /lag pa g.yob pa med do/ /bshang ba med do/ /gci ba med do/ /

rlung gi rnam pa med do/ /shin du legs par gnas shing dran pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /kha 'og tu bltas nas tshe'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro/ /'chi ba'i dus su nyon mongs pa med par rab tu brjod par 'gyur ro/ /

sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang du smon lam btab pa de dang de ru skye bar 'gyur ro/ /dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ /nyin re zhing dus gsum du lan gsum du bklag par bya'o/ /chang dang sha dang

tsong dang sgog skya dang bde byed la byin pa'i lhag ma khyad par du bsrung bar 'dod pas de rnams spang bar bya'o/ /don yod zhags pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di sems can rnams la nus sam mi nus

shes par byas la nyan du gzhug par bya'o/ /slob dpon gyis ser sna mi bya ste/ gang gi phyir phrag dog dang ser sna'i dri ma spangs pa ni byang chub sems dpa' yin no/ /sems can gyi don gyi ched du sangs rgyas kyi byang chub

thob pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun du yang 'gyur ro/ /shes rab ni byang chub tu brjod la sems dpa' ni thabs te/ de gnyis dag gis sems can gyi don nyid thob par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das gal

te chos 'di rjes su zlos shing snying po de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdun du brjod par byed pa ni 'khor bzhi po rnams la phan pa dang bde ba'i don gyi phyir dang / sdig pa byed pa gzhan rnams kyi yang phyir ro/ /de nas bcom
ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa/ gang 'di dag pa'i sems can la khyod kyis bstan pa'i dus la bab ste/ de bzhin

gshegs pas kyang rjes su yi rang ngo / /phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi pha'i bya ba byed par 'gyur ro/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras
gzigs dbang phyug spyan mi 'dzums par gyur pas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das gson cig /sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag byas pa'i rnam par

thar pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di skye bo mang po la phan pa dang skye bo mang po la bde ba dang 'jig rten la rjes su brtse ba dang skye dgu'i tshogs chen po la phan pa dang bde ba dang rnam par thar pa'i don gyi phyir yang ngo / /

na ma s+t+r+ya yad+d+hA nu ga ta pra tiSh+Thi te b+h+yaH sarba b+hud+d+ha bo d+hi sa twe b+h+yaH / na maH pra t+ye ka bud+hA R+Ya shrA ba ka sa~M g+he b+h+yo tA tA nA ga ta pra t+yud+pan+ne b+h+yaH na ma s+samyak+ga tA nA/ na maH sa~M myak+p+ra t+yut+pan+nA nA~M/ na maH shA ra dwa tI pu trA ya/ ma hA ma ta

ye+e/ na ma Ar+ya mai tre ya mu khe b+h+yo ma hA bo d+hi satwe sa~M g+he b+h+yaH na maH su pra tiSh+Thi ta she len dra rA dza pra ma khe b+h+yaH / sarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH d+h+ha d+b+h+yaH samyak+sa~M bud+d+he b+h+yo b+ha ga bad+b+h+yaH na maH su bar+N+Na bar+N+Na su pra ti b+hA bi ta na rdi ne shwa ra rA

dzA ya ta thA ga tA ya/ na maH si~M ha bi kri Di ti rA dzA ya ta thA ga tA ya/ na mo a mi tA b+hA ya ta thA ga tA ya/ na maH su pra tiSh+Thi te ma Ni kU Ta rA dzA ya ta thA ga tA ya/ na maH sa man+ta rasmyung+gata shrI kU Ta rA dzA ya ta thA ga tA ya/ na mo bi pa

sh+yi ne ta thA ga tA ya/ ne ta thA ga tA ya/ na mo bi shwa b+hu be ta thA ga tA ya/ na maH kra kuts+tshA n+d+rA ya ta thA ga tA ya/ na ma ka na ka mu na ye ta thA ga tA ya/ na maH kA sha pA ya ta thA ga tA ya/ na maH shAkya mu na ye ta thA ga tA yAR+ha te sa myak+sa~M

bud+d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM mu ne mu ne ma hA mu na ye swA hA/ oM sa me sa me ma hA sa me rak+Sha rak+Sha ma~M sarba satwa~M sh+tsa sarba pA pa pra sha ma ne swA hA/ na maH su pa ri kIr+t+ti ta nA ma d+he yA ya ta thA ga tA ya/ na maH sa man+ta wa b+hA sa bi dzi ta sa~M grA

ma shra ye ta thA ga tA ya/ na ma in+d+ra ke tu d+h+wa dza rA dzA ya ta thA ga tA ya/ na mo rat+na pra b+hA se shwa ra rA dzA ya ta thA ga tA ya/ na mo a pra ti ha ta b+hai Sha dz+ya rA dzA ya ta thA ga tA ya/ na mo bikrAn ta gA mi ne ta thA ga tA ya/ na mo bud d+hA ya/ na mo d+har+m+mA ya/

na maH sa~M g+hA ya/ na mo tI tA nA ga ta pra t+yut+pan+ne b+h+yo bud+d+he b+h+yo b+ha ga bad+d+h+yaHtad+ya thA/ smr-i ti bar+d+ha ni/ ma ti bar+d+ha ni/ ga ti bar d+ha ni/ d+h+r-i ti bar d+ha ni/ pradz+nyA bar d+ha ni/ pra hi b+hA na baR+d+ha ni/ d+h+yA na baR+d+ha ni/ shA ma tha baR+d+ha ni/ sarba bo d+hi

bak+Sha d+harma baR+d+ha ni/ sa ka la bud+d+ha d+harma pa ri pU ra NA ye swA hA/ na mo rad na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya wa lo ki te shwa rA ya bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA sa twA ya ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ na mo ma hAs+thA ma prap+tA ya bo d+hi satwA ya ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA

kA ru Ni kA ya/ e b+h+yo na ma skr-i twA i dmAr+ya wa ka lo ki te shwa ra mu khod+gi r+N+Na a mo g+ha pA shwa rA dzA nA ma hr-i da ya~M ta thA ga tA sa~M mu khaM b+hA Shi ta~M ma hA tA~M baR+Shan+ma d+h+ye a ha mi dA nI mA bar+t+ta yi Sh+yA mi/ sid+b+h+yan+tu me man+t+ra pA

dAHsarba kAr+ya Ni sarba b+ha ye b+h+yo ma ma sarba satwA nAny+tsa rak+Sha b+ha ban+tu/ tad+ya thA/ oM tsa ra tsa ra/ tsi ri tsi ri/ tsu ru tsu ru/ ma ra ma ra/ mi ri mi ri/ mu ru mu ru/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka /sa ra sa ra/ si ri si ri/ su ru su ru/

tsu ru tsu ru/ tsi ri tsi ri/ pi ri pi ri/ bi ri bi ri/ mi ri mi ri/ ma hA pad ma hasta/ ka la ka la/ ki li ki li/ ku lu ku lu/ ma hA shud+hA satwA/ bud d+h+ya bud d+h+ya/ bo d+ha bo d+ha/ bo d+hi bo d+hi/ bo d+ha ya bo d+ha ya/ ka Na ka Na/

ki Ni ki Ni/ ku Nu ku Nu/ pa ra ma shud d+ha satwA/ ka ra ka ra/ ki ri ki ri/ ku ru ku ru/ ma hA s+thA ma prAp+ta/ tsa la tsa la/ sany+tsa la sany+tsa la/ bi tsa la bi tsa la/ e TaT e Ta Ta/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ b+hi ri b+hi ri/ b+hu ru b+hu ru/

ta ra ta ra/ ti ri ti ri/ tu ru tu ru/ e h+ye hi ma hA kA ru Ni ka /ma hA pa shu pa ti be shu d+ha ra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ ta ra ta ra/ sa ra sa ra/ tsa ra tsa ra/ pa ra pa ra/ ba ra ba ra/ ma ra ma ra/ la ra la ra/ ha ra ha ra/

hA hA hI hI hU hU/ oM kA ra brah+ma be sha d+ha ra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ ta ra ta ra/ sa ra sa ra/ tsa ra tsa ra/ na ra na ra/ ba ra ba ra/ ha ra ha ra/ rasmi sha ta sa ha sra pra ti maN+Di ta sha rI ra/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ ta pa ta pa/

b+hA Sha b+hA Sha/ b+h+ra ma b+h+ra ma/ b+ha ga wAn+so mA di t+ya ya ma/ ba ru Na/ ku be ra/ brah+men+d+ra/ bA yu/ ag+ni/ d+ha na dA/ r-i Shi de ba ga NA b+h+yar+ts+tsi ta tsa ra Na/ su ru su ru/ tsu ru tsu ru/ mu ru mu ru/ g+hu ru g+hu ru/ san t+ku mA ra/ ru dra/ bA sa ba/

biSh+Nu/ d+han dA/ bA yu/ ag+ni/ r-i Shi/ nA ya ka /bi nA ya ka /ba hu bi bi d+ha bi sha d+ha ra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ ta ra ta ra/ tha ra tha ra/ g+ha ra g+ha ra/ pa ra pa ra/ la ra la ra/ ha ra ha ra/ ya ra ya ra/ sa ra sa ra/ ba ra ba

ra/ ba ra dA ya ka /sa man tA wa lo ki ta/ bi ke shwa ra/ ma he shwa ra/ tre b+hu ba ne shwa ra/ sarba gu Na sa mA la~M kri ta/ a wa lo ki te shwa ra/ mu hu mu hu/ mu ru mu ru/ mu ya mu ya/ muny+tsa muny+tsa/ rak+She rak+She mA~M sarba satwA sh+tsa/ sarba

b+ha ye b+h+ya/ s+sarbo pa dra be b+h+yaH sarbo gra he b+h+yaH sarba byA d+hi b+h+yaH ba sarba bi She b+h+yaH sarba dz+wa re b+h+yaH e ba~M/ ba~M d+ha ban+d+ha na/ tA ra na/ tardza na/ rA dza/ taska ra/ ag+ni/ u da ka /bi Sha shas+t+ra pa ri mo tsa ka /ka Na ka Na/ ki Ni ki Ni/

ku Nu ku Nu/ tsa ra tsa ra/ tsi ri tsi ri/ tsu ru tsu ru/ in+d+ri ya/ ba la/ bo d+h+yi ga /tsa tu rA r+yas t+ya sa~M pra kA sha ka /ta pa ta pa/ ta ma ta ma/ da ma da ma/ sha ma sha ma/ ma sa ma sa/ d+ha ma d+ha ma/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka /ma hA ta man+d+ha ka ri/

bi d+ham na/ ShaT+pA ra mi tA pa ri pU ra ka /ma la ma la/ mi li mi li/ mu lu mu lu/ Ta Ta Ta Ta/ Tha Tha Tha Tha/ Ti Ti Ti Ti/ Tu Tu Tu Tu/ Thi Thi Thi Thi/ Thu Thu Thu Thu/ e Ne ya tsaR+ma kr-i ta pa ri ka ra/ e h+ye hi ma hA kA ru

Ni ka /I shwa ra/ ma he shwa ra/ ma hA b+hu ta ga Na sa~M b+hany+dza ka /ka ra ka ra/ ki ri ki ri/ ku ru ku ru/ ha ra ha ra/ ba ra ba ra/ sa ra sa ra/ ka ra ka ra/ ka Ta ka Ta/ ki Ti ki Ti/ ku Tu ku Tu/ ma Ta ma Ta/ ma hA bi shud d+ha bi Sha

ya ni pA si na/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka shwe ta yadz+nyo pa bI ta/ rat+na ma ku Ta/ mA lA d+ha ra/ sarba dz+nya shi ra si kri ta dza TA ma ku Ta/ ma hA d+b+hu ta ka ma lA/ la~M kri ta ka ra ta ya/ d+h+yA na sa mA d+hi bi mok+Sha pra kam+p+ya/ ba hu satwA san+ta ti pa ri

pA tsa ka /ma hA kA ru Ni ka /sarba kar+m+mA wa ra Na bi sho d+ha ka /sarba dz+nyA dz+nyA na pa ri pU ra ka /sarba byA d+hi pa ri mo tsa ka /sarba satwA shA pa ri pU ra ka /sarba satwA sa mA shwA sa na ka ra na mo stu te swA hA/ a mo g+hA ya swA hA/ a mo g+ha

pA shA ya swA hA/ a dzi tA ya swA hA/ a pa rA dzi tA ya swA hA/ a mi tA b+hA ya swA hA/ a mi tA b+hA su tA ya swA hA/ mA ra sai n+ya pra mar+d+da nA ya swA hA/ a b+ha yA ya swA hA/ a b+ha ya pra dA ya swA hA/ dza yA ya swA hA/ bi dza yA ya

swA hA/ dza ya bi dza yA ya swA hA/ ba ra dA ya swA hA/ ba ra pra dA ya swA hA/ a kA la mr-i t+yu pra sha ma nA ya swA hA/ i dany+tsa me kar+m+mA ku ru na mo stu te swA hA/ oM ra Na ra Na hU~M phaT swA hA/ oM dza ya hU~M phaT swA hA/ oM dzra dzU

swA hA/ oM hU~M dza ya swA hA/ oM hri s+t+rai lo kya bi dza yA mo g+ha pA shA pra ti ha ta hrIHhaHhU~M phaT swA hA/ oM pa su pa ti swA hA/ oM A ro li ka swA hA/ oM ba hu le ba hu le swA hA/ oM A ro li ka hrIHhrIHhu~M phaT swA hA/ ni ya tA ni ya ta/

bi da nI yA shu b+ha s+ya me b+ha ga wan karma No a she Sha taHk+Sha ya~M ku ru swA hA/ oM pad ma hastA ya swA hA/ oM bud+d+ha d+har+m+ma sa~M g+hA ya swA hA/ bklags pas las thams cad 'grub pa yin no/ /dus gsum du bzlas na mtshams

med pa lnga rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/ /las kyi sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/ /a ga ru'i bdug spos dang thal ba dang chu dang / yungs kar dang seng lding gi phur bu la sogs pas mtshams bcing

ngo / /rims nad thams cad la srung skud bcing bar bya'o/ /nad thams cad la mar ram/ mar nag gam/ chu la yongs su bzlas te sbyin par bya'o/ /lus la khyab pa'i nad la mtshon chas gcad cing srung skud kyang bya'o/ /

lto na ba la tshwa chus nyams par byed pa 'am/ 'jim 'bag gam/ chus kyang bya'o/ /mig gi nad la skud pa dkar po rna ba la bcing bar bya'o/ /so'i nad la ka ra bi ra'i so shing gis so/ /mtshams bcing ba la ni tshon

sna lnga'i skud pa la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar du yongs su bzlas nas seng lding gi phur bu bzhi la bcings te phyogs bzhir gdab par byas na mtshams bcings pa yin no/ /thams cad du srung skud dam/ chu 'am thal

bas bya'o/ /gza' thams cad la tshon sna lnga'i skud pas bya'o/ /rims thams cad la skud pa dkar pos bya'o/ /sbrul dang / srin bu dang / ba spu byi ba dang / lhog pa dang / gre ba 'gags pa rnams la sbrang rtsi pi pi ling

dang ldan pas bya'o/ /mig gi nad la dri zhim po'i chu 'am/ rgya skyegs kyi chu 'am/ sbrang rtsi 'am/ shing mngar gyis bya'o/ /rtsod pa'i dus thams cad du rtsod pa dang mi snyan par brjod pa la chu la yongs su bzlas te gdong

bkru bar bya'o/ /yul gzhan gyi rgyal po'i 'tshe ba la yul 'khor du bum pa gang ba yang dag par gzhag nas gtsang mas gos gtsang ma gyon te mchod pa chen po byas shing bklags na zhi ba chen por 'gyur ro/ /de'i

chus kyang gtor bar byas nas sems can thams cad bsrung ba yin no/ /nye bar 'tshe ba thams cad dang / yams rnams zhi ba yin no/ /phyag rgya tsan dan gyi thig le la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar du yongs su bzlas

na mtshams med pa thams cad zad par byed do/ /rtag tu bzlas na khyim bsrung ba'o/ /pad ma'i sbyin sreg gi sems can thams cad kyi bsrung ba'o/ /tsan dan gyi sbyin sreg gis gza' dang / 'byung po dang rgyu skar

thams cad las bsrung ba'o/ /rgyal ba dang / rnam par rgyal ba dang / gzhan gyis mi thub pa dang / na gu li dang / dri'i na gu li dang / d+ha ra ni dang / mi 'jigs pa'i lag pa dang / dbang po'i lag pa dang / dri'i pri

yang ku dang / ta ka ra dang 'khor lo dang 'khor lo chen po dang / rnam par gnon pa dang / so ma rA dzi dang / su nat+ta zhes bya ba ste/ de dag gang yang rung ba la brgya rtsa brgyad kyi bar du yongs su bzlas nas nor bu lta bur
byas nas mgo bo dang dpung pa la bcing bar bya'o/ /byis pa mo rnams kyi ni mgul du'o/ /bud med rnams kyi 'doms su bcangs na rang nyid mchog tu maskal ba dang ldan par byed do/ /g.yang med pa

nyams nas bu yang ster ro/ /nor bu 'di bcangs pas thams cad du bsrung ba byas pa yin no/ /dug dang mes mi tshugs so/ /dug gis byas pa yang skye bar mi 'gyur ro/ /nad byung ba yang mi skye zhing myur du zhi bar

'gyur ro/ /gza' rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /rlung dang sprin dang thog ni chus rengs par byed do/ /ka ra bi ra'i lcug mas ni las thams cad byed do/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po mchog tu

grub pa 'dis ma bsgrubs par yang las 'di rnams byed do/ /de nas sgrub par 'dod na thang sku'i cho ga ni tshon sna ma lus pas sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs mnyam par bri bar bya ste/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
dbang phyug ral pa'i cod pan 'chang ba ri dgas kyi lpags pas smad dkris byas shing phyugs bdag gi cha lugs 'chang ba rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan par bya'o/ /lha bzo mkhan
gso sbyong dang ldan pas ri mo bri bar bya'o/ /de nas sgrub pa pos sku gzugs de'i mdun du ba lang gi lci bas dkyil 'khor byas la me tog dkar po bkram ste/ dri zhim po'i chus bkang ba'i bum pa brgyad
gzhag par bya'o/ /nye bar spyod pa brgyad dang nye bar mkho ba drug bcu rtsa bzhi dang / khrag med pa'i gtor ma sha dang bcas pa bya'o/ /a ga ru'i bdug spos bsregs la rig pa stong phrag brgyad
bzlas par bya'o/ /nyin zhag gcig tu smyung bar gnas pa 'am/ dkar gsum za zhing dus gsum du khrus byas nas gos gtsang ma gyon par gyur pas bzlas pa bya'o/ /de nas sku gzugs
kyi mdun du rang nyid bris pa bltas te de mthong bas dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /ji srid du 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug byon te/ bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par
byed do/ /ldong ros sam mig sman la yongs su bzlas te mig la bskus nas de nas mi snang bar 'gyur zhing nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /yang dag par rmongs pa med pa'i tshogs shes bya
ba'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu 'thob bo/ /sgrub pa po gang 'dod pa de 'dis byed do zhes bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / dge slong de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang /
lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //'phags pa don yod zhags pa'i snying po zhes bya ba theg pa
chen po'i mdo rdzogs s+ho// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po a mo g+ha badzra dang / bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba dge slong rin chen grags pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// //
'di ni don yod zhags pa cho ga zhib mo'i dbu nas/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga yan chad logs su bkos// // // // //

pa yin mod kyi/ gzungs rings la mi 'dra ba'i khyad par cung zad yod pa dang / don yod zhags par phyin drug yongs su rdzogs pa'i gzungs ni cho ga zhib mo'i bam po bcu bzhi pa las phyung bar snang bas der 'dus so//

@#/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya a mo g+ha pA sha pA ra mi tA ShaT pa ri pU ra ya nA ma d+hA ra NI/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa don yod zhags pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par byed pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag

'tshal lo/ /dus gsum du gshegs shing bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag

'tshal lo/ /oM a mo g+ha pA sha ma hA dA na pA ra mi tA pA ri pU ra ya hU~M/ da ra da ra/ bi bi d+ha ra/ bi tsi trai/ sar+b+ba satwA u pa b+ho ga /sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta/ ma hA dA na/ pu dza me g+hA pra brtA ya/ ta ra ta ra/ ta ra ya ma hA pad ma ma ni hU~M phaT swA hA/

'di ni don yod pa'i zhags pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i snying po chen po ste/ gang gis yungs 'bru tsam gyi sbyin pa yang byin te dran pa tsam gyis lan bdun bzlas brjod byas na mchod sbyin chen po rnam par 'phrul pa chen po shin du

rgyas pa chen po'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan

pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /oM a mo g+ha shI la/ sa~M b+ha ra sa~M b+ha ra/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ ma hA shud+ha sa twa pad ma bi b+hU Shi ta/ b+hu dza/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ sa man ta a ba lo ki te hU~M

phaT swA hA/ gzungs 'di gso sbyong gi yan lag brgyad gzung nas smyung bar gnas par byas te mi smra bar lan nyi shu rtsa gcig tu dran pas brjod par bya'o/ /de nas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po bzlas brjod bya'o/ /

bzlas brjod byas pa tsam gyi mod la tshul khrims dag pa chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /tshul khrims kyi dri zhim po mang po lus la 'byung zhing / phyogs bcu

bcu'i 'jig rten du grags par 'gyur ro/ /gang zhig nyi ma re re zhing gzungs 'di dran par byed na de ni rtag tu tshul khrims yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/ /dge slong gang la la zhig tshul khrims zhig cing nyams par gyur pas smyung bar gnas

par byas te/ gzungs 'di bzlas brjod byas pa tsam gyi mod la tshul khrims yongs su dag par 'gyur zhing / tshul khrims mang po dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag

'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /oM a mo g+ha k+ShAn ti sar+b+ba bo d+hi satwa k+Sha mi Na/ k+Sha Na k+Sha Na ma hA mai tri kA ru

Na sar+b+ba satwa bad sA la/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka /sar+b+ba satwa k+Sha ma Ni hU~M phaT swA hA/ gzungs 'di dran pas sems can du gyur pa thams cad la bzod pa dang / bzod pa chen po dang / snying brtse ba dang / snying rje chen po dang
ldan pa'i sems kyis mnyam par gnas pa dang / byol song gi skye gnas su gtogs pa'i ri dgas dang / bya dang / ltos 'gro la sogs pa gang dag 'das pa gang yin pa dang / gnas pa gang yin pa dang /

skye bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa de dag rnams la snying brtse ba'i phyir gang la la zhig gzungs 'di dran pas bzod pa'i mchog sgom par byed na de sems can dmyal ba dang / yi dgas dang / dud 'gro thams cad las yongs su thar bar 'gyur zhing /

skye bo'i tshogs mang po sdug bsngal la gnas pa rnams las rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro/ /nam sangs rgyas kyi yongs su dag pa la gnas par gyur gyi bar du bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /dus gsum gyi

de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /oM ma hA bIr+ya a mo g+ha bi

lo ki te/ ba ra ba ra/ dri D+ha bIr+ya ma hA ba la/ ba la ba la/ ma hA bo d+h+ya~M ga /ba la bo d+ha ni hU~M phaT swA hA/ gzungs 'di dus rtag tu dran pa 'am/ yongs su dag cing spro ba'i yid kyis dran pa tsam gyi mod la brtson 'grus kyi

pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/ /gang 'di yid la byed pa dang ldan pas dge ba sna 'ga' tsam byas pa yang dag dpag tu med pa byas par 'gyur/ stobs dang ldan par 'gyur/ myur bar 'gyur ro/ /
byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug gi bar du brtson 'grus nyams par mi 'gyur/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang nam yang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/ brtson pa chen por 'gyur ro/ /
dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /

oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA a mo g+ha kA ru Na/ d+h+ya na/ sa mA d+hi/ sar+b+ba bi mo k+Sha/ a pra kam pya ka /tsu ru tsu ru hU~M phaT swA hA/ gzungs 'di 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi drung du

yid la byed pas rtse gcig tu dran par byas na dran pa tsam gyi mod la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang ting nge 'dzin stong phrag brgya so sor rab tu thob par 'gyur ro/ /
sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du zhugs par 'gyur ro/ /bzlas brjod byas pa tsam gyi mod la ting nge 'dzin thams cad la dbang byed par 'gyur ro/ /dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la

phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /oM a mo g+ha ma hA pradz+nyA pa ra mi tA a ba b+hA sa swa b+hA ba/

sa ma~M ta s+pha ra Na/ bud d+hi/ pra sa ra pra sa ra/ sa man ta bud d+hi/ a ba lo ki te/ b+ha ga bAn pradz+nyA a ba lo ki te tsak+Shu Sha ma hA pradz+nyA pa ra mA ni ma hA pradz+nyA/ pad ma d+hA ri Ni b+hu dze hU~M phaT swA hA/ gzungs 'di dran pa

tsam gyi mod la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /thabs dang shes rab sna tshogs kyi dge ba'i blo chen po rab tu 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par pha rol tu
phyin pa bcu'i blo dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa na 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yid la
byed cing / sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i shes rab kyi blo dang rab tu ldan par 'gyur ro/ /lan 'ga' yang pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ /sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang /
bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ro/ /byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du nam yang

rmongs par mi 'gyur ro/ /chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid la yang dag par rjes su song ba zhes bya ba'i de kho na nyid dang rab tu ldan par 'gyur ro/ /blo gros dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa phun sum tshogs
par 'gyur ro/ /phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rab tu dgongs par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad rjes su sems par 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i pha rol

tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i gzungs chen po rdzogs s+ho// //paN Di ta many+dzu shrI warma dang / lo ts+tsha ba blo ldan shes rab kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ lo ts+tsha ba chos kyi shes rab kyis kyang bsgyur te gtan la phab pa'o/ /yang zhus she/ //

@#/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa ra sa ha sri ka b+hu dza lo tsa na nirmA Na bi stA ra pa ri pUr+NA sa~M ga ma hA kA ru Ni ka d+ha ra Ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug phyag stong spyan stong du sprul pa rgya chen po yongs su rdzogs pa

thogs pa med par thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das ri po ta la ka'i steng na/ 'phags

pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi med khang pa rin po ches rnam par brgyan pa'i nang na seng ge'i gdan rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyis rgyal mtshan dang / lha'i ba dan la sogs pa lhab lhub kyis klubs

pa'i nang na bzhugs te/ de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pas gzungs sngags kun tu 'dzin pas bshad pa dgongs nas/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po grangs med dpag tu med pa dag dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa

la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' gzungs 'dzin rgyal po dang / byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i rgyal po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sman gyi rgyal po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sman gyi bla dang / byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras

gzigs dbang phyug dang / byang chub sems dpa' mthu chen thob dang / byang chub sems dpa' me tog bkod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' cher bkod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rin po che bkod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' dpal

gyi snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la sogs

pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag thams cad kyang chos chen po'i dbang spyi bo nas bskur ba sha stag dang / nyan thos kyi dge 'dun chen po'i nang na gtso bo/ 'od srungs chen po dang / nyan thos kyi dge 'dun grangs med pa dag dgra

bcom pa'i sa bcu la spyod pa sha stag dang / yang tshangs lha rnams kyi nang na gtso bo tshangs pa chen po dang / tshangs lha grangs med pa dag dang / yang lha'i bu'i nang na gtso bo lha'i bu zer snang du ba can dang / lha'i bu grangs med pa dag dang / 'jig rten

skyong ba'i gtso bo gnas srung po la sogs pa rgyal po chen po bzhi dag dang / lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / namakha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa la sogs pa grangs med pa'i

nang na gtso bo klu'i rgyal po'i dpal dang / 'dod pa'i khams kyi lha mo grangs med pa'i nang na gtso mo lha mo gzhon nu'i mig dang / namakha' dang / chu bo dang / mtsho dang / rdzing dang / chu mig dang / chu bran dang / shing dang / sman dang / tshal dang grong

khyim dang / sa dang / chu dang / me dang / rlung dang / ri dang / nags tshal la sogs pa'i lha kun dang thabs gcig go/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug gis 'khor mang po 'dus pa'i nang nas gsangs

te rdzu 'phrul gyi 'od phyogs bcur btang nas/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kun kyang gser gyi kha dog tu snang / lha'i gnas dang / klu'i gnas dang / gnyan po thams cad kyi gnas kun kyang g.yos/ rab tu

g.yos/ chu bo dang / rgya mtsho dang / ri rab dang / lcags kyi ri dang / khor yug dang / sa'i ri dang / rdo'i ri dang / ri nag po dang / ri dmar po la sogs pa kun kyang g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ kun du rab tu g.yos/ /nyi ma dang / zla ba dang /

nor bu dang / me dang / gza' skar rnams kyi 'od kyang med par gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzungs 'dzin rgyal pos 'di lta bu'i ya mtshan ngo mtshar rmad du gyur pa mthong nas stan las langs te/
bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul gyi ltas ngo mtshar du byung ba su'i mthu lags/ shes bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de zhus pa/

gang zhig de ring mngon par rdzogs 'tshang rgya/ 'di ltar 'od chen kun du btang nas su/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten kha dog gser du snang / stong khams kun kyang khyab par de bzhin no/ su zhig de ring dbang phyug thob pa ste/

mthu chen ngo mtshar ldan pa'i ltas byung bas/ 'jig rten mtha' yas kun kyang rab g.yos shing / lha klu'i khang khyim kun kyang bde ma gyur/ su yi mthu stobs rgyu rkyen gang lags pa/ bdag cag ma rig thibs por skyes
pas na/ bcom ldan byams pa dang ni thugs rje yis/ 'phrul 'di su yi yon tan bshad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' gzungs 'dzin rgyal po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ rigs

kyi bu khyed rnams shes par gyis shig de ltar 'khor 'dir 'dus pa'i nang nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ces bya ba thog mar bskal pa grangs med pa nas byams pa dang snying rje chen

po bsgrubs te/ gzungs kyi sgo grangs med pa sdud cing spyod pa la mkhas pas sems can thams cad bde ba la bkod pa'i phyir/ 'di lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul gyi ltas chen po gsangs te btang ba yin no/ bcom ldan 'das
kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug stan las langs te/ gos tshags bcos nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan
'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ bcom ldan 'das bdag la thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa'i gzungs sngags kyi snying po mchis te/ sems can thams cad bde ba la gnas par bgyi ba dang / nad thams cad sel

bar bgyi ba dang / che skyang bar bgyi ba dang / phyug cing longs spyod dang ldan par bgyi ba dang / sdig pa mi dge ba'i las thams cad sel bar bgyi ba dang / bgegs dang / sgribs pa rnams sel bar bgyi ba dang /

chos dkar po thams cad dang / yon tan thams cad rnam par 'phel bar bgyi ba dang / legs pa'i sa bon thams cad yongs su grub par bgyi ba dang / 'jigs shing skrag pa 'gyur ba thams cad las yongs su thar bar bgyi

ba dang / re ba thams cad myur du bskong bar bgyi ba'i slad du bshad par 'tshal na/ de bzhin gshegs pas thugs rjer dgongs te gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu byams pa dang snying rje chen

po dang ldan pa khyod sems can thams cad bde ba la gnas par bya ba'i phyir gsang sngags bshad par 'dod na da dus la bab kyis myur du bshad pa'i rigs so/ nga yang rjes su thugs rangs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang

de bzhin du rjes su thugs rangs so zhes bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ bdag sngon du dran pa 'das pa'i dus bskal pa 'bum phrag

grangs ma mchis pa'i pha rol na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od stong 'bab pa'i rgyal po dben par gnas shes bgyi ba 'jig rten du gshegs te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bdag

dang / sems can thams cad la byams pa dang / thugs rjer dgongs pa'i slad du shin du rgya che ba thogs pa ma mchis pa'i thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa'i gzungs kyi snying po 'di bshad de/ phyag gser gyi kha dog can bdag gi

spyi bor gzhag nas/ 'di skad ces bka' l+tsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod gsang sngags kyi snying po 'di gzungs su zung la/ phyis ma 'ongs pa'i dus ngan pa na sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba chen por gyis

shig ces bka' stsal pa nas/ bdag de'i tshe de'i dus nas dang po la gnas pa las gzungs sngags 'di lan cig thos pa tsam gyis 'phags te sa brgyad du phyin to/ de'i tshe de'i dus na bdag shin tu dga' ba skyes

nas yi dam du bcas pa/ bdag gis dus slad ma la sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i 'gyur ba bgyi ba'i mthu zhig rnyed par 'gyur na/ bdag gi lus 'di la lag pa stong dang ldan par gyur cig ces smon lam btab

ma thag tu lus la lag pa stong dang mig stong tshang bar byung bar 'gyur te/ de nas phyogs bcu'i sa chen po rnam pa drug du g.yos par phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas stong gis 'od zer btang nas/ bdag gi lus la phyogs bcu'i

sangs rgyas stong gis 'od zer btang ste/ bdag gi lus dang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten mtha' yas par snang ba chen por mdzad do/ /de'i slan cad kyang sangs rgyas mang po dang 'khor mang po'i tshogs grangs ma mchis pa'i nang nas

yang 'di skad du thos te/ bsnyen bkur bgyis blangs te/ sems dga' ba dang rab tu dga' ba skyes te/ dga' ba dpag tu ma mchis pa nas yang bskal pa 'bum phrag grangs ma mchis pa'i skye shi ni shin du phra ba las thar

te 'phags so/ /de slan cad rtag tu bzlas brjod bgyi ste gzungs su gzung nas/ bskyud ma myong ste/ sngags 'di gzungs su 'dzin pa'i slad du bdag gar byung gar skyes kyang rtag tu sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar pad ma la rdzus shing

skyes te/ mngal du skye ma myong ngo / /gal te dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma 'am/ de ma yin pa gang la la zhig gzung sngags 'di 'dzin par 'tshal na/ sems can thams cad

la byams pa dang / snying rje cher bskyed do/ /thog mar bdag spyan ras gzigs kyi ming nas brjod cing smon lam 'di skad du gdab par bgyi'o/ /thugs rje chen po spyan ras gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdag gis chos nyid

kun du myur du chud gyur cig /thugs rje chen po spyan ras gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdag gis shes rab spyan ni myur du thob gyur cig /thugs rje chen po spyan ras gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdag gis sems

can thams cad myur du sgrol gyur cig /thugs rje chen po spyan ras gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdag gis thabs la mkhas pa myur du thob gyur cig /thugs rje chen po spyan ras gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdag ni shes rab grur ni myur du

zhugs gyur cig /thugs rje chen po spyan ras gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdag gis sdug bsngal mtsho las myur du rgal gyur cig /thugs rje chen po spyan ras gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdag gis tshul khrims lam la

myur du rdzogs gyur cig /thugs rje chen po spyan ras gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdag gis mya ngan 'das kyi ri la myur du 'dzegs gyur cig /thugs rje chen po spyan ras gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdag gi 'dus ma

byas kyi khang par myur du 'dus gyur cig /thugs rje chen po spyan ras gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdag gis myur du chos nyid sku dang mthun gyur cig /gal te mtshon gyi ri la phyogs gyur na/ /mtshon gyi ri ni rab

tu zhig cing rnyil gyur cig /gal te bdag gis chu tshan zangs la phyogs gyur na/ /me dang chu tshan rang du zhi zhing med gyur cig /gal te bdag gis sems can dmyal bar phyogs gyur na/ /sems can dmyal ba zhi zhing sdug bsngal
zad gyur cig /gal te bdag gis yi dgas bkres ltogs phyogs gyur na/ /yi dgas ltogs pa rab tu 'grangs gyur cig /gal te bdag gis lha ma yin du phyogs gyur na/ /lha ma yin gyi ngan sems yongs su

zhi gyur cig /gal te bdag gis byol song rgyud ru phyogs gyur na/ /bdag gis shes rab chen po'i rang bzhin thob gyur cig /de skad smon lam btab pa'i 'og tu sems brtse gcig tu bdag dang bdag gi mkhan po de

bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag tu med pa la mngon du dmigs te/ gsang sngags 'di zhag cig gi bar bzlas pa lan lnga tshang bar bgyis na/ bskal pa brgya stong khri phrag 'bum gyi bar du bsags pa'i sdig lci ba kun

kyang 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das lha dang mi dang gang la la zhig thugs rje chen po'i rig sngags 'di 'dzin pa 'am/ 'chang ba 'am/ klog pa 'am/ gdon

par bgyis na/ tshe 'phos shing 'gum pa'i khar phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kun der gshegs te/ phyag gis 'dzin cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang nas gang du skye bar 'dod pa de dang der skye bar 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das
sems can gang la la zhig thugs rje chen po'i gsang sngags 'di gzungs su gzungs ste/ bzlas pa las ngan song gsum du ltung na/ bdag mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ma gyur cig /gang gis thugs

rje chen po'i gzungs su 'dzin cing / bzlas brjod bgyis pa las sangs rgyas kyi zhing du ma skyes na bdag mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ma gyur cig /gang gis thugs rje chen po'i gsang sngags 'di gzungs
su 'dzin cing bzlas brjod bgyis pa las/ ting nge 'dzin grangs med pa'i rang rig pa ma thob na/ bdag mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ma gyur cig /thugs rje chen po'i gsang sngags 'di gang la las

gzungs su gzung ste/ bzlas pa bgyis pa las/ da ltar gyi tshe 'di la re ba thams cad ma skongs na thugs rje chen po'i gzungs sngags kyi snying po zhes bgyir yang mi rung ste/ gang dge ba mi spyod pa dang
sems thag pa nas mi bsgrub pa ni ma gtogs so/ /bud med gang la las bud med kyi lus kyis skyo ste/ skyes pa'i lus su skye bar 'tshal na thugs rje chen po'i gzungs sngags 'di bzlas par bgyis te/
gzungs su gzungs pa las bud med kyi lus las skyes pa'i lus su ma gyur na/ bdag mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ma gyur cig /gang yid gnyis sam the tsom chung zad tsam skyes pas ni 'grub

par mi 'gyur ro/ /sems can gang zhig dkon mchog gsum gyi dkor dang zhal zas la 'bags te/ spyad pa'i sdig pa sangs rgyas stong 'jig rten du gshegs pa'i tshe yang 'thol zhing 'chags su mi snang ste/ 'thol du lags kyang sdig pa mi 'byang

bar mi 'gyur ba rigs sngags 'di 'chang ba 'am bzlas pa bgyis na de ma thag tu sdig pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /dkon mchog gsum gyi dkor nor dang / zhal zas las spyod pa'i sdig pa phyogs bcu'i dge 'dun la 'thol zhing 'chags

na gdod byang ba lags te/ da 'dir thugs rje chen po'i gzungs sngags bzlas pa tsam gyis phyogs bcu'i dge 'dun yang der ltung ba byang zhing tshangs par bgyis pas sdig pa thams cad kyang myur du 'byang ngo / /mi dge bcu dang / mtshams

med pa lnga dang / gang zag la skur ba dang / mchod rten la 'dral ba dang / tshul khrims 'chal ba dang / gtsug lag khang zhig pa dang / dkon mchog gsum gyi dkor brkus pa dang / tshangs par spyod pa la mya ngan bgyis pa

la sogs pa'i sdig pa lci ba la sogs pa thams cad 'byang bar 'gyur ro/ /gang gzungs sngags 'di la the tsom 'tshal ba ni ma gtogs so/ /de sdig pa'i las chung ba dang / yang ba las kyang 'byung bar mi 'gyur na sdig pa

lci ba lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te/ sdig pa 'phral mi 'byang du lags kyis kyang / yun ring du byang chub kyi rgyur ni 'gyur ro/ /spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis kyang bcon ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/

bcon ldan 'das gal te lha dang mi rnams kyis thugs rje chen po ldan pa'i rigs sngags kyi snying po gzungs su 'dzin cing bzlas brjod bgyis na/ legs pa'i yon tan rnam pa bcwa lnga 'thob pa dang / gshis ngan du 'gum
pa rnam pa bcwa lnga mi myong bar 'gyur ro/ gshis ngan du mi 'gum pa gang zhe na/ ltogs te mi 'gum/ mtshon cha dang lcags dbyig gis mi 'gum/ dgra sha klan pas mi 'gum/ dmag gis g.yul du
mi 'gum/ stag dang / spyang gi la sogs pa'i gcan zan gyis mi 'gum/ sbrul dang sdig pa la sogs pa'i gdug pa can gyis mi 'gum chab kyis mi 'gum/ zhugs kyis mi 'tshig /dug gis mi 'gum/ mkha' 'gro
mas mi 'gum/ sems stor cing myos pas mi 'gum/ ri 'am brag gam shing ngam gad kar lhung ste mi 'gum/ byad stems kyis mi 'gum/ lham srin dang / 'dre gdon gyis mi 'gum/ nad ngan gyis mi 'gum/ lcebs

bas mi 'gum ste/ thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa'i gzungs sngags 'chang bzlas pa des gshis ngan du 'gum pa rnam pa bcwa lnga po myong bar mi 'gyur ro/ /legs pa'i yon tan bcwa lnga gang zhe na/ gang nas gang du skye ba'i

sar chos bzhin du bgyid pa'i rgyal po dang phrad pa dang / rtag par dge ba'i yul du skye ba dang / rtag par dus bzang po dang phrad pa dang / rtag par dge ba'i grogs po dang phrad pa dang / dbang po dang yan lag tshang ba dang /

spyod lam zhi dul can du 'gyur ba dang / tshu khrims mi nyams pa dang / gnyen bshes dang 'khor ldan zhing 'dum 'phrod pa dang / 'tshog chas dang nor zas yod pa gzhan gyis mi 'phrog pa dang / rtag par gzhan gyis bkur

sti dang phu dud bgyi ba dang / 'tshog chas dang nor zas la sogs pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / yid la 'dod cing 'tshal lo cog myur du 'grub pa dang / lha dang klu kun gyis rtag tu mgon skyabs bgyid par 'gyur ba dang /

gar byung gar skyes kyang sangs rgyas kyi drung du skye zhing dam pa'i chos thos pa dang dam pa'i chos thos nas don bzang po la rtog pa dang / thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa'i gzungs sngags 'chang ba dang bzlas pa des legs pa'i yon tan rnam pa bcwa lnga po

'di dag dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /lha dang mi rnams kyis rigs sngags 'di rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par 'chang ba dang / bzlas brjod du bgyi ba'i rigs te/ de la le lo bgyi ba'i mi rigs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'phags

pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis tshig de skad ces gsol nas/ 'khor 'dus pa mang po'i dbus su thal mo sbyar cing lus drang por bsrang nas sems can thams cad kyi phyir snying rje cher bskyed de/ mdangs phye zhing 'dzum dmul nas rgya

cher yongs su rdzogs pa thogs pa med par thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa'i gzungs sngags kyi snying po dam pa 'di brjod do/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mo Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA sa twA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni

kA ya/ sarba b+ha ba sa mut+t+ro/ co sha na ka ra ya/ sarba byA d+hi pra sha man ka rA ya/ sarbe t+yu ba dra ba/ bi na Shu Na ka rA ya/ ta sa na maskr-i da twa/ i mam Ar+yA ba lo ki ti shwa rA ya/ ta ba nI la kan+te na ma hr-i da ya

mA baR+ta yi Sh+yA mi/ sarba aR+tha yi ta sa da nan/ shu ban a tse yan/ sarba b+hU tA nAn/ ba b+ha marga/ bi sho d+ha kan/ tad+ya thA/ a lo ke lo ka /ma ti lo ka a ti kran+ta/ a ti kran+ta he h+ya ta re ba ha bo d+hi satwA/ he bo d+hi satwA/

hi bri ya bo d+hi satwA/ he kA ru Ni ka /rmar hrir yan/ hi hi hi re/ Ar+yA ba lo ke te shwa ra/ pa ra ma me tra/ tsit+ta na/ kA ru Ni ka /ku ru ku ru/ karma sA d+ha ya/ bin+da na de hi de ni/ ka mang+ga ma/ bi had+ga ma/ sid+d+ha yo ge shwa ra/

d+hu rU d+hu rU/ bi yan+ti/ ma hA bi yan+ti/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ da ren tre shwa ra/ tsa la bi ma la mU rte/ Ar+yA ba lo kI te shwa ra/ dzin kriSh+Na/ dzaT mo ku Ta/ lam+ba bra lam+ba/ bi lam+ba/ ma hA bi lam+ba/ ma hA sing+d+ha/ bid+yA d+ha ra/ ba la ba la/

ma hA ba la/ ma la ma la/ ma hA ma la/ tsa la tsa la/ ma hA tsa la/ ki na ba ka sha /kriSh+Na bar+N+Na/ kriSh+Na pak+Sha ni r+g+g+ha ta na/ he pad ma hasta/ tsa la tsa la/ ni sha tsa re/ shwa ri kr-iSh+Na sar ba krid tra/ yadz+nyo ba

bI ti/ e h+ye hi/ ba ra ha mu kha/ tri pu ra/ da ha ne shwa ra/ na ra ya Na ba la rU pa/ be Sha d+ha ri/ he nI kan la kaN+Tha he ma hA/ ha la ha la/ bi Sha nir dza ti/ lo ka s+ya rA ga pa sha na/ shan sha nan

de sha ni sha nan/ mo ha bi sha nan/ nir mo k+Sha na/ hu lu hu lu/ ma hu la/ ha la ha re/ ma hA pad ma/ ba na sa ra sa ra/ si ri si ri/ su ru su ru/ bud+ha bud+ha/ bo d+ha ya bo d+ha ya/ bo d+ha ya mi te/ nI la kaN+Tha/ e h+ye hi/ bA ma

s+thi ta sing+ha mu kha/ ha sa ha sa/ mun tsa mun tsa/ ma hA ha ta ha sa/ e h+ye haM/ sid+d+ha yo gI shwa ra/ ba na ba na/ ba tsa na/ sa d+ha ya sa d+ha ya/ ba dan/ sma ra sma ra/ tan b+ha ga ban tam/ lo ka bi lo ta ka tan/
ta thA ga ta na/ da da hi me/ da ri shan ba/ ka ma s+ya/ da ni sha ra/ pra la d+ha ya man swA hA/ sid+d+ha swA hA/ ma hA sid+d+ha ya swA hA/ sid+d+ha yo ge shwa ra swA hA/ nI la kaN+ThA ya swA hA/

hA/ sid+d+ha bid+yA d+ha rA ya swA hA/ pad ma ha stA ya swA hA/ kr-iSh+Na sa ra ba yadz+nyo ba bI ya swA hA/ ma hA la ku ta/ da ra ya swA hA/ tsakrA yu d+ha ya swA hA/ shad+ga sha p+ta d+hA ra Ni bo d+ha ya swA hA/ bI ma skan+da de sha stid ta/ kriSh+Na dzi na ya

swA hA/ ma hA b+h+ya swA hA/ kra tsar ma Ni ba si ni ya swA hA/ ka lo ke shwa ra ya swA hA/ sarba sid+d+hi shwa r+ya swA hA/ rak+Sha rak+Sha ma ra na/ bdag bsrung du gsol/ bsrung du gsol/ /na mo b+ha ga ba ti/

Ar+yA ba lo ki ti shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ sid+d+h+ya n+tu du man+t+ra pa da swA hA/ oM hrI tre+e lo kya bi dza yA/ a mo g+ha pA sha a pra ti ha ta hr-i da hU~M phaT swA hA/ /byang chub sems dpa'

'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis sngags 'di brjod ma thag tu sa chen po rnam pa drug tu g.yos so/ /de nas lha rnams kyis me tog rin po che'i char phab ste mchod do/ /phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyang

shin tu thugs dgyes par gyur nas lha'i bdud dang mu stegs rnams kyang 'jigs skrag ste skyi bung zhes byed do/ /'khor 'dus pa'i tshogs thams cad 'bras bu'i khyad par 'thob pa/ gcig ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras

bu/ kha cig ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba/ kha cig ni phyir mi 'ong ba/ kha cig ni dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu/ kha cig ni sa dang po dang / sa gnyis pa dang / sa gsum pa dang sa bzhi pa dang / sa lnga pa dang / sa bcu pa'i bar gyi 'bras

bu thob pa/ sems can mang po zhig kyang de'i tshe/ byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /de nas tshangs pa chen po stan las langs te/ gos tshags bcos nas thal mo sbyar cing bsnyen bkur gus pa'i tshul du byang chub

sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces smras so/ /skyes bu chen po legs so/ /bdag sngon sangs rgyas grangs ma mchis pa nas chos kyi rnam grangs mang po zhig thos kyis kyang 'di lta bu'i

thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa thogs pa mi mnga' ba'i gzungs kyi snying po tshigs thos ma myong ste/ skyes bu chen po'i gzungs 'di'i mtshan nyid ji lta bu lags pa bdag la bstan du gsom/ /bdag cag phal mang po yang /
thos par smon to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis tshangs pa chen po la smras pa/ khyed thabs la mkhas pas sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde bar bya ba'i
phyir 'di skad du 'dri na/ legs par nyon cig dang / ngas khyed rnams la mdo tsam zhig bshad do/ /gzungs 'di'i mtshan nyid ni 'di lta ste/ byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po'i sems so/ /
'dus ma byas pa'i sems so/ /chags pa med pa'i sems so/ /stong pa nyid du rtogs pa'i sems so/ /ri mo gus pa'i sems so/ /bdag dman pa'i sems so/ /'khrug pa med pa'i sems so/ /

bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi sems so/ /de lta bu'i sems ni gzungs kyi mtshan nyid ces byas te/ khyod kyang de bzhin du sbyong cig /tshangs pa chen pos smras pa/ bdag la sogs pa phal mang pos gzungs 'di'i

mtshan nyid ni gdod 'tshal te/ der phyin cad gzungs su gzungs zhing ming skyud par bgyi'o/ /spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la las byang chub kyi sems rgya
cher bskyed de/ sems can thams cad mya ngan las bzla ba'i phyir/ tshul khrims 'dzin cing sems can thams cad la snyoms pa'i sems bskyed de/ sngags 'di rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par khang pa dben pa zhig

tu khrus byas te gos gtsang ma bgo zhing rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / mar me dang / bdug spos dang / byug pa dang / me tog dang / zhal zas rnams kyis mchod cing don gzhan btang ste sems rtse gcig tu cho ga bzhin

bzlas brjod byas na/ de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' nyi 'od dang / byang chub sems dpa' zla 'od dang / rig 'dzin grangs med pa dag dang lhan cig tu der 'ongs te/ de la phan par byed pa'i rtags dang mtshan ma ston

par 'gyur ro/ /ngas kyang de'i tshe de'i dus na mig stong gis brtag cing lag stong gis bskyab par bya'o/ /mu stegs kyi gtsug lag thams cad la mkhas shing khong ngu chud par bya'o/ /gang gis gzungs sngags

'di gzungs su gzung zhing bzlas brjod byas na 'jig rten gyi 'dre gdon gyi nad brgyad khri bzhi stong kun gso bar nus te mi 'tsho ba med do/ /gcig tu na lha ma srin thams cad bkol pa dang lha'i bdud thams cad pham
par byed pa dang / mu stegs can thams cad thul bar 'gyur ro/ /gal te gang la las dgon pa na gnas shing bsam gtan byed dam/ mdo sde klog pa 'am/ kha ton byed pa las 'byung po dang yi dgas
la sogs pas bgegs byas te/ sems mi bde na/ sngags de lan gcig bton pa tsam gyis bgegs byed pa rnams 'ching bar 'gyur ro/ /de cho ga bzhin du

bzlas brjod byas te/ sems can thams cad la byams pa dang / snying rje bskyed de/ de'i tshe de'i dus na ngas 'jig rten skyong ba dang / rdo rje gsang ba 'dzin dang / klu'i rgyal po la sogs pa bsgo ste/ de la bsrung ba dang / skyob pa

dang / sba ba'i phyir dus thams cad du phyi bzhin du 'brang zhing skad cig tu yang mi 'bral bar/ ji ltar rang gi mig dang srog la 'phangs pa bzhin rim gro byed pa bzhin bsrung zhing skyob du gzhug go/ 'di ltar ngas ni gsang 'dzin

thal sbyor dang / /rdo rje 'tshol ba dang ni lcags kyu dang / /lu gu rgyud dang stobs chen sde brgyad rnams/ /gzungs 'dzin de la bsrung zhing skyob du gzhug /ngas ni sred med bu dang dbang ldan dang / /kum bi ra dang ka pa li ka

dang / / ba hu chu bdag dang ni legs ldan rnams/ /gzungs 'dzin de la bsrung zhing skyob du gzhug /ngas ni mgrin bcu dang ni tsan da ra/ /ka lan ta ka dang ni san tsam bal/ /ban ki la dang pirba ka la rgyal/ /gzungs

'dzin de la bsrung zhing skyob tu gzhug /ngas ni ing dig bi ta sar ga dang / /tshangs pa chen po sam pra ka dang ni/ /tshangs ris lha yi sde dang gshin rje rnams/ /gzungs 'dzin de la bsrung zhing skyob du gzhug /

ngas ni brgya byin sum bcu gnyis dbang bcas/ /dbyangs can dpal dang ni sa ta na dang / /ma mo la sogs mthu chen rnams kyis kyang / /gzungs 'dzin de la bsrung zhing skyob tu gzhug /ngas ni 'jig rten skyong

ba gnas bsrungs dang / /'phags skyes mig mi bzang dang ngal bso dang / /gser can dang ni rma bya chen mo rnams/ /rtag tu de la bsrung zhing skyob tu gzhug /ngas ni rig 'dzin nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang / /gnod sbyin

sde dpon chen po nor bzangs dang / /gang ba bzang dang yang dag shes rnams kyis/ /rtag tu de la bsrung zhing skyob tu gzhug /ngas ni klu yi rgyal po dga' bo dang / /nye dga' bo dang ma dros rnams dang ni/ /klu'i yi rgyal po i la

ma la sogs/ /gzungs 'dzin de la bsrung zhing skyob tu gzhug /ngas ni lha ma yin dang dri za dang / /namakha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang ni/ /lto 'phye chen po dang ni grul bum gyis/ /gzungs 'dzin de la bsrung zhing skyob du gzhug

ngas ni chu dang me dang rlung lha dang / /'brug dang glog gi lha rnams mthu chen dang / /'byung po sha za rnams kyis rtag pa ru/ /gzungs 'dzin de la bsrung zhing skyob tu gzhug /de dag kun kyang so so nas 'khor lnga brgya dang

gnod sbyin stobs po che rnams thugs rje chen po'i rigs sngags 'chang ba de la bsrung ba dang skyob pa dang / sba ba'i phyir dus thams cad du 'brang bar byed do/ /de 'brog dgon pa na gcig pu gnas pa'i tshe/ mgon po dag res
kyis bsrung ba byed cing gdon dang bgegs sel bar byed do/ /dgon pa chen por bslad dam lam 'tshol bar gyur na/ rigs sngags 'di bzlas pa tsam gyis mgon po dang / klu'i rgyal po la sogs pa mir sprul te/

lam gang yin pa ston par byed do/ /gal te 'brog dgon pa 'am mya ngam 'am/ nags tshal dag du 'gro ba'i tshe/ chu dang mes 'phongs na/ rigs sngags 'di dran pa tsam gyis/ klu rnams kyi chu dang me mngon du

sprul cing 'byung bar byed do/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis kyang sngags 'di'i yon tan tshigs su bcad de brjod pa/ /gang zhig ri brag dgon par gnas pa'i tshe/ /gcan zan stags dang dom dred spyang gi dang

sbrul gdugs can dang brlabs pa'i 'dre rnams la/ /sngags 'di brjod pa tsam gyis gnod mi nus/ /gang zhig rgya mtsho 'am chu klung sar 'gro na/ /klu gdug 'jog po chu srin nya rnams dang / /gnod sbyin srin po 'bar ba ru sbal

rnams/ /sngags 'di thos pa tsam gyis lus sbed 'gyur/ /pha rol dmag tshogs phrad de dgras bskor tam/ /sdig pa can gyis nor zas 'joms pa'i tshe/ /bsam pa thag pas thugs rje'i sngags brjod na/ /de dag byams sems

g.yo zhing phyir yang ldog /gang zhig rje dpon dag gis brtson bzung nas/ /khri mon dang ni btson rar 'jug pa'i tshe/ /bsam pa thag pas thugs rje'i sngags brjod na/ /rje dpon sems slod gnang zhing slar la gtong / /dug can zas rnams

gnod par gyur pa'i tshe/ bsam pa thag pas thugs rje'i sngags brjod na/ /dug can zas de 'phral du bdud rtsir 'gyur/ /bud med gang zhig bu dag btsa' ba na/ /gdon bgegs zhugs te sdug bsngal mi bzang tshe/ /thugs rje

yi ni sngags 'di brjod byas pas/ /gdon bgegs byer zhing bde bar btsa' bar 'gyur/ /klu gdug gor 'dres rims nad gtong ba na/ /na tsha mi bzad 'chi sgor bsnyen pa'i tshe/ /bsam pa thag pas thugs rje'i sngags brjod na/ /

rims nad zhi zhing tshe srog nur par 'gyur/ /klu dang chu srin gdon gyis skrangs gyur cing / 'bras dang shu ba rnag khrag mi bzad tshe/ /bsam pa thag pas thugs rje'i sngags brjod nas/ mchil ma thengs gsum btab pas

rjes bzhin 'byang / /snyigs ma can gyi sems can sdig spyod cing / /sngags dang byad kyis khon la shar gnyer ba/ /bsam pa thag pas thugs rje'i sngags brjod na/ /byad sngags drag po de la slar 'khor ro/ /

dus ngan snyigs can 'khrug cing chos 'jig tshe/ /chags med bdo zhing 'dod la sems rmongs te/ /bza' shug dben zhing nyin mtshan gzhan dag la/ /'dod pa'i chags sems gtong ba'i dus med pa/ /de tshe thugs rje
can gyi sngags brjod na/ /'dod chags me dang 'khrug sems 'gag par 'gyur/ /gal te nga yi sngags kyi yon tan kun/ /rgya cher bshad du bskal par mi rdzogs so/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang
phyug phyag stong spyan stong du sgrul pa'i gzungs rdzogs s+ho// //

@#/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+yA bo d+hi sa twA ba lo ki te shwa ra sa hA sra b+hu dza ne trA sa~M ga ma hA kA ru Ni ka tsi t+ta bista ra pa ri pUr+N+Na nA ma d+ha ra NI/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug phyag

stong spyan stong dang ldan pa thogs pa mi mnga' ba'i thugs rje chen po'i sems rgya cher yongs su rdzogs pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ bam po dang po/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i po ta la'i steng / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzhal med khang rin po che bkod pa'i dkyil 'khor na nor bu rin po

che rnam pa sna tshogs kyis rab tu brgyan pa'i rin po che'i seng ge'i gdan rin po che'i rgyal mtshan dang ba dan dag gis 'khor bar bkod cing dpyangs pa la bzhugs te/ de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa gdan de la bzhugs

nas kun 'dzin ces bya ba'i gzungs sngags bshad par bzhed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po grangs med pa dang / thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' kun 'dzin gyi

rgyal po dang / byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i rgyal po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sman gyi rgyal po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sman mngon par 'phags pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang

phyug dang / byang chub sems dpa' mthu chen thob pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' pad ma'i bkod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' bkod pa chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' rin chen snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa'

dpal gyi snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po dang / byang chub

sems dpa' 'jam dpal la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi rgyal bu chen por dbang bskur ba thob pa sha stag dang thabs gcig go/ /gzhan yang nyan thos kyi dge 'dun chen po thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa'i

sa bcu spyad pa tshad med grangs med pa dag dang thabs gcig ste/ tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po ni gtso bor gyur to/ /gzhan yang tshangs ris kyi lha tshad med pa snyed dang thabs gcig ste/ lha'i bu k+ShaN+Da ma ra ni gtso bor gyur to/ /

gzhan yang lha dang lha'i bu tshad med pa snyed dang thabs gcig ste/ lha'i bu ku b+ha ka ni gtso bor gyur to/ /gzhan yang 'jig rten skyong ba dang / rgyal chen ris bzhi'i lha'i rgyal po tshad med pa snyed dang thabs gcig ste/

lha'i rgyal po yul 'khor bsrung ni gtso bor gyur to/ /gzhan yang lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin

pa la sogs pa tshad med pa snyed dang thabs gcig ste/ klu'i rgyal po chen po ri'i dpal ni gtso bor gyur to/ /gzhan yang 'dod pa'i khams kyi lha'i bu mo tshad med pa snyed dang thabs gcig ste/ lha'i bu mo gzhon nu'i

mig ces bya ba ni gtso mor gyur to/ /gzhan yang nam mkha'i lha dang / chu bo dang / rgya mtsho yi lha dang / chu mig gi lha dang / chu klung gi lha dang / sman gyi lha dang / ljon shing gi lha dang / nags tshal gyi lha dang /

khang khyim gyi lha dang / chu'i lha dang / me'i lha dang / rlung gi lha dang / sa'i lha dang / ri'i lha dang / gzhal med khang la sogs pa'i lha tshad med pa snyed kyang so so nas 'dus shing lhags par gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' spyan

ras gzigs dbang phyug 'khor mang po'i nang du gsang ste/ rdzu 'phrul gyis 'od zer bkye bas phyogs bcu'-i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di yang gser gyi
kha dog can du gyur to/ /lha'i gzhal med khang rnams dang / klu'i khang khyim rnams dang / lha'i gtso bo rnams kyi gzhal med khang rnams kyang rab tu g.yos par gyur/ chu bo dang / mtsho dang / rgya

mtsho chen po dang / ri 'khor yug dang / ri rab lhun po dang / sa'i ri dang / ri nag po rnams kyang rab tu g.yos par gyur to/ /nyi ma dang / zla ba dang / nor bu dang / me dang / rgyu skar dang / gza'i 'od rnams kyang zil gyis mnan te mi snang

bar gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun 'dzin gyi rgyal pos ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i mtshan ma de dag mthong ba dang / sngon chad nam yang de lta bu ma byung ngo zhes ngo mtshar du gyur nas/ stan las langs te thal mo sbyar

nas 'di skad ces bcom ldan 'das rdzu 'phrul gyi mtshan ma 'di lta bu 'di dag sus bkye lags zhes gsol nas/ tshigs su bcad de zhu ba zhus pa/ ding ni su zhig mngon par sangs rgyas na/ /'di ltar 'od zer chen po rab

bkye bas/ /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gser gyi mdog du gyur/ /stong chen 'jig rten khams kyang de bzhin lags/ /deng ni su zhig rang dbang thob gyur na/ /ya mtshan rdzu 'phrul chen po mthu bkye nas/ /mtha' med sangs rgyas

zhing rnams rab g.yos shing / /lha klu gzhal med khang rnams mi bder gyur/ /su yi mthu lags rgyu rkyen ma rtogs pas/ /'khor mang 'di dag the tshom 'tshal gyur na/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs rje chen po yis/ /

rdzu 'phrul 'di yi rgyu rkyen bkas bshad gsol/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' kun 'dzin gyi rgyal po la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyed kyis 'di rig par bya ste/ deng 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor

'dus pa 'dir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ces bya ba zhig yod pa de/ sngon bskal pa tshad med pa nas byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po phun sum tshogs par gyur pa/ gzungs kyi

sgo tshad med pa snyed shin tu bsgoms shing mngon par bsgrubs par gyur pas/ sems can rnams la phan pa dang bde bar 'dod pa'i phyir gsang ste 'di lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu chen po bstan pa yin no/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal

pa dang / de nas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug stan las langs te gos tshags bcos nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das

bdag la thugs rje chen po'i sems shes bgyi ba'i gzungs sngags mchis te/ sems can mang po rnams la sman pa dang bde ba 'thob par bgyi ba dang / bro nad thams cad bsal bar bgyi ba dang / tshe ring bar 'gyur ba dang / phyug cing

'byor ba dang ldan par bgyi ba dang / sdig pa mi dge ba'i las dang kha na ma tho ba lci ba rnams yongs su sbyang zhing bsal ba dang / sgrib pa'i bgegs rnams dang 'bral ba dang / chos dkar po'i yon tan thams cad 'phel bar bgyi ba dang /

dge ba'i sa bon thams cad phun sum tshogs par bgyi ba dang / 'jigs shing skrags pa thams cad yongs su spang bar bgyi ba dang / re ba thams cad myur du yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba'i slad du deng bshad par 'tshal na/

bcom ldan 'das thugs brtse bar dgongs te gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod snying rje chen pos sems can rnams la phan pa dang / bde ba 'dod pa'i phyir rigs sngags

bshad par 'dod pas deng dus la bab kyis myur du smros shig dang / de bzhin gshegs pa nga dang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang rjes su thugs dgyes par mdzad do/ /bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa'

spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yang 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag mngon par dran lags te/ sngon byung ba'i bskal pa 'bum phrag tshad ma mchis pa snyed 'das pa de'i tshe de'i dus na bcom ldan 'das

de bzhin gshegs pa 'od stong gi rgyal po zhi bar gnas pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das des bdag dang sems can thams cad la thugs brtse ba'i slad du thogs pa ma mchis pa'i thugs rje chen

po rgya cher yongs su rdzogs pa zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs 'di bka' stsal nas/ phyag gser gyi kha dog can gyis bdag gi spyi bo la byugs te 'di skad ces/ rigs kyi bu khyod thugs rje chen po'i rig sngags 'di zung shig dang /

ma 'ongs pa'i dus ngan pa'i sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba chen po byed par 'gyur ro zhes bka' stsal to/ /bdag de'i tshe gdod sa dang po la gnas pa las rig sngags 'di lan cig thos pa tsam gyis sa brgyad pa las yang dag

par 'das par gyur lags so/ /bdag de'i tshe de'i dus na sems rab tu dga' zhing mgu bar gyur pa'i slad du smon lam 'di skad du btab lags te/ gal te bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na sems can thams cad la sman cing bde bar bgyid

pa'i 'os su 'gyur yang dag pa zhig lags na deng bdag gi lus 'di nyid las lag pa stong dang / mig stong tshang bar 'byung bar gyur cig ces smon lam btab ma thag tu lus las sug pa stong dang mig stong tshang bar byung bar gyur te/ phyogs bcu'i sa

chen po rnams kyang rnam pa drug du rab tu g.yos par gyur/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang 'od zer bkye bas bdag gi lus la reg cing phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' ma mchis pa rnams kyang gsal bar

bgyis par gyur lags so/ /de slan chad sangs rgyas tshad ma mchis pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor tshad ma mchis pa dag tu gzungs 'di yang dang yang du thos shing mngon sum du yang dag par blangs pa dang / gzhan yang dga' ba dang /

mgu ba dang rangs pa tshad ma mchis pa bskyed pas bskal pa 'bum phrag tshad ma mchis pa snyed kyi 'khor ba phra mo las yang dag par 'das par gyur lags so/ /de sman cad gzungs 'di rtag par 'don cing yongs su gzung nas/

nam du yang mi bskyud par bgyis pa'i slad du skye ba thams cad du rtag par sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyan sngar pad ma la brdzus te skyes pas mngal du skye ba'i lus blangs par ma gyur lags so/ /dge slong ngam/ dge slong

ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma 'am/ khye'u 'am/ bu mo gang la la zhig 'di 'don cing yongs su 'dzin par 'tshal ba des sems can rnams la snying brtse ba'i sems bskyed nas/ dang po kho nar bdag la smon lam
'di skad gdab par bgyi lags so/ /spyan ras gzigs dbang thugs rje che la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdag gis chos rnams thams cad myur du rtogs par shog /spyan ras gzigs dbang thugs rje che la phyag 'tshal lo/

bdag gis ye shes mig ni myur du thob par shog /spyan ras gzigs dbang thugs rje che la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdag gis sems can thams cad myur du sgrol bar shog /spyan ras gzigs dbang thugs rje che la lo/ /
phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdag gis thabs mkhas pa dag myur du thob par shog /spyan ras gzigs dbang thugs rje che la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdag ni myur du shes rab gru yis sgrol bar shog /spyan ras

gzigs dbang thugs rje che la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdag na ni myur du sdug bsngal mtsho las 'da' bar shog /spyan ras gzigs dbang thugs rje che la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdag gis myur du tshul khrims rkang gi lam thob shog /

spyan ras gzigs dbang thugs rje che la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdag gis myur du mya ngan 'da' ba'i ri mdzeg shog /spyan ras gzigs dbang thugs rje che la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdag gis myur du 'dus ma byas kyi khyim
phyin shog /spyan ras gzigs dbang thugs rje che la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdag ni myur du chos nyid sku dang mtshungs par shog /bdag ni ral gri ri la 'dzeg /ral gri ri ni rang brnyil shog /
bdag ni chu tshan phrad gyur na/ /chu tshan me mur rang zhi shog /sems can dmyal bar bdag song na/ /sems can dmyal ba rang skams shog /bdag ni yi dgas gnas song na/ /bkres skoms dag ni 'grangs bar

shog /bdag ni lha min gnas song na/ /ngan sems rang ni dul bar shog /bdag ni dud 'gro'i gnas phyin na/ /rang nyid shes rab che thob shog /de skad du smon lam btab nas sems rtse gcig tu bdag gi ming nas

'don cing rjes su dran par bgyi'o/ /gzhan yang bdag gi ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med rjes su dran par bgyis nas/ de'i rjes la gzungs sngags 'di mtshan gcig la lan bdun tshang bar 'don par bgyid na/

bskal pa 'bum phrag brgyad stong snyed du 'khor bar 'gyur ba'i kha na ma tho ba'i lci ba rnams yongs su bsal cing 'byang bar 'gyur lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das la yang 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das lha

'am mi gang la la zhig thugs rje chen po'i tshig 'don cing 'dzin par bgyid na 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe/ phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams der gshegs nas phyag rkyong bar 'gyur bas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang du

skye bar 'tshal ba ji ltar smon pa bzhin du de dag tu skye bar 'gyur lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das la yang 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das sems can gang la la zhig thugs rje chen po'i rigs sngags 'di 'don cing yongs su 'dzin

pa dag gal te ngan 'gro gsum po dag tu ltung bar gyur na/ bdag nam yang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi bgyi'o/ /thugs rje chen po'i rigs sngags 'don cing yongs su 'dzin pa dag gal te sangs rgyas kyi zhing khams

rnams su skye bar ma gyur na bdag nam yang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi bgyi'o/ /thugs rje chen po'i rig sngags 'don cing yongs su 'dzin pa dag gal te ting nge 'dzin dang spobs pa tshad ma mchis pa snyed thob par ma gyur

na bdag nam yang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi bgyi'o/ /thugs rje chen po'i rig sngags 'don cing yongs su 'dzin pa dag gal te tshe 'di nyid la smon pa thams cad ji ltar smon pa bzhin du grub par ma gyur na snying rje chen po'i

sems kyi gzungs shes mi bgyi lags te/ mi dge ba' rnams dang / sems rtse gcig tu ma bgyis pa ni ma gtogs lags so/ /bud med gang la la zhig bud med kyis lus kyi yongs su skyo nas skyes pa'i lus thob par 'tshal

ba gang lags pa des thugs rje chen po'i sems kyi gzungs kyi tshig 'di 'don cing yongs su gzung bas gal te bud med kyi dngos po las yongs su gyur te/ skyes pa'i lus thob par ma gyur na bdag nam yang mngon par rdzogs par

'tshang rgya bar mi bgyi'o/ /the tshom gyi bsam pa cung zad cig bskyed par gyur na gdon mi 'tshal bar gang smon pa'i 'bras bu de mngon par 'grub par mi 'gyur lags so/ /sems can gang la la zhig dge 'dun gyi zhal zas
