rgya ba'i bar du nams kyang ldog par mi 'gyur bar bgyid pas so/ /dkyil 'khor de yang gtsug lag khang gi nang ngam/ ri 'am/ chab mig 'bab pa 'am/ nags tshal gyi drung du yang rung ste/ nye 'khor kun tu khru gang

yan chad na shing gi rtsa ba dang / dogs ngan pa dang / gyo mo dang / gor ma dang / rus pa la sogs pa ci mchis pa brkos te bsal nas/ dog sa bzang po las rmang khru gang tsam du blangs te brdungs nas mnyam por bgyis la ba lang

gi lci ba dang / spos chab dog sa ser po dang bsres nas 'jim pa bgyis te legs par byug cing zhal zhal bgyis nas gling lngar bgo bar bgyi'o/ /de la dbus kyi gling ni zheng du khru gsum tsam du bgyis te/ dbus kho nar khru

do gru bzhi lham par mchis pa'i rin po che'i 'khor lo rtsibs brgya rtsa brgyad dang ldan pa cig bri bar bya'o/ /gzhan yang 'khor lo'i dbus su rin po che'i pad ma kha bye ba 'dab ma sum bcu rtsa gnyis mchis pa khru gang pa cig

bri bar bgyi'o/ /gzhan yang 'khor lo'i tha ma 'khor bar 'od 'bar ba bri bar bya'o/ /de'i rjes la gling gi grwa bzhir pad ma kha bye ba re re bri bar bgyi'o/ /gzhan yang pad ma re re'i steng du yid bzhin gyi nor bu re re

bris nas nor bu bzhi po'i steng du 'od 'bar ba bri bar bgyi'o/ /gzhan yang 'dab ma sum bcu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa'i pad ma de'i steng du byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs tsan dan dkar po

las bgyis pa cig gzhag par bgyi'o/ /de nas gling gnyis pa ni zheng du khru gang par bgyis nas sngar grwa bzhir pad ma kha bye ba re re bri bar bgyi'o/ /gzhan yang pad ma de dag re re'i steng du ri rab lhun po'i stan rim pa gsum mchis

pa gsum gsum bris nas byang shar mtshams kyi stan la ni dbang phyug chen po'i lha bri'o/ /shar lho'i mtshams kyi stan la ni lha mthu chen po bri'o/ /lho nub mtshams kyi stan la ni tshangs pa chen po bri'o/ /nub byang mtshams kyi stan la

ni brgya byin bri bar bya'o/ /gzhan yang ngos bzhir ni rin po che'i me tog dang / phreng ba bcu drug bri bar bgyi'o/ /de nas gling gsum pa ni zheng du khru do par bgyis te/ sa gzhi sngon po la gser gyi thig bkye ba 'ba' zhig bri bar bgyi'o/ /

de nas gling bzhi pa ni zheng du khru gang bar bgyis te/ ngos bzhi spyi la bar chad nyi shu rtsa brgyad du byas bar chad dum bu re re'i nang du yang pad ma kha bye ba re re bri bar bgyi'o/ /gzhan yang go rims bzhin du pad ma de dag re re'i steng du yang rdo rje tho ba

dang / rtse gsum pa'i phyag rgya dang / dgra sta'i phyag rgya dang / gri'i phyag rgya dang / ral gri'i phyag rgya dang / dung gi phyag rgya dang / chu gri'i phyag rgya dang / zhags pa'i phyag rgya dang / dbyig pa thogs pa'i phyag rgya dang /

gdugs kyi phyag rgya dang / yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i phyag rgya dang / gshin rje'i dbyig pa'i phyag rgya dang / bi na ya ka'i phyag rgya dang / mtshon cha'i phyag rgya dang / 'khor lo'i phyag rgya dang / sug pa lag pa

sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i phyag rgya rnams so sor bris nas phyag rgya de dag kun la yang 'od 'bar ba dag bri bar bgyi'o/ /gzhan yang lho phyogs kyi chab sgor bar chad bgyis pa'i nang du ni 'thab bral gyi lha bri ba'o/ /

nub phyogs kyi chab sgor bar chad bgyis pa'i nang du ni chu lha bri'o/ /byang phyogs kyi chab sgor bar chad bgyis pa'i nang du ni ku be ra bri'o/ /shar phyogs kyi chab sgor bar chad bgyis pa'i nang du ni lha gzhon nu bri bar bgyi'o/ /

de nas gru bzhi'i gnas so sor ni rgyal po chen po bzhi khro gnyer can g.yog 'khor dang bcas pa bri bar bgyi'o/ /de nas gling lnga pa ni khru gang bar bgyis te/ ngos bzhi kun tu 'bras bu'i ljon shing dang / me tog gi ljon shing

dang / rin po che'i ljon shing rnam pa sna tshogs bri bar bgyi'o/ /gzhan yang grwa bzhi kun tu rin po che'i ri rab lhun po re re bri bar bgyi'o/ /chab sgo bzhir ni rgya mtsho chen po'i chab bri bar bgyi'o/ /dkyil 'khor gyi slad nang gi gling

rnams kyi sa gzhi ni kha dog sngon por bgyi'o/ /gzhan yang slad nang gi gling rnams kyi nub phyogs kyi chab sgo'i lho'i ngogs zur la sngags mkhan 'byung zhing 'jug pa'i chab sgor gcig dbye bar bgyi'o/ /gzhan yang spyan ras gzigs

dbang phyug mig stong lag stong dang ldan pa'i gzugs bgyis pa'i gcig dbus su kha shar phyogs su blta bar bgyi'o/ /gzhan yang mig stong lag stong dang ldan pa'i mdo sde glegs bam cig pad ma 'dab ma sum bcu rtsa gnyis

mchis pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du gzhag nas gzugs bgyis pa de'i mdun du gzhan yang tsan dan dkar po'i dri chab zhal bu bcu drug dang / zhal zas rnam pa sna tshogs dang / zas dkar gsum dang / shing tog

la sogs pas bkang ba'i gzhong bu nyi shu rtsa lnga dang / spos chab bre gang dang / bum pa dar tshon sna tshogs dang / me tog dang / ljon shing gi yal ga la sogs pas kha brgyan pa nyi shu rtsa lnga dang / me tog dang phreng ba

sna sna nas nyi shu nyi shu dang / mar me nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang / byug spos dang / spos kyi phye ma dang / de la sogs pa'i spos deb tshe nyi shu dang / byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs bris pa'i 'phan dang / dar tshon sna tshogs

las bgyis pa'i phan spyir phreng nyi shu rtsa lnga bsham par bgyi'o/ /'di ltar mchod pa bgyid pa'i zhal sder dang / snod spyad dang / bum pa la sogs pa de dag thams cad kyang gser dang / dngul dang / khar ba la sogs

pa las bgyis pa las sbyar bar bgyi'o/ /gal te yang dag par ma mchis na brnyan ma yang rung lags so/ /'di ltar yo byad de dag thams cad kyang slad nang gi gling rnams ngos bzhir chos bzhin du bri zhing dgram par bgyi'o/ /gdan dang me tog sna

tshogs gzugs shing gtor bar bgyi'o/ /'bras sA lu'i me tog dang / yungs kar dang / me tog rnam pa sna tshogs dkyil 'khor gyi steng du gtor bar bgyi'o/ /zhal zas de dag kyang gdugs gcig bzhin du gsar du bgyis

pa bzang po las mchod par bgyi'o/ /sngags mkhan de yang 'byung 'jug gi tshe khrus yongs su dag par bgyis nas byug spos kyis byug ste/ gos sar pa gtsang ma bgo bar bgyi'o/ /zas dkar gsum 'tshal nas tsan dan
dang / a ga ru dang / du ru ska dang / ga bur la sogs pa bsres te/ gdugs gcig la dus gsum du byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mig stong lag stong dang ldan pa'i gzugs bgyis pa
la mchod par bgyi'o/ /nang gi gling gsum pa'i nang du mig stong pa'i gzugs gzhag pa'i mdun du rang byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa gsum po dag yang dag par blang bar dam bca' bar bgyi'o/ /gdugs

mtshan du slad rol gyi gling gi nub phyogs kyi chab sgor skyil mo dkrung bcas te mchis nas gdugs gcig la yum gyi gzungs lan stong rtsa brgyad bar chad ma mchis par bzlas brjod bgyis nas gdugs nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar
du bsam pa gtugs te mchod par bgyi'o/ /gzhan yang dus drug du dkyil 'khor kyi nub ngos kyi zur gyi chab sgo nas dkyil 'khor gyi nang du zhugs nas/ gling gsum pa'i nub phyogs kyi chab sgor 'greng ste/

sngar bstan pa'i phyag rgya dang po dang / gnyis pa dang / gsum pa nas bcu gnyis pa sangs rgyas spyan 'dren pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi bar gyi phyag rgya kun bgyis nas sngags lan bdun bdun bzla bar bgyi'o/ /phyag rgya bcu gnyis

pa'i bar du bgyis lags nas kyang bdag nyid byang chub chen po'i smon lam shin tu bstan pa las phyir mi ldog par bgyi'o zhes smon lam btab nas g.yar 'dren par bgyid na/ thams cad nye bar mchi bar 'gyur bas lus drang

por bsrang ste mchis nas nges pa'i sems kyis lha 'dre thams cad sgrib cing chod pa ma mchis par mig sngar mchis so snyam du 'du shes nye bar gzhag ste/ tha dad pa'i yul la mi dmigs par lus po che'i sngags snga ma lan nyi shu rtsa

gcig 'don par bgyid na/ de'i mtshan mo gzugs bgyis pa de las 'od zer chen po byung nas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug nyid gdon mi 'tshal bar mngon sum du lus ston par 'gyur te/ lus bstan

nas mchi ba'i tshe kun dga' ba'i lus kyi byad gzugs su mngon par sprul nas/ dga' zhing 'dzum pa'i bzhin gyis rnal 'byor pa de la ci zhig dgos gang zhig smon ces 'dri bar 'gyur bas/ de'i tshe sngags mkhan gyis 'di skad

du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang / gzungs dang ting nge 'dzin gyi chos yongs su gnyer ba dang / gzhan yang dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya dang / sngags kyi cho ga thams cad mngon par 'grub pa dang /

'dre gdon thams cad gdul zhing ngag nyan par 'gyur bar 'tshal lo zhes lan gdab par bgyi'o/ /de ltar smod pa rnams grub nas kyang bdag nyid rig par bgyi'i/ gzhan dag la brjod par mi bgyi'o/ /dkyil 'khor gyi

cho ga 'di ni bas ras sam/ btso ras la ri mos bris te bgyis na yang rung lags so/ /smon pa thams cad 'grub par 'tshal na chab kyi dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa bgyis la a ga ru bsreg ste/ lus po che'i sngags snga

ma lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas nas bcu pa smon pa rnams yid bzhin du 'grub pa'i phyag rgya snga ma bgyis na/ smon pa thams cad bsam pa bzhin du 'grub cing yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur lags so/ /gal te skye bo mang po thams

cad dga' bar 'gyur bar 'tshal na rab tu dga' ba'i yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i phyag rgya snga ma bgyis nas lus po che'i sngags kyis til 'bru la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig gdab par bgyi'o/ /yang na sngags lan re bzlas nas/ lan re

zhugs kyi nang du dor ba lan stong rtsa brgyad tshang bar bgyis na thams cad yid bzhin du dga' bar 'gyur lags so/ /gnod sbyin rnams dga' bar 'tshal na gnod sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba'i ljon shing gi yal ga blangs te/ lan nyi

shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab nas kun dga' ra bar bor na dga' bar 'gyur lags so/ /mi ma rungs pa dgrar gyur pa gdul bar 'tshal na shing khong len 'bog la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab nas sngags

lan re bzla zhing lan re zhugs su dor ba lan brgya rtsa brgyad tshang bar bgyis na skyabs su mchi zhing thul bar 'gyur lags so/ /'dre gdon gdul dka' ba zhig mchis na gu gul dang / yungs kar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig

sngags kyis btab ste/ sngags lan re bzla zhing lan re zhugs su dor ba lan brgya rtsa brgyad tshang bar bgyis na 'dre gdon thams cad rang dul bar 'gyur lags so/ /yul phyogs su rims nad byung bar gyur na

chab kyi dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa bgyis nas/ ba mar bzang po la lan brgya rtsa brgyad sngags kyis btab ste/ sngags lan re bzla zhing lan re zhugs su dor ba lan stong rtsa brgyad tshang bar bgyis na rims nad thams cad
zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /yang na chab nyung zad cig blangs te rims kyis thebs pa 'tshal du stsal na 'phral du 'tsho bar 'gyur lags so/ /sngon yul ge byin zhes bgyi bar rims nad byung nas/ gang rims kyis
btab pa de dag gdugs zhag gcig gam gnyis las mi 'da' bar 'chi ba'i dus bgyid par gyur to/ /de'i tshe bram ze tsen ti zhes bgyi ba zhig snying rje chen po skyes nas/ cho ga'i sgo 'di bshams nas yul

khams gcig gi rims kyis thebs pa thams cad gsos pas thams cad zhi bar gyur te/ rims gtong ba'i 'dre gdon gyi rgyal po yang de'i tshe yul nas byung bar gyur pa'i slad du sman yon che bar rig par bgyi lags so/ /

gal te pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyis gtses par gyur tam/ chom rkun dang / 'khrug pa byung bar gyur na lus kun bsdud pa'i phyag rgya dang po bgyis te/ rig sngags lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis na dgra

dang chom rkun de dag thams cad rang gi ngang gis rab tu zhi bar 'gyur lags so/ /rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig las kyi rnam par smin pa'i dbang gis tshe rabs su nye ba'i tshe 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i

phyag rgya snga ma bgyis te/ gdugs re bzhin du mchod pa bgyis nas a ga ru bsregs te/ rig sngags lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas nas sngags lan re bzlas nas de'i ming nas lan re 'don par bgyid na las kyi sgrib pa de
dag yongs su bsgyur lags so/ /sngon yul bA ra Na sir khyim bdag gcig gnas pa las bu gcig las ma mchis pa de lo bcu drug las mi thub par gyur nas/ lo bcwa lnga lon pa dang / khyim bdag khyo shug

mya ngan gyis rod nyams par gyur to/ /de'i tshe bram ze zhig sgo kun tu rgyu zhing zas slong ba las khyim bdag de mthong nas ci'i phyir mi bde bar gyur ces smras pa dang / khyim bdag gis lo rgyus de dag rgyas par bshad do/ /

de nas bram zes khyim bdag de la mya ngan ma byed par bdag gis bsgo ba bzhin du byos shig dang / khyod kyi bu tshe ring bar 'gyur ro zhes smras nas/ de'i tshe bram ze des cho ga'i sgo 'di nyid zhag bdun tshang bar bgyis pa

dang / gshin rjes khyim bdag de la khyod kyi bu'i tshe'i tshad lo bcu drug las mi thub pas/ lo bcwa lnga lon te lo gcig las ma lus pa las/ deng dge ba'i rkyen dang phrad pas lo brgya thub par 'gyur ba'i phyir 'dir

'ongs nas bsgo ba yin no zhes smras pa dang / de'i tshe khyim bdag khyo shugs rab tu dga' zhing mgu bar gyur pas/ khyim gyi nor ci mchis pa bteg ste/ sangs rgyas dang chos dang / dge 'dun la phul bas cho ga 'di ni bsam
gyis mi khyab pa'i mthu chen po dang ldan par rig par bgyi lags so/ /sngar 'dus pa chen po'i dkyil 'khor dang / rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor chen por lan gsum zhugs pa zhig lags te dkyil 'khor mi 'tshal te/

phyag rgya bgyis nas rig sngags bzlas brjod bgyis pa tsam gyis smon pa rnams mi 'grub pa gang yang ma mchis la myur du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par yang 'gyur lags so/ /bud med gang la la zhig bu

btsa' ba'i tshe/ sdug bsngal chen po myong bar gyur na/ chab mar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab ste 'tshal du stsal na nges par bde bar 'gyur zhing / khye'u dang bu mo btsas pa gang lags pa de dag kyang

mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po dang ldan par 'gyur/ dge ba sna tshogs kyis brgyan nas sngon bsod nams bsags pa'i mthus skye bo mang po kun gyi snying du sdug par 'gyur/ rtag par mi'i nang du longs spyod khyad
par du 'phags pa dag la longs spyod par 'gyur lags so/ /sems can gang la la zhig mig nad kyis thebs te sdug bsngal zhing mi bde bar gyur na/ sngags mkhan gyis byang chub sems dpa'

mig stong dang ldan pa'i phyag rgya bgyis nas sngags lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te mig la phyag rgyas btab par gyur na mig kyang 'tsho bar 'gyur la/ rgyu dang rkyen des gang zag de lha'i mig thob par 'gyur bas lha
rnams gsal bar mthong zhing longs spyod mchog la longs spyod par 'gyur lags so/ /byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mig stong lag stong dang ldan pa'i gzugs 'bri ba'i cho ga ni ras dkar

po khru bcu drug pa 'am/ khru nyi shu pa yang rung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' de'i lus ni 'dzam bu'i gser gyi kha dog can du bgyis te/ gdong la mig gsum mchis pa sug pa lag pa stong dang ldan pa zhing sug pa

lag pa stong po de dag re re'i mthil du yang mig re re bri'o/ /sug pa lag pa chen po yang dag pa nyid ni bcwa brgyad mchis te/ sngar sug pa gnyis kyis ni snying gar thal mo sbyar bar bgyid do/ /sug pa gcig gis
ni rdo rje'i tho ba thogs so/ /yang gcig gis ni rtse gsum pa thogs so/ /yang gcig gis ni glegs bam thogs so/ /yang gcig gis ni rin po che'i phyag rgya thogs so/ /yang gcig gis ni mkhar sil
thogs so/ /yang gcig gis ni rin po che'i nor bu thogs so/ /yang gcig gis ni rin po che'i 'khor lo thogs so/ /yang gcig gis ni pad ma kha bye ba thogs so/ /yang gcig gis ni zhags pa thogs
so/ /yang gcig gis ni lcang ma'i lcug ma thogs so/ /yang gcig gis ni 'od zer kha dog lnga 'byin par bgyid do/ /yang gcig gis ni bgrang phreng thogs so/ /yang gcig gis ni ril ba thogs so/ /yang gcig

gis ni zil dngar yongs su gtong ba'i lag tu ston to/ /yang gcig gis ni rin po che'i char sna tshogs 'bebs shing mi 'jigs pa'i lag tu ston to/ /yang gnyis ni lte ba'i thad kar g.yon pa g.yas pas mnan nas mthil bkan

te mchis so/ /sug pa lag pa gzhan dgu brgya dgu bcu rtsa gnyis po de dag thams cad ni sprul pa'i sug pa lags te/ sug pa de dag kun kyang so so nas mtshon cha dang / phyag rgya rnam pa sna tshogs thogs pas/

kha cig ni sug pa lag pa'i phyag rgya brkyang ba nyi tshe ba yang mchis te/ so so nas mi mthun pas snying po'i mdo las/ ji skad du byang chub sems dpa' de ni lha'i rin po che sna bdun gyi mgo rgyan thogs so/ /lag ngar la

ni gdub 'khor rnam pa sna tshogs kyis brgyan to/ /lus la ni phreng ba thogs shing lha'i rin po che'i gos gya nom pa dag bgos pa yin no zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o/ /tshon rtsi de dag gi nang du ko ba'i sbyin stsal bar mi bgyi'o/ /kun tu ra'i

khu ba dang sbyar bar bgyi'o/ /gang dag yum gyi gzungs kyi cho ga bgyid par 'tshal na sngar de'i gzugs ri mor bri'o/ /gzugs ri mor bri bar yang nges par chos bzhin du bgyi 'tshal bas ri mo 'bri ba'i gnas khang nye 'khor

kun tu tsan dan dkar po'i chab kyis dog sa la byugs te/ dkyil 'khor bgyi'o/ /gzhan yang ri mo mkhan 'byung 'jug gi tshe/ khrus bgyis nas gos sar pa gtsang ma bgos te/ nyin re bzhin sdom pa brgyad yang dag

par blang bar bgyi'o/ /chos bzhin du gzugs bris lags nas kyang / ri mo mkhan chos bzhin du ma bgyis par dogs par gyur na/ dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa cig yid la ji ltar mos pa bzhin du bgyis te/ ba dan dang /

me tog dang / zhal zas dang / zas dkar gsum dang / me tog dang / spos chab dang / me tog sna tshogs kyis kun tu khyab par bkram nas mchod pa rgya cher bgyis te/ rnal 'byor pa dang / ri mo mkhan gang lags pa des

gdugs gcig la dus gsum du gzugs bris pa'i mdun du nongs pa rnams 'thol bshags na/ zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig tshang ba'i mtshan mo mig stong lag stong dang ldan pa'i gzugs bris pa las 'od zer chen po byung nas/

nyi zla zil gyis mnan te 'od kyis phyogs bcu'i stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' dang / tshad ma mchis pa thams cad thogs pa ma mchis par gsal bar bgyid pas/ rnal 'byor pa dang / ri mo mkhan

gang lags pa de dag dang sems can gang dag 'od kyis reg pa de dag thams cad shin tu lci ba'i kha na ma tho ba ci mchis pa dus gcig tu zhu byang nas yongs su dag par 'gyur lags so/ /cho ga 'di sgrub pa gang lags pa des

sems rtse gcig tu ma bgyis pa ni ma gtogs lags so/ /byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yang 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bdag gis sngon 'das pa'i dus kyi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs kyis

kyang phyag stong dang spyan stong po 'di dag bstan nas/ bdud chen po rnams 'dul ba mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das deng bdag gis kyang lag stong dang mig stong po 'di dag bstan nas bdud chen po rnams btul ba lags te/ sug pa

lag pa stong po de dag kyang so so nas 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po re re mngon par sprul nas bskal pa bzang po rabs stong gi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po bgyid par gyur la/ mig stong po de dag kyang so so nas sangs rgyas re re mngon par

sprul nas bskal pa bzang po'i sangs rgyas stong dang mtshungs par 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' de'i lus bdud 'dul ba'i nang nas mchog tu gyur pa lags so/ /de nas bcom

ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal ba legs so legs so/ /ngas kyang byin gyi rlabs kyi mthus bskal pa mthar thug pa'i bar du khyod kyi yum gyi gzungs 'di byin gyis brlab par

bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thogs pa mi mnga' ba'i thugs rje chen po rgya cher yongs su rdzogs pa'i gzungs// //bam po gsum pa/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang

phyug bcom ldan 'das kyis bsngags pa brjod pa thos nas rab tu dga' zhing mgu bar gyur pas thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal du bltas nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang mig stong lag

stong dang ldan pa'i gzugs kyi phyag rgya mngon par sgrub par bgyid pa mchis lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ngas kyang rjes su yi rang gis khyod kyis shod cig /de nas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs

dbang phyug gis smras pa dang / nam byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis rig sngags 'di smras pa na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi bar gyi lha'i gnas thams

cad kyang rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos par gyur to/ /'og min gyi lha dang / dbang phyug chen po yang mi bde bar shin tu skrag par gyur to/ /'dre gdon ma rungs pa thams cad kyang sdug bsngal chen po myong bar gyur pas/ ku co 'don cing shar

nub tu byer nas 'gro ba'i gnas kyang mi rnyed par gyur to/ /de nas sprul pa'i lus kyis 'khor mang po rnams dang 'dre gdon ma rungs pa rnams la khyed gal te bdag gi rig sngags kyi rjes su mi 'brang zhing 'gal bar byas par gyur na mgo tshal bar

'gyur ro zhes bsgo'o/ /bcom ldan 'das rig sngags 'dis ni ri rnams 'joms par bgyid cing rgya mtsho chen po skams par bgyid do/ /rig sngags 'dis ni lha ma yin gyi dpung rnams bcom nas yul rnams bsrung bar bgyid do/ /

rig sngags 'dis ni 'dre gdon ma rungs pa thams cad dang / nad thams cad dang / mi ma rungs pa thams cad tshar gcod par bgyid do/ /rig sngags 'dis ni sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams 'joms shing dul bar bgyid lags so/ /

rigs kyi bu gang la la zhig rig sngags 'di 'don cing yongs su 'dzin par bgyid na/ gang zag de'i mthu stobs brjod kyis mi lang ngo / /rig sngags 'di 'don pa dang / yongs su 'dzin pa de dag btsun zhing dbang phyug dang ldan

pa dang / nam 'tsho'i bar du rgyal pos byams shing yid du mchi ba dang / smon pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par bgyid do/ /gang la la zhig phyir rgol ba'i bdud gdul bar 'tshal na spos gu gul bsregs te/ bdag gi

lus po che'i sngags lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyi'o/ /skye bo mang po thams cad kyis bdag la byams par 'tshal na lcug ma la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab ste/ g.yar khams bcas na byams shing

bkur bar bgyi'o/ /bdag nyid spobs pa dang / shes rab dang ldan par 'tshal na/ shu dag la lan stong rtsa brgyad sngags kyis btab ste/ snying gar bskus na thogs pa ma mchis pa'i spobs pa thob par 'gyur te/ yum gyi gzungs

kyi snying po'i phyag rgya bgyi'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi thogs pa ma mchis pa'i spobs pa'i phyag rgya ni 'di lags te/ lag pa gnyis rgyab sprad de sbyar nas mthe bong gnyis mdun du brkyang

bar bgyi'o/ /phyag rgya 'dis ni bdag kyang bsrung zhing gzhan yang bsrung bar bgyid do/ /phyogs gang dang gang du mchi yang rung ste/ mtshams dgum par 'tshal bas/ chab gtsang ma 'am thal ba gtsang ma la
lan bdun sngags kyis btab ste/ gang du mchis pa'i gnas der chab bam/ thal pa snyims pa gang sngar rang gi lus la gtor nas de'i rjes la phyogs bzhir chos bzhin du gtor na/ de nyid mtshams
su 'grub par 'gyur lags so/ /rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig 'dre srin ma rungs pa dang / log pa'i gdon mang po rnams kyis gtses par gyur na bal po se'u'i yal ga dang /
grib logs kyi lcang ma'i yal ga blangs te/ rig sngags 'di bzlas brjod bgyis nas nad pa la gzhus na nad gang yang rung ste/ mi 'tsho ba ma mchis lags so/ /rig sngags ni 'di lta ste/ na ma/

sarba bud+d+ha/ d+harma sa~M g+hA ya/ na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ na mo badzra pA Na ye/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ tad+ya thA/ si bi si bi/ ka ya si bi/ pa la sha pa la ni swA hA/ rig sngags

kyi phyag rgya 'dis ni log par lta ba'i mu stegs can rnams 'dul bar bgyid do/ /rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig rtag par gdugs dang po 'char ba'i tshe dang gdugs kyi gung dang gdugs bas pa'i tshe lan nyi shu

rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis na/ rnam pa sna tshogs kyis sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bcu la mchod pa bgyis pa dang / bye brag tu gyur pa ma mchis pas nam du yang bud med kyi dngos po len par mi 'gyur/ tshe 'das nas kyang

ngan song gsum po dag dang gtan tu 'bral zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyi zhing yongs su dag par skye bar 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa de'i phyag gis spyi bo la byugs te/ khyod nga'i zhing du skye bar

'gyur bas ma 'jigs shig ces bka' stsal par 'gyur/ tshe 'di nyid la yang blo bur du 'chi bar mi 'gyur zhing / 'dre gdon dag gis kyang glags rnyed par mi 'gyur lags so/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras

gzigs dbang phyug gis stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi kha na ma tho ba yongs su sbyong ba'i phyag rgya ni 'di lags te/ 'greng nas 'di ltar sug pa lag pa g.yon pa mdun du brkyang ste/ sor mo lnga so sor phye

nas mdun du phul te sor mo lnga char bsgreng ngo / /de'i rjes la sug pa lag pa g.yas pa'i mthe bo lag mthil du bkug ste/ sor mo gzhan bzhi ni khu tshur du bcangs nas rna ba g.yas pa'i thad kar gzhag ste/

lus po che'i sngags bzlas nas mdzub mo ni phan tshun rgyu bar bgyi'o/ /phyag rgya ni gdugs gcig la dus gsum du bgyi bar 'tshal bas dus gcig gi tshe yang lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis na mtshams ma mchis pa lnga dang

shin tu lci ba bzhi'i kha na ma tho ba rnams kyang 'byang bar 'gyur lags so/ /sems can thams cad la byams pa dang / snying rje bskyed par 'gyur na kha na ma tho ba thams cad kyi rtsa ba bsregs nas/ tshe 'das pa'i rjes la

yang sangs rgyas rnams dang 'jal bar 'gyur zhing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu yang 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po bgyid par 'gyur/ gzhan yang bas pa ma mchis pa'i gter zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs dang /

ye shes mnyam pa zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs thob par 'gyur/ gzhan yang mtshan nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang ldan par 'gyur/ gzhan yang tshe 'di nyid la mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce la sogs pa bro 'tshal bar

mi 'gyur zhing lus kyi nad thams cad kyang yongs su 'byang bar 'gyur/ sngon gyi las dang kha na ma tho ba rnams kyang zhu byang bar 'gyur lags so/ /gal te than pa byung bar gyur na til 'bru yog po'i 'bras bu'i mar dang sbyar te/ ril bu

bgyis nas lan brgya rtsa brgyad bsngags kyis btab ste/ chab rdzing du bor nas dgung chab 'bab par 'gyur lags so/ /gal te char ches na 'bras sA lu brngos pa'i me tog yungs 'bru'i mar dang sbyar te/ ri lu bgyis nas

lan brgya rtsa brgyad sngags kyis btab ste chab rdzing du bor na dgung char 'chad par 'gyur lags so/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bdud rnams
btul ba'i phyag rgya ni 'di lags te/ sor mo snol mar btang ste/ g.yon pas g.yas pa mnan te/ khu tshur dam du bcangs te spyi bor gzhag nas lus po che'i sngags bzlas brjod bgyis na 'khon pa'i

dgra thams cad rang dul bar 'gyur lags so/ /cho ga 'di bgyid pa gang lags pa des ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten gyi mdun du tshes nyi shu dgu'i mtshan mo tsan dan dkar po'i phye ma'i dkyil 'khor bgyis te/
me tog sna tshogs bkram nas yongs su dag par khrus bgyis te/ gos sar pa gtsang ma bgos nas pog phor thogs te/ a ga ru bsregs la kha shar phyogs su bltas te/ skyil mo dkrung bcas

nas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug lag stong mig stong dang ldan pa spyi bo la mchis par 'du shes nye bar gzhag ste/ lus po che'i sngags lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis na 'di

dngos grub thob par 'gyur ba'i phan yon dang po mchog lags so/ /gzhan yang yungs kar til gyi 'bras bu dang gcig tu bsres te brdungs nas phye mar bgyis te/ pho gsum gyis cung zad cig blangs nas lan cig
sngags kyis btab ste zhugs su dor ba dgung bdun tshang bar bgyis la/ gdugs re la yang lan brgya rtsa brgyad tshang bar bgyis na slad kyis ci bgyi'o/ /'tshal mngon par 'grub par 'gyur lags so/ /de la
byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi 'jigs pa ma mchis pa chen po'i phyag rgya ni 'di lags te/ 'greng nas sug pa rkang pa gnyis gzhibs te/ sngar sug pa lag pa g.yas pa bkan te lag

ngar g.yon pa bteg nas pus mo'i steng du gzhag par bgyis te/ sug pa lag pa g.yon pa yang de bzhin du bgyis nas/ rtag par ring bsrel gyi mdun du lus po che'i sngags lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis na/

myur du sems can la mi 'jigs pa stsal ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo thob par 'gyur lags so/ /gzhan yang shing kun dang / yungs kar dang / shu thag dang / ta ta pa'i ri lu blangs te dngos po 'di dag zhugs kyi nang du bor te bsreg par

bgyi'o/ /'di dag bsreg pa yang sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar 'am/ dkyil 'khor 'am/ gnas gtsang ma dag tu bsregs nas lus po che'i sngags bzlas te/ sngags lan re bzla zhing lan re bsreg pa brgya rtsa brgyad

tshang bar bgyis nas spos dang me tog dag gis rig sngags la mchod par bgyis na/ ci dang ci smon pa rnams yid bzhin du mngon par 'grub par 'gyur lags so/ /gal te rig sngags gzhan gyis mi thub pa dag sngags 'dis

btab nas thams cad thub cing 'grub par 'gyur lags so/ /gal te rmi ltas mthong bar 'tshal na sngags 'di bzlas nas phyag rgya bgyis te mig la btab na ci dang ci mthong bar 'tshal ba de dag thams cad rmi lam du mthong bar 'tshal lags so/ /

bsod nams ma mchis pa gang dag ci bgyi'o 'tshal yid bzhin du grub par mi 'gyur na/ gdugs re bzhin rig sngags 'di lan brgya rtsa brgyad 'don pa dgung bdun du tshang bar gyur na ci dang ci smon pa thams cad 'thob par 'gyur lags so/ /

bcom ldan 'das bdag sngon klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho'i gnas su rgya mtsho'i chos kyi mdun sar chos ston pa na/ klu mang po rnams sdug bsngal chen po rnams myong bar mthong ba dang / klu mang po rnams la snying brtse nas de dag sdug bsngal las

yang dag par bzla ba dang / sems can mang po rnams sdug bsngal dang bral zhing 'khon pa'i dgra ma mchis par bgyi ba'i slad du chos bstan pa las de'i tshe klu'i bu mos chos 'di gnyer ba'i slad du nor bu rin po che mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams ri ba

gcig phul ba dang / bdag gis ni de la yum gyi gzungs 'di rgya cher bstan pas sdug bsngal gyi bgegs rnams dang bral bar 'gyur lags so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chu shel gyis rig sngags 'di yongs su 'dzin

pa dag la phan gdags shing bgegs yongs su bsrung ba'-i phyir sngags 'di smras so/ /bi ma le ma hA bi ma le u ha le/ ma hA u ha le/ hu ma le/ ma hA hu ma le/ sa hA le/ ma hA sa hA le/ tsi li te swA hA/

rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig phyogs gang du gnas kyang rung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' mig stong dang lag pa stong dang ldan pa'i chos kyi cho ga 'di yongs su 'dzin par bgyid na/ bdag kyang rtag par de dag gi

rjes su 'brang ste/ yongs su bsrung bar bgyid pas bdud kyi 'khor rnams kyi bar dag gis gtse bar mi 'gyur lags so/ /gang la la zhig brel zhing phongs par gyur tam/ pha rol gyi dgras gtses sam/ chom rkun

dag gis gnod pa bgyid par gyur na/ tshon sna lnga'i skud pa la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab ste/ sngags lan re bzla zhing mdud pa re re mdud nas/ dpung pa g.yon pa la mdud par bgyi'o/ /gzhan yang

sug pa g.yon pa'i srin lag dang / gung mo dang / mdzub mo rnams khu tshur bcangs te/ mthe bos steng du mnan nas mthe chung chom rkun gyi phyogs su kha bstan te/ sngags 'di lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas na thams cad rang gyis nas gnod

pa bgyid par mi 'gyur lags so/ /sngon byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gangs ri la gnas te/ chos ston pa dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po'i yul na gnas pa'i skye bo rnams sems can gyi sha khrag 'ba' shig 'tshal zhing

dge ba'i sems ci yang ma mchis pa mthong ba dang / de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' de thabs la mkhas pas phan gdags shing sems can gdul ba'i ched du rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus de ma thag tu yul de dag tu mchis nas/ mig stong dang

lag stong dang ldan pas bdud gdul ba'i lus mngon par bstan te/ yum gyi gzungs mngon par 'grub pa'i phyag rgya bgyis pa dang / de'i tshe srin po'i yul gyi rgyal po bdag gi thad du mchis nas/ nongs pa 'thol bshags te/

phyag bgyis pa dang / bdag gis kyang mngon par 'grub pa'i phyag rgyas btab pas/ de la bla na ma mchis pa'i lam mngon par grub par gyur lags so/ /byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mngon par 'grub

pa'i phyag rgya ni 'di lags te/ 'greng nas sug pa rkang pa gnyis gshibs te/ snying gar thal mo sbyar te mthe'u chung gnyis bsnol mar btang zhing / g.yon pas g.yas mnan nas lus po che'i sngags lan nyi shu rtsa
gcig bzlas nas/ cho ga rnam pa sna tshogs gang bgyid kyang rung ste/ thams cad mngon par 'grub par 'gyur lags so/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis 'gro ba drug po dag sdug

bsngal gyi bgegs las yongs su skyobs pa'i 'khor lo'i phyag rgya ni 'di lags te/ 'gro ba drug gi sems can sdug bsngal las yongs su skyob par 'tshal na 'khor lo'i phyag rgya spyad par bgyi ste/ 'di ltar sor mo bcu'i rtse

mo phan tshun phrad par bgyi ste/ lag ngar gyi tshigs dang / lag mthil ni dbye bar bgyi'o/ /sor mo rnams kyi bar yang tshon gang tsam mchis par bgyis te/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' de 'gro ba drug po dag tu gnas nas sdug

bsngal gyi bgegs las yongs su bzlas pa zhes bgyi ste/ 'di ltar phyag rgya'i 'khor lo 'di'i dbang gis thams cad sdug bsngal dang bral bar gyur pas so/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' mig stong dang ldan pa'i mngon par rdzogs par byang chub

pa'i phyag rgya ni 'di lags te/ skyil mo dkrung bcas nas sngar sug pa g.yon pa brkyang ste/ sor mo lnga car bkan nas pus mo g.yon pa'i steng du gzhag go/ /de'i rjes la sug pa lag pa g.yas pa brkyang ste/ sor mo lnga car kha sbub nas/

spus mo g.yas pa'i steng du mnan par bgyi'o/ /'di ni 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i phyag rgya dang 'dra ste/ 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyang mtshungs par phyag rgya 'dis mngon par

rdzogs par byang chub par 'gyur ba lags pas/ phyag rgya 'dis ni las kyi sgrib pa thams cad sel bar bgyid do/ /rnal 'byor pa bsam gtan sgom pa gang dag t-ing nge 'dzin mngon sum du ma gyur na gdugs mtshan bdun gyi bar
du dgon pa'i gnas su mchis nas gzungs 'd-i bzlas te phyag rgya 'di bgyis nas/ sems rtse gcig tu sangs rgyas rnams mig sngar mngon sum du bzhugs par yid la bgyis te/ gdugs mtshan gcig la dus drug
du 'thol bshags bgyis na/ sangs rgyas rnams kyang mngon sum du 'gyur zhing / bsod nams kyi phung po chen po tshad ma mchis dpag tu ma mchis brjod du ma mchis pa rnams kyang 'thob par 'gyur lags so/ /

de la byang chub sems dpa' mig stong dang ldan pas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dgug pa'i phyag rgya ni 'di lags te/ sngar sug pa lag pa g.yon pa'i sor mo bzhi khu tshur bcang bar bgyi'o/ /de'i rjes la sug pa

lag pa g.yas pas g.yon pa'i mthe bo khu tshur bcangs pa bzhin bcangs nas lag pa g.yon pa'i mthe bo lag pa g.yas pa'i chang pa'i gong du rtse mo phyung nas sug pa lag pa g.yas pa'i mdzub mo ni phan tshun du rgyu bar bgyi'o/ /sngags ni 'di

lta ste/ oM ku tsi ku tsi ku tsi ku tsa ya ri/ tsa ri tsa ri tsa ri le swA hA/ gzungs kyi phyag rgya dang sngags 'di ni bsam gyis mi khyab pas rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig mchis nyal kar phyag rgya 'di bgyis te/ sngags 'di

lan re bzlas shing snying gar phyag rgya lan re bgyi ba lan brgya rtsa brgyad tshang bar gyur na/ sems la ci dang ci 'dod pa rnams rmi lam du rig cing mthong bar 'gyur lags so/ /gang la la zhig rtag par phyag rgya 'di bgyis nas/

sngags 'di bzlas brjod bgyis na sdig pa thams cad byang nas byang chub kyi sems stong bar mi 'gyur bas gang zag de mtshan mo mchis nyal ba'i tshe g.yar lam na rgya cher 'phel zhing bkra shis par 'gyur/ g.yar lam na de bzhin gshegs pa

byang chub kyi shing drung du bzhugs nas lung ston pa dang / mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par 'gyur ba'i bar dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur/ tshangs pa dang / brgya byin dang / lha rnams kyang rtag tu nye bar mchis nas/ rim gro bgyid

yongs su bsrung bar 'gyur lags so/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' mig stong dang ldan pas lha dang / klu dang 'dre gdon sde brgyad po dgug pa'i phyag rgya ni 'di lags te/ 'greng nas sug pa rkang pa gnyis gshibs te/ sngar

sug pa lag pa g.yon pa'i mthe bo lag mthil du bkug nas/ sor mo bzhi khu tshur bcangs te snying gar bzhag go/ /de'i rjes la sug pa g.yas pa yang de bzhin du bgyis te/ lag pa g.yas pa rna drung du gtad nas mdzub

mo phan tshun du rgyu bar bgyi'o/ /sngags ni 'di lta ste/ na mo nI la kaN+Tha/ na mo Ar+ya sha pa ta swA hA/ na mo Ar+ya sha la swA hA/ e hi e hi swA hA/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gzungs dang phyag rgya 'di len

tam 'dzin tam klog gam/ 'don par bgyid na/ myur du tshe rabs bdun tshun chad kyi sngon gyi gnas kyi dngos po rjes su dran par 'gyur/ sbrul gdug pas zin par mi 'gyur ro/ /dug gis mi tshugs par 'gyur/ mtshon gyis gnod pa bgyid par

mi 'gyur/ rgyal pos gshe bar mi 'gyur/ nams kyang sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal myong bar mi 'gyur lags so/ /gang la la zhig gdugs re bzhin du rig sngags 'di 'don par bgyid na/ 'dre srin sde brgyad po rnams rig sngags

'don pa'i drung du nye bar mchis nas/ rig sngags 'don pa nyan par bgyid do/ /rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig 'dre gdon gyis zin par gyur na/ skud pa dkar po la sngags kyis btab ste/ sngags lan re bzla zhing mdud

pa re re mdud de/ mdud pa bzhi bcu rtsa dgu tshang bar bgyis nas de'i mgul du btags nas de'i nad sel bar 'gyur lags so/ /gal te yul gang du ltas ngan dang / rims nad byung ste/ yul mi mang du gum par gyur na/

rgyal po'i kun dga' ra ba dang / rdzing dag tu pad ma stong rtsa brgyad blangs te/ pad ma re re la sngags lan re btab nas zhugs kyi nang du bor te bas par bsregs na rims nad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur lags so/ /de la byang chub

sems dpa' mig stong dang ldan pa'i rnam par grol ba'i phyag rgya ni 'di lags te/ skyil mo dkrung bcas nas sngar sug pa lag pa g.yon pa'i gung mo mthe bo'i rtse mo dang sbyar te bkan la/ sor mo gzhan gsum ni brkyang nas pus mo g.yon

pa'i steng du gzhag par bgyi'o/ /de'i rjes la sug pa lag pa g.yas pa yang de bzhin du bgyis nas/ sug pa lag pa pus mo g.yas pa'i steng du kha sbub tu gzhag par bgyi'o/ /gang la la zhig rtag par phyag rgya 'di bgyis nas lus po

che'i sngags lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis na/ smon lam rnams yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhing / sdug bsngal rnams kyang rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig mi dge ba bcu

dang mtshams ma mchis pa lnga la sogs pa'i dngos sdig phun sum tshogs pa bgyis pas 'dzam bu'i gling gi sa ci mchis pa de dag thams cad rdul phra rab tu bgyis la/ rdul phra rab de re re yang bskal pa re re mngon par byung bar gyur na/ gang zag de dngos

sdig rnam pa sna tshogs bgyis pa'i dbang gis bskal pa grangs de snyed kyi bar du sems can dmyal bar ltung nas sdug bsngal myong zhing gtan du 'byung ba'i dus ma mchis pa zhig lags na yang / rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis ring bsrel dang

bcas pa'i sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar zla ba dkar po'i ngo tshes bcwa lnga la gdugs mtshan gcig zas bkum ste phyag rgya mdud nas rig sngags stong rtsa brgyad tshang bar bzlas na gong du bstan pa'i sdug bsngal de dag thams cad byang bar 'gyur te/

gal te byang bar mi 'gyur ro zhe na/ de lta bu'i gnas ma mchis lags so/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mig stong dang ldan pas rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa la rang dbang thob pa'i phyag rgya ni 'di lags te/

langs nas 'greng ste sngar sug pa g.yon pas sug pa rkang pa g.yon pa'i mthe bo la btsir nas khu tshur bcangs pa bzhin du bgyi'o/ /de'i rjes la sug pa lag pa g.yas pas g.yon pa'i lag ngar gyi steng du btsir nas/

lus po che'i sngags lan bdun 'don par bgyis na/ dpag tshad brgya stong du mar mchi 'tshal na yang dka' ba ma mchis par 'gyur lags so/ /sngags 'don pa'i tshe sgra 'byung bar mi bgyi'o/ /de la byang chub

sems dpa' mig stong dang ldan pas rdzu 'phrul la rang dbang thob pa'i phyag rgya ni 'di lags te/ sngar sug pa lag pa g.yon pa'i mthe bos mthe'u chung gi sen mo'i steng du reg par bgyi'o/ /de'i rjes la sug pa lag
pa g.yas pa yang de bzhin du bgyis nas/ sor mo gzhan gsum ni so sor yan par bsgreng ste/ lag ngar gyi tshigs sbyar nas spyi bo'i steng du gzhag ste/ lus po che'i sngags lan brgya rtsa brgyad 'don par

bgyid na/ drang srong 'phur te 'chi bdag dang 'dra bar rang dbang du mchi bar 'gyur lags so/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams sems rtse gcig tu spyan 'dren pa'i phyag rgya ni 'di lags te/ sug pa gnyis
nam mkha' la thal mo sbyar te/ lag ngar gyi tshigs sbyar nas mdzub mo gnyis ni phan tshun rgyu bar bgyi'o/ /sngags ni 'di lta ste/ oM a ro li ka te le/
lo ki bi do ya/ sarba ya dru/ bra maR+d+ha na ka ra ya pu ru swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ nyan thos chen po de dag dang /
byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / tshangs pa chen po dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig
rten thams cad bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /
byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug phyag stong spyan stong dang ldan pa thogs pa mi mnga' ba'i thugs rje chen po'i sems
rgya cher yongs su rdzogs pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ cho ga dang bcas pa/ rdzogs s+ho// //
zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de chos grub kyis rgya'i dpe las bsgyur te gtan la phab pa// //
